
-----title
瑞安 (出生地)
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='046208d8abaf496390bbe3beb88f9c70_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("046208d8abaf496390bbe3beb88f9c70");'><span id='046208d8abaf496390bbe3beb88f9c70_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1150&endYear=1161')">1150-1161年</a>，1-12岁</div><div id='046208d8abaf496390bbe3beb88f9c70' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1150&endYear=1150')">1150年5月9日</a>　五月九日，生于瑞安。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1151&endYear=1153')">1151-1153年</a>　居家。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1154&endYear=1154')">1154年</a>　常嬉同县林正仲家。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1155&endYear=1158')">1155-1158年</a>　居家。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1159&endYear=1159')">1159年</a>　能属文。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1160&endYear=1160')">1160年</a>　年初识陈傅良于林元章家。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1161&endYear=1161')">1161年</a>　读书属文。<br /></div>

-----title
温州（永嘉）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='5b75671842134e03a307a76095a72941_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("5b75671842134e03a307a76095a72941");'><span id='5b75671842134e03a307a76095a72941_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1162&endYear=1164')">1162-1164年</a>，13-15岁</div><div id='5b75671842134e03a307a76095a72941' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1162&endYear=1162')">1162年</a>　随父自瑞安迁居永嘉，因家贫，数年中随僦随迁。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1163&endYear=1163')">1163年</a>　毛崇主持南湖学塾，聘陈傅良主讲，叶适曾在此受教。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1163&endYear=1163')">1163年</a>　从戴溪、王楠、陈武等游。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1163&endYear=1163')">1163年</a>　在永嘉楠溪从刘愚、李伯钧等人学习。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1164&endYear=1164')">1164年</a>　是年学诗文，即弃去，学为时文，以求功名。求教于温州州学教授刘夙及其弟刘朔。并与刘夙之子弥正、刘朔之子起晦为友。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='dcc12f0d6dd94052bcd2a4a06d050556_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("dcc12f0d6dd94052bcd2a4a06d050556");'><span id='dcc12f0d6dd94052bcd2a4a06d050556_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1172&endYear=1172')">1172年</a>　母杜氏病，回家侍疾。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='7ec67c263aa64bfe913bc01c4436b16f_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("7ec67c263aa64bfe913bc01c4436b16f");'><span id='7ec67c263aa64bfe913bc01c4436b16f_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1174&endYear=1174')">1174年</a>，25岁</div><div id='7ec67c263aa64bfe913bc01c4436b16f' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>是年或稍后，作《白纻词》<div id='poem_80079' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_80079' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/80079?labeling=true' target='_blank'>白纻词</a><span class='authorDate'>（1174年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_80079")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_80079_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_80079'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_80079'>有美一人兮表独处，陟彼南山兮伐寒纻。<div id='poem_sentence_0_80079_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_80079'>挑灯细缉抽苦心，冰花织成雪为缕。<div id='poem_sentence_1_80079_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_80079'>不忧绝技无人学，只愁不堪嫁时著。<div id='poem_sentence_2_80079_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_80079'>郑侨吴札今悠悠，争看买笑锦缠头。<div id='poem_sentence_3_80079_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_80079'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_80079_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>代人为叶衡作启。作品：贺叶丞相。<div id='poem_1285873' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1285873' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1285873?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺叶丞相启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1174年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1285873")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1285873_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1285873'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1285873'>伏审诞敷明命，宠陟上台。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1285873_comment'></div>宗社所临，独当眷赉之厚；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1285873_comment'></div>臣工是式，庶几观听之新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1285873_comment'></div>伏惟庆尉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1285873_comment'></div>国家若稽治本，灼见俊心，考其盛衰之原，必关用舍之际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1285873_comment'></div>三杰未臣于高帝，秦、项方争；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1285873_comment'></div>十夫既翼于武王，商、奄斯剪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1285873_comment'></div>虽异世每烦于兴叹，而并时尝患于不遭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1285873_comment'></div>惟管仲之相齐，与孔明之佐蜀，皆以偏隅之地，坐收强霸之勋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1285873_comment'></div>盖上之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1285873", 1285873, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>相信</span>，无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1285873", 1285873, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>枘凿</span>之乖；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1285873_comment'></div>故己得专行，有符节之合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1285873_comment'></div>事罔间以儒陋之学，功不逾于素定之谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1285873_comment'></div>维时真人，勃兴昌运。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1285873_comment'></div>亟更元宰，卑房、杜而不庸；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1285873_comment'></div>梦想天民，宜稷、契之自至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1285873_comment'></div>伏惟某官，器钟嵩、岳之厚，才配唐、虞之难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1285873_comment'></div>从容烦乱之中，有如□□；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1285873_comment'></div>踊跃功名之会，动中事几。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1285873_comment'></div>体坤顺以承天，躬谦劳而接下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1285873_comment'></div>遹樊子男之服，入均卿士之尊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1285873_comment'></div>漕输江、淮，屏翰吴、楚；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1285873_comment'></div>擢参<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1285873", 1285873, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>华近</span>，密契圣神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1285873_comment'></div>地官兼掌贰之隆，政府历东西之峻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1285873_comment'></div>未能独任，容有累于设施；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1285873_comment'></div>命以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1285873", 1285873, "Clauses/52/Comments/0")'>仔肩</span>，固显示于德行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1285873_comment'></div>方今内康四海，外总六师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1285873_comment'></div>刘晏得君，财茍匮而何患；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1285873_comment'></div>吉甫任政，官虽冗而自清。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1285873_comment'></div>钦闻卓异之名，一洗因循之陋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1285873_comment'></div>某衰舛自屏，欣幸滋深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1285873_comment'></div>外合搢绅之公言，内慰<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1285873", 1285873, "Clauses/65/Comments/0")'>钧陶</span>之私愿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1285873_comment'></div>不腆缄縢之敬，莫伸庭著之仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1285873_comment'></div>愧喜兼怀，敷陈奚既！</div><div id='poem_sentence_32_1285873_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>代人为龚茂良作启。作品：贺龚参政。<div id='poem_1285874' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1285874' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1285874?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺龚参政启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1174年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1285874")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1285874_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1285874'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1285874'>伏审独由上旨，参贰国钧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1285874_comment'></div>涣号初颁，交庆仁人之用；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1285874_comment'></div>寻纲肆举，益振本朝之尊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1285874_comment'></div>伏惟欢尉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1285874_comment'></div>切观贤俊之所立，无如出处之最难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1285874_comment'></div>自其养望于具僚之中，则有致身于上宰之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1285874_comment'></div>苟惟达志，建国无穷之基；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1285874_comment'></div>庶几得君，俾民与被其泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1285874_comment'></div>自期甚厚，成效罕闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1285874_comment'></div>时益变迁，既乖所学之素；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1285874_comment'></div>事乃丛委，或违应务之周。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1285874_comment'></div>而又气不足以行其言，节不足以徇其道，黾勉积禄，沈酣奉身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1285874_comment'></div>功名之垂，逝云邈矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1285874_comment'></div>社稷之固，将何诿焉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1285874_comment'></div>然物之萃者势必升，阴之剥者阳必复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1285874_comment'></div>天地交泰，君臣会通，是生命世之英，出任天下之重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1285874_comment'></div>某官德博而道大，体备而用全。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1285874_comment'></div>元化运于四时，莫测机缄之际；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1285874_comment'></div>善驭调于八骏，靡勤衔勒之劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1285874_comment'></div>屹然公辅之资，蚤著谏垣之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1285874_comment'></div>惠流旧楚，声冠中都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1285874_comment'></div>民具十年之瞻，帝求一德之赉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1285874_comment'></div>果发大议，分别忠邪；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1285874_comment'></div>多举训词，旁招俊乂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1285874_comment'></div>岂徒<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1285874", 1285874, "Clauses/51/Comments/0")'>因陋就简</span>，袭制度于汉、唐之馀；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1285874_comment'></div>必将<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1285874", 1285874, "Clauses/53/Comments/0")'>用夏变夷</span>，复<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1285874", 1285874, "Clauses/54/Comments/0")'>版籍</span>于祖宗之故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1285874_comment'></div>伫超鼎铉，大布甄衡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1285874_comment'></div>某顷参御史之僚，老领偏郡之乏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1285874_comment'></div>茫茫其远，深愧大夫之从；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1285874_comment'></div>断断无他，尚冀黎民之保。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1285874_comment'></div>忽闻新命，喜倍常伦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1285874_comment'></div>木德方亨，水行未殄，伏乞为时自寿，少尉群情。</div><div id='poem_sentence_31_1285874_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='66009a1477dc49458f47414be3094248_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("66009a1477dc49458f47414be3094248");'><span id='66009a1477dc49458f47414be3094248_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1175&endYear=1175')">1175年</a>，26岁</div><div id='66009a1477dc49458f47414be3094248' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1175&endYear=1175')">1175年</a>　冬，返温州，与吕祖谦有书札来往。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='5985aa36747a4b3c9cd01b2b698cf9fc_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("5985aa36747a4b3c9cd01b2b698cf9fc");'><span id='5985aa36747a4b3c9cd01b2b698cf9fc_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1177&endYear=1177')">1177年</a>，28岁</div><div id='5985aa36747a4b3c9cd01b2b698cf9fc' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>因翰林学士周必大以门客名义推荐，参加两浙东路转运使司类试，得以“发解”，名置前列。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>户部尚书韩彦直调任温州知州，开浚城内河道，请叶适作记。作品：东嘉开河记。<div id='poem_1286140' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286140' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286140?labeling=true' target='_blank'>东嘉开河记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1177年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286140")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286140_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286140'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286140'>温州并南海以东，地常燠少寒，上壤而下湿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286140_comment'></div>昔之置郡者，环外内城皆为河，分画坊巷，横贯旁午，升高望之，如画奕局。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286140_comment'></div>永嘉非水之汇而河之聚者，不特以便运输，达舟楫也，而以节地性，防人灾，安居利用之大意也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286140_comment'></div>其后承国家生养之盛，市里充满，至于桥水堤岸而为屋，其故河亦狭矣，而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1286140", 1286140, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>河政</span>又以不修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286140_comment'></div>长吏岁发闾伍之民以浚之，或慢不能应，反取河滨之积实之渊中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286140_comment'></div>故大川浅不胜舟，而小者<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1286140", 1286140, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>纳污藏秽</span>，流泉不来，感为疠疫，民之病此，积四五十年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286140_comment'></div>淳熙四年，户部尚书韩公之来守也，其九月，即用州之钱米有籍无名者合四十馀万，益以私钱五十万，命幕僚兴州之社里长募閒民，为工一万三千有奇，举环城之河以丈率者二万三百有奇，取泥出甓，两岸成丘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286140_comment'></div>村农闻之，争喜负去，一日几尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286140_comment'></div>毕事，则天雨两旬，于是洒濯<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1286140", 1286140, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>流荡</span>，而水之集者，深漫清泚，通利<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1286140", 1286140, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>流演</span>，虽远坊曲巷，皆有轻舟至其下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286140_comment'></div>民既得以舒郁滞，导和乐，而公之治遂以清平而成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286140_comment'></div>盖先王之政，以养人为大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286140_comment'></div>生聚所资，衣食之有无，此上之责也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286140_comment'></div>封疆道路，城郭沟池，其修补<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1286140", 1286140, "Clauses/60/Comments/0")'>浚治</span>之功，此民之力所能自为也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286140_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1286140", 1286140, "Clauses/62/Comments/0")'>如使</span>官亦为之，则费而难给矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286140_comment'></div>后世道失，乃以废官益民者为政之大，然吏惧其费而不复为之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286140_comment'></div>或不知而一委之民也，而其劝之或不以其道，使之或不尽其术，则徒扰扰而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286140_comment'></div>夫上之于下，岂必与之较哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286140_comment'></div>民以为不能者，官自为之可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286140_comment'></div>民有四五十年之病而上无一日之救，则非仁者之用心也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286140_comment'></div>公之为是役也，可以知其仁矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286140_comment'></div>故州之人相与刻石记之，以载公之仁，亦欲使后来者知所考云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1286140_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='c7ba459ddf8b491383ac8416dd3e722a_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("c7ba459ddf8b491383ac8416dd3e722a");'><span id='c7ba459ddf8b491383ac8416dd3e722a_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1178&endYear=1181')">1178-1181年</a>，29-32岁</div><div id='c7ba459ddf8b491383ac8416dd3e722a' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1178&endYear=1178')">1178年</a>　致函周必大，表示谢意。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1178&endYear=1178')">1178年6月23日</a>　六月二十三日，母杜氏病亡，叶适丁忧守制。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1178&endYear=1178')">1178年</a>　为陈鹏飞撰墓志铭。作品：陈少男墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286170' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286170' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286170?labeling=true' target='_blank'>陈少南墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1178年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286170")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286170_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286170'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286170'>少南以谪死，葬不及铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286170_comment'></div>后三十年，当淳熙五年三月己酉，改葬于旧墓南百步先人之侧，其子六龄，始次叙本末，请铭于余。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286170_comment'></div>少南姓陈氏，讳鹏飞，少南其字也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286170_comment'></div>自为布衣，以经术文辞名当世，教学诸生数百人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286170_comment'></div>其于经，不为章句新说，至君父人伦、世变风俗之际，必反复详至而趋于深厚，今世所刊曰《诗书传》者是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286170_comment'></div>其晚而始得仕，用之未及而斥逐以死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286170_comment'></div>既死不泯灭，而南方学者尤思之，至今称焉，犹曰少南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286170_comment'></div>故因而不改，所以记也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286170_comment'></div>少南，温州永嘉人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286170_comment'></div>曾祖某，祖戬，父公谟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286170_comment'></div>少南举进士再为第一，中绍兴十二年甲科。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286170_comment'></div>授左迪功郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286170_comment'></div>明州鄞县主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286170_comment'></div>移浙西安抚司属官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286170_comment'></div>召对，为博士太学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286170_comment'></div>以视学恩，改承奉郎，说书崇政殿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286170_comment'></div>除尚书礼部员外郎，兼资善堂赞读，复兼说书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286170_comment'></div>初建太学，承中原丧乱，士未知所向。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286170_comment'></div>司业高闶始更造学法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286170_comment'></div>及少南以文字起，多所接纳，而江左俊秀李冲、詹左、张相、范端臣、林光朝等应其选，由是绍兴之文见矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286170_comment'></div>上知其名儒，敬待之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286170_comment'></div>经筵论周平王归鲁仲子之赗，上忽问：「母以子贵，何也」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286170_comment'></div>讲读官变色踧踖不敢对。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286170_comment'></div>少南从容开析其所以然，既而曰：「舜、禹皆圣人，兴于贱微，其父母待之而后显，所以贵也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286170_comment'></div>若失道与民以忧其父母，则非所以为贵，此孔氏所以戒也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286170_comment'></div>上为欣然听纳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286170_comment'></div>初，秦丞相子熺学于少南，丞相既重少南，且以熺故，遂骤引用，以博士为讲官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286170_comment'></div>其为礼部郎也，熺为其侍郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286170_comment'></div>少南谓熺子弟未习事，所下文案多不应法，批其后还之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286170_comment'></div>每见丞相，言：「荆、襄可为都以控接北方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286170_comment'></div>今置郊祀坛、都驿亭，劳费甚矣，是不动吴、越而忘雠耻以自佚也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286170_comment'></div>及上前讲解，多引尊君卑臣之义，崇抑予夺，有所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1286170", 1286170, "Clauses/90/Comments/0")'>开讽</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286170_comment'></div>自是丞相见少南礼甚恭，意浸不悦，而熺尤不平，遂以御史疏罢归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286170_comment'></div>明年，主管崇道观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286170_comment'></div>上将复召，有自南还者，执政问少南何为，时适彗见，则对曰：「睹妖星，聚饮为乐耳」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286170_comment'></div>由是除名，居于惠州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286170_comment'></div>福建盗起，少南徒步循江南踰岭数千里而至，妻子不能从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286170_comment'></div>绍兴十八年，少南居四年矣，得瘴疾卒，年五十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286170_comment'></div>会有乡人经略广东，得以丧归，葬于瓯浦之原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286170_comment'></div>娶王氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286170_comment'></div>子一人，六龄也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1286170_comment'></div>二女，适周季显、徐贯之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1286170_comment'></div>孙男二人，曰载，曰古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1286170_comment'></div>有《管见集》十卷，《罗浮集》二卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1286170_comment'></div>少南性简重，言动有准。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1286170_comment'></div>自幼而孤，以专志勤苦成其名，于声利乐欲无所动。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1286170_comment'></div>其学为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_46_1286170", 1286170, "Clauses/131/Comments/0")'>通博</span>，而多识治乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1286170_comment'></div>在人主左右，谋议<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_47_1286170", 1286170, "Clauses/134/Comments/0")'>箴切</span>，皆合大体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1286170_comment'></div>上亦自欲用之，而不幸有所牵制，一不屈节，即坐贬死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1286170_comment'></div>及秦丞相薨，诸常所排摈，随小大收用无遗，而少南独以先卒，无为言者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1286170_comment'></div>乾道中，时宰欲上其事，庶几天子慨然追录其后，卒不果。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1286170_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1286170_comment'></div>少南之所立不少概见而至此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1286170_comment'></div>宰相必用士，士必修洁博习以待用，治世之常理也，而其进退离合若此，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1286170_comment'></div>故士有卓然著见而不污其所为者矣，其遂可以为贤耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1286170_comment'></div>其亦有幸不幸耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1286170_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_56_1286170'>古时会通俊良集，左皋右夔助引汲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1286170_comment'></div>忽非其逢牵挽入，自行志义以维絷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1286170_comment'></div>吁嗟少南兮，命胡弗长！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1286170_comment'></div>放彼南服兮，奄沦亡！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1286170_comment'></div>永终一世兮，改厥藏，后如有考兮，视铭章。</div><div id='poem_sentence_60_1286170_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1179&endYear=1179')">1179年</a>　与永嘉知县宋绍恭有交，其子宋驹从叶适问学。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1179&endYear=1179')">1179年</a>　为林升卿作序。作品：与平阳林升卿谋葬父序。<div id='poem_1285887' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1285887' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1285887?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与平阳林升卿谋葬父序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1179年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1285887")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1285887_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1285887'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1285887'>林君好学有文，贫不能葬其父，属余为之言，余谢以母丧犹在殡，方图葬未克，不忍言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1285887_comment'></div>林君乃言：「吾先人葬大父时，乡先生林英伯为谋于江南故人叔材，亦得治墓葬，不以为嫌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1285887_comment'></div>今其无可辞」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1285887_comment'></div>余闻而伤之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1285887_comment'></div>士贫累世，命也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1285887_comment'></div>若死不能得葬，乞于人而后葬，此贫之至，不可讳之极也，亦可以继世为之乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1285887_comment'></div>何子遇之深也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1285887_comment'></div>虽然，不可以讳此名而使其亲不得葬也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1285887_comment'></div>其往告之，当有见哀者。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1285887_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1180&endYear=1180')">1180年</a>　在家守制，与宋绍恭、宋驹父子仍有往来。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1180&endYear=1180')">1180年</a>　郑伯熊自宁国府知府秩满回家，秋间除知建宁府，叶适以诗相送。作品：送郑景望二首。<div id='poem_80003' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_80003' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/80003?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送郑景望二首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1180年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_80003")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_80003_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_80003'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_80003'>两地旌旗一闰中，十年<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_80003", 80003, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>监牧</span>九卿崇。<div id='poem_sentence_0_80003_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_80003'>安舆遍就东南养，遗俗将陶雅颂功。<div id='poem_sentence_1_80003_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_80003'>爱护元身如宝玉，节宣时序戒螟螽。<div id='poem_sentence_2_80003_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_80003'>遥知独上千山路，处处梅花逐煖风。<div id='poem_sentence_3_80003_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_80003'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_80003_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_80002' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_80002' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/80002?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1180年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_80002_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_80002'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_80002'>江左诸贤尽凋落，迩来名字未深知。<div id='poem_sentence_0_80002_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_80002'>愿公年德加前辈，救世勋庸莫后时。<div id='poem_sentence_1_80002_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_80002'>国重四维人建立，天还一统道藩篱。<div id='poem_sentence_2_80002_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_80002'>弥纶康济何曾极，自古忠臣不远期。<div id='poem_sentence_3_80002_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_80002'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_80002_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1180&endYear=1180')">1180年</a>　秋，陈亮至永嘉，叶适、陈傅良、许及之等相聚。陈亮带有吕祖谦致叶适信，叶适复函托陈亮代致吕祖谦。陈亮归时，叶适等在江心屿饯行。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1180&endYear=1180')">1180年7月</a>　七月，叶适服满。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1180&endYear=1180')">1180年</a>　冬，叶适与高氏结婚。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1180&endYear=1180')">1180年</a>　平阳陈昂等人从学。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1181&endYear=1181')">1181年7月</a>　改任武昌军节度推官。六月，史浩荐赴都堂审察。七月，叶适上书赵雄，乞辞不赴。擢浙西提刑司干办公事。作品：与赵丞相书。<div id='poem_1285861' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1285861' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1285861?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与赵丞相书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1181年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1285861")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1285861_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1285861'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1285861'>某皇恐再拜上书大丞相阁下：某往岁集英之对，山林朴野，言无可采。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1285861_comment'></div>相公时在<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1285861", 1285861, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>政府</span>，实拔异之，使某由此有闻于世，虽尝奉启陈谢，而不敢叙道其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1285861", 1285861, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>感戴</span>之私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1285861_comment'></div>甫还<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1285861", 1285861, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>里舍</span>，祸变不测，先妣倾丧，方痛苦号呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1285861_comment'></div>而闻相公进位上宰，独荷重任，天下企竦以观新政，某又不得以衔茹荼毒之馀，与搢绅群士同致其咏歌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1285861_comment'></div>比者免丧不死，亦几年矣，则又以为州县卑冗之官，不宜辄通姓名作文字以干宰相，而自取于僭冒弃绝之罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1285861_comment'></div>盖相公之经纬密勿，在于政事之几：进退百官，在于人才之贤不肖；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1285861_comment'></div>其功业之著见，在于民心；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1285861_comment'></div>而为国家长远宏大之规，在于邪正消长之际：固非一士之言语能私致其轻重，而某所以辄疏远自外于门下者，直欲自明其区区之义而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1285861_comment'></div>顾今日之势，非一吐露<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1285861", 1285861, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>情款</span>于相公，则区区之义不足以自明，不当复以疏远自外为言者，亦惟相公有以察之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1285861_comment'></div>某之不肖甚矣，欲强学也而质不敏，欲力行也而心不逮，虽有其志而才能不踰于中人，顾尝怛然而内恐，望古人而不可复及也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1285861_comment'></div>今者少师史公，以得还之谢，荐达海内之贤，而使若某者获与十五人之中；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1285861_comment'></div>主上以史公之重，例令审察，而使若某者遽在升擢之数；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1285861_comment'></div>相公出命庙堂，招纳英俊，而使若某者得以收召而察其才之所堪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1285861_comment'></div>闻命之日，惭汗悚仄，不能出<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1285861", 1285861, "Clauses/57/Comments/0")'>声气</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1285861_comment'></div>盖前日之忝窃科第，视其等伦，已<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1285861", 1285861, "Clauses/60/Comments/0")'>超越</span>甚矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1285861_comment'></div>使不服勤幕职，尝试吏事，而遂躐他途以希进取，则不惟丧失名义，而他日之法令事功，疏拙<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1285861", 1285861, "Clauses/66/Comments/0")'>旷废</span>，将有面墙之羞，以辜朝廷<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1285861", 1285861, "Clauses/68/Comments/0")'>器使</span>之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1285861_comment'></div>而况今之武昌，以格待次，有问学读书之闲，使不能补治其所不足，而骤以未习之学施之于用，则必有迂阔不通之讥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1285861_comment'></div>二者，揆之于私，无一而可，此某所以欲行而不敢也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1285861_comment'></div>某又复思念，史公采虚名之誉，以足其所荐而已，不必以为真可举；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1285861_comment'></div>主上之恩，相公之命，不欲于史公之荐有所择而已，不必以为真可察。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1285861_comment'></div>而某幕僚得试吏之勤，待次有为学之暇，可以自守其义，而无负朝廷<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1285861", 1285861, "Clauses/90/Comments/0")'>器使</span>之意，则相公不必责其当至也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1285861_comment'></div>夫可辞而犹不辞，则人必以为冒；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1285861_comment'></div>不可辞而犹辞，人必以为矫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1285861_comment'></div>今未至于矫而有近于冒，则以相公长养人才之心，而惜其去就进退之义，宜不惮于敷陈以听其所乞也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1285861_comment'></div>故已具公状申省，而又以其私告相公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1285861_comment'></div>烦渎皇恐，死罪死罪！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1285861_comment'></div>秋序浸凉，伏乞为国自重。</div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1285861_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1181&endYear=1181')">1181年7月3日</a>　七月初三，郑伯熊卒于建宁知府任上，归葬永嘉。叶适作祭文。作品：祭郑景望龙图文。<div id='poem_1286318' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286318' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286318?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭郑景望龙图文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1181年7月3日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286318")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286318_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286318'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286318'>呜呼郑公！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286318_comment'></div>官虽不为贱，而未得要地以建明；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286318_comment'></div>年虽不为夭，而遽委慈亲以先卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286318_comment'></div>在物理而不然，抱此疑兮安诘！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286318_comment'></div>一人为善，福及彝伦，至其大者，国命攸存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286318_comment'></div>岂善人之猥多，致神祐之靡专。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286318_comment'></div>自死自生，或寿或夭，惟其所遭，莫适控告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286318_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286318_comment'></div>历观近岁，贤者之志，各出其力，以救斯世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286318_comment'></div>然而质有厚薄，意有同异，疏者受侮，刚者见忌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286318_comment'></div>上下之交不合，君臣之心罔契。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286318_comment'></div>嗟宝玉之误斥，难复登于衮佩，而犹沦谢灭没，不存一二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286318_comment'></div>匪摧栋以折轴，将丧朋而亡类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286318_comment'></div>惟公顺正静密，夷旷粹冲，不违其心，不襮其躬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286318_comment'></div>出处进退，潜涵显融，谤誉不及，庶几中庸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286318_comment'></div>此愚不肖，谓如公者，可以系天下之望而待万物之会通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286318_comment'></div>区区之心，冀其德业之愈懋，年寿之日隆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286318_comment'></div>宜百龄而未已，曾一病以殂终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286318_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286318_comment'></div>某之于公，长幼分殊，登门晚矣，承教则疏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286318_comment'></div>自闻公丧，昼喟夜吁，茫茫长空，恸不可呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286318_comment'></div>死生一诀，公其享欤！</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1286318_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1181&endYear=1181')">1181年</a>　作诗祭郑伯熊。作品：哭郑丈四首。<div id='poem_80017' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_80017' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/80017?labeling=true' target='_blank'>哭郑丈四首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1181年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_80017")'>叶适</a></span><br id='poem_sentence_0_80017'>道义秦城重，声名冀马空。<div id='poem_sentence_0_80017_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_80017'>河汾谈圣制，邹鲁振儒风。<div id='poem_sentence_1_80017_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_80017'>有学堪经世，无官可效忠。<div id='poem_sentence_2_80017_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_80017'>浮云公岂计，吾道自怜穷。<div id='poem_sentence_3_80017_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_80017'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_80017_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_80016' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_80016' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/80016?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1181年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_80016_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_80016'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_80016'>谁谓居今世，无由见古人。<div id='poem_sentence_0_80016_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_80016'>事亲曾闵上，游世葛怀民。<div id='poem_sentence_1_80016_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_80016'>德盛天为侣，慈薰物与春。<div id='poem_sentence_2_80016_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_80016'>清风如尚想，犹足洗嚣尘。<div id='poem_sentence_3_80016_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_80016'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_80016_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_80015' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_80015' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/80015?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1181年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_80015_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_80015'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_80015'>插架轴三万，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_80015", 80015, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>撑肠</span>卷五千。<div id='poem_sentence_0_80015_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_80015'>京都通百郡，溟渤汇群川。<div id='poem_sentence_1_80015_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_80015'>深浅人随汲，东西意各便。<div id='poem_sentence_2_80015_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_80015'>后生无复见，媚学谩<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_80015", 80015, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>跹跹</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_80015_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_80015'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_80015_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_80014' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_80014' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/80014?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其四 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1181年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_80014_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_80014'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_80014'>忆在诸生列，曾窥太史书。<div id='poem_sentence_0_80014_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_80014'>泉蒙烦浚达，质槁费<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_80014", 80014, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>吹嘘</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_80014_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_80014'>外宅宁成相，生刍早吊闾。<div id='poem_sentence_2_80014_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_80014'>临风两行泪，愁绝向輀车。<div id='poem_sentence_3_80014_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_80014'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_80014_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='940bc2f109b94db9ae0e15856be79f14_label'><a href='javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1181&endYear=1181')">1181年</a>，32岁</div><div id='940bc2f109b94db9ae0e15856be79f14' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1181&endYear=1181')">1181年11月</a>　十一月，为白石净慧寺撰写经藏记。作品：白石净慧院经藏记。<div id='poem_1286104' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286104' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286104?labeling=true' target='_blank'>白石净慧院经藏记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1181年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286104")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286104_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286104'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286104'>乐清之山，东则雁荡，西则白石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286104_comment'></div>舟行至上水，陆见巨石冠于崖首，势甚壮伟，去之尚数十里外，险绝有奇致。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286104_comment'></div>其山麓漫平，深泉衍流，多香草大木。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286104_comment'></div>陆地尤美，居之者黄、钱二家，累世不贫，以文义自笃为秀士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286104_comment'></div>北山有小学舍，余少所讲习之地也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286104_comment'></div>常沿流上下，读书以忘日月，间亦从黄氏父子渔钓，岛屿萦错可游者十数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286104_comment'></div>有杨翁者，善种花，余或来玩其花，必大喜，延请无倦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286104_comment'></div>间又游于其所谓净慧院者，院僧择饶善诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286104_comment'></div>义充、从岳、文捷，皆黄氏子，终老不出户，而从岳又以其兄子仲参为子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286104_comment'></div>余时虽尚少，见其能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1286104", 1286104, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>侃然</span>自得于山谷之间，未尝不叹其风俗之淳，而记其泉石之美，既去而不能忘也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286104_comment'></div>盖天下之俗，往往皆如是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286104_comment'></div>使为上者知冒之以道，而不以偏駮之政乱之，则以余所闻于古人之治，何不可致之有哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286104_comment'></div>他日，仲参忽来谒余，叙其所以为别者，盖已十五六年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286104_comment'></div>问其旧人，则择饶、义充、从岳、文捷皆死矣，其他老人，多无在者，杨翁者亦已死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286104_comment'></div>而草木衰谢，不复可识，因相对感怆久之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286104_comment'></div>问其院之兴废，则曰：「门庑殿堂库湢之室，昔以毁而缺者，今粗具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286104_comment'></div>独转经藏，屋庐闳丽，像设精严，殆为一院之极，此今之所创而昔之所无也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286104_comment'></div>于是仲参请曰：「此经藏者，先人以垂死之言，命余辍其学而为之者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286104_comment'></div>虽不敢有其劳，亦无废于先人之命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286104_comment'></div>以公昔之所尝游而今问之之悉也，盍为我记焉」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286104_comment'></div>余既嘉其以成先志为孝，而重其申故旧之请，且因可以记余之所不忘者，故不得辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286104_comment'></div>问其院之始末，则曰：「始建于唐之龙纪，为广教集云，而今名净慧者，大中祥符之所锡也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286104_comment'></div>其在政和，尝易为道士之观，而后还为院。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286104_comment'></div>既还而睦州盗起，焚于宣和之三年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286104_comment'></div>而淳熙三年十一月朔，则此藏之始建也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286104_comment'></div>八年十一月。</div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1286104_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1181&endYear=1181')">1181年</a>　冬，叶适赴浙西提刑司干办公事任，陈傅良有诗相送。行前，转行李于妻家，邻舍火灾，被焚略尽。致书黄岩林鼐。作品：与黄岩林元秀书。<span class='inlineComment2'>（陈傅良有诗《送叶正则赴浙西宪幕》）</span><div id='poem_1285864' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1285864' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1285864?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与黄岩林元秀书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1181年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1285864")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1285864_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1285864'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1285864'>上覆元秀、国材二兄：尊友姚君俞之行，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1285864", 1285864, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>附讯</span>必达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1285864_comment'></div>忽领来教，慰喜不可言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1285864_comment'></div>冬中凝冱，伏惟侍奉有相，尊履万福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1285864_comment'></div>侯官事简，而闽中县多佳，非江、浙费力之比，但益入南，非有志者所宜往耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1285864_comment'></div>自君举要觅福倅，某有此说，渠不以为然，今亦从此论也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1285864_comment'></div>添创屋已毕否？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1285864_comment'></div>且喜国材亲事有期，见从黄岩来者，皆云国材近日学问之规模甚严，而此讯乃不曾说及，何耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1285864_comment'></div>向亦曾说及子静事，不知曾记忆否？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1285864_comment'></div>世之所谓无志者，混然随流俗，颓堕于声利而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1285864_comment'></div>及其有志，则又以考之不详，资之不深，随其所论，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1285864", 1285864, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>牵陷</span>于寡浅<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1285864", 1285864, "Clauses/32/Comments/1")'>缺废</span>之地，此自古之所患，是与无志者同为流俗也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1285864_comment'></div>与二君<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1285864", 1285864, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>亲厚</span>，非复他人之比，每愿相聚数日，讲学其所当言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1285864_comment'></div>而事役参差，竟不一遂，将如之何！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1285864_comment'></div>牒试俟到官不容不尽力，有即报矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1285864_comment'></div>或因此得早来吴中，岂非幸会！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1285864_comment'></div>改习《尚书》甚好，取人差宽，又省力耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1285864_comment'></div>某今岁家事劳费，又倍于前时，所谓久之无间然者，外间之说，是诚如此，然二兄未知其故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1285864_comment'></div>新妇曾有娠，数月而失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1285864_comment'></div>妇女兼后生，当此艰难百罹，内外极觉无意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1285864_comment'></div>况但业如此，无可论者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1285864_comment'></div>浙西之行，已取此月二十八日就道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1285864_comment'></div>临期转行李于妻家，一宵邻舍火作，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1285864", 1285864, "Clauses/66/Comments/0")'>生生</span>之具<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1285864", 1285864, "Clauses/66/Comments/1")'>燔爇</span>略尽，尤可叹笑也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1285864_comment'></div>某行役兼之灾变，颇复<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1285864", 1285864, "Clauses/69/Comments/0")'>扰冗</span>，未能别有所言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1285864_comment'></div>须到吴复作书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1285864_comment'></div>万先生事，曾属象先矣，恐未易集，奈何！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1285864_comment'></div>老兄不可不频惠书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1285864_comment'></div>馀祝自厚，不宣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1285864_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1181&endYear=1181')">1181年</a>　是年，与永嘉知县宋绍恭仍有来往。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1181&endYear=1181')">1181年</a>　乐清钱易直从学。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='415f198d3d1f4a14920ebfd75bdd348e_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("415f198d3d1f4a14920ebfd75bdd348e");'><span id='415f198d3d1f4a14920ebfd75bdd348e_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1189&endYear=1189')">1189年</a>，40岁</div><div id='415f198d3d1f4a14920ebfd75bdd348e' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1189&endYear=1189')">1189年6月</a>　六月，离乡赴湖北江陵任所，门人陈志崇相送，乞为其兄陈岩作墓志铭。作品：陈君墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286178' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286178' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286178?labeling=true' target='_blank'>陈君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1189年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286178")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286178_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286178'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286178'>平阳陈岩，字仲石，自其成童，智之所开，师友问学而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286178_comment'></div>年进志立，习通性明，服所知于家而宗族慕焉，信所行于里而乡党宾焉，意愈高，力愈下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286178_comment'></div>督责其身，不使一日纵于慢游也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286178_comment'></div>奉持其心，不使一思虑杂于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1286178", 1286178, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>邪妄</span>也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286178_comment'></div>训于经，讲于礼者，必欲周于事，达于物，不计事之异同，时之先后也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286178_comment'></div>其可见者若此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286178_comment'></div>呜呼岩也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286178_comment'></div>父之钜子，弟之任兄，师之传人，出而从宦，国之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1286178", 1286178, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>修士</span>也夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286178_comment'></div>如木升而为材可抡，如玉琢而为器可缫藉也夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286178_comment'></div>不幸年三十有五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286178_comment'></div>淳熙十五年十二月四日卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286178_comment'></div>明年三月，葬于安仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286178_comment'></div>其弟崇致其父及师之请曰：「愿有铭」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286178_comment'></div>夫悲哀其志意之不及于成就，此师友之所以为君痛也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286178_comment'></div>道丧久矣，士不修其实职，而皆以必用为贵，偶不获用为憾，志意之卓，祗重累焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286178_comment'></div>三代之时，道尝行矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286178_comment'></div>彼家淑其道，人有其善，孰从而尽用之！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286178_comment'></div>然则寿夭一也，用舍一也，君之自得以正其命，宜有人之所不及知者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286178_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_1286178'>恤尔妇，抚尔子，父母之力止矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286178_comment'></div>止而弗止，斯石纪之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1286178_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='c171d4b80f824fd98a585516bfe4bca2_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("c171d4b80f824fd98a585516bfe4bca2");'><span id='c171d4b80f824fd98a585516bfe4bca2_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1190&endYear=1190')">1190年</a>，41岁</div><div id='c171d4b80f824fd98a585516bfe4bca2' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1190&endYear=1190')">1190年10月</a>　陈亮再次入狱，陈亮门人喻南强来永嘉向叶适求援，叶曾予援救，无实效。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1190&endYear=1190')">1190年11月20日</a>　友人华阳范东叔(范祖禹之孙）好佛，叶适为其撰文指点。作品：觉斋记。<div id='poem_1286107' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286107' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286107?labeling=true' target='_blank'>觉斋记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1190年11月20日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286107")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286107_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286107'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286107'>所谓觉者，道德、仁义、天命、人事之理是已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286107_comment'></div>夫是理岂不素具而常存乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286107_comment'></div>其于人也，岂不均赋而无偏乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286107_comment'></div>然而无色无形，无对无待，其于是人也，必颖然独悟，必眇然特见，其耳目之聪明，心志之思虑，必有出于见闻觉知之外者焉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286107_comment'></div>不如是者，不足以得之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286107_comment'></div>古之人，其养是觉也何道？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286107_comment'></div>将非一趋于问学而不变乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286107_comment'></div>将非责难于师友而不息乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286107_comment'></div>将非先义而后利乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286107_comment'></div>将非笃于所以自为而不苟于所以为人乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286107_comment'></div>是其得之也，死生祸福齐焉，是非邪正定焉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286107_comment'></div>人之大伦，天下国家之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1286107", 1286107, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>经纪</span>，取极于是矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286107_comment'></div>余观三代之后，世远俗坏，士以利害得丧为准的，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1286107", 1286107, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>杂揉</span>其思虑，纷汩其聪明，以求参乎人情违顺之间；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286107_comment'></div>喜相玩也，怒相寇也，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1286107", 1286107, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>障固</span>其公共者使之狭小，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1286107", 1286107, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>阐辟</span>其专私者而更自以为广大也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286107_comment'></div>于时独悟特见之士，觉于道而违于世，昏然为天下大迷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286107_comment'></div>悲夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286107_comment'></div>以一人而觉一世之所迷，合一世以咻一人之所觉，其所谓问学师友之序，义利人己之辨，常患乎乍存乍亡、若起若灭，方与世俗交斗而未已也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286107_comment'></div>然则理虽常存，而觉之者病矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286107_comment'></div>及其甚也，异端之说至于中国，上不尽乎性命，下不达乎世俗，举以聪明为障，思虑为贼，颠错漫汗而谓之破巢窟，颓弛放散而谓之得本心，以愚求真，以粗合妙，而卒归之于无有，是又大异矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286107_comment'></div>然其知是也，其觉是也，亦必颖然独悟，亦必眇然特见，耳目之聪明，心志之思虑，亦必有出于见闻觉知而后可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286107_comment'></div>士徒厌夫<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1286107", 1286107, "Clauses/68/Comments/0")'>杂揉</span>纷汩之为己累也，遂舍而求之者十八九矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286107_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286107_comment'></div>聪明固无纷汩而正矣，思虑固无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1286107", 1286107, "Clauses/72/Comments/0")'>杂揉</span>而壹矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286107_comment'></div>道德仁义天命人事之理不可以有易也，夷夏之学不可以有乱也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286107_comment'></div>以世俗之觉蔽其中，而又以异端之觉夺其外，则理之素具者其不缺，而常存者其不隐乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286107_comment'></div>是故今士之于道，有二难焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286107_comment'></div>华阳范东叔，名燕居之斋曰觉，使余记之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286107_comment'></div>盖东叔之致其知深矣，故以余之所疑质焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286107_comment'></div>绍熙元年十一月二十日。</div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1286107_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='c2c8031223464541939a3507097817a0_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("c2c8031223464541939a3507097817a0");'><span id='c2c8031223464541939a3507097817a0_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1196&endYear=1200')">1196-1200年</a>，47-51岁</div><div id='c2c8031223464541939a3507097817a0' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1196&endYear=1196')">1196年3月</a>　是年道学继续被禁，三月，叶适遭监察御史胡竑论，降两官，放罢，回温州居住。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1196&endYear=1196')">1196年5月</a>　五月，为丁绍詹撰墓志铭。作品：丁绍詹墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286198' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286198' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286198?labeling=true' target='_blank'>丁少詹墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1196年5月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286198")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286198_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286198'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286198'>呜呼，学之难也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286198_comment'></div>质与性不合，年与人不并，幼而教之，时至而不得成其材，十且八九也，况不幸失教者乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286198_comment'></div>不幸失教，过其时乃能感励奋发，溯驰年，循定性，自成其材以收独至之功，若是者，世之异材异质也，盖跨都绵国得一二焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286198_comment'></div>虽然，其若是，岂徒然也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286198_comment'></div>天必厚之，使有发于事焉，使有施于时焉，位叙<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1286198", 1286198, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>显宠</span>，使不与常人者同焉，所以信夫学之难而成之于已废者为尤可贵也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286198_comment'></div>溯年而卒于逝，成材而无所发，始与常人异，终与常人同，若丁君希亮，余所谓可哀者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286198_comment'></div>希亮字少詹，台州黄岩人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286198_comment'></div>曾祖皓，祖旼，父轲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286198_comment'></div>少詹生二十九年，余遇之于钱塘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286198_comment'></div>闻人言，自以为高下能有辨也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286198_comment'></div>见人行事，自以为是非能有择也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286198_comment'></div>拊躬誓志，自以为不至于所至不止也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286198_comment'></div>后二年，余教诸生于乐清，少詹始来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286198_comment'></div>人谓少詹年已<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1286198", 1286198, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>尊老</span>，读书有数，而论议自许誇大，相与背笑之，少詹知而不愠也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286198_comment'></div>又明年，变名字，从陈同甫于龙窟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286198_comment'></div>同甫惊曰：「是人目荦荦，神谔谔，非妥帖为学徒者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286198_comment'></div>且吾乡里不素识，得非岩穴挺出之士耶」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286198_comment'></div>既而少詹尽师硕儒，尽友良士，尽闻名言，尽求别义，常服补褐而食<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1286198", 1286198, "Clauses/65/Comments/0")'>疏薄</span>，夜诵逮晨，手抄满屋，纵笔所就，词雄意确，论事<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1286198", 1286198, "Clauses/70/Comments/0")'>深眇</span>，皆有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1286198", 1286198, "Clauses/71/Comments/0")'>方幅</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286198_comment'></div>人于是奇少詹学倏博，文倏工，淹识练智，粗细并入，彼幼而教之，更数十年术业尚新者，果非人力可及矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286198_comment'></div>率以岁日二三留治其家，馀辄屩山航海，一夕竟去，僧坊民舍，随所栖止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286198_comment'></div>虽在千里外，家事伸缩，不失尺寸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286198_comment'></div>绍熙三年七月十一日卒，年四十七。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286198_comment'></div>十月十一日，葬峤岭之原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286198_comment'></div>娶于氏，先卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286198_comment'></div>四子，簠，林，籍，一未名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286198_comment'></div>三女，长嫁宗室崇譓，二尚幼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286198_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_1286198'>余观书传，士当<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1286198", 1286198, "Clauses/103/Comments/0")'>晚成</span>之后，必垂功名，少詹乃独无有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286198_comment'></div>故为此铭，冀以慰吾亡友云尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286198_comment'></div>悲夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286198_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_1286198'>庆元二年五月□日。</div><div id='poem_sentence_29_1286198_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1196&endYear=1196')">1196年8月</a>　宁宗下诏伪学之党勿除在内差遣，叶适《进卷》、陈傅良《待遇集》书版被毁。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1196&endYear=1196')">1196年</a>　为陆游帖作跋。作品：跋陆游帖。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1196&endYear=1196')">1196年</a>　撰宋傅墓志铭。作品：参议朝奉大夫宋公墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286196' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286196' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286196?labeling=true' target='_blank'>参议朝奉大夫宋公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1196年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286196")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286196_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286196'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286196'>公讳傅，字岩老，姓宋氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286196_comment'></div>其先自闽徙温平阳，五世祖为郡都曹，葬瑞鹿寺山，居永嘉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286196_comment'></div>曾祖应昌，祖仲彝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286196_comment'></div>父<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>允，赠朝散大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286196_comment'></div>公中绍兴二十四年进士第，为台州黄岩县主簿，郴州州学教授，知福州闽县，江西转运司干办公事，通判袁州，授沿海制置司参议官，乞致仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286196_comment'></div>绍熙五年七月丙子卒，年七十，官至朝奉大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286196_comment'></div>娶潘氏，赠宜人；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286196_comment'></div>再娶徐氏，封宜人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286196_comment'></div>子三人：楠，某官；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286196_comment'></div>檬，先卒；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286196_comment'></div>权，当以公致仕恩补官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286196_comment'></div>女嫁进士周嵩，先卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286196_comment'></div>孙男女各二人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286196_comment'></div>庆元二年二月庚午，葬州西山法果寺山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286196_comment'></div>楠录公<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1286196", 1286196, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>始末</span>如此，题曰「历官次序」，来求铭，而其行事阙焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286196_comment'></div>余与公善，欲辞不可，然不得其所为铭者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286196_comment'></div>以余所闻，公精识内究，人贤否，事是非，计虑利害，潜贯迎解。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286196_comment'></div>刻皮澄滓，绝去粗重，内自<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1286196", 1286196, "Clauses/53/Comments/0")'>玩悦</span>，未尝形言，间微见一二言尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286196_comment'></div>人与之处，及众论事，其知公者，视其色上下已有所可否，置不复敢论；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286196_comment'></div>其不知者，或锋起争论，忘失前后，公固笑而不问也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286196_comment'></div>自郑景望兄弟、薛士隆、陈君举，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1286196", 1286196, "Clauses/66/Comments/0")'>持议</span>精立，号有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1286196", 1286196, "Clauses/67/Comments/0")'>芒锷</span>，公居其间，徐折衷之，诸公皆曰：「向某事某议，于岩老意未然，不可轻也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286196_comment'></div>居官所至，或事上官，或从其僚，其人往往有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1286196", 1286196, "Clauses/77/Comments/0")'>奋张</span>须髯，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1286196", 1286196, "Clauses/78/Comments/0")'>凭托</span>气势，生事立威以自贤者，公无不逊听使自为之，其人后徐寤，愧公而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286196_comment'></div>上官称其某事能，某文善，公汎答以他语，或曰「此<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1286196", 1286196, "Clauses/86/Comments/2")'>倩人</span>为之耳」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286196_comment'></div>官庭终日寂然，事日理，民至于无讼，而公不以为治，人亦不知公之为治也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286196_comment'></div>故世人之与公遇者，多异公所为而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286196_comment'></div>然莫能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1286196", 1286196, "Clauses/94/Comments/0")'>钩致</span>公以轩轾之者，遂以此终其身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286196_comment'></div>人之不同，正邪贤不肖耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286196_comment'></div>若甘荣愿达，崇爵厚势，则其大情极志未有不同者，顾有得否耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286196_comment'></div>其或躁或竞，或矜或衒，先己后人，始以此得，终以失之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286196_comment'></div>故静节动，钝济锐，密补疏，若愚似鄙，以为如是，则其于甘荣愿达，崇爵厚势，可以保而勿失也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286196_comment'></div>颛孙氏求<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1286196", 1286196, "Clauses/115/Comments/0")'>闻达</span>之要，学干禄之术，孔子告以先远世患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286196_comment'></div>老子、列御寇教人以后其身者固所以先其身，外其名者固所以存其名也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286196_comment'></div>今岩老极明，极锐，极智虑，极<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1286196", 1286196, "Clauses/123/Comments/0")'>闻识</span>，其居于世也，则似钝，似鄙，似后，似不及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286196_comment'></div>然而不甘荣，不愿达，不为崇爵厚势，终于后其身，遗其名，人不得而知，其子弟亦莫知也，是何道出耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286196_comment'></div>岂其非杨，非墨，非庄，非老，不枝叶于道之末流而近其本者或在是耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286196_comment'></div>昔孔氏定古今人品目，至汉有月旦、耆旧之论，余既疑而未能决，聊复序公之大略，刻于墓上，使后之君子得以详焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286196_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_36_1286196'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1286196", 1286196, "Clauses/149/Comments/0")'>称事</span>以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1286196", 1286196, "Clauses/149/Comments/1")'>责禄</span>，禄虽获，役也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286196_comment'></div>远害而志利，利虽全，桎也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286196_comment'></div>已蕴其高，彼卑者自夸出也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286196_comment'></div>公所存乎，吁莫测也！</div><div id='poem_sentence_39_1286196_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1286196'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_1286196_0'>⑴ 上一字犯太上御讳。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1286196_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1196&endYear=1196')">1196年</a>　撰吕师愈墓志铭。作品：吕君墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286197' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286197' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286197?labeling=true' target='_blank'>吕君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1196年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286197")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286197_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286197'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286197'>吕君，讳师愈，字少韩，婺州永康人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286197_comment'></div>姿善治生，不为奇术，速赢转化，徒以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1286197", 1286197, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>俭节</span>勤力，能使田桑不失利而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286197_comment'></div>又方急时，便已力教子，凡可以益其子之学，无所吝也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286197_comment'></div>故骤起家，富于一县，而其子孙既皆深于儒，寒苦自课，如未尝富者，可谓知<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1286197", 1286197, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>本务</span>矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286197_comment'></div>世论常实讳贫而文诋富，所是非往往失事理之平，余以为果实讳，当取质焉，若以文被诋，亦不得辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286197_comment'></div>何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286197_comment'></div>吕君用一扇十年，尚<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1286197", 1286197, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>补缉</span>之，道遇坠炭数寸，亦袖携以归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286197_comment'></div>入其里，墙无闲地，陂无坏堤，肆无博徒，人无侈服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286197_comment'></div>然则实讳贫者，安得不视君所为乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286197_comment'></div>文之所以诋富，非恶富也，恶其与害富者俱也，君致富虽纤微，然遇旱饥，辄再出稻子数千斛，助州县<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1286197", 1286197, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>赈贷</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286197_comment'></div>其知取舍盖如此，岂有所谓害富者哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286197_comment'></div>能去之尽，使富久而不厌，此君子孙之责也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286197_comment'></div>君生六十五年，绍熙五年正月十五日卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286197_comment'></div>庆元二年二月二十七日，葬赵侯祠西南山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286197_comment'></div>两娶夏氏，皆先君卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286197_comment'></div>后夏氏与君同治生尤苦，君自以且老失助，哀之甚，每凭其棺哭曰：「社某日醯，腊某日酿，吾妇所为乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286197_comment'></div>吾不忍闻也」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286197_comment'></div>君竟亦死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286197_comment'></div>子三人，约，浩，源。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286197_comment'></div>五孙，季鲁，季殊，季时，季怀，季恂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286197_comment'></div>昔余过陈同甫，同甫以所述夏氏铭示余，因使余题其墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286197_comment'></div>余笑曰：「吾字书不能分偏傍，将安取此」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286197_comment'></div>同甫滋欲必得，余强许之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286197_comment'></div>同甫使其仆随余至渔浦，取书而去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286197_comment'></div>及吕君葬，同甫之子演屡为请铭，曰：「先人之愿也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286197_comment'></div>嗟乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286197_comment'></div>余文虽陋，使同甫在，余得勿从耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286197_comment'></div>而浩与源以辞接于余，悲壮回转，皆可铨叙，浩尝有官，转运司贡其名，自乞勿受，以解父兄之狱，其志又有足观者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286197_comment'></div>遂铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_1286197'>人道多方，举要而言，治生能富，教子能贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286197_comment'></div>吕君有是，可以文传。</div><div id='poem_sentence_29_1286197_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1196&endYear=1196')">1196年9月</a>　九月，撰姚献可墓志铭。作品：姚君俞墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（撰写之月见《水心集》卷十四该文末。）</span><div id='poem_1286199' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286199' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286199?labeling=true' target='_blank'>姚君俞墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1196年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286199")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286199_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286199'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286199'>余二十许，客乌伤，无所并游，春时独出满心寺，蔽著松㯲间，行吟绣川湖岸，望山际桃杏花，踏绿芜至郭西门，耕者方馌，从而坐焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286199_comment'></div>童子谓余：「此径入，烟起处有姚秀才居之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286199_comment'></div>君俞曳破鞋出逆，相视恍然，如旧已<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1286199", 1286199, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>熟识</span>者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286199_comment'></div>余为之题诗石磴上，往还弥年乃去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286199_comment'></div>时君俞应科场，学习词赋锐甚，然其风指孤骞，自洁不同物，若山人处士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286199_comment'></div>年饥不粒食，蒸菘菜茄子啖之，无盐醯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286199_comment'></div>邑人始但忧其贫不堪，既而以其久不屈，稍听向。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286199_comment'></div>至且老克有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1286199", 1286199, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>加行</span>，迄无妄求，遂皆信重，曰：「是可为乡之丈人矣」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286199_comment'></div>将死，戒其弟，棺前止须布帷一幅，置瓦炉于案，曰：「知我者自当来哭，不知，虽哭，吾不对也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286199_comment'></div>又书告余曰：「我能守义不辱子，子能卒为我铭则幸」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286199_comment'></div>余曰：「诺」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286199_comment'></div>君俞名献可，婺州义乌人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286199_comment'></div>曾祖忠，祖昭，父辉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286199_comment'></div>年五十七。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286199_comment'></div>娶傅氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286199_comment'></div>子远，逵，连。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286199_comment'></div>二女，长嫁王某，次<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1286199", 1286199, "Clauses/60/Comments/0")'>许嫁</span>黄某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286199_comment'></div>卒之六十二日，庆元二年十月辛酉，葬于西山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286199_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_1286199'>资富而为廉，贤之所以选也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286199_comment'></div>倚吏而效威，材之所以展也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286199_comment'></div>是故非势与利，则贵名美实，将无以自显也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286199_comment'></div>若夫以身为义，则虽无铢两而可不羡也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286199_comment'></div>以全为归，则虽极卑贱而可不乱也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286199_comment'></div>圣贤之所自尽，不与世同贯也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286199_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286199_comment'></div>子之闻此，其无限也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286199_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_1286199'>庆元二年九月。</div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1286199_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1196&endYear=1196')">1196年10月18日</a>　十月十八，撰郑噩墓志铭。作品：郑仲酉墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（撰写月日见《水心集》卷十四该文末。）</span><div id='poem_1286200' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286200' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286200?labeling=true' target='_blank'>郑仲酉墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1196年10月18日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286200")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286200_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286200'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286200'>君姓郑氏，讳噩，字仲酉，温州平阳人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286200_comment'></div>曾祖琼，祖榛，父躬，故皆不仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286200_comment'></div>君中进士第，为台州天台县尉，婺州武义县丞，临江军录事参军，知其军新淦县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286200_comment'></div>淳熙十一年十二月初六日卒，年五十六。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286200_comment'></div>君治狱<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1286200", 1286200, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>察辨</span>而坚明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286200_comment'></div>保义郎孟友谅，有妻赵，又挑寡妇茅以居，如二妻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286200_comment'></div>茅之男，其夫李之子也，畜于友谅，以病而殒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286200_comment'></div>茅告赵，谓为谋杀之也，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1286200", 1286200, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>掠治</span>不胜痛，自诬服，将抵死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286200_comment'></div>君讯知其冤，与一郡官吏争论累月，赵卒得不死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286200_comment'></div>有僧惠果愬范模者曰：「模善为骗，吾携疏乞钱，而模使其徒黄文昌致吾空寺中，伪出姓名，谬多题施，因数取钱物酒食以相报设，今巨费矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286200_comment'></div>然无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1286200", 1286200, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>左验</span>，有司疑之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286200_comment'></div>君令益取纸，杂问模他事；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286200_comment'></div>徐视其答，则有与题施之字同者数十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286200_comment'></div>鞫之，果模与文昌谋，改笔易书以诈之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286200_comment'></div>遂伏罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286200_comment'></div>新淦素大县，诛责厚，往往失<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1286200", 1286200, "Clauses/52/Comments/0")'>施置</span>，累令坐不良去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286200_comment'></div>吏部榜阙于亭甚久，人莫敢当，君叹曰：「吾欲无待阙而畏其难，可乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286200_comment'></div>单马之县，尽疏邑病，陈义引古以撼诸使，使稍为动，得颇有蠲损。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286200_comment'></div>既不迫于期会，然后调柔其嚚者以寡讼，矫强其愿者以趋学，三年之间，县以大治，声流江西，诸使会当荐者，君为首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286200_comment'></div>君积与守不相下，守怒，中君以法，赖诸使缓之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286200_comment'></div>而君亦已先<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1286200", 1286200, "Clauses/76/Comments/0")'>遇疾</span>，遂卒官下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286200_comment'></div>更十二年，庆元二年十一月二十三日，其子益朋、寿朋始葬君于县金舟乡斜溪山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286200_comment'></div>夫人陈氏，先卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286200_comment'></div>女嫁承信郎李韶，进士林某、林某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286200_comment'></div>余昔识君于武义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286200_comment'></div>武义小邑，沙溆井落尽目前也，而君伟然长大，步止如山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286200_comment'></div>旦出治事，不过<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1286200", 1286200, "Clauses/91/Comments/0")'>食顷</span>，辄闲静终日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286200_comment'></div>余时气盛，未甚涉事，私窃奇爱君，谓「如此人便当勒功建侯，勤劳国家，不应于此置之也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286200_comment'></div>其时天子方综名实，修政事，亲拔材能士，不以次用之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286200_comment'></div>君间至行在，封上数千言，天子为下其书，使第其可行者条上之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286200_comment'></div>而其人尤用事，人谓君：「幸一见，富贵且来矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286200_comment'></div>君笑不应。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286200_comment'></div>后五六年，始用格改官，人又谓君「已了近时所谓债县者，正复平进，未失晚遇也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286200_comment'></div>而君又已死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286200_comment'></div>然则人之私愿其然者，命固不与之合，又况君负气节，必行意，终不以势挠而从也，则命虽不能如君志，亦何必深咎也哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286200_comment'></div>余一夕宿茭道厩，夜参半，回风飞雪，瞢瞢就寐，忽有列炬，声稍哗，启门，则君自县走视余，相对荧然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286200_comment'></div>俄曰：「被郡檄，明当至某处」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286200_comment'></div>复揖归其舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286200_comment'></div>雪益急，比晓，没井干矣，人怪此县丞竟夜行雪中，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286200_comment'></div>今余老不自立，辱君知，坐念太息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286200_comment'></div>寿朋来谂葬，故乃铭之曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_40_1286200'>嗟仲酉，身实大，智又过诸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1286200_comment'></div>两不就，将掩焉，铭殆播欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1286200_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_42_1286200'>庆元二年十月十八日。</div><div id='poem_sentence_42_1286200_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1197&endYear=1197')">1197年7月</a>　七月，为瑞安沈体仁撰文。作品：沈氏萱竹堂记。<div id='poem_1286116' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286116' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286116?labeling=true' target='_blank'>沈氏萱竹堂记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1197年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286116")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286116_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286116'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286116'>瑞安盐聚渔合，而北湖背市远人，山水<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1286116", 1286116, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>闲美</span>，游者恨不得居而久也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286116_comment'></div>沈君体仁始治园观，广池以接清流，累土以抗峻峰，缭其四旁，互为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1286116", 1286116, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>蔽隐</span>，搜花拣石，绵日系月，衣食所馀辄具焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286116_comment'></div>然后迟客有亭，延月有台，藓梅露药草木之奇品，莫不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1286116", 1286116, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>贯序</span>以先后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286116_comment'></div>屋室最大曰萱竹之堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286116_comment'></div>沈君为诗十章，闻者皆和之，而北湖之胜，遂誇一时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286116_comment'></div>君间求记于余，且自叙曰：「人之所欲，寝处游观而已，君子则以义安其身者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286116_comment'></div>我祖高曾，被忠信，服礼乐，尝西入关，北走洛，师友天下之有道者，沈氏之为儒百年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286116_comment'></div>暨我不肖，不敢坠先绪以有此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286116_comment'></div>昔唐人杜甫咏诗，称权势不如宗族，故堂之前自生竹，后自生萱，言宅舍之荒落而非其族不游也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286116_comment'></div>淘米不能浑其水，刈葵不能伤其根，言饮食之疏薄而非其族不饱也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286116_comment'></div>噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286116_comment'></div>贫犹可，况少有者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286116_comment'></div>故我过而为此，所以合族人于堂，共喜乐于园也，非崇游而饰观也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286116_comment'></div>子其为我发焉」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286116_comment'></div>夫随耳目之愿于无穷，人之常尔；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286116_comment'></div>至游观之力不能足，则无不憾也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286116_comment'></div>今君据游观已成之利矣，反以耳目之玩为可薄乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286116_comment'></div>古之人，惟颜子知自备天地万物之道，其陋巷饮水，如寄泊焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286116_comment'></div>圣贤之致同而行不同也，故或登东山，登泰山，叹逝川，乐山以为仁，乐水以为智。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286116_comment'></div>若此岂异人？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286116_comment'></div>乃孔子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286116_comment'></div>游观之术进矣，大而高丘大泽，放荡独往；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286116_comment'></div>小亦幽花丛薄，啸歌自命；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286116_comment'></div>此文人才士之所以逞其赡逸雄豪，放臣逐子之所以平其郁纡悲忧也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286116_comment'></div>累世之笔墨，未有抑此而不扬者也，又可陋乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286116_comment'></div>若夫流连其耳目，役使其财力，以游观之术资其人而身不获焉，此师旷所谓晋平公不足以听之者尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286116_comment'></div>然则君之为此堂也，既收合宗族，同养其和平，而又发舒心思，特致其高洁，亦可矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286116_comment'></div>余故因君之自叙，稍推进之，使知游观之义未当贬也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286116_comment'></div>庆元三年七月。</div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1286116_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1197&endYear=1197')">1197年8月</a>　八月，为邵持正之父邵叔豹撰墓志铭，持正约于是时从学。作品：宋武翼郎邵君墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（《水心集》卷十五题为《宋武翼郎新制造御前军器所监造官邵君墓志铭》）</span><div id='poem_1286202' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286202' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286202?labeling=true' target='_blank'>宋武翼郎新制造御前军器所监造官邵君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1197年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286202")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286202_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286202'><div
