class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286202'>自名司显吏之外，碎曹猥局，无不因人废兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286202_comment'></div>其职任虽<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1286202", 1286202, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>卑近</span>，而倖门弊穴，更为深远而难治，傲胥豪客之所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1286202", 1286202, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>噬攫</span>，官人徒缩气肯首，反得善誉，奋而自为，未尝无祸也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286202_comment'></div>君之子持正，为余言君监岱山盐场时事曰：「场监至贱也，走书<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1286202", 1286202, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>乞索</span>日至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286202_comment'></div>州县将有土木之事，或佣借<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1286202", 1286202, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>夫力</span>，上司抛买，提刑司所谓五分头子，皆于此乎取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286202_comment'></div>提盐及州县吏每年帐例缗钱千馀，他所须求尚不预。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286202_comment'></div>旧常使甲头持状名借于官，谓之请本煎盐，实尅亭户钱以应诸费。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286202_comment'></div>君初到，受前官牒，亭户借欠钱至六千百馀万，曰：『已豁其半矣，昔吾受牒，盖不止此』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286202_comment'></div>君大惊曰：『盐买可足耶』？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286202_comment'></div>阴白于州，为从上遏绝者，尽罢蠲之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286202_comment'></div>痛抑诸费。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286202_comment'></div>甚不可免，则买盐有馀钱足以当矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286202_comment'></div>久之，亭户争煮盐中官，君为益买零盐，随称轻重，得钱增十八九。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286202_comment'></div>右曹上其最，进官者再焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286202_comment'></div>君又祷提盐，除绍兴年借欠亦且千万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286202_comment'></div>自是亭民不复笞讯，始著新衣，置家具，君亦治敖庾，饰公廨，内外坚好矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286202_comment'></div>岱山在明州昌国县大海际，居者数千，君直其争讼，岛聚欢服，不干守令，曰：『自有岱山场未有也』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286202_comment'></div>吏与甲头故为借状者，方大怨君，竟讼君妄用盐本钱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286202_comment'></div>有司考君『一任无借状用四百馀万，虽买盐之馀，盖本钱也』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286202_comment'></div>君无以解，笑曰：『法当是，奈何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286202_comment'></div>惟处置耳』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286202_comment'></div>太守极谅君无私，得免，然<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1286202", 1286202, "Clauses/75/Comments/1")'>濒于</span>罪矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286202_comment'></div>世常曰「仕不举职为可愧」，然而有人之过，有法之患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286202_comment'></div>夫法不为人计也，所以待有罪而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286202_comment'></div>世不独贪惰不材而后得罪于法也，廉善有能，亦未免焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286202_comment'></div>人之情无以劝而法有所待，则虽名司显吏，将畏悔而不勇为者多矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286202_comment'></div>况如君者，亦幸而免尔，而犹勇为之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286202_comment'></div>夫合碎曹猥局之事无一不治而后得称治，其治之难如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286202_comment'></div>然则余于君之事，所以载之详者，非以君能监一盐场为可传也，嗟夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286202_comment'></div>君讳叔豹，字隐甫，姓邵氏，温州平阳人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286202_comment'></div>曾祖膺，祖锡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286202_comment'></div>父倬，赠忠训郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286202_comment'></div>君有逸气通识，从进士试不中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286202_comment'></div>募造战船补官，监吉州龙泉县酒税，耻之，不赴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286202_comment'></div>后数年，乃监光化军酒税。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286202_comment'></div>军无苗额，惟视酒税耗登，十官九称乏以为常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286202_comment'></div>君既足郡经用，又赈流民之来食者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286202_comment'></div>去且二十年，余友王道父为守，其人陈「某计有某利」，曰：「往邵监税能之，后不能也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286202_comment'></div>又监镇江府榷货务都茶场门，总领使专酒事，赖君材欲倍卖，辞曰：「某之于曲糵无异故，不欺而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286202_comment'></div>日增月长可也，骤倍之，使市皆化饮，他日无以见为士者矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286202_comment'></div>君不幸埋没鄙事，然其刚难屈，其正难狎，所遇多<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1286202", 1286202, "Clauses/136/Comments/0")'>敬礼</span>之，盖亦有所蓄而然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286202_comment'></div>既脱岱山，得监造御前军器，不及上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1286202_comment'></div>绍熙五年六月十五日卒，年六十八。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1286202_comment'></div>十二月甲戌，葬尚仁原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1286202_comment'></div>娶周氏，封安人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1286202_comment'></div>子持正、持志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1286202_comment'></div>女嫁林杓，先卒；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1286202_comment'></div>次嫁朱至，幼与浮屠为尼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1286202_comment'></div>持正有籍春官，工文词，用君遗恩调监台州路桥酒，讳弗肯称，手叙君行告曰：「始父常自课薪米，使持正学于先生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1286202_comment'></div>今之为先人荣者，其不在此也」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1286202_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_49_1286202'>可俎豆也而下夷，可荫覆也有杕之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1286202_comment'></div>犹有可传仅毫丝，若又泯泯当语谁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1286202_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_51_1286202'>庆元三年八月□日。</div><div id='poem_sentence_51_1286202_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1197&endYear=1197')">1197年10月</a>　十月，撰郑耕老墓志铭。作品：奉议郎郑公墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286204' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286204' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286204?labeling=true' target='_blank'>奉议郎郑公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1197年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286204")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286204_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286204'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286204'>莆人郑洙言曰：「先人殁于乾道壬辰，葬用淳熙甲午。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286204_comment'></div>惟<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1286204", 1286204, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>先友</span>莆一二贤大夫也，不敢铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286204_comment'></div>诲洙曰：『必别求贤有文者』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286204_comment'></div>洙也不肖，不足以得，怀疑重请，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1286204", 1286204, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>延伫</span>于今，二十六年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286204_comment'></div>惧老且死，不能振<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1286204", 1286204, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>幽芳</span>，昭遗绪，岂惟不肖又抱不孝之罪以殒！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286204_comment'></div>吾子纵不胜任，勉矣笔之也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286204_comment'></div>按洙状，郑氏自太府卿露徙莆南湖，露之孙曰大中大夫敖，生五子，各以其居自别为祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286204_comment'></div>由敖之子司门郎准三世而为君之曾祖曰亚卿，祖曰资深，父曰安正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286204_comment'></div>君讳耕老，字谷叔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286204_comment'></div>幼孤，母林氏，有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1286204", 1286204, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>专行</span>，切切课君从三兄学，曰：「余妇人，汝欺余易耳，欺场屋难也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286204_comment'></div>君兄弟益自力，乡论多甲乙，送之，至再举三子云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286204_comment'></div>中进士第，主福州怀安县簿，而林氏卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286204_comment'></div>丧除，叹曰：「禄不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1286204", 1286204, "Clauses/45/Comments/1")'>逮亲</span>矣，求仕何为」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286204_comment'></div>复居庐二年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286204_comment'></div>亲戚故人强起之，调温州法曹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286204_comment'></div>守故用常平钱物，君不听，忤守意，又欲舍去，其友知旁郡，固止之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286204_comment'></div>教授明州学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286204_comment'></div>四明自女真焚荡，士之学，学之地，陋弗理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286204_comment'></div>君为讲说科举之外者，更营学区，取田以供乡饮费。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286204_comment'></div>侍从荐君通经术甚众，召见，奏事明辨，孝宗悦，亲笔用为国子监主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286204_comment'></div>于是执政患职事官多待阙失职，以君添差福建安抚司机宜文字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286204_comment'></div>满秩，不朝集，遂归南陂，移梅种竹终焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286204_comment'></div>始，君虽捷应举，已厌声律浮靡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286204_comment'></div>读《诗》、《周易》、《洪范》、《中庸》及《论语》、《孟子》，味其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1286204", 1286204, "Clauses/79/Comments/0")'>深微</span>，皆有训释。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286204_comment'></div>著《仁义》、《礼乐》、《扶中》、《截流》等论，推明圣人之道，归于中正不偏，常行不厌，而佛者以寂默无为乱之，此性命道德之蠹也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286204_comment'></div>常抚书语其子曰：「时不我知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286204_comment'></div>我死，若藏此书南陂上而已」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286204_comment'></div>荣利澹无与，既丧母，宦进尤薄，每曰：「吾心方神迟，习险履巇，余所畏也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286204_comment'></div>林氏墓有小精庐，南陂木兰溪有草堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286204_comment'></div>堂南有沂春亭、舞雩台，君所常往来也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286204_comment'></div>具舟楫琴书，晴光月夕，不从宾御，夷犹溪上，忘其近远，溪北野农，常吹箫击鼓送迎之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286204_comment'></div>莆多大儒名士，皆君辈行上下，相善甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286204_comment'></div>其间相踵为辅相，然不以身之进退望焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286204_comment'></div>盖《六经》孔氏之学通于天下，而人之心知耳目，有浅深之殊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286204_comment'></div>百有馀年以来，士虽以其深者自命，而世之好恶<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1286204", 1286204, "Clauses/119/Comments/0")'>趣舍</span>犹不能尽合也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286204_comment'></div>故妙己而粗物，哗伪而毁真，方并逐于末流以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1286204", 1286204, "Clauses/122/Comments/0")'>斲败</span>本学矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286204_comment'></div>惟不必于用者知自重，不急于教者知自乐；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286204_comment'></div>自重则严己，自乐则恕人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286204_comment'></div>余以洙所次君事及其书考之，君学为用而不求用，可以教而不教，退静多而进动少，未尝违世而世莫之同也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286204_comment'></div>昔孔子谓颜渊「舍之则藏」，曾晰曰「异三子者之撰」，圣贤之遗意庶几乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286204_comment'></div>君之卒，年六十五矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1286204_comment'></div>其葬在文赋里东山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1286204_comment'></div>娶林氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1286204_comment'></div>二子，炳，洙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1286204_comment'></div>女嫁朱审度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1286204_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_45_1286204'>南陂之书，今故存兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1286204_comment'></div>溪北鼓箫，后可闻兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1286204_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_47_1286204'>庆元三年十月□日。</div><div id='poem_sentence_47_1286204_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1197&endYear=1197')">1197年12月</a>　十二月，道学之禁升级，朝廷置伪学之籍，凡五十九人，叶适名列其中。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1197&endYear=1197')">1197年</a>　为方武成诗卷题诗。作品：题方武成诗卷二首。<div id='poem_79914' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_79914' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/79914?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题方武成诗卷二首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1197年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_79914")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_79914_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_79914'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_79914'>闻说莆中方武成，年登二十便长吟。<div id='poem_sentence_0_79914_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_79914'>鬼神送与天成句，不道思多呕出心。<div id='poem_sentence_1_79914_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_79914'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_79914_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_79915' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_79915' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/79915?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1197年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_79915_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_79915'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_79915'>自古诗人高远处，看君涉步迈前峰。<div id='poem_sentence_0_79915_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_79915'>谩呼贾岛为同社，莫遣陶潜是别宗。<div id='poem_sentence_1_79915_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_79915'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_79915_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1197&endYear=1197')">1197年</a>　撰彭仲刚墓志铭。作品：彭子复墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286201' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286201' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286201?labeling=true' target='_blank'>彭子复墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1197年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286201")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286201_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286201'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286201'>士多以意为善，鲜以力为善也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286201_comment'></div>诚得其意，圣贤何远！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286201_comment'></div>如意之而未至焉，遂又以意为力也，则善非其善，窒其材，枉其德矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286201_comment'></div>今夫意之者，如望远焉，目之所至，身可至乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286201_comment'></div>天下之理备矣，尺度按之，规矩占之，若称物然，斤石之差，必以其力，不可诬也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286201_comment'></div>以力从意，不以意为力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286201_comment'></div>力所不及，圣贤犹舍诸；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286201_comment'></div>力之所及，则材为实材，德为实德矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286201_comment'></div>初，子复能胜冠，东南之学起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286201_comment'></div>昔之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1286201", 1286201, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>宿闻</span>腐见皆已<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1286201", 1286201, "Clauses/30/Comments/1")'>遁散</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1286201", 1286201, "Clauses/30/Comments/2")'>剽剥</span>，奇论新说忽焉交列横布。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286201_comment'></div>士之研聪涤明，澄气养质，精意所获，自为深微，奚翅家尧、舜而身孔、颜也哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286201_comment'></div>其一时师友盛矣，而子复又最先周旋其间，其闻之早矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286201_comment'></div>然而子复知为善之难，非同声趋和之所能至也，故不敢以意之为是，而独以力之能者试之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286201_comment'></div>常左经而右律，目验而耳覈，考实以任重，先难以致远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286201_comment'></div>非其心之所通，虽诚闻之，不苟从也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286201_comment'></div>非其行之所至，虽审知之，犹慭置之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286201_comment'></div>其修身，使奢者啬；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286201_comment'></div>其治民，使烦者理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286201_comment'></div>朝廷不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1286201", 1286201, "Clauses/58/Comments/0")'>养交</span>，乡党不合誉，侃然求其是而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286201_comment'></div>嗟夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286201_comment'></div>不同其所趋而不异其所合，宁少于其意而致多于其事，徒辛苦于所难而不敢安乐于所易也，何子复之用心勤行之笃哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286201_comment'></div>昔孔子谓「无能一日用其力于仁」，而又曰「未见力不足者」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286201_comment'></div>然则以力而不以意，岂古人亦以为难也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286201_comment'></div>子复姓彭氏，名仲刚，温州平阳人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286201_comment'></div>曾祖迥，祖宗盛，父汝砺，赠承议郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286201_comment'></div>初任婺州金华县主簿，曰：「古人先正名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286201_comment'></div>主簿者，主其簿籍云尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286201_comment'></div>今簿籍多废绝，何以名官」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286201_comment'></div>乃求得四塍帐，校其差谬，类为数百册藏焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286201_comment'></div>衢州大水，上司令子复覆视而后赈，子复请曰：「衢水高者出屋危，杀稼溺人，行道共知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286201_comment'></div>既再检实矣，犹往覆视者，防吏之欺，将使民实得食也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286201_comment'></div>然恐待覆视而民不食死矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286201_comment'></div>上司感其言，即出米，恣子复所为，民赖以活。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286201_comment'></div>移台州临海县令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286201_comment'></div>均其民之力役，图县乡之地，几都几保，合为大图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286201_comment'></div>地之所有，皆物数之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286201_comment'></div>有献乡图者，子复曰：「善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286201_comment'></div>犹有遗」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286201_comment'></div>其人曰：「无」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286201_comment'></div>子复指曰：「某处岭也，岭边某乙居之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286201_comment'></div>某地有松林<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1286201", 1286201, "Clauses/118/Comments/0")'>水步</span>，今忘之矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1286201_comment'></div>其人大惊，不知子复何以能知之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1286201_comment'></div>由是扶羸整坏以就坚新，尽为他令所不能为者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1286201_comment'></div>立县廨且百楹，子复听民讼甚察，然不自以为明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1286201_comment'></div>每谕之曰：「虽讼而直，所屈多矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1286201_comment'></div>民爱信之，忿斗衰止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1286201_comment'></div>至今言治临海者，推子复云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1286201_comment'></div>提点铸钱，将荐子复，使之买铅，冀以职事<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_47_1286201", 1286201, "Clauses/137/Comments/0")'>相涉</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1286201_comment'></div>子复辞曰：「铅非所产也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1286201_comment'></div>提点刑狱荐得审察，子复径参吏部，授两浙运司物斛官而去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1286201_comment'></div>近臣累言落州县可惜，始召为详定一司敕令所删定官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1286201_comment'></div>迁国子监丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1286201_comment'></div>子复终日坐局，治其细碎，多所更定，后皆为故实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1286201_comment'></div>贵人弗善也，遂坐考进士与知举力争而罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1286201_comment'></div>久乃知全州，时詹元善、陈君举任总漕事，首为减月桩钱十三四。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1286201_comment'></div>子复又自减郡之凡费，然后戢<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_55_1286201", 1286201, "Clauses/156/Comments/0")'>预借</span>，宽<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_55_1286201", 1286201, "Clauses/157/Comments/0")'>省限</span>，商税止取正钱，带纳者蠲其太半，输租得自槩量，无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_55_1286201", 1286201, "Clauses/161/Comments/0")'>斛面</span>，吏之一切聚敛，略皆不用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1286201_comment'></div>乃择其耆老学行，俾师长其子弟，而亲执经讲说其中，曰：「此古人所以富庶而教之也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1286201_comment'></div>未几，承议卒，民哭扶其柩至境外数十里，曰：「何时复此太守乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1286201_comment'></div>服除，知濠州，未行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1286201_comment'></div>绍熙五年，明、越大饥，特令提举浙东常平，盖于是将用子复矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1286201_comment'></div>命下，八月庚戌，以病不起闻，年五十二，官至朝请郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1286201_comment'></div>娶王氏，封安人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1286201_comment'></div>子曰𣶮，将仕郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1286201_comment'></div>曰浫，曰溓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1286201_comment'></div>女嫁从事郎、新徽州歙县丞林士裕，进士林居易，其二尚幼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1286201_comment'></div>庆元二年四月丙辰，葬金舟乡将军陈湾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1286201_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1286201_comment'></div>以子复行事考之，岂所谓力不及欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1286201_comment'></div>然则不得尽其材而死者，非力也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1286201_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_69_1286201'>孰为任重？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1286201_comment'></div>累铢而称；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1286201_comment'></div>孰为道远？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1286201_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_72_1286201", 1286201, "Clauses/206/Comments/0")'>积步</span>而行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1286201_comment'></div>始士终圣，级举阶升。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1286201_comment'></div>古人之学，远矣难明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1286201_comment'></div>子复之志，匪腾匪骞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1286201_comment'></div>力其所难，不以意言，彼用者天，彼成者年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1286201_comment'></div>摭其已然，斲铭此篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1286201_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_78_1286201'>庆元三年□月□□日撰。</div><div id='poem_sentence_78_1286201_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1197&endYear=1197')">1197年</a>　撰沈大经墓志铭。作品：沈元诚墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286203' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286203' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286203?labeling=true' target='_blank'>沈元诚墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1197年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286203")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286203_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286203'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286203'>古之谓一乡一国之善士者，以其德限之而云也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286203_comment'></div>后之所谓一乡一国之善士者，亦以其德限之乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286203_comment'></div>未可知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286203_comment'></div>夫士，毁檐隈巷，败衣缕褐耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286203_comment'></div>然而专为善之责，将以公天下，准后世，其止于一乡一国，尚不能传而远也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286203_comment'></div>不然，则夷、惠之流，孔氏之门人，何以垂称焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286203_comment'></div>及其后也，士以位为善；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286203_comment'></div>位之贵可以达于天下后世，而善之利始可以著于天下后世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286203_comment'></div>位所不达，则士怠于自修而苟且以求安，虽一乡而已者，一国而已者，犹病其乏也，况不止一乡一国乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286203_comment'></div>就其不止一乡一国，而世无孔子、孟子，复无以定其论；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286203_comment'></div>于是高下之疑，诚伪之杂，荑颖将为干实，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1286203", 1286203, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>肤脆</span>将为坚成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286203_comment'></div>譬之物焉，春种之，不待秋而穫也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286203_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286203_comment'></div>不限于德而限于位，使士不能如古人者，其势之然哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286203_comment'></div>温之瑞安县有士曰沈君，讳大经，字元诚，余不知其一乡一国之善欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286203_comment'></div>抑不止一乡一国者欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286203_comment'></div>余见其躬为善之责甚专，位虽不达，而欲著为善之利甚勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286203_comment'></div>自君从父躬行，兄大廉，本诚居敬，尊绍绝学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286203_comment'></div>君闳而懋之，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1286203", 1286203, "Clauses/54/Comments/0")'>通物</span>以性，成身以行，应事以理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286203_comment'></div>博书瑰传，皆究<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1286203", 1286203, "Clauses/58/Comments/0")'>端极</span>；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286203_comment'></div>曲文短句，亦中<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1286203", 1286203, "Clauses/60/Comments/0")'>程律</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286203_comment'></div>瑞安称多士，君独为前辈宿老慰宠，后进有所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1286203", 1286203, "Clauses/63/Comments/0")'>裁正</span>，无不服从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286203_comment'></div>在家，肃如也，妻子族人化而不慢矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286203_comment'></div>初入太学，司业博士皆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1286203", 1286203, "Clauses/69/Comments/0")'>倾下</span>之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286203_comment'></div>已而用累举授漳浦县主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286203_comment'></div>有故人为其郡太守，过君门，请与俱行，君不得辞，至未几，求监南岳庙而归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286203_comment'></div>绍熙二年正月辛酉卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286203_comment'></div>其十月某日，葬来暮乡余奥山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286203_comment'></div>君既重其县人，县将有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1286203", 1286203, "Clauses/81/Comments/0")'>大虑</span>，必待君而后决。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286203_comment'></div>君同其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1286203", 1286203, "Clauses/83/Comments/0")'>疾患</span>，时其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1286203", 1286203, "Clauses/84/Comments/0")'>阙蠹</span>，起而谋诸，新庙学，补荒年，修地利，设水险，备欠政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286203_comment'></div>故今盗夺于海者，自屏不近县；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286203_comment'></div>米贾岁来自海南，米不大踊；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286203_comment'></div>复石岗斗门，浚九乡河渠，年以不侵：皆君所建画也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286203_comment'></div>虽古人自求于穷约者，不必尽著为善之利，然而君能专为善之责，操其实柄，而庶几毫发之可以及人，其不怠于自修而苟且以求安，审矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286203_comment'></div>曾王父曰惟钦，王父曰度，父曰夷行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286203_comment'></div>孺人项氏，先君卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286203_comment'></div>子曰上达、中孚；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286203_comment'></div>曰三畏，早卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286203_comment'></div>婿曰林尚友、项迪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286203_comment'></div>孙男弥尊、弥章、弥高、弥坚、弥卲，馀未名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286203_comment'></div>孙女嫁章学诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1286203_comment'></div>上达请余铭君之墓六年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1286203_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1286203_comment'></div>君之善止一乡乎，乡人铭之可也，何必其子孙！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1286203_comment'></div>不止一乡乎，当有达者记之矣，予不肖，敢辞也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1286203_comment'></div>上达固以请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1286203_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_46_1286203'>西岘原，南堤宅，伊沈夫子之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1286203_comment'></div>惟其乡之传耶！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1286203_comment'></div>非松非柏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1286203_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_49_1286203'>庆元三年□月□日。</div><div id='poem_sentence_49_1286203_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1197&endYear=1197')">1197年</a>　撰方崧卿神道碑。作品：京西运判方公神道碑。<div id='poem_1286253' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286253' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286253?labeling=true' target='_blank'>京西运判方公神道碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（1197年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286253")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286253_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286253'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286253'>方氏自固始迁莆田九世矣，公名崧卿，字季申。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286253_comment'></div>曾祖早，祖渊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286253_comment'></div>父宪，阳江令，赠朝议大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286253_comment'></div>阳江殁而公生，孤特强立，俊异躐伦等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286253_comment'></div>举进士，教官中其科，教授越州，母丧止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286253_comment'></div>干办湖广总领所公事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286253_comment'></div>添差淮西安抚司属官，员省，为两浙转运司属官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286253_comment'></div>知上饶县，提举常平荐审察，通判明州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286253_comment'></div>知南安军，政最一路，诸司合奏，擢知吉州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286253_comment'></div>提点广东刑狱，移广西转运判官，复移京西。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286253_comment'></div>绍熙五年三月二十五日，终于襄阳，年六十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286253_comment'></div>庆元三年正月丙午，葬于濑溪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286253_comment'></div>公学极原本，有书以来，无不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1286253", 1286253, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>通习</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286253_comment'></div>聚帙数万，多<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1286253", 1286253, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>朱黄</span>涂乙处；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286253_comment'></div>宿疑隐问，一事常类举十馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286253_comment'></div>续《横浦集》，补《襄阳志》，皆釐纠昔谬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286253_comment'></div>韩氏文行于世二百年，其始所从，家异人殊，不能相一，学者患之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286253_comment'></div>公会證旁引，为书二十馀卷，得以据依，他本废矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286253_comment'></div>夫人叶氏，丞相颙女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286253_comment'></div>公用丞相治县法，分保正副，旬诣邑受令，保长五日一轮役，当募者第其色力缄之按上，民大喜，上下无敢不信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286253_comment'></div>然公天资精于吏职，在南安、吉州，尤称神明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286253_comment'></div>其所予夺，人以为经方守者，一字不可改也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286253_comment'></div>初，广西诸州及经略司岁用乏，朝廷命转运使煮盐给之，或官自卖，或客贩，率四五年盐积不售，仰哺竭则多科增价，而民病矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286253_comment'></div>天子怛然加惠远方，辄赐为贯钱万者数十，黜<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1286253", 1286253, "Clauses/78/Comments/0")'>议主</span>，更法以便民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286253_comment'></div>公转漕时，适当官卖之后，请曰：「夫食盐有定口，不量其入而以官用赋盐，岂官卖则善于客贩哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286253_comment'></div>今拨属州盐箩七万五千有奇，而实卖才踰六万，稍积不已，是十六郡岁用每折四而为五也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286253_comment'></div>广西别发湖广总司钱赢八万，靖州三万，岁以为常，夫自治不暇而犹馈挽他路，是于折减之外更增十馀万以自困也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286253_comment'></div>然则不及十年，官卖之弊甚于客贩矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286253_comment'></div>益下固损上，非有异术，待更法而后损已晚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286253_comment'></div>曷若自今诸州守实卖之数，本路免别发之额，势足相补，法可久行」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286253_comment'></div>其言<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1286253", 1286253, "Clauses/104/Comments/0")'>殷重</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1286253", 1286253, "Clauses/104/Comments/1")'>恻切</span>，天子以为然，行之至今。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286253_comment'></div>嗟夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286253_comment'></div>岭海绝徼，视中州近县不齐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286253_comment'></div>彼地素薄于财，则简其贡税，兼官并吏，合兵于农，而因其俗以富之，不备责也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286253_comment'></div>若夫财不足以养其地矣，奈何犹欲具体焉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286253_comment'></div>故公谓官般非必善于客贩，其要在岭民免贵盐，官府粗自立而已者，岂不然哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286253_comment'></div>公遍行瘴土，尽其利害，得消渴疾，医不能愈，邕、桂人哀思之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286253_comment'></div>二子：直孺，新改官；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286253_comment'></div>信孺，开禧初挺入虏帐，再结和，由韶州为广西提刑、运判。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286253_comment'></div>继公行部，父老迎拜悲喜；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286253_comment'></div>既，相与画公像，春秋报祠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1286253_comment'></div>公阶朝请大夫，赠至五品。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1286253_comment'></div>宾佐又谓应刻碑墓上，遂来求文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1286253_comment'></div>余嘉公博于儒而以吏得民，惜其不及验于稽古劝学之事，而爱民之志，利民之术，又非特一广西之盐而止也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1286253_comment'></div>详其已行而信其未行，或庶几焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1286253_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_45_1286253'>盐利之末，挈作邦柄；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1286253_comment'></div>增多不已，咸苦为病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1286253_comment'></div>恳恳方公，斟酌行之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1286253_comment'></div>如彼饮食，时其渴饥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1286253_comment'></div>方公甚文，甚文且博；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1286253_comment'></div>廷发大议，可诹可度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1286253_comment'></div>六府惟修，缊而莫陈；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1286253_comment'></div>独正此盐，岭服是遵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1286253_comment'></div>墓柏成峰，有辟其道；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1286253_comment'></div>岭人之思，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_54_1286253", 1286253, "Clauses/170/Comments/0")'>赛祷</span>以报。</div><div id='poem_sentence_54_1286253_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1197&endYear=1197')">1197年</a>　撰蒋行简墓志铭。作品：朝议大夫知处州蒋公墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286240' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286240' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286240?labeling=true' target='_blank'>朝议大夫知处州蒋公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1197年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286240")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286240_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286240'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286240'>蒋氏本阳羡人，梁普通初，涣为永嘉守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286240_comment'></div>涣弟湛，以西华奇山也，留居不归，武帝贤而官之，命后守即庐授焉，故乡名建牙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286240_comment'></div>至公曾祖锡、祖扶、父赠中大夫惇及上五世，皆家郭南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286240_comment'></div>公讳行简，字仲可，学不为举子，达于世用，器度<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1286240", 1286240, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>凝审</span>，登绍兴庚午进士第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286240_comment'></div>时荆帅孙汝翼、从事查籥，皆名士倾待，公遂与薛公士隆婿孙氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286240_comment'></div>主仙游县簿，辟四川制置司属官，罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286240_comment'></div>为滁州判官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286240_comment'></div>虏亮且反，公请「调丹阳弩手三千守清流关，副之州兵，滁可保也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286240_comment'></div>主兵官笑不应，公遽令远斥候。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286240_comment'></div>虏既大入，滁人徐渡江，僮妾不逃，器用无丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286240_comment'></div>又督运于天长，传言「虏兵至矣」，令尉欲弃刍茭而逝，公曰：「姑止，急燔之，毋为盗资」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286240_comment'></div>虏不敢进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286240_comment'></div>有以擅焚粮请劾公，制置使刘锜曰：「此真知兵也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286240_comment'></div>乃已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286240_comment'></div>监明州市舶务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286240_comment'></div>舶船至，即日<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1286240", 1286240, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>抽掣</span>，亲自评量，随粗细立尽，老侩束手。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286240_comment'></div>蕃客跪公前，昂其首，加手于额，拊地以谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286240_comment'></div>秀安僖王叹曰：「天下安有如此好监官」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286240_comment'></div>诸司相谓，不旬月举员毕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286240_comment'></div>知海盐县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286240_comment'></div>太守告公曰：「县坏久，欠州用经总数巨万，得材令，庶补足乎」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286240_comment'></div>公正色拒之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286240_comment'></div>已而新钱有馀，旧欠亦补，及季年，馀钱一万一千。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286240_comment'></div>倅行县知之，促公使具钞，公曰：「此夏税钱，代者事尔」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286240_comment'></div>倅曰：「使君方以善理财荐公，何必留钱为后人耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286240_comment'></div>公缩舌骇曰：「善理财，岂美名欤」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286240_comment'></div>倅惭而止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286240_comment'></div>还朝，裒平生著书五十篇，号《枢言》，上之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286240_comment'></div>执政爱其文，曰：「院辖选也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286240_comment'></div>公不顾去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286240_comment'></div>通判兴国军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286240_comment'></div>大旱，疫被数路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286240_comment'></div>公从一马二卒，赍㕮咀药，半夜宿村舍，空常平以救。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286240_comment'></div>他日过之，所至辄数千人送迎，知军怪问其故，皆泣曰：「昔不遇此通判，吾属阖门死矣」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286240_comment'></div>知峡州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286240_comment'></div>归，舟无辎重，有压动石十馀，络弃之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286240_comment'></div>王丞相，同僚也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286240_comment'></div>周丞相，同年也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286240_comment'></div>争劳公良苦，曰：「郎有阙，可待也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286240_comment'></div>公力辞，曰：「重内轻外，无甚于今。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286240_comment'></div>某老矣，朝谒之礼不堪也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1286240_comment'></div>知常德府，诸司举异绩，对后苑清晖殿，光宗面称肯十数，画时送中书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1286240_comment'></div>值留丞相引去，逾月不决，不果用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1286240_comment'></div>知处州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1286240_comment'></div>公治郡，以爱惜知县为本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1286240_comment'></div>狱讼赋输，使任其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_45_1286240", 1286240, "Clauses/135/Comments/0")'>殿负</span>，文檄付<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_45_1286240", 1286240, "Clauses/136/Comments/0")'>递铺</span>，一人不至县庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1286240_comment'></div>武陵二年，军律严静，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_46_1286240", 1286240, "Clauses/140/Comments/0")'>蛮猺</span>震服，省地晏然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1286240_comment'></div>括苍去乡近，治之尤详。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1286240_comment'></div>更造板籍，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_48_1286240", 1286240, "Clauses/145/Comments/3")'>隐寄</span>、<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_48_1286240", 1286240, "Clauses/145/Comments/4")'>飞寄</span>、影占、伪跋悉釐改。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1286240_comment'></div>好溪堰旁山桩筱所聚，请于朝，禁<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_49_1286240", 1286240, "Clauses/148/Comments/0")'>席势</span>冒佃者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1286240_comment'></div>贵人不悦，提刑以为慢己，御史亦妄疏，自朝议大夫贬二秩罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1286240_comment'></div>公既休，扃小室，缪篆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_51_1286240", 1286240, "Clauses/155/Comments/0")'>郁芬</span>，竟日<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_51_1286240", 1286240, "Clauses/156/Comments/0")'>却坐</span>，客至，请入<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_51_1286240", 1286240, "Clauses/158/Comments/0")'>庄语</span>而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1286240_comment'></div>庆元二年七月二日卒，年七十一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1286240_comment'></div>其明年七月八日，葬膺符乡瞿屿乾山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1286240_comment'></div>孙氏封宜人，后三年卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1286240_comment'></div>男五，二早夭；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1286240_comment'></div>伯舆，从政郎、邵武县丞，亦已卒；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1286240_comment'></div>叔舆，承直郎、新岳阳军节推；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1286240_comment'></div>季舆，迪功郎、婺州司户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1286240_comment'></div>孙男十一人，女八人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1286240_comment'></div>公仕不希名誉，诚意为民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1286240_comment'></div>海盐、兴国大兵后，不升降物力，公始行之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1286240_comment'></div>数为上言：「百姓困悴可哀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1286240_comment'></div>果、阆大军钱比他郡独重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1286240_comment'></div>峡州茶租均之客户，兴国马料□敷于五等，衡、袁岁取曲引，赣、吉日较赃罚，江东白收板帐，湖南倍折冬苗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1286240_comment'></div>夏绢和买，已非正赋，复有军衣和买；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1286240_comment'></div>糯米<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_66_1286240", 1286240, "Clauses/193/Comments/0")'>科折</span>，止为省务，复有覆纽价钱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1286240_comment'></div>若此类，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_67_1286240", 1286240, "Clauses/197/Comments/0")'>闻一知十</span>，穷民何以堪命！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1286240_comment'></div>今大吏无不言州县窘迫以咻公上，以臣所见，诚有窘迫之县，曾无窘迫之州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1286240_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_69_1286240", 1286240, "Clauses/203/Comments/0")'>占吝</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_69_1286240", 1286240, "Clauses/203/Comments/1")'>公事</span>，视同己物，狼心不厌矣，虽与数州，窘固在也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1286240_comment'></div>臣欲择朝士晓畅民事者，先于一路考财赋所从，孰<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_70_1286240", 1286240, "Clauses/210/Comments/0")'>经常</span>，孰横敛，某创支，某定例，何为而有馀，何为而不足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1286240_comment'></div>使溯源陷失者稽其违，沿流费耗者订其失，抑配白著虐取诸民者，一切论奏蠲除之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1286240_comment'></div>富哉言乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1286240_comment'></div>太史公所谓可著廊庙者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1286240_comment'></div>听公之言，行公之谏，则膏泽乌有不下于民者哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1286240_comment'></div>初，河南郭忠孝子雍，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_75_1286240", 1286240, "Clauses/227/Comments/0")'>遁居</span>长阳山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1286240_comment'></div>公将出峡，来见于白羊，极言天人性命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1286240_comment'></div>郭君曰：「『天命之谓性』，非天命则不谓性也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1286240_comment'></div>率此，斯谓道也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1286240_comment'></div>修此，斯谓教也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1286240_comment'></div>公又问雍得于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_80_1286240", 1286240, "Clauses/238/Comments/0")'>兼山</span>最要者，郭君曰：「所得在艮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1286240_comment'></div>艮者，限也，限立而内外不越。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1286240_comment'></div>天之命我，限之内也，不可出；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1286240_comment'></div>人欲，限之外也，不可入也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1286240_comment'></div>或为著《白羊问答》行于世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1286240_comment'></div>然则公之所存可知矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1286240_comment'></div>夫艮有止而无限，居不获之地，立无与之时，其止命也，岂有欲于其閒哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1286240_comment'></div>苟虞其未至于无欲也，而限以止焉，则或可矣，而非止之正也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1286240_comment'></div>余闻古之用人，胜流，一也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1286240_comment'></div>平进，二也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1286240_comment'></div>科目，三也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1286240_comment'></div>干泽，四也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1286240_comment'></div>胜流者有所激发以厉其节，平进者无所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_92_1286240", 1286240, "Clauses/271/Comments/0")'>附离</span>而行其志，故世莫能好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1286240_comment'></div>而科目以券内必取，干泽以凿空速化，虽左雄、山涛复生，不与易也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1286240_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1286240_comment'></div>蒋公终老不伸，又奚怪焉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1286240_comment'></div>叔舆又言：「自韩侂胄用，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_96_1286240", 1286240, "Clauses/282/Comments/0")'>党论</span>起，士大夫或去或逐，公始欲谢事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1286240_comment'></div>及赵公汝愚死，公痛其冤，因骤感疾不起」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1286240_comment'></div>噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1286240_comment'></div>是增异矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1286240_comment'></div>无汇征之利，而有朋亡之忧，何耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1286240_comment'></div>岂其好恶取舍一断以义，而不以己参之耶！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1286240_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_102_1286240'>西华隐者，巢、许之流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1286240_comment'></div>其孙以之，以铭斯丘。</div><div id='poem_sentence_103_1286240_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1198&endYear=1198')">1198年</a>　差管冲祐观，转朝奉大夫。朝廷拟差知衢州，辞，在家领祠禄，定居于永嘉生姜门外西湖上之水心村，与吴民表、周镇伯为邻。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1198&endYear=1198')">1198年</a>　金华王植来温受学。陈埴、翁敏之约于是时来学。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1198&endYear=1198')">1198年11月14日</a>　十一月十四日，撰石洞书院记。作品：石洞书院记。<span class='inlineComment2'>（日期见《水心集》卷九该文末。）</span><div id='poem_1286117' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286117' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286117?labeling=true' target='_blank'>石洞书院记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1198年11月14日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286117")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286117_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286117'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286117'>东阳郭君钦止，作书院于石洞之下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286117_comment'></div>石洞，郭氏名山也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286117_comment'></div>初，洞深复无行径，薪者给采而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286117_comment'></div>君始以意疏治，益前，阻崖壁，众不知所为，欲止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286117_comment'></div>君逼视其罅，遥闻水声出空中，曰：「嘻！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286117_comment'></div>是也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286117_comment'></div>盖凿崖百步，梯级而后进，土开谷明，俄若异境。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286117_comment'></div>稍复罙入，臻于旷平，则石之高翔俯踞，而竹坚木瘦皆衣被于其上；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286117_comment'></div>水之飞湍瀑流，而蕉红蒲绿皆浸灌于其下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286117_comment'></div>潭涧之洼衍，阿岭之嵌突，以亭以宇，可钓可奕，巧智所欲集，皆不谋而先成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286117_comment'></div>君又荫茂密以崇其幽，植芳妍以绚其阳，左右面势，彼此<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1286117", 1286117, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>回薄</span>，而山之向背曲折，阴晴早暮，姿态备矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286117_comment'></div>君甚乐之，以为山水之美，千载而潜，譬犹赵璧、随珠，璞于外而韫于中，其一日忽彰，何异武陵、天台显于今而閟于昔也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286117_comment'></div>既而叹曰：「吾寒生也，地之偶出于吾庐，非赐余者，吾其可自泰而游！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286117_comment'></div>将使子孙勤而学于斯，学其可以专，盍使乡里之秀并焉」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286117_comment'></div>于是度为书院，礼名士主其学，徙家之藏书以实之，储洞之田为书院之食，而斥洞之山为书院之山，示郭氏不敢有也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286117_comment'></div>君既卒，诸子修之不废，而津请余为记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286117_comment'></div>嗟夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286117_comment'></div>郭君远矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286117_comment'></div>以学易游而不以物乐厚其身，以众合独而不以地胜私其家也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286117_comment'></div>自君之为是，至今五十年，成之之难，传之之久也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286117_comment'></div>游之兴废，家之盛衰占焉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286117_comment'></div>学之兴废，人之盛衰占焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286117_comment'></div>学不待地也，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1286117", 1286117, "Clauses/77/Comments/0")'>萤灯雪屋</span>，苟取尺寸，而圣贤之业可成矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286117_comment'></div>学以知意为始，以尽力为终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286117_comment'></div>今夫悉其聪明，传之文字，深已造于性命，浅亦重于科举，而不能知其意，则犹为无所始也，将何以终之乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286117_comment'></div>君之子孙与其乡人必勉之！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286117_comment'></div>使之玩云岚，挹泉濑，心形洁清，以始终其学，而卓异豪杰之材出焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286117_comment'></div>然则学虽不待夫地，而地固有待夫学也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286117_comment'></div>庆元四年十一月十四日。</div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1286117_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1198&endYear=1198')">1198年</a>　撰宋希孟墓志铭。作品：宋邹卿墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286205' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286205' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286205?labeling=true' target='_blank'>宋邹卿墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1198年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286205")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286205_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286205'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286205'>君姓宋氏，讳希孟，字邹卿，温州平阳人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286205_comment'></div>曾祖荫，祖槩，父之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286205_comment'></div>庆元二年十月癸丑卒，年八十三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286205_comment'></div>明年正月，葬瑞安县长山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286205_comment'></div>娶徐氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286205_comment'></div>子长曰伯廉，幼曰弥大；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286205_comment'></div>曰直大、成大，曰浮屠、义天，皆先卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286205_comment'></div>女嫁叶浩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286205_comment'></div>孙男女十二人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286205_comment'></div>浩以君行语余曰：「翁一生姓名不悬<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1286205", 1286205, "Clauses/20/Comments/1")'>符牒</span>，足趾不履官府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286205_comment'></div>僧卧四十年，常坐惟一曲绳床，怠则假寐，终不易坐，床题戛檐柱，黑白成坎，今其处存焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286205_comment'></div>其于己，耻而不纵；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286205_comment'></div>其于人，厚而不议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286205_comment'></div>敬妻如宾，役僮如倩，以争为残，以吝为贼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286205_comment'></div>静而生明，虑而先验；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286205_comment'></div>其疾不痛，其死不乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286205_comment'></div>盖性有乐地，身有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1286205", 1286205, "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>常德</span>，质合道，器合仁，不教而自至也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286205_comment'></div>凡书籍所载，问学所讲，其道心人欲，出入不常，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1286205", 1286205, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>操揉磨治</span>，乃克底善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286205_comment'></div>故其为文，义反复而可传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286205_comment'></div>又所谓逸民隐德者，亦必苦身劳力，昼研暮赜，求志达道，不舍晷刻，使夫人以为是可以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1286205", 1286205, "Clauses/59/Comments/0")'>振暴</span>于当世，而尚阙然隐没不能足也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286205_comment'></div>然则矫恶而进善，援显以明隐，古今之故，既皆若此矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286205_comment'></div>今翁全乎天得之成资，而安乎畎亩之至顺，无持乎生存之学，而无蕲乎死灭之名，是以亲戚故人之外，鲜有知者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286205_comment'></div>其知者犹曰『是固田里之善而天民之常尔」』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286205_comment'></div>余闻而矍然！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286205_comment'></div>嗟乎，余之后夫子也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286205_comment'></div>前掩而后覆，补败而扶伤，俛俛焉杂乎善恶而役乎名实也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286205_comment'></div>如泥中之迹焉，徒示其跌而已矣，其不得为田里之善，天民之常，审哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286205_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_1286205'>淳心之成，其行不倾，以不胶乎死生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286205_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_1286205'>庆元四年□月□日。</div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1286205_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1198&endYear=1198')">1198年</a>　撰陈葵墓志铭。作品：陈叔向墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286227' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286227' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286227?labeling=true' target='_blank'>陈叔向墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1198年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286227")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286227_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286227'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286227'>叔向名葵，姓陈氏，处州青田人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286227_comment'></div>父彦成，宜教郎致仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286227_comment'></div>君第进士，莆田主簿，摄尉，盗获，法应改官，君叹曰：「彼罪且死而吾利之耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286227_comment'></div>簿缘<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1286227", 1286227, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>故例</span>掌僧租，僧遗簿米有定数，囊山一寺至六十石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286227_comment'></div>簿得之安，君一扫绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286227_comment'></div>教授婺州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286227_comment'></div>教官岁取钱米于学，取职田于东阳县数百千，君别藏之，为诸生市书，略具焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286227_comment'></div>又教南外睦宗院。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286227_comment'></div>赵丞相知福州，君谓赵公未知道，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1286227", 1286227, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>指告</span>提耳，累千馀言，并以崇饮饰游为戒，赵公矍然受规。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286227_comment'></div>荐审察，授淮南<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1286227", 1286227, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>运干</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286227_comment'></div>方议修石梁瓦梁堰，君言：「今果行此，则真、滁、和<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1286227", 1286227, "Clauses/35/Comments/2")'>涵浸</span>失业，濠、光、安丰怨不保护，六郡体大，备圉当别求」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286227_comment'></div>事遂格。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286227_comment'></div>运司交币将半而虏主卒，北人要君改服，君止不渡淮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286227_comment'></div>或劝姑听许，君曰：「漕檄令输银绢耳，无预<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1286227", 1286227, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>吊恤</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286227_comment'></div>必若改服，须奏闻也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286227_comment'></div>虏不能夺，竟常服而毕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286227_comment'></div>知平阳县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286227_comment'></div>号为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1286227", 1286227, "Clauses/52/Comments/0")'>剧烦</span>，君临以至诚，适缓急之中，吏民畏悦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286227_comment'></div>绍熙五年正月五日卒官，年五十六。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286227_comment'></div>夫人洪氏，后十四年卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286227_comment'></div>子志仁、志义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286227_comment'></div>五女，嫁者乡贡进士洪纬、康伯起，太学生刘之海，之海死；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286227_comment'></div>迪功郎、监海盐买纳场席葆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286227_comment'></div>庆元四年十二月甲申，葬永嘉县三洲台湖山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286227_comment'></div>乾道淳熙中，问学日盛，士<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1286227", 1286227, "Clauses/70/Comments/0")'>梯山栈谷</span>，自力于善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286227_comment'></div>君仕不希举，有辄推其僚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286227_comment'></div>事父<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1286227", 1286227, "Clauses/74/Comments/0")'>孝谨</span>，宣教君病，不解衣数月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286227_comment'></div>兄弟相爱友，门内<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1286227", 1286227, "Clauses/78/Comments/0")'>谐乐</span>，无疾声<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1286227", 1286227, "Clauses/79/Comments/0")'>遽色</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286227_comment'></div>祭庙以主，合族以宗，行义修，内外完，彬彬乎一乡之和也，有吉人良士之实矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286227_comment'></div>君既与魏益之游，每恨<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1286227", 1286227, "Clauses/87/Comments/0")'>志虑</span>昏而无所明，记忆烦而不足赖，益之因教以尽弃所怀，独立于物之初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286227_comment'></div>未久，忽大悟，洪纤大小，高下曲直，皆髣髴若有见焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286227_comment'></div>自是以师道归益之，且疑吕伯恭诵书徒多，朱元晦修方不疗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286227_comment'></div>时吕公已下世矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286227_comment'></div>朱公虽论未合，然重其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_1286227", 1286227, "Clauses/101/Comments/0")'>调直</span>无隐，士有比君所者，必使往从之，曰：「可以寡过也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286227_comment'></div>昔孔子称愤启悱发，举一而返三，而孟子亦言充其四端至于能保四海，往往近于今之所谓悟者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286227_comment'></div>然仁必有方，道必有等，未有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1286227", 1286227, "Clauses/112/Comments/0")'>一造</span>而尽获也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286227_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1286227", 1286227, "Clauses/113/Comments/0")'>一造</span>而尽获，庄、佛氏之妄也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286227_comment'></div>叔向掊<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_1286227", 1286227, "Clauses/115/Comments/0")'>包蒙</span>之钥，游于广大，而常自言用功益难，进道愈远，古人今人皆未可轻议，其励志勇猛，盖不以悟自足也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286227_comment'></div>而益之不然，独守其悟，而百圣之户庭虚矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286227_comment'></div>然则叔向之所以异于其师者，益之亦未暇详也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286227_comment'></div>二君死馀二十年，余复老病，追念往事，悲慨无已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1286227_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_41_1286227'>履卑而行尊，言约而义富；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1286227_comment'></div>经术修明，表里纯茂；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1286227_comment'></div>美玉精金，宜在清庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1286227_comment'></div>此赵公荐叔向之美也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1286227_comment'></div>叔向之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_45_1286227", 1286227, "Clauses/139/Comments/0")'>劘拂</span>赵公如彼也，赵公之敬听叔向如此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1286227_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1286227_comment'></div>能用功名显，有以也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_47_1286227_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1198&endYear=1198')">1198年</a>　为法明寺教藏作序。作品：法明寺教藏序。<div id='poem_1285912' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1285912' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1285912?labeling=true' target='_blank'>法明寺教藏序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1198年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1285912")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1285912_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1285912'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1285912'>西湖法明寺，昔<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1285912", 1285912, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>讲师</span>继忠居之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1285912_comment'></div>忠有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1285912", 1285912, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>行业</span>，愿力强果，故虽焚荡草莽，百年间冠盖常走一郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1285912_comment'></div>至子真建两序，师昶崇殿堂，院始落成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1285912_comment'></div>昶尤精苦，衣屦穿损，食不累合，然诸生云赴，应答泉涌，人谓东掖、上天竺之盛不能过也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1285912_comment'></div>天台既立止观二义，承而为说者益以蔓衍，而忠与昶亦各有论述，故其徒妙真、普济，欲集诸家之学为教藏置院中，率州士女修念佛<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1285912", 1285912, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>三昧</span>，以旌昶之绩而嗣忠之业于无穷，志甚远也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1285912_comment'></div>夫浮屠以身为旅泊而严其宫室不已，以言为赘疣而传于文字愈多，固余所不解；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1285912_comment'></div>尝以问昶，昶亦不能言也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1285912_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1199&endYear=1199')">1199年</a>　是年仍奉祠家居。夏，得异疾。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1200&endYear=1200')">1200年</a>　因患病与党禁居家。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1200&endYear=1200')">1200年4月23日</a>　四月二十三，岳父高子莫卒，因病不能行礼，勉为文祭之。作品：祭高永州文。<span class='inlineComment2'>（题目见《水心集》卷二八。）</span><div id='poem_1286331' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286331' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286331?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭高永州文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1200年4月23日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286331")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286331_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286331'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286331'>先后圣德，天报其门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286331_comment'></div>何以报之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286331_comment'></div>维材与贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286331_comment'></div>簪笏之腴，而自陶冶，不以师教，有如公者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286331_comment'></div>靡骄曩贵，靡羞后贫，铢廉黍约，以标厥身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286331_comment'></div>官奚弗昭，知亦非少，荐闻实多，不用竟老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286331_comment'></div>眇然零陵，并重夺之，理不可推，通人所疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286331_comment'></div>我惭素贱，乃辱公女，手择寒蔬，相与敬处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286331_comment'></div>公归自洪，我屏西山，瘦马独来，共谈草间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286331_comment'></div>我疾异甚，迟旦暮死，公今忽先，视我馀几。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286331_comment'></div>以义当哀，以情当悲，昏塞我衷，不知施为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286331_comment'></div>又失我思，无复昔语，强寄兹觞，公釂勿吐。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1286331_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1200&endYear=1200')">1200年12月</a>　十二月，门人山阴孙之宏请志其父墓，叶适因病却之，乃请陆游表于墓。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='c62a1f4e604e4329a3eb428c98588cd0_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("c62a1f4e604e4329a3eb428c98588cd0");'><span id='c62a1f4e604e4329a3eb428c98588cd0_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1203&endYear=1206')">1203-1206年</a>，54-57岁</div><div id='c62a1f4e604e4329a3eb428c98588cd0' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1203&endYear=1203')">1203年11月11日</a>　十一月十一日，父光祖卒，丁忧去职。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1203&endYear=1203')">1203年11月</a>　十一月十二日，陈傅良卒于瑞安家中，叶适有祭文。作品：祭陈君举中书文。<span class='inlineComment2'>（题目见《水心集》卷二十八。）</span><div id='poem_1286334' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286334' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286334?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭陈君举中书文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1203年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286334")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286334_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286334'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286334'>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286334_comment'></div>惟公勤而滋苦之累，敏而成钝之功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286334_comment'></div>岂徒意讲圣贤之精粗，固已实考王伯之污隆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286334_comment'></div>所欲托之空言，又曰不如载之行事者，皆古人之未及，讵广学而希通！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286334_comment'></div>有能行之，审周道如贯珠，晓百世若发蒙；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286334_comment'></div>开章程于草昧，调辔策于驽癃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286334_comment'></div>其广其长，其深其崇，可以运之掌上而措之寰中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286334_comment'></div>鸣于海陬，败屦瘦筇，暴名如雷，新语如风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286334_comment'></div>宿老<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1286334", 1286334, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>负墙</span>，豪隽景从，而时文靡然由之一变，遂为多士之宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286334_comment'></div>好恶顺逆，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1286334", 1286334, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>几几</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1286334", 1286334, "Clauses/26/Comments/1")'>恭恭</span>；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286334_comment'></div>进退用舍，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1286334", 1286334, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>侃侃</span>雍雍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286334_comment'></div>机虑内沈，笑语外融。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286334_comment'></div>曾未施其一二，而谤大于山，忌众成丛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286334_comment'></div>洗足南塘之流，振袖葑村之峰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286334_comment'></div>帝曰汝归，公寐无聪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286334_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286334_comment'></div>世事<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1286334", 1286334, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>多端</span>，非智所穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286334_comment'></div>谓其易研，而后难工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286334_comment'></div>有或间之，掩昭以聋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286334_comment'></div>惟其不磨，植厚干穹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286334_comment'></div>自我获见，四十馀冬，其术则殊，其论鲜同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286334_comment'></div>伟标寒而韵远，有死始而生终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286334_comment'></div>异疾侵陵，美人西东。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286334_comment'></div>天罚不宥，销殒并空。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286334_comment'></div>公既弃我，又遭<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1286334", 1286334, "Clauses/58/Comments/0")'>鞠凶</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286334_comment'></div>日馀几何，而不随公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286334_comment'></div>覆酒成池，有痛填胸。</div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1286334_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1203&endYear=1203')">1203年</a>　为林湜撰墓志。作品：中奉大夫直龙图阁司农卿林公墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（题目见《水心集》卷十九。）</span><div id='poem_1286250' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286250' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286250?labeling=true' target='_blank'>中奉大夫直龙图阁司农卿林公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1203年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286250")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286250_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286250'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286250'>公林氏，讳湜，字正甫，福州长溪人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286250_comment'></div>曾祖岩，祖樗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286250_comment'></div>父师中，赠中奉大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286250_comment'></div>中奉迎师于蜀，得师先生以归，学者常数百人，中奉为高第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286250_comment'></div>公入太学，与石斗文、吴称、吴俯、张渊并时知名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286250_comment'></div>登绍兴庚辰进士第，为富阳尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286250_comment'></div>虏亮之乱，部弓手截隘处，邑豪乘时贩盐行劫，公捕擒之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286250_comment'></div>代归，教授明州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286250_comment'></div>朝廷会其劳，改官改泉州晋江县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286250_comment'></div>州分造战船，公曰：「负郭岂有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1286250", 1286250, "Clauses/26/Comments/1")'>羡钱</span>耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286250_comment'></div>何忍敛百姓」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286250_comment'></div>将舍去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286250_comment'></div>诸番义公之为，助其役，舟先就而民不知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286250_comment'></div>满秩，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1286250", 1286250, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>攀留</span>空一城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286250_comment'></div>通判南剑，太守议官自卖酒，公争曰：「卖盐已病矣，又益以酒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286250_comment'></div>且闽地俱万户也，今始自南剑，他郡效之，君不畏八州民怨己乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286250_comment'></div>守讳其切，自为奏，朝廷视无通判署，疑之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286250_comment'></div>方下，公条上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286250_comment'></div>言者亦谓「闽近瘴，故二税有酒钱而民自酤，今创禁之，非旧制也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286250_comment'></div>守奏遂格。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286250_comment'></div>汀州赋输无法，吏多取自入，为百姓患，帅漕请<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1286250", 1286250, "Clauses/57/Comments/0")'>均节</span>之，以委公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286250_comment'></div>公索其征，有公库鲊脯食次册、差出贴支等钱，皆数千计，他多此类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286250_comment'></div>守倅俸数倍矣，小官薄，复别贷以给。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286250_comment'></div>公约其岁用，增损适平，省缗钱四万还之民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286250_comment'></div>监司更荐，召审察，干办诸司审计司，迁太常寺主簿、国子监丞、太常丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286250_comment'></div>绍熙元年，迁监察御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286250_comment'></div>公久官南方，无中援。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286250_comment'></div>既入朝，名人善士一见如旧识，相谓曰：「今士大夫去就，常以台谏官贤否为卜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286250_comment'></div>是公格应入台，得如斯人者，庶几乎」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286250_comment'></div>至是竟用公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286250_comment'></div>故事，台谏官居同宅，相爱助厚甚，弹劾论谏，必相参审，好恶指趣不少异，曰：「所以共持纪纲也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286250_comment'></div>公独喟然曰：「吾不惟贤与善是亲，正人之愠于众小人是助，好恶去取不以公论为归，而曰共持其纪纲也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286250_comment'></div>夫纪纲者，岂台谏官为私之地欤」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286250_comment'></div>他日见上，奏曰：「陛下托股肱于宰执而除授多小人，寄耳目于台谏而弹击多君子，治乱之大，无过此也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286250_comment'></div>执论移晷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286250_comment'></div>侍立舍人言于众曰：「今日察院争何事，反覆不已也」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286250_comment'></div>自是与其长不合矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286250_comment'></div>时小人知公意，颇自为计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286250_comment'></div>公与同列三人论劾甚锐，至一日罢数人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286250_comment'></div>内外皆耸，方依公为重，而上以觉察过数诏谕公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286250_comment'></div>公为殿试详定官，考直言者居第一，而上不用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1286250_comment'></div>及殿中侍御史刘德脩下迁，公曰：「吾可以去矣」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1286250_comment'></div>刘公，盖公所谓亲而助之者也，公奏直刘公，不报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1286250_comment'></div>钱之望知静江府，公再论之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1286250_comment'></div>上罢之望，出公浙东提刑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1286250_comment'></div>宰执合前，愿少留，不听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1286250_comment'></div>移江西转运判官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1286250_comment'></div>楚多讼，吏积厌苦，公曰：「己恣睢，而使民以弭笔成名乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1286250_comment'></div>取滞讼自判之，数月，至者益少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1286250_comment'></div>免赣州科罚，罢龙南安远折变，减兴国淮衣绢、南安圣节银，及水潦州县窠名之在漕司者皆除之，岁损数万，而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_49_1286250", 1286250, "Clauses/150/Comments/0")'>漕计</span>犹增于旧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1286250_comment'></div>召为吏部郎中，迁太府少卿，以孝宗遗留使虏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1286250_comment'></div>始，光宗过重华宫疏阔，公再三请，未效而孝宗崩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1286250_comment'></div>上内禅，公入辞，首以「奉亲欢，杜谗口」为劝，上俯听，首肯数四，谓吏部侍郎彭龟年曰：「朕初即位，未识群臣，此老成重厚人也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1286250_comment'></div>在道系带、及国通名有未合者，连却虏议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1286250_comment'></div>至赐衣，以其服被公，公挥掷去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1286250_comment'></div>虏人曰：「君命何可慢也」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1286250_comment'></div>公曰：「宋正统相承，群官服视其品。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1286250_comment'></div>今易左衽，有死而已」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1286250_comment'></div>争辩甚久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1286250_comment'></div>虏趣入谢，公<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_59_1286250", 1286250, "Clauses/182/Comments/0")'>盛服</span>如故，虏不能屈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1286250_comment'></div>复命，上迎谓曰：「卿守礼甚坚，国体不失，朕所知也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1286250_comment'></div>迁司农卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1286250_comment'></div>公之还自江西，众望谓公当遂用，公论事不假借。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1286250_comment'></div>庆元初，韩侘胄始专国，朝士多自引去，吕祖俭上书争之，贬岭外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1286250_comment'></div>公见余丞相曰：「吕子约匆匆南行，奈何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1286250_comment'></div>叔世事不宜有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1286250_comment'></div>执奏收回，大臣责也，丞相可不勉乎」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1286250_comment'></div>语喧一时，权近<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_67_1286250", 1286250, "Clauses/206/Comments/0")'>侧睨</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1286250_comment'></div>公因力请外，除直宝文阁，湖北运副。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1286250_comment'></div>未几，与冲佑观，起知泉州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1286250_comment'></div>不乐公者犹谓不可，复与冲佑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1286250_comment'></div>毕祠，遂请老，进龙图阁致仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1286250_comment'></div>嘉泰二年七月二十六日卒，年七十一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1286250_comment'></div>公晚而居平阳松山，温、福之间也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1286250_comment'></div>遂以三年十二月十九日葬于贤沙里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1286250_comment'></div>夫人黄氏，封令人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1286250_comment'></div>子介，文林郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1286250_comment'></div>孙孟嘉、孟治，皆登仕郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1286250_comment'></div>孟淮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1286250_comment'></div>孙女二人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1286250_comment'></div>公合女兄弟十人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1286250_comment'></div>兄淳，尉朝阳，夫妇死，公经纪振业，官其子弇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1286250_comment'></div>馀弟妹亦自足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1286250_comment'></div>再从叔贫无后，为立嗣，嫁其女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1286250_comment'></div>性淡薄散朗，虽居官精敏，遇事<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_84_1286250", 1286250, "Clauses/243/Comments/0")'>立断</span>，而平居但教诸生诵说，若不涉世故者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1286250_comment'></div>于善恶贤不肖明白，而尤护惜善类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1286250_comment'></div>世所谓善人君子，常欲以一身同其荣悴去留，故议论多激发，见忌于人，以是龃龉废斥而终不悔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1286250_comment'></div>朱公元晦既谪，士讳其学，公执弟子礼不变，未殁数月，犹<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_87_1286250", 1286250, "Clauses/257/Comments/0")'>走书</span>问疑义云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1286250_comment'></div>介录其文号《盘隐类藁》十卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1286250_comment'></div>介喜节知类，能似公，来请铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1286250_comment'></div>余昔与公及詹元善同在太常，续炬纵语，以铭属余者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1286250_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_91_1286250'>大膏寥寥分一灯，耿然自照非外明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1286250_comment'></div>奉璋来朝如景星，善人视之为废兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1286250_comment'></div>绍熙御史庆元卿，义能扶持事不胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1286250_comment'></div>乾刚坤柔相<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_94_1286250", 1286250, "Clauses/272/Comments/0")'>降升</span>，以待后死铭有徵。</div><div id='poem_sentence_94_1286250_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1204&endYear=1204')">1204年</a>　居家服丧。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1204&endYear=1204')">1204年2月8日</a>　二月八日，葬父于永嘉县建牙乡，并撰圹志。作品：叶公圹志。<div id='poem_1286212' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286212' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286212?labeling=true' target='_blank'>致政朝请郎叶公圹志</a><span class='authorDate'>（1204年2月8日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286212")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286212_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286212'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286212'>公姓叶氏，讳光祖，字显之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286212_comment'></div>祖公济，游太学无成，赀衰，去处州龙泉，居于温，至公定为永嘉人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286212_comment'></div>公性<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1286212", 1286212, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>拓荦</span>，志愿大，困于无地，不自振立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286212_comment'></div>岁既晚，专屏静处，不预人事，味山野之乐而远市朝，服台笠以忘<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1286212", 1286212, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>冠绅</span>焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286212_comment'></div>年八十五，嘉泰三年十一月十一日卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286212_comment'></div>积封至朝请郎，赐紫衣金鱼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286212_comment'></div>夫人杜氏，先公二十六年卒，封安人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286212_comment'></div>子男六：曰逮；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286212_comment'></div>曰某，朝散大夫、尚书兵部侍郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286212_comment'></div>曰还，曰过，曰迈，曰造。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286212_comment'></div>女三，嫁孙夔、项士龙、伍衡尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286212_comment'></div>孙男八：曰思益，曰福歌，先夭；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286212_comment'></div>曰宣，曰阿阜；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286212_comment'></div>曰寀，将仕郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286212_comment'></div>曰宓，曰楠郎，曰阿胜，曰阿自。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286212_comment'></div>孙女五：曰媛，曰季，皆先夭；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286212_comment'></div>曰淑，曰止，曰雅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286212_comment'></div>嘉泰四年二月初八日，葬永嘉县建牙乡无相院山之右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286212_comment'></div>初，杜氏葬膺符乡上水陆院西，及是不克合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286212_comment'></div>吴人滕宬记圹。</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1286212_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1204&endYear=1204')">1204年3月</a>　三月，为陈亮《龙川文集》作序。作品：龙川集序。<span class='inlineComment2'>（题目见《水心集》卷十二。）</span><div id='poem_1285894' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1285894' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1285894?labeling=true' target='_blank'>龙川集序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1204年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1285894")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1285894_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1285894'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1285894'>同甫文字行于世者，《酌古论》、《陈子课稿》、《上皇帝四书》，最著者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1285894_comment'></div>子沆，聚他作为若干卷以授余。<div class='inline'
