id='poem_sentence_1_1285894_comment'></div>初，天子得同甫所上书，惊异累日，以为绝出，使执政召问当从何处下手，将由布衣径唯诺殿上以定大事，何其盛也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1285894_comment'></div>然而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1285894", 1285894, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>诋讪</span>交起，竟用空言罗织成罪，再入大理狱几死，又何酷也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1285894_comment'></div>使同甫晚不登进士第，则世终以为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1285894", 1285894, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>狼疾</span>人矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1285894_comment'></div>呜呼，悲夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1285894_comment'></div>同甫其果有罪于世乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1285894_comment'></div>天乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1285894_comment'></div>余知其无罪也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1285894_comment'></div>同甫其果无罪于世乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1285894_comment'></div>世之好恶未有不以情者，彼于同甫何独异哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1285894_comment'></div>虽然，同甫为德不为怨，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1285894", 1285894, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>自厚</span>而薄责人，则疑若以为有罪焉可矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1285894_comment'></div>同甫既修皇帝王霸之学，上下二千馀年，考其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1285894", 1285894, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>合散</span>，发其秘藏，见圣贤之精微常流行于事物，儒者失其指，故不足以开物成务，其说皆今人所未讲，朱公元晦意有不与，而不能夺也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1285894_comment'></div>吕公伯恭退居金华，同甫间往视之，极论至夜分，吕公叹曰：「未可以世为不能用，虎帅以听，谁敢犯子」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1285894_comment'></div>同甫亦颇慰意焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1285894_comment'></div>余最鄙且钝，同甫微言，十不能解一二，犹以为可教者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1285894_comment'></div>病眊十年，耗忘尽矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1285894_comment'></div>今其遗文，大抵班班具焉，览者详之而已。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1285894_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1204&endYear=1204')">1204年10月</a>　十月，在家编次《外稿》并作跋。作品：外稿自跋。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1204&endYear=1204')">1204年</a>　为高少卿作墓志铭。作品：朝请大夫司农少卿高公墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286218' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286218' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286218?labeling=true' target='_blank'>朝请大夫司农少卿高公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1204年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286218")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286218_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286218'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286218'>宣仁后<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1286218", 1286218, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>临朝</span>九年，尤<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1286218", 1286218, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>抑远</span>外家，不私以官，亲侄公绘、公纪止防御使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286218_comment'></div>后崩，哲宗始推恩迁留后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286218_comment'></div>宣和前，公纪子世则，任不过遥刺；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286218_comment'></div>及陪扈高宗，翊戴宋州，自以功擢使相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286218_comment'></div>中兴用人道广，戚畹功臣子多<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1286218", 1286218, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>显幸</span>，甚或侍从执政累累有焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286218_comment'></div>由是公绘子世定修撰于秘阁，世则子百之亦直秘阁，百之子子溶司农少卿，又公纪曾孙子润大宗正丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286218_comment'></div>盖百年间，宣仁近亲高氏美仕具是矣，比其他勋戚，重侯叠官，富贵熏炙，多少相什伯也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286218_comment'></div>夫不问材否，当时而荣，人以力取之也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286218_comment'></div>以贤自异，待时而显，天以德报之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286218_comment'></div>宣仁绍姜女胥宇之烈，嗣太任思齐之圣，复还尧、舜仁义道，为宋延无疆大历服，本于至公大义而已矣，岂顾计外家区区恩爱厚薄哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286218_comment'></div>闻于长老，元祐之政，奸邪小人特不便，故高氏不得志于绍圣、崇观，用事者惴惴几不全。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286218_comment'></div>高宗恻然，命宰相改谤史，圣德复明，然褒录之诏偶未及也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286218_comment'></div>余以国史叙高氏世次，而少卿子不倚请为记其墓，曰：少卿字庆远，仁爱恭恕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286218_comment'></div>常独处一室，不妄交接。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286218_comment'></div>内敏而畅，应和<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1286218", 1286218, "Clauses/54/Comments/0")'>纷遝</span>，中微入眇，口若不能言，人倍贤之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286218_comment'></div>调平江府粮料院，签书越州节度判官，再通判平江府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286218_comment'></div>事长官如父兄，职守不便，立治亟改。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286218_comment'></div>吴人围田壅下流者以里计，皆豪势家也，公视水势所向，标拆废之，人不敢怨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286218_comment'></div>知荆门军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286218_comment'></div>汉旁百六十里，雨潦冒民田，耕者不偿种，官<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1286218", 1286218, "Clauses/73/Comments/0")'>捐廪</span>六千石，犹不能救，公曰：「此可谓巨害，而昔未有议，何也」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286218_comment'></div>为沿汉筑堤，十旬而成，岁以不饥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286218_comment'></div>于役处得窖银锸钁甚众，人皆异之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286218_comment'></div>公<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1286218", 1286218, "Clauses/84/Comments/0")'>摩揉</span>小郡，辛苦在民，兴其大利，约己惜费，整坏理阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286218_comment'></div>又摘试义勇，岁遍，军容完新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286218_comment'></div>声闻诸司，荐授太社令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286218_comment'></div>迁军器大理丞仓曹郎，提举淮东常平茶盐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286218_comment'></div>淮东久旱，飞蝗食人食几尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286218_comment'></div>公予州县粟五十万，分择官吏，悉条前后赈恤善者数十事施行之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286218_comment'></div>劝盐商以米<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1286218", 1286218, "Clauses/101/Comments/0")'>贴钞</span>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1286218", 1286218, "Clauses/102/Comments/0")'>贩舟</span>鳞集。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286218_comment'></div>岁七日，率属郡<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1286218", 1286218, "Clauses/104/Comments/0")'>洁斋</span>合祠以祈，既大雪，蝗死麦熟，人以为至诚之应。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286218_comment'></div>盐司故例厚，公削去法不应得者，先绳以身，吏蠹颇息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286218_comment'></div>亭民本钱，量留十一，偿放博户，火伏日多支卖增十三四。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286218_comment'></div>召还，除左曹郎军器监，入司农为少卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286218_comment'></div>时太仓米名具无实，上下<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_1286218", 1286218, "Clauses/120/Comments/0")'>蔽匿</span>，莫敢覆按。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286218_comment'></div>公疏十年致弊本末，请一洗宿负，给新钱，从之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286218_comment'></div>方别为纲条，使后可继，而公以忧归矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286218_comment'></div>初，公母安国夫人年且九十，聪明轻捷，无老人状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286218_comment'></div>诸子踰六十，各守一州，夫人东西行莅之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286218_comment'></div>将从公请而往，疾忽作，公奔走省而夫人薨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286218_comment'></div>勺饮未和，嘉泰三年十二月甲子，公亦卒，年六十三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286218_comment'></div>四年十月某日，不倚与弟不倨、不俦，以公遗命葬于平江府吴县长洲乡阳山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1286218_comment'></div>娶李氏、王氏、韩氏，皆封宜人，其卒皆先公；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1286218_comment'></div>其茔，公所治也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1286218_comment'></div>不倨、不俦，皆将仕郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1286218_comment'></div>孙彦博、彦章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1286218_comment'></div>孙女二人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1286218_comment'></div>始，公课郡最，入朝前后七迁得少卿，在廷中<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_46_1286218", 1286218, "Clauses/158/Comments/0")'>谦退</span>甚，不敢与同列齿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1286218_comment'></div>仪观秀伟，见者亲敬之，安其为僚而不忌其躐己，皆曰仁人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1286218_comment'></div>高氏簪绂九世，初以武功，后以舅宠，独不倚登进士第，今为修职郎、浙西安抚司干官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1286218_comment'></div>昔后自以阁内钱买国子监书赐其私第，欸识曰：「元祐丙午崇庆殿赐书安仁坊高氏家藏」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1286218_comment'></div>然则读书之效，至不倚始当之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1286218_comment'></div>今高氏子弟往往耦耕<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_51_1286218", 1286218, "Clauses/174/Comments/0")'>斗食</span>，密房坏户，一灯荧荧，挟册呻吟，如布衣寒士，于是将皆为进士，皆以文字科目起其家也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1286218_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1286218_comment'></div>后之志也欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1286218_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_54_1286218'>猗高祖姑，元祐稽古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1286218_comment'></div>复祖宗法，开贤俊路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1286218_comment'></div>颙颙少卿，天侈其门；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1286218_comment'></div>本无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_57_1286218", 1286218, "Clauses/190/Comments/0")'>骄舒</span>，不待锄耘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1286218_comment'></div>淮、楚之郊，以庸以绩；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1286218_comment'></div>表著之美，金锡圭璧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1286218_comment'></div>我不尽能，留畀厥子；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1286218_comment'></div>文字之祥，始基于此。</div><div id='poem_sentence_61_1286218_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1204&endYear=1204')">1204年</a>　为门人赵汝谈之母作墓志铭。作品：夫人王氏墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286296' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286296' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286296?labeling=true' target='_blank'>夫人王氏墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1204年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286296")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286296_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286296'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286296'>夫人，临海王氏，嫁为朝奉郎知池州赵善临妻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286296_comment'></div>嘉泰四年六月二十二日卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286296_comment'></div>九月壬午，合葬馀杭县景信里东坞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286296_comment'></div>子五人，曰汝谈，汝谠，汝训，汝诂，汝诂；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286296_comment'></div>汝诂继善胜后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286296_comment'></div>女四，婿曰奉议郎龙游知县潘自牧，进士黄镇，承务郎监隆兴府苗米仓吴弥昭，奉议郎太社令王梦龙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286296_comment'></div>孙崇豫，成忠郎监衢州比较务；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286296_comment'></div>崇陶，将仕郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286296_comment'></div>崇龚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286296_comment'></div>初，大宗正崇国公不𢙯与校书郎王道名义相友善如弟兄，二家求永好，故夫人归池州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286296_comment'></div>祖姑曹，性刚严，姑郑奉事庄慄不敢惰；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286296_comment'></div>夫人助郑旦暮上食饮，扶侍左右，终曹之世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286296_comment'></div>崇公仕湖、湘、夔、蜀，川舟陆馆，淹泊累载，欲常候母<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1286296", 1286296, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>动息</span>，妇姑同一室处，嬉遨谐剧，不用常礼，其和乐又如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286296_comment'></div>而池州昼夜父侧，参论议，治文书，房舍稀闻履声，各以孝敬分职，非世俗间子妇比也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286296_comment'></div>崇公既主留务任，公族大长，赐宅供帐；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286296_comment'></div>池州倅辇毂下，用行能荐登朝廷，门户益伸气；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286296_comment'></div>而节以恭俭，约以诗礼，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1286296", 1286296, "Clauses/55/Comments/0")'>宾师</span>必于名士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286296_comment'></div>诸子恂恂<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1286296", 1286296, "Clauses/56/Comments/0")'>退守</span>，诸孙惟笔砚得亲近，绝不知京、洛可喜玩事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286296_comment'></div>而汝谈、汝谠有异材，文藻蔚发，韩篇杜笔，高出于时，朝士咸<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1286296", 1286296, "Clauses/63/Comments/0")'>仰重</span>，不独夫人之产多贤良，亦其家法素修，故致此尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286296_comment'></div>赵丞相欲骤进汝谈、汝谠，风厉宗室，然崇公及曹、郑夫人相次薨，池州毁不胜丧，亦早殁，韩侂胄谗逐赵丞相，二子并坐斥矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286296_comment'></div>当是时，夫人去之馀杭山中，居无庐，食无田，芟锄荒榛，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1286296", 1286296, "Clauses/79/Comments/0")'>经始</span>耕稼，迎妇送女，细碎罄竭，辛苦淡薄十馀年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286296_comment'></div>侂胄败死，汝谈为馆职，出湖北常平，知温州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286296_comment'></div>汝谠寺丞，使数路，汝训、汝诂改官知连江泰宁县，祥委顺合，如崇公在时，人固以不及夫人之养为诸子恨，而尤以不预诸子之荣为夫人惜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286296_comment'></div>盖夫人则象崇公，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1286296", 1286296, "Clauses/95/Comments/1")'>规矩</span>曹、郑，位夫妇男女之正而安行乎家道之常，虽丰悴不齐而中微后显，天理必复，如霜露零落而春阳之生发已具矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286296_comment'></div>贤者虑百世，身之预不预，何计欣戚哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286296_comment'></div>夫人每记宣、政宴安，靖康祸乱，时时为子妇道说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286296_comment'></div>常曰：「始吾为妇，衣食外不用钱，一室环丈许不觉隘，今汝辈不足耶」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286296_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_1286296'>父实南士，家垂<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1286296", 1286296, "Clauses/113/Comments/0")'>范模</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286296_comment'></div>爰从罗甥，教始诗、书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286296_comment'></div>冢于赵宗，人无间言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286296_comment'></div>女淑在闺，男秀盈门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286296_comment'></div>云雷方屯，失匕致难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286296_comment'></div>有物有常，星斗其烂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286296_comment'></div>弥高极深，一缕万寻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286296_comment'></div>益培后昆，尚单厥心。</div><div id='poem_sentence_34_1286296_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1204&endYear=1204')">1204年</a>　为朱黼《纪年备遗》作序。作品：纪年备遗序。<div id='poem_1285895' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1285895' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1285895?labeling=true' target='_blank'>纪年备遗序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1204年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1285895")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1285895_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1285895'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1285895'>孔子没，统纪之学废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1285895_comment'></div>汉以来，经、史、文词裂而为三，它小道杂出，不可胜数，殚聪明于微浅，自谓巧智，不足以成德而人材坏矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1285895_comment'></div>王通、二司马，缉遗绪，综世变，使君臣德合以起治道，其粗细广略不同，而问学统纪之辨不可杂也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1285895_comment'></div>平阳朱黼，因《通鉴》、《稽古录》，章别论著，始尧、舜，迄五代，三千馀篇，述吕、武、王莽、曹丕、朱温，皆削其纪年以从正统，曰：「吾为书之志也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1285895_comment'></div>书法无大于此矣，报雠明耻，贵夏贱夷其次也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1285895_comment'></div>凡民人家国之用，制度<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1285895", 1285895, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>等威</span>之异，皆为说以处之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1285895_comment'></div>众言之淆乱，则折而一之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1285895_comment'></div>讹谬之相承，则釐而正之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1285895_comment'></div>南北华戎之离合，争夺之碎，人所厌简，亦备论之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1285895_comment'></div>该括既多而条目众矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1285895_comment'></div>所以存世次，观<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1285895", 1285895, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>兴坏</span>，本经训，原事实，芟理芜蔓，显发精隐，扶树正义，蒐举<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1285895", 1285895, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>坠逸</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1285895_comment'></div>不以华为辨，不以意为觉，无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1285895", 1285895, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>偏駮</span>之说，无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1285895", 1285895, "Clauses/51/Comments/0")'>新特</span>之论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1285895_comment'></div>反而约之，知其能费而隐也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1285895_comment'></div>时而措之，知其能曲而当也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1285895_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1285895_comment'></div>此岂非学者之所当尽其心欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1285895_comment'></div>何后世用力者之难而成功者之寡也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1285895_comment'></div>自董仲舒推明孔氏，犹不能无讥，况马、郑、王肃之伦哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1285895_comment'></div>故余于此书窃有叹焉，所谓复而不厌，不知老之将至者，几是欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1285895_comment'></div>黼字文昭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1285895_comment'></div>初，陈公君举未壮讲学，文昭年差次，最先进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1285895_comment'></div>及后来取名官，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1285895", 1285895, "Clauses/72/Comments/0")'>弁冕</span>接踵，而文昭蓬累耕南荡上，山水叠重，声迹落落，人不知其能传陈公之业也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1285895_comment'></div>一旦此书出，义理所会，宝藏充斥，遂为成学，而陈公卒久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1285895_comment'></div>相与论旧事，追念怆然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1285895_comment'></div>然则文昭<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1285895", 1285895, "Clauses/84/Comments/0")'>岂徒</span>以博习自是而已哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1285895_comment'></div>后有欲知陈公者，于此书求之可也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1285895_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1205&endYear=1205')">1205年</a>　丁忧居家，金华王植复来问学，不久即去。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1205&endYear=1205')">1205年3月</a>　三月，陈傅良葬于瑞安湗村前山，叶适赋诗二首致哀。作品：待制中书舍人陈公之亡以山宅须利既迁殡而未葬也后五月乃克葬焉二首。<div id='poem_79978' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_79978' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/79978?labeling=true' target='_blank'>待制中书舍人陈公之亡以山宅须利既迁殡而未葬也后五月乃克葬焉二首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1205年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_79978")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_79978_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_79978'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_79978'>可怕阴阳恶，还惊日月遒。<div id='poem_sentence_0_79978_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_79978'>终成埋璧去，不作坐禅留。<div id='poem_sentence_1_79978_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_79978'>雨洗一箪净，风翻千橘愁。<div id='poem_sentence_2_79978_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_79978'>门前系船橛，宿鸟漫啁啾。<div id='poem_sentence_3_79978_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_79978'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_79978_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_80127' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_80127' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/80127?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1205年3月）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_80127_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_80127'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_80127'>嗟我与公同澹泊，一生一死又凄凉。<div id='poem_sentence_0_80127_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_80127'>经纶传世上于此，老病著身行自当。<div id='poem_sentence_1_80127_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_80127'>挂壁断弦从别调，拂天野水渡新航。<div id='poem_sentence_2_80127_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_80127'>暮春未有风雩伴，且閤遗编住冢傍。<div id='poem_sentence_3_80127_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_80127'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_80127_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1205&endYear=1205')">1205年5月</a>　友人莆田刘起晦卒，五月为作墓志铭。作品：刘建翁墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（题目见《水心集》卷十八。）</span><div id='poem_1286239' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286239' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286239?labeling=true' target='_blank'>刘建翁墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1205年5月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286239")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286239_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286239'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286239'>莆田刘起晦，字建翁，淳熙戊戌进士及第，任福清主簿，监建康府榷货务，知贵溪县，江西安抚司机宜，召试秘书省正字，兼吴益王教授。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286239_comment'></div>开禧元年五月卒，葬石室西原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286239_comment'></div>夫人方氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286239_comment'></div>二子，曰希醇，某官；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286239_comment'></div>曰希深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286239_comment'></div>建翁父名朔，莆人号二刘先生者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286239_comment'></div>先生殁乾道中，年太早，非显官，家薄不自振业，天下悲怜之，曰：「是宁有子耶」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286239_comment'></div>及建翁胜冠带，克迈竞强，志义修立，声名远闻，人士皆喜，走相传，笔相告也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286239_comment'></div>既中乙第，愈益喜，为劝饮相乐也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286239_comment'></div>仕所历，无不争荐君，曰：「刘复之子，渠可后之」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286239_comment'></div>建翁有所择，曰「某不宜受」，亦不敢怒也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286239_comment'></div>然所荐不过关升改官，则固州县常举尔，至为馆职然后厌，曰：「足以待建翁矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286239_comment'></div>嗟夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286239_comment'></div>建翁底法父，不忝父，致大称誉自其理；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286239_comment'></div>而天下于建翁父子乃郑重不已如此，亦足以知好善者人之同心，而为善者之不可怠也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286239_comment'></div>建翁韵甚清，气安而貌和，悬会宿解，不以滞吝<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1286239", 1286239, "Clauses/58/Comments/0")'>婴物</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286239_comment'></div>事虽<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1286239", 1286239, "Clauses/59/Comments/0")'>漫汗</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1286239", 1286239, "Clauses/59/Comments/1")'>粗梗</span>，经建翁手，必有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1286239", 1286239, "Clauses/61/Comments/0")'>条流</span>秩序，后可<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1286239", 1286239, "Clauses/62/Comments/0")'>循守</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286239_comment'></div>治县极宽，不为节限，讼者从容各尽其辞；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286239_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1286239", 1286239, "Clauses/66/Comments/0")'>已而</span>敷畅折衷，隐情<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1286239", 1286239, "Clauses/67/Comments/0")'>遁节</span>，如镜见象，奸民未尝不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1286239", 1286239, "Clauses/69/Comments/0")'>避影敛迹</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286239_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1286239", 1286239, "Clauses/70/Comments/0")'>市里</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1286239", 1286239, "Clauses/70/Comments/1")'>寒人</span>，必知名数，雨雪冻仆，计口与钱米。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286239_comment'></div>疾疠天行，自煮药；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286239_comment'></div>不幸死，给棺敛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286239_comment'></div>县东起孤独庐，西安乐坊，岁减斛面米六千石、籴本钱六十万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286239_comment'></div>贵溪人谓建翁，不曰「知县」，曰「吾翁」也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286239_comment'></div>故闻其卒，罢市聚哭，为佛老事五昼夜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286239_comment'></div>建翁既为上下信服，同时有作邑者，内不善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286239_comment'></div>为正字，其人适在<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1286239", 1286239, "Clauses/91/Comments/0")'>言地</span>，诬奏罢之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286239_comment'></div>夫举一世所爱，不能胜一人所忌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286239_comment'></div>使建翁稍进用，必争是非，辨邪正，决不能使一世尽爱建翁也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286239_comment'></div>然则世之所以爱建翁者，岂能知之哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286239_comment'></div>建翁内事两世母，奉<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1286239", 1286239, "Clauses/102/Comments/0")'>从兄</span>，抚幼弟；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286239_comment'></div>外交友朋，接乡里，通无共有；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286239_comment'></div>尽敬极孝，一如二父，人不知二刘已死也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286239_comment'></div>居室尤陋，不改，余间过之，及门而下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286239_comment'></div>建翁逡巡出迎中街，笑曰：「自二父在，而四方之过莆者无不造于庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286239_comment'></div>盖今之轿大于旧矣，乃世变也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286239_comment'></div>余亦笑曰：「轿虽大不数寸，公<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1286239", 1286239, "Clauses/122/Comments/0")'>门扉</span>无乃太狭乎，而不知变耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286239_comment'></div>其偏，墼四围之，仅通户牖，建翁指示余：「此吾二父讲学处也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286239_comment'></div>余低徊久之不能去云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286239_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_39_1286239'>建翁之于父，材德同，年寿同，官职又同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286239_comment'></div>曷为踰之，而有不逢？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1286239_comment'></div>悲哉！</div><div id='poem_sentence_41_1286239_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1205&endYear=1205')">1205年</a>　曾赠诗人赵汝回诗。作品：送赵几道邵武司户。<div id='poem_80005' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_80005' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/80005?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送赵几道邵武司户</a><span class='authorDate'>（1205年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_80005")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_80005_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_80005'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_80005'>无滩秋水平，有句官曹清。<div id='poem_sentence_0_80005_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_80005'>杨柳欲落尽，菊花愁晚生。<div id='poem_sentence_1_80005_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_80005'>书多前<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_80005", 80005, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>益智</span>，文古后垂名。<div id='poem_sentence_2_80005_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_80005'>功到阔深处，天教勤苦成。<div id='poem_sentence_3_80005_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_80005'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_80005_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1205&endYear=1205')">1205年</a>　作《奉酬般若长老诗》及诗后题。<div id='poem_79879' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_79879' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/79879?labeling=true' target='_blank'>奉酬般若长老</a><span class='authorDate'>（1205年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_79879")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_79879_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_79879'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_79879'>简师诗语特惊人，六反掀腾不动身。<div id='poem_sentence_0_79879_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_79879'>说与东家小儿女，涂红染绿未禁春。<div id='poem_sentence_1_79879_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_79879'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_79879_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1205&endYear=1205')">1205年</a>　为翁诚之撰挽词。作品：翁诚之挽词。<div id='poem_80184' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_80184' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/80184?labeling=true' target='_blank'>翁诚之挽词</a><span class='authorDate'>（1205年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_80184")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_80184_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_80184'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_80184'>西方之人美无度，眷此南邑朝阳鸣。<div id='poem_sentence_0_80184_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_80184'>如锥出囊拟砭国，似璞有价空连城。<div id='poem_sentence_1_80184_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_80184'>三仕郎官老将及，一去郴州唤不应。<div id='poem_sentence_2_80184_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_80184'>朔风吹潮没复涌，渡口野梅飞碎琼。<div id='poem_sentence_3_80184_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_80184'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_80184_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1205&endYear=1205')">1205年</a>　为黄仁静撰墓志。作品：朝奉大夫黄公墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286207' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286207' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286207?labeling=true' target='_blank'>朝奉大夫致仕黄公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1205年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286207")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286207_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286207'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286207'>越新昌黄公，讳仁静，字仲山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286207_comment'></div>其先婺徙也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286207_comment'></div>曾祖朴，祖巽，父惠之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286207_comment'></div>公累封朝奉大夫，赐服金紫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286207_comment'></div>年八十七，开禧元年八月乙丑卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286207_comment'></div>十二月庚申，葬孟塘石冢山北麓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286207_comment'></div>娶沈氏，继室潘氏，皆封宜人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286207_comment'></div>子男六，度，朝散大夫直宝文阁，主管建宁府武夷山冲佑观；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286207_comment'></div>庶；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286207_comment'></div>庚，宜州文学；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286207_comment'></div>庑，从事郎、湖州长兴县主簿；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286207_comment'></div>庭，迪功郎、池州州学教授；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286207_comment'></div>士隆，太学生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286207_comment'></div>子女二，婿奉议郎、知婺州东阳县韩墨卿，宣教郎、知庆元府鄞县周之瑞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286207_comment'></div>而庶、士隆及嫁墨卿者先已卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286207_comment'></div>孙男十二，迈，迪功郎、镇江府司户参军；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286207_comment'></div>章，乡贡进士；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286207_comment'></div>遵；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286207_comment'></div>准，迪功郎、饶州司户参军；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286207_comment'></div>覃，芾，申。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286207_comment'></div>馀未名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286207_comment'></div>而迈、遵皆早卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286207_comment'></div>孙女九，婿文林郎、常州军事推官周南，文林郎、武昌军节度推官求淳，从事郎、婺州观察推官王棐，将仕郎陈镯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286207_comment'></div>馀未行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286207_comment'></div>曾孙男七，女一，皆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1286207", 1286207, "Clauses/54/Comments/0")'>未齿</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286207_comment'></div>黄氏越之闻家，而公越之君子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286207_comment'></div>少为士，家未充，米盐旦夕急，公求所以逸其亲者，百方督课，以身先之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286207_comment'></div>未久，有田二十顷，公以为如是不已，则以财自没矣，于是诸子出师入友，交劝以学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286207_comment'></div>而度中进士第，公喜曰：「吾虽未耄老，然天其畀吾休乎」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286207_comment'></div>遂营隐居沃州之尾，孟塘之山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286207_comment'></div>以某夫人年高多疾，卧起须公，尚未决去也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286207_comment'></div>及某夫人殁，终丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286207_comment'></div>松柏迷道，庭花合围，公著山人衣，曳杖挟书行吟，宾送烟月于林茜中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286207_comment'></div>凡故畴新畎，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_1286207", 1286207, "Clauses/86/Comments/0")'>廪假</span>进退，抱孙长息，婚嫁有无，皆落莫恍惚，若梦中事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286207_comment'></div>唯闻名胜士，欣然邀至，共食啖面羹苦薇，为语儒拂二氏所以离合者，自言见性命真处，如水中盐味，非无非有，其说深美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286207_comment'></div>陈君举来游经年，常纵论夜分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286207_comment'></div>君举名善辩，不能穷诘而畏之，曰：「此非由师授而得也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286207_comment'></div>至于天性<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_1286207", 1286207, "Clauses/105/Comments/0")'>旷达</span>，不作疑吝；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286207_comment'></div>推己利人，不自封殖；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286207_comment'></div>无颜色之悦而人誉其德，无市井之惠而人怀其恩，盖其中之信于人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286207_comment'></div>方度宦浙东西，公来不过三月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1286207_comment'></div>为御史谏官，事有当言，言有难尽，微婉<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1286207", 1286207, "Clauses/117/Comments/0")'>顺导</span>，冀必感发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1286207_comment'></div>前后援亲以请至八九，辄不听，最后命使守泉，复固辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1286207_comment'></div>天子知公实老矣，乃自显谟进直宝文阁，许以养公，君臣父子之际，人又以为难焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1286207_comment'></div>盖自癸未至乙丑四十馀年，公子孙屡以文字起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1286207_comment'></div>庭既释褐，公疾始侵，呼章语之曰：「汝知吾乐乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1286207_comment'></div>章对：「不知也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1286207_comment'></div>曰：「夫除世俗<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_47_1286207", 1286207, "Clauses/137/Comments/1")'>粗事</span>易，断细微精想难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1286207_comment'></div>吾用力于此久矣，然叶落枝生，不知其几；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1286207_comment'></div>今真断矣，故乐也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1286207_comment'></div>临绝视度而笑，度指其心曰：「得非能于此<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_50_1286207", 1286207, "Clauses/146/Comments/2")'>洞然</span>乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1286207_comment'></div>公应曰：「然」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1286207_comment'></div>遂殁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1286207_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_53_1286207'>昔君之来兮，友兹山而谁俦？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1286207_comment'></div>今君之去兮，邈兹山乎何求？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1286207_comment'></div>其风疏疏，其月皎皎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1286207_comment'></div>彼蔚者藏，不尚有诏。</div><div id='poem_sentence_56_1286207_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1205&endYear=1205')">1205年</a>　为蔡必胜撰墓志。作品：蔡知阁墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286224' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286224' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286224?labeling=true' target='_blank'>蔡知閤墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1205年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286224")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286224_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286224'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286224'>公蔡姓，必胜其名，字直之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286224_comment'></div>其先自莆徙，为温州平阳人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286224_comment'></div>曾祖岳，祖钦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286224_comment'></div>父蔚，赠武德郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286224_comment'></div>孝宗立，公以武学进士对策第一，授江东将领。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286224_comment'></div>故事，将官谒帅，皆小袖衫拜庭下，至公，独袍笏<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1286224", 1286224, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>肃揖</span>，帅因请以宾礼见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286224_comment'></div>召审察，枢密使欲除学官，且致意于公赐，公耻之，谢有疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286224_comment'></div>出副东南十一将，捕获茶盐，当赏，公不自言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286224_comment'></div>召试閤门舍人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286224_comment'></div>曾觌用事，冀公见己，故召众舍人饮，辄差会期，同列屡趣公，公不肯往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286224_comment'></div>既得对，陈六事移晷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286224_comment'></div>上诘难反覆，公<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1286224", 1286224, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>辨奏</span>从容，手笔付外多施行者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286224_comment'></div>知澧州，母丧不赴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286224_comment'></div>知邵州，论择方面人材及天下大计，孝宗尤异之，曰：「观卿<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1286224", 1286224, "Clauses/45/Comments/1")'>一表</span>，前程未可量也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286224_comment'></div>勉之」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286224_comment'></div>命周丞相留公馆伴，公辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286224_comment'></div>至郡，言州起总领所钱岁捌万，溪恶舟败，诏易以银。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286224_comment'></div>在邵二年，公私便之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286224_comment'></div>邵人乞更留一年，勒碑纪政，公皆禁止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286224_comment'></div>还，知光州，未至，光宗召复为閤门舍人，迁带御器械。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286224_comment'></div>未几，武德卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286224_comment'></div>上数问蔡某何时服除，诏复为带御器械。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286224_comment'></div>时御带员足，公辞，诏员外供职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286224_comment'></div>光宗之在东宫，闻公不见曾觌，对宫僚叹息言「佳士难得」，退朝，常目招。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286224_comment'></div>公自邵州还也，光宗方参决，见于议事堂，谓公：「向在閤门，煞有人称道，今去几何，比来安否」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286224_comment'></div>其再为舍人也，知閤有阙，将用公，执政亟召刘㢸授之，上固不快，至是遂召知閤门事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286224_comment'></div>公以前此无用士人，固辞，弗许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286224_comment'></div>孝宗崩，光宗疾不能丧，太皇太后命今上即位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286224_comment'></div>上<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1286224", 1286224, "Clauses/96/Comments/0")'>却避</span>再三，公与同列韩侂胄<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1286224", 1286224, "Clauses/97/Comments/0")'>扶抱</span>登御榻，涕泪被面，庭中惊悚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286224_comment'></div>出知池州建德县，解强盗十人，囚称冤，公疑之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286224_comment'></div>官吏争「狱已具矣」，公阅其案，有弓手坐他事同系，教囚「姑自诬服，幸速见太守」，急呼至，屏人曰：「若知真盗乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286224_comment'></div>趣禽，有厚赏」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286224_comment'></div>盗果得，十人泣拜去，人以为神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286224_comment'></div>徙知楚州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286224_comment'></div>北神镇少年以剽境外为业，前后不能禁，公日与钱米什伍伺察，用其豪为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1286224", 1286224, "Clauses/121/Comments/0")'>总首</span>，旬一<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1286224", 1286224, "Clauses/122/Comments/0")'>按试</span>，两界以安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286224_comment'></div>有效用张㬇，聚众越淮，自称元帅，谋取桃园寨，边人凶惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286224_comment'></div>公发，示不知者，密设方计，俘㬇以归，斩于市，然后以闻，诸将叹服，自谓不及也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286224_comment'></div>擢知庐州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286224_comment'></div>公既领方镇，经度久远，议于今新城斗梁月城中间，合筑相连，创二水门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286224_comment'></div>增建康戍军，徙其家勿更戍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286224_comment'></div>浚肥河，修巢湖西口闸以通漕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1286224_comment'></div>且造<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1286224", 1286224, "Clauses/147/Comments/0")'>战舰</span>于巢湖，并湖民愿为水军者籍焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1286224_comment'></div>湖有孤姥山，急难可保聚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1286224_comment'></div>乾道中，为寨屋五百，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_43_1286224", 1286224, "Clauses/153/Comments/0")'>敖仓</span>七十，今浸废，而两淮民马，官可给直听自养，岁大阅以赏激之，朝论相持久，方行而公已归死矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1286224_comment'></div>合肥<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_44_1286224", 1286224, "Clauses/160/Comments/0")'>桩积</span>钱七万待非常，朝廷意帅以侵用，徙置漕司，公以自节郡费者别储之，更过其旧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1286224_comment'></div>虏有杨桩，数至光州献攻守策，实觇我，守不悟，辄上闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1286224_comment'></div>公奏<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_46_1286224", 1286224, "Clauses/170/Comments/0")'>拘縻</span>内地，从之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1286224_comment'></div>除吉州刺史，提举崇道观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1286224_comment'></div>将用为扬州，命垂下，嘉泰三年八月甲寅卒，年六十四。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1286224_comment'></div>开禧元年闰月壬午，葬瑞安县灵峰寺后山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1286224_comment'></div>妻杨氏，封宜人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1286224_comment'></div>子仪，保义郎新閤门看班祗候；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1286224_comment'></div>任，迪功郎江东安抚司干官；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1286224_comment'></div>信，承节郎新閤门看班祗候；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1286224_comment'></div>俦，某官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1286224_comment'></div>女适吉州教授徐泾，先卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1286224_comment'></div>孙男六人，孙女五人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1286224_comment'></div>公为政，求下疾苦，审郡利病，条画修废，先后必伦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1286224_comment'></div>未尝立名字歛财，而常以其馀与民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1286224_comment'></div>岁时寒苦，赒其尤贫不自业者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1286224_comment'></div>亲至<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_60_1286224", 1286224, "Clauses/203/Comments/0")'>学宫</span>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_60_1286224", 1286224, "Clauses/204/Comments/0")'>课率</span>诸生，劝教有义，士人<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_60_1286224", 1286224, "Clauses/206/Comments/0")'>兴起</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1286224_comment'></div>在卢，封马亮、包拯之墓，因墓作祠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1286224_comment'></div>赵立、魏胜死战于楚，新其茔庙，以公田给祀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1286224_comment'></div>徐谊子宜，公之友也，谪居南安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1286224_comment'></div>公时守池，将乞宫观禄归，为徐公奉其母，徐公惊叹，固止之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1286224_comment'></div>四方名士摈于家者，不以密疏，存问无虚岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1286224_comment'></div>盖公以忠孝发其刚毅，慈良成其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_66_1286224", 1286224, "Clauses/225/Comments/0")'>密察</span>，故凡所立必得其大者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1286224_comment'></div>至其小者尚皆可纪，而余不尽录也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1286224_comment'></div>而又有大者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1286224_comment'></div>绍熙初，光宗已不豫，虽御朝，犹苒苒未平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1286224_comment'></div>外庭不知之，多谏上宜过北宫<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_70_1286224", 1286224, "Clauses/235/Comments/0")'>省候</span>如礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1286224_comment'></div>疏积几上，言或讦至，上宽优不加怒，然亦不能从也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1286224_comment'></div>自是中外讹言相<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_72_1286224", 1286224, "Clauses/240/Comments/0")'>汹动</span>，无不讥切过宫者，甚至群以相率攀上衣裾泣曰：「寿皇死也，陛下合上辇一出」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1286224_comment'></div>随至福宁殿不退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1286224_comment'></div>上亦泣曰：「此非卿等行处也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1286224_comment'></div>急还内，裤緎为裂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1286224_comment'></div>有责宰相：「上有疾明矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1286224_comment'></div>父子相见，宜俟疾瘳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1286224_comment'></div>公不播告，使臣下轻议君父，可乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1286224_comment'></div>宰相怅然曰：「君殆未晓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1286224_comment'></div>夫上实有疾，然讳言疾，日御朝自如，兹所以为疾也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1286224_comment'></div>且人臣无自以疾名上身之理」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1286224_comment'></div>既而孝宗大渐，上成服宫中，中外讹言益甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1286224_comment'></div>或言「某将辄奔赴」，或传「某军私聚哭」，大抵皆反矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1286224_comment'></div>朝士<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_84_1286224", 1286224, "Clauses/270/Comments/0")'>潜遁</span>者前后数人，私窃以家去者甚众，近幸富民，竞匿重器村舍中，都人朝夕不自聊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1286224_comment'></div>或又责宰相：「上虽疾而不临丧，无以辞于天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1286224_comment'></div>今嘉王长，若豫建参决，则<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_86_1286224", 1286224, "Clauses/280/Comments/1")'>疑谤</span>释矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1286224_comment'></div>宰相又怅然曰：「他日尝降出一草茅书，书言储副事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1286224_comment'></div>吾袖进取旨，上变色曰：『储副不豫建，建即代也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1286224_comment'></div>朕欲卿知其妄尔』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1286224_comment'></div>然试合辞以请，上再报曰：『甚好、朕欲退闲久矣』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1286224_comment'></div>屡乞奏事不获命，忧惧无所出」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1286224_comment'></div>公自争过宫至孝宗崩，昼不食，夜不寐，私念曰：「夫梓宫无主，而上疾不瘳，请储不获，计且穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1286224_comment'></div>傥白太皇太后，遂立元子代执丧，养上疾，其可」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1286224_comment'></div>独与知枢密院赵公汝愚往反定议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1286224_comment'></div>时韩侂胄同在閤门，公素善侂胄，曰：「公于太皇，甥也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1286224_comment'></div>吾欲以公至赵公所」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1286224_comment'></div>侂胄知指，许诺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1286224_comment'></div>公遂挟侂胄见赵公<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_98_1286224", 1286224, "Clauses/315/Comments/0")'>参语</span>，因知省关礼白太皇太后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1286224_comment'></div>赵公又约工部尚书赵彦逾戒郭杲饬宿卫，起居舍人彭龟年告嘉邸备进发，皆定矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1286224_comment'></div>五年七月甲寅禫祭，时台谏官有待罪城外者，孝宗崩，不敢复入，而学官须祭毕将归田里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1286224_comment'></div>太皇太后遂引宰执至帘下，诏曰：「皇帝疾，至今未能执丧，自欲退闲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1286224_comment'></div>此御笔也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1286224_comment'></div>嘉王可即皇帝位于重华宫，躬行<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_103_1286224", 1286224, "Clauses/332/Comments/1")'>丧礼</span>」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1286224_comment'></div>百官泣拜起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1286224_comment'></div>而今上已立，天下晏然复宁者，公本致侂胄于赵公，定策遂立元子之力也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1286224_comment'></div>及侂胄恃功专恣，立党论为倾者方因之，而知閤刘㢸又内忌公，即胁说侂胄曰：「蔡直之素厚诸名士，今内参密画，外扶正论，非君福也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1286224_comment'></div>侂胄由是疏公，出为池州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1286224_comment'></div>公叹曰：「吾受太上深知，不幸太上有疾将革，命悬漏刻，而吾判家族出此，所以报也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1286224_comment'></div>事属安定，何妄分彼我乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1286224_comment'></div>祸今作矣」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1286224_comment'></div>亟去，绝口秘前事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1286224_comment'></div>侂胄果为飞语中赵公，贬死衡阳，士不附者，尽以赵公党坐之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1286224_comment'></div>自为太师、郡王，擅国命，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_113_1286224", 1286224, "Clauses/365/Comments/0")'>绝席</span>卿相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1286224_comment'></div>而公连刺外州，默默以卒，悲夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1286224_comment'></div>公不矜功，不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_115_1286224", 1286224, "Clauses/370/Comments/0")'>徇利</span>，似矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1286224_comment'></div>然而以立君为难者，虽通乎百世，犹将难之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1286224_comment'></div>故余弗敢阙，以待信史焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1286224_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_118_1286224'>昔孝宗，重武科；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1286224_comment'></div>时蔡公，首应胪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1286224_comment'></div>甚易良，不侠粗；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1286224_comment'></div>更外内，绝尤殊；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1286224_comment'></div>领宾閤，前此无，遭<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_122_1286224", 1286224, "Clauses/388/Comments/0")'>危疑</span>，建大谟；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1286224_comment'></div>上龙飞，公手扶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1286224_comment'></div>出三州，自戏娱；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1286224_comment'></div>翩其往，谁特书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1286224_comment'></div>万山中，林集乌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1286224_comment'></div>碑斯今，振古初。</div><div id='poem_sentence_127_1286224_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1205&endYear=1205')">1205年</a>　为刘建翁撰墓志。作品：刘建翁墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286239' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286239' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286239?labeling=true' target='_blank'>刘建翁墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1205年5月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286239")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286239_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286239'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286239'>莆田刘起晦，字建翁，淳熙戊戌进士及第，任福清主簿，监建康府榷货务，知贵溪县，江西安抚司机宜，召试秘书省正字，兼吴益王教授。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286239_comment'></div>开禧元年五月卒，葬石室西原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286239_comment'></div>夫人方氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286239_comment'></div>二子，曰希醇，某官；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286239_comment'></div>曰希深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286239_comment'></div>建翁父名朔，莆人号二刘先生者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286239_comment'></div>先生殁乾道中，年太早，非显官，家薄不自振业，天下悲怜之，曰：「是宁有子耶」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286239_comment'></div>及建翁胜冠带，克迈竞强，志义修立，声名远闻，人士皆喜，走相传，笔相告也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286239_comment'></div>既中乙第，愈益喜，为劝饮相乐也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286239_comment'></div>仕所历，无不争荐君，曰：「刘复之子，渠可后之」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286239_comment'></div>建翁有所择，曰「某不宜受」，亦不敢怒也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286239_comment'></div>然所荐不过关升改官，则固州县常举尔，至为馆职然后厌，曰：「足以待建翁矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286239_comment'></div>嗟夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286239_comment'></div>建翁底法父，不忝父，致大称誉自其理；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286239_comment'></div>而天下于建翁父子乃郑重不已如此，亦足以知好善者人之同心，而为善者之不可怠也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286239_comment'></div>建翁韵甚清，气安而貌和，悬会宿解，不以滞吝<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1286239", 1286239, "Clauses/58/Comments/0")'>婴物</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286239_comment'></div>事虽<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1286239", 1286239, "Clauses/59/Comments/0")'>漫汗</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1286239", 1286239, "Clauses/59/Comments/1")'>粗梗</span>，经建翁手，必有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1286239", 1286239, "Clauses/61/Comments/0")'>条流</span>秩序，后可<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1286239", 1286239, "Clauses/62/Comments/0")'>循守</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286239_comment'></div>治县极宽，不为节限，讼者从容各尽其辞；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286239_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1286239", 1286239, "Clauses/66/Comments/0")'>已而</span>敷畅折衷，隐情<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1286239", 1286239, "Clauses/67/Comments/0")'>遁节</span>，如镜见象，奸民未尝不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1286239", 1286239, "Clauses/69/Comments/0")'>避影敛迹</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286239_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1286239", 1286239, "Clauses/70/Comments/0")'>市里</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1286239", 1286239, "Clauses/70/Comments/1")'>寒人</span>，必知名数，雨雪冻仆，计口与钱米。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286239_comment'></div>疾疠天行，自煮药；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286239_comment'></div>不幸死，给棺敛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286239_comment'></div>县东起孤独庐，西安乐坊，岁减斛面米六千石、籴本钱六十万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286239_comment'></div>贵溪人谓建翁，不曰「知县」，曰「吾翁」也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286239_comment'></div>故闻其卒，罢市聚哭，为佛老事五昼夜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286239_comment'></div>建翁既为上下信服，同时有作邑者，内不善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286239_comment'></div>为正字，其人适在<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1286239", 1286239, "Clauses/91/Comments/0")'>言地</span>，诬奏罢之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286239_comment'></div>夫举一世所爱，不能胜一人所忌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286239_comment'></div>使建翁稍进用，必争是非，辨邪正，决不能使一世尽爱建翁也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286239_comment'></div>然则世之所以爱建翁者，岂能知之哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286239_comment'></div>建翁内事两世母，奉<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1286239", 1286239, "Clauses/102/Comments/0")'>从兄</span>，抚幼弟；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286239_comment'></div>外交友朋，接乡里，通无共有；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286239_comment'></div>尽敬极孝，一如二父，人不知二刘已死也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286239_comment'></div>居室尤陋，不改，余间过之，及门而下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286239_comment'></div>建翁逡巡出迎中街，笑曰：「自二父在，而四方之过莆者无不造于庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286239_comment'></div>盖今之轿大于旧矣，乃世变也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286239_comment'></div>余亦笑曰：「轿虽大不数寸，公<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1286239", 1286239, "Clauses/122/Comments/0")'>门扉</span>无乃太狭乎，而不知变耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286239_comment'></div>其偏，墼四围之，仅通户牖，建翁指示余：「此吾二父讲学处也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286239_comment'></div>余低徊久之不能去云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286239_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_39_1286239'>建翁之于父，材德同，年寿同，官职又同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286239_comment'></div>曷为踰之，而有不逢？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1286239_comment'></div>悲哉！</div><div id='poem_sentence_41_1286239_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1205&endYear=1205')">1205年</a>　是年有《西山》诗。<div id='poem_79954' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_79954' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/79954?labeling=true' target='_blank'>西山</a><span class='authorDate'>（1205年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_79954")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_79954_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_79954'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_79954'>对面吴桥港，西山第一家。<div id='poem_sentence_0_79954_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_79954'>有林皆橘树，无水不荷花。<div id='poem_sentence_1_79954_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_79954'>竹下晴垂钓，松间雨试茶。<div id='poem_sentence_2_79954_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_79954'>更瞻东挂䌽，空翠杂朝霞。<div id='poem_sentence_3_79954_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_79954'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_79954_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1205&endYear=1205')">1205年</a>　是年有《看柑》诗。<div id='poem_79980' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_79980' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/79980?labeling=true' target='_blank'>看柑</a><span class='authorDate'>（1205年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_79980")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_79980_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_79980'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_79980'>窈窕随塘曲，酸甜在橘中。<div id='poem_sentence_0_79980_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_79980'>所欣黄一半，相逐树无穷。<div id='poem_sentence_1_79980_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_79980'>习啖成真性，悲歌记土风。<div id='poem_sentence_2_79980_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_79980'>惭非美人赠，采摘恣村童。<div id='poem_sentence_3_79980_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_79980'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_79980_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1205&endYear=1205')">1205年</a>　是年有二诗题柳山人壁。作品：题柳山人壁二首。<div id='poem_80038' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_80038' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/80038?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题柳山人壁二首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1205年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_80038")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_80038_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_80038'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_80038'>水北柳六一，家传掷卦灵。<div id='poem_sentence_0_80038_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_80038'>秋清演渔曲，春近著牛经。<div id='poem_sentence_1_80038_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_80038'>掩肆花竹秀，排门柑橘馨。<div id='poem_sentence_2_80038_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_80038'>应怜喜功者，虚要岘山铭。<div id='poem_sentence_3_80038_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_80038'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_80038_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_80037' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_80037' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/80037?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1205年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_80037_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_80037'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_80037'>我病屡穆卜，山人不面谩。<div id='poem_sentence_0_80037_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_80037'>常言千日厄，未许一朝安。<div id='poem_sentence_1_80037_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_80037'>地上庸医满，天边恶曜攒。<div id='poem_sentence_2_80037_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_80037'>归根与复命，自笑此何难。<div id='poem_sentence_3_80037_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_80037'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_80037_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1206&endYear=1206')">1206年1月</a>　一月，为黄中之父黄正己撰墓志。作品：承事郎致仕黄君墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（写作时间见《水心集》卷十五，该文。）</span><div id='poem_1286206' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286206' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286206?labeling=true' target='_blank'>承事郎致仕黄君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1206年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286206")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286206_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286206'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286206'>君姓黄氏，讳正己，字圣与，温州平阳人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286206_comment'></div>始名千乘而字建侯，自言梦有锡以今名者，因并字更之，然相谓君者犹曰建侯云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286206_comment'></div>曾祖贲，祖淳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286206_comment'></div>父邈，绍兴中，为太学生，宁宗庆元六年，以恩补迪功郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286206_comment'></div>君自少时，顺悌长老无违行，虽已肃文，尤<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1286206", 1286206, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>巽抑</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286206_comment'></div>常称善掩恶，退在人后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286206_comment'></div>遇后生有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1286206", 1286206, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>教谏</span>，亦讽道宛转，不令失色词。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286206_comment'></div>尝不幸有意外事，素不乐者乘时挤君，君不憾，待之如平日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286206_comment'></div>其党后有急，君勇赴之，力为尽，挤者惭服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286206_comment'></div>人以是爱信，号长者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286206_comment'></div>家故贫，迪功粗给衣食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286206_comment'></div>君环视无几何，叹曰：「富贵有命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286206_comment'></div>吾自度不能益矣，然可复损于今乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286206_comment'></div>约啬凡用，至鲑菜<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1286206", 1286206, "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>细琐</span>，往往人不能堪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286206_comment'></div>然客至，辄具酒食中礼，或一日忽<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1286206", 1286206, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>倒囊</span>与人钱，不吝也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286206_comment'></div>族人昆弟时节集处，君未尝不先赴，抵掌极论，大笑为乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286206_comment'></div>有末至者闻笑声，曰：「是建侯兄在耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286206_comment'></div>皆倒屣惟恐后，因相与竟日不忍去，盖雍穆之助也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286206_comment'></div>君本有当世志，既无所遇合，而其子擢进士第三人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286206_comment'></div>君谓曰：「吾畴昔所愿，不过平进一官而止，然而终不可得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286206_comment'></div>今汝乃得高第，又平进，所愿而不得者，汝兼二，滋幸矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286206_comment'></div>然立朝有义，临民有政，自今汝谨听吾<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1286206", 1286206, "Clauses/72/Comments/1")'>预告</span>汝」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286206_comment'></div>因每事为节度授之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286206_comment'></div>间则浮舟散策，独到山海孤绝处，忘其返焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286206_comment'></div>嘉泰三年，郊祀礼成，封承事郎，故人亲戚争酌以寿君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286206_comment'></div>君意在自喜，曰：「自吾祖垂三百年，仕盖有荣其先者，吾何德，乃独身被之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286206_comment'></div>顾老不足为善，将无以报国而死，奈何」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286206_comment'></div>开禧元年，君疾且革，不乱，语不及身后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286206_comment'></div>五月二十四日卒，年七十五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286206_comment'></div>再娶皆林氏，封孺人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286206_comment'></div>子男中，承议郎、著作佐郎兼资善堂小学教授。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286206_comment'></div>女嫁同邑进士薛仍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286206_comment'></div>孙男三，曰迟孙、还孙、近孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286206_comment'></div>明年三月壬午，中葬君于马奥山迪功墓右岗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286206_comment'></div>惟君幽潜私淑，报以其子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286206_comment'></div>而中方佐太史氏掌教元子，向用矣，当大列鼎养君也，而不少须以死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286206_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_36_1286206'>种之炊之，有实其餗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286206_comment'></div>熟而食之，孔美且馥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286206_comment'></div>亦既难老，可以期耄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286206_comment'></div>纪辞于泉，君子是悼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286206_comment'></div>开禧二年正月□□日。</div><div id='poem_sentence_40_1286206_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1206&endYear=1206')">1206年2月</a>　二月，为李君亮时斋撰文。作品：时斋记。<span class='inlineComment2'>（写作时间见《水心集》卷九，该文。）</span><div id='poem_1286118' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286118' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286118?labeling=true' target='_blank'>时斋记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1206年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286118")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286118_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286118'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286118'>余与巴西李公君亮，同馆同年，相善也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286118_comment'></div>公间语余便私之室时斋，图以示余，请记之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286118_comment'></div>问「所以名时何也」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286118_comment'></div>公曰：「在《易》，『时止则止，时行则行』，是欤非耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286118_comment'></div>余方谋议荆南，不果作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286118_comment'></div>比<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1286118", 1286118, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>返道</span>过钱塘，公由太史乞守眉矣，又不果。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286118_comment'></div>后十馀年余召自温陵，而公以少司空入侍，迎余而笑曰：「可得记否」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286118_comment'></div>余丧先人，又辄不果。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286118_comment'></div>其明年，公自乞帅泸以归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286118_comment'></div>又明年，乃诒书曰：「愿卒记之」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286118_comment'></div>时之为用大矣，发生于朽败之馀，流行于缺绝之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286118_comment'></div>天地虽人物之主，而不自为，一皆听命于时而已，所兴不能夺，所废莫之与也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286118_comment'></div>故物无不作媚取好求必于时者，而况于人，择奇而用智，争险以贾力，祸患压而不悔，血气衰而未已，惟恐时之去己也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286118_comment'></div>时常运而无息，万物与人亦皆动而不止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286118_comment'></div>《易》虽因事以明随时之义，然终不能尽其变通，而古今憧憧，更起迭仆，如机发轮转而不得停也，可不哀欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286118_comment'></div>惟《艮》以息为象，时虽运而必息；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286118_comment'></div>人以止为本，道必止而后行；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286118_comment'></div>孔氏以为君子宜取节焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286118_comment'></div>是其义以止明行而非以行明行，以静柅动而非以动柅动也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286118_comment'></div>时所同趋，将遁而不返；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286118_comment'></div>利所共获，将弭而不进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286118_comment'></div>荣宠艳丽矣，禄位酣美矣，而有甘澹泊、安<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1286118", 1286118, "Clauses/64/Comments/1")'>卑辱</span>以自终其身者，大则范世纪俗，小则委己顺命，盖时且行之而吾固止之，物方动之而吾卒静之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286118_comment'></div>故能「不失其时而其道光明」，此岂习于利害之情而以时自达者哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286118_comment'></div>君亮性退而行冲，曲肱一榻，冰雪枯槁，不与物对，而山川草木无不自得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286118_comment'></div>入备顾问，出守方镇，天下之言静止者皆归焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286118_comment'></div>盖公既有进于斯，而余亦以自警也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286118_comment'></div>开禧二年二月。</div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1286118_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='c9fa5c5642804e79a14f105f0c216dcd_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("c9fa5c5642804e79a14f105f0c216dcd");'><span id='c9fa5c5642804e79a14f105f0c216dcd_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1208&endYear=1223')">1208-1223年</a>，59-74岁</div><div id='c9fa5c5642804e79a14f105f0c216dcd' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1208&endYear=1208')">1208年</a>　落职回乡，居于永嘉城郊水心村，开始撰述《习学记言序目》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1208&endYear=1208')">1208年7月1日</a>　七月一日，友人隆兴府知府徐谊卒于任所，时六十五，叶适有祭文。作品：祭徐子宜侍郎文。<span class='inlineComment2'>（题目见《水心集》卷二八。）</span><div id='poem_1286335' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286335' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286335?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭徐子宜侍郎文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1208年7月1日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286335")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286335_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286335'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286335'>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286335_comment'></div>甲寅之岁，天地震崩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286335_comment'></div>惟左司郎，昼惶夜惊，刳心为谋，殒身为行，奉漏沃焦，幸而复宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286335_comment'></div>曾未几时，有命南窜，虚罪山出，浮毁波乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286335_comment'></div>腾书交章，预指牢犴，请诛请族，以一咻万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286335_comment'></div>自兹十年，旅食僦宿，以医自混，以药自鬻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286335_comment'></div>稚儿道长，老母门哭，逢旧御史，攘臂瞋目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286335_comment'></div>岁复在寅，江、淮大凶，投之湓城，俾塞贼冲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286335_comment'></div>毁楼学舠，烧土补墉，募兵满阶，教剑交胸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286335_comment'></div>秣陵之画，众固不右，遂徙豫章，闻听日谬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286335_comment'></div>沸羹再兴，罗织重就，朝传罢斥，莫报弹奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286335_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286335_comment'></div>课其前功，庙祏之思；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286335_comment'></div>陈其往冤，行路之悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286335_comment'></div>彼谗不图，别立是非。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286335_comment'></div>室人孔安，噫我独危。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286335_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286335_comment'></div>心恭貌冲，气顺词正，如璋如圭，起爱起敬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286335_comment'></div>谁托之孤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286335_comment'></div>谁寄之命？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286335_comment'></div>今也云亡，可以论定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286335_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286335_comment'></div>惟鉴者神，惟知者天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286335_comment'></div>物险我平，虽艰不偏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286335_comment'></div>匪伊后来，古圣则然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286335_comment'></div>尽此一觞，归安于泉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1286335_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1208&endYear=1208')">1208年</a>　为徐谊作挽词。作品：安抚待制侍郎徐公挽词二首。<div id='poem_79950' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_79950' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/79950?labeling=true' target='_blank'>安抚待制侍郎徐公挽词二首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1208年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_79950")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_79950_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_79950'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_79950'>玉质金章映海滨，养成天德异<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_79950", 79950, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>凡伦</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_79950_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_79950'>曾颜窈渺关前圣，管葛粗疏付后人。<div id='poem_sentence_1_79950_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_79950'>惆怅穷途三讫癸，吁嗟厄岁再逢寅。<div id='poem_sentence_2_79950_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_79950'>送公何物堪将去，留在埋铭石色新。<div id='poem_sentence_3_79950_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_79950'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_79950_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_79949' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_79949' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/79949?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1208年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_79949_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_79949'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_79949'>饮冰那得不醒然，北看成南丑又妍。<div id='poem_sentence_0_79949_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_79949'>建策须为万世虑，孤忠亦有一身全。<div id='poem_sentence_1_79949_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_79949'>星文忍向生前坠，梦事方从死日传。<div id='poem_sentence_2_79949_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_79949'>莫指鸣山归路熟，青林黄叶度年年。<div id='poem_sentence_3_79949_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_79949'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_79949_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1208&endYear=1208')">1208年8月</a>　友人丘崇卒，有祭文。作品：祭丘枢密使文。<div id='poem_1286337' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286337' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286337?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭丘枢使文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1208年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286337")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286337_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286337'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286337'>特起为豪，间出为贤，必也师友，是为本源。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286337_comment'></div>在乾道中，京师多士，坐席推高，曰张、吕氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286337_comment'></div>公时<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1286337", 1286337, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>瑰磊</span>，独步汉、关，手提泰、华，横绝两间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286337_comment'></div>胄学春晴，容台夜雨，通庐并榻，连月纵语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286337_comment'></div>挺空千寻，卓地成深，离合百代，贯联古今。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286337_comment'></div>更二十年，旧人日少，金声中朝，玉振江表。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286337_comment'></div>谁执牛耳，晋礼主盟，奉先割腥，满堂为倾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286337_comment'></div>蚤历方隅，声实甚重；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286337_comment'></div>晚登将相，乃不尽用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286337_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286337_comment'></div>自古讲学，祖性宗命，克己复礼，终始笃敬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286337_comment'></div>功名之枝，累棋奚足，富贵之流，炊黍未熟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286337_comment'></div>惟公本源，我则素知，授之麈尾，张、吕同归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286337_comment'></div>我生<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1286337", 1286337, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>款启</span>，以拙自摈，繇公有闻，又顽不近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286337_comment'></div>公言「世事，譬若盈尺，彼分毫者，精微之极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286337_comment'></div>余取其粗，拉朽夷难，惧子未精，散落无还」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286337_comment'></div>怀公此评，不果自见，况今老矣，愿岂及远！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286337_comment'></div>公薨五秋，我病四春，虽有遗论，无复再伸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286337_comment'></div>墓已新阡，寺已新础，长松妍华，下荫海浦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286337_comment'></div>一铢其薰，茗苦上浮，千里同念，弗我有廋。</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1286337_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1208&endYear=1208')">1208年9月6日</a>　九月六日，永嘉鲍潚卒，叶适有挽词。作品：冲佑大夫鲍公挽词。<span class='inlineComment2'>（题目见《水心集》卷七。）</span><div id='poem_79944' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_79944' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/79944?labeling=true' target='_blank'>冲佑大夫鲍公挽词</a><span class='authorDate'>（1208年9月6日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_79944")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_79944_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_79944'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_79944'>幽人眇何在，高阁锁重关。<div id='poem_sentence_0_79944_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_79944'>梅冷桥边月，菊残篱外山。<div id='poem_sentence_1_79944_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_79944'>可怜清绝地，长忆笑谈间。<div id='poem_sentence_2_79944_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_79944'>寂寞私盐港，渔樵自往还。<div id='poem_sentence_3_79944_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_79944'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_79944_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1208&endYear=1208')">1208年9月</a>　九月，为鲍潚作墓志铭。作品：朝散大夫主管冲佑观鲍公墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（题目见《水心集》卷十六。）</span><div id='poem_1286214' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286214' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286214?labeling=true' target='_blank'>朝散大夫主管冲佑观鲍公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1208年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286214")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286214_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286214'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286214'>清卿初病足，以两竹自舆，过亲旧辄止，饮酒笑语如平时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286214_comment'></div>稍侵，犹循行园林，住磐石上，数花须嗅松叶为乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286214_comment'></div>转剧，谢客危坐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286214_comment'></div>嘉定元年九月癸卯卒，年六十八。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286214_comment'></div>十二月甲申，其子迪功郎兴化县尉野葬清卿于父朝散墓东壬山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286214_comment'></div>野哭谓余：「知先人莫如子」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286214_comment'></div>鲍氏之谱，曰鲍叔后也，四迁至洛阳，唐季，徙越，徙杭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286214_comment'></div>七世祖皓，皓生守忠，皆官于永嘉，遂为永嘉人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286214_comment'></div>高祖轲，太常少卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286214_comment'></div>曾祖极，宿州教授，有闻熙、丰中，翰林学士梁公焘铭其墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286214_comment'></div>祖诲，梁公铭所谓「有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1286214", 1286214, "Clauses/33/Comments/1")'>隐德</span>，东南士人器重之」者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286214_comment'></div>梁公，元祐名臣也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286214_comment'></div>父得朋，缙云县令，族父司封员外郎彪铭之，司封亦名士也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286214_comment'></div>清卿讳潚，生六七年，读书<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1286214", 1286214, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>迎解</span>，下笔有奇语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286214_comment'></div>入太学，每一篇出，士人转相授，垫首醉心，争效其体，惟恐不庶几也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286214_comment'></div>前后积取高等，中上第。<div class='inline'
