id='poem_sentence_15_1286214_comment'></div>教授处州兴化军，干办湖运司公事，知新昌县，通判濠州，知潮州，自乞宫观，知融州，复乞冲佑观而终，累官朝散大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286214_comment'></div>野之言曰：「先人接华绪富，美实殆天畀，然意将有以用之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286214_comment'></div>然而糠秕名誉，刍狗官爵，虽于古所谓为贫而仕者，小俛焉就之，若夫不以义而富贵，未尝不趯焉远之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286214_comment'></div>以是闵默不遇而死及之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286214_comment'></div>子重知吾先人，彼历官行事之琐琐，无述可也，惟事外之志，庶发舒万一以昭余哀」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286214_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286214_comment'></div>千钧重任也，载以大鹏之翼，犹一毫末也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286214_comment'></div>超埃𡏖，轶浮云，上于帝庭，而岂知榆枋之寻丈哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286214_comment'></div>宜野之不愿述也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286214_comment'></div>清卿智识绝异，于治乱消长，推见至隐，规度深密，可以遏绝横溃，然而不以干权势，佐策画也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286214_comment'></div>吏道尤敏给，钩深应猝，投机立发，不得回止也，然而不以耀声威，明恩怨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286214_comment'></div>与一世朋友上下文墨论议之间，宫动商应而笙镛错陈之也，然而不以养交党，资进取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286214_comment'></div>一吟一咏，有陶、谢之思；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286214_comment'></div>一觞一曲，有嵇、阮之放；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286214_comment'></div>隐几永日，澹泊灰槁，有瞿、庄之决也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286214_comment'></div>悲夫，已矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286214_comment'></div>虽然，清卿之历官行事，则亦有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1286214", 1286214, "Clauses/115/Comments/0")'>卓诡</span>过人者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286214_comment'></div>方永思陵复土，清卿主新昌顿递，中贵人卫士求索纷杂，至裂供张，弃食饮，椎床呼捽，他邑失魂魄奔命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286214_comment'></div>清卿取小胥所执筹签削之，濒运河立，曰：「大行在道，率士悲殒，非臣子自快时也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286214_comment'></div>小县排设既一应法矣，而公辈诛责不已，吾抢两目，蹈此水为百姓请命，公能自安乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286214_comment'></div>众大惊谢过，退即次肃然，民免横敛，而大官先置，犹馀二百万，上之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286214_comment'></div>濠归正人常跳淮暴虏边，杀人烧屋相继。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286214_comment'></div>千户隔河注箭，徵主叫骂，清卿使与打话曰：「吾在此，姑待」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286214_comment'></div>集其总首抚之曰：「尔等看我面如满月，忍为是乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286214_comment'></div>归正人感动，皆拜且泣曰：「请后不敢」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1286214_comment'></div>自是终清卿去，边人开窦而睡，牛马被野矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1286214_comment'></div>然则其历官行事若是者，可谓<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_42_1286214", 1286214, "Clauses/157/Comments/0")'>卓诡</span>过人矣，余岂得而略之哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1286214_comment'></div>清卿娶刘氏，封宜人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1286214_comment'></div>二子，矩先死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1286214_comment'></div>孙嵤、㽦，㽦将以致仕恩补官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1286214_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_46_1286214'>嗟人之英，去为神明，挟壬山兮以灵。</div><div id='poem_sentence_46_1286214_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1208&endYear=1208')">1208年9月</a>　九月，为温州开元寺千佛阁撰文。作品：温州开元寺千佛阁记。<div id='poem_1286119' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286119' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286119?labeling=true' target='_blank'>温州开元寺千佛阁记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1208年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286119")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286119_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286119'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286119'>始，开元寺屋以里数，门阁高百三十尺，旁翼二台，千佛阁在其后，高又过之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286119_comment'></div>钟梵隔云雨，栏槛罗网，阶陛门户夸耀甚，不独为一郡巨丽也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286119_comment'></div>于时永嘉至僻陋，显官富民之居，俛眉而入，贿藏好赠，不实于篚而奉佛若此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286119_comment'></div>余颇记僧清了者来，所过空聚落迎拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286119_comment'></div>金帛之献，舟衔舆戛，以先至为幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286119_comment'></div>造寺洪流中，不日月而成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286119_comment'></div>盖薄其家而厚佛僧，自唐以来迄于渡江，其俗然矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286119_comment'></div>绍兴庚申岁，火延烧开元皆尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286119_comment'></div>其僧感愤激发，誓以复起，死则后至继之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286119_comment'></div>然自是人益以施为难，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1286119", 1286119, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>乌集</span>其门，侧睨横出，漫不酬对，有终不捐一钱者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286119_comment'></div>辛苦踰一甲子，犹未悉就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286119_comment'></div>已就者，广崇之度与初寺相百也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286119_comment'></div>所谓千佛阁者，居广实为之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286119_comment'></div>广赡智博习，能诵说，俗所信爱，施之差易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286119_comment'></div>积至三千万，斧斤不绝声十年，方之昔为隘，视今华敞矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286119_comment'></div>顾他释、老舍，兵残火燬，荒基断础相望，十不能兴一二也，何论复旧美哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286119_comment'></div>虽然，余观今之为生者，土以寸辟，稻以参种，水蹙而岸附，垄削而平处，一州之壤日以狭矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286119_comment'></div>异木别草争植于圃，隆楝深宇角胜于家，氄衣卉服交货于市，四民之用日以侈矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286119_comment'></div>然则以昔之厚佛僧者而自与，情之所便；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286119_comment'></div>抑异以安俗，退夷而进华，又义之所出也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286119_comment'></div>虽然，将充夫先王之道而一由于至顺，则固不以吝于人者为己利，损于外者为家侈，然后富教而德正，礼辨而俗朴，此三代之上所以为治道一而义理明也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286119_comment'></div>故余因广之请，并今昔之变纪焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286119_comment'></div>嘉定元年九月。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1286119_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1208&endYear=1208')">1208年</a>　冬，旧友黄岩林鼒来访，叶适有诗相赠。作品：林叔和见访道旧感叹以为赠。<div id='poem_80122' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_80122' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/80122?labeling=true' target='_blank'>林叔和见访道旧感叹因以为赠</a><span class='authorDate'>（1208年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_80122")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_80122_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_80122'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_80122'>与子异州壤，取友四十年。<div id='poem_sentence_0_80122_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_80122'>狂心早探索，出语乾道前。<div id='poem_sentence_1_80122_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_80122'>向来朱建安，拊手笑渊源。<div id='poem_sentence_2_80122_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_80122'>小心承父昆，刻意希回骞。<div id='poem_sentence_3_80122_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_80122'>不求<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_80122", 80122, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>垄断</span>登，有路直如弦。<div id='poem_sentence_4_80122_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_80122'>计其所不为，敌富逾百千。<div id='poem_sentence_5_80122_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_80122'>众骏跨险远，独鹄超渺绵。<div id='poem_sentence_6_80122_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_80122'>谓当共骖服，可以争联翩。<div id='poem_sentence_7_80122_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_80122'>谁知竟大谬，寸影孤云边。<div id='poem_sentence_8_80122_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_80122'>南省无姓名，俛眉自愁煎。<div id='poem_sentence_9_80122_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_80122'>家蔬仅掩豆，野蝗来蔽天。<div id='poem_sentence_10_80122_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_80122'>过我城西隅，相视各华颠。<div id='poem_sentence_11_80122_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_80122'>寒菊已收花，枯井未回泉。<div id='poem_sentence_12_80122_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_80122'>人生寓地上，蚁垤交折旋。<div id='poem_sentence_13_80122_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_80122'>中间较得失，区区等浮烟。<div id='poem_sentence_14_80122_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_80122'>喜君佳儿侄，放笔追奔川。<div id='poem_sentence_15_80122_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_80122'>许身若卧龙，斩蛟透重渊。<div id='poem_sentence_16_80122_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_80122'>所虞气力豪，未受规矩镌。<div id='poem_sentence_17_80122_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_80122'>过翁非止肖，奕世始称贤。<div id='poem_sentence_18_80122_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_80122'>从今掩蓬荜，同赋归来篇。<div id='poem_sentence_19_80122_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_80122'></div><div id='poem_sentence_20_80122_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1208&endYear=1208')">1208年</a>　是年冬，撰陈傅良墓志铭。作品：宝谟阁待制中书舍人陈公墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286216' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286216' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286216?labeling=true' target='_blank'>宝谟阁待制中书舍人陈公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1208年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286216")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286216_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286216'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286216'>公姓陈氏，讳傅良，字君举，温州瑞安人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286216_comment'></div>初讲城南茶院时，诸老先生传科举旧学，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1286216", 1286216, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>摩荡</span>鼓舞，受教者无异辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286216_comment'></div>公未三十，心思<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1286216", 1286216, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>挺出</span>，陈编宿说，披剥溃败，奇意<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1286216", 1286216, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>芽甲</span>，新语<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1286216", 1286216, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>懋长</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286216_comment'></div>士苏醒起立，骇未曾有，皆相号召，雷动从之，虽縻他师，亦藉名陈氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286216_comment'></div>由是其文擅于当世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286216_comment'></div>公不自喜，悉谢去，独<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1286216", 1286216, "Clauses/23/Comments/1")'>崇敬</span>郑景望、薛士隆，师友事之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286216_comment'></div>入太学，则张钦夫、吕伯恭相视遇兄弟也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286216_comment'></div>四方受业愈众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286216_comment'></div>乾道八年，策进士殿庐，定公第一，奏入，不果用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286216_comment'></div>教授泰州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286216_comment'></div>朝廷难以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1286216", 1286216, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>铨法</span>持之，遂授太学录。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286216_comment'></div>将召试馆职，复不果，使告公，将以为编修官，公辞焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286216_comment'></div>通判福州，右正言黄洽引王安石事劾公罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286216_comment'></div>主管崇道观，知桂阳军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286216_comment'></div>或言知名士废不用凡三十三人，公为其首，执政病之，稍迁提举湖南常平茶盐，转运判官，浙西提刑，吏部员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286216_comment'></div>去朝十四年，至是而归，鬓须无黑者，都人聚观嗟叹，号老陈郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286216_comment'></div>光宗<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1286216", 1286216, "Clauses/57/Comments/0")'>逆劳</span>曰：「卿昔安在？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286216_comment'></div>朕思见久矣，其以所著书示朕」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286216_comment'></div>迁秘书少监兼实录院编修官，皇子赞读，历起居郎舍人，皆兼中书舍人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286216_comment'></div>会上疾，不能觐重华，公阴讽显谏，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1286216", 1286216, "Clauses/68/Comments/0")'>危论</span>婉说，因乞致仕，下殿径行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286216_comment'></div>改秘阁修撰，复兼赞读，不至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286216_comment'></div>今上即位，除中书舍人、侍讲、同实录院修撰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286216_comment'></div>御史中丞谢深甫论公言不顾行，提举兴国宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286216_comment'></div>居三年，察官交疏，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1286216", 1286216, "Clauses/80/Comments/0")'>削秩</span>罢，时庆元二年也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286216_comment'></div>嘉泰二年，始复官，再为兴国宫，知泉州，辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286216_comment'></div>授集英殿修撰，待制宝谟阁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286216_comment'></div>三年十一月丙子卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286216_comment'></div>开禧元年三月庚寅，葬于帆游乡湗村前山，距家巷语可达也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286216_comment'></div>夫人张氏，封令人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286216_comment'></div>子师朴，承务郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286216_comment'></div>师辙，新监盐官买纳场。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286216_comment'></div>潘子顺，薛师雍，林子燕，徐冲，皆婿也，既仕；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286216_comment'></div>未仕者张绍、张畴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286216_comment'></div>未嫁者一女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286216_comment'></div>孙女一人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286216_comment'></div>公之从郑、薛也，以克己<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1286216", 1286216, "Clauses/109/Comments/0")'>兢畏</span>为主，敬德集义，于张公尽心焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286216_comment'></div>至古人经制，三代治法，又与薛公反复论之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286216_comment'></div>而吕公为言：「本朝文献相承，所以垂世立国者，然后学之内外本末备矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286216_comment'></div>公犹不已，年经月纬，昼验夜索，询世旧，翻吏牍，蒐断简，采异闻，一事一物，必稽于极而后止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286216_comment'></div>千载之上，珠贯而丝组之，若目见而身<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1286216", 1286216, "Clauses/130/Comments/0")'>折旋</span>其间，吕公以为其长不独在文字也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286216_comment'></div>公既实究治体，故常本原祖宗德意，欲减重征，捐末利，还之于民，省兵薄刑，期于富厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1286216_comment'></div>而稍修取士法，养其理义廉耻为人材地，以待上用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1286216_comment'></div>其于君德内治，则欲内朝外庭为人主一体，群臣庶民并询迭谏，而无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_42_1286216", 1286216, "Clauses/145/Comments/0")'>壅塞</span>不通之情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1286216_comment'></div>凡成周之所以为盛，皆可以行于今世，视昔人之致其君，非止以气力<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_43_1286216", 1286216, "Clauses/149/Comments/0")'>荷负</span>之，华藻润色之而已也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1286216_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1286216_comment'></div>其操术精而致用远，弥纶之义弘矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1286216_comment'></div>盖鲁有臧文仲，郑有子产，齐有晏婴，晋有叔向，四人者当周之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_46_1286216", 1286216, "Clauses/158/Comments/0")'>末造</span>，能新美旧学而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_46_1286216", 1286216, "Clauses/159/Comments/0")'>和齐</span>用之，尊奉前闻而斟酌行之，不啬于古，不狃于今，是能辅当时而传后世，此春秋名世之士，孔子之所贤者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1286216_comment'></div>今公亦考元祐、庆历，上极建隆，以达乎绍兴之后，将<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_47_1286216", 1286216, "Clauses/169/Comments/0")'>栉理</span>弦续，起废疾解倒悬而燠炰之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1286216_comment'></div>使公而得尽其用，则未知于四人者孰先后也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1286216_comment'></div>始，公以盛名，天下归重，意其将有为矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1286216_comment'></div>其录大学也，议科举敝法，颇檃括之而已，然而拘于常而习于故者以为异矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1286216_comment'></div>其倅福州也，平一府曲直使不得隐而已，然而畏其明而苦其决者以为专矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1286216_comment'></div>流言<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_52_1286216", 1286216, "Clauses/184/Comments/0")'>转易</span>，应和喧然，而公之道不得行矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1286216_comment'></div>孝宗尝于禁中，从容读公所论著；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1286216_comment'></div>光宗尝因直前独对，许公且大用；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1286216_comment'></div>及今上<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_55_1286216", 1286216, "Clauses/191/Comments/0")'>御极</span>，有讲堂之旧；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1286216_comment'></div>招徕初载，有咨谋之美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1286216_comment'></div>然而夺其眷者使反为怒，蔽其知者使不复思，而公之身，竟以斥矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1286216_comment'></div>以彼四人，使其君臣之际上下之交不遂，靡然为时所向，而谤誉杂于朝市，疑信异其始终，则夫功烈之成就曾不能万一，而况其有大于四人者乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1286216_comment'></div>此余于公所以叹其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_59_1286216", 1286216, "Clauses/206/Comments/0")'>开物</span>之易而周身之难，成名之厚而收功之薄也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1286216_comment'></div>悲夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1286216_comment'></div>公葬四年，吏部侍郎蔡公行之始状其行于太史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1286216_comment'></div>行之从公蚤，载之详。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1286216_comment'></div>余亦陪公游四十年，教余勤矣，故摭其平生大指，刻于墓上，以记余之哀思，而行之已载者，不复述也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1286216_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_64_1286216'>呜呼陈公，未壮而兴；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1286216_comment'></div>群士惊奔，来师来承。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1286216_comment'></div>三代统纪，汉、唐制度；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1286216_comment'></div>百世虽远，一二以数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1286216_comment'></div>事研于终，德复于初；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1286216_comment'></div>发为词华，乃学之馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1286216_comment'></div>内圣外王，本末洪纤；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1286216_comment'></div>春秋四人，孔子所严。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1286216_comment'></div>建隆之元，实维《下武》；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1286216_comment'></div>斟酌损益，可继尧、禹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1286216_comment'></div>天欲平治，必待其材；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1286216_comment'></div>生之实难，莫我肯培。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1286216_comment'></div>名胡忌高！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1286216_comment'></div>实奚恶富！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1286216_comment'></div>裂弃文锦，缝彼败素。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1286216_comment'></div>寄印如累，其谗云云；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1286216_comment'></div>拥书如林，其乐欣欣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1286216_comment'></div>有橘之菔，有菡之芬；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1286216_comment'></div>有挐其舟，音远不闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1286216_comment'></div>我瞻湗村，泚矣南塘！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1286216_comment'></div>二物则存，公乎在亡！</div><div id='poem_sentence_84_1286216_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1208&endYear=1208')">1208年</a>　黄岩赵师渊约卒于本年，有祭文。作品：祭赵几道文。<span class='inlineComment2'>（题目见《水心集》卷二十八。）</span><div id='poem_1286336' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286336' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286336?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭赵几道文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1208年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286336")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286336_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286336'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286336'>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286336_comment'></div>世寡成材，天损人亏，骜外羸中，得角丧圭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286336_comment'></div>昔在孔氏，学急于困，终身之力，治此分寸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286336_comment'></div>嗟余几道，独源众流，不尼不奔，孔治孔求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286336_comment'></div>国能洋洋，家行济济，有以致用，无不具体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286336_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1286336", 1286336, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>事物</span>之碎，多于发丝；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286336_comment'></div>性命之眇，犹隔杪忽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286336_comment'></div>如果既熟，可荐而食；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286336_comment'></div>其或不食，遗后以德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286336_comment'></div>谁挽而后？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286336_comment'></div>孰推而前？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286336_comment'></div>电逝矢激，惊波骇川。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286336_comment'></div>余痼且老，视荫永息，期君雁荡，并坐岩石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286336_comment'></div>一游甚难，悲夫骤亡，病覆丘陵，气血靡亢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286336_comment'></div>天欲行道，世欲树教，胡不保定，俾试厥效？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286336_comment'></div>万古茫茫，去来<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1286336", 1286336, "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>堂堂</span>，盈庭之哀，痛舍我觞。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1286336_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1208&endYear=1208')">1208年</a>　为薛季宣之姐撰墓志铭。作品：夫人薛氏墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286211' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286211' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286211?labeling=true' target='_blank'>夫人薛氏墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1208年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286211")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286211_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286211'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286211'>胡序少宾夫人曰薛氏，起居舍人徽言之女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286211_comment'></div>二家永嘉望姓，世相婚姻，少宾于夫人实内外兄弟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286211_comment'></div>夫人之弟常州君，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1286211", 1286211, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>博习</span>综练，号有管、葛事业，天下所谓薛士隆者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286211_comment'></div>而少宾通达沈雄，特自期负厚甚，与士隆取舍略不尽同也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286211_comment'></div>年且五十，犹未有仕宦意，夫人助之，扫一室，时卧起饮食而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286211_comment'></div>人疑少宾内富乐，故不轻出，不知其贫也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286211_comment'></div>少宾监湖州酒库，卒官，家益空，夫人治如平日，不使其子问有无。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286211_comment'></div>已而子宗、子守相次登进士第，以能文有学为名士，师友必于四方，在家如处子，里巷人不识面，未尝谒州县也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286211_comment'></div>又不幸皆先死，夫人虽悲，不以乱志，最后幼子定得试礼部，而夫人卒，年八十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286211_comment'></div>嘉定元年正月晦日也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286211_comment'></div>其四月朔，祔于永嘉县吹台乡少宾之墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286211_comment'></div>夫人五子，曰寅，亦早夭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286211_comment'></div>葬夫人者，宇也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286211_comment'></div>婿曰孙楠、黄庭、陈侁、吴珩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286211_comment'></div>庭，嘉泰进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286211_comment'></div>孙男四人，曰壑，曰垕，曰圭，曰堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286211_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286211_comment'></div>余于夫人，知为家者不以贫富有无而家道常存也，其子若孙不以通塞隐显而善常积名常闻也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286211_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_1286211'>少宾温温，万夫之豪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286211_comment'></div>宗也继长，守也增高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286211_comment'></div>勉勉夫人，遭世变迁；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286211_comment'></div>蚤听暮教，以考厥年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286211_comment'></div>其在后人，力仁力义；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286211_comment'></div>达于家邦，夫人之志。</div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1286211_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1209&endYear=1209')">1209年</a>　居水心村，苦疾，不妄出。是年在家讲学授徒，因文名盛，从学者众。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1209&endYear=1209')">1209年2月</a>　二月，为宿觉庵撰文。作品：宿觉庵记。<span class='inlineComment2'>（时间见《水心集》卷九该文后。）</span><div id='poem_1286120' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286120' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286120?labeling=true' target='_blank'>宿觉庵记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1209年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286120")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286120_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286120'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286120'>玄觉师歌诗数十章，虽不与中国之道合，余爱其拨钞疏之烦，自立證解，深而易达，浅不可测，明悟勇决，不累于生死，盖人杰也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286120_comment'></div>既殁六百年，学者载之不衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286120_comment'></div>所居山，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1286120", 1286120, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>延袤</span>十里，有江月松风之胜，依而寺者十数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286120_comment'></div>余亦在其下，苦<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1286120", 1286120, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>疾痼</span>，非人事<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1286120", 1286120, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>酬答</span>不妄出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286120_comment'></div>他日，钱塘本然、蜀人居宽固请登焉，则山已入贵家，所存二三而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286120_comment'></div>枯茶败草，髣髴乱石中，余慨然怜之，为于绝景亭下作小精舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286120_comment'></div>寺名四字，土人但称净光，故重述旧事，题曰宿觉，使宽主之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286120_comment'></div>稍种竹树，有所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1286120", 1286120, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>避隐</span>出没，以为风雨晦明之地，而时与坊僧巷友游居其间，以招来其徒，冀遇如觉者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286120_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286120_comment'></div>余老矣，病而力不给，惰而志不进，岂非不复知以古人自期，而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1286120", 1286120, "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>遁流</span>汩没于异方之学者哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286120_comment'></div>盖世有畏日暮，疾走<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1286120", 1286120, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>猖狂</span>而迷惑者，然犹反顾不已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286120_comment'></div>余之记此，既以自警，而又以自笑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286120_comment'></div>嘉定二年二月。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1286120_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1209&endYear=1209')">1209年</a>　为宿觉庵作诗。<div id='poem_80023' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_80023' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/80023?labeling=true' target='_blank'>宿觉庵</a><span class='authorDate'>（1209年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_80023")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_80023_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_80023'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_80023'>宿觉名未谢，残山今尚存。<div id='poem_sentence_0_80023_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_80023'>暂开云外宅，不闭雨中门。<div id='poem_sentence_1_80023_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_80023'>麦熟僧常饿，茶枯客谩吞。<div id='poem_sentence_2_80023_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_80023'>荒凉自有趣，衰病遣谁言。<div id='poem_sentence_3_80023_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_80023'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_80023_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1209&endYear=1209')">1209年4月</a>　四月，为杨时祠堂撰文。作品：龟山杨先生祠堂记。<div id='poem_1286121' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286121' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286121?labeling=true' target='_blank'>龟山杨先生祠堂记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1209年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286121")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286121_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286121'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286121'>贤者之世，渐远而渐微，或微而遂绝，可叹也已！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286121_comment'></div>若夫好贤者不然，虽远而不衰，愈远而愈隆也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286121_comment'></div>《微子之命》曰：「崇德象贤」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286121_comment'></div>然则微者可望以复兴，绝者可恃以复续，是在后之人矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286121_comment'></div>臧文仲闻六与蓼灭，曰：「皋陶、庭坚，不祀<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1286121", 1286121, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>忽诸</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286121_comment'></div>德之不建，民之无援，哀哉」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286121_comment'></div>于时相去既千五百年而其言如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286121_comment'></div>虽然，以二人之德而使其后不传，岂惟臧文仲哀之，虽远而万世，愈远而无穷，犹且哀之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286121_comment'></div>龟山先生文靖杨公中立，力行二程之道，黜王氏邪说，节高而安，行峻而和，学者所师，当世所尊，可谓贤矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286121_comment'></div>卒于绍兴丙辰，七十馀年而无仕者，微不自业，至卖其宅，去绝几何，可不悲夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286121_comment'></div>其四世孙子复病之，争愬纷然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286121_comment'></div>太守余景瞻曰：「非也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286121_comment'></div>有司治此，不过用交易法尔，安能空手以得！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286121_comment'></div>吾以义长民者也，子姑听乎」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286121_comment'></div>自景瞻至郡，有例券百馀万，谢不取，因赎以归杨氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286121_comment'></div>将乐更寇乱，民居皆后起，盗敬公之名，故杨氏旧庐独存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286121_comment'></div>然屋老且败，景瞻又修补其漏缺，特立门巷，黑白绚好矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286121_comment'></div>顾子复尚无所衣食，则又职于学官以廪之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286121_comment'></div>杨公有笔藁《史论》一编，景瞻尤惜之，曰「是将为好事者夺去」，则肖公像于霤，并藏其书，岁遣官祭祠，然后出陈之焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286121_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286121_comment'></div>其为杨氏虑悉矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286121_comment'></div>微者可兴也，绝者可续也，斯弗憾矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286121_comment'></div>异时景瞻<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1286121", 1286121, "Clauses/75/Comments/0")'>明锐</span>果敢，是非贤否立见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286121_comment'></div>其守延平，乃更<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1286121", 1286121, "Clauses/78/Comments/0")'>详缓</span>曲折。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286121_comment'></div>野人有讼，呼案前儿女语之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286121_comment'></div>收敛<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1286121", 1286121, "Clauses/81/Comments/0")'>锋锷</span>以立纲目，昼勤夜思，各就<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1286121", 1286121, "Clauses/83/Comments/0")'>纪序</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286121_comment'></div>今夫事之可为如杨公者众，而或未之为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286121_comment'></div>然则虽其未入于景瞻职业之内者，余亦不欲其出于景瞻思虑之外矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286121_comment'></div>故余之愿景瞻，非独以其能好贤而已也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286121_comment'></div>嘉定二年四月。</div><div id='poem_sentence_29_1286121_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1209&endYear=1209')">1209年9月</a>　九月，应平阳知县汪季良之情，撰写代纳坊场钱记。作品：平阳县代纳坊场钱记。<div id='poem_1286122' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286122' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286122?labeling=true' target='_blank'>平阳县代纳坊场钱记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1209年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286122")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286122_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286122'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286122'>自前世乡村以分地<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1286122", 1286122, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>扑酒</span>，有课利买，名净利钱，恣民增钱夺买，或卖不及，则为败缺而当停闭，虽当停闭而钱自若，官督输不贷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286122_comment'></div>民无高下，枚户而偿，虽良吏善政莫能救也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286122_comment'></div>嘉定二年，浙东提举司言：「温州平阳县言：『县之乡村坊店二十五，当停闭二十一，有坊店之名而无其处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286122_comment'></div>旧传自宣和时则然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286122_comment'></div>钱之以贯数二千六百七十三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286122_comment'></div>州下<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1286122", 1286122, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>青册</span>于县，月取岁足，无敢蹉跌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286122_comment'></div>保正赋饮户不实，杯盂之酤，罂缶之酿，强家幸免，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1286122", 1286122, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>浮细</span>受害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286122_comment'></div>穷山入云，绝少醉者，鬻樵雇耕，抑配白纳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286122_comment'></div>而永嘉至有算亩而起，反过正税，斯又甚矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286122_comment'></div>且县人无沈湎之失而受败缺之咎，十百零碎，承催乾没，关门逃避，攘及锅釜，子孙不息，愁苦不止，惟垂裁哀，颇加救助』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286122_comment'></div>伏见近造伪会子抵罪者所籍之田，及馀废寺亦有残田，谓宜赐县就用，禾利粗足相直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286122_comment'></div>补<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1286122", 1286122, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>青册</span>之缺，释饮户之负，不胜大愿」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286122_comment'></div>于是朝廷恻然许之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286122_comment'></div>命既布，一县无不歌舞赞叹，以纪上恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286122_comment'></div>夫坊场之有败缺，州县通患也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286122_comment'></div>今平阳独以使者一言去百年之疾，然则昔所谓莫能救者，岂未之思欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286122_comment'></div>某闻仁人视民如子，知其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1286122", 1286122, "Clauses/60/Comments/0")'>痛毒</span>，若身尝之，审择其利，常与事称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286122_comment'></div>疗之有方，予之有名，不以高论废务，不以空意妨实，然后举措可明于朝廷而惠泽可出于君上，此其所以法不敝而民不穷也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286122_comment'></div>疏别其事以请者，知县汪季良也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286122_comment'></div>为季良请，且将行其说于他邑者，提举孟植也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286122_comment'></div>九月日。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1286122_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1209&endYear=1209')">1209年</a>　乡人许及之卒，有挽词。作品：许相公挽词二首。<span class='inlineComment2'>（题目见《水心集》卷八。）</span><div id='poem_79956' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_79956' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/79956?labeling=true' target='_blank'>许相公挽词二首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1209年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_79956")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_79956_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_79956'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_79956'>容成堂上光华别，谢客岩前意象閒。<div id='poem_sentence_0_79956_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_79956'>身到三台良未满，年添九老定谁悭。<div id='poem_sentence_1_79956_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_79956'>高期落落尘嚣外，苦论喧喧醉梦间。<div id='poem_sentence_2_79956_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_79956'>我欲为公深着语，桂林芝树不同删。<div id='poem_sentence_3_79956_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_79956'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_79956_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_79955' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_79955' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/79955?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1209年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_79955_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_79955'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_79955'>行露空多晓色催，夜香烧断作飞埃。<div id='poem_sentence_0_79955_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_79955'>松江鲙好凭谁忆，金谷花浓只自开。<div id='poem_sentence_1_79955_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_79955'>玉女云中应尽去，仙人雾里更重来。<div id='poem_sentence_2_79955_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_79955'>千年一判<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_79955", 79955, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>禁销得</span>，涕掩寒塘错莫回。<div id='poem_sentence_3_79955_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_79955'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_79955_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1209&endYear=1209')">1209年</a>　与薛绍等人为率真会。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1209&endYear=1209')">1209年</a>　为刘夙、刘朔兄弟撰墓志铭。作品：著作正字二刘公墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286217' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286217' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286217?labeling=true' target='_blank'>著作正字二刘公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1209年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286217")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286217_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286217'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286217'>隆兴、乾道中，天下称莆之贤曰二刘公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286217_comment'></div>著作讳夙，字宾之，弟正字讳朔，字复之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286217_comment'></div>其学本于师友，成于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1286217", 1286217, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>理义</span>，轻爵禄而重出处，厚<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1286217", 1286217, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>名闻</span>而薄利势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286217_comment'></div>立朝能尽言，治民能尽力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286217_comment'></div>居家以父母兄弟为心而不私其身，乡党隐一州之患，若除其身之疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286217_comment'></div>其饬廉隅，定臧否，公是非，审予夺，皆可以暴之当世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286217_comment'></div>方孝宗始初求治，召二公寘馆阁，犯而不欺，难进易退，国人贵焉，以为麟见获，凤来仪也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286217_comment'></div>不幸正字年四十四，以乾道六年六月卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286217_comment'></div>其明年五月，著作年四十八，亦卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286217_comment'></div>四方相吊，如悲亲戚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286217_comment'></div>后四十年，道其事者，尚相与<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1286217", 1286217, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>悼痛</span>嗟惜不已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286217_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286217_comment'></div>其中心诚信于人耶！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286217_comment'></div>士之不求为君子者视此欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286217_comment'></div>著作生毁齿，日读千字，已记忆，犹摘诵不离口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286217_comment'></div>同学儿黄刍季野笑曰：「岂患此数句易忘耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286217_comment'></div>著作曰：「我心乐此，诵久，乐益深矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286217_comment'></div>闻者异之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286217_comment'></div>诘所以乐，皆自言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286217_comment'></div>二公及刍盖师中书舍人林公，事之终身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286217_comment'></div>林公名光朝，莆人所谓艾轩先生者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286217_comment'></div>正字少而喜《易》，蕲以名家；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286217_comment'></div>著作曰《春秋》为王介甫茅塞久矣，由是更治《春秋》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286217_comment'></div>绍兴庚辰，礼部奏第一；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286217_comment'></div>前九年，著作以词赋在第二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286217_comment'></div>二公不为科举学，虽场屋<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1286217", 1286217, "Clauses/66/Comments/0")'>荒速</span>之文，与论著金石等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286217_comment'></div>而《春秋》于三家凡例外自出新义，尔雅<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1286217", 1286217, "Clauses/69/Comments/0")'>独至</span>，无能及者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286217_comment'></div>著作既释褐，调吉州司户、临安府教授。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286217_comment'></div>会正字迎游夫人于永嘉，易教授温州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286217_comment'></div>召试馆职学士院，问荐举之敝，著作对策曰：「此执政大臣为惠而不为政致之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286217_comment'></div>陈执中、章子厚，人知其小人也，然能不以官私其亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286217_comment'></div>今将告执政大臣曰：『子为子厚乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286217_comment'></div>为执中乎』？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286217_comment'></div>则艴然怒矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286217_comment'></div>至其行事，则有为子厚、执中所不为者矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286217_comment'></div>学者至今诵之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286217_comment'></div>除秘书省正字，减员，移枢密院编修官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286217_comment'></div>母老，屡求去，不许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286217_comment'></div>兼史院编修官，著作曰：「求去以便私也，美职可因而得乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286217_comment'></div>力辞不就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286217_comment'></div>右正言陈良祐、侍御史周操疑其必去，合疏留之，除著作佐郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1286217_comment'></div>初秦桧死，高宗开<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1286217", 1286217, "Clauses/104/Comments/0")'>谏路</span>，轮对群臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1286217_comment'></div>孝宗既即位，望太平旦夕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1286217_comment'></div>虏讲和未定，内庭设射驰毬，大雨水，蝗害稼，而曾觌、龙大渊挟声势，阴进退士大夫，皆相顾莫敢发口，发亦辄逐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1286217_comment'></div>时隆兴二年七月也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1286217_comment'></div>著作轮对，见上曰：「群臣不以尧、舜事陛下，臣不识忌讳，窃深愤之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1286217_comment'></div>上遽曰：「天下事可言者，卿第言勿隐」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1286217_comment'></div>对曰：「自去夏至今，日再食，东南三地震。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1286217_comment'></div>比又积阴弥月，所至水潦，蝗食雨中，为异尤大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1286217_comment'></div>在廷纷纷谓陛下宜避殿损膳自责矣，而至今不闻德音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1286217_comment'></div>古者灾沴，皆为臣偪君之象；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1286217_comment'></div>今一二大臣奉行且不暇，何足语此，殆左右近习盗陛下权尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1286217_comment'></div>且长淮无一兵之戍，而陛下乃亲技击骋<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_52_1286217", 1286217, "Clauses/141/Comments/0")'>衔辔</span>，岂缓急欲为自将地乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1286217_comment'></div>阎德、陈敏近堕马失臂，梁珂亦摧折濒死，陛下所亲见也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1286217_comment'></div>上为改容动色，遂下诏曰：「政事不修，灾异数见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1286217_comment'></div>江、浙水潦，害于秋成，朕甚惧焉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1286217_comment'></div>其自八月朔不御正殿，减常膳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1286217_comment'></div>令侍从至馆职疏朕阙失及当今急务」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1286217_comment'></div>著作复封上曰：「陛下引旧僚谋政事，得如张阐、王十朋可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1286217_comment'></div>乃与觌、大渊辈觞咏唱酬，字而不名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1286217_comment'></div>罢宰相，易大将，待其言而后决乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1286217_comment'></div>严法守，裁侥倖，自宫掖近侍始可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1286217_comment'></div>今梁珂一年三受醲赏，他<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_62_1286217", 1286217, "Clauses/168/Comments/0")'>内目</span>一日迁四使，而但减卿监郎曹数十员乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1286217_comment'></div>昔姚崇以十事要其君曰：『能用则就，不用则去』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1286217_comment'></div>今陛下以五事要其臣曰：『不能如是则去，能如是则留』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1286217_comment'></div>然则安用大臣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1286217_comment'></div>孔道辅首论曹利用、罗崇勋使罢去，吕诲、范纯仁力谏濮王称亲为不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1286217_comment'></div>今幺么如杨倓、曹口，尚熟视不敢议，然则安用台谏」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1286217_comment'></div>又言：「国初<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_68_1286217", 1286217, "Clauses/183/Comments/1")'>僭叛</span>虽平，人情未一，故设逻卒，广耳目，有不便者，一切闻上改之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1286217_comment'></div>今徒监谤愈密，岂可不畏！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1286217_comment'></div>禹恶旨酒，汤不迩声色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1286217_comment'></div>夫宴游无度，甚则有流荡戏狎之患；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1286217_comment'></div>御幸无节，其终为人兽杂乱之祸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1286217_comment'></div>愿陛下罢行前事，应天以实，庶可消弭灾变」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1286217_comment'></div>疏入，亟求罢，留之数十不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1286217_comment'></div>以为湖北安抚司参议，不行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1286217_comment'></div>三年十二月，觌、大渊出为总管，于是天下相庆，而著作知衢州矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1286217_comment'></div>复奏论君子小人之辨曰：「人主不示天下以所好，而常禁其所偏」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1286217_comment'></div>上深然之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1286217_comment'></div>在州期年，政平讼简，郡人画像祠公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1286217_comment'></div>会觌副贺金正旦，道衢谒公，不纳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1286217_comment'></div>复求去，徙知温州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1286217_comment'></div>春夏不雨，公全家淡食，请命八十馀日，母游夫人饭以梅乾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1286217_comment'></div>自乞病甚，主管崇道观而去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1286217_comment'></div>始，正字调温州户曹，缘岁大饥，继以大疫，正字计口受禄，以其馀散粥糜，日有常数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1286217_comment'></div>同僚寓士富人争效之，挟医至门，颦蹙掩鼻却立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1286217_comment'></div>正字亲切脉煮药，晨往晏罢，径入徐出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1286217_comment'></div>有难之者曰：「将为太夫人忧」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1286217_comment'></div>曰：「此老母意也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1286217_comment'></div>所活数万人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1286217_comment'></div>聚道旁弃儿常百计，幕妪乳饲，听无子者择取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1286217_comment'></div>比<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_91_1286217", 1286217, "Clauses/248/Comments/0")'>满秩</span>，灾疫犹未已，皆泣曰：「司户去，吾何所得衣食」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1286217_comment'></div>既而著作来守，故民望之亦如正字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1286217_comment'></div>及著作亦去，又泣曰：「天以二刘赐我而不能终也，奈何」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1286217_comment'></div>莆人往还，必问著作、正字及游夫人安否，其皆卒也，哭之皆失声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1286217_comment'></div>此盖余少年亲见闻实事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1286217_comment'></div>正字既解户曹，乞监岳庙，召对，奏曰：「陛下何不延纳愤激敢言之士而听讦直难堪之言，因以自考察成败得失」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1286217_comment'></div>以是不得留，犹改官知福清县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1286217_comment'></div>福之支邑，月责羡钱而无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_98_1286217", 1286217, "Clauses/273/Comments/0")'>经赋</span>，正字尽罢之，复请缓输数月，帅为并宽旁县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1286217_comment'></div>听讼，使两辞自诣，无追呼者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1286217_comment'></div>市食挂钱于门，民当其物，持钱而去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1286217_comment'></div>邑庭常空，失<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_101_1286217", 1286217, "Clauses/284/Comments/0")'>械索</span>所在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1286217_comment'></div>时王参政之望为帅自尊，不使僚属抗礼，正字以义责，之望不悦也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1286217_comment'></div>居五月，以疾复请祠归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1286217_comment'></div>再召对，虞丞相允文赞上谋恢复锐甚，希进者趋和之，正字极谏曰：「臣观今日通和，未为失策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1286217_comment'></div>昔富弼累增岁币，今减十万矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1286217_comment'></div>往时两淮不许备守，今江北诸城增陴浚隍矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1286217_comment'></div>前此江上教兵，彼且呵问，今沿淮分屯，鼓声达泗、颍矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1286217_comment'></div>虏或示我弱，殆不可测。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1286217_comment'></div>宜选兵将，广储歭，责成于端重堪事者，从容以待其变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1286217_comment'></div>若募彼人<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_110_1286217", 1286217, "Clauses/311/Comments/0")'>向导</span>，挟异国济师，合中原<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_110_1286217", 1286217, "Clauses/313/Comments/0")'>响赴</span>而兵不必众，就虏人<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_110_1286217", 1286217, "Clauses/314/Comments/0")'>储聚</span>而粟不必多，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_110_1286217", 1286217, "Clauses/315/Comments/0")'>凭虚</span>蹈空，过为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_110_1286217", 1286217, "Clauses/316/Comments/0")'>指料</span>，将有临危失据之忧矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1286217_comment'></div>此所谓决天下于一掷者也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1286217_comment'></div>上竦然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1286217_comment'></div>不以试除正字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1286217_comment'></div>于时士无不向恢复者，朱公元晦亦以为人主义在复雠，遇著作于李德远坐论之，著作弗是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1286217_comment'></div>他日，朱公曰：「乃为宾之、德远夹攻」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1286217_comment'></div>德远者，吏部侍郎李浩也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1286217_comment'></div>正字又言「归明人宜散处州县，不当聚畿甸」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1286217_comment'></div>从之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1286217_comment'></div>疾复作，求为福建参议官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1286217_comment'></div>行至信安传舍卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1286217_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1286217_comment'></div>二公之道，所谓忧天下之危而忘其身，图国家之便而不利其乐者欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1286217_comment'></div>著作之还自温，疾有间，莆亦大旱，手为救荒十馀事，率乡人行之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1286217_comment'></div>招潮、惠米商，白守免力胜，四集城下，郡以不饥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1286217_comment'></div>莆之苗斛馀六万，建炎盗起，漕司算其军食，犹剩二万五百，入之福州，自是莆有犹剩米，斛增四敛焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1286217_comment'></div>著作出湖北，愬于朝，舍其半；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1286217_comment'></div>请犹不已，宰相袖书以进，尽蠲之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1286217_comment'></div>正字尝行秦溪，有道殣者，驻家良久，棺殓瘗之乃去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1286217_comment'></div>过剑津，望覆舟号呼，解郑夫人髻金救之而免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1286217_comment'></div>平居昏暮<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_130_1286217", 1286217, "Clauses/369/Comments/0")'>扣户</span>，宿舂饭之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1286217_comment'></div>二公行事隐显大略如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1286217_comment'></div>自谓朋友讲习为古今至乐，常曰：「天下至大也，千岁至远也，所不可一日无者公论也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1286217_comment'></div>朋友群居，敬畏之心所由生，而公论之所由出也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1286217_comment'></div>穷山永夕，篝灯共语，常闻钟声未已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1286217_comment'></div>死日，家无留赀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1286217_comment'></div>著作前后夫人皆林氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1286217_comment'></div>子弥正，朝请郎、淮南转运判官；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1286217_comment'></div>弥恭，弥卲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1286217_comment'></div>女嫁郑其卿，林尚之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1286217_comment'></div>其卿，某官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1286217_comment'></div>正字郑夫人星生三子：起晦，朝奉大夫、秘书省正字；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1286217_comment'></div>起世，迪功郎、南海县尉，皆已卒；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1286217_comment'></div>起元，某官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1286217_comment'></div>盖著作止承议郎，正字奉议郎，而弥正、起晦、起世皆登进士第，起元则起晦为大夫时所任也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1286217_comment'></div>诸孙曰瀛，曰篪，曰镇，曰庆，曰洪，曰合，曰鼎，而正字则希醇、希道、希谦、希深所为祖也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1286217_comment'></div>余童孺事二公，既与弥正为友，而起晦实同年生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1286217_comment'></div>弥正曰：「吾二父铭，以幸子」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1286217_comment'></div>病眊十年不能文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1286217_comment'></div>呜呼悲夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1286217_comment'></div>二公之卒也，艾轩先生为国受吊，笔濡不忍铭以至是也，而余何敢僭！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1286217_comment'></div>虽然，艾轩之不忍，痛至也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1286217_comment'></div>痛且远，德将湮，无以属来者矣，而余何敢忽！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1286217_comment'></div>每念绍兴末，淳熙终，若汪圣锡、芮国瑞、王龟龄、张钦夫、朱元晦、郑景望、薛士隆、吕伯恭及刘宾之、复之兄弟十馀公，位虽屈，其道伸矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1286217_comment'></div>身虽没，其言立矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1286217_comment'></div>好恶同，出处偕，进退用舍，必能一其志者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1286217_comment'></div>表直木于四达之逵，后生之所望而从也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1286217_comment'></div>著作既教授温州，正字亦次摄学事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1286217_comment'></div>于是邦之士，披山通谷，浚泉源而达之川流，其尚克有闻，二公之力也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1286217_comment'></div>盖余昔孺子，而今老矣，而又何敢忘！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1286217_comment'></div>乃为铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_160_1286217'>范曾祖也，愿王父也，显考讳炳，三世长者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_160_1286217_comment'></div>府君将终，有虹闯然；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_161_1286217_comment'></div>升堂绕几，如绶蜿蜒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_162_1286217_comment'></div>其端二公，文字之符，有孝有德，以言以谟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_163_1286217_comment'></div>并事阜陵，致忠极爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_164_1286217_comment'></div>朕乐闻过，不谏奚待！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_165_1286217_comment'></div>如玉斯攻，如木斯绳；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_166_1286217_comment'></div>治烦去惑，臣道以弘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_167_1286217_comment'></div>味苦而长，语甘而螫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_168_1286217_comment'></div>彼何人斯，茍逭朝夕！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_169_1286217_comment'></div>元、凯既来，舜谐其琴；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_170_1286217_comment'></div>伯夷、叔齐，称之到今。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_171_1286217_comment'></div>寿溪之源，土囊之下；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_172_1286217_comment'></div>墓槚相扶，百世一化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_173_1286217_comment'></div>我铭其诗，古人无已；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_174_1286217_comment'></div>庶几后生，闻风而起。</div><div id='poem_sentence_175_1286217_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1209&endYear=1209')">1209年</a>　为林夫人撰墓志铭。作品：夫人林氏墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（题目见《水心集》卷十六。）</span><div id='poem_1286219' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286219' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286219?labeling=true' target='_blank'>夫人林氏墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1209年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286219")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286219_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286219'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286219'>夫人林氏，生婺永康，父签书枢密院事大中，嫁同县宣教郎、通判临安府应懋之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286219_comment'></div>应君，吏部侍郎孟明第三子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286219_comment'></div>夫人年四十二，开禧元年七月，从夫知宁国县，卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286219_comment'></div>嘉定二年十二月某日，葬游仙乡灵岩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286219_comment'></div>子三德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286219_comment'></div>女归辰州司户王杰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286219_comment'></div>应君以书来曰：「林氏恭约苦节，在群，众和乐；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286219_comment'></div>慈子，训之严；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286219_comment'></div>操下，接之恕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286219_comment'></div>处家日，未尝降<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1286219", 1286219, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>堂序</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286219_comment'></div>敏察有智，能助其夫，非止以妇职为顺也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286219_comment'></div>夫世之欲荣官显仕者，无不致厚其妻子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286219_comment'></div>而士亦有固穷<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1286219", 1286219, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>甘约</span>，至冻馁其妻子而犹不得为薄者，彼诚知其所以厚之不在彼而在此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286219_comment'></div>故虽拱璧驷马华屋，翕赫于生存之前，而不若片文只字断石，漫灭于零落之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286219_comment'></div>林氏之死，倘不辱而赐以铭，则是所以厚之者不彼获而此得，而某致薄之过可以洗矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286219_comment'></div>余读而悲之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286219_comment'></div>昔予在金陵，雅闻君能治宁国，号令清省，绝少<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1286219", 1286219, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>笞扑</span>，民爱信之，异口同辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286219_comment'></div>余以病归，舍舟山行，始识君，见其质性<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1286219", 1286219, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>冲泊</span>，器宇<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1286219", 1286219, "Clauses/51/Comments/0")'>明审</span>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1286219", 1286219, "Clauses/52/Comments/0")'>侃然</span>穷邑中，量过其任者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286219_comment'></div>夫鸾翥而鹄举，枳棘不能栖宿也，昔人记之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286219_comment'></div>应君岂以一县自薄者哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286219_comment'></div>余既<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1286219", 1286219, "Clauses/58/Comments/0")'>衰惰</span>不与世接，而友朋之念已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286219_comment'></div>然则君重戚于夫人之不遇，余预有责焉，故不辞而铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286219_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_1286219'>枢密女欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286219_comment'></div>侍郎妇欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286219_comment'></div>其夫甚材，可系武欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286219_comment'></div>余实铭之，观尔后欤！</div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1286219_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1209&endYear=1209')">1209年</a>　为孙永叔撰墓志铭。作品：孙永叔墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286220' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286220' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286220?labeling=true' target='_blank'>孙永叔墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1209年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286220")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286220_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286220'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286220'>馀姚孙君椿年，字永叔，生五十九年，卒于庆元己未。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286220_comment'></div>六年十二月甲申，葬龙泉乡澄溪原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286220_comment'></div>君子之宏来索铭，值余得眩疾，文理颠倒，不自省录，乃请山阴陆公表于墓以待。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286220_comment'></div>余疾更十年不愈，之宏索铭不置，间为苦词以撼余曰：「澄溪木中琴瑟矣，奈壤下何」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286220_comment'></div>余愧不能答也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286220_comment'></div>初，君五世伯祖枢密副使沔，号名臣，而君之曾祖玑，祖绎，无仕者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286220_comment'></div>父修职郎述，始挈君于学，东南师友多聚其家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286220_comment'></div>君<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1286220", 1286220, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>刚特</span>博达，精力过绝夷等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286220_comment'></div>寒抄暑讲，寝食失<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1286220", 1286220, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>期会</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286220_comment'></div>凡书籍义类深浅，古今事物变通，采章错综，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1286220", 1286220, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>机神</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1286220", 1286220, "Clauses/33/Comments/1")'>融液</span>，往往心悟所以然，越之稠儒广士，争倾下君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286220_comment'></div>君负其能，踏<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1286220", 1286220, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>省门</span>五六，然终不得<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1286220", 1286220, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>第名</span>于进士，发谢齿落，遂至槁死，知者皆为君<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1286220", 1286220, "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>歉惜</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286220_comment'></div>故陆公历叙君学能抽先民之微，智能发当世之虑，而恨其不及在人主前口论手画，见于用而成功名也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286220_comment'></div>君既不遇，行之家，推之乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286220_comment'></div>寡嫂孤侄，待君而后立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286220_comment'></div>衣食其族人，岁有常廪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286220_comment'></div>亲戚故人邻里，赖以不冻馁露居者甚众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286220_comment'></div>又出私钱筑堤捍海，县无凶年，繄君力也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286220_comment'></div>所以著君之贤，哀君之困，开阖宛转，句字抑扬，月逝年徂，读者爽然尚亲见君子之为人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286220_comment'></div>所贵于生，谓吾不苟生也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286220_comment'></div>所不憾于死，谓吾不遂死也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286220_comment'></div>一字之称，一善之目，古之名卿材大夫，良史记之不过是尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286220_comment'></div>累行以尊名而君能有之备，懿文以寿远而君能得之多，是固荣于生而耀于死矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286220_comment'></div>人之欲富，将以明予也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286220_comment'></div>欲贵，将以明夺也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286220_comment'></div>予夺之当否，贤不肖之所以异，而名称之所为有无也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286220_comment'></div>世盖有穷富极贵，而予夺之当否，名称之有无，无得预焉，则贤不肖之实，岂不前定也哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286220_comment'></div>君之前定者既如此，陆公之文又如此，然则之宏之索余铭，速之勤，迟之久，余之答之宏，慢于疾，荒于言，宜亦必出于此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286220_comment'></div>君娶吴氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286220_comment'></div>四子，之宏为长，与之亮皆继君席乡贡；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286220_comment'></div>之襄，之颖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286220_comment'></div>女嫁某官史弥忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286220_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_31_1286220'>昔虞仲翔，对王景兴；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286220_comment'></div>朱育继之，炳其丹青。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286220_comment'></div>越之多贤，有屈有伸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286220_comment'></div>嗟乎孙君！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286220_comment'></div>我怀古人！</div><div id='poem_sentence_35_1286220_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1210&endYear=1210')">1210年</a>　居家讲学授徒。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1210&endYear=1210')">1210年</a>　友人乐清叶士宁养病于永嘉南郊，叶适与之来往，九月丁亥士宁卒，年六十六。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1210&endYear=1210')">1210年</a>　魏了翁鹤山书院建成，叶适有诗。作品：魏华甫鹤山书院。<div id='poem_80231' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_80231' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/80231?labeling=true' target='_blank'>魏华甫鹤山书院</a><span class='authorDate'>（1210年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_80231")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_80231_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_80231'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_80231'>苍崔有顶我为庐，日君月妃霍下趋。<div id='poem_sentence_0_80231_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_80231'>梳风洗雨耳自醒，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_80231", 80231, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>玉帝</span>诏许担宸居。<div id='poem_sentence_1_80231_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_80231'>周公仲尼在左右，勘点六籍开凡愚。<div id='poem_sentence_2_80231_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_80231'>曾经<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_80231", 80231, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>秦祸</span>多散阙，郑笺毛传悲纷如。<div id='poem_sentence_3_80231_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_80231'>精神感通若亲授，损益殷夏还其初。<div id='poem_sentence_4_80231_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_80231'>忆君低回校天禄，高论自遣陈言锄。<div id='poem_sentence_5_80231_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_80231'>况今卓绝离人境，妙悟岂可常情拘。<div id='poem_sentence_6_80231_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_80231'>飘零每疑梦魂到，惝慌忽堕西南书。<div id='poem_sentence_7_80231_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_80231'>韩吕之相以类聚，程张之师以道俱。<div id='poem_sentence_8_80231_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_80231'>业调甘酸嗜秦炙，肯逐象罔迷玄珠。<div id='poem_sentence_9_80231_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_80231'>分明愤发贯篇首，端的镂写传吾徒。<div id='poem_sentence_10_80231_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_80231'>乃知山中新所得，慢简閒编皆弃馀。<div id='poem_sentence_11_80231_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_80231'>脩林远岭秋映蔽，浓花近院春扶疏。<div id='poem_sentence_12_80231_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_80231'>彫胡已馈豆笾静，黄独未斸筐篮孤。<div id='poem_sentence_13_80231_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_80231'>垂竿桐江笑<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_80231", 80231, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>短弱</span>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_80231", 80231, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>负鼎</span>莘野嫌<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_80231", 80231, "Clauses/29/Comments/1")'>豪粗</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_14_80231_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_80231'>岷峨崔嵬留后拒，滟滪突兀催前驱。<div id='poem_sentence_15_80231_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_80231'>莫嗔猿鹤不解事，与民由之诚丈夫。<div id='poem_sentence_16_80231_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_80231'></div><div id='poem_sentence_17_80231_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1210&endYear=1210')">1210年</a>　为瑞安县重建厅事撰文。作品：瑞安县重建厅事记。<div id='poem_1286123' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286123' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286123?labeling=true' target='_blank'>瑞安县重建厅事记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1210年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286123")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286123_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286123'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286123'>民于令，最亲也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286123_comment'></div>令必有宫室居处，合力奉之无难也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286123_comment'></div>民聚而多，莫如浙东、西，瑞安非大邑而聚尤多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286123_comment'></div>直杉高竹皆丛产，复厢穹瓦皆赘列，夜行若游其邻，村落若在市廛，肤挠<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1286123", 1286123, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>眦决</span>，或赴于令，暮往而朝达也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286123_comment'></div>是合以奉令之宫室居处，愈无难也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286123_comment'></div>然余自童子，见县门甚卑狭，毁置不常，厅屋<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1286123", 1286123, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>摧破</span>，无立人处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286123_comment'></div>弃而即他舍，寒暑相抵突，令常降气低色，惨戚不怡，字民之志落如也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286123_comment'></div>夫华于民而俭于令，岂其理固然哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286123_comment'></div>岂民姑自营而不顾其令哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286123_comment'></div>抑令仅自保，无以得于民哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286123_comment'></div>不然，则期迫会促，月销岁殒而不暇也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286123_comment'></div>庆元二年，信安留君寅始建门楼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286123_comment'></div>后十四年，当嘉定庚午，嘉兴许君兴裔知县事，而大厅、琴堂始克并立，上极旁挟，比旧<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1286123", 1286123, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>倍差</span>，厚基博础，楹桷丰硕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286123_comment'></div>民来观者，倾动惊骇，忘其百年之陋，而以为今日之瑰杰丽伟，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1286123", 1286123, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>竦踊</span>而独出也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286123_comment'></div>嗟夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286123_comment'></div>宫室居处者，言之无难而成之岂易哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286123_comment'></div>夫以义则下卫上，故《灵台》之歌，乐于始附；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286123_comment'></div>子罕之扑，尽其末力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286123_comment'></div>以仁则上安下，故君之经度，积累辛苦，三载然后集此，而犹曰不敢烦民也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286123_comment'></div>郭西有观潮阁遗址，平视海门，众山葱茏，鱼龙变怪，为一县奇特。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286123_comment'></div>惜乎，君既去，不及谋矣！</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1286123_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1210&endYear=1210')">1210年</a>　为李浃撰墓志铭。作品：太府少卿福建运判直宝谟阁李公墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286245' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286245' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286245?labeling=true' target='_blank'>太府少卿福建运判直宝谟阁李公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1210年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286245")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286245_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286245'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286245'>故参知政事吴兴李公，以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1286245", 1286245, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>诚信</span>质直事孝宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286245_comment'></div>时天子念<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1286245", 1286245, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>讨虏</span>报仇，功绪未验，昼夜耿耿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286245_comment'></div>他执政多迎前趋和，退即覆却异辞，上固不快。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286245_comment'></div>独公谓「机会难猝致，本根当牢持，诸所兴为，不宜以空意忤敌」，公私恳切，始末至到。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286245_comment'></div>上感公忠实，久而顺听，然后大言迎附者稍复衰息，风俗浸向淳厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286245_comment'></div>而自淳熙接内禅二十馀年，天下安乐无事，中外讴歌至今，由公发之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286245_comment'></div>两预政，终不取相位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286245_comment'></div>退归僧榻，食才数溢米。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286245_comment'></div>萧然永日，风操绝俗远甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286245_comment'></div>三子，伯尚书，季侍郎，中子官差不遂，犹至卿少，皆有业尚名称著于世，而诸孙材贤矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286245_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286245_comment'></div>教以约而类者众，受以薄而与之丰，天非偏厚李氏，盖亦其理然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286245_comment'></div>余不及从参政后，而与三子蹑履迹于朝会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286245_comment'></div>少卿之孤仁本以铭墓来请，因窃用常所论叙者为书首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286245_comment'></div>少卿讳浃，字兼善，有夙成之度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286245_comment'></div>少游太学，诸生畏其能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286245_comment'></div>授承务郎，监淮西惠民局。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286245_comment'></div>复<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1286245", 1286245, "Clauses/51/Comments/0")'>锁厅试</span>礼部，词致瑰特，有司异之，曰执政子也，嫌弗敢上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286245_comment'></div>亲友交唁公，公叹曰：「吾既仕矣，学有大于此者，科目何为」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286245_comment'></div>自是不复求试，尽取诸书遍读，其兴坏因革一代之制，别自成编。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286245_comment'></div>而尤好《左氏》，为作《广诲蒙》，曰：「众宝所藏也，猎而有之在我矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286245_comment'></div>历干办军器所、国子监书库官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286245_comment'></div>书库在十年外，喜曰：「积是岁月，足以宁吾亲矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286245_comment'></div>期至，犹不忍行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286245_comment'></div>参政曰：「不然，今二孙已长，家问旦莫及，而尔兄弟结绶京师，吾意其少慰」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286245_comment'></div>公谢，勉出，监六部门，军器监主簿，太府丞，大宗正丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286245_comment'></div>再知严州，不行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286245_comment'></div>初，公在军器监，言：「造会子者二百人，放作则散处于外，稍久则兑卖名役，恣其自便，诲其为奸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286245_comment'></div>宜置营区聚，老而后代，死而后收」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286245_comment'></div>及外府，又言四弊：「戮伪造，一也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286245_comment'></div>立营房，二也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286245_comment'></div>纸纲出峡，重其防禁，无使售易，三也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286245_comment'></div>暂止印造，或出内库钱收换桩管以救低折之害，四也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286245_comment'></div>于时会子法未敝，而公之策如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286245_comment'></div>改知徽州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286245_comment'></div>寻提举浙东常平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286245_comment'></div>会稽督零税急，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1286245", 1286245, "Clauses/120/Comments/0")'>械系</span>满府县，值公摄帅，尽释之，士民歌呼，叉手至额曰：「真李参政儿也」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286245_comment'></div>以兵部郎召。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286245_comment'></div>枢密都承旨苏师旦，倚权利倾天下士，公独不往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286245_comment'></div>师旦病之，或曰：「可饵而致也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286245_comment'></div>迁枢密院检详文字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1286245_comment'></div>公固不往，晨入局会揖而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1286245_comment'></div>师旦怒，愬于专国者，徙将作监。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1286245_comment'></div>既而自为节度使，贺客成市，公又不往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1286245_comment'></div>专国者奇之，曰：「是负气有守，可尚已」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1286245_comment'></div>迁太府少卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1286245_comment'></div>公建言：「治世黜虚而务实，今挟虚竞伪者，酝成北伐之议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1286245_comment'></div>边事既坏矣，尚多<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_47_1286245", 1286245, "Clauses/152/Comments/0")'>夸诩</span>以误朝听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1286245_comment'></div>诋虏则以强为弱，以锐为怯；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1286245_comment'></div>誉己则以无为有，以少为多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1286245_comment'></div>上玩下怠，施置<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_50_1286245", 1286245, "Clauses/158/Comments/0")'>莽卤</span>，恐祸不可测。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1286245_comment'></div>愿亲札边臣，毋得以不根无实之语轻辄来上」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1286245_comment'></div>他日，白事宰相，又面论之，于是专国者亦怒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1286245_comment'></div>公因力请外，除直宝谟阁，福建运判。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1286245_comment'></div>在职二年，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_54_1286245", 1286245, "Clauses/170/Comments/0")'>孳孳</span>为民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1286245_comment'></div>苏谦者，建之凶豪，兵兴，席<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_55_1286245", 1286245, "Clauses/174/Comments/0")'>隅官</span>势，以杀人取<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_55_1286245", 1286245, "Clauses/175/Comments/0")'>赇赂</span>，屡移狱矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1286245_comment'></div>言路有为道地者，使刑部谕公以建储<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_56_1286245", 1286245, "Clauses/178/Comments/0")'>赦贷</span>之，公曰：「<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_56_1286245", 1286245, "Clauses/180/Comments/1")'>隅官</span>，监临也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1286245_comment'></div>受财，枉法也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1286245_comment'></div>庸可赦乎」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1286245_comment'></div>不许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1286245_comment'></div>刑部吏朱书符端曰：「台谏意也，勿误」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1286245_comment'></div>公大骇，亟具奏为吏借台谏以令者，举朝壮其为，竟投谦岭外而召公还，然卒排笮<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_61_1286245", 1286245, "Clauses/193/Comments/0")'>诬谰</span>，寝其命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1286245_comment'></div>公殊自喜，别墅有寒泉脩竹，留居之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1286245_comment'></div>以嘉定二年十一月二日卒，年五十八。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1286245_comment'></div>三年九月十一日，葬馀杭县茅山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1286245_comment'></div>夫人施氏、潘氏，赠宜人，四子：曰仁本，通直郎、新知南陵县；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1286245_comment'></div>曰仁方，承事郎、前知仁和县；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1286245_comment'></div>曰仁表，迪功郎、新海盐主簿；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1286245_comment'></div>曰仁元，通仕郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1286245_comment'></div>五女，迪功郎前乌程主簿张端节、从政郎新嘉兴府司法余㮤、迪功郎吉州龙泉主簿张恢、承务郎监江东总领所药局蒋杞为其婿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1286245_comment'></div>孙曰熙，曰勋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1286245_comment'></div>公文出新意，作<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_71_1286245", 1286245, "Clauses/218/Comments/0")'>生语</span>，致密<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_71_1286245", 1286245, "Clauses/219/Comments/0")'>简雅</span>，无刻露之态；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1286245_comment'></div>四六绝去数十百年体裁，切对顺偶，有若自然，圆行方止，不拘定质；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1286245_comment'></div>诗骚尤清婉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1286245_comment'></div>其馀弄笔<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_74_1286245", 1286245, "Clauses/227/Comments/0")'>率就</span>，皆有义趣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1286245_comment'></div>读者虽贵珍，莫能定其价，而公亦深自<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_75_1286245", 1286245, "Clauses/231/Comments/0")'>椟藏</span>，虽子弟不觌也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1286245_comment'></div>远斋，公燕居之斋也，故公自记之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1286245_comment'></div>其言曰：「心，远物也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1286245_comment'></div>利害得丧欲恶，若一尘之起其前，远者隔焉，心盖近物尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1286245_comment'></div>吾惧其然也，挥斥剔抉，使夫尘者不立而吾之远者日充，充而至于无所终极，方寸之微而有不可胜用矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1286245_comment'></div>嗟夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1286245_comment'></div>人常求所以悦是心者，未尝知所以病是心者，方将与利害得丧欲恶角立而并行，且竭力以奉之不暇焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1286245_comment'></div>有以是为尘而隔吾远哉，又乌有挥斥剔抉使是尘之不立而充吾远也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1286245_comment'></div>然则公能求所以病是心者而治之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1286245_comment'></div>其能难进，其能易退，其立德深，其去奸果，仰能承其先，俯能训其后，非偶然致者；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1286245_comment'></div>文字之工，不足为公道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1286245_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_86_1286245'>彼门地者，发身之秒；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1286245_comment'></div>彼词华者，得名之小。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1286245_comment'></div>贤哉兼善，清明自躬！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1286245_comment'></div>养心有本，聚学有宗。<div class='inline'
