id='poem_sentence_89_1286245_comment'></div>其在本朝，杰出特立；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1286245_comment'></div>其在四方，护善锄恶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1286245_comment'></div>岂不富贵，视若一尘；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1286245_comment'></div>我为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_93_1286245", 1286245, "Clauses/280/Comments/0")'>悚然</span>，思见其人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1286245_comment'></div>苕溪千里，湛其止止；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1286245_comment'></div>我不见兮，庶几在此。</div><div id='poem_sentence_95_1286245_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1210&endYear=1210')">1210年</a>　为林正仲撰墓志铭。作品：林正仲墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286221' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286221' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286221?labeling=true' target='_blank'>林正仲墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1210年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286221")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286221_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286221'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286221'>余为儿，嬉同县林元章家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286221_comment'></div>时邑俗质俭，屋宇财足，而元章新造广宅，东望海，西挹三港诸山，曲楼重坐，门牖<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1286221", 1286221, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>洞彻</span>，表以梧柳，槛以芍药，行者咸流睇延颈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286221_comment'></div>元章能敛喜散，乡党乐附。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286221_comment'></div>诸子自刻琢，聘请陈君举为师，一州文士毕至，正仲、懿仲皆登进士第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286221_comment'></div>正仲名颐叔，宽整有局量，朋友爱信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286221_comment'></div>为罗源主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286221_comment'></div>丧死者焚尸，糜其骨，众薰合和，凌风飘飏，命曰<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1286221", 1286221, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>升天</span>，以尤细为孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286221_comment'></div>正仲<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1286221", 1286221, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>雕文</span>禁止，治冢甓藏之，始变其俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286221_comment'></div>有以刃梃诬人至大辟，狱再岁不酬，正仲视之，文疮，且溺死也，一府称善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286221_comment'></div>移玉山丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286221_comment'></div>玉虹桥在市心，坏久，计费数百巨万，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1286221", 1286221, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>徒舆</span>缩手，正仲自与钱劝成之，至今为利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286221_comment'></div>辟监建康户部赡军库。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286221_comment'></div>元章卒，正仲哀毁成疾，未几亦卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286221_comment'></div>群弟环视，从容诵梦中语曰：「世衰道不沦，作者口兴起」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286221_comment'></div>因振手而诀，年四十九，时绍熙元年七月丙寅也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286221_comment'></div>以致仕恩迁通直郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286221_comment'></div>三年十月己酉，葬于北湖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286221_comment'></div>夫人叶氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286221_comment'></div>二子，子真、早夭；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286221_comment'></div>子普。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286221_comment'></div>长女为尼，次嫁项叔益。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286221_comment'></div>他日，子普谓余：「吾祖若祖母叔父，皆得当世名人为铭，独先人二十年铭未立，敢以请」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286221_comment'></div>始，元章奋独身，自致大家矣，而抑利务与，晚岁极淡薄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286221_comment'></div>正仲材富位狭，所至有纪；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286221_comment'></div>懿仲名渊叔，敏业精识，众尤以为当<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1286221", 1286221, "Clauses/79/Comments/0")'>远至</span>：然皆止于选人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286221_comment'></div>正仲死，子普方十岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286221_comment'></div>稍长，崇庵庐，辟墓道，异草秋荣，美槚寒碧，与余书词甚美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286221_comment'></div>懿仲诸孙亦早慧，同时中童子科，乡人甚以为宠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286221_comment'></div>夫五十年之远，盛衰能否未有不变者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286221_comment'></div>今其孙曾，塈昔墉，畎初畲，长立幼慕，滋厚于旧，岂非元章好善之报而正仲兄弟未报之泽欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286221_comment'></div>嗟夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286221_comment'></div>余既<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1286221", 1286221, "Clauses/101/Comments/0")'>耄衰</span>，而见元章四世矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286221_comment'></div>余不足悲，而元章之后益隆，可喜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286221_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_33_1286221'>望江之宅，其传无斁，元章之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286221_comment'></div>集云之阡，其久而新，正仲之贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286221_comment'></div>合二弥存，以蕃后昆，请视斯文。</div><div id='poem_sentence_35_1286221_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1211&endYear=1211')">1211年2月</a>　二月，永嘉四灵诗人徐照卒，为作墓志铭。作品：徐道晖墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286225' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286225' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286225?labeling=true' target='_blank'>徐道晖墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1211年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286225")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286225_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286225'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286225'>徐照，字道晖，永嘉人，自号山民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286225_comment'></div>嗜苦茗甚于饴蜜，手烹口啜无时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286225_comment'></div>上下山水，穿幽透深，弃日留夜，拾其胜会，向人<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1286225", 1286225, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>铺说</span>，无异好美色也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286225_comment'></div>有诗数百，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1286225", 1286225, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>斲思</span>尤奇，皆横绝歘起，冰悬雪跨，使读者变踔憀慄，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1286225", 1286225, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>肯首</span>吟叹不自已；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286225_comment'></div>然无异语，皆人所知也，人不能道尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286225_comment'></div>盖魏、晋名家，多发兴高远之言，少验物切近之实，及沈约、谢朓永明体出，士争效之，初犹甚艰，或仅得一<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1286225", 1286225, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>偶句</span>，便已名世矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286225_comment'></div>夫东字十馀，五色彰施，而律吕<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1286225", 1286225, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>相命</span>，岂易工哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286225_comment'></div>故善为是者，取成于心，寄妍于物，融会一法，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1286225", 1286225, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>涵受</span>万象，狶苓、桔梗，时而为帝，无不接节赴之，君尊臣卑，宾顺主穆，如丸投区，矢破的，此唐人之精也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286225_comment'></div>然厌之者，谓其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1286225", 1286225, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>纤碎</span>而害道，淫肆而乱雅，至于廷设九奏，广袖大舞，而反以浮响疑宫商，布缕缪组绣，则失其所以为诗矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286225_comment'></div>然则发今人未悟之机，回百年已废之学，使后复言唐诗自君始，不亦词人<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1286225", 1286225, "Clauses/57/Comments/0")'>墨卿</span>之一快也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286225_comment'></div>惜其不尚以年，不及臻乎开元、元和之盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286225_comment'></div>而君既死，同为唐诗者，徐玑字文渊，翁卷字灵舒，赵师秀字紫芝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286225_comment'></div>紫芝集常朋友殡且葬之，在塔山、林额两村间，嘉定四年闰月二十三日，距卒四十五日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286225_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_1286225'>诵其诗，其人可乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286225_comment'></div>身可没，墓不可无。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1286225_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1211&endYear=1211')">1211年5月</a>　转中奉大夫，五月提举江州太平兴国宫，至此始有祠奉，著述讲学，生活较为安定优裕。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1211&endYear=1211')">1211年6月</a>　六月，应友人黄岩林鼒之介，为其县令杨圭撰文。作品：利涉桥记。<div id='poem_1286130' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286130' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286130?labeling=true' target='_blank'>利涉桥记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1211年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286130")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286130_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286130'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286130'>嘉定四年二月，黄岩县浮桥成，林鼒叔和为其知县杨君言曰：「桥长千尺，籍舟四十，栏笝繂索，堤其两旁，梱图狻猊，讫三十旬，斥铁九千，木石二万五千，夫工六万馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286130_comment'></div>县东南车马据负，而客之途皆达于桥；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286130_comment'></div>西北樵采携挈，而民之市皆趋于桥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286130_comment'></div>诸公跨天台，陟雁荡，行过黄岩，皆喜曰：『增一桥矣』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286130_comment'></div>盖奔渡、争舟、倾覆、蹴蹋之患既免，而井屋之富，廛肆烟火，与桥相望不绝，甚可壮也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286130_comment'></div>古无而今有，难也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286130_comment'></div>桥于江之险，又难也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286130_comment'></div>台州有桥自唐守始，君一县作之，抗其力如州，倍难也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286130_comment'></div>愿子记以为君酬！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286130_comment'></div>余病未暇也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286130_comment'></div>叔和又言曰：「桥以未成为难，众人所知尔；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286130_comment'></div>以既成为难，君所自知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286130_comment'></div>今岁别一囷以待异日之缺，尚惧不足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286130_comment'></div>虽然，县籍坏七十年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286130_comment'></div>君聚田百万亩，算而步析之，更二载，始得经界之旧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286130_comment'></div>君之力虽尤难，而承其后者易矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286130_comment'></div>易则思，思无穷，而桥可恃以常存也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286130_comment'></div>愿并著之」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286130_comment'></div>余卧水心久，往来皆村野人语，不到门外，不知君材乃若是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286130_comment'></div>郑大夫非异人耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286130_comment'></div>举郑国解落整比，大效小验具于《春秋》，至捐一车，则天下以为笑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286130_comment'></div>彼溱、洧之易，视今之难奚百倍翅耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286130_comment'></div>岂古人于此则或有故欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286130_comment'></div>世常言「极今人所难，不足以进古人所易；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286130_comment'></div>而充古人所易，不能为今人所难」，何哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286130_comment'></div>叔和之论未余质也，可无为书！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286130_comment'></div>余少从叔和兄弟游，每为余言：「县直北山，爽气浮动，花柳之丽，雪月之胜，无不在江北」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286130_comment'></div>余间至程头，必徘徊<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1286130", 1286130, "Clauses/82/Comments/0")'>瞻顾</span>，辄阻江而返屡矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286130_comment'></div>今既施桥，而叔和与邑人日曳杖<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1286130", 1286130, "Clauses/85/Comments/0")'>娱嬉</span>于北山，潮生汐落，随江降升，悠然如泳汉浴沂，以咏歌令君之遗德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286130_comment'></div>而余已老，不复有四方之事，徒慨想而不能从也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286130_comment'></div>因附见之，亦以志余之不忘斯游尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286130_comment'></div>杨君名圭，字国瑞，建安人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286130_comment'></div>其来黄岩，监司固以材辟矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286130_comment'></div>是年六月日记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_33_1286130_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1211&endYear=1211')">1211年8月</a>　八月，作敬亭后记。<div id='poem_1286124' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286124' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286124?labeling=true' target='_blank'>敬亭后记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1211年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286124")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286124_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286124'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286124'>初，鲍商霖有屋于雁池，河南张思叔命曰敬亭，且记之，由此名闻天下百馀年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286124_comment'></div>亭废，归薛氏子舒，按旧基复作亭，刻记其上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286124_comment'></div>程氏诲学者必以敬为始，故思叔曰：「敬则实，实则虚，虚则无事矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286124_comment'></div>以余所闻，学有本始，如物始生，无不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1286124", 1286124, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>懋长</span>焉，不可强立也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286124_comment'></div>孔子教颜子「克己复礼为仁」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286124_comment'></div>请问其目，曰：「非礼勿视，非礼勿听，非礼勿言，非礼勿动」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286124_comment'></div>颜子曰：「回虽不敏，请事斯语矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286124_comment'></div>是则复礼者，学之始也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286124_comment'></div>教曾子曰：「安上治民莫善于礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286124_comment'></div>礼者，敬而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286124_comment'></div>故敬其父则子悦，敬其兄则弟悦，敬其君则臣悦，敬一人而千万人悦」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286124_comment'></div>是则敬者，德之成也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286124_comment'></div>学必始于复礼，故治其非礼者而后能复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286124_comment'></div>礼复而后能敬，所敬者寡而悦者众矣，则谓之无事焉可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286124_comment'></div>未能复礼而遽责以敬，内则不悦于己，外则不悦于人，诚行之则近愚，明行之则近伪；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286124_comment'></div>愚与伪杂，则礼散而事益繁，安得谓无！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286124_comment'></div>此教之失，非孔氏本旨也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286124_comment'></div>然则何为？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286124_comment'></div>曰：礼之未复，是身固非礼之聚尔，耳目百体瞿瞿然择其合乎礼者斯就之，故其视听言动必以礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286124_comment'></div>当孔子时，礼尚全完，勤苦用力，皆有条目可见也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286124_comment'></div>后世虽礼阙不具，然是身之非礼者固常在尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286124_comment'></div>出于己，加于人，小则纷错溃乱，大则烂漫充斥，盖若白黑一二之不可掩，其敢忽乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286124_comment'></div>故非礼则不以视听言动，而耳目百体瞿瞿然择其不合乎礼者期去之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286124_comment'></div>昼去之，夜去之，旦忘之，夕忘之，诚使非礼之豪发皆尽，则所存虽丘山焉，殆无往而不中礼也，是之谓礼复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286124_comment'></div>礼复而敬立矣，非强之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286124_comment'></div>因以补思叔之遗，为《敬亭后记》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286124_comment'></div>嘉定四年八月。</div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1286124_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1211&endYear=1211')">1211年9月</a>　九月，为张季樗撰行状。作品：宋故中散大夫提举武夷山冲佑观张公行状。<div id='poem_1286169' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286169' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286169?labeling=true' target='_blank'>宋故中散大夫提举武夷山冲佑观张公行状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1211年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286169")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286169_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286169'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286169'>公姓张氏，讳季樗，字延卿，温州府永嘉人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286169_comment'></div>幼入太学，用忠简公恩试吏部第一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286169_comment'></div>监临安府粮料院，迁敕令所删定官，司农寺丞，兼权仓部郎官，换工部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286169_comment'></div>皇子镇明州，选为司马，上面谕曰：「卿辅魏王，当如端□教朕也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286169_comment'></div>公拜谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286169_comment'></div>会有异议者，徙知潮州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286169_comment'></div>潮沐韩文公遗化，俗矜厉自喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286169_comment'></div>公仿古以便今，用刑甚简，崇雅黜陋，士民爱服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286169_comment'></div>提刑行部，贵倨甚，候迎累日不至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286169_comment'></div>公赋诗称「远地井蛙尊」以诮之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286169_comment'></div>提刑怒，深文劾公，公引诗自辨，上笑曰：「守臣不应骂监司耶」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286169_comment'></div>竟罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286169_comment'></div>起知南剑，犹坐前谩不行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286169_comment'></div>知沅州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286169_comment'></div>猺人屡入城邑，关通博买无忌，至滥恶抵负，而睚眦雠劫之祸移于平民，谓之「准把」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286169_comment'></div>公按旧法，重禁越界来往者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286169_comment'></div>有至市，则令都巡防监视，讫事各还，剽夺衰止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286169_comment'></div>公言：「都巡防与猺相持最苦，请三岁一补官，以责尽力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286169_comment'></div>土城才四里，高十二尺，如女垣尔，且用板屋，风漂雨淫，非所谓设险也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286169_comment'></div>请甃砖石，备楼橹，以期永久」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286169_comment'></div>又特起贡院，数延后进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286169_comment'></div>为言科甲可喜，而向于学者滋多矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286169_comment'></div>于是自总领以下，皆荐公宜留本朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286169_comment'></div>公自以离郎署二十年，故人无在者，力请外，得光州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286169_comment'></div>自光西南行，渐远淮流而就冈阜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286169_comment'></div>其树林岩石，幽茂<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1286169", 1286169, "Clauses/75/Comments/0")'>深阻</span>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1286169", 1286169, "Clauses/76/Comments/0")'>恍惚</span>隔尘世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286169_comment'></div>山如绣屏画卷，数里一合，水绀绿，随山方折<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1286169", 1286169, "Clauses/80/Comments/0")'>流转</span>，大声出雷霆，细声中琴瑟，盖江南名山水不能及，而土人以为梅林、沙窝，存著老幼处也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286169_comment'></div>公上言：「异日欲迁郡沙窝久矣，决迁之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286169_comment'></div>易守御，便储积，人心既固，可以牵制，可以进攻，此五利也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286169_comment'></div>请以城壁事付臣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286169_comment'></div>既而与商廷昌两易濠州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286169_comment'></div>濠人占地无顷亩之限，为后至冒耕，不较也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286169_comment'></div>暨田成而争讼林起，州县往往有所左右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286169_comment'></div>公独中分之，官私厌服，以公断为法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286169_comment'></div>初，公至郡，谍报「虏主祈太清宫，且窥边州」，人大恐，定远县逃奔几尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286169_comment'></div>公不为动，但遣承局趣取<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1286169", 1286169, "Clauses/112/Comments/0")'>子舍</span>，远近安之，亡者复还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286169_comment'></div>就知和州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286169_comment'></div>公之在光、濠，朝旨建广储仓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286169_comment'></div>他郡徒改桩积，立号名，惟公置敖贮米，如令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286169_comment'></div>军校死，必募善弓马事艺补之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286169_comment'></div>光有司马公祠，薙草为庭除，岁时率官属拜其下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1286169_comment'></div>其能实事不具文而名义兼举多此类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1286169_comment'></div>至和，首开三河，复胡昉故迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1286169_comment'></div>刬车蒺藜，火药傅镞，右辕左蓐，嗅地望尘，废关遗隘之要，无不预讲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1286169_comment'></div>然时论既将远讨，而疑公为平世守边者，故秩公以冲佑观，使自请而去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1286169_comment'></div>公亦倦游，不复求仕，凡续禄再三焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1286169_comment'></div>嘉泰四年闰二月二十二日平旦，盥洗索常食，食既，视瞻炯然，家人<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_46_1286169", 1286169, "Clauses/148/Comments/0")'>抃叫</span>曰：「起疾矣」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1286169_comment'></div>其日卒，年七十八。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1286169_comment'></div>自文林郎积官中散大夫，开国永嘉县男。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1286169_comment'></div>九月二十四日，葬瑞鹿西冈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1286169_comment'></div>夫人潘氏，封令人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1286169_comment'></div>男五人：曰燧，通直郎、福建舶司干官，先卒；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1286169_comment'></div>曰熺，儒林郎、新监行在点检赡军激赏酒库所籴场；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1286169_comment'></div>曰炳，从事郎、瓯宁县丞；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1286169_comment'></div>曰爟，迪功郎、常州州学教授；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1286169_comment'></div>曰燡，承奉郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1286169_comment'></div>女二人，其婿曰宣教郎、新建德知县潘桧，迪功郎、泉州录参叶春。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1286169_comment'></div>孙男曰坦，将仕郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1286169_comment'></div>曰均，曰垠；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1286169_comment'></div>曰墉，方以公致仕官之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1286169_comment'></div>曰墐，曰埏；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1286169_comment'></div>曰圯，登仕郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1286169_comment'></div>曰埙，曰堪，曰圻，曰垲，曰埈，曰坡，曰增，曰填，曰坱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1286169_comment'></div>孙女嫁承务郎木溶，次许嫁将仕郎鲍嵤，次许嫁进士周保之，馀幼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1286169_comment'></div>公志虑<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_64_1286169", 1286169, "Clauses/196/Comments/0")'>精密</span>，前后谋议数十上，事小大皆有成，画深而不迂，切而易从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1286169_comment'></div>言：「州县受纳盘量，常欲今岁出剩多去岁，商税增额必以一年最高比较。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1286169_comment'></div>彼安从得？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1286169_comment'></div>皆出于民耳」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1286169_comment'></div>又言：「民纳钱免役，而役不得免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1286169_comment'></div>今姑令见役保正长，免当界役钱可也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1286169_comment'></div>比可谓知忧民矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1286169_comment'></div>又请：「内外官奏对须指陈急务，不许泛引<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_71_1286169", 1286169, "Clauses/215/Comments/0")'>闲慢</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1286169_comment'></div>人已言者，宁复言之，期于必行而已」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1286169_comment'></div>此固知治体之论也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1286169_comment'></div>至言：「陛下无恃江为险，必守淮而后能守江。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1286169_comment'></div>修城增戍，所以守淮也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1286169_comment'></div>或曰：「增戍难在钱粮，移江置诸淮尔，何难！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1286169_comment'></div>且州郡不敢合教甚无谓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1286169_comment'></div>虏今日打猎，明日巡绰，率用千馀骑，岂虑警动我耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1286169_comment'></div>此又壮论异于人者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1286169_comment'></div>始忠简拒秦丞相，斥之，晚翊孝宗，终不肯取执政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1286169_comment'></div>公耳目陶染，故虽列省寺，无顾恋意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1286169_comment'></div>连挤于外，视后出捷起腾上，无恨望心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1286169_comment'></div>惟以家门素业为事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1286169_comment'></div>二子既登第，诲诸孙尤切。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1286169_comment'></div>书室纵横，与同卧起，休沐不使踰户限。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1286169_comment'></div>余每从公，见其动止有常节，得言语之味，乐而无荒，未尝不敬下风也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1286169_comment'></div>嘉定四年九月。</div><div id='poem_sentence_87_1286169_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1211&endYear=1211')">1211年12月10日</a>　十二月十日，妻高氏卒，年五十二。叶适悲恸，有祭文。作品：祭令人文。<div id='poem_1286338' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286338' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286338?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭令人文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1211年12月10日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286338")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286338_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286338'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286338'>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286338_comment'></div>子之物变周匝，不止于办一家；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286338_comment'></div>材明勇决，不止于了一身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286338_comment'></div>余寡偶而少徒，忽遇子而获亲，虽月艰而岁棘，常旦友而昏宾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286338_comment'></div>何虑之多而食之鲜，岂衣之敝而笥之新！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286338_comment'></div>动息先至，如鹤警分；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286338_comment'></div>尺寸自达，如苇涉津。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286338_comment'></div>竟复奚为，丘夷谷堙！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286338_comment'></div>哀哉悲夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286338_comment'></div>拔尘凡而高鶱，既罔滞于性灵；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286338_comment'></div>抚机关而远离，亦靡吝于情真。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286338_comment'></div>哀莫哀兮道无成，悲莫悲于事难平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286338_comment'></div>忆昔余疾屡绝，子誓以偕死；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286338_comment'></div>今子病亟往，余不如无生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286338_comment'></div>凛枯槎之介雪，噤野雁而吞声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286338_comment'></div>大块漫漫，谁浊谁清？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286338_comment'></div>昭此无昧，浩乎独行！</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1286338_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1211&endYear=1211')">1211年</a>　杨简知温州，与叶适有往来。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1211&endYear=1211')">1211年</a>　撰文记瑞安县重修县学。作品：瑞安县重修县学记。<div id='poem_1286129' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286129' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286129?labeling=true' target='_blank'>瑞安县重修县学记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1211年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286129")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286129_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286129'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286129'>昔刘君龟从宰瑞安，颇修学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286129_comment'></div>前记云：「糜镪二百万」，不薄矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286129_comment'></div>未久已浸敝，颓障堕级，栋扶梁拄，岌岌摇动，如坐漏舟中，邑人以为大惭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286129_comment'></div>顷岁谋于余，将自治之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286129_comment'></div>余曰：「止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286129_comment'></div>政在有司，非乡民所敢干也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286129_comment'></div>此岂佛、老氏室庐耶，又可醵而就乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286129_comment'></div>嘉定四年，黄君葵初领县，贯无赢铢，叹曰：「吾其舍旃」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286129_comment'></div>士之职于学者郑炎、陈观大趣赞曰：「愿尽力」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286129_comment'></div>费比昔十四，而学复壮好，如新成焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286129_comment'></div>凡吏之品有三：上者以学为吏，其次本于吏而学以饰之，下者苟吏，无饰也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286129_comment'></div>君始至即修学，视一邑之政，无先于学，斯知以学为吏欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286129_comment'></div>世之论吏亦有三：上者学成而能教，其次虽未能教而以政养民，下者无养，豕饲兽扰之尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286129_comment'></div>君知以学为吏，固不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1286129", 1286129, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>鄙慢</span>其民，教与养斯勉而进欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286129_comment'></div>世之论，常曰「吏必设学，而教且养人最急」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286129_comment'></div>不知吏当先自教且自养，急顾有甚于人者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286129_comment'></div>何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286129_comment'></div>彼虽知以学为吏，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1286129", 1286129, "Clauses/53/Comments/0")'>烛物</span>之智浅，察己之功不深，意则以教且养者厚民，实则以教且养者病民矣，乌得勉而进哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286129_comment'></div>且自一令长以上，所关于民，杀活成败，不可预测。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286129_comment'></div>若但竖数十屋而宫，群数十士而饭，而曰教养尽是矣，何其易也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286129_comment'></div>故明恕而多通，吏之所以自教；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286129_comment'></div>节廉而少欲，吏之所以自养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286129_comment'></div>少欲则民有馀力，多通则民有馀情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286129_comment'></div>然后推其所以自养者亦养人廉，推其所以自教者亦教人恕，此忠信礼义之俗所由起，而学之道所由明也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286129_comment'></div>余既嘉君能重学于先，故乐为君系其勉于学者于后。</div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1286129_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1211&endYear=1211')">1211年</a>　为陈景思撰墓铭。作品：焕章侍郎陈公墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286244' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286244' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286244?labeling=true' target='_blank'>朝请大夫主管冲佑观焕章侍郎陈公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1211年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286244")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286244_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286244'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286244'>思诚名景思，姓陈氏，信州弋阳人，用祖丞相文正公恩补承奉郎，监平江府粮料院。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286244_comment'></div>光宗初即位，诏天下言事，思诚甫踰冠，上十事，多一时要切。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286244_comment'></div>授淮东总领所干办事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286244_comment'></div>光宗不豫，定省礼阙，百官更谏，思诚亦引李唐山人语极论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286244_comment'></div>任职廉善，总领荐其材，与籍田令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286244_comment'></div>迁太府寺主簿，序本寺丞，迁宗正丞，兼金部郎，谒告，视兄疾于当涂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286244_comment'></div>兄卒，不忍复朝，乞知衢州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286244_comment'></div>未至，除将作少监兼尚右郎，删修敕令，就为监。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286244_comment'></div>除直秘阁，两浙转运判官，升副使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286244_comment'></div>故事，运司虽名察两路，其实内不过应办宫禁，外往来部舟护虏使客而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286244_comment'></div>及思诚，所至则延问穷民；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286244_comment'></div>遮道<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1286244", 1286244, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>词牒</span>，皆灼见<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1286244", 1286244, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>廋隐</span>，予夺中情，百姓骇叹云，「前此未尝也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286244_comment'></div>为杭学筑门设戟，仪比他州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286244_comment'></div>置钱塘左选监渡，谨视重载覆溺者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286244_comment'></div>管内受输多取者，预催者，催已倚阁者，皆禁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286244_comment'></div>诉水旱而过限勿禁也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286244_comment'></div>民所愿得辄来请，思诚必议所以推行之，皆曰「方知有运使矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286244_comment'></div>内引奏事，言：「镇江府<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1286244", 1286244, "Clauses/59/Comments/1")'>折罗</span>虚额当罢，绍兴府和买额重当减。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286244_comment'></div>夫国之根本在州县，州县根本在民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286244_comment'></div>欲裕民力，当宽州县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286244_comment'></div>今猥云裕民，而急州县若星火，视其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1286244", 1286244, "Clauses/67/Comments/0")'>敝坏</span>如髦蛮，此诲使病民尔，非裕之也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286244_comment'></div>思诚美仪观，音吐融畅，上固<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1286244", 1286244, "Clauses/72/Comments/0")'>耸听</span>，因问其家世，思诚奏：「大父康伯，相高宗，值逆亮送死，竭臣子力，赖累圣威灵，幸而破虏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286244_comment'></div>临内禅，特诏定策，自请退休，得守乡社。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286244_comment'></div>都人称赞曰：『所谓衣锦昼行者也』」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286244_comment'></div>上益喜，书「归锦堂」三字赐之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286244_comment'></div>寻又赐服三品，内出金带令系。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286244_comment'></div>又进直焕章阁，迁太府卿，兼夏官侍郎，时开禧元年二月也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286244_comment'></div>初，用事者专国久，规钓奇功，威服内外，术不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1286244", 1286244, "Clauses/99/Comments/0")'>素讲</span>，而先事<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1286244", 1286244, "Clauses/100/Comments/0")'>挑敌</span>，在廷不获闻，思诚闻而未察也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286244_comment'></div>一日，集侍从官议虏移文，变色叱咤曰：「国耻未报也，彼乃以近事责我，盍遂正名乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286244_comment'></div>众相顾皇恐，对不坚决，思诚曰：「昔孝宗虑此久矣，迟回二十馀年，终不敢发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286244_comment'></div>惧发不胜，则安危存亡之所从分也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286244_comment'></div>今财窘兵穷，贪将<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1286244", 1286244, "Clauses/118/Comments/0")'>朘剥</span>，外约难信，内心弗齐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286244_comment'></div>且辛巳之役，只劳师一项，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1286244", 1286244, "Clauses/123/Comments/0")'>倾倒</span>经费，遗患至今。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286244_comment'></div>征伐重事也，后不可悔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286244_comment'></div>悔而复和，耻益甚尔，何报之有」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286244_comment'></div>用事者与思诚亲，冀其助己，至是大怒，亟命提举玉局观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286244_comment'></div>明年，兵四出，月馀已溃散，略皆如所言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286244_comment'></div>知镇江府，固辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286244_comment'></div>移江西运副。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286244_comment'></div>岁荒，流殍<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1286244", 1286244, "Clauses/142/Comments/0")'>系路</span>，而官籴至四十万，甚急。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286244_comment'></div>思诚通借有无，命州县无敢遏籴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1286244_comment'></div>喻寺观憩徙者，死为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1286244", 1286244, "Clauses/148/Comments/0")'>瘗藏</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1286244_comment'></div>发桩管旧积见纳令住输。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1286244_comment'></div>饥民赖以活，而官籴亦告备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1286244_comment'></div>市人时其出，设芗华敬礼之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1286244_comment'></div>既而虏再求盟，用事者以罪死，思诚前议虽户晓，犹坐亲嫌例罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1286244_comment'></div>二年，得冲佑观，起有日矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1286244_comment'></div>先时豫章火，思诚亲救扑，因感寒疾，时作时止，遂剧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1286244_comment'></div>以嘉定三年五月二日卒，年四十三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1286244_comment'></div>上惜之，命复直焕章阁致仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1286244_comment'></div>四年十一月八日，殡铅山县仁义乡杨原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1286244_comment'></div>夫人汤氏，封宜人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1286244_comment'></div>子曰橐，曰梁，皆将仕郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1286244_comment'></div>思诚<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_53_1286244", 1286244, "Clauses/177/Comments/0")'>竞朗</span>通达，而以门阀自畏，问学师友，出于嗜欲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1286244_comment'></div>余客钱塘，不择晨暮过，疑难填臆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1286244_comment'></div>至其舍，论辨<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_55_1286244", 1286244, "Clauses/185/Comments/0")'>从横</span>，僮御必旰食而返。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1286244_comment'></div>为僚于徐，夜失睡者再三矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1286244_comment'></div>朱公之在建安，接牍续简无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_57_1286244", 1286244, "Clauses/190/Comments/0")'>旷时</span>，远质方闻，遍扣尊老，不以寒畯为间也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1286244_comment'></div>攻伪既日峻，士<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_58_1286244", 1286244, "Clauses/195/Comments/0")'>重足</span>不自保，浮薄者以时论相恐喝，思诚每为所亲正说不忌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1286244_comment'></div>与朱公书，具言其无他，公答曰：「其然其然！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1286244_comment'></div>韩丈于我本无怨恶，我于韩丈亦何嫌猜乎」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1286244_comment'></div>所亲见之，意大折。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1286244_comment'></div>道学不遂废，思诚力为多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1286244_comment'></div>边事将作，思诚谂故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1286244_comment'></div>余告以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_64_1286244", 1286244, "Clauses/210/Comments/0")'>立说</span>有先后，定计有始末，无误也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1286244_comment'></div>思诚复言：「虏衰有徵矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1286244_comment'></div>余又告以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_66_1286244", 1286244, "Clauses/215/Comments/0")'>鱼烂瓦解</span>，其实未见，今外弱而形饥，非也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1286244_comment'></div>思诚悟曰：「决矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1286244_comment'></div>先生当知我为不预人事者」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1286244_comment'></div>未几，果以议不合去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1286244_comment'></div>嗟夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1286244_comment'></div>广学而壹好，如思诚之厚其本，鲜矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1286244_comment'></div>至于以民为贵而聚其所欲，以去为轻而行其所知，则又今世之难能焉，使稔于岁以究其成，殆庶几哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1286244_comment'></div>始，湖北提举直秘阁名安节，长子曰景参，字守约，次即思诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1286244_comment'></div>母福国太夫人韩氏，贤而早寡，课二子，释纨绮，饱疏稗，勤苦惜日，故皆有名誉登进，同时华宠矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1286244_comment'></div>不十年，相继<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_75_1286244", 1286244, "Clauses/247/Comments/0")'>殒落</span>，福国安命委数，无甚过之哀，独计曰：「吾儿未有铭」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1286244_comment'></div>使梁来请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1286244_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1286244_comment'></div>思诚万钟养其母，顺道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1286244_comment'></div>今拽石寘冢间，奈何累老人耶！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1286244_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_80_1286244'>美哉绍、隆名相孙，中兴十事八九存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1286244_comment'></div>骥称其德扬和銮，玉以受治成玙璠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1286244_comment'></div>担簦问俗裘絮温，奋袂决策风霆奔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1286244_comment'></div>亦既上升拱帝尊，胡乃下斥游杨原！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1286244_comment'></div>天不与年人道昏，母悲子啼记斯文。</div><div id='poem_sentence_84_1286244_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1212&endYear=1212')">1212年1月2日</a>　一月二日，永嘉薛绍卒，为撰墓志铭。作品：中奉大夫太常少卿直秘阁致仕薛公墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286246' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286246' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286246?labeling=true' target='_blank'>中奉大夫太常少卿直秘阁致仕薛公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1212年1月2日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286246")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286246_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286246'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286246'>初，公由少奉常领祠官，至再焉，未七十，屡自请，以直秘阁致仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286246_comment'></div>家有司马文正公真率约，按<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1286246", 1286246, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>旧事</span>，率年及六十者行之，余亦预往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286246_comment'></div>公园池不多，而花草疏阔，游止自在；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286246_comment'></div>楼甚低小，而江山隐约可识；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286246_comment'></div>书画精粗杂，而观者各有取；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286246_comment'></div>惟灵壁石旧物也，相与考击为乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286246_comment'></div>如是岁一遍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286246_comment'></div>不幸客衰残多病，相继死数人，诸公悲痛，自为集，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1286246", 1286246, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>锡麻</span>带绖而哭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286246_comment'></div>吊者避席曰：「真率翁来矣」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286246_comment'></div>余因戏谓：「是率者，率人于死而非以难夫老也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286246_comment'></div>既而公亦病，真率竟废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286246_comment'></div>嘉定五年正月二日，公卒，年七十四。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286246_comment'></div>十二月壬午，葬清凉山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286246_comment'></div>嗟夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286246_comment'></div>岂天于闲退之乐不轻与，而昔之寿考强力，特偶然聚而非可齐耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286246_comment'></div>公讳绍，字承之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286246_comment'></div>其先自河东徙闽长溪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286246_comment'></div>有令之者，仕唐至右补阙，人以其廉，号其居廉村。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286246_comment'></div>廉村之后，为永嘉人，薛氏大于永嘉三百年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286246_comment'></div>公<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1286246", 1286246, "Clauses/51/Comments/0")'>魁重</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1286246", 1286246, "Clauses/51/Comments/1")'>凝特</span>，造次不以词色自达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286246_comment'></div>而诚意内充，与之游久者，皆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1286246", 1286246, "Clauses/55/Comments/0")'>厌然</span>心服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286246_comment'></div>登乾道二年进士第，授台州推官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286246_comment'></div>州用急，酿者满城，几无榷矣，陈守岩肖忧不知所出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286246_comment'></div>公曰：「易耳」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286246_comment'></div>命彻旧帘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286246_comment'></div>有自<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1286246", 1286246, "Clauses/65/Comments/0")'>门堂</span>来言：「薛推官新酒，美而贱」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286246_comment'></div>相传遍一郡，饮于家者悉从官市。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286246_comment'></div>众垆束手，榷缗十倍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286246_comment'></div>更事向守汋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286246_comment'></div>向老吏，检御有绳尺，尤器公，以为能继己。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286246_comment'></div>余从公游，前后口汋数十不置，知公有得于汋也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286246_comment'></div>监车辂院，知鄱阳县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286246_comment'></div>讼日千数，令故不訾省，争气怫郁，簪笔走诸司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286246_comment'></div>公曰：「息争莫如理讼」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286246_comment'></div>至常夜丙，须发为白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286246_comment'></div>太守所遣卒诟于庭，公囚之，守怒，罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286246_comment'></div>民挽公流涕曰：「知州岂重一兵轻百姓耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286246_comment'></div>知宜春县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286246_comment'></div>前知县有柯长卿，邑人纪之，故称前柯后薛云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286246_comment'></div>通判无为军，摄和州，积宽剩籴米馀十万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286246_comment'></div>绍熙五年，岁饥，赖以无死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1286246_comment'></div>知真州，提举浙西常平茶盐，就迁提刑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1286246_comment'></div>有窃富人婢以逃，其家谓「主杀吾女」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1286246_comment'></div>州县以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_43_1286246", 1286246, "Clauses/111/Comments/0")'>成狱</span>至，公却之，曰：「安有杀人而无验者」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1286246_comment'></div>未几，婢果自诣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1286246_comment'></div>除户部郎，淮东总领，迁太府少卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1286246_comment'></div>且满，难其代，复留年馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1286246_comment'></div>召为太常少卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1286246_comment'></div>淮东用盐饷军，务场趁卖无法，率以钞当钱冒赏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1286246_comment'></div>至公，常卖实钱，三年间增多三百二十万贯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1286246_comment'></div>执政骇异，莫知用何术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1286246_comment'></div>谢丞相从容问公，公具有实言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1286246_comment'></div>丞相叹咨良久，指其榻曰：「此公坐处也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1286246_comment'></div>而深甫叨之，过矣」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1286246_comment'></div>公既谢所引，而于韩太师侘胄未有纳也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1286246_comment'></div>异日，从陵下归，韩曰：「陵树比前殊苍苍耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1286246_comment'></div>公答：「陵庙至重，非被使，何敢觇！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1286246_comment'></div>树有盛衰，不可考。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1286246_comment'></div>然顷见吏云：『补种若干，今青活若干矣』」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1286246_comment'></div>韩悒然止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1286246_comment'></div>忽又言：「少卿来几何时？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1286246_comment'></div>亦何欲」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1286246_comment'></div>公但喏喏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1286246_comment'></div>退，亟辞于谢，遂行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1286246_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1286246_comment'></div>公不自结于韩而自必于去，其中盖有所守，世固未察也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1286246_comment'></div>又，公乞谢事时，钱丞相素厚公，留公，许用公，公卒不改以就，其执信如此，人亦未知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1286246_comment'></div>秩累中奉大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1286246_comment'></div>夫人洪氏，封令人，先公卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1286246_comment'></div>子曰师岩，南剑州司理；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1286246_comment'></div>曰龟从，湖州司法；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1286246_comment'></div>曰岷，武当军推官；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1286246_comment'></div>曰师武，监隆兴府税务；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1286246_comment'></div>曰师睿，早卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1286246_comment'></div>龟从及己未第，而岷国子监所解进士也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1286246_comment'></div>长女为道士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1286246_comment'></div>曰监省仓上界门林士尹，曰建康府录事参军黄时宪，婿也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1286246_comment'></div>初，公在真州，有倡单，流涕言其祖仕先朝为谏臣长，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_77_1286246", 1286246, "Clauses/198/Comments/0")'>坠落</span>致此，无面见日月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1286246_comment'></div>公物其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_78_1286246", 1286246, "Clauses/200/Comments/0")'>世出</span>，诘其弟昆，皆是，亦流涕，饶与钱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1286246_comment'></div>洪令人捐簪珥裯褥，择士人嫁之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1286246_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_80_1286246'>薛氏之茔，清凉之麓；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1286246_comment'></div>千尺飞流，百寻老木。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1286246_comment'></div>有美一人，薜裳笋冠；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1286246_comment'></div>自种小草，即山而盘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1286246_comment'></div>山既<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_84_1286246", 1286246, "Clauses/216/Comments/0")'>深幽</span>，草亦茂好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1286246_comment'></div>人兮不留，噫铭是考！</div><div id='poem_sentence_85_1286246_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1212&endYear=1212')">1212年1月</a>　正月辛酉，平阳陈岘卒，叶适有挽词。作品：陈侍郎挽词。<div id='poem_79970' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_79970' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/79970?labeling=true' target='_blank'>陈侍郎挽词</a><span class='authorDate'>（1212年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_79970")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_79970_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_79970'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_79970'>生死悲欢地，长嗟付短吟。<div id='poem_sentence_0_79970_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_79970'>北门晨鹊趁，西甸晚鸦寻。<div id='poem_sentence_1_79970_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_79970'>三品官名重，千年墓色深。<div id='poem_sentence_2_79970_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_79970'>广东正思忆，泪激海潮音。<div id='poem_sentence_3_79970_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_79970'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_79970_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1212&endYear=1212')">1212年3月</a>　三月，友人沈有开卒，为作墓志。作品：朝请大夫直龙图阁致仕沈公墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286261' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286261' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286261?labeling=true' target='_blank'>朝请大夫直龙图阁致仕沈公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1212年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286261")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286261_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286261'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286261'>嘉定五年三月朏，越明日，朝请大夫、直龙图阁沈公卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286261_comment'></div>于是宜人强氏殁十三年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286261_comment'></div>五子，二女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286261_comment'></div>子曰烨、曰乡贡进士焯、曰嫁承直郎扈武者亦已卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286261_comment'></div>十二月晦，进武校尉杰，从事郎、监提领所籴场门焘，迪功郎、监镇江府东比较务然，免解进士王唐卿，葬公于开元乡管社山，与强氏同藏，而使来请铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286261_comment'></div>沈氏自汉以后，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1286261", 1286261, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>冠冕</span>名闻之盛，代不绝于乌程，公六世祖遇，始别居常州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286261_comment'></div>至曾祖宗道，犹未能以仕显。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286261_comment'></div>至王父复、考松年及公，皆中进士第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286261_comment'></div>复为朝奉大夫，松年登太学为博士，而公教授处州，掌刑工部架阁文字，国子录，太学博士，枢密院编修官兼实录院检讨官，秘书丞，著作郎，赞读嘉王府兼兵部郎官，迁起居舍人，起居郎，皆兼侍讲，有位有贤，相继益章，然后无锡之沈始亢其大宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286261_comment'></div>公讳有开，字应先，少学，志其大者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286261_comment'></div>张钦夫、吕伯恭官京师，浙西士不知敬，公独从之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286261_comment'></div>薛士隆、陈君举客于毗陵，公又从之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286261_comment'></div>心为范防，物为经制，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1286261", 1286261, "Clauses/51/Comments/0")'>脉理</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1286261", 1286261, "Clauses/51/Comments/1")'>灌输</span>，而不以文字华藻给口耳之求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286261_comment'></div>人视之愦愦，而公<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1286261", 1286261, "Clauses/54/Comments/0")'>陶然</span>有以自乐，不顾也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286261_comment'></div>盖晚乃奏上舍名，朝廷方选旧人使教国子，而公在焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286261_comment'></div>竟讲，下帘重扉深拒，未尝妄请谒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286261_comment'></div>留丞相异之，唤语揖坐，常耸听移日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286261_comment'></div>当是时，丞相患淳熙末知名士不采察而沈废于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1286261", 1286261, "Clauses/66/Comments/0")'>贱冗</span>，数年间<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1286261", 1286261, "Clauses/67/Comments/0")'>拔用</span>几尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286261_comment'></div>士<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1286261", 1286261, "Clauses/68/Comments/0")'>欢喜</span>诵说，以为自赵元镇、陈应求才有此尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286261_comment'></div>丞相既得誉于天下，而公阴赞密请，力尤多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286261_comment'></div>天下虽知公助之，而莫知其所以进者何人；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286261_comment'></div>公默不以语人，虽子弟亦莫知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286261_comment'></div>然不悦者固已忌公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286261_comment'></div>及教嘉邸，反覆深切，尤详于君子小人之际，则忌益甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286261_comment'></div>上即位，欲习知国家事，故宫僚二三人日再宣，引入禁中赐坐，问民疾苦，皆非前例所有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286261_comment'></div>由是忌者合势相与排公，最先罢；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286261_comment'></div>又以危语中之，坐废斥十年，公恬不为动。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286261_comment'></div>已而稍悔寤，使知徽州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286261_comment'></div>不得已强起，屡求去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286261_comment'></div>奉使江东，迎吏守门迫公行，固不往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286261_comment'></div>复以知太平州，遂乞致仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286261_comment'></div>又几十年，年七十九而后卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286261_comment'></div>其居家，无酒肴燕舞，僮奴衰落。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286261_comment'></div>终日整坐，间行视园中草木。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286261_comment'></div>所从惟耆年久故；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286261_comment'></div>南北之过宾及有职任于时者，皆辞以老病，不见也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286261_comment'></div>嗟夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286261_comment'></div>士非不欲自贤也，迷谬于趋舍操术之异，颠沛于得丧忧乐之殊，壮而合，老而悖，而得其所谓贤者鲜矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286261_comment'></div>公学不衒于繁而能守其要；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286261_comment'></div>及其用也，不荣其身而思以畀其徒；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286261_comment'></div>终其老也，安以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1286261", 1286261, "Clauses/124/Comments/0")'>俭退</span>而无累于得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1286261_comment'></div>三者人之大节，而公兼之，斯其为贤也欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1286261_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_42_1286261'>苏、常中间，季子所国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1286261_comment'></div>地卑而为野兮，无锡之山缭而特；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1286261_comment'></div>水污而为泽兮，无锡之泉洌而食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1286261_comment'></div>允矣沈公，以配兹德。</div><div id='poem_sentence_45_1286261_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1212&endYear=1212')">1212年3月20日</a>　三月二十日，葬妻高氏于永嘉开元观后山，作墓志铭。作品：高令人墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286241' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286241' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286241?labeling=true' target='_blank'>高令人墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1212年3月20日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286241")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286241_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286241'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286241'>蒙城高氏，六岁，父为京山尉，能助其母；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286241_comment'></div>思父辄涕泣，父归乃已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286241_comment'></div>从知象山县，父思虑所不及，必左右之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286241_comment'></div>为余妻，赁舍甚贫，闭一閒，终日不闻声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286241_comment'></div>亲馔粥饭十馀盘，鱼肉鲑菜略具，人或以为难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286241_comment'></div>官视禄上下，月储以奉舅，次伯叔群从，无馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286241_comment'></div>所食者，太湖葱、城东菘芥尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286241_comment'></div>服饰进止常俨然，见者皆尚其华整，不知其敝故洗刷而然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286241_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1286241", 1286241, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>晚岁</span>，三子始育，始有宅居，稍垦田，不市籴，然自处一如其初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286241_comment'></div>盖其刚简无欲，余所惮；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286241_comment'></div>其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1286241", 1286241, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>静密</span>有智，余所服；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286241_comment'></div>其多能而易解，缓急中程，识事本末，大抵余所资以为家也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286241_comment'></div>嘉定四年十二月初十日，年五十二卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286241_comment'></div>五年三月二十日，葬开元观后山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286241_comment'></div>余观自古特立独行之士，无所复望于世，而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1286241", 1286241, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>旅泊</span>其身以苟免者，固已众矣，是不足悲也，然而岂亦不有夫顺亲和戚之属而为之托焉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286241_comment'></div>今余非敢谓特立而独行也，然既老而休，且病且衰，旦暮且尽，而高氏迫不余待，遂弃余，以是使余无顺亲和戚而为之托也，是亦不足悲乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286241_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_1286241'>千世之远兮，百年之长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286241_comment'></div>天宽而地阔兮，此为何祥。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1286241_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1212&endYear=1212')">1212年</a>　为妻作祭文。作品：祭内子令人文。<div id='poem_1286368' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286368' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286368?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭内子令人文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1212年）</span><span class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286368_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286368'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286368'>世言夫妇，盖有等差，子于妇职，得之实多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286368_comment'></div>外直内正，无一邪曲，我每敬愧，自消其欲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286368_comment'></div>私愿既然，使有中寿，侃侃雍雍，家道可久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286368_comment'></div>自子之逝，宣姜别随，宓滞下夭，三嫂径归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286368_comment'></div>我病大热，傫然枯峙，斯命也欤，抑天所弃？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286368_comment'></div>开元之阳，缭其玄圹，童兮若孩，迟我同往。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1286368_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1212&endYear=1212')">1212年</a>　代子作祭文。作品：代子祭令人文。<div id='poem_1286369' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286369' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286369?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代子祭令人文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1212年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286369")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286369_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286369'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286369'>某仅脱童丱，识未及远。<div id='poem_sentence_2_1286369_comment'></div>何图一朝，割裂至此！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286369_comment'></div>彼永存者，无形无声；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286369_comment'></div>痛哉！</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1286369_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1212&endYear=1212')">1212年9月25日</a>　九月二十五，门人厉仲方卒于邵州贬所，年五十四，叶适深为惋惜，作祭文。作品：祭厉约父文。<div id='poem_1286339' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286339' class='poemTitle class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286339'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286339'>呜呼哀哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286339_comment'></div>行学忘家，经营博浃，三场甚工，一第可蹑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286339_comment'></div>用此取获，安坐运筹，以短议人，于己曷尤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286339_comment'></div>奚其两图，并习孙武，虽得俊科，已失故步。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286339_comment'></div>箭插于腰，马行翩翾，按则抵掌，势则当然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286339_comment'></div>湘山之长，湘水之远，招子而来，留子不返。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286339_comment'></div>噫母啼矣，泪尽目乾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286339_comment'></div>噫友悲矣，气折鼻酸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286339_comment'></div>《诗》应绝吟，《易》应罢训。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286339_comment'></div>万感都消，百殒谁愠！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286339_comment'></div>扶柩复宇，上恩如春。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286339_comment'></div>魂将无同，我语或闻。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1286339_comment'></div></div></div><br class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286370'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286370'>噫嘻！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286370_comment'></div>汝其幼成耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286370_comment'></div>汝幼既能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1286370", 1286370, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>率礼</span>，长必能行义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286370_comment'></div>教以良师，如护珠玉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286370_comment'></div>日望成立，如养苗稼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286370_comment'></div>何物怪病，如追寇雠，我但迷痴，莫敢挽夺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286370_comment'></div>方葬汝母，俄丧汝生，哭泪纵横，同口异说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286370_comment'></div>汝其误□□□事虽粗，脆而难持。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286370_comment'></div>我欲合之，彼固离之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286370_comment'></div>我欲成之，彼固败之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286370_comment'></div>我身无坚，变化则宜；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286370_comment'></div>念汝何罪，今也并罹！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286370_comment'></div>我汝绝同，振手于兹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286370_comment'></div>哀哉！</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1286370_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1212&endYear=1212')">1212年</a>　平阳薛疑之卒，有挽词。作品：薛君季常挽词。<div id='poem_80044' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_80044' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/80044?labeling=true' target='_blank'>薛君季常挽词</a><span class='authorDate'>（1212年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: id='poem_content_80044'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_80044'>汨罗谩陨离骚经，伊洛源流今更清。<div id='poem_sentence_0_80044_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_80044'>自别三年无信息，忽惊一日有铭旌。<div id='poem_sentence_1_80044_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_80044'>乾坤未放虚空坏，蛮触犹须事业成。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1212&endYear=1212')">1212年</a>　杨简迁驾部员外郎，离开温州，叶适致书与别。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1212&endYear=1212')">1212年</a>　应台州知州黄子耕之请，作文。作品：上蔡先生祠堂记。<div id='poem_1286126' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286126' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286126?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上蔡先生祠堂记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1212年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286126")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286126_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286126'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286126'>谢良佐，字显道，受业二程，与游酢定夫、杨时中立，皆为高弟，号上蔡先生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286126_comment'></div>学者宗其传，谓颜、冉复见也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286126_comment'></div>不幸遭党人禁锢，未解而卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286126_comment'></div>诸子避虏迸逸，一死楚，一死闽，独克念者，落台州，绍兴六年，给事中朱震子发奏官之，寻亦死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286126_comment'></div>克念有子偕，偕三子，无衣食，替人承符，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1286126", 1286126, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>引养</span>老母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286126_comment'></div>嘉定五年，太守黄㽦子耕修郡志，访求故家得之，请见，抗宾主礼，给冠带钱米，买田宅，祠显道于学，在二程后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286126_comment'></div>郡人惊异曰：「自黄太守来，他日邦赋之没于群奸者一收敛，公使之消于妄费者悉减节，遂能以其馀兴小学，作棂星门，增大学生食，服有珩韠，器有罍簠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286126_comment'></div>又设潜火，立养济，葬丛骸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286126_comment'></div>政通化达，生死润赖，此吾等所知也，惟上蔡事不可解」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286126_comment'></div>甚或嗤笑曰：「奚不切若是哉」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286126_comment'></div>夫意有远近，知有难易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286126_comment'></div>《诗》曰：「烝我髦士」，近也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286126_comment'></div>又曰：「续古之人」，远也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286126_comment'></div>兴小学，近而易知也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286126_comment'></div>祠上蔡，远而难解乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286126_comment'></div>道非人不行，不行而天地之理不章，古今大患也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286126_comment'></div>先王比联闾附而教其人，不敢薄也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286126_comment'></div>然其致道而成材者，几绝都旷国不一遇焉，故尊之贵之，珍之重之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286126_comment'></div>哀其死也，尸祝以神之，禄位以延之，更世千百犹未也，盖公之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286126_comment'></div>若使人奋其私智，家操乎异说，各不相统，而以己之气血所胜者为善，则道德坏而义理灭矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286126_comment'></div>解子耕之举者，宜曰：「独上蔡事尤长，非不切也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286126_comment'></div>昔正考父饘粥于鼎，循墙而走，其后孔子生，而孟僖子命其子学礼焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286126_comment'></div>谢氏之困于庸奴久矣，子耕既<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1286126", 1286126, "Clauses/90/Comments/0")'>洗沐</span>之，列于士大夫，安知无达人出，复佐二程之道！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286126_comment'></div>斯可以占天意矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286126_comment'></div>然则余之不切不愈甚乎！</div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1286126_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1212&endYear=1212')">1212年</a>　应同安县令门人毛当时之请，作文。作品：同安县学朱先生祠堂记。<div id='poem_1286127' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286127' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286127?labeling=true' target='_blank'>同安县学朱先生祠堂记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1212年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286127")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286127_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286127'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286127'>初，新安先生朱公为同安县主簿，今知县事毛君当时祀公学宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286127_comment'></div>昔孔子既<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1286127", 1286127, "Clauses/3/Comments/2")'>修述</span>尧、舜、三代纪法垂后世，而黄、老、申、韩之流亦各自为书，学者荡析<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1286127", 1286127, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>畔离</span>，苟私所受，未有博探详考，务合本统也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286127_comment'></div>及董仲舒稍推明之，与人主意合，则杂家异学始绌，而归壹于孔氏矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286127_comment'></div>姑设禄利驱縻使从，岂道德果尽信哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286127_comment'></div>故经师句生无有知者，徒为短狭，蔽大义而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286127_comment'></div>独司马迁采《论语》，发明孟子不言利，为传世家；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286127_comment'></div>孔安国解古文《论语》；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286127_comment'></div>扬雄数称颜渊，笃好孟轲；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286127_comment'></div>小戴集记《大学》、《中庸》，郑玄并注之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286127_comment'></div>《孟子》有赵岐，《论语》又有何晏；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286127_comment'></div>韩愈、李翱，文人也，愈本曾参，翱尊子思矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286127_comment'></div>噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286127_comment'></div>二千年间，萌蘖汎滥，若存若亡，而大义之难明如此！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286127_comment'></div>则其博探详考，知本统所由，而后能标颜、曾、孟子为之传，揭《大学》、《中庸》为之教，语学者必曰：「不如是，不足达孔子之道也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286127_comment'></div>然后序次不差而道德几尽信矣，非程、张暨朱、吕数君子之力欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286127_comment'></div>今夫笺传衰歇，而士之聪明亦益以放恣，夷夏同指，科举<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1286127", 1286127, "Clauses/49/Comments/0")'>冒没</span>，浅识而深守，正说而伪受，交背于一室之内，而不以是心为残贼无几矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286127_comment'></div>余每见朱公<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1286127", 1286127, "Clauses/54/Comments/0")'>极辨</span>于毫釐之微，尤激切而殷勤，未尝不为之叹息也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286127_comment'></div>夫学莫熟于好，道莫成于乐，颜、曾、孟子所以潜其心也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286127_comment'></div>行莫如诚，止莫如善，《大学》、《中庸》所以致其义也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286127_comment'></div>夷佛，疾疢也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286127_comment'></div>科举，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1286127", 1286127, "Clauses/66/Comments/0")'>痒痾</span>也：公所甚惧也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286127_comment'></div>毛君尝与余学，去而宰同安，有惠政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286127_comment'></div>夫政之得民速，不如教之及民远也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1286127_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1212&endYear=1212')">1212年</a>　为晋元帝庙撰文。作品：晋元帝庙记。<div id='poem_1286128' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286128' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286128?labeling=true' target='_blank'>晋元帝庙记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1212年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286128")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286128_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286128'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286128'>城隍，晋元帝旧祠，孤寄寒窭，牲瘦酒薄，祝史<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1286128", 1286128, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>桀慢</span>，执吏<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1286128", 1286128, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>惰弛</span>，不记其王此土也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286128_comment'></div>嘉定五年，江淮制置使黄公作新庙于石头。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286128_comment'></div>初，卞壸侑食，嵇绍配焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286128_comment'></div>公谓「壸名辈后绍，当以序列，且均晋臣也」，因徙置庙东房。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286128_comment'></div>又谓「晋传四姓，常为中原共主，更七八巨寇不害其立，非用材致然耶」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286128_comment'></div>故设绘事两庑，起周顗迄谢玄二十人<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1286128", 1286128, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>表异</span>之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286128_comment'></div>又谓「王导、谢安，独晋所恃以存也」，故特像于庙西房。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286128_comment'></div>客或顾而嘻曰：「深乎是役也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286128_comment'></div>商、周之相，孚终迓衡，是以铭常勒鼎，烝从祫侑，示其不忘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286128_comment'></div>汉、唐陋矣，其殊勋盛烈，亦纪官爵，图形貌，有麒麟、云台、<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1286128", 1286128, "Clauses/36/Comments/2")'>凌烟</span>之目，夸其得意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286128_comment'></div>及后子孙忽于念功，弃不省录，运去物改，臣主同尽，名迹俱泯，一抔之土，不暇为谋；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286128_comment'></div>徒使文士弄笔于坠编遗简之馀，骚客费吟于残烟衰草之外，其亦有足哀也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286128_comment'></div>建康虽晋都邑，千载既远，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1286128", 1286128, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>迁革</span>尤多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286128_comment'></div>寻冶城，问新亭，岂复异时髣髴哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286128_comment'></div>今不惜数亩之宫，聚其贤劳，祼馈以伦，山川具存，楹桷可想，行者翼然如瞻太极之题，止者洗然如闻广室之论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286128_comment'></div>然则公之好古，非若鲁殿、秦碑，爱其刓缺摧落而已，茍有益于世教，以今准昔，犹一日也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286128_comment'></div>方王敦篡势已成，举朝不悟，尚<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1286128", 1286128, "Clauses/69/Comments/0")'>安恬</span>自若，惟帝视为腹心之疾，决意讨除，忧辱逮身，忠义激发，至子卒殄灭之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286128_comment'></div>不然，晋亡久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286128_comment'></div>盖过于明断而无不足也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286128_comment'></div>自正始以风流相命，赏好成俗，士虽坐谈空解，不畏临戎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286128_comment'></div>及气倍勇积，则裤襦子弟能破百万兵矣，盖清言致效而非丧邦也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286128_comment'></div>二事终始大节，疑史妄评，故略著云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1286128_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1212&endYear=1212')">1212年</a>　送徐玑序文。作品：送徐致中序。<div id='poem_1285888' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1285888' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1285888?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送徐致中序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1212年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1285888")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1285888_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1285888'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1285888'>徐致中在零陵，得单秉文笔法，以自书《论语》、《大学》诸篇遗予。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1285888_comment'></div>予得之惊喜，为作诗云：「欧、虞兼褚、薛，字远笔为尘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1285888_comment'></div>今日睹来翰，如亲见古人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1285888_comment'></div>尽归严号令，富有活精神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1285888_comment'></div>碑版荒唐久，遄看走四邻」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1285888_comment'></div>然致中书暴进，而予素不知书，恐见者嗤侮，遂不敢出此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1285888_comment'></div>因其赴龙溪丞，谩书以别。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1285888_comment'></div>致中云：「今人字不用法，随帖摹写，止取形似，虽有巧拙，岂足评论」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1285888_comment'></div>予问：「当用何法」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1285888_comment'></div>致中言：「王逸少则不可知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1285888_comment'></div>凡书皆一法，如匠造屋，主人位置装折不同，木之分寸必应绳墨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1285888_comment'></div>故分为点画，合而为字，无妄施者」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1285888_comment'></div>致中所造如此，当遂名家，更须归日验之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1285888_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1212&endYear=1212')">1212年</a>　为林鼐撰墓志。作品：林伯和墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286209' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286209' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286209?labeling=true' target='_blank'>林伯和墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1212年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286209")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286209_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286209'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286209'>伯和，林氏，名鼐，一字元秀，台州黄岩人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286209_comment'></div>曾祖实，祖灏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286209_comment'></div>父兴祥，赠宣义郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286209_comment'></div>妣戴氏，宜人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286209_comment'></div>宣义少贫，业行贾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286209_comment'></div>同贾分获筹钱竟，欢饮乃去，宣义徐覆之，误多若干，追还于涂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286209_comment'></div>同贾殊惘然，曰：「我愧君矣」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286209_comment'></div>复欢饮而别。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286209_comment'></div>宜人亦重义不吝，夫妇义合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286209_comment'></div>邻女将字而孤，养视如己子，择对嫁之，其人父母事终身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286209_comment'></div>盖宣义年八十四、宜人年八十二而卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286209_comment'></div>伯和以进士起，主明州奉化县簿，定海县丞，知福州侯官县，通判筠州，未行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286209_comment'></div>绍熙三年七月庚午卒，年四十九。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286209_comment'></div>在定海，郡令受租输。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286209_comment'></div>伯和纵民自槩量，吏争曰：「数不足，当俱坐」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286209_comment'></div>伯和故行之，卒无欠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286209_comment'></div>在侯官，方<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1286209", 1286209, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>视印</span>，吏言无以解板帐，请逮<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1286209", 1286209, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>逋户</span>，伯和曰：「吾未晓也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286209_comment'></div>榜：「尽三日约民量自欠输十之二，过是当考实均限」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286209_comment'></div>民争输不失期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286209_comment'></div>因尽阅邑目，得其要，戒吏旁立待命而已，无得预理欠，迄伯和去，无以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1286209", 1286209, "Clauses/60/Comments/0")'>逋税</span>受笞者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286209_comment'></div>石门乡田顷五十七亩，受米二斗六升。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286209_comment'></div>太平兴国中，民田在外乡者，输其乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286209_comment'></div>绍兴经界曰：「此本乡税也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286209_comment'></div>由是比他乡倍六七，民不堪重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286209_comment'></div>伯和白帅，特免和籴、折变及馀<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1286209", 1286209, "Clauses/71/Comments/1")'>科配</span>，乡赖以苏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286209_comment'></div>侯官之俗淳，伯和静抚之，民服<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1286209", 1286209, "Clauses/75/Comments/0")'>教令</span>，木阴满庭，终日寂寂，无复讼者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286209_comment'></div>然不以声色徇上官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286209_comment'></div>奉化时，有中贵人过境上，令使摄尉，以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1286209", 1286209, "Clauses/83/Comments/0")'>杂戏</span>迓之百里外，伯和笑曰：「吾性不好戏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286209_comment'></div>且略吾地，无以迓为也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286209_comment'></div>竟不迓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286209_comment'></div>定海时，富人用本路常平使籍，傲不受役，伯和役之如令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286209_comment'></div>常平檄使改役，伯和曰：「<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1286209", 1286209, "Clauses/95/Comments/2")'>私产</span>可公檄乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286209_comment'></div>不许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286209_comment'></div>常平捕其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_1286209", 1286209, "Clauses/97/Comments/0")'>曹吏</span>几尽，将为名以劾，会其罢而止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286209_comment'></div>侯官时，刑狱使武吏，素不相得，擒县胥移问，怒拍案，声出厅屋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286209_comment'></div>伯和徐<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1286209", 1286209, "Clauses/106/Comments/0")'>答报</span>，不能屈，滋怒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286209_comment'></div>一日，突入县虑囚，值其狱空而去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286209_comment'></div>既，复以告帅，使加罪，帅疑之，以物色访求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286209_comment'></div>民誉伯和不容口，乃已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286209_comment'></div>初，余年未冠，识伯和兄弟，勇不自抑，数为言古人之道，或显或晦，当世之学有是有非。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286209_comment'></div>伯和喜，游日以亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1286209_comment'></div>因又识宣义，质实老人，厚而不踰，披心语口，可背面察也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1286209_comment'></div>宜人尤<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_42_1286209", 1286209, "Clauses/133/Comments/0")'>淑善</span>，听夫子所为，家事贫而理，宾友往来，门内和乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1286209_comment'></div>余每叹其父母兄弟能如是，足尚矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1286209_comment'></div>其后伯和出仕，行其所知，敢决不回。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1286209_comment'></div>一家皆自戢，助伯和为善，声实充满。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1286209_comment'></div>人谓伯和于官无不宜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1286209_comment'></div>既而宜人卒，长子仲履夭，伯和与宣义仍相继卒，棺椁复萦，门户更仆起，垂二十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1286209_comment'></div>次子仲谦，始用伯和遗恩补迪功郎，授隆兴府司户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1286209_comment'></div>长女嫁修职郎、新添差吉州司户赵崇贤，次许嫁通仕郎木浩，次未嫁，幼先死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1286209_comment'></div>然则以伯和之行事观林氏之盛衰，所以蹶而复振者，其诸安命而恃义之验耶！<div class='inline'
