id='poem_sentence_50_1286209_comment'></div>始伯和之夫人杜氏，以绍熙四年九月甲申葬伯和于善化乡樟槿山，而铭未立，叔和及仲谦屡以请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1286209_comment'></div>余病且老，念昔语伯和，今<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_52_1286209", 1286209, "Clauses/169/Comments/0")'>退堕</span>几何矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1286209_comment'></div>而仲谦文词奔放<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_53_1286209", 1286209, "Clauses/170/Comments/0")'>横逸</span>，学进而未已，其还以余之语伯和者教戒余也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1286209_comment'></div>顾余老，可舍也已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1286209_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1286209_comment'></div>可以悼余之衰，而伯和不死矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1286209_comment'></div>故并叙而铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1286209_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_58_1286209'>既为鼎，没何所？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1286209_comment'></div>《濯缨》之歌悲复苦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1286209_comment'></div>不为栋，摧焉之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1286209_comment'></div>《伐木》之音哀以思。</div><div id='poem_sentence_61_1286209_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1212&endYear=1212')">1212年</a>　为陈秀伯撰墓志。作品：陈秀伯墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286237' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286237' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286237?labeling=true' target='_blank'>陈秀伯墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1212年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286237")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286237_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286237'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286237'>平阳豪士陈君尧英，字秀伯，少有大志，一时贵人，非其能所致，虽其能所致而终不足以立，视之皆如无也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286237_comment'></div>绍兴六年，上书<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1286237", 1286237, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>登闻</span>，陈策十二；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286237_comment'></div>明年正月，再上《清朝政序》，《序》亦十二，语益切；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286237_comment'></div>三月，复上《兵书》，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1286237", 1286237, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>指画</span>利害尤急。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286237_comment'></div>高宗异之，令政事堂召问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286237_comment'></div>君既不以求和为是，而书语侵中书，执政固不喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286237_comment'></div>至召问，君<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1286237", 1286237, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>长揖</span>色倨，论事，泉涌不屈，执政愈怒，奏罢之，君不悔也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286237_comment'></div>将归，又以三书抵宰相曰：「苟违某言，中兴之业未见其可」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286237_comment'></div>高宗侧身修行以来天下之士，四方献进接踵，释白袍取<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1286237", 1286237, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>通官</span>美职众矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286237_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286237_comment'></div>君之言不用而身无成，亦岂其命也欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286237_comment'></div>后七年，君始入太学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286237_comment'></div>学法不许上书，君亦绝不及当世；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286237_comment'></div>独场屋对策，犹抗言如故，以是无所合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286237_comment'></div>夫亲遇明主，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1286237", 1286237, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>干说</span>悟意，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1286237", 1286237, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>九筵</span>之室可陛而登，屡省之歌可飏而赓也，尚<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1286237", 1286237, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>邂逅不偶</span>；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286237_comment'></div>况一夫之取舍，何足动心乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286237_comment'></div>隐显穷达之际，在君可以无憾矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286237_comment'></div>君所居号陈营里，其先自兰溪来，至君九世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286237_comment'></div>先造一宅，推与兄，塘渎疏通，衢路回达，华榱复厢，如邦侯邑君之官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286237_comment'></div>又能薄己厚人，赴其急时，多贷少偿，乡曲常依为惠主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286237_comment'></div>此虽不足以见君之材，然士盖有一不得于世，则<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1286237", 1286237, "Clauses/70/Comments/0")'>销堕</span>摧折，并其馀不能有为矣，是故不可无录也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286237_comment'></div>君年七十，卒淳熙五年十一月九日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286237_comment'></div>十年十月辛酉，葬东山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286237_comment'></div>夫人黄氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286237_comment'></div>一子曰雅言，先君四年卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286237_comment'></div>雅言之子曰昂，从余三十年，请曰：「某常欲以吾祖为托，至是始克有言也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286237_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_1286237'>徐乐、严安，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1286237", 1286237, "Clauses/87/Comments/0")'>愊臆</span>见收；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286237_comment'></div>有嘉秀伯，良亦其俦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286237_comment'></div>谁不我与，东山之休。</div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1286237_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1212&endYear=1212')">1212年</a>　为李仲举撰墓志。作品：李仲举墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286243' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286243' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286243?labeling=true' target='_blank'>李仲举墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1212年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286243")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286243_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286243'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286243'>李伯钧，字仲举，楠溪人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286243_comment'></div>由永嘉汎枝港，尽汐而至楠溪，则别为聚区，风气言语<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1286243", 1286243, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>殊异</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286243_comment'></div>其中洲四绝水，陂汇深缓，草树多细色，敞爽宜远望，旧名苍墩，溪之温厚处也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286243_comment'></div>其十世曰岑，号苍墩先生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286243_comment'></div>父曰嵩，分宁县尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286243_comment'></div>仲举甫十馀，族里有大事，已能相可否，老人咸异此儿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286243_comment'></div>及长，足智<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1286243", 1286243, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>恢达</span>，以义理胜<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1286243", 1286243, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>血气</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286243_comment'></div>倥偬难理，雍容<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1286243", 1286243, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>应会</span>；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286243_comment'></div>迷谬不决，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1286243", 1286243, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>欻疾</span>赴机。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286243_comment'></div>而又外文内质，章采粲错，轻重襄序，主于敬共。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286243_comment'></div>猝与之遇，无不心畅神怿，谓其对大宾，入清庙矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286243_comment'></div>闻其方自溪谷出，尤骇莫测也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286243_comment'></div>郑景望、薛士隆引为亲友，曰：「不幸而仲举于世之味薄，斯人者岂以章句限之，所谓不可小知而可大受也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286243_comment'></div>得官，调监慈溪酒，耻之，曰：「吾何忍诱饥民舍其糠覈而遁于醨糟耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286243_comment'></div>谢不起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286243_comment'></div>盖仲举之业成矣，而年不究，踰四十而卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286243_comment'></div>有子曰源，字深之，材艺<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1286243", 1286243, "Clauses/54/Comments/0")'>德器</span>如其父，而居身益庄，与人益畏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286243_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1286243", 1286243, "Clauses/57/Comments/0")'>隩室</span>烦暑，常整饰不惰；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286243_comment'></div>广庭狎聚，拣语无慢情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286243_comment'></div>庐舍用器，皆有常度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286243_comment'></div>不醉饱于物，曰：「吾父祖乃尔，吾何以堪之」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286243_comment'></div>有痟渴疾，未尝离书，曰：「吾师也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286243_comment'></div>疾惙，惟烧香，曰：「吾友也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286243_comment'></div>始，仲举使余与深之游，余甚幼，而能记仲举言行，象其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1286243", 1286243, "Clauses/79/Comments/0")'>风裁</span>，至今想见之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286243_comment'></div>深之少余二岁，余从童子戏，深之俨然端默，余惭，为弃戏<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1286243", 1286243, "Clauses/85/Comments/0")'>敛衽</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286243_comment'></div>余谋于四方，间一归而见深之，寡言笑康色如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286243_comment'></div>余病且老，不出户，故友影绝，问深之，则曰死久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286243_comment'></div>其子义方实来，则丧除矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286243_comment'></div>悲夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286243_comment'></div>仲举父子，积五六十年，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1286243", 1286243, "Clauses/99/Comments/0")'>家行</span>修，本学明，固将施之，而固止之耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286243_comment'></div>岂天之不相道欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286243_comment'></div>文王曰：「誉髦斯士」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286243_comment'></div>成王曰：「烝我髦士」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286243_comment'></div>髦士，非科举所谓士也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286243_comment'></div>誉之所不加，烝之所不及，科举蔽之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286243_comment'></div>以科举论天下士，失士甚矣，然则非天也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286243_comment'></div>深之卒于嘉定五年，年五十九。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286243_comment'></div>三子：义方，长也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286243_comment'></div>曰义问、义崇，为弟后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286243_comment'></div>女一人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286243_comment'></div>嘉定五年十一月辛酉，义方改葬仲举于先墓后，而深之从焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1286243_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_41_1286243'>所谓伊人，山高谷深！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1286243_comment'></div>鹤哺于庭，猿乳于林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1286243_comment'></div>怨耶非耶，而有斯吟！</div><div id='poem_sentence_43_1286243_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1212&endYear=1212')">1212年</a>　为门人丁木之母戴夫人撰墓志。作品：戴夫人墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286230' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286230' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286230?labeling=true' target='_blank'>戴夫人墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1212年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286230")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286230_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286230'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286230'>夫人戴氏，黄岩人，嫁同县丁世雄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286230_comment'></div>年四十七，庆元六年二月二十五日卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286230_comment'></div>十二月二十一日，葬从其夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286230_comment'></div>子木，某官；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286230_comment'></div>复，某官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286230_comment'></div>初，少云外豪华，中易直，价倾一县，客自天台雁荡者多归之，少云必留<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1286230", 1286230, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>张饮</span>，佩兰瀹茗，穷日夜与娱乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286230_comment'></div>夫人整坐<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1286230", 1286230, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>里向</span>，杯酒瓯羹，凡赠遗之物，亲自<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1286230", 1286230, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>经手</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286230_comment'></div>饮散，少云鼻息鼾鼾，夫人<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1286230", 1286230, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>吹灯</span>起，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1286230", 1286230, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>检料</span>内外，复治具如昨日矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286230_comment'></div>如是终少云之身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286230_comment'></div>少云卒，木生十五岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286230_comment'></div>夫人趣使请余为铭，意欲永其夫人之传也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286230_comment'></div>木遂走他郡从硕师，而夫人方<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1286230", 1286230, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>翻拆</span>旧庐，敛工斲材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286230_comment'></div>比归，则高屋长梁，瓦染皆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1286230", 1286230, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>奂然</span>矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286230_comment'></div>又不幸死早，二子未极壮长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286230_comment'></div>然家事已治，遵行之自若。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286230_comment'></div>十年间，木登科，佐安抚使幕，报旗敕牒交道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286230_comment'></div>同时射策知名士，络绎踵门，为士大夫家，丁村未有也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286230_comment'></div>夫人及少云欢喜于墓下曰：「得吾愿哉」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286230_comment'></div>余每患世之夫妇殊性，有所经营，其夫欲广，妇必曰狭；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286230_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1286230", 1286230, "Clauses/57/Comments/0")'>看设</span>于外，夫欲崇侈，妇必以俭；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286230_comment'></div>人有求假，夫子欲与，妇辄<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1286230", 1286230, "Clauses/62/Comments/0")'>吝固</span>；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286230_comment'></div>论已定，虑已行，妇从中沮止，十事稀八九坏矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286230_comment'></div>虽然，阳疏而阴密，一于张施而无以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1286230", 1286230, "Clauses/69/Comments/0")'>揫聚</span>，则家亦或不成，未可尽非也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286230_comment'></div>若夫德与夫同，趋好不异，夫有滞意，委曲以申之，夫虽开喻，斥大反过，洗其陋，完其鄙，袭其锲，补其薄，人以是为非妇人之常也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286230_comment'></div>然而益厚其家，非禀挚之卓安能！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286230_comment'></div>若夫人是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286230_comment'></div>余嘉夫人与少云志合类从，终以畀其子孙也，故复为铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286230_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_1286230'>昔种之木，阴复阴；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286230_comment'></div>昔读之书，单厥心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286230_comment'></div>其墙几仞，高自今。</div><div id='poem_sentence_29_1286230_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1212&endYear=1212')">1212年</a>　为沈仲一撰墓志。作品：沈仲一墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286233' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286233' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286233?labeling=true' target='_blank'>沈仲一墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1212年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286233")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286233_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286233'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286233'>沈君，名体仁，字仲一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286233_comment'></div>先从吴兴避唐乱迁温州，为瑞安名家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286233_comment'></div>有彬老者，北游程氏<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1286233", 1286233, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>师生</span>间，得性命<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1286233", 1286233, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>微旨</span>，经世大意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286233_comment'></div>方禁《春秋》学，《石经》甫刻即废，彬老窃赂守者，自摹藏之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286233_comment'></div>君生后百馀年，珍其遗书，严奉若秘文焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286233_comment'></div>志意<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1286233", 1286233, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>闳雅</span>，鄙远声利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286233_comment'></div>常言：「沈氏本以儒术廉耻兴门户，奈何求官达，问生产，与俗人较高下哉」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286233_comment'></div>敬士好文，十室之誉，一咏之工，无不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1286233", 1286233, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>降屈</span>，坐者满堂，酬义侃侃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286233_comment'></div>夜后市音阒寂，乃闻独诵声琅然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286233_comment'></div>嘉定四年，君年六十二，卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286233_comment'></div>许令适来，余谓令：「仲一疾幸少平，何遽」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286233_comment'></div>令曰：「吾行也，邑之大夫集仲一所为别，劳动而然」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286233_comment'></div>余始疑「君岂为县多交关耶，而力病至此」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286233_comment'></div>令惨戚良久，曰：「自吾为邑三年，仲一无指尖讼到庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286233_comment'></div>然守煎倅逼，时辍假不吝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286233_comment'></div>吾赖仲一，常兄事之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286233_comment'></div>然每<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1286233", 1286233, "Clauses/52/Comments/0")'>节朔</span>，束带相看，啜茗径去矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286233_comment'></div>历十馀令，无不然者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286233_comment'></div>其力病至此，为礼尔」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286233_comment'></div>余以是多其保家有常节也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286233_comment'></div>又参之所闻，君终身有师，陈君举是已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286233_comment'></div>记其言，观其行，老而益恭，然不依以为重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286233_comment'></div>其取友道广，贤者亲之，贫者存之，授庐丐食，死而不贰，然不恃以自重，盖其持身有常度也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286233_comment'></div>天行或<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1286233", 1286233, "Clauses/74/Comments/0")'>饥凶</span>，民利欲建置，君<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1286233", 1286233, "Clauses/76/Comments/0")'>率先</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1286233", 1286233, "Clauses/76/Comments/1")'>推与</span>无疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286233_comment'></div>然岁熟不以为德，役成不以为功，彼偶汗漫败事，亦无恨意，不追诮首议者，盖其应事有常准也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286233_comment'></div>凡若此，岂于君于法书，书之亦为后世法也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286233_comment'></div>夫人项氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286233_comment'></div>四子，曰楹，曰东卿，曰焕道，曰得翁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286233_comment'></div>为尼未嫁七女，张埴、赵炳、项振玉、薛仲序、丘仲寀为其婿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286233_comment'></div>埴，筠州录参；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286233_comment'></div>仲序，镇江府司户；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286233_comment'></div>仲寀，将仕郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286233_comment'></div>五年，楹等葬君于北湖马奥山，而以项氏之命来曰：「吾夫行事，知者以为贤，不知者以为难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286233_comment'></div>吾虽妇人，不敢废也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286233_comment'></div>其在时，手钞予文，自甲至癸；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286233_comment'></div>戒东卿：「异日死，不得斯文以铭吾墓，犹不葬也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286233_comment'></div>余念一生与君相邂逅不数四，列御寇之于南郭子疏矣，有间矣，而能望余深如此，岂其寄情高远，真有在于形质之外邪！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286233_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_37_1286233'>冰肝雪胆自琢磨，书林画苑纷<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_1286233", 1286233, "Clauses/123/Comments/0")'>交罗</span>，诗得好语终夜哦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286233_comment'></div>今虽远矣山之阿，岂无风月相与过！</div><div id='poem_sentence_38_1286233_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1212&endYear=1212')">1212年</a>　应永嘉丞惠端方之请为其父作墓志。作品：建康府教授惠君墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286248' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286248' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286248?labeling=true' target='_blank'>建康府教授惠君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1212年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286248")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286248_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286248'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286248'>毗陵惠端方为永嘉丞，与民<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1286248", 1286248, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>尔汝</span>，求事情实而审寘其便处，不以妄与夺取快也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286248_comment'></div>士后出迭唱和相朋友，同蔬共醨无倦日，然立于高远不可浼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286248_comment'></div>近数年来，称州之贤大夫，佥曰惠丞，交誉于大吏；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286248_comment'></div>率气力薄，吏所易侮，缘是未改官，人尤惜之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286248_comment'></div>丞不动意，独谓余曰：「吾父乾道八年三月某日卒，十二月某日葬君山乡原曰野山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286248_comment'></div>仕信州铅山簿，监行在激赏库籴场，用荐者得宣教郎，教授建康府而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286248_comment'></div>夫用不究，可悲也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286248_comment'></div>后四十年，远无以诏，吾重悲之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286248_comment'></div>子幸使墓有铭，可乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286248_comment'></div>惠氏始见《庄周》，号惠施，而居毗陵之宜兴者六世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286248_comment'></div>君讳哲，字茂明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286248_comment'></div>父承事郎俊民，苦学被惑疾，祖父溥自教之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286248_comment'></div>君<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1286248", 1286248, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>夙悟</span>幼成，与兄国子博士迪励志读书，至「所过者化，所存者神，上下与天地同流」，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1286248", 1286248, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>辩论</span>往往终夕不就睡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286248_comment'></div>祖父欣然曰：「吾孙其庶乎」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286248_comment'></div>遂皆以文学有时名，同登进士第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286248_comment'></div>既入官，以能见异，以廉见敬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286248_comment'></div>铅山脩废<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1286248", 1286248, "Clauses/51/Comments/0")'>决滞</span>，民畏爱过于令，令赖之如己出，守徐公林亟荐之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286248_comment'></div>籴场米数十万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286248_comment'></div>孝宗初亲政，逻卒猝至，一日，诏捕籴吏甚急。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286248_comment'></div>提领官召君慰安之曰：「廉士无恐也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286248_comment'></div>既上，取出入籍视之，不得毫发，于是周参政葵谋荐君，会罢政不果。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286248_comment'></div>周舍人麟之既荐君之兄，又将荐君，不果。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286248_comment'></div>单侍御时将辟君为属，以格不果，亦会君死，才五十六矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286248_comment'></div>初娶孙氏，再娶蔡氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286248_comment'></div>子端本，新岳阳军节度推官，次端方也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286248_comment'></div>女四人，嫁迪功郎、常州晋陵县尉钱正国，迪功郎、常德府司户申洙，进士周作霖、王鼐，皆已卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286248_comment'></div>孙纯夫，迪功郎、台州司法；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286248_comment'></div>有夫，迪功郎、新建康府溧阳县尉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286248_comment'></div>道夫，德夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286248_comment'></div>自君之曾祖正议大夫智，训其子敷及需始官显，至君兄弟子孙，世有科目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286248_comment'></div>兴于孝友，而文字润泽之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286248_comment'></div>尚德不务进，虽仕不急用，其家法也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286248_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_32_1286248'>湖洑绀冽兼两峰，涵晖发祥蔼冲融。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286248_comment'></div>惠君之文地所钟，如云章天雨不从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286248_comment'></div>生死变化塞复通，相其子孙与时隆。</div><div id='poem_sentence_34_1286248_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1212&endYear=1212')">1212年</a>　为罗克开撰墓志。作品：故大理正知袁州罗公墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286289' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286289' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286289?labeling=true' target='_blank'>故大理正知袁州罗公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1212年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286289")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286289_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286289'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286289'>罗公名克开，字达父，家吉州龙泉县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286289_comment'></div>乾道八年进士，赣县西尉，父丧免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286289_comment'></div>肇庆府司法，浙西提刑司检法官，知广昌县，监进奏院，国子监主簿，军器监丞，大理正，知郴州、袁州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286289_comment'></div>嘉定二年七月晦卒，年六十九。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286289_comment'></div>五年四月丁酉，葬万安县官屯山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286289_comment'></div>宜人梁氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286289_comment'></div>子曰晟，郴州司理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286289_comment'></div>婿曰钟如阜、孙铚、李燔、胡焞、周约礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286289_comment'></div>未嫁者一女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286289_comment'></div>孙曰似，将士郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286289_comment'></div>曰仍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286289_comment'></div>初，公五世祖而下，及其群祖，官相接至州倅县宰，旁房比院，策名数十，号一州闻姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286289_comment'></div>而曾祖衡、祖革、父袭，虽有文学，不预于仕，公每痛慨，任为己责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286289_comment'></div>他日，主司标其文壁间，夸同列曰：「此当一经首，必如是者乃为次」，则公之兄浚也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286289_comment'></div>既上省，复当一经首，士由此屈罗氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286289_comment'></div>岭外荒貊，吏用法忽恣，有私假他印文得赇者，守欲以伪造符印坐之，公争曰：「此于法欺骗尔，入重奈何」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286289_comment'></div>守大怒，戒通引官：「即司法至，谒勿入」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286289_comment'></div>公径抵案前，执愈坚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286289_comment'></div>守气夺，竟从公议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286289_comment'></div>治广昌，察而有恩，民空县遮监司乞留。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286289_comment'></div>问：「知县何所长」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286289_comment'></div>民杂应曰：「不要钱，不信公人，不苦百姓，此知县三长也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286289_comment'></div>监司爱其语朴，叹息而去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286289_comment'></div>公详重孤耿，立朝不倚援力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286289_comment'></div>论事笃而坚，多人广席，疑难所聚，声怡色温，必伸其说而后止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286289_comment'></div>执政惮其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1286289", 1286289, "Clauses/81/Comments/0")'>楚楚</span>，不敢狎，而亦不能亲也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286289_comment'></div>然公常无久住意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286289_comment'></div>会巨豪竞沙田数百顷计，累讼至大理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286289_comment'></div>丞评将没入之为贵人德，公持不可，遂迁于郴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286289_comment'></div>入辞，劝上事亲匪懈而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286289_comment'></div>郴山阻水涸，㪷米尺绢，皆自赍诣郡，公怜之，为代输直数万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286289_comment'></div>废永丰<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1286289", 1286289, "Clauses/97/Comments/0")'>银坑</span>，还社仓于民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286289_comment'></div>其在袁州，开禧<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1286289", 1286289, "Clauses/100/Comments/0")'>兵役</span>猝起，方取常平啖边军，广和籴以续馈挽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286289_comment'></div>公出郡钱移于邻境，常平独完。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286289_comment'></div>又上言「袁无藏粟，俵户停炊，汹汹无告」，和籴亦免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286289_comment'></div>约岁用赢缩，立准备库，军之百须具焉，袁人不知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286289_comment'></div>两州善政，为一时冠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286289_comment'></div>民绘事以祠，公止之曰：「口成碑足矣，龛贮像奚为」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286289_comment'></div>又尝自咏曰：「抚摩二字圭三复，公直一心衡不欺」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286289_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286289_comment'></div>若斯言者，可以验其志矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1286289_comment'></div>始余游吴，为宪属，检法偶无官，诸生息荫空廨中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1286289_comment'></div>街卒俄报「新检法官到乌鹊桥矣」，亟起迎之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1286289_comment'></div>舟才胜二十斛，青衫手板外无馀装，余固叹其质易不作官人体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1286289_comment'></div>然余旦旦挟书坐曹，帖牒漫不省，胥史顾失笑；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1286289_comment'></div>而公齐比款證，覆虑明审，无不畏服也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1286289_comment'></div>暇则从余评论往反，余摘其文句尤惊丽者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1286289_comment'></div>吴士交诵，公日益有名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1286289_comment'></div>后八九年，公掌国子，余适来为僚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1286289_comment'></div>又五六年，奉使湖外，值公居郴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1286289_comment'></div>二十年出处大略，必相与佐佑其间，有隆无降也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1286289_comment'></div>今老至而休，四方友朋，零落几尽，而公之逝久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1286289_comment'></div>嗟夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1286289_comment'></div>振三世之幽绪，跨一宗之显爵，好仁恶佞，善士倾与，而余又特厚之，不幸前死，铭余职也，况晟请之勤耶！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1286289_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_54_1286289'>以身为旌，以宗为成；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1286289_comment'></div>以法为平，以民为生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1286289_comment'></div>进非所重，退非所轻；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1286289_comment'></div>要其终归，有伦有经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1286289_comment'></div>念昔吴下，暮春坚冰；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1286289_comment'></div>姑苏之高，天池之清。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1286289_comment'></div>旧游雨散，新垄云横。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1286289_comment'></div>孰怜我衰，尚力斯铭。</div><div id='poem_sentence_61_1286289_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1213&endYear=1213')">1213年2月</a>　二月，为黄（艹冖田）撰墓志铭。作品：黄子耕墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286228' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286228' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286228?labeling=true' target='_blank'>黄子耕墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1213年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286228")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286228_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286228'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286228'>子耕，名㽦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286228_comment'></div>黄氏自金华迁分宁，至本朝为豫章闻家矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286228_comment'></div>给事中廉，曾祖也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286228_comment'></div>户部尚书叔敖，祖也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286228_comment'></div>朝散大夫野，父也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286228_comment'></div>太史庭坚字鲁直者，从祖也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286228_comment'></div>天下尽宗太史诗，外夷殊域皆称江西，而黄氏由此不独为豫章闻家也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286228_comment'></div>子耕<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1286228", 1286228, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>澄润</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1286228", 1286228, "Clauses/15/Comments/1")'>明澈</span>，雅服缫籍，纤尘点俗，挥绝限域，人谓唤起鲁直矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286228_comment'></div>读其诗词，如逗幽薄，超高丘，宇宙奇旷，风露绰约，人又谓「非子耕所能，鲁直遗墨<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1286228", 1286228, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>散落</span>，收拾未尽尔」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286228_comment'></div>子耕不自是家学，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1286228", 1286228, "Clauses/29/Comments/1")'>挈从</span>郭子和、朱元晦甚久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286228_comment'></div>取友虽<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1286228", 1286228, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>魁杰</span>士，而皆行笃言信，步步著绳墨，未尝放达而好恣，漭荡而无程也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286228_comment'></div>故子耕蚤岁名重江西。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286228_comment'></div>调瑞昌主簿，监文思院。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286228_comment'></div>天子郊，见上公貂蝉久远暗淡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286228_comment'></div>大礼事务惶恐，以咎子耕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286228_comment'></div>子耕出祗候库牒，指曰：「此未尝许重镀也，且安所取金」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286228_comment'></div>事务怒曰：「监官不材，吏辈自饰之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286228_comment'></div>子耕笑曰：「大臣庄其首，所以敬天也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286228_comment'></div>若专知陪备，岂胜任耶」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286228_comment'></div>事务以为玩己，益怒，盛气将劾子耕，或曰：「彼事大臣以礼，子事大臣以谄，可乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286228_comment'></div>事务惭而止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286228_comment'></div>先是湖北安抚使章森荐可职事官，前宰相赵雄知洪州，又与转运判官林湜荐，至是给舍侍从又交荐，要人使所亲招之，不往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286228_comment'></div>因其知卢阳县，遂以为堂除。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286228_comment'></div>五溪故猺獠，族种逼迫，杂耕省地上，气势自由，县官不能主令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286228_comment'></div>子耕陈诗劝晓，有公事，立期信使之，紧慢应手，如一家人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286228_comment'></div>监司又争荐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286228_comment'></div>朝廷第其语，子耕亟授处州通判。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286228_comment'></div>经总制有额无钱，十收六七。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286228_comment'></div>每岁三月，右曹按籍校之，有展减磨勘之文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286228_comment'></div>俗号为殿最纲，其法必行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286228_comment'></div>通判卑辞借系省，预敛<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1286228", 1286228, "Clauses/91/Comments/0")'>牙契</span>，常为殿矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286228_comment'></div>子耕会一郡成赋，法应隶经总者，以十年中酌取之，阁免其逋负，钱额均等，故态尽革，更为最矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286228_comment'></div>两浙荐士，又以子耕为首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286228_comment'></div>主管官告院、大理寺簿、军器监丞，岁为三迁，善类皆喜曰：「向用矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286228_comment'></div>然子耕意不乐，间行西湖，戴莲叶，榜击汰，慨然叹曰：「我昔在南北山，一水一石无不自题品，今无有清味，何耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286228_comment'></div>岂耄耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286228_comment'></div>抑市朝山林，故相违耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286228_comment'></div>遂以贫请去，知台州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286228_comment'></div>又年馀，以从弟死，请归哭之，论者颇疑其迂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286228_comment'></div>子耕请不已，知袁州，过抚州，哭弟哀甚，得疾，即谢事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286228_comment'></div>诸子进药，不肯饮，示以丧礼而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1286228_comment'></div>嘉定五年九月二十二日，拍床呼曰：「可行矣」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1286228_comment'></div>夜漏上十刻，手书起字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1286228_comment'></div>烓掖之坐，良久卒，年六十三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1286228_comment'></div>六年二月丙申，葬分宁县双井。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1286228_comment'></div>夫人吴氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1286228_comment'></div>子曰烓，国子进士；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1286228_comment'></div>𡏴，子耕卒后二十日亦卒；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1286228_comment'></div>曰在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1286228_comment'></div>女嫁承事郎、监隆兴府苗米仓赵崇斌，先卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1286228_comment'></div>孙曰鏶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1286228_comment'></div>初，子耕得台州，知其家世者谓晚暮，以唁子耕，子耕曰：「某书生，蒙此过矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1286228_comment'></div>既至，则勤苦夙夜，先劝后禁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1286228_comment'></div>讼牒旧千计，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_53_1286228", 1286228, "Clauses/163/Comments/0")'>销缩</span>才百馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1286228_comment'></div>悍顽易节，嚚险改行，而郡称平治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1286228_comment'></div>自顷吏道薰习，所师用往往暴民之事也，有欲行惠利者，共嗤笑之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1286228_comment'></div>而州素简陋，礼文所当施而有阙者，辄曰「吾未暇也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1286228_comment'></div>子耕于酒税不用最高比，私卖偷瞒阴纵之，减则例，添升方，人感其宽，既而课入皆多于旧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1286228_comment'></div>虚籍坊场钱百馀万，非本界也，壹偿不自列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1286228_comment'></div>而在民者犹太半，贷不复取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1286228_comment'></div>县当输钱七千万，子耕曰：「前后相承至此尔，不能为鞭挞费也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1286228_comment'></div>尽除之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1286228_comment'></div>为济粜仓贮谷，青黄时，下其价使不踊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1286228_comment'></div>为抵当库储钱，雨雪时，量民急与之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1286228_comment'></div>置丛冢二，葬棺千五百。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1286228_comment'></div>置养济院，左为安老，右为慈幼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1286228_comment'></div>又别造安济坊，以居病囚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1286228_comment'></div>凡此皆自有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_67_1286228", 1286228, "Clauses/203/Comments/0")'>子本</span>，使后不废，不徒为之名也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1286228_comment'></div>庙学隘，首增修，创棂星门，益诸生食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1286228_comment'></div>有词诉称小学生者，建小学，择<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_69_1286228", 1286228, "Clauses/212/Comments/0")'>学谕</span>教之，制释奠器服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1286228_comment'></div>而仪门之两庑，僦为贾区久矣，徙而新之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1286228_comment'></div>更作丽谯，完城益垒，班春阅武皆具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1286228_comment'></div>亭观坊巷，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_72_1286228", 1286228, "Clauses/221/Comments/0")'>表揭</span>悉可别识，其费各数十百万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1286228_comment'></div>然后<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_73_1286228", 1286228, "Clauses/223/Comments/0")'>畿内</span>之公侯，秦、汉之郡国，称其制矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1286228_comment'></div>余观子耕了外物成坏，犹<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_74_1286228", 1286228, "Clauses/227/Comments/0")'>影像</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_74_1286228", 1286228, "Clauses/227/Comments/1")'>空寂</span>，然而毫末爱惜于赢亏有无之间，急迫备预于岁月倏忽之顷，常食糟羹䲡䏑，家人不知从太守为乐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1286228_comment'></div>特重教义，兴灭继绝，任为己责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1286228_comment'></div>方纂郡志，或言「谢显道家焉」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1286228_comment'></div>访之，有谢官人者，常代院长送<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_77_1286228", 1286228, "Clauses/239/Comments/0")'>符帖</span>，盖亲孙也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1286228_comment'></div>子耕对之泣，与冠带，买田宅，祀显道于二程之次，曰：「自今其为士人」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1286228_comment'></div>不知竟能如子耕志否。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1286228_comment'></div>昔人称顾恺之昼日垂帘，门阶闲寂，彼将不以名迹衒其志欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1286228_comment'></div>虽然，使用世者皆若子耕之为，则治不胜举，而古人之功效可冀矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1286228_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_82_1286228'>其文也鷟，其清也鹤；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1286228_comment'></div>虽竞于善，而实无作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1286228_comment'></div>鲁直之宗，百年再振。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1286228_comment'></div>双井有名，为子复新。</div><div id='poem_sentence_85_1286228_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1213&endYear=1213')">1213年</a>　又为黄子耕文集作序。作品：黄子耕文集序。<div id='poem_1285899' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1285899' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1285899?labeling=true' target='_blank'>黄子耕文集序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1213年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1285899")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1285899_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1285899'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1285899'>豫章黄子耕，少所树立，便入高人<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1285899", 1285899, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>胜士</span>之目，不独倚先世为重也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1285899_comment'></div>诗文似太史，有《洪州九词》、《五溪十谈》，兴指予夺之微，追古人而过今人矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1285899_comment'></div>出守天台，一钱细碎皆籍之，条目建置，为穷人衣食居处计，辄费数百千万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1285899_comment'></div>人但言其能忧民如家，不知其家事乃落拓不理，未尝自忧也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1285899_comment'></div>余每叹学者各具材品，惟<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1285899", 1285899, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>识趣</span>为最难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1285899_comment'></div>子耕虽以惠利德于一州，然异日去此，必将有时而尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1285899_comment'></div>不若刻二书巾山之上，使读之者<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1285899", 1285899, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>识趣</span>增长，后生及知古人源流，教思无穷，视今惠利何翅千百！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1285899_comment'></div>客其以予言告子耕，幸勿自嫌也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1285899_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1213&endYear=1213')">1213年3月27日</a>　三月二十七，刘颖卒，叶适有祭文。作品：祭刘公实侍郎文。<div id='poem_1286340' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286340' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286340?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭刘公实侍郎文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1213年3月27日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286340")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286340_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286340'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286340'>昔我官吴，事公为属，且戆且拙，无一可瞩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286340_comment'></div>手一卷书，随吏后先，公顾而笑，如是积年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286340_comment'></div>别公东西，若常在侧，问讯寒暑，莫敢有失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286340_comment'></div>问胡阔焉，子困妻屯，公乃长谢，报行始闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286340_comment'></div>伟公自置，介介特特，虽为侍从，屡去王国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286340_comment'></div>未尝屈己，未尝徇人，未尝计惜，私售其身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286340_comment'></div>我因乏使，时踵公后，情严律宽，可效可守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286340_comment'></div>归从泉山，弃祠而止，上两起公，公不一起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286340_comment'></div>望公深者，终遂高蹈；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286340_comment'></div>待公浅者，公曷轻矫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286340_comment'></div>出处大矣，古今所难，孰如公完，既老愈安！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286340_comment'></div>菱角之塘，采菱若云，激其歌声，以传后人。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1286340_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1213&endYear=1213')">1213年</a>　又为刘颖撰墓志铭。作品：宝谟阁直学士赠光禄大夫刘公墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286255' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286255' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286255?labeling=true' target='_blank'>宝谟阁直学士赠光禄大夫刘公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1213年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286255")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286255_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286255'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286255'>公讳颖，字公实，衢州西安人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286255_comment'></div>曾祖瑫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286255_comment'></div>祖持，右迪功郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286255_comment'></div>父蕴，赠正议大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286255_comment'></div>公绍兴丁丑中进士第，主溧阳县簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286255_comment'></div>虏窥江退，州索民租未入者，公白留守：「虏事急，民不胜病矣，请因以赐民」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286255_comment'></div>张丞相悟，谢曰：「虑不及此」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286255_comment'></div>即奏阁免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286255_comment'></div>由是知公，令其子栻与游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286255_comment'></div>教授全州，勤苦自力，率诸生同夜旦，湖、湘化之，士人增倍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286255_comment'></div>改官，知铅山县，陈丞相讶曰：「薄职事官耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286255_comment'></div>公谢以「当应新制」而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286255_comment'></div>正议卒，知常熟县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286255_comment'></div>素号繁难，前后健者盛气<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1286255", 1286255, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>锄刬</span>，顾不克，公降心条理，更以治称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286255_comment'></div>签判潭州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286255_comment'></div>帅负其能，僚吏<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1286255", 1286255, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>惮慑</span>，公约以中道，常屈而改为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286255_comment'></div>及陈峒反，所禽灭多公计策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286255_comment'></div>既入朝，乃言「签判功在臣上，臣实愧之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286255_comment'></div>召监进奏院，迁太常寺主簿，迁丞，兼兵部郎官监司，皆上自选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286255_comment'></div>提举浙西常平茶盐事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286255_comment'></div>公言特备籴本，尽废围田者再，未及用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286255_comment'></div>就迁提刑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286255_comment'></div>禁州县毋得法外自恣，间诣狱，察不应系数十为曹，纵遣之，百姓走愬，道相属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286255_comment'></div>权势交恨，御史遂以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1286255", 1286255, "Clauses/66/Comments/0")'>介僻</span>劾公罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286255_comment'></div>久之，御史去，除江西转运判官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286255_comment'></div>德化县田逃徙太半，守乞免税至五六，不报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286255_comment'></div>公以见种实税均其荒莱，民愿佃者第减之，上供自若而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1286255", 1286255, "Clauses/75/Comments/0")'>逃田</span>尽复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286255_comment'></div>属州缘绍熙登极，科进奉千馀，公亟奏黜，而荐其名士<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1286255", 1286255, "Clauses/79/Comments/0")'>洁廉</span>者十数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286255_comment'></div>除直秘阁，淮东运副。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286255_comment'></div>初，水败楚州城，帮修久未定，总领扳公预议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286255_comment'></div>公接伴虏生辰，入对，言：「刘超欲坏旧城改筑，国家何故捐数百万缗为军帅<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1286255", 1286255, "Clauses/90/Comments/0")'>幸赏</span>地？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286255_comment'></div>可一语决也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286255_comment'></div>光宗从之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286255_comment'></div>城完牢至今。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286255_comment'></div>除户部郎中，淮东总领。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286255_comment'></div>务场以额钞抵赏，阴失饷计，积二十年无知者，公隐核得之，度卖绝增饷一年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286255_comment'></div>迁司农少卿，总领淮西。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286255_comment'></div>先是有总领自乞为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_1286255", 1286255, "Clauses/103/Comments/0")'>都酿</span>，抱净息而私其赢，后稍益侵，反以大军钱佐之，邀籴遍江、淮，迁复岁月，回易如负贩，王人之体尽矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286255_comment'></div>公在事虽无几，名实有辨，义利判然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286255_comment'></div>斥部内窃借总司为奸者，其人大吏难动摇者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286255_comment'></div>太夫人董氏卒，除直宝谟阁，江东运副，又知平江府，皆未上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1286255_comment'></div>除宗正少卿，起居郎，实录院检讨官，权户部侍郎，同修撰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1286255_comment'></div>疡生于颊，提举兴国宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1286255_comment'></div>除集英殿修撰，知宁国府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1286255_comment'></div>改知绍兴府，越东西都而彫郡也，数旱灾，然众欲所𨏭，念不暇恤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1286255_comment'></div>公叹曰：「民何罪！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1286255_comment'></div>吾不忍用太守礼，食其粟过矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1286255_comment'></div>浮馈妄请皆不与。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1286255_comment'></div>又乞鬻僧道，止添差，曰：「庶几宽之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1286255_comment'></div>遽差知平江府，公径归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1286255_comment'></div>复提举兴国宫，知泉州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1286255_comment'></div>泉土富乐，其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_51_1286255", 1286255, "Clauses/149/Comments/0")'>暴桀</span>椎埋群偷而众夺者，悉株连送远地，则一以静镇，事从其俗，人尤爱之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1286255_comment'></div>蕃舶至，旧与提举阅视，公不往，第遣职官喻曰：「货不汝买也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1286255_comment'></div>待制华文阁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1286255_comment'></div>次子正学死，复乞兴国而归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1286255_comment'></div>公历官大小各有意，随其病伤，针石施焉，苏愈而止，不执<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_55_1286255", 1286255, "Clauses/166/Comments/0")'>宽猛</span>之偏术，抑人以徇己也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1286255_comment'></div>余所述近是矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1286255_comment'></div>立朝进退必以义，立德所尚，陈说正理而扶救之，不怀避就之浅心，贬己以合时也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1286255_comment'></div>孝宗时，博谋尽下，人臣争承风自献，公乃奏：「今日之失，在轻听人言而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1286255_comment'></div>昔之施为，今复弃置，损盛德矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1286255_comment'></div>上既优待三衙，与执政钧礼，公又言：「兵权恶专，况今之将帅，何足称颐指哉」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1286255_comment'></div>光宗时，论人主难克而易流者四：曰「逸豫无节，赐予无度，儒臣易疏，近倖易昵」也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1286255_comment'></div>庆元初，始得亲近，即疏言：「二三执政，非所谓坐而论道耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1286255_comment'></div>致今日之治，要须深讲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1286255_comment'></div>今不过<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_64_1286255", 1286255, "Clauses/202/Comments/0")'>寻常</span>文书，肯首而退尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1286255_comment'></div>大官大职，安得轻授！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1286255_comment'></div>冗兵冗吏，所宜痛减；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1286255_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_67_1286255", 1286255, "Clauses/208/Comments/0")'>横恩滥赏</span>，不可辄启；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1286255_comment'></div>巧请他比，不可曲从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1286255_comment'></div>皆今日大患也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1286255_comment'></div>又言：「修德莫先于务学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1286255_comment'></div>学之道，存在己不息之诚，极取人为善之益者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1286255_comment'></div>夫《易》贵朋友之讲习，《礼》戒独学之寡陋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1286255_comment'></div>今劝讲久废矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1286255_comment'></div>方是时，风俗一变，其正邪消长而好恶向背之际有甚难言者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1286255_comment'></div>公独谓「党与倾挤，报复迭起，愿陛下御之以道，容之以德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1286255_comment'></div>不然，元祐、崇、观可监也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1286255_comment'></div>且今日已尔，又将如后世何」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1286255_comment'></div>公立朝论事，落落多此类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1286255_comment'></div>余所谓不贬己以合时者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1286255_comment'></div>公自泉归，而兴国满四年，不再请；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1286255_comment'></div>有为言而与者，辞不获，然后受。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1286255_comment'></div>已而复请老，进敷文阁待制，致仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1286255_comment'></div>嘉定元年，除刑部侍郎，公曰：「臣已得谢矣，惟陛下哀怜，俾全末路」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1286255_comment'></div>进龙图阁，宫观，数月，复以公知婺州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1286255_comment'></div>公又曰：「若强臣此行，狼狈殒越，身无处所，有亏名义，取诮士论」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1286255_comment'></div>上知不可夺，禄宫观者再。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1286255_comment'></div>又请老，以宝谟阁直学士致仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1286255_comment'></div>嘉定六年三月二十七日乡晨，坐，索汤盥洁而终，年七十八，赠光禄大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1286255_comment'></div>硕人杨氏，先公四年卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1286255_comment'></div>三子，曰强学，奉议郎、主管仙都观；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1286255_comment'></div>曰正学，宣义郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1286255_comment'></div>曰志学，宣教郎、知仙居县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1286255_comment'></div>三女，婿曰承事郎、华亭知县陆三省，进士徐冲，通直郎、萧山县丞余冈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1286255_comment'></div>孙男六，常道，迪功郎、监车辂院；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1286255_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_95_1286255", 1286255, "Clauses/285/Comments/0")'>常德</span>，从事郎、晋陵县尉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1286255_comment'></div>常武，迪功郎、监绍兴府都税院；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1286255_comment'></div>常宁，常明；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1286255_comment'></div>常先，登仕郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1286255_comment'></div>孙女五，婿曰将仕郎徐士廉、承事郎赵与勤、进士毛用之、潘自楚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1286255_comment'></div>曾孙男三，女二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1286255_comment'></div>十二月壬寅，葬公于靖安乡岩山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1286255_comment'></div>余既录公终始大节，而又知其自少年高识，特立无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_102_1286255", 1286255, "Clauses/301/Comments/0")'>倚附</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1286255_comment'></div>陈应求、刘共甫，名公卿也，挽致不得，宁甘服州县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1286255_comment'></div>其出浙西连七八，外徙十馀年，有以淹速讯之，公笑谢曰：「吾所欲也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1286255_comment'></div>其在侍从，而故与周旋<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_105_1286255", 1286255, "Clauses/312/Comments/0")'>倾吐</span>无间者，方居中用事，提将相与人如反手，然公从是绝矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1286255_comment'></div>常言：「士以不辱身为重，用舍命也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1286255_comment'></div>其为少宗正，而赵丞相适归，相遇于废寺，泥雨不能伸足，但僧床立语曰：「寄谢余参政，某虽去而人材犹在朝廷，幸善待之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1286255_comment'></div>公曰：「相公人材，即参政人材也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1286255_comment'></div>使果贤，参政之责，非宰相之忧也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1286255_comment'></div>揖而别，余公继相，卒于善人多所全佑，公助之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1286255_comment'></div>及后落公致仕，而同时被落者皆已起为执政，独公不顾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1286255_comment'></div>词婉而正，志恬而安，呜呼，斯完矣夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1286255_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_113_1286255'>公先幽潜，始自正议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1286255_comment'></div>隆兴初元，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_114_1286255", 1286255, "Clauses/348/Comments/0")'>匦书</span>千至；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1286255_comment'></div>天子惊嗟，曰才一二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1286255_comment'></div>公时已仕，德器早成；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1286255_comment'></div>物粗兼融，理冲独荣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1286255_comment'></div>前方后方，不斲而行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1286255_comment'></div>势有险夷，情有戚休；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1286255_comment'></div>畀我百为，从容并酬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1286255_comment'></div>阶卿级侯，众俯偻之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1286255_comment'></div>峙而莫前，公则户之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1286255_comment'></div>始居叠石，岩开洞划；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1286255_comment'></div>九仙烂柯，今古一奕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1286255_comment'></div>后依菱塘，陂斜浦横；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1286255_comment'></div>欸乃其歌，五湖夜明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1286255_comment'></div>有芝九折，有松千尺；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1286255_comment'></div>雪藏雾羃，以庇兹刻。</div><div id='poem_sentence_128_1286255_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1213&endYear=1213')">1213年4月18日</a>　四月十八，楼钥卒，叶适有挽词。作品：楼参政挽词。<div id='poem_80030' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_80030' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/80030?labeling=true' target='_blank'>楼参政挽词</a><span class='authorDate'>（1213年4月18日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_80030")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_80030_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_80030'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_80030'>外补何多只近州，却于中禁胜淹留。<div id='poem_sentence_0_80030_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_80030'>晚参国论非无乐，苦说时难更有愁。<div id='poem_sentence_1_80030_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_80030'>天下知心古来少，人间此梦觉应休。<div id='poem_sentence_2_80030_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_80030'>自嗟不识鄞江路，清泪因公寄海流。<div id='poem_sentence_3_80030_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_80030'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_80030_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1213&endYear=1213')">1213年7月6日</a>　七月六日，刘弥正卒，叶适作墓志铭。作品：故吏部侍郎刘公墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286256' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286256' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286256?labeling=true' target='_blank'>故吏部侍郎刘公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1213年7月6日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286256")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286256_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286256'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286256'>开禧二年冬，虏<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1286256", 1286256, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>举国</span>入寇，蜀、楚、淮、徐同日被兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286256_comment'></div>上诏边臣，谨城壁，纵民徙内地，虏求战不许，卤掠无所获。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286256_comment'></div>既而大雪数尺，冻饥<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1286256", 1286256, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>太半</span>死，皆引去，独留数千人于濠州以缀和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286256_comment'></div>明年六月，刘公退翁为贺金国生辰使虏，论议往返未决。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286256_comment'></div>公至扬州，诏还润州以俟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286256_comment'></div>自兵起，盐商不敢行，传言虏且犯通、泰，而提举官相继<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1286256", 1286256, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>遁逸</span>，盐利大乏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286256_comment'></div>朝廷患之，即京口用公提举淮东常平盐事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286256_comment'></div>公曰：「盐在北而移司于南，异日虏不至，使剽夺窃窥，吾之责也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286256_comment'></div>遂渡江。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286256_comment'></div>益贷亭户，盐既增积，舟相接数千里，卖尽复其旧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286256_comment'></div>又明年，改嘉定元年，就为转运判官，虏卒请和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286256_comment'></div>公得运司留钱十九千，护视通问贺生辰使各一，又自为接送伴遗留使，三年，为两浙转运判官，四年，为副使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286256_comment'></div>自浙徂淮，凡北使送迎之事，经公裁定，后皆为成式；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286256_comment'></div>州县无横费暴役，两运司各有赢财。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286256_comment'></div>盖五六年中，自虏约和，而公以选居其间，至于约成，而能坚且久，其所以阜财宽民，上下之情<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1286256", 1286256, "Clauses/57/Comments/0")'>交孚</span>，而绥怀安集之政行焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286256_comment'></div>公姓刘氏，讳弥正，莆田人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286256_comment'></div>由进士第历潮州司户参军，监镇江府榷货务茶场，知抚州临川县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286256_comment'></div>入为诸司粮料院，太常寺主簿，枢密院编修官，太常丞兼左曹郎官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286256_comment'></div>其提举转运淮东也，召为吏部员外郎兼考功右司，进左司郎中，以直宝谟阁为运判，遂自副使为太常少卿，国史院编修，实录院检讨官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286256_comment'></div>除起居舍人，迁郎，遂为吏部侍郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286256_comment'></div>公方静简质，与人不苟立同异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286256_comment'></div>至临事<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1286256", 1286256, "Clauses/81/Comments/0")'>鲠峭</span>，除民疾痛，刚果立发，必达其志而后已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286256_comment'></div>在临川，守以畸零税迫县，公故为宽期，曰：「此于法不当徵也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286256_comment'></div>守怒甚，荷邑胥项廷诟公，公曰：「以喜怒罪令则可，然畸零税不可得也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286256_comment'></div>岁旱，按田伤者自蠲之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286256_comment'></div>端午，守戒县取鼓以节渡者，且檄公至其所曰：「无令敢哗」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286256_comment'></div>公曰：「民无鼓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286256_comment'></div>而知县有公事，不可往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286256_comment'></div>往，尉职尔」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286256_comment'></div>其在朝，而陈丞相自强愎，公不附己，故出以使虏；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286256_comment'></div>又疑虏复犯淮，故就用为提盐，皆欲以危地陷公也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286256_comment'></div>公既尽通盐利，则力绳武将之兼州者使奉法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286256_comment'></div>奏罢<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1286256", 1286256, "Clauses/116/Comments/0")'>军功</span>杂流之为县者，悉注文臣，赈业其部之贫民钱米各有差。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286256_comment'></div>其至真州，官私屋初立，坊巷街始具，城楼橹皆新成，取广储富安仓稻麦以食饿羸，淮东渐如平时矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286256_comment'></div>自渡江而帅漕为应办官，儒生节士苦不得行意，公既过清，无敢以私问者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286256_comment'></div>事关内臣，未尝与相见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286256_comment'></div>爨不宿设，门衢寂然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286256_comment'></div>公之始入朝，兵祸起有萌，擅国者名使议铁钱，实以边事付之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286256_comment'></div>公行两淮，久而后返，言：「无故而先发，天理不顺；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286256_comment'></div>无豫而轻举，人谋不从」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286256_comment'></div>擅国者怒，促进师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1286256_comment'></div>既，皆溃败，公又言：「今虏顿兵要我复和，急之，权则在人矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1286256_comment'></div>缓敌莫难于财。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1286256_comment'></div>若令任帅守监司管军以上赀豪其地者，皆有以佐军须，而宫掖之奉，吏胥<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_43_1286256", 1286256, "Clauses/156/Comments/0")'>蠹食</span>，悉加<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_43_1286256", 1286256, "Clauses/157/Comments/0")'>裁撙</span>，使国用未甚屈，则虏可力持而计可徐定也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1286256_comment'></div>其论先后之序如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1286256_comment'></div>在太常，言：「初相光宗，周必大、留正也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1286256_comment'></div>及升祔，独葛邲已死，遂得配食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1286256_comment'></div>今二臣亡矣，请别议应配者」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1286256_comment'></div>诏方下其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1286256_comment'></div>公为侍郎一月，即以病自乞，不许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1286256_comment'></div>满三月，累疏犹不许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1286256_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_51_1286256", 1286256, "Clauses/176/Comments/0")'>最后</span>许以职守郡，然冀公复瘳也，犹不出命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1286256_comment'></div>遂以七月六日卒，年五十七，嘉定六年也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1286256_comment'></div>七年三月，归葬于城南三里宝涧原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1286256_comment'></div>前夫人曰方氏，今夫人曰林氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1286256_comment'></div>子四人，曰克庄，迪功郎、隆兴府靖安县主簿；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1286256_comment'></div>曰克逊，曰克刚，方以公遗恩任之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1286256_comment'></div>曰克永。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1286256_comment'></div>女三人，已嫁者乡贡进士方濯其婿也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1286256_comment'></div>初，公父名夙，仕至著作郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1286256_comment'></div>著作弟名朔，秘书省正字；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1286256_comment'></div>余尝叙其人在名世之目，忽忽未用死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1286256_comment'></div>公幼率诸弟勤苦缉故业，贫不能具膏火，旁妪夜绩者，光射公牖，辄携书就之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1286256_comment'></div>后皆中第，天下谓能继其父矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1286256_comment'></div>公教在事内，故鄙事亦勉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1286256_comment'></div>志在事外，故雅道不废；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1286256_comment'></div>介而容物，故不知者不忌；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1286256_comment'></div>密而与善，故知者依为重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1286256_comment'></div>登侍从浅，其事未著，道未伸也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1286256_comment'></div>然推其已行，可以信其未行；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1286256_comment'></div>迹其不为，可以任其必为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1286256_comment'></div>有国者未尝不欲得善人之用，修而至于善者未尝不欲为世用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1286256_comment'></div>然公之二父与弟皆不及用，公将用矣而不究，此势之难合而可为天下哀之也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1286256_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_73_1286256'>惟墓有勒，惟贤是记；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1286256_comment'></div>或一已多，或绝不值。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1286256_comment'></div>猗公之家，我铭者四；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1286256_comment'></div>皆伟然哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1286256_comment'></div>可诏后世。</div><div id='poem_sentence_77_1286256_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1213&endYear=1213')">1213年闰9月1日</a>　闰九月一日，门人周南卒，叶适悲痛，有祭文。作品：祭周南仲文。<div id='poem_1286341' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286341' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286341?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭周南仲文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1213年闰9月1日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286341")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286341_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286341'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286341'>呜呼哀哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286341_comment'></div>刳形而蜕质，强心而使臆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286341_comment'></div>夜凛凛而彻曙，朝茕茕而竟夕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286341_comment'></div>事固杂而难精，理尤微而易失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286341_comment'></div>信孰御而横陈，疑避碍而旁出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286341_comment'></div>弃昔能之故智，就今巧之新术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286341_comment'></div>忽超前而却拒，几左搴而右絷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286341_comment'></div>山未高而亟进，井既深而更掘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286341_comment'></div>积劬劳者至矣，终拔类而离匹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286341_comment'></div>力欲周乎世人，纷上勤而下恤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286341_comment'></div>宁小俛以为巽，不苦劲而转激。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286341_comment'></div>冀家化而户晓，乃群讥而众嫉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286341_comment'></div>希意合而何有，曾不暖其一席。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286341_comment'></div>粗窥右文之户，迄老集英之秩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286341_comment'></div>身常屏于穷巷，论每喧乎京邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286341_comment'></div>《诗》虽取夫谮人，嗟谁受而谁食！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286341_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286341_comment'></div>子昨舍我，曷月曷日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286341_comment'></div>梦辄堕前，悲子之屈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286341_comment'></div>书复屡讯，勉子以德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286341_comment'></div>彼外物之为重，丧吾宝于聚砾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286341_comment'></div>何飘风而得久，漫黄潦之骤溢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286341_comment'></div>孰后获而夺志，勿先辞而示迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286341_comment'></div>谓坎𡒄以长在，奚死亡而遽及！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286341_comment'></div>岁惨淡以将莫，沪汎澜而横集。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286341_comment'></div>畴昔之会，有言未卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286341_comment'></div>岂隔江之莫写，遂重泉而永毕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286341_comment'></div>展也兹觞，子尚未觌。</div><div id='poem_sentence_27_1286341_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1213&endYear=1213')">1213年闰9月4日</a>　闰九月四日，门人王度卒，有祭文。作品：祭王君玉太博文。<div id='poem_1286344' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286344' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286344?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭王君玉太博文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1213年闰9月4日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286344")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286344_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286344'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286344'>蚤指子学，慎水之坻，爱子德容，质淳无亏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286344_comment'></div>晚哦子诗，钟山之壁，喜子业艺，更进往昔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286344_comment'></div>四十年间，散合靡常，寒温每通，细密其行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286344_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1286344", 1286344, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>籍田</span>以来，倩咐尤谨，我已昧昧，子何恳恳！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286344_comment'></div>自云师友，义定不愆，缓当不后，急当不先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286344_comment'></div>鼓之答桴，我则多愧；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286344_comment'></div>骖之从舆，子信勿背。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286344_comment'></div>属有越客，袖传子书，问无恙耶，乃与讣俱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286344_comment'></div>立朝几何，论事未也，徒成古今，莫奏颂雅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286344_comment'></div>崇高<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1286344", 1286344, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>转瞬</span>，忽堕奚悲，丧我良朋，妨老增衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286344_comment'></div>沥酒于江，巨壑摆撼，执泪满把，自日黮闇。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1286344_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1213&endYear=1213')">1213年10月</a>　十月，黄度卒，有祭文。作品：祭黄尚书文。<div id='poem_1286342' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286342' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286342?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭黄尚书文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1213年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286342")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286342_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286342'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286342'>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286342_comment'></div>方哭公婿，俄又哭公，哀我人斯，一门两逢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286342_comment'></div>始公少时，便期不朽，必天下材，乃相与友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286342_comment'></div>聚书成山，积疑成林，不质不止，断以内心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286342_comment'></div>唯唯默默，与世不隔；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286342_comment'></div>卓卓的的，自为令德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286342_comment'></div>进谏何晚，退奚阔焉，何复外徙，南东其边。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286342_comment'></div>公存匪石，终始根柢，常扶<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1286342", 1286342, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>正论</span>，独引大体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286342_comment'></div>既病既衰，犹为时咨：得士三十，可培国基。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286342_comment'></div>今始五六，嘻其难遇，所识未博，乏贤是惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286342_comment'></div>人生几何，谁能无媮，思公壮意，令我涕流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286342_comment'></div>忧人虽急，忧己尤重，传闻得谢，有识欣悚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286342_comment'></div>天台可去，雁荡可来，公若许我，老怀共开。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286342_comment'></div>兹焉止矣，且置是事，有酾彼酒，有切彼胾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286342_comment'></div>公不歆我，意则已宣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286342_comment'></div>公如我歆，一念万年。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1286342_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1213&endYear=1213')">1213年</a>　冬，余姚胡撙（崇礼）之长子胡卫，通判明州，偶来永嘉，请叶适为其父作墓志铭。作品：胡崇礼墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（题目见《水心集》卷十七。）</span><div id='poem_1286234' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286234' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286234?labeling=true' target='_blank'>胡崇礼墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1213年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286234")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286234_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286234'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286234'>崇礼胡氏，名撙，会稽馀姚人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286234_comment'></div>自承务郎监临安府楼店务，西京中岳庙，两浙转运使、浙西茶盐司干官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286234_comment'></div>庆元元年五月某日，卒于吴，年四十九。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286234_comment'></div>二年十二月某日，葬翁湖山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286234_comment'></div>夫人周氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286234_comment'></div>二子，卫，衍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286234_comment'></div>二女，长嫁歙县主簿石孝淳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286234_comment'></div>崇礼本末<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1286234", 1286234, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>单厚</span>，终始信实，启发颖锐而守以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1286234", 1286234, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>凝固</span>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1286234", 1286234, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>激厉</span>勇敢而行以和顺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286234_comment'></div>俗所溺惰戏鄙诈，未尝留色；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286234_comment'></div>众所竞儇巧黠慧，未尝接心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286234_comment'></div>父礼部尚书沂，乾道名卿，衣冠推其表则；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286234_comment'></div>兄监回易库拱，淳熙名士，朋友载其言行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286234_comment'></div>崇礼步趋顾省，无一事不以父兄为法；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286234_comment'></div>梦想跂及，无一念不以家门为重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286234_comment'></div>先世故书，缇囊珍箧重封之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286234_comment'></div>屏几遗字，笼玩往复或移日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286234_comment'></div>尚书阶不及谥，崇礼顿首丽正门请曰：「先臣幸以詹事侍陛下东宫」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286234_comment'></div>光宗恻然，特赐谥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286234_comment'></div>既定章简，又曰：「此非所以谥臣父也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286234_comment'></div>卒易献简，乃已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286234_comment'></div>回易不幸弃盛年，崇礼悲哀思慕，自罢官乞岳祠，曰：「不得是，无以葬吾兄」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286234_comment'></div>馀姚之胡，冈连垄接者八世矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286234_comment'></div>族人贫富相通，亲疏相恤，堕枝脱叶，亦使自存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286234_comment'></div>越人言松槚寿郁能无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1286234", 1286234, "Clauses/61/Comments/0")'>毁伤</span>者，或羡胡氏，盖崇礼营护其间也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286234_comment'></div>在运司，覈诸县板帐，一日，条无名重赋白于长，请尽除之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286234_comment'></div>长惮其直，逊为谢曰：「当议而行」，不敢迕也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286234_comment'></div>甲寅乙卯岁，浙西先旱后水，湖、常州死无虚室，县梁河堤积尸千数，崇礼泣愬于朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286234_comment'></div>适会所知为丞相，急转米，多卖僧，去长兴安吉山谷中，缘门糜饮之，民赖以少苏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286234_comment'></div>既而崇礼良苦，被疾，遂不起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286234_comment'></div>此皆其亲戚所记，乡里所传，而余识崇礼，且见且闻不忘者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286234_comment'></div>初，朱元晦、吕伯恭以道学教闽、浙士；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286234_comment'></div>有陆子静后出，号称径要简捷，诸生或立语已感动悟入矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286234_comment'></div>以故越人为其学尤众，雨并笠，夜续灯，聚崇礼之家，皆澄坐内观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286234_comment'></div>周氏贤明，身治鲑菜，供饭羹，历岁阅闰，无改其度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286234_comment'></div>士既成名，无不向重崇礼，谓宜世用，然竟不遇，不寿死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286234_comment'></div>死后十五日，周氏死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286234_comment'></div>又八日，幼女亦死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286234_comment'></div>卫、衍尚少，浮柩纵横而归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286234_comment'></div>吴、越人皆咨嗟痛惜，以为天之于吉人善士，何其不少<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_38_1286234", 1286234, "Clauses/119/Comments/0")'>假易</span>至此！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286234_comment'></div>而崇礼执义秉德，既乏为善之报，而死亡摧折之惨反加甚耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286234_comment'></div>然其后未久，卫登进士第，登朝，今为朝奉郎、通判明州；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1286234_comment'></div>衍后其兄，通直郎、知黄岩县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1286234_comment'></div>赠崇礼官五品，周氏安人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1286234_comment'></div>胡氏其复起，起必崇礼子孙，而天之于吉人善士，其终不虚其应，特有久近浅深而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1286234_comment'></div>嘉定六年冬，卫偶来永嘉，见余言旧事，相对叹息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1286234_comment'></div>余观卫恳恳于学术<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_45_1286234", 1286234, "Clauses/140/Comments/0")'>衰废</span>之馀，补缀张设，若欲继其先者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1286234_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1286234_comment'></div>是胡氏义理德性之传，而崇礼之灵所以相之也，影响迟速，何足计哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1286234_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_48_1286234'>生而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_48_1286234", 1286234, "Clauses/149/Comments/0")'>知方</span>，学而蹈道；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1286234_comment'></div>职当成身，岂限常报！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1286234_comment'></div>浅耕先穫，深种后收；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1286234_comment'></div>静而自至，福焉待求！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1286234_comment'></div>露楸亭亭，云冢幂幂；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1286234_comment'></div>崇礼之铭，于以尚德。</div><div id='poem_sentence_53_1286234_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1213&endYear=1213')">1213年</a>　瑞安陈武约卒于此年，叶适有祭文。作品：祭陈殿撰文。<div id='poem_1286349' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286349' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286349?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭陈殿撰文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1213年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286349")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286349_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286349'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286349'>噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286349_comment'></div>道难知，其又难行，参鲁后觉，回夭先成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286349_comment'></div>公初尚少，悬悟独醒，九流百家，不学自能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286349_comment'></div>天固厚之，庞艾端特，公亦挺然，捐身徇国。<div class='inline'
