id='poem_sentence_3_1286349_comment'></div>夫何事谬，以名受抑，三十年中，进寸退尺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286349_comment'></div>清切之地，虽曰大蓬，不及上前，献替雍容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286349_comment'></div>家与饱饭，厥志曷从，岂民无良，使我不逢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286349_comment'></div>稚余从公，狂气未敛；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286349_comment'></div>耋至而衰，百罹易感。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286349_comment'></div>绳床并坐，谛视惨惨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286349_comment'></div>已矣奈何，饮也靡憾。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1286349_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1213&endYear=1213')">1213年12月10日</a>　十二月十日，妻高氏大祥日，代子作青词。作品：大祥设醮青词。<div id='poem_1286375' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286375' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286375?labeling=true' target='_blank'>大祥设醮青词</a><span class='authorDate'>（1213年12月10日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286375")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286375_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286375'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286375'>母亡子在，徒想音容；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286375_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1286375", 1286375, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>祝孝嘏慈</span>，岂迷<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1286375", 1286375, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>影响</span>！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286375_comment'></div>伏念臣妣令人高氏，不登中寿，轻舍幼孤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286375_comment'></div>速甚须臾，宛已二年之隔；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286375_comment'></div>索于罔象，曾无一日之还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286375_comment'></div>敢上觊于超升，乞下招其离散，获留家宇，长奉昏晨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286375_comment'></div>诏许降衷，便肉既枯之骨；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286375_comment'></div>恩垂复性，益歆未泯之魂。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1286375_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1213&endYear=1213')">1213年12月10日</a>　妻高氏大祥日，代子作谢恩青词。<div id='poem_1286376' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286376' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286376?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢恩青词</a><span class='authorDate'>（1213年12月10日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286376")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286376_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286376'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286376'>失母之酷，不知所求；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286376_comment'></div>吁天之哀，自期必获。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286376_comment'></div>伏念臣妣令人高氏，幻身虽谢，灵识故存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286376_comment'></div>素深儿子之慈，岂无感格；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286376_comment'></div>疑有鬼神之祟，致限幽冥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286376_comment'></div>幸赐大恩，俾通宿命，乘化桥而来下，指故室以言归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286376_comment'></div>悲泪交横，何啻再三之渎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286376_comment'></div>烝尝罔替，岂胜如在之情。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1286376_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1213&endYear=1213')">1213年12月10日</a>　妻高氏大祥日，代子作设醮青词。作品：代子设醮青词。<div id='poem_1286374' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286374' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286374?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代子设醮青词</a><span class='authorDate'>（1213年12月10日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286374")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286374_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286374'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286374'>身婴降割，已无可赎之愆；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286374_comment'></div>教许追亡，尚有自投之路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286374_comment'></div>伏念臣母令人高氏，蚤怀微志，备受多艰，经营甚劳，细大可考。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286374_comment'></div>岂不酬偿于晚节，胡为殒落于中年！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286374_comment'></div>遗骨空存，先灵何往！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286374_comment'></div>恍寻求而莫见，冀彷佛以能通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286374_comment'></div>傥旧宇安栖，乞长为孤露之托；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286374_comment'></div>如烦冤上诉，幸曲垂矜度之私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286374_comment'></div>俾获依凭，奚閒存没。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286374_comment'></div>臣等精蕲有限，哀意无穷。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1286374_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1213&endYear=1213')">1213年</a>　为陈亮《龙川集》集后撰文。作品：书龙川集后。<div id='poem_1285931' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1285931' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1285931?labeling=true' target='_blank'>书龙川集后</a><span class='authorDate'>（1213年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1285931")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1285931_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1285931'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1285931'>余既为同甫序《龙川文》，而太守邱侯真长刻于州学，教授侯君敞，推官赵君崇嵓，皆佐其役费。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1285931_comment'></div>同甫虽以上一人赐第，不及至官而卒，于是二十年矣，遗稿未辑，愈久将坠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1285931_comment'></div>真长不惟收恤旧故，存其家声，可以托生死，厉薄俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1285931_comment'></div>至于趯然以其文字废兴任为己事，僚友一时，志同义合，相与扶立<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1285931", 1285931, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>俊豪</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1285931", 1285931, "Clauses/17/Comments/1")'>魁特</span>之绪，使流风馀论犹能表见于后人，盖知古太守职业者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1285931_comment'></div>《同甫集》有《春秋属辞》三卷，放今世经义破题，乃昔人连珠急就之比，而寄意尤深远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1285931_comment'></div>又有长短句四卷，每一章就，辄自叹曰：「平生经济之怀，略已陈矣」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1285931_comment'></div>余所谓微言，多此类也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1285931_comment'></div>若其他文，海涵泽聚，天霁风止，无狂浪暴流，而回漩起洑，萦映妙巧，极天下之奇险，固人所共知，不待余言也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1285931_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1213&endYear=1213')">1213年</a>　为台州重建中津桥撰文。作品：台州重建中津记。<div id='poem_1286131' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286131' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286131?labeling=true' target='_blank'>台州重建中津桥记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1213年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286131")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286131_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286131'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286131'>人情欲永逸，而物废兴不常，成之未几，坏已至矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286131_comment'></div>而况联竹比板以斗江潮日涉之厄，尺量寸度而当往来无穷之劳，则安得支而久哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286131_comment'></div>故台州始作浮桥，十馀年而修者再，未二十年，遂大坏矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286131_comment'></div>嘉定六年，太守俞侯建以为不可复修也，议别造新桥。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1286131_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1213&endYear=1213')">1213年</a>　为王文正祠堂作记。作品：平江县王文正公祠堂记。<div id='poem_1286134' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286134' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286134?labeling=true' target='_blank'>平江县王文正公祠堂记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1213年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286134")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286134_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286134'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286134'>湖外俗<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1286134", 1286134, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>简朴</span>畏事，而平江喜讼善逃，与江、浙嚚县比，其土风所从来久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286134_comment'></div>昔王文正公宰是邑，民甚爱之，生为奉祠，岂非公能以德揉其民于平，而不以刑迫其民于险欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286134_comment'></div>公时初仕，年又极少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286134_comment'></div>夫初则涉历无素，少则血气未定，公方凝然安静，乃若老宦备尝者，贤之禀质，要当与常人异耶！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286134_comment'></div>然公既去平江，又监潭之银场，通判濠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286134_comment'></div>郑州王禹偁荐其材可转运使，驿召至京师，辞不拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286134_comment'></div>献所为文，然后得直史馆，知制诰，则是不独长者盛德，而又尝以吏能称矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286134_comment'></div>其为民补弊剔蠹，锄其悍顽，而兴作利政，以惠养之，意必有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1286134", 1286134, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>风迹</span>可述，惜其世远而不能传也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286134_comment'></div>陋者徒以公为宰相，民所夸羡；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286134_comment'></div>甚至魈退舍，蚁避席，亦曰福力使然，尤谬妄矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286134_comment'></div>且有功德于其民，去而见思，虽狼狈困辱，尚不忍忘，岂待其必为大官哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286134_comment'></div>不然，则彼尝所临涖非不多，而获祠于民何其少也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286134_comment'></div>嘉定六年，永嘉陈君观任平江令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286134_comment'></div>盖今之平江又异昔者，旧讼始决而新争无穷，逋赋适偿而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1286134", 1286134, "Clauses/52/Comments/0")'>追敛</span>无已，至于版籍府藏，一切废坏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286134_comment'></div>君敏于应猝，易乱为整。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286134_comment'></div>未几而县大治，则完揭学舍，以善道示民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286134_comment'></div>公祠故在长庆寺，去县七十九里，君患其不足系民瞻也，即学后新立堂祀公，邑先大夫皆像于两傍，作《四慕诗》，以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1286134", 1286134, "Clauses/66/Comments/0")'>风劝</span>之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286134_comment'></div>其人跂而竦，俛而悟，肸蚃感召，如公复出，亦一时之盛也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286134_comment'></div>夫化不可骤，而君之岁月不及待其久而成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286134_comment'></div>虽然，余所谓有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1286134", 1286134, "Clauses/75/Comments/0")'>风迹</span>可述，必于君取之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286134_comment'></div>县有幕阜、连云二山，高踰万寻，衡岳反在其下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286134_comment'></div>其云气异物，恍惚有无之间，可以渺然而赋矣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1286134_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1213&endYear=1213')">1213年</a>　见石月砚，作文。作品：题石月砚屏后。<div id='poem_1285930' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1285930' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1285930?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题石月砚屏后</a><span class='authorDate'>（1213年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1285930")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1285930_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1285930'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1285930'>欧阳文忠公石月砚屏，余见于陈文惠公裔孙忠懿家，云公昔所赠也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1285930_comment'></div>欧公爱玩不自持，至谓「两曜分为三」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1285930_comment'></div>苏子美、梅圣俞又各为说，美恶相攻，反令此石受垢，良可叹尔！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1285930_comment'></div>物之真者世不必贵，常贵其似。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1285930_comment'></div>然相似之品亦多，盖其偶然，又皆人所共见，不甚异也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1285930_comment'></div>月中有树，世莫能见，特相传尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1285930_comment'></div>石晕正圆白，中涵树文，因其可见象所莫见，虽难言之，若相传为不谬，则以石似月，有足异者矣，况经诸公辩博之论，垂二百年乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1285930_comment'></div>陈君宜宝藏也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1285930_comment'></div>嘉定癸酉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1285930_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1213&endYear=1213')">1213年</a>　为门人袁聘儒之父撰墓志铭。作品：袁声史墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286252' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286252' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286252?labeling=true' target='_blank'>袁声史墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1213年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286252")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286252_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286252'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286252'>声史，袁氏，名直友，幼而奇杰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286252_comment'></div>父延孺，知武进县，提举杜师旦兼常州，怒武进小书字大，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1286252", 1286252, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>诃诘</span>累至，家人恐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286252_comment'></div>君忽立常州庭高语曰：「尊年迈目眵，小书童子所代尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286252_comment'></div>即有罪，儿坐，无及尊也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286252_comment'></div>师旦异之，乃免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286252_comment'></div>稍长，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1286252", 1286252, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>阔达</span>多大节，葬武进于乌程厉山，尽卖其产，道上连驷马，冢旁置百家焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286252_comment'></div>张丞相虽败符离，孝宗意尚锐，论者争言虏当击，君独上疏：「今比句践栖会稽时粗胜不多，愿陛下少忍且须后」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286252_comment'></div>卒割地而和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286252_comment'></div>虞丞相复与上谋出蜀师会长安，君曰：「吴氏挟虏自重久矣，今诚能臂指使从我乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286252_comment'></div>虞公默默，蜀师不果出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286252_comment'></div>既相，荐君及魏掞之于上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286252_comment'></div>君雅不好掞之，固辞；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286252_comment'></div>掞之独召对。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286252_comment'></div>后四十年，君七十馀矣，韩侂胄以虏自为功，士大夫不敢问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286252_comment'></div>君间语侂胄：「自古君倡而后臣和，无以人臣专大征伐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286252_comment'></div>诸葛亮虽为忠，桓温、刘裕为篡矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286252_comment'></div>公将何所据」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286252_comment'></div>侂胄不答，逾年被杀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286252_comment'></div>君又数上书，及与执政多论天下事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286252_comment'></div>金陵无帅，谓宇文签书：「何不自行」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286252_comment'></div>宇文不平，出鄙语曰：「真九百」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286252_comment'></div>君大悔恨，自是不复言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286252_comment'></div>袁氏世家建安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286252_comment'></div>曾祖禫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286252_comment'></div>祖符，第进士，奉议郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286252_comment'></div>奉议次其谱曰：「司徒裔孙卲甫，丑绍、术之乱，逃徙上虞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286252_comment'></div>袁晁反浙东，卲甫之后复丑之，又逃徙闽，故为建安人」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286252_comment'></div>子敏孺，通判沧州，饷军白沟河，军败，死之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286252_comment'></div>廷孺，涟水军司户，女真陷涟水，亦死之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286252_comment'></div>季即武进，用沧州恩补官，素狎秦丞相，秦呼曰：「来！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286252_comment'></div>吾与若共此」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286252_comment'></div>武进但以书叙战守形势，无亲附意，秦不喜，武进竟不往，部注知县者三，终其身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286252_comment'></div>盖上虞、建安之袁能以洁易污，沧州兄弟再死节，武进不阿所欲于故旧；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286252_comment'></div>至君，策画念虑必以国，不以己，穷苦贯稚耋，常守一意，何义理千馀年未尝间绝哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286252_comment'></div>初，虞丞相荐君，既不受，举进士，亦不中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286252_comment'></div>弟说友知衢州，光宗立，持其表来贺，得海盐催煎，未久弃去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286252_comment'></div>为常州推官，又弃去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286252_comment'></div>以嘉定六年二月二日卒，年八十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286252_comment'></div>五月六日，祔于武进之墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286252_comment'></div>夫人陈氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286252_comment'></div>子五人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1286252_comment'></div>女之婿曰文林郎、江东提举司干官曾谅，曰范希奭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1286252_comment'></div>孙男女各四人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1286252_comment'></div>说友事兄谨，宦浸达，至参知政事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1286252_comment'></div>君无一钱，食客辄为万钱具，费皆出参政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1286252_comment'></div>长子聘儒，癸丑进士，朝奉郎、浙东安抚司机宜；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1286252_comment'></div>次举儒，早卒；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1286252_comment'></div>次学儒、钦儒、立儒，皆参政奏官之，人以为难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1286252_comment'></div>余观君疏于世故而谋国无不中，不见小利而大义常独决，其品等在春秋、战国中，非后世之才也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1286252_comment'></div>虽然，创为强者难持而安处弱者易效，盖唐以后通患，而春秋、战国所无也，然则强果不可以创为耶！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1286252_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_50_1286252'>远矣声史！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1286252_comment'></div>匪竞匪营。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1286252_comment'></div>以节为身，千载同清。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1286252_comment'></div>尚其后昆，无改厥承！</div><div id='poem_sentence_53_1286252_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1213&endYear=1213')">1213年</a>　撰俞宽墓志铭。作品：朝奉郎致仕俞公墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286249' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286249' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286249?labeling=true' target='_blank'>朝奉郎致仕俞公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1213年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286249")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286249_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286249'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286249'>公姓俞氏，讳宽，字伯仁，临安人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286249_comment'></div>曾祖举，祖昌龄，世为临安儒家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286249_comment'></div>父彻，尤工文词，与张子韶、凌季文同有时名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286249_comment'></div>公年十三入县学，笔墨意度如成人，长老皆器此儿，行贵矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286249_comment'></div>初，其父既贡辟廱，避乱不行，复摈乡举，慨然谓公曰：「吾闻得而不止，无义者也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286249_comment'></div>失而不止，无命者也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286249_comment'></div>衒于得失，欲止不能，进不足以事君，退不足以成身，是兼无义命者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286249_comment'></div>吾将止矣，若能佐我乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286249_comment'></div>于是公尚少也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286249_comment'></div>及父卒而公已壮，丝粟程度如父在，弗敢失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286249_comment'></div>既而生有以养，死有以送，冠婚宾祭必具，凶荒乏贫必与。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286249_comment'></div>入其塾，诵读之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1286249", 1286249, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>锵然</span>，覃思之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1286249", 1286249, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>悠然</span>，人雅多公父子不穷于儒也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286249_comment'></div>及已得仕，勿亟勿徐，择义必精，不为利回，与可偕入，与否偕退，无失道而已，人又知公不特能以所难止者从其父，而又能以所难进者诏其子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286249_comment'></div>公年益侵，始有山水花竹之乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286249_comment'></div>老兄弟相携间出，乡人见其无车马而步轻履安，相与追随迎劳，曰：「福人也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286249_comment'></div>公则人人与语，酌饮之，且酌且行，欢笑尽日而返。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286249_comment'></div>嘉定元年，公九十三矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286249_comment'></div>子烈以起居舍人为金人报谢使，住都梁境上数月，公常手书问边事虏情，祝使自爱报国，辞甚壮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286249_comment'></div>一日，呼其幼子珙曰：「我欲归矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286249_comment'></div>家人莫喻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286249_comment'></div>明日，又令设洗沐，未及而逝，实七月乙丑，盖舍人出境之日也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286249_comment'></div>是年十二月壬午，葬于下洪山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286249_comment'></div>累封朝奉郎，服绯衣银鱼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286249_comment'></div>夫人张氏，封安人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286249_comment'></div>子三人，长曰璨，将仕郎，早卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286249_comment'></div>四婿，王庭实、高健、王思恭、戴宗师也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286249_comment'></div>孙曰垓，迪功郎、台州宁海县主簿；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286249_comment'></div>曰坦，将仕郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286249_comment'></div>舍人免公丧，召入西掖为侍从臣，今为中奉大夫，知明州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286249_comment'></div>某辱舍人同僚，张夫人墓窃有铭焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286249_comment'></div>暨公葬，又以为请，病不克就者六七寒暑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286249_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286249_comment'></div>公意承其考，变通<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1286249", 1286249, "Clauses/105/Comments/0")'>诎伸</span>以待天命，卒大报之，是宜铭已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286249_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_33_1286249'>涸研燥笔，陋儒之酸；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286249_comment'></div>肥马轻裘，鄙夫之盘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286249_comment'></div>广能具礼，约能守义；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286249_comment'></div>天福方来，导迎使至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286249_comment'></div>长原<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_1286249", 1286249, "Clauses/117/Comments/0")'>回回</span>，高木阴阴；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286249_comment'></div>有式其阡，昭公此心。</div><div id='poem_sentence_38_1286249_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1213&endYear=1213')">1213年</a>　撰高松墓志铭。作品：台州教授高君墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286229' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286229' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286229?labeling=true' target='_blank'>台州教授高君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1213年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286229")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286229_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286229'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286229'>君名松，字国楹，姓高氏，福州长溪人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286229_comment'></div>曾祖亶，祖亨，不仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286229_comment'></div>父融，有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1286229", 1286229, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>素履</span>，起家衡州司户参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286229_comment'></div>既乃遁其官，与野僧游，一筇独往，经年忘归，家人常访求深山始得之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286229_comment'></div>君绍熙元年中第，授临海主簿，青田尉，不赴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286229_comment'></div>教授台州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286229_comment'></div>嘉定四年十二月六日卒，年五十八。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286229_comment'></div>夫人何氏，先卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286229_comment'></div>三子，峻，屼，崃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286229_comment'></div>一女，从浮屠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286229_comment'></div>六年后九月某日，葬廉江山门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286229_comment'></div>始，陈君举为名师，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1286229", 1286229, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>自出</span>新学，文体一变，集处多老成俊特。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286229_comment'></div>君少年，能探请深处，语移日，精锐<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1286229", 1286229, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>锋起</span>，同进皆回目盻<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1286229", 1286229, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>末坐</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286229_comment'></div>试入高选，史丞相当举送，奇之，更擢第一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286229_comment'></div>然君不专为科举，每黎明读书，夜丙止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286229_comment'></div>书益多，见闻益高远，华枝蔓叶自然<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1286229", 1286229, "Clauses/51/Comments/0")'>消落</span>，以是不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1286229", 1286229, "Clauses/52/Comments/0")'>骤合</span>于俗，而昔之同进反先达矣，盖二十年，方有名第，既而司户死，母陈夫人又死，君益以其间放肆于书，寻流会源，今古终极，不轻费一卷顷为洗沐地也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286229_comment'></div>又二十年，同年或已改官登朝，而君方至台州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286229_comment'></div>故例，博士撰解训一二通，据案抗声读，诸生<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1286229", 1286229, "Clauses/68/Comments/0")'>俯首</span>听，谓之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1286229", 1286229, "Clauses/69/Comments/0")'>讲书</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286229_comment'></div>君曰：「是何所明耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286229_comment'></div>令更进迭问，疑难交发，满意而退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286229_comment'></div>士人喜，来学日众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286229_comment'></div>学既久敝，欲大釐改。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286229_comment'></div>令下，一郡父兄欢服，然君已病矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286229_comment'></div>嗟夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286229_comment'></div>君不以老厌仕，几及时也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286229_comment'></div>不以贫愿仕，几有行也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286229_comment'></div>时有早莫，莫亦可也，而犹无时，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286229_comment'></div>行有大小，小亦可也，而犹无行，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286229_comment'></div>始之难于仕，不忘修也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286229_comment'></div>仕而难于禄，愈其修也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286229_comment'></div>修之数十年矣，而用之不能终日，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286229_comment'></div>孔氏之言曰：「良农能稼而不能穑」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286229_comment'></div>嗟夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286229_comment'></div>君亦不能穑而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286229_comment'></div>蓄数十年之种，而芽无获焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286229_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_35_1286229'>吾尝归自南方，而过桐山之里；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286229_comment'></div>始脱幽险，爱其衍美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286229_comment'></div>模山写水，宜产文士；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286229_comment'></div>曷又閟之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286229_comment'></div>尚以孙子。</div><div id='poem_sentence_39_1286229_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1213&endYear=1213')">1213年</a>　撰文祭虞夫人。作品：祭虞夫人文。<div id='poem_1286345' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286345' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286345?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭虞夫人文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1213年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286345")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286345_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286345'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286345'>责子以贵，力欲必穷；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286345_comment'></div>怜子以贫，请期必从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286345_comment'></div>属忧夫人，独寒远客。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286345_comment'></div>岂不荣养，质子来索。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286345_comment'></div>示疾求金，死犹待衾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286345_comment'></div>孰如从兄，存没遂心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286345_comment'></div>匍匐空悲，寂寥罔悔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286345_comment'></div>坏此从容，成彼狼狈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286345_comment'></div>噫象及段，古有至难，薄夫兴吪，君子所叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286345_comment'></div>谁能同生，不同缓急。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286345_comment'></div>以货易德，何啻瓦石！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286345_comment'></div>异景迫人，老惊见之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286345_comment'></div>遥持一尊，式昭母慈。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1286345_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1213&endYear=1213')">1213年</a>　撰文祭俞侍郎。作品：祭俞侍郎文。<div id='poem_1286343' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286343' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286343?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭俞侍郎文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1213年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286343")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286343_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286343'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286343'>昔游太学，公乃心亲，一经寥寥，万类千伦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286343_comment'></div>后使徐州，我独神遇，众宾藉藉，却坐屏语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286343_comment'></div>人情实难，对面山川，寒暖燥湿，随时屡迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286343_comment'></div>浪波虽流，金石常在，我意则然，公亦深体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286343_comment'></div>公侍明主，善良有依，黜薄崇厚，销纷释疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286343_comment'></div>色别朱紫，声辨聪聩，坦然平怀，可以用大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286343_comment'></div>淳熙朝士，存者几馀，况我老病，窜身海隅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286343_comment'></div>隮其作云，临安之上，密而不雨，迹泯无向。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286343_comment'></div>孰谓未泯，公之至诚，尚知我哀，酒泪同倾。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1286343_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1214&endYear=1214')">1214年</a>　永康吕皓来书，疏陈亮、朱熹《王霸义利之弊》，叶适有答书，已佚。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1214&endYear=1214')">1214年</a>　吕皓又携所著《老子说》向叶适求教，叶适为撰文。作品：吕子阳老子支离说。<div id='poem_1285944' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1285944' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1285944?labeling=true' target='_blank'>吕子阳老子支离说</a><span class='authorDate'>（1214年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1285944")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1285944_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1285944'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1285944'>永康吕皓子阳，解《老子》既成，以授余。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1285944_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1285944'>周衰，诸子各骋私见为书，隳裂王道而恣于曲学，聃其最甚者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1285944_comment'></div>祥祲所蒙，大义蔽矣，固不得而强同也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1285944_comment'></div>每叹《六经》、孔、孟，举世共习。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1285944_comment'></div>其魁俊伟特者，乃或去而从老、佛、庄、列之说，怪神<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1285944", 1285944, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>虚霍</span>，相与眩乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1285944_comment'></div>甚至山栖绝俗，木食涧饮，以守其言，异哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1285944_comment'></div>子阳再试省司不中，遂绝迹科举，当得累恩，亦弃不就，有高退之节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1285944_comment'></div>岁青黄，散谷数千，远村穷乏皆赖其救，有任恤之恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1285944_comment'></div>方少时，适会父兄有诏狱，上疏孝宗，且纳所居官，天子感动，立命虑冤枉，并缘坐得释五十馀人，有干子之孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1285944_comment'></div>既隐居无用，独教其子殊，殊亦<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1285944", 1285944, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>凛絜</span>孤立，出处必以度，子阳实知之，父子自为师友，有察父之明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1285944_comment'></div>门内肃如也，闾里雍如也，非所谓魁俊伟特者耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1285944_comment'></div>虽不解《老子》，亦足以发身成名矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1285944_comment'></div>子阳愀然曰：「我性物理而进于道，天地之至公也，眇眇乎身名奚有」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1285944_comment'></div>夫合性情之正而为言者，闻道也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1285944_comment'></div>即性情之安而为言者，近道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1285944_comment'></div>子阳诗歌文字，多自得意，高处往往不减古人，近道之言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1285944_comment'></div>虽不解《老子》，亦足以身名两忘而进于道矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1285944_comment'></div>虽然，山林之士，倚幽树，激寒流，放饭永日，为惰而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1285944_comment'></div>子阳于是书，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1285944", 1285944, "Clauses/70/Comments/0")'>赘附</span>群圣贤，出入释、老，用力甚勤，譬夫博奕愈于已也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1285944_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1214&endYear=1214')">1214年</a>　赠吕子阳绝句二首。作品：送吕子阳二绝。<div id='poem_79888' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1214&endYear=1214')">1214年</a>　为徐玑撰祭文。作品：祭徐灵渊文。<div id='poem_1286346' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286346' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1214&endYear=1214')">1214年</a>　为孙祖佑世友堂作诗并有跋。作品：孙祖佑解元世友堂。<div id='poem_80087' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_80087' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_content_80087'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_80087'>雀寻屋角穿，燕绕帘栊窥。<div id='poem_sentence_0_80087_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_80087'>共贺新宇就，生物欣有依。<div id='poem_sentence_1_80087_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_80087'>含德厚乃祖，义完嗟利隳。<div id='poem_sentence_2_80087_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_80087'>最怜常熟令，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_80087", 80087, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>椟韫</span>不尽施。<div id='poem_sentence_3_80087_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_80087'>温恭化群从，逊悌流深规。<div id='poem_sentence_4_80087_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_80087'>一丝必同袍，粒黍无异炊。<div id='poem_sentence_5_80087_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_80087'>感零天上露，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_80087", 80087, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>润浃</span>园中葵。<div id='poem_sentence_6_80087_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_80087'>鱼蟹虽芳鲜，不如此菜肥。<div id='poem_sentence_7_80087_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_80087'>凉风送佳音，桂林自生枝。<div id='poem_sentence_8_80087_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_80087'>借子赤霄羽，登君文石墀。<div id='poem_sentence_9_80087_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_80087'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_80087", 80087, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>朴斲</span>吁已勤，砻密审所宜。<div id='poem_sentence_10_80087_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_80087'>谅为前峰近，长映客星垂。<div id='poem_sentence_11_80087_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_80087'></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_80087_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1214&endYear=1214')">1214年</a>　撰留耕堂记。<div id='poem_1286125' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286125' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286125?labeling=true' target='_blank'>留耕堂记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1214年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286125")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286125_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286125'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286125'>「但存方寸地，留与子孙耕」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286125_comment'></div>余孩稚时，闻田野传诵，已识其趣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286125_comment'></div>出游四方，所至闾巷无不道此相<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1286125", 1286125, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>训切</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286125_comment'></div>今葛君自得遂取以名堂，盖其词意质而劝戒深，殆非文于言语者所能窥也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286125_comment'></div>凡人衣食、居处、嗜好之须，当身而足，则所留固狭矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286125_comment'></div>然而念迫于室家，莫之赢焉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286125_comment'></div>爱牵于子孙，不能业焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286125_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1286125", 1286125, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>四民</span>百艺，朝营暮逐，各竞其力，各私其求，虽危而终不惧，已多而犹不足者，以其所留不止于一身故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286125_comment'></div>嗟夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286125_comment'></div>若是则诚不可禁已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286125_comment'></div>虽然，其留者则必与是心俱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286125_comment'></div>彼心不丧，术不谬，阡连陌接，谷量山积，而隐诸方寸之小，无惭焉可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286125_comment'></div>不然，则货虽留而心不足以留也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286125_comment'></div>留之家，家不能受；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286125_comment'></div>留之子孙，子孙不能守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286125_comment'></div>甚至刑祸戮辱，水火盗贼，俄反顾失之，皆是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286125_comment'></div>故广欲莫如少取，多贪莫如寡愿，有得莫如无争。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286125_comment'></div>货虽不留，心足以留也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286125_comment'></div>岂惟田野闾巷，而士君子何独不然！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286125_comment'></div>葛君宅才数亩，无高垣大屋之居，桑麻果树，依约可数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286125_comment'></div>有二子，行称其文，卑躬侧履，非礼不动，草衣木食，自乐其乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286125_comment'></div>然后知方寸之小为无穷，而所留者异乎人之留也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286125_comment'></div>若夫由是以致其用，则犹外物也哉！</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1286125_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1214&endYear=1214')">1214年</a>　为蔡必胜之子蔡任撰文。作品：叶岭书房记。<div id='poem_1286135' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286135' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286135?labeling=true' target='_blank'>叶岭书房记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1214年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286135")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286135_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286135'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286135'>丙寅岁，骤起师北伐，余争论于朝，请升、润、江、池别募兵急备守，补楼船器甲之坏以虞寇至，未之许也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286135_comment'></div>无几，田俊迈为虏得，郭倬、李爽、皇甫斌不任战而溃，中外恐悚，遂出余金陵，制置江上，平阳蔡任子重实豫在行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286135_comment'></div>数月，虏大入，淮民避走江南百万家矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286135_comment'></div>一日，传有胡人三骑抄水滨，两舟溺岸侧，城中闻之皆震动，吏颤余前，不能持纸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286135_comment'></div>喟然而叹，始悟建炎以来，虏轻渡江，敢斗明、越之远者，非真劲悍不可敌也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286135_comment'></div>既挑于石跋觜，复邀之定山，虏遽解和州围，退屯瓜步。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286135_comment'></div>郭僎虽败而亦以困归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286135_comment'></div>当是时，子重专治军事，昼夜不得休息，而余听讼断狱，从容如平常，不然则建康之人，未见敌先遁，堕建、绍<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1286135", 1286135, "Clauses/39/Comments/1")'>覆辙</span>矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286135_comment'></div>盖有智者不待素习，然必无惧而后智行焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286135_comment'></div>若子重，余特以故人子辟之，不知其材至此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286135_comment'></div>子重既累黜，仕进路绝，所居林阜折旋，号七星山，叶岭尤近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286135_comment'></div>草木之阴与几席相错，因度为书房，曲径修庑而读书其中，以为材无用于世，则姑寄于书而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286135_comment'></div>夫书不足以合变，而材之高下无与于书，此为不知书者言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286135_comment'></div>使诚知之，则非书无以合变，而材之高下，固书之浅深系焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286135_comment'></div>古之成材者，其高有至于圣，以是书也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286135_comment'></div>静有以息谤，动有以居功，亦书也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286135_comment'></div>泊无所存，而所存者常在功名之外，亦书也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286135_comment'></div>百家众作，殊方异论，各造其极，如天地之宝并列于前，能兼取而无祸，皆书之馀也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286135_comment'></div>书之博大广远不可<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1286135", 1286135, "Clauses/77/Comments/0")'>测量</span>如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286135_comment'></div>惜乎余老死，不暇读矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286135_comment'></div>子其尽心哉，无徒以材为无用而姑寄于书也！</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1286135_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1214&endYear=1214')">1214年</a>　为王宗卿作诗。作品：王宗卿答春堂。<div id='poem_80071' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_80071' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/80071?labeling=true' target='_blank'>王宗卿答春堂</a><span class='authorDate'>（1214年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_80071")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_80071_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_80071'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_80071'>春以喻母慈，慈深春不如。<div id='poem_sentence_0_80071_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_80071'>儿欲答母恩，恩重答无馀。<div id='poem_sentence_1_80071_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_80071'>华堂顿有云岭隔，梦里分明与亲剧。<div id='poem_sentence_2_80071_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_80071'>阿连进奉新批敕，翠裘黄简缘兄得。<div id='poem_sentence_3_80071_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_80071'>朝腾巽章乞祠官，愿身暮归怡母颜。<div id='poem_sentence_4_80071_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_80071'>老农邀君勿轻去，万红千紫扶春住。<div id='poem_sentence_5_80071_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_80071'>雨田自种晴田收，好是天留答春处。<div id='poem_sentence_6_80071_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_80071'></div><div id='poem_sentence_7_80071_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1214&endYear=1214')">1214年</a>　和王宗卿诗。作品：和王宗卿白兔诗。<div id='poem_79972' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_79972' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/79972?labeling=true' target='_blank'>和王宗卿白兔诗</a><span class='authorDate'>（1214年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_79972")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_79972_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_79972'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_79972'>鸦带初阳照广津，兔随斜月满亏轮。<div id='poem_sentence_0_79972_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_79972'>瑞登韩笔名尤重，喜动欧吟事转神。<div id='poem_sentence_1_79972_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_79972'>不道奇毛妒霜雪，应知雅意合松椿。<div id='poem_sentence_2_79972_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_79972'>龟年鹤岁犹嫌少，献与尊堂别纪春。<div id='poem_sentence_3_79972_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_79972'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_79972_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1214&endYear=1214')">1214年</a>　以诗送王宗卿。<div id='poem_79886' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_79886' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/79886?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送王宗卿二首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1214年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_79886")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_79886_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_79886'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_79886'>米多糠少贺丰登，莲吐双花麦五茎。<div id='poem_sentence_0_79886_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_79886'>别有到家呈瑞处，绕篱黄菊向人明。<div id='poem_sentence_1_79886_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_79886'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_79886_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_79885' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_79885' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/79885?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1214年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_79885_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_79885'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_79885'>久违曾闵膝前劳，翻得龚黄意外褒。<div id='poem_sentence_0_79885_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_79885'>但使亲年多过百，人间一品未为高。<div id='poem_sentence_1_79885_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_79885'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_79885_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1214&endYear=1214')">1214年</a>　为林子炳作序。作品：送林子炳序。<div id='poem_1285885' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1285885' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1285885?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送林子柄序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1214年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1285885")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1285885_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1285885'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1285885'>始，余见子尚少尔，知其学于古之道，甚异之，然未知其智足以有明也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1285885_comment'></div>再见子，知其欲以学之者著于行，尤异之，然未知其材足以有成也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1285885_comment'></div>今三见子矣，智之明者知其必求至于是，不然，不强通也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1285885_comment'></div>材之成者知其必能安于命，不然，不强售也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1285885_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1285885_comment'></div>能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1285885", 1285885, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>如是</span>，足矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1285885_comment'></div>又谓余曰：「夫学于古者不徒善其身，著于行者必并淑其乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1285885_comment'></div>吾将与兄弟若亲戚及友朋，旬验而月考之，家营不反顾，私欲不乱意，时积而岁累，使其智交相明，其材交相成，庶几乎善其身者可放以治人，淑于乡者可推以准天下也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1285885_comment'></div>嘻！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1285885_comment'></div>能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1285885", 1285885, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>如是</span>，足不啻矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1285885_comment'></div>抑余闻之，不徒善其身者，以人治身而不以身治人；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1285885_comment'></div>必并淑于乡者，以天下准其乡而不以乡准天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1285885_comment'></div>《诗》云：「他山之石，可以攻玉」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1285885_comment'></div>况人之同类，天下之同域哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1285885_comment'></div>其智之交相明，其材之交相成，不既多矣乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1285885_comment'></div>余犹惧子之狭于乡而专于己，安其足之易而忘其未足之难也，因以为子别，且并告子之愿同者焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1285885_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1214&endYear=1214')">1214年</a>　为周子实撰文。作品：题周子实所录。<div id='poem_1285945' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1285945' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1285945?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题周子实所录</a><span class='authorDate'>（1214年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1285945")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1285945_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1285945'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1285945'>余久居水心<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1285945", 1285945, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>村落</span>，农蓑圃笠，共谈陇亩间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1285945_comment'></div>有士人来，多言场屋利害破题工拙而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1285945_comment'></div>周子实数过余，必示以前辈旧闻，每得一二，耳目<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1285945", 1285945, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>鲜醒</span>，寘于举业丛中，不啻夜光之照敝帚也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1285945_comment'></div>古人多识前言往行，谓之畜德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1285945_comment'></div>近世以心通性达为学，而见闻几废，为其不能畜德也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1285945_comment'></div>然可以畜而犹废之，狭而不充，为德之病矣，当更熟论。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1285945_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1214&endYear=1214')">1214年</a>　为鲍潚妻撰墓志铭。作品：刘夫人墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286232' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286232' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286232?labeling=true' target='_blank'>刘夫人墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1214年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286232")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286232_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286232'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286232'>宜人姓刘氏，名善敬，永嘉人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286232_comment'></div>祖安上，给事中；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286232_comment'></div>父诰，监泉州市舶务；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286232_comment'></div>夫鲍潚，朝散大夫、知融州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286232_comment'></div>嘉定五年，年六十四，七月二十四日卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286232_comment'></div>七年正月十八日，葬仙桂乡安丰奥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286232_comment'></div>子矩，早卒；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286232_comment'></div>野，宁德县尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286232_comment'></div>孙嵤，将仕郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286232_comment'></div>㽦，鼎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286232_comment'></div>始，清卿喜<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1286232", 1286232, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>禅学</span>，趺坐辟观，湛慧凝寂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286232_comment'></div>而野□□□□古今宗说，蔓衍数百千卷，横竖案上，脉理断绝，□下勘点，曰：「某话堕，某未圆」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286232_comment'></div>山袍野衲为不请之友，所造诣人莫测也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286232_comment'></div>夫人素无妇女气习，简服用，鄙<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1286232", 1286232, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>涂饰</span>，资度冲远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286232_comment'></div>闻清卿与野持论，月迈岁往，性现根熟，一旦昭彻，情识俱尽，机鐍洞照，时出颂偈，迥脱常语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286232_comment'></div>既病，以珠步摇付野曰：「以是具棺衾」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286232_comment'></div>垂毕，阅视盥手而逝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286232_comment'></div>野为余言如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286232_comment'></div>昔庞蕴夫妇破家从禅，至卖<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1286232", 1286232, "Clauses/55/Comments/0")'>漉篱</span>自给，男女不婚嫁，争相为死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286232_comment'></div>言论播于天下，浮屠世世记之，以为超异奇特人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286232_comment'></div>虽然，使皆若蕴，则人空而道废，释氏之徒亦不立矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286232_comment'></div>夫人佐其夫有恩，清卿病八年，一饭皆自煮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286232_comment'></div>内事无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1286232", 1286232, "Clauses/68/Comments/0")'>针缕</span>不整，家行无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1286232", 1286232, "Clauses/69/Comments/0")'>纤发</span>不备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286232_comment'></div>欲乐栖止，伦纪通明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286232_comment'></div>若是而共游乎方之外可也，非为蕴者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286232_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_1286232'>既歇既休，不遁不流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286232_comment'></div>何净何垢，无前无后。</div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1286232_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1214&endYear=1214')">1214年</a>　为王思文撰墓志铭。作品：长潭王公墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286301' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286301' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286301?labeling=true' target='_blank'>长潭王公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1214年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286301")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286301_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286301'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286301'>承奉郎赠朝奉郎王君，名思文，字焕之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286301_comment'></div>《王氏谱》曰：「晋丞相导长子悦十世齐辅国将军山容后，两世三为剡县令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286301_comment'></div>又八世，梁武毅将军超孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286301_comment'></div>又二世，隋剡县户曹元顗」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286301_comment'></div>其《墓记》曰：「武毅夫人杜氏，葬于长潭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286301_comment'></div>户曹葬于剡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286301_comment'></div>剡之南，胡塍官塘西，上金西北小遁数百十里，大抵王氏家也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286301_comment'></div>谱不能别其居，墓不能纪其世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286301_comment'></div>合谱与墓，则王氏家长潭，自梁而基，陈、隋而蕃矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286301_comment'></div>承奉每独念曰：「祥、览以上，推王世子受姓之始；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286301_comment'></div>导、悦以下，审超孙、顗定居之实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286301_comment'></div>长潭之王，言贵种也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286301_comment'></div>余一身所承，岂不重哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286301_comment'></div>然自唐迄曾祖璇，三世莫能仕显。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286301_comment'></div>而又有甚急者，方腊叛，祖徽死之，父迪功郎迥哀痛沈剧，未暇及生理」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286301_comment'></div>君幼尚束发，即能任父事，补拾焚坏，疏浅累狭，以致深广。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286301_comment'></div>迪功叹曰：「吾家命脉也，非此儿不兴矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286301_comment'></div>族人长老加敬爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286301_comment'></div>新剡中语：「生子何独不如焕之」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286301_comment'></div>然君常不自喜，曰：「奈何以近利伤远成」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286301_comment'></div>其恭孝和敏，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1286301", 1286301, "Clauses/55/Comments/0")'>先人后己</span>，通有共无，出于天性。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286301_comment'></div>奇书善本辄贵售，属其子必于清论闻流，意未尝不在谱谍间也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286301_comment'></div>已而梦龙登进士第，犹疑曰：「先绪眇微甚矣，今一青衫手板，便扶起否」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286301_comment'></div>后知龙游县，县人持安车来迎，谢不往，曰：「吾岂以无益身，慕馀荣于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1286301", 1286301, "Clauses/71/Comments/1")'>笃老</span>之日哉」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286301_comment'></div>梦龙遂历御史，入宗寺为卿，直中秘书，出守永嘉，诸孙继有科目，稍复晋、梁之旧，如其志焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286301_comment'></div>严子陵葬越，墓侧皆严也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286301_comment'></div>阮遥集葬婺，山旁皆阮也：彼非贤者之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1286301", 1286301, "Clauses/83/Comments/0")'>裔胄</span>耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286301_comment'></div>时远则念息，地寒则虑短，此高人旷士之所以失其世也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286301_comment'></div>君聪朗开达，上顾千岁，已不及用，而子孙赖之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286301_comment'></div>盖嘉定之壬申，年七十九，而以六月戊子卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286301_comment'></div>甲戌十一月丙申，柩葬彩烟乡，山曰鳌峰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286301_comment'></div>夫人袁氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286301_comment'></div>子曰梦庚、梦龙、梦良、梦锡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286301_comment'></div>婿曰史必端。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286301_comment'></div>梦庚、梦良皆已卒，女亦先卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286301_comment'></div>梦龙在永嘉时，受命宝复还，梦锡持表贺，授迪功郎，丽水县主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286301_comment'></div>孙男女十五人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286301_comment'></div>余既以谱次君事，而史称悦子混，混子嘏，嘏子恢，谱乃言嘏子偃，无恢者，误也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286301_comment'></div>然邵之子名恢，而嘏复以名其子乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286301_comment'></div>史亦误也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286301_comment'></div>自怀成四世皆称陈，至景暄始复称梁，字误也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1286301_comment'></div>晋九十馀年，导传三世，梁五十馀年，怀成传九世，亦误也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1286301_comment'></div>惟杜氏葬长潭，户曹葬剡，不误。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1286301_comment'></div>故表曰长潭王公而铭之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1286301_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_44_1286301'>山回水复，昔谁爰宅？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1286301_comment'></div>晋相梁卿，蕃衍千百。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1286301_comment'></div>有笃王公，追念世德；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1286301_comment'></div>勿为崛升，不如继兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1286301_comment'></div>仆垄摧邱，淑绶彯缨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1286301_comment'></div>我能新之，贲此铭称。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_49_1286301'></div><div id='poem_sentence_49_1286301_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1214&endYear=1214')">1214年</a>　为虞夫人撰墓志铭。作品：虞夫人墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286258' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286258' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286258?labeling=true' target='_blank'>虞夫人墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1214年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286258")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286258_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286258'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286258'>夫人虞氏，越山阴人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286258_comment'></div>父手雕北辰像事之，祝曰：「必求九天慧女」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286258_comment'></div>已而夫人生，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1286258", 1286258, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>英悟</span>夙成，劲画<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1286258", 1286258, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>丽语</span>，不学而能，诗书古文，有若素习。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286258_comment'></div>既归其夫，则屏抑聪明，不使衒露，曰：「以文成名，子之责也，我无预焉」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286258_comment'></div>凡一家粗重，昼夜辛苦无所厌，忽而高笔雅韵，常在事外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286258_comment'></div>自舅姑叔季，内外亲戚，皆言「是嫂以贤有识起吾宗」，不以材称也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286258_comment'></div>夫死，夫人焚约弃债。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286258_comment'></div>自治茔宅，据冈阜之宜，合宽俭之中，人尤以为能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286258_comment'></div>而益趣其子于学义，曰：「尔未解，无庸他质」，则为辩说衮衮，如发机中的焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286258_comment'></div>及子纯赐进士第一人，不数年至两制，封夫人为太硕人，夫人无喜色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286258_comment'></div>后乃连外补，众又叹其迟莫落拓，夫人亦无愠容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286258_comment'></div>常曰：「吾忧吾儿不能及古人尔，他尚何觊」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286258_comment'></div>嘉定五年，夫人从其子守温州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286258_comment'></div>明简静恕，能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1286258", 1286258, "Clauses/51/Comments/0")'>消弭</span>大斗，使之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1286258", 1286258, "Clauses/52/Comments/0")'>轻微</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286258_comment'></div>郡人甚爱太守，且爱夫人，曰：「母之教也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286258_comment'></div>夫人亦天性有恩意，闻外杖箠声，辄请入，戒曰：「错打人乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286258_comment'></div>故人愈爱之，如其母云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286258_comment'></div>六年，嫠女幼子，思慕涕泣，自越来迎，夫人怜之，使君不能止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286258_comment'></div>郡人以为大戚，曰：「草树冻枯，天风<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1286258", 1286258, "Clauses/73/Comments/0")'>凄然</span>，而吾母远道，得无霜露之感」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286258_comment'></div>于是使君徬徨乞归，未听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286258_comment'></div>以十二月二十三日卒，年七十七。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286258_comment'></div>七年二月二十日，从夫葬山阴县丞务乡道木原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286258_comment'></div>三子，子纯，中大夫、右文殿修撰；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286258_comment'></div>子英，子彦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286258_comment'></div>一女，嫁坑冶司干官赵公珏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286258_comment'></div>孙曰幼成、寄子、苏老、鼎孙、嫌孙、长孙、硕老、昌孙、申孙、龙孙、艮孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286258_comment'></div>女曰不惜，满女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286258_comment'></div>余每患妇女门内常行，殆不足铭；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286258_comment'></div>若夫人以文字异质立其家声，在穷达无变志，是可述已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286258_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_1286258'>九天下兮游人间，裾<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1286258", 1286258, "Clauses/99/Comments/0")'>褷褷</span>兮佩珊珊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286258_comment'></div>悲寿尽兮复来还，莽故迹兮留空山。</div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1286258_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1215&endYear=1215')">1215年</a>　提举隆兴府玉隆万寿宫，继续授徒撰文。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1215&endYear=1215')">1215年1月20日</a>　正月二十日，友人刘愚卒，同年十月为作墓志铭。作品：刘靖君墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286269' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286269' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286269?labeling=true' target='_blank'>刘靖君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1215年1月20日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286269")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286269_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286269'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286269'>刘靖君，名愚，字必明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286269_comment'></div>太学释褐，教授江陵府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286269_comment'></div>外迁安乡令，乞致仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286269_comment'></div>嘉定八年正月十二日卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286269_comment'></div>明年二月某日，葬城北仁塘原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286269_comment'></div>君行己恭，与人敬，节坚而志厉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286269_comment'></div>学必是古，尤邃讲说，能自浅入深，荆人闻者欣朗<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1286269", 1286269, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>开达</span>，将校改服以听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286269_comment'></div>在安乡，慈允得民和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286269_comment'></div>旁县自占，季年再倍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286269_comment'></div>夫由果、求艺，皆通方之材，非以儒自局也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286269_comment'></div>始，君甚幼，家零落，待我而衣食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286269_comment'></div>父死，伯不吊，疑将祔于祖，一夕舆其柩他山，哀呼<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1286269", 1286269, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>僵踣</span>，几不活者数焉，遂<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1286269", 1286269, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>羸毁</span>终身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286269_comment'></div>入太学，凡三中上舍，积岁月，始升名，比脱纻袍，五十馀矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286269_comment'></div>忧患之味早，视众所甘，殆若<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1286269", 1286269, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>辛螫</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286269_comment'></div>余丞相素知君，至是且召用，澧守苏若霍，诸司杨、吕、范又争荐君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286269_comment'></div>然自谓逾六十矣，发堕齿折，何以驱驰一世，竟舍去不顾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286269_comment'></div>买宅城南，四无垣堑，萧艾数尺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286269_comment'></div>尝展卷长哦，醨酒薄羹，盎如也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286269_comment'></div>垂二十年，至八十三而终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286269_comment'></div>郡人高其行，无不叹惜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286269_comment'></div>观文殿学士何公率尝同舍，故学徒共谥曰靖君，明其无竞之德可宗于时，没有以思，存有以劝也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286269_comment'></div>舍法者，馆学之地也，以经任为限，盖有委心归计于未满之先矣，未有灭迹绝影于既满之后也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286269_comment'></div>作邑者，要路之储也，以改官为急，盖有因缘属托于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1286269", 1286269, "Clauses/76/Comments/0")'>破白</span>之初矣，未有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1286269", 1286269, "Clauses/77/Comments/0")'>逡巡</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1286269", 1286269, "Clauses/77/Comments/1")'>退却</span>于及格之际也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286269_comment'></div>虽然，道远俗散，而天下无肥遁之士，流风所扇，既莫不然，而君岂异于人哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286269_comment'></div>惟尚往于招徕之不豫，故谓之知耻；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286269_comment'></div>迎受于筋力之当衰，故谓之知命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286269_comment'></div>此君之所以自安于古人，而今人以为不及也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286269_comment'></div>君之九世祖曰存，以上柱国自建徙衢，为龙游人，号江潭刘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286269_comment'></div>传绪至君，虽宦未显，而德皆馀于隐矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286269_comment'></div>两娶徐氏，又继以留氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286269_comment'></div>子曰克，曰几，曰凡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286269_comment'></div>女嫁进士应弥明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286269_comment'></div>孙四人，女孙二人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286269_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_33_1286269'>量人而退，非曰自晦；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286269_comment'></div>量己而止，亦其常理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286269_comment'></div>有或为之，有或不能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286269_comment'></div>是名靖君，于后之称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286269_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_37_1286269'>嘉定八年十月□日。</div><div id='poem_sentence_37_1286269_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1215&endYear=1215')">1215年1月</a>　一月，门人平阳陈昂以其母林氏传为请，叶适为之撰文。作品：题陈秀伯碑阴。<div id='poem_1285932' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1285932' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1285932?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题陈秀伯碑阴</a><span class='authorDate'>（1215年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1285932")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1285932_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1285932'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1285932'>余既铭陈君，昂重言曰：「昂母林氏，同县林坳里人，生十八年归先人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1285932_comment'></div>林氏富，陈氏贫，父祖同宦学，道里常千馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1285932_comment'></div>母从姑穷舍中，插槿自蔽，叹曰：『是可长处乎』？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1285932_comment'></div>尽倾赍装，悉买田，始治屋，今砺埼、东山、西奥三村，多遗畴焉」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1285932_comment'></div>余固疑陈君无所合于世，何遽至给足？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1285932_comment'></div>而夫人能以枝叶芘本根，克私成公，信天下贤女子也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1285932_comment'></div>有儒业，无儒效，衣食并日，门单户寒，故昔人以为误，悔之久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1285932_comment'></div>自君高及昂，为儒累累，效无寸尺，误岂少耶！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1285932_comment'></div>母弃昂时，未三十尔，然而上伸舅姑之养，下隆子孙之托，皆夫人力也，不可以无传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1285932_comment'></div>因书畀昂，使刻于铭侧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1285932_comment'></div>嘉定八年正月□□日。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1285932_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1215&endYear=1215')">1215年2月</a>　二月，赵汝駉为台州属县簿建屋以藏户版，叶适为名曰“孔先”而著其词。作品：赵汝駉为台州属县簿建屋以藏户版余为名曰“孔先”而著其词。<span class='inlineComment2'>（四言齐句，题目见《水心集》卷二十九。）</span><div id='poem_1285933' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1285933' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1285933?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赵汝駉为台州属县簿建屋以藏户版余为名曰孔先而著其词</a><span class='authorDate'>（1215年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1285933")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1285933_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1285933'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1285933'>非籍不有，惟籍乃守；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1285933_comment'></div>先圣所正，后学敢谬！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1285933_comment'></div>临海之邑，龠米寸帛；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1285933_comment'></div>必信必实，以作民极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1285933_comment'></div>嘉定八年二月。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1285933_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1215&endYear=1215')">1215年5月</a>　五月，知州留元刚曾在温州州学对学生训话，论述永嘉学派源流，叶适笔录成文。作品：温州新修学记。<span class='inlineComment2'>（叶适笔录。）</span><div id='poem_1286137' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286137' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286137?labeling=true' target='_blank'>温州新修学记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1215年5月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286137")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286137_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286137'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286137'>学立于绍兴初，积久蠹毁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286137_comment'></div>嘉定七年，留公茂潜来守，既修崇之，食增田焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286137_comment'></div>告诸生曰：「峙饰庐廪，苟厚其养而已；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286137_comment'></div>若夫本原师友，必纳诸道德，太守职也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286137_comment'></div>昔周恭叔首闻程、吕氏微言，始放新经，黜旧疏，挈其俦伦，退而自求，视千载之已绝，俨然如醉忽醒，梦方觉也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286137_comment'></div>颇益衰歇，而郑景望出，明见天理，神畅气怡，笃信固守，言与行应，而后知今人之心可即于古人之心矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286137_comment'></div>故永嘉之学，必兢省以御物欲者，周作于前而郑承于后也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286137_comment'></div>薛士隆愤发昭旷，独究<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1286137", 1286137, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>体统</span>，兴王远大之制，叔末寡陋之术，不随毁誉，必摭故实，如有用我，疗复之方安在！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286137_comment'></div>至陈君举尤号精密，民病某政，国厌某法，铢称镒数，各到根穴，而后知古人之治可措于今人之治矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286137_comment'></div>故永嘉之学，必弥纶以通世变者，薛经其始而陈纬其终也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286137_comment'></div>四人，邦之哲民也，诸生得无景行哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286137_comment'></div>夫学不自身始而曰推之天下，可乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286137_comment'></div>虽曰推之天下而不足以反其身，可乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286137_comment'></div>然则妄相融会者零落而不存，外为驰骤者<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1286137", 1286137, "Clauses/55/Comments/0")'>粗鄙</span>而不近矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286137_comment'></div>虽然，未至于圣人，未有不滞于所先得而以偏受为患者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286137_comment'></div>孔子进参与赐示之道，皆曰『吾一以贯之』，岂非无本末之辨，而欲合门人同异之趋哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286137_comment'></div>今观曾子最后之传，终以笾豆有司之事为可略，是则唯而不悟者自若也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286137_comment'></div>子贡平日之愧，终以性与天道为不可得而闻，是则疑而未达者犹在也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286137_comment'></div>且道无贵而苟欲忽其所贱，学无浅而方自病其不能深乎」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286137_comment'></div>诸生侧听，转相语，自学官及其父兄，皆请余笔授。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286137_comment'></div>嘉定八年五月。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1286137_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1215&endYear=1215')">1215年</a>　友人毛予中卒，作墓志铭。作品：毛积夫墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（题目参见《水心集》卷二十一。）</span><div id='poem_1286265' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286265' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286265?labeling=true' target='_blank'>毛积夫墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1215年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286265")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286265_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286265'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286265'>毛子中，字积夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286265_comment'></div>髫鬌有杰气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286265_comment'></div>十七八，游江淮，乱后邸店未复，卧起草中，时时与小寇遇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286265_comment'></div>行数千里，知形便<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1286265", 1286265, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>阸塞</span>，涕泣曰：「管、乐不再生耶」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286265_comment'></div>夜捕鹿，迷失道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286265_comment'></div>旦，见楼堞矗然，合肥城也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286265_comment'></div>值帅方打围，戈甲耀日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286265_comment'></div>君荐虎皮道旁，燔肉煮葵菜，浩歌纵饮，弗为视。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286265_comment'></div>帅揖语，大惊，延上座。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286265_comment'></div>稍长，亲师友，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1286265", 1286265, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>学习</span>今古，诸生不能言者，尽为言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286265_comment'></div>复出沔、鄂，得贤豪名世士识别，相与欢甚，因留门下终身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286265_comment'></div>所至专席高论，衮衮无对，怒马独出，不施鞍勒，或入酒垆，凭高悲啸，众共怪不敢近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286265_comment'></div>荒旅穷肆，饭客常满，或闭门袖手，借书危读，经旬月无不通，人畏其博而专也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286265_comment'></div>然不得骋于科举，礼部尝欲第其文，又议不合而止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286265_comment'></div>余屡讽君：「年过五十矣，气惰将衰，血燥将臞，宜<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1286265", 1286265, "Clauses/55/Comments/0")'>返耕</span>筑室，以顺天命，无徒取俗子赘疣也」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286265_comment'></div>君怏怏不自喜，尚行游无忌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286265_comment'></div>至踰六十，度决不偶矣，始弃去，蔽长松，吟《小山》、《招隐》诸词，哀愤激烈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286265_comment'></div>作振衣亭，请余记，未毕而病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286265_comment'></div>嘉定八年五月二十一日，以书来曰：「某自量不在友朋下，幸赐之铭，抑扬<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1286265", 1286265, "Clauses/73/Comments/0")'>咏叹</span>之，死不恨矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286265_comment'></div>其明日卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286265_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286265_comment'></div>人之所长，世固不易知；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286265_comment'></div>君之所有，人亦不能察也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286265_comment'></div>然使其当蹉跎之年而与之以奋迅之日，则必损奇特之行而为平易之趋矣，讵轻测哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286265_comment'></div>所居瑞安深谷，号毛家山，以毛姓者二千人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286265_comment'></div>祖镗，九十三，父骧，八十六，皆笃学好善称于乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286265_comment'></div>君自谓寿种，故其规图常宽远若有待，然才六十五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286265_comment'></div>娶张氏，正而婉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286265_comment'></div>生四子，允，兑，兖，充。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286265_comment'></div>二女，辑，辅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286265_comment'></div>再娶康氏，一子，曰应，早夭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286265_comment'></div>九年某月日，葬瑞峰山广度寺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286265_comment'></div>允来速铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286265_comment'></div>予老愦愦，下笔未数行，耳如附蜩，头眩转不自支，其于抑扬<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_1286265", 1286265, "Clauses/116/Comments/0")'>咏叹</span>之意盖微矣，故所述仅如此，然可以观其大略也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286265_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_34_1286265'>不役志以灭命，不厚生而薄性。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286265_comment'></div>古之人哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286265_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_36_1286265'>嘉定八年九月□日。</div><div id='poem_sentence_36_1286265_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1215&endYear=1215')">1215年</a>　友人戴溪卒，有祭文。作品：祭戴詹事文。<div id='poem_1286347' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286347' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286347?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭戴詹事文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1215年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286347")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286347_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286347'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286347'>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286347_comment'></div>我幼而贱，公长又贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286347_comment'></div>怜我教我，莫如公先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286347_comment'></div>爰自生发，逮于华颠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286347_comment'></div>志有各行，情无间焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286347_comment'></div>公晚逢时，儒道始尊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286347_comment'></div>乃尹震宫，乃长冬官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286347_comment'></div>文词之宗，经术之源。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286347_comment'></div>麒麟独游，凤凰孤鶱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286347_comment'></div>君父恩深，百请难绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286347_comment'></div>疏广虽去，终在魏阙；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286347_comment'></div>贡禹虽留，卒以死别。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286347_comment'></div>都人熟见，感事悲切。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286347_comment'></div>我病卧久，迟公远归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286347_comment'></div>曷不迎门，曷不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1286347", 1286347, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>倒衣</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286347_comment'></div>曷不大斗，以酌寿祺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286347_comment'></div>缟巾素衫，相对曷为！</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1286347_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1215&endYear=1215')">1215年</a>　为戴溪作挽词二首。作品：戴肖望挽词二首。<div id='poem_80230' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_80230' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/80230?labeling=true' target='_blank'>戴肖望挽词二首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1215年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span id='poem_title_80230_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_80230'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_80230'>岩岩萧太傅，謇謇郑尚书。<div id='poem_sentence_0_80230_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_80230'>可惜流光晚，翻无急诏除。<div id='poem_sentence_1_80230_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence'
