id='poem_sentence_4_80056_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1215&endYear=1215')">1215年</a>　友人朱黼之母杨氏卒，叶适撰挽词。作品：朱文昭母杨氏挽词。<div id='poem_79952' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_79952' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/79952?labeling=true' target='_blank'>朱文昭母杨氏挽词</a><span class='authorDate'>（1215年）</span><span class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_79952_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_79952'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_79952'>文昭有贤母，白首教篇章。<div id='poem_sentence_0_79952_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_79952'>义并<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_79952", 79952, id='poem_sentence_4_79952_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1215&endYear=1215')">1215年</a>　朱黼卒，叶适有祭文。作品：祭朱文昭文。<div id='poem_1286350' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286350' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286350?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭朱文昭文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1215年）</span><span class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286350_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286350'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286350'>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286350_comment'></div>子生逾七十，余犹病其不延；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286350_comment'></div>子讣已隔年，余尚意其或存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286350_comment'></div>独钓孤耘，蜑浦蛮村。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286350_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1286350", 1286350, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>汲坟</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1286350", 1286350, "Clauses/7/Comments/1")'>鲁壁</span>，暗理冥论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286350_comment'></div>蓬蒿当径兮蒹葭门，面肉拥肿兮眼<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1286350", 1286350, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>眵昏</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286350_comment'></div>书成家而不食，缉野茧以自温。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286350_comment'></div>嗟子去今何之兮？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286350_comment'></div>电先置，云后轩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286350_comment'></div>听我苦词，有来<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1286350", 1286350, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>荧魂</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1286350_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1215&endYear=1215')">1215年</a>　为李宽之母郑氏撰墓志铭。作品：李宜人郑氏墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（题目、人名见《水心集》卷二十一。）</span><div id='poem_1286262' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286262' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286262?labeling=true' target='_blank'>宜人郑氏墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1215年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286262")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286262_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286262'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286262'>天富北监在海玉环岛上，乾道丙戌秋分，月霁，民欲解衣宿，忽冲风骤雨，水暴至，闼启膝没，及霤荡胸，至门已溺死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286262_comment'></div>如是食顷，并海死者数万人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286262_comment'></div>监故千馀家，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1286262", 1286262, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>市肆</span>皆尽，茅苇有无起灭波浪中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286262_comment'></div>老子长孙，无复安宅四十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286262_comment'></div>濮阳李宽知监事，民赖其力，始就高燥，立栋宇，坊巷绳引，闾伍鳞次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286262_comment'></div>既满，诸司辄留止，不得代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286262_comment'></div>凡六年而监市成，略如丙戌前矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286262_comment'></div>噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286262_comment'></div>四十年而后得一监官，何好官之难遇欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286262_comment'></div>虽好官，六年而后集，然则以急疾草猝为功者非虐欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286262_comment'></div>以故李君每来，予礼接不怠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286262_comment'></div>君以其母夫人状授予铭，不辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286262_comment'></div>夫人郑氏，徐州人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286262_comment'></div>曾祖仅，从祖望之，皆有名先朝，至侍从贵人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286262_comment'></div>夫曰朝请大夫、浙东参议某，丞相文定公迪五世孙，太子少保东之四世孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286262_comment'></div>既生大家，其归又相门也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286262_comment'></div>家法不教而严，家政不虑而修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286262_comment'></div>参议为奉直子，夫人前后事舅姑无违，爱子不异庶嫡，遇妾媵尤有意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286262_comment'></div>参议没，子孙遵其德，贵贱百五十人，合堂共食，令壹而和，职分而同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286262_comment'></div>新嵊之郊，以为是北方名族能存其旧风，可效而行者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286262_comment'></div>夫人卒年七十五，葬从其夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286262_comment'></div>子十人，得仕者文宿与宽也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286262_comment'></div>孙若曾孙男女，婿若群孙婿，又数十人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286262_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286262_comment'></div>可以为众矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286262_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_1286262'>其众则增，其贤必升，夫人之承。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286262_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_1286262'>嘉定八年二月□□日。</div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1286262_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1215&endYear=1215')">1215年</a>　为徐谊撰墓志铭。作品：宝谟阁待制知隆兴府徐公墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286263' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286263' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286263?labeling=true' target='_blank'>宝谟阁待制知隆兴府徐公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1215年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286263")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286263_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286263'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286263'>公讳谊，字子宜，一字宏父，温州人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286263_comment'></div>有徐寅者，相王审知，寅之孙薄其官，遁于平阳，自号处士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286263_comment'></div>寅以上，无世次，而处士庙于沙冈为别祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286263_comment'></div>公二大父仲熙、世充，考迪哲，皆以惠爱称，今江南石马头百间，其所为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286263_comment'></div>公贵，赠迪哲奉直大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286263_comment'></div>公登乾道八年进士第，教授池州，江、浙后进负担来学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286263_comment'></div>宰相曰：「当为太学得师」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286263_comment'></div>除博士，迁枢密院编修官，太常丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286263_comment'></div>天子亲政久，威柄积上，臣下多皇恐顾望，事惟奉旨而行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286263_comment'></div>公谏曰：「若是，则人主日圣，人臣日愚，陛下谁与共功」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286263_comment'></div>上<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1286263", 1286263, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>色庄</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286263_comment'></div>改论乐制，公对：「宫乱则荒，其君骄；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286263_comment'></div>商乱则陂，其官坏」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286263_comment'></div>上遽和容受规，徐曰：「卿可谓不以官自惰矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286263_comment'></div>丁奉直忧，知徽州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286263_comment'></div>光宗内禅，公奏：「三代圣王，有至诚而无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1286263", 1286263, "Clauses/51/Comments/0")'>权术</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286263_comment'></div>至诚不息，则可以达天德矣，愿陛下守而勿失」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286263_comment'></div>宰相邀公留，公谢曰：「某方欲劝公去，奈何」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286263_comment'></div>歙县上妻杀夫，以五岁女为證。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286263_comment'></div>公疑曰：「妇人能以一掴致人死乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286263_comment'></div>缓之，未覆也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286263_comment'></div>既而实税于庭，死民母及弟在焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286263_comment'></div>乃言：「我子欠租，系久不胜饥，大叫，役者批之，堕水亹耳，宿昔死矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286263_comment'></div>然后保正伏罪，并劾受赇吏，阖州感动。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286263_comment'></div>所谓实税者，婺源户馀三万，而逃绝六千，其新安还朱乡户税役十无二三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286263_comment'></div>公始令民以干照造簿自实其税，应者<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1286263", 1286263, "Clauses/82/Comments/0")'>蚁集</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286263_comment'></div>婺源诸大豪不喜，谤于朝，移提举浙西，公请讫籍而行，不听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286263_comment'></div>公在徽，常单行入村落，除其赋万缗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286263_comment'></div>山谷叟老，具鼓笛侑酒送公，泣而别。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286263_comment'></div>过朝，疏兵民十二事，持不下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286263_comment'></div>留丞相请付外，上悉<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1286263", 1286263, "Clauses/98/Comments/0")'>钩摘</span>要语，多施行者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286263_comment'></div>时方拜右丞相，将引公自助，延纳甚密。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286263_comment'></div>公曰：「上圣质宽平，相公宜匪躬协赞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286263_comment'></div>若意向有偏，祸不旋踵」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286263_comment'></div>揖而起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286263_comment'></div>浙西水利尤重，公论其切于时者曰：「昔下流不疏而水上溢，故凿直曲港，还三江故道，开宜兴百渎，所以顺导下流也，惟高亢田径乃潴堰之尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286263_comment'></div>昔之言水，如单锷、郏亶皆是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286263_comment'></div>今开吴松江下流与宜兴渎属之海者，无虑数十百所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286263_comment'></div>异时浦港<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_38_1286263", 1286263, "Clauses/121/Comments/0")'>磬折</span>以趋海，今近浦之民，多取径直决。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286263_comment'></div>苏、湖、常、秀，旧为泽国，比年雨或后至，种且不入，盖围田众而疏导多也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286263_comment'></div>小人见利，不畏其害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1286263_comment'></div>围于浅水，既为高田；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1286263_comment'></div>围于茭荡，既为稻田。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1286263_comment'></div>二俱不已，复有下脚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1286263_comment'></div>始之重陂，太半为土；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1286263_comment'></div>始之良田，背水自晒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1286263_comment'></div>十日不雨，农废作业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1286263_comment'></div>然且承用旧说，又将疏之，失利害之实矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1286263_comment'></div>故旧田沟浍当浚治，围田下脚无辄开，已开未填当捺合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1286263_comment'></div>今之言水者，能行是三说，则高原旧田还为衍沃，而农不病矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1286263_comment'></div>入为吏部郎，迁右司左司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1286263_comment'></div>今上即位，迁检正中书门下公事，兼权刑部侍郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1286263_comment'></div>岁不熟半天下，宰相以命公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1286263_comment'></div>吏或夜半携乞米奏至，歘起拥被，烛其重轻量分数应之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1286263_comment'></div>报下，未尝失时刻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1286263_comment'></div>进权工部侍郎，知临安府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1286263_comment'></div>公叹曰：「京师弹压，如<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_56_1286263", 1286263, "Clauses/169/Comments/0")'>传餐</span>耳，况应办手掬食也，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_56_1286263", 1286263, "Clauses/171/Comments/1")'>首善</span>何所仰」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1286263_comment'></div>请于上曰：「今鳏寡<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_57_1286263", 1286263, "Clauses/173/Comments/1")'>孤独</span>夜宿煖堂寒苦，而僦钱无所得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1286263_comment'></div>臣欲度都门外为入居养院，费大不给。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1286263_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_59_1286263", 1286263, "Clauses/177/Comments/0")'>内帑</span>皆三朝恭俭之积，陛下幸图之」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1286263_comment'></div>上蹙然曰：「卿言是也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1286263_comment'></div>赐贯馀四万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1286263_comment'></div>即相地市木。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1286263_comment'></div>会有御史刘德秀疏，罢，庆元元年三月也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1286263_comment'></div>胡纮再疏，责副团置南安军，移袁、婺州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1286263_comment'></div>嘉泰元年六月，始听自便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1286263_comment'></div>久之，复朝散大夫，提举崇道观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1286263_comment'></div>二年，王师北出，以公知江州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1286263_comment'></div>辞不获，与子浑杖策赴郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1286263_comment'></div>虏数道迎拒，兵压江、汉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1286263_comment'></div>奸民乘隙谋乱，讹言相恐，公捕诛首恶，字其饿羸，恩接宾旅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1286263_comment'></div>募人于浙东，部分练习。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1286263_comment'></div>烧墼筑城，创轻舠船，往来捷疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1286263_comment'></div>由夏口而下，依公为强。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1286263_comment'></div>虏既去，朝廷是公所为，除集英殿修撰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1286263_comment'></div>寻待制宝谟阁，知建康府，兼制置江淮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1286263_comment'></div>初，虏围庐、楚不下而归，犹缀濠州以待和，时时<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_76_1286263", 1286263, "Clauses/222/Comments/0")'>抄劫</span>，与我师遇，杀伤相当。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1286263_comment'></div>淮人大惊，复<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_77_1286263", 1286263, "Clauses/226/Comments/0")'>迸流</span>江南，在建康者数十万，皆曰「虏再至矣」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1286263_comment'></div>公昼夜拊循，益备御，请专捍敌，勿从中御。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1286263_comment'></div>朝廷疑于和戎弗利，亟移知隆兴府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1286263_comment'></div>黑风猺罗孟传与其叔罗时忿争雠杀，湖南抑孟传而右时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1286263_comment'></div>孟传怒，杀飞虎亲兵以叛，祸连江西，吉、赣四州劳于戍守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1286263_comment'></div>孟传因土豪以情愬公，且乞降，公为列上曰：「受降非臣事也，顾大计宜听」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1286263_comment'></div>诏许从江西降，而公已病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1286263_comment'></div>既而赏及两路，公不预也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1286263_comment'></div>嘉定元年，有星陨州之南，明日七月朔而公卒，年六十五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1286263_comment'></div>二年十一月朔，葬于鸣山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1286263_comment'></div>夫人宋氏，先公卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1286263_comment'></div>二子，冲，迪功郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1286263_comment'></div>浑，将仕郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1286263_comment'></div>长女嫁西外宗教林士逊，次进士章学礼，幼未行也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1286263_comment'></div>公少而异质，自然合道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1286263_comment'></div>天下虽争为性命之学，然而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_92_1286263", 1286263, "Clauses/269/Comments/0")'>滞痼</span>于语言，播流于偏末，多茫昧<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_92_1286263", 1286263, "Clauses/271/Comments/0")'>影响</span>而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1286263_comment'></div>及公以悟为宗，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_93_1286263", 1286263, "Clauses/273/Comments/0")'>县解</span>昭彻，近取日用之内，为学者开示。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1286263_comment'></div>修證所缘，至于形废心死，神视气听，如静中震霆，冥外朗日，无不洗然自以为有得也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1286263_comment'></div>前后执政以国事访公者，告之必尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1286263_comment'></div>初，光宗疾，免到重华，而日视朝毋改，中外交章<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_96_1286263", 1286263, "Clauses/288/Comments/0")'>论切</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1286263_comment'></div>公既入谏，退见宰相，泪落曰：「上慰纳从容，然目瞪不瞬而意恍惚，真病也已！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1286263_comment'></div>盍为诏四方祷祠郊庙，进皇子嘉王参决」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1286263_comment'></div>留丞相未及用，跳之徐村，上使公谕还浙江亭，复其位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1286263_comment'></div>疾终不愈，孝宗崩，又不能丧，公与少保吴琚议，请太皇太后临朝，扶嘉王代祭，答群臣礼，幕士取帘帏俟命，后自祭奠，乃止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1286263_comment'></div>于是将禫，上临丧未可知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1286263_comment'></div>公忧愤呕泄卧，责赵丞相曰：「自古人臣，为忠则忠，为奸则奸；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1286263_comment'></div>忠奸杂而能济者，未之有也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1286263_comment'></div>公内虽心惕，外欲坐观，非杂之类欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1286263_comment'></div>国家存亡，在兹一举」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1286263_comment'></div>赵公问策安在，公以知閤门事蔡必胜授之，使同为知閤韩侂胄固请于太皇太后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1286263_comment'></div>禫之旦，嘉王竟立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1286263_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1286263_comment'></div>当是时，谤讟横流，而天下之口不可遏矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1286263_comment'></div>微公定计，将使一夫攘袂而趋，然则社稷永安而宗庙常尊，泽施于今者，公之大节不可掩也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1286263_comment'></div>余观公忠利惨怛，能任大事，视人如己，本无以取嫉于世，而世亦无忌公者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1286263_comment'></div>独侂胄既得志则骄肆，公面诲之，惭恨，故得祸最酷，流落十年不复用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1286263_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_113_1286263'>古之闻道，以身为言；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1286263_comment'></div>开乾阖坤，圆方各旋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1286263_comment'></div>后之闻道，以言为身；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1286263_comment'></div>因其已行，笔舌之陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1286263_comment'></div>人实不弘，狭而易安；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1286263_comment'></div>公胡早悟，婴此百难！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1286263_comment'></div>绍熙<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_119_1286263", 1286263, "Clauses/362/Comments/0")'>讧讧</span>，天作闵凶；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1286263_comment'></div>举世惊哀，莫敢弭锋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1286263_comment'></div>公初何营？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1286263_comment'></div>裂肝碎脑；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1286263_comment'></div>公后何成？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1286263_comment'></div>宗国是保。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1286263_comment'></div>彼谮人者，不祀忽谮；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1286263_comment'></div>畀尔枕席，诒我泥涂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1286263_comment'></div>生不求荣，死不求谥；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1286263_comment'></div>人臣之义，惟以自致。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1286263_comment'></div>鸣山高高，终风续涛；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1286263_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_130_1286263", 1286263, "Clauses/380/Comments/0")'>爰居</span>时来，助其永号！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1286263_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_131_1286263'>嘉定八年三月□日。</div><div id='poem_sentence_131_1286263_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1215&endYear=1215')">1215年</a>　为曾渐撰墓志铭。作品：中奉大夫尚书工部侍郎曾公墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286264' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286264' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286264?labeling=true' target='_blank'>中奉大夫尚书工部侍郎曾公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1215年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286264")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286264_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286264'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286264'>公曾姓，渐其名，字鸿甫，建昌南城人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286264_comment'></div>曾氏散居江南、闽、浙，仕无不取卿相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286264_comment'></div>其别自抚州房居南城者，至公曾祖处仁、祖度，始种殖于学，为儒先生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286264_comment'></div>父发，用累举恩监文思院。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286264_comment'></div>公生未十年，遍读经史，默诵《左氏》，能通举大义，笔下语五六十翁不能为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286264_comment'></div>踰冠，三上省，以第二人赐及第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286264_comment'></div>授承事郎，签书南康军判官，政<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1286264", 1286264, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>纤巨</span>一佐其守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286264_comment'></div>值旱饥，沿村劝粜，又决狱问囚，走旁郡，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1286264", 1286264, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>劳苦</span>未尝辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286264_comment'></div>诸司赖其亲己，合议荐之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286264_comment'></div>公逡巡辞曰：「一路当荐有几，不知求，何用我」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286264_comment'></div>曰：「名孰先于子」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286264_comment'></div>公曰：「刺举不责功实，而以名取人，纵我急进不爱惜，得无反坠弃之乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286264_comment'></div>固辞而免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286264_comment'></div>召为国子正，迁博士、秘书郎、实录检讨官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286264_comment'></div>时论者方以道学为伪，攻讪出一口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286264_comment'></div>公厌之，求去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286264_comment'></div>得请矣，有觉其不可者，留于朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286264_comment'></div>迁著作佐郎，兼考功郎官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286264_comment'></div>求去不已，知滁州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286264_comment'></div>会新立法，不更邑，不守边。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286264_comment'></div>请主管冲佑观，知兴化军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286264_comment'></div>将行，文思卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286264_comment'></div>初，韩侂胄阴执国柄，宰相以下，升黜在手。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286264_comment'></div>公不往见，故御史程松希指罢公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286264_comment'></div>至是侂胄自为平章军国事，未毕禫而以秘书丞召，改著作郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286264_comment'></div>兼兵部郎官，军器少监，秘书少监。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286264_comment'></div>公以骤迁为非，复求去，不许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286264_comment'></div>方下诏伐虏，直北门者既辞不就，将用公，公曰：「吾初不与议，必用我，即以自所为言者具之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286264_comment'></div>诏遂寝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286264_comment'></div>又将以公检点枢密院机速文字，公复力陈不可，又寝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286264_comment'></div>连求去，侂胄虽不乐，然极重公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286264_comment'></div>迁秘书监兼国史编修、实录检讨官，兼权中书舍人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286264_comment'></div>自侂胄贵，台谏、给舍供隶役，弹劾、封驳皆具检请命，意所欲者指授行之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286264_comment'></div>侂胄殊不以望公，有论执，即时止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286264_comment'></div>右史陈子翀归自泉州，众畏其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1286264", 1286264, "Clauses/101/Comments/0")'>凶险</span>，公曰：「是尝无故自言为察官者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286264_comment'></div>今地位已高，必抗颜据要路，肆其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1286264", 1286264, "Clauses/106/Comments/0")'>噬搏</span>，善人无类矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286264_comment'></div>侂胄不敢违，为改一州使去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286264_comment'></div>于是女真虽退，而濠州屡扰，小使议和久不决。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286264_comment'></div>虏坚责正隆以前礼赂，持论者各怀苟且。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286264_comment'></div>公推衍大义，载于训词，扶善警奸，得承平<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1286264", 1286264, "Clauses/118/Comments/0")'>奥雅</span>之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286264_comment'></div>又为改定誓书，以存旧体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1286264_comment'></div>俄而侂胄死，素抑夺者多收用，而赵彦逾亦在中，公争曰：「彦逾无预世道兴衰，何为于此」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1286264_comment'></div>又将籍故宰相陈自强之家，公又争曰：「国家本忠厚为德，二百馀年矣，岂以自强故薄哉」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1286264_comment'></div>时公已病，于更改向背之际多不合，慨然叹息曰：「天下事止于是邪」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1286264_comment'></div>遂以亲嫌乞免，且以病力祈去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1286264_comment'></div>除权工部侍郎，升史官为同修撰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1286264_comment'></div>病遂不愈，开禧二年十二月二十九日卒，年四十二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1286264_comment'></div>顾其子曰：「汝虽贫，尚有田宅，谨持门户，无因我死乞怜于人」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1286264_comment'></div>嘉定二年二月十八日，葬于太平乡香山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1286264_comment'></div>夫人汪氏，封恭人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1286264_comment'></div>子曰颖茂，承务郎、监福州水口镇；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1286264_comment'></div>曰颖秀，修职郎、新监绍兴府苗米仓；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1286264_comment'></div>曰颖敷，早卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1286264_comment'></div>女之婿曰卫樗，某官；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1286264_comment'></div>幼未行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1286264_comment'></div>公孚尹明达，既早慧，长益贯研古今，出其英华，皆有新意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1286264_comment'></div>方得志于科目，不知者以凡人料之，谓其驰逐资富贵，鲜淟相矜伐而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1286264_comment'></div>而公谦明无傲世之行，简远无近俗之名，未得不愿进，暂进辄求退，处乐而忧，遇变而安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1286264_comment'></div>当庆元、嘉泰间，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_58_1286264", 1286264, "Clauses/177/Comments/0")'>朝衣</span>负涂炭之羞而以冰玉自洁，青蝇蒙<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_58_1286264", 1286264, "Clauses/178/Comments/0")'>樊棘</span>之诮而与鸿鹄偕逝，合德引类，思深虑长，天下以为贤而宜书，死而宜传，惟公也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1286264_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_59_1286264'>孰司下人，逐死奔生？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1286264_comment'></div>有膏其污，不臞其清。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1286264_comment'></div>是为鸿甫，正性之闲；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1286264_comment'></div>众攫群攘，舒徐其间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1286264_comment'></div>时虽我畀，我不时即；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1286264_comment'></div>进怯退勇，先义后得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1286264_comment'></div>终于开禧，始于庆元；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1286264_comment'></div>吉士庇国，如珠润渊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1286264_comment'></div>日之所杲，月之所耀；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1286264_comment'></div>不可盖藏，可以并照。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1286264_comment'></div>香山之冈，云木茫茫；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1286264_comment'></div>其年<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_70_1286264", 1286264, "Clauses/207/Comments/0")'>短折</span>，其存永长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1286264_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_71_1286264'>嘉定八年九月□日。</div><div id='poem_sentence_71_1286264_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1215&endYear=1215')">1215年</a>　为徐玑撰墓志铭。作品：徐文渊墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286266' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286266' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286266?labeling=true' target='_blank'>徐文渊墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1215年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286266")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286266_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286266'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286266'>君名玑，字文渊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286266_comment'></div>任主建安簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286266_comment'></div>麻溪峒民业铸兵鬻盐者，官穷治群捕，因相聚为逆，多杀伤官军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286266_comment'></div>州恐，以君将而往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286266_comment'></div>君不用众，但命土人持榜告谕，皆散去，罪止三人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286266_comment'></div>监造贡茶，其长欲取于数外，君正色曰：「此人主所以荐天地宗庙，非臣下所宜得」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286266_comment'></div>移永州司理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286266_comment'></div>兵官大执<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1286266", 1286266, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>平民</span>为贼，冀以成赏，君明其无罪，尽释之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286266_comment'></div>丞龙溪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286266_comment'></div>县城旁陂，旧称溉万顷，豪党私以为田，陂浸坏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286266_comment'></div>君既按视，即疏凿如旧规。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286266_comment'></div>移武当令，改长泰令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286266_comment'></div>未至官，嘉定七年十月二十日卒，年五十三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286266_comment'></div>初，唐诗废久，君与其友徐照、翁卷、赵师秀议曰：「昔人以浮声切响单字只句计巧拙，盖风骚之至精也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286266_comment'></div>近世乃连篇累牍，汗漫而无禁，岂能名家哉」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286266_comment'></div>四人之语遂极其工，而唐诗由此复行矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286266_comment'></div>君每为余评诗及他文字，高者迥出，深者寂入，郁流瓒中，神洞形外，余辄俛仰终日，不知所言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286266_comment'></div>然则所谓专固而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1286266", 1286266, "Clauses/52/Comments/0")'>狭陋</span>者，殆未足以讥唐人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286266_comment'></div>得魏人单炜教书法，心悟所以然，无一食去纸笔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286266_comment'></div>暮年，书稍近《兰亭》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286266_comment'></div>余谓君：「当自成体，何必《兰亭》也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286266_comment'></div>君曰：「不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286266_comment'></div>天下之书，篆籀隶楷皆一法，法备而力到皆一体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286266_comment'></div>其不能为《兰亭》者，未到尔，非自成体也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286266_comment'></div>此论余尤骇之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286266_comment'></div>君与余游最早，余衰甚，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1286266", 1286266, "Clauses/73/Comments/0")'>朋曹</span>益落。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286266_comment'></div>君将请于朝，弃长泰终从余，未及而死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286266_comment'></div>垂绝，忽长叹言争争者数声，其妹抚之曰：「何争」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286266_comment'></div>张其目视曰：「天争」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286266_comment'></div>妹又曰：「天何争」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286266_comment'></div>复力疾大声曰：「争名也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286266_comment'></div>遂卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286266_comment'></div>嗟夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286266_comment'></div>君之志固远于利矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286266_comment'></div>岂以名未就而有不足耶！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286266_comment'></div>徐氏自君曾祖逢，祖赠朝议大夫泽，为泉州晋江人，皇考潮州太守定，始为温州永嘉人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286266_comment'></div>君娶刘氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286266_comment'></div>子曰鼎，国子学生；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286266_comment'></div>曰吕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286266_comment'></div>八年十月十二日，葬建牙乡郭溪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286266_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_40_1286266'>如是而足以名欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1286266_comment'></div>则所名何止于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1286266_comment'></div>如是而不足以名欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1286266_comment'></div>则古之为名寡矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1286266_comment'></div>呜呼文渊！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1286266_comment'></div>其视斯铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1286266_comment'></div>余之所传，天亦不争。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1286266_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_47_1286266'>嘉定八年九月□日。</div><div id='poem_sentence_47_1286266_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1215&endYear=1215')">1215年</a>　为何瀹撰墓志铭。作品：故通直郎清流知县何君墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286267' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286267' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286267?labeling=true' target='_blank'>故通直郎清流知县何君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1215年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286267")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286267_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286267'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286267'>何君名瀹，字叔禹，处州龙泉人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286267_comment'></div>其为南城簿、明州造船场，皆以忧不任事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286267_comment'></div>后自温州司理、绍兴府比较务六年，而用荐者知清流县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286267_comment'></div>开禧三年八月十五日，卒于官，年五十六。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286267_comment'></div>先是夫人富氏殁三年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286267_comment'></div>嘉定元年十二月十九日，合葬于北里山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286267_comment'></div>子一人，曰处权，转运司发解进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286267_comment'></div>女之夫曰张希颜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286267_comment'></div>君门地贵重，盖太傅、清源郡王执中曾孙，徽猷阁待制志同之孙也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286267_comment'></div>父佃，官差减，犹奉直大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286267_comment'></div>然君自待如寒人单士，未尝以势加物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286267_comment'></div>居官明恕，必举职而不为苛暴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286267_comment'></div>尤恬淡，远于声利，群从多已显，而君故常调，泊如也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286267_comment'></div>将往清流，值淮北既交兵，众劝无行，君曰：「遇患不避，义也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286267_comment'></div>州檄县馈军前，独君能至，全椒、来安不至也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286267_comment'></div>既而宿、寿两将遁走，溃卒聚滁河无食，噪且乱，君以戍兵粮贷之，得免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286267_comment'></div>虏决逾淮，吏焚廪弃积而南，或又因以为利，君独携口券马草钱五十馀万归之总司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286267_comment'></div>守怒，扣空箧，强拘之，总为诮谕，乃已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286267_comment'></div>虏退，守与郡僚留金陵沙上卖酒，不敢返，君挺身坐黄悦村，招散民种稻，趣刈麦，昼夜暑湿中，遂得疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286267_comment'></div>县人赖君方再造，皇恐扶舆医建康，冀其愈，竟不起，哭而去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286267_comment'></div>悲夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286267_comment'></div>自复雠之议出，余固恳恳论奏，谓「须<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1286267", 1286267, "Clauses/71/Comments/1")'>家计</span>牢实，彼必不可以进而后我可以不退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286267_comment'></div>且盟约久定矣，必彼先破坏而后我徐应之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286267_comment'></div>不然，前直掩而较后曲，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1286267", 1286267, "Clauses/77/Comments/1")'>藩墙</span>扰则堂奥摇矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286267_comment'></div>执事者不审，轻动妄发，未几，勇怯俱弊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286267_comment'></div>使据正守义如君之贤者，劳苦困极而不得以老死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286267_comment'></div>故其丧归，乡人迎之，无亲疏贵贱皆霣涕雪泣，非特其恩厚素感于人，亦以君仕不逢，失其常所而痛惜之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286267_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286267_comment'></div>非有述于后，则何以著君之志而塞其子孙之哀！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286267_comment'></div>宜处权请之勤也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286267_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_1286267'>身都子男兮家相门，往而不还兮堕时纷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286267_comment'></div>故园有茹兮溪有缗，魂乎归徕兮无怨呻！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286267_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_32_1286267'>嘉定八年十一月□日。</div><div id='poem_sentence_32_1286267_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1215&endYear=1215')">1215年</a>　为林璞夫人陈氏撰墓志铭。作品：林夫人陈氏墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（题目见《水心集》卷二十一。）</span><div id='poem_1286268' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286268' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286268?labeling=true' target='_blank'>夫人陈氏墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1215年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286268")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286268_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286268'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286268'>夫人陈氏，平阳陈营里人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286268_comment'></div>嫁同县林璞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286268_comment'></div>二子，善补，善祗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286268_comment'></div>二女婿，彭表，韩原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286268_comment'></div>林君田不盈一顷，多莱少熟，父母老，逊其业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286268_comment'></div>而林君昼夜诵书攻文，高吟啸，绝不知家事，事一关夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286268_comment'></div>夫人能饰无为有，久而若自然，夫之父母安焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286268_comment'></div>其后频死丧，岁恶，田且尽，犹力课其子学不怠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286268_comment'></div>比寡居而病<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1286268", 1286268, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>风湿</span>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1286268", 1286268, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>沈废</span>逾二十年，夫人常顺听，无悲戚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286268_comment'></div>有劳苦之者，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1286268", 1286268, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>欣笑</span>弥日，得好语而归，人以为难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286268_comment'></div>当是时，善补经营四方，杰材伟工无不师友，然尚疑信未决，独夫人以其志许之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286268_comment'></div>已而善补及进士第，教授无为军，兵乱，人相食，俟间辄谒告视夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286268_comment'></div>夫人麾使速去，曰：「汝已出身事君，又<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1286268", 1286268, "Clauses/45/Comments/1")'>反顾</span>乎」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286268_comment'></div>嘉定五年九月某日卒，年七十四。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286268_comment'></div>盖舅姑夫子不疚其艰而相依以成者，固人之常理；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286268_comment'></div>至于饥羸疾痛不失其善而必与以报者，亦天之常道；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286268_comment'></div>此夫人所以兼得之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286268_comment'></div>夫人并家有盐亭山，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1286268", 1286268, "Clauses/54/Comments/0")'>阿阜</span>深衍，卜者指斗门之北曰，「是宜冢藏」，善补税于官十亩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286268_comment'></div>初，光孝寺亦佃盐亭山，在斗门之东，由戴家山而北。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286268_comment'></div>僧以官人所择必山之胜也，因内热，冒争之，曰：「此吾赐山也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286268_comment'></div>既又曰：「吾山所至也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286268_comment'></div>有司索文书验视，不酬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286268_comment'></div>吏取<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1286268", 1286268, "Clauses/71/Comments/0")'>重货</span>，持不肯决。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286268_comment'></div>僧诅鬼路骂，聚<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1286268", 1286268, "Clauses/74/Comments/0")'>刀槊</span>，期以死竞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286268_comment'></div>后二年，御史、民曹交相趣，符移总总，常平司定以善补为直，然后十一月初六日，葬夫人于山之原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286268_comment'></div>呜呼，有是哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286268_comment'></div>夫赀不足以买山而葬于官荒之山，此誉士之穷，王政所必矜也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286268_comment'></div>遁耕织之劳而欲擅山海之富，此异端之横，王法所必诛也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286268_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_1286268'>徂徕躬耕葬百丧，使皆如此讼何当！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286268_comment'></div>蔂梩而掩孰在亡！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286268_comment'></div>夫人之归天与冈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286268_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_31_1286268'>嘉定八年十一月。</div><div id='poem_sentence_31_1286268_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1215&endYear=1215')">1215年</a>　为郑景元撰墓志铭。作品：郑景元墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286270' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286270' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286270?labeling=true' target='_blank'>郑景元墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1215年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286270")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286270_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286270'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286270'>景元，郑氏，名伯英，永嘉人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286270_comment'></div>隆兴癸未进士甲科。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286270_comment'></div>满秀州判官，调杭州、泉州推官，母老，不忍行，食岳庙禄九年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286270_comment'></div>终母丧，授宁德县丞，福建提刑司干官，犹不行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286270_comment'></div>于是六十三矣，遂以绍熙三年四月戊午卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286270_comment'></div>十一月壬申，葬西山余家奥原上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286270_comment'></div>二子，为仁，次求仁，早夭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286270_comment'></div>女嫁蔡幼学、李复、陈鉴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286270_comment'></div>世常病景元负气不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1286270", 1286270, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>屈折</span>，故不用，殆豪士哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286270_comment'></div>以余考之，景元信道不苟，且宁不用，盖志士欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286270_comment'></div>方秦氏以愚擅国，人自识字外，不知有学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286270_comment'></div>独景元与其兄，推性命<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1286270", 1286270, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>微眇</span>，酌今古要会，师友警策，惟统纪不接是忧，今天下以学名者，皆出其后也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286270_comment'></div>其论议愤发，笔宽墨馀，佞者<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1286270", 1286270, "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>褫魄</span>，贵者夺色，岂血气为之使哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286270_comment'></div>然则志也，非豪也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286270_comment'></div>故事，第四人与上三人<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1286270", 1286270, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>踵蹑</span>以进，累日月皆至卿相，景元耻自言，故甘为选人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286270_comment'></div>最后，朝廷以干官者拔滞淹之一门也，景元笑曰：「此冗官尔，法当废省，可身践之乎」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286270_comment'></div>卒以疾辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286270_comment'></div>夫思其职不利其禄，然则志也，非豪也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286270_comment'></div>自其兄及薛士隆、陈君举擅一世臧否，号为方峻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286270_comment'></div>景元不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286270_comment'></div>虽闾巷<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1286270", 1286270, "Clauses/65/Comments/0")'>一介之善</span>，甚或辈行绝数等，未尝不委曲外比，售其声名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286270_comment'></div>家产无十金，僮傔单特，宾从昼夜集，绝肺烹蛤蚬蔬橡杂陈之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286270_comment'></div>急难窘助，扁舟径往，夜半扣门，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1286270", 1286270, "Clauses/76/Comments/0")'>摄衣</span>偕出矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286270_comment'></div>景元果豪耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286270_comment'></div>不以富贵适己而以贫贱徇人耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286270_comment'></div>故曰：「亦志而已矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286270_comment'></div>始，行之游陈、郑间，后婿郑氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286270_comment'></div>景元为余言，「参政李泰发之孙委禽焉，吾顾不敢」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286270_comment'></div>已而中第，今为临海丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286270_comment'></div>景元没二十三年，夫人黄氏卒，既合葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286270_comment'></div>时行之以龙图阁待制知福州，书来曰：「郑公远矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286270_comment'></div>宜于此乎铭」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286270_comment'></div>夫豪与生尽，志死不灭，立德之本也，孔、孟所尊也，何较远近哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286270_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_33_1286270'>陈代尝言，「枉尺直寻」，孟氏所诃，曰有利心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286270_comment'></div>嗟乎景元，尺何必枉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286270_comment'></div>既定之荣，矢而不往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286270_comment'></div>以介责身，以通恕人；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286270_comment'></div>饿于西山，草秋木春。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286270_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_38_1286270'>嘉定八年十一月□日。</div><div id='poem_sentence_38_1286270_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1215&endYear=1215')">1215年</a>　为陈瑾撰墓志铭。作品：东塘处士墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286271' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286271' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286271?labeling=true' target='_blank'>东塘处士墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1215年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286271")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286271_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286271'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286271'>昔平阳陈岩，学能造微，为陈君举、徐子宜密授。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286271_comment'></div>不幸早夭，二公哀伤，俾余记其藏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286271_comment'></div>时余自都返，缭出荆州，茇舍仓卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286271_comment'></div>岩弟志崇，踪迹参讯，追及余西山，重戴拜伏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286271_comment'></div>又逼同婺、越两界，乃得以竁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286271_comment'></div>志崇词藻精丽，从余久，每语家人，细大辄噤不吐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286271_comment'></div>余窃怪，诘其故，则长忾泪落曰：「吾兄铭，而吾父踵逝，亦有意于子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286271_comment'></div>以吾未与士齿也，率三岁迟之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286271_comment'></div>迟六七而吾老，不堪士矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286271_comment'></div>不敢怠，不敢请，即死，无以见吾父」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286271_comment'></div>嗟夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286271_comment'></div>余文无用于地上矣，岂志崇姑欲慰其父兄于地下而然耶！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286271_comment'></div>君名瑾，字国器，由左厢兵马使十世为石床里人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286271_comment'></div>床方三寻，平如琢，相传古有异人所为饮奕也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286271_comment'></div>君<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1286271", 1286271, "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>轩岸</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1286271", 1286271, "Clauses/42/Comments/1")'>沈雄</span>，言动未尝妄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286271_comment'></div>既苦志不酬，右书左琴以善<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1286271", 1286271, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>娱乐</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286271_comment'></div>其行常损己益物，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1286271", 1286271, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>种植</span>甚远，积累而可<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1286271", 1286271, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>称纪</span>者众矣，然最著者在东塘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286271_comment'></div>初，县驿道东北皆行水中，漱淖垫没数十里，晨暝风雨，咫尺断还往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286271_comment'></div>北塘合一县之力，间乞丐大官，历年多，犹未备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286271_comment'></div>君独用一家力，栽石取底，东达之海，阅闰而成，坚悍可屐，甚潦不能淫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286271_comment'></div>人以为君德，更号曰东塘陈氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286271_comment'></div>余尝患世之富贵苟自肥，于民无毫发利益。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286271_comment'></div>君虽贫贱，不为身计，特作此塘，利垂无穷，可尚已！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286271_comment'></div>卒年七十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286271_comment'></div>夫人林氏，先九日卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286271_comment'></div>林氏淑而知礼，事姑九十，白首尽敬，闺房咨以为法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286271_comment'></div>志崇弟曰德崇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286271_comment'></div>二婿，曰林萃、邵持正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286271_comment'></div>既葬君于安仁山二十年，而孙男七人皆已长立，孙女三人，其二已嫁，而曾孙男女亦三人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286271_comment'></div>君尝以志崇得解恩与修职郎，然不足为君道，而君亦讳不肯当也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286271_comment'></div>故题其墓曰「东塘处士」，而铭之曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_1286271'>承于祖而未信，付以子而犹疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286271_comment'></div>孙衍曾蕃，东塘岂欺！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286271_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_32_1286271'>嘉定八年十二月□日。</div><div id='poem_sentence_32_1286271_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1215&endYear=1215')">1215年</a>　为漳浦县圣祖殿作记。作品：漳浦县圣祖殿记。<div id='poem_1286138' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286138' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286138?labeling=true' target='_blank'>漳浦县圣祖殿记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1215年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286138")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286138_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286138'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286138'>漳浦五千户，粱山蔽其西，南属之海，特高秀多异峰，相传时见巨人迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286138_comment'></div>山中美果自熟，不知名数，就啖者欲持去，辄迷失道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286138_comment'></div>近人而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1286138", 1286138, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>奇诡</span>不常如此，非止以禽兽草木为广大也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286138_comment'></div>郭西古陂，涵受重水，修数里，有真君道院。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286138_comment'></div>初，国家感冥会，按道书，命天下皆立圣祖像，长吏拜伏如原庙礼，而殿在焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286138_comment'></div>盖必山水合吉而后神灵依之，所以助民<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1286138", 1286138, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>福祥</span>，祈国永延也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286138_comment'></div>顾民惰吏慢，公私室庐无能与山答，陂废不治，枯落见底，而殿亦徙置，邻于岳祠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286138_comment'></div>然则山水背人，而神灵失其所栖宿矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286138_comment'></div>故至今其俗尚<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1286138", 1286138, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>陋狭</span>，反为下邑，非天不畀人也，人自弃尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286138_comment'></div>赵君师缙之来，偶以事行西门，访道院，周视良久，忽若心动。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286138_comment'></div>道士言状，因慨然曰：「政莫先是耶」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286138_comment'></div>即以其力复殿旧址。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286138_comment'></div>浚陂茀堤，闭纵以时，使水常满泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286138_comment'></div>而谓邑人曰：「据阴阳法，坤申上位也，水之长生，俊秀所出也，邑其兴于善乎」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286138_comment'></div>陂阴为堂，中湖为亭，高有桃柳，下有菱芡，红敷绿绕，俯仰映带。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286138_comment'></div>然后山水之与人，若拱若揖，若响若翕，寝食坐起，无不与接。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286138_comment'></div>神之居严以清，民之游和以安，令于其间，上敬下顺，无不自得也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286138_comment'></div>夫好不度义而恣情之所发，故有声色田猎之娱，珠玉裘马之玩，甘于独往而人莫能同，圣人未尝不深致其戒也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286138_comment'></div>至于所好者山水，则以为豫于德而贤之，岂非动静协应物之宜，寿乐由<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1286138", 1286138, "Clauses/78/Comments/0")'>反躬</span>之效欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286138_comment'></div>然其汎之㳽茫，遁之幽遐，家薜萝，友鸥鹭，亦甘于独往而人莫能同，固不取也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286138_comment'></div>君治县宽简，即山水之近，与民共乐以宁其神，是可书矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286138_comment'></div>嘉定八年五月。</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1286138_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1215&endYear=1215')">1215年</a>　为绍兴府新置二庄作记。作品：绍兴府新置二庄记。<div id='poem_1286139' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286139' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286139?labeling=true' target='_blank'>绍兴府新置二庄记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1215年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286139")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286139_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286139'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286139'>嘉定七年，越州初建二庄于诸暨县古博岭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286139_comment'></div>越之西皆海也，水怒防失，冒宝盆，隳白杨市，两县间荡为沧溟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286139_comment'></div>事闻，上遽颁经常，命太守赵公彦倓筑堤捍之，起汤湾，迄王家浦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286139_comment'></div>公又益以留州钱千馀万，役自秋复夏，乃毕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286139_comment'></div>越人谢曰：「昔土塘而今石，宜可久无患」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286139_comment'></div>公愀然曰：「未也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286139_comment'></div>堤之始穴尺寸尔，慢不省，积岁月大溃矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286139_comment'></div>今虽壮好，后将复然，石何能为」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286139_comment'></div>初，民杜思齐获罪，家没入公，请买于安边所，别藏其租，以备补完，一也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286139_comment'></div>越为郊畿而民不胜困，卿相迭守而治反<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1286139", 1286139, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>疏卤</span>，城堞营署无不敝缺，聘问燕飨无不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1286139", 1286139, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>削损</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286139_comment'></div>若夫命乡论秀，合乐以侑之，古今常礼也，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1286139", 1286139, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>然且</span>寂而无声数十年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286139_comment'></div>公又叹曰：「越为东诸侯率，而简陋至此，况以贵傲士哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286139_comment'></div>幸吾在，皆略具，而《鹿鸣》歌矣，若异日何」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286139_comment'></div>因思齐之馀，又买诸傅氏，以待三岁之用，二也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286139_comment'></div>余知公者，故以记来请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286139_comment'></div>嗟夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286139_comment'></div>政未有不得其本而后成其末也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286139_comment'></div>故捍海之功巨而害原于小，举士之费小而所关者大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286139_comment'></div>二庄之作，赵公知之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286139_comment'></div>非特此也，券易米而致镪，三物相流通，不贵籴矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286139_comment'></div>持券索钱，昏暮无不与，天下坐会子，犯法相望，不滥罚矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286139_comment'></div>勤收而俭藏，以贯万数者四十，乙亥大旱，举以救民，不病岁矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286139_comment'></div>有本之效也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286139_comment'></div>抑又有焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286139_comment'></div>夫名峰异岭，在扬州盖百千所，独会稽为镇山，越之奇胜峻特擅于东南者，以山也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286139_comment'></div>其深泉高瀑，百道争流，昔人浚而为湖，山之窈窕萦纡，媚于越中者，以湖也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286139_comment'></div>湖今废矣，公能疏凿以复汉、晋之旧，存王、谢遗迹，则治越之美，可垂无穷，二庄区区，又岂足为公道哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286139_comment'></div>虽然，天子召公归矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286139_comment'></div>嘉定八年。</div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1286139_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1215&endYear=1215')">1215年</a>　为信州教授厅作记。作品：信州教授厅记。<div id='poem_1286133' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286133' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286133?labeling=true' target='_blank'>信州教授厅记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1215年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286133")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286133_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286133'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286133'>阅《上饶志》，无教授厅，岂其缺欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286133_comment'></div>教官廨署必与学接，别在城之东，于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1286133", 1286133, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>扣请</span>也难；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286133_comment'></div>且其处卑下，雨淖甚则往来绝；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286133_comment'></div>夫非其所宜居，而居又不足以安，缺之是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286133_comment'></div>王君梦龙始至，召诸生之长郑著计曰：「今直舍后多美竹，尽学地也，民实僦之，而昔人弗知改，当有待。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286133_comment'></div>学颇馀钱，士得属餍幸矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286133_comment'></div>然吾不及常与士接，则以义理为馁者，教官之责也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286133_comment'></div>于是著挟郑汉儒、余凤分事竭作，州与转运总领亦稍颁焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286133_comment'></div>未几而师友所延，家人所燕，街通户达，公私便之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286133_comment'></div>而君尤喜，曰：「是举也，自大官至庶役，售材之节，归地之情，无一不顺者，非人力也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286133_comment'></div>余以为不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286133_comment'></div>教授，师也，与吏异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286133_comment'></div>吏往任，师不往教也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286133_comment'></div>吏治舍，师不谋居也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286133_comment'></div>《子衿》之歌曰：「纵我不往」，言师不往教而子不可不来也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286133_comment'></div>又曰：「在城阙兮」，言师不能舍寂寞而就子，子娱城阙而忘诸乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286133_comment'></div>责之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286133_comment'></div>拥彗而迎，北面而事，而避正堂以舍，可也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286133_comment'></div>修其墙屋，不毁伤其薪木，而返，可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286133_comment'></div>然则师必守道不妄屈而后能教，至于室庐寝处，则诸侯国人固严授之，师不以自累也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286133_comment'></div>今吏部按格<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1286133", 1286133, "Clauses/65/Comments/0")'>注拟</span>，或特命为堂差，赢数千里，至终始坐学不敢离局，长吏但以虚礼揖使上车，亲遇反在曹掾下，所丐乞未有获者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286133_comment'></div>国人父兄则曰：「是官使教子弟尔，舍馆未安，我何病」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286133_comment'></div>课试外涉豪发，谤论山积矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286133_comment'></div>盖君所为喜者，法使之然，非古义也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286133_comment'></div>君既去，继者施君应龙，又曰：「我携家<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1286133", 1286133, "Clauses/84/Comments/1")'>背乡</span>，一旦住好宅，地利近，由君德也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286133_comment'></div>复自喜，请余记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286133_comment'></div>二君，余友也，故陈其奉法于今而思义于古者勉之，明不可以徒喜也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1286133_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1215&endYear=1215')">1215年</a>　为郭氏种德庵作记。作品：郭氏种德庵记。<div id='poem_1286141' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286141' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286141?labeling=true' target='_blank'>郭氏种德庵记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1215年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286141")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286141_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286141'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286141'>余同年友琼州刺史郭宗之既没十年，子森卿，用举者五人知崇阳县，磊卿，锁主簿厅中乙科，皆会余容成之阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286141_comment'></div>始，余与宗之别长沙，宗之卒，而余有大戚，不暇哭，又不能吊，相对惭惋而已，故访其家事甚详。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286141_comment'></div>森卿曰：「先人葬莲堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286141_comment'></div>莲堂之山，吾数世坟墓所藏也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286141_comment'></div>并墓之庐，吾先人手所建也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286141_comment'></div>郭氏自镇将传祀三百，约而久，劳而安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286141_comment'></div>至曾大父，正信均淑，一县所取平也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286141_comment'></div>大父施舍惠助，一乡所倚成也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286141_comment'></div>而后先人士以文显，吏以善最。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286141_comment'></div>然而端直寡偶，不视时向背，缩敛自爱，不倚势进趋，每曰：『吾欲先世流泽常在子孙，使坟墓永有荫托尔，奚以多为』！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286141_comment'></div>故庐上之题，我兄弟以种德为之名者，先人之志也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286141_comment'></div>余闻而叹曰：「允哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286141_comment'></div>夫家非德不兴，德非种不成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286141_comment'></div>虽一人之家，未尝不与天地同其长久；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286141_comment'></div>所以不能者，天地种之而人毁之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286141_comment'></div>人之所就未豪末，而以丘山之心承之，为益几何！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286141_comment'></div>然则谦者种之，盈者毁之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286141_comment'></div>我可以得，彼岂可以丧！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286141_comment'></div>一夫<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1286141", 1286141, "Clauses/56/Comments/0")'>攘臂</span>，万人裂其肘矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286141_comment'></div>然则让者种之，争者毁之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286141_comment'></div>义勇而先，利怯而后，君子也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286141_comment'></div>小人反是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286141_comment'></div>然则廉者种之，贪者毁之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286141_comment'></div>冥升疾走，辔必失，御必蹙；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286141_comment'></div>徐行安步，神乃泰，气乃舒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286141_comment'></div>然则退者种之，进者毁之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286141_comment'></div>为其厚不为其薄，治于己不治于人，宁散无积，宁俭无忲，皆所以种而不敢毁也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286141_comment'></div>朝种暮穫，市人之德也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286141_comment'></div>时种岁穫，农夫之德也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286141_comment'></div>种不求穫，不敢毁，不敢成，圣贤之德也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286141_comment'></div>冲漠之际，万理炳然，种者常福，毁者常祸，天地之德也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286141_comment'></div>郭氏其知所以种矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286141_comment'></div>知所以种，则知德矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286141_comment'></div>嘉定八年十一月。</div><div id='poem_sentence_33_1286141_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1215&endYear=1215')">1215年</a>　为二刘文集撰文。作品：题二刘文集后。<div id='poem_1285934' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1285934' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1285934?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题二刘文集后</a><span class='authorDate'>（1215年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1285934")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1285934_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1285934'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1285934'>按《周博士集》，元丰时，永嘉同游太学者，蒋元中，沈彬老，刘元承，刘元礼，许少伊，戴明仲，赵彦昭，张子充，所谓「不满十人，而皆经行修明为四方学者敬服」者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1285934_comment'></div>绍兴末，州始祠周公及二刘公于学，号三先生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1285934_comment'></div>余观自古尧、舜旧都，鲁、卫故国，莫不因前代师友之教，流风相接，使其后生有所考信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1285934_comment'></div>今永嘉徒以僻远下州，见闻最晚，而九人者，乃能违志开道，蔚为之前，岂非俊豪先觉之士也哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1285934_comment'></div>然百馀年间，绪言遗论，稍已坠失，而吾侪浅陋，不及识知者多矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1285934_comment'></div>幸其犹有存者，岂可不为之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1285934", 1285934, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>勤重</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1285934", 1285934, "Clauses/33/Comments/1")'>玩绎</span>之欤！</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1285934_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1216&endYear=1216')">1216年2月</a>　二月，为门人赵汝铎之父赵善悉撰墓志铭。作品：中大夫直敷文阁赵公墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286272' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286272' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286272?labeling=true' target='_blank'>中大夫直敷文阁两浙运副赵公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1216年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286272")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286272_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286272'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286272'>公名善悉，字寿卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286272_comment'></div>父不尤，知横州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286272_comment'></div>祖士起，武义大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286272_comment'></div>曾祖仲驯，开府仪同三司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286272_comment'></div>由仪同至太宗四世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286272_comment'></div>横州初入宗学，以文占上舍，而有武力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286272_comment'></div>靖康之难，走相州，与岳飞善，聚兵万人，将迎二圣，雄张河南、北。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286272_comment'></div>巨盗皆避之，曰：「此小使军也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286272_comment'></div>高宗立，以众归御营，复从飞武昌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286272_comment'></div>飞死，秦桧夺其兵，抑守岭外而没。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286272_comment'></div>公孤愤激发，痛横州以投笔自挫，束置袍笏不挂身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286272_comment'></div>娶妇清江一月，誓之乐清舅家，赁僧房，业举子，夜诵依佛灯，或日昃未爨，履袜穿垢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286272_comment'></div>如是三年，得京官，往视其妻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286272_comment'></div>未及境，有萧某官者同宿，漫问：「李通判安耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286272_comment'></div>曰：「嘻！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286272_comment'></div>死矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286272_comment'></div>女嫁宗室，流浪，音信绝数年矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286272_comment'></div>公笑，因叙本末，萧惊异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286272_comment'></div>后公为郎而萧位执政，为上言如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286272_comment'></div>知无锡县丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286272_comment'></div>初，有印板帐钱，吏茫昧不能理，欠负十七八。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286272_comment'></div>公补旧增新，常多三四以上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286272_comment'></div>知宁德县，邑小易治，公亦竟岁无所笞罚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286272_comment'></div>通判临安府，敏绝为一府冠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286272_comment'></div>孝宗知之，故令以事至殿中者再，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1286272", 1286272, "Clauses/69/Comments/0")'>瞻相</span>良久，喜动色，擢知秀州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286272_comment'></div>金字牌忽夜下，上亲札曰：「海盐地高病旱，岂有水利可兴乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286272_comment'></div>河成，至今为腴田。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286272_comment'></div>还朝，命除郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286272_comment'></div>黄参政不奉诏，王丞相请与大州，知鄂州，以嫌改江州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286272_comment'></div>始，有旨射<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1286272", 1286272, "Clauses/85/Comments/0")'>铁帘</span>，公多与金银，鼓舞将士，奏艺为诸军第一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286272_comment'></div>除度支郎中，侍从夜直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286272_comment'></div>上论朝士能否，独称公材，前后十数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286272_comment'></div>内出姓名知临安府，大臣犹难之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286272_comment'></div>进太府少卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286272_comment'></div>于是上既欲骤用公，而轧于外廷，御史遂以为公罪，上怒，涂抹其疏几尽，然亦罢公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286272_comment'></div>光宗语宰相：「赵某今安在？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286272_comment'></div>寿皇所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1286272", 1286272, "Clauses/105/Comments/1")'>嘱付</span>也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286272_comment'></div>除提点铸钱，谏官疏，复止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286272_comment'></div>知徽州，库钱满溢，寄于外廊，其归公使者，尽以代诸县赋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286272_comment'></div>移江西运判，除直秘阁，两浙运判。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286272_comment'></div>虏使张汝方暮发京口，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1286272", 1286272, "Clauses/118/Comments/0")'>炮车云</span>上，风挟浪成山，且覆且号。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1286272_comment'></div>夜乙丙，公择金山隈处，列炬火累百，募人钩其舟，浮筏以济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1286272_comment'></div>国信吏白：「例卷当自正门入」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1286272_comment'></div>公叱曰：「汝欲葬使人鱼腹中乃已耶」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1286272_comment'></div>升直敷文阁，副使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1286272_comment'></div>宪圣后攒宫复土，第劳当迁侍郎，公已病，叹曰：「吾昔遇孝宗，蚤居此矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1286272_comment'></div>今夕阳之照尔，润家可也，报国乎何有」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1286272_comment'></div>力辞而免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1286272_comment'></div>庆元四年五月朔卒，年五十八。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1286272_comment'></div>八月某日，葬明州定海县太丘乡启霞山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1286272_comment'></div>夫人李氏，封齐安郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1286272_comment'></div>子曰汝铎，承直郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1286272_comment'></div>汝镕，宣教郎、知浦江县；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1286272_comment'></div>汝鄈，从事郎、坑冶司干官；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1286272_comment'></div>汝鐀，高州文学；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1286272_comment'></div>汝駉，从事郎、临海主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1286272_comment'></div>女嫁文林郎钱芄，朝散郎、知宁国府张忠恕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1286272_comment'></div>孙男二人，孙女四人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1286272_comment'></div>公为政，速于赴机，事常集而无迹，期会不迫而信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1286272_comment'></div>治财以宽，民获贷放而官有馀资。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1286272_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_60_1286272", 1286272, "Clauses/168/Comments/0")'>廉俭</span>终身，不用公库物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1286272_comment'></div>在上前，言论率朴透底无枝叶，上亦坦怀欢笑，肝鬲亲厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1286272_comment'></div>尝谓公曰：「周天下事，每日须过朕心下<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_62_1286272", 1286272, "Clauses/176/Comments/0")'>一遭</span>，留卿相聚，正欲共此，不可远去也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1286272_comment'></div>盖孝宗之有志于治如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1286272_comment'></div>用人必亲柬，雅不任宰相，宰相往往惭沮，曰：「此何以得进」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1286272_comment'></div>同类亦耻不预，辄噪曰：「此由某来也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1286272_comment'></div>虽疑似无实，然卓越被知于人主者，地偪而交疏，孤外反甚矣，故虽一意保持，而不胜百计之排斥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1286272_comment'></div>嗟乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1286272_comment'></div>方公盛年，使其朋党比周，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_68_1286272", 1286272, "Clauses/198/Comments/0")'>矫揉</span>以应虚誉，则何惧不用！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1286272_comment'></div>而摧残困折，终不能有所为者，岂非伸于上而顾屈于下哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1286272_comment'></div>其后天子一切恭己，以事任其臣，举雁行鱼贯以听，而公于是时亦始为任事者所知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1286272_comment'></div>然公宁以人主之知受屈于永久，而不以人臣之知求伸于须臾，此余之所以贤公也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1286272_comment'></div>性专介重执，未尝曲己徇物，荐士尤谨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1286272_comment'></div>在两浙，或请荐沈桯，公以桯犯赃，不许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1286272_comment'></div>在江西，荐许中应、李肃，皆善士，时所谓伪学，畏不敢举者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1286272_comment'></div>在秀州，黄洽为中丞，荐其所亲；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1286272_comment'></div>公闻澉浦监镇赵师石之材而未识也，荐而后报，曰：「宜以中丞所亲为后」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1286272_comment'></div>洽大恚，故迄其去，毁公不置。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1286272_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1286272_comment'></div>此又可悲已！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1286272_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_80_1286272'>富矣启霞，金碧<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_80_1286272", 1286272, "Clauses/236/Comments/0")'>暾暾</span>；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1286272_comment'></div>四兽维之，中可一棺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1286272_comment'></div>咸曰天造，树以斯原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1286272_comment'></div>噫余赵公！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1286272_comment'></div>旷度逸群；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1286272_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_85_1286272", 1286272, "Clauses/243/Comments/0")'>神往</span>无方，岂是之坟！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1286272_comment'></div>懿其遗声，以世厥存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1286272_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_87_1286272'>嘉定九年二月□日。</div><div id='poem_sentence_87_1286272_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1216&endYear=1216')">1216年8月</a>　八月十五日，友人陈谦卒，叶适有挽诗。作品：陈待制挽诗四首。<div id='poem_79876' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_79876' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/79876?labeling=true' target='_blank'>陈待制挽诗四首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1216年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_79876")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_79876_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_79876'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_79876'>唤作成亏总雪消，等閒好恶任风飘。<div id='poem_sentence_0_79876_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_79876'>齐侯自要乘千驷，颜子何妨饮一瓢。<div id='poem_sentence_1_79876_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_79876'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_79876_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_80110' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_80110' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/80110?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1216年8月）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_80110_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_80110'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_80110'>巳报西川落那边，倒杯索赌计茫然。<div id='poem_sentence_0_80110_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_80110'>也知汉北糇粮聚，能使江东保障全。<div id='poem_sentence_1_80110_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_80110'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_80110_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_79877' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_79877' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/79877?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1216年8月）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_79877_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_79877'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_79877'>昔年行住偶相同，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_79877", 79877, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>舍策追羊</span>径未通。<div id='poem_sentence_0_79877_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_79877'>只么空归在何处，一竿红日海门东。<div id='poem_sentence_1_79877_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_79877'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_79877_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_79878' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_79878' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/79878?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其四 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1216年8月）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_79878_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_79878'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_79878'>世事从来半局棋，夜眠还有不应时。<div id='poem_sentence_0_79878_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_79878'>峙岩桥畔船辞柁，冷水观边花发枝。<div id='poem_sentence_1_79878_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_79878'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_79878_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1216&endYear=1216')">1216年</a>　为陈谦撰祭文。作品：祭陈益之待制文。<div id='poem_1286353' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286353' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286353?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭陈益之待制文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1216年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286353")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286353_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286353'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286353'>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286353_comment'></div>知复何言，言又曷明？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286353_comment'></div>世所谓善，孰非我朋？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286353_comment'></div>岂或举之，而莫能胜？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286353_comment'></div>亦幸有一，神和语平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286353_comment'></div>栖迟啸歌，水送山迎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286353_comment'></div>自斸荒陂，窈无红青。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286353_comment'></div>如郑公业，颇以豪名，一饭不孤，四坐常盈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286353_comment'></div>笔砚欲绝，忽编永宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286353_comment'></div>耆旧昔闻，汝、颍今评。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286353_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1286353", 1286353, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>摅吐</span>宿虑，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1286353", 1286353, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>镌磨</span>晚生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286353_comment'></div>投榻已瞑，百询靡醒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286353_comment'></div>慨此多友，聚为时英。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286353_comment'></div>各秉志义，俱存法程。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286353_comment'></div>惟公<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1286353", 1286353, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>恢特</span>，文武纶经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286353_comment'></div>国有大命，率先启行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286353_comment'></div>夜下巴峡，风回洞庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286353_comment'></div>匪勇为尚，由其血诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286353_comment'></div>天之牖民，心膂股肱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286353_comment'></div>谁甘蔀屋，舍车弗乘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286353_comment'></div>销沈至死，有困无亨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286353_comment'></div>竭尽寒卮，以哀冥冥。</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1286353_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1216&endYear=1216')">1216年10月</a>　友人黄岩林鼒卒，有祭文。作品：祭林叔和文。<div id='poem_1286354' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286354' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286354?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭林叔和文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1216年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286354")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286354_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286354'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286354'>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286354_comment'></div>我少<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1286354", 1286354, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>狂勇</span>，自喜先登，援而愒者，独君弟兄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286354_comment'></div>人之所利，我之所讳，君不我同，亦不我异。<div
