class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286354_comment'></div>君质甚和，内涵至刚，学婉而茂，行冲而芳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286354_comment'></div>名驰势奔，其难在止，始约终穷，要信于己。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286354_comment'></div>如水涤源，细而常流，行潦虽大，岂为海谋！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286354_comment'></div>如山定居，物所倚镇，嗜欲争高，摧压必尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286354_comment'></div>截彼委羽，密化潜符，敬不敢斥，号君草庐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286354_comment'></div>芒芒生民，之死奚辨，有德者贵，无德者贱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286354_comment'></div>昔君过我，一樽二簋，春笋秋花，烂漫窗几。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286354_comment'></div>屡尅后会，不果其来，书题永断，墓草新栽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286354_comment'></div>竹远莫将，菊尚可把，荐君之清，移植垄下。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1286354_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1216&endYear=1216')">1216年12月</a>　诗人永嘉薛师石为其曾祖薛弼求铭于叶适，并请叶适访其瓜庐。作品：故广州敷文阁待制薛公墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286275' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286275' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286275?labeling=true' target='_blank'>故知广州敷文阁待制薛公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1216年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286275")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286275_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286275'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286275'>公名弼，字直老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286275_comment'></div>薛氏自晋徙闽者，左补阙令之，在唐有高人之目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286275_comment'></div>补阙孙怀仁，为温州人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286275_comment'></div>怀仁九世至公曾祖元礼，而父强立始及第，终江宁府推官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286275_comment'></div>公政和二年进士，任怀州刑曹，教授杭州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286275_comment'></div>召对，语不合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286275_comment'></div>教授沧州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286275_comment'></div>年饥，赈以学廪，守拒之，公曰：「民饿死，士何忍独饱！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286275_comment'></div>籴不偿，某当坐」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286275_comment'></div>已而补旧，有赢粮焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286275_comment'></div>辟浦江令，时所至告事魔者牢户填溢，县亦诬逮数百人，公一笔放遣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286275_comment'></div>燕山免夫钱既集，而郡仍别科，公执不下，民自载输官，曰：「宁费钱，毋失令也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286275_comment'></div>知桐庐县，清江丞，监左藏东库。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286275_comment'></div>中官王道使奴挟旁视绢美恶，多取之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286275_comment'></div>公白长贰下奴狱，惊曰：「何敢然」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286275_comment'></div>亟移病请致仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286275_comment'></div>长贰度不可，诡奏「宗室不奉法，纵奴横帑藏」，阴祈道流其仆，且以旨押公就职，乃已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286275_comment'></div>女真犯京师，李纲定议守御，众不悦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286275_comment'></div>公意与纲同，除太仆丞，参其军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286275_comment'></div>城围解，迁光禄丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286275_comment'></div>公尝言「姚平仲不可恃」，未几而败。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286275_comment'></div>纲救太原，又言「虏必再至，宜先事河北，且纲不当去」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286275_comment'></div>宋伯友提举河防，以点检见在粮草从伯友，为计画甚众，皆不用，乞罢归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286275_comment'></div>提举三门白波辇运，又上书择代伯友者，既而分委安扶等，李回复守河，公叹曰：「今败矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286275_comment'></div>遂主管明道宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286275_comment'></div>六年，高宗帆海，入青奥门，幸水陆寺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286275_comment'></div>公见吕颐浩言：「岛岸萧条，无以安上躬，不如跸郡廨，增舟取财，皆有定所，民不加敛，扈从休息」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286275_comment'></div>提举淮东盐，湖南运判。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286275_comment'></div>王𤫉捕扬幺，久无功，更命岳飞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286275_comment'></div>幺据洞庭，陆耕水战，楼船十馀丈，官军徒仰视，不得近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286275_comment'></div>飞谋益造大舟，公曰：「若是，则未可以岁月胜矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286275_comment'></div>且彼之所长，可避而不可斗也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286275_comment'></div>幸今大旱，湖水落洪，若重购舟首，勿与战逐，筏断江路，稿其上流，使彼之长坐废，而以精骑直捣其垒，则破坏在目前矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286275_comment'></div>飞曰：「善」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286275_comment'></div>兼旬，积寇尽平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286275_comment'></div>进直秘阁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286275_comment'></div>是冬，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1286275", 1286275, "Clauses/121/Comments/0")'>震电</span>大雪，冰厚尺馀，席益煮粥于市，益去尤甚，白昼剽劫群行，而飞责月桩钱、鄂、鼎运分拨米甚峻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286275_comment'></div>公具奏天灾民穷，词甚哀切，上恻然动，为捐二十万，出广西常平贷之，潭、永间始复生理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286275_comment'></div>王彦自荆移襄，迁延不即赴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286275_comment'></div>彦所将八字军，中原劲卒也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286275_comment'></div>朝廷疑有变，以公直徽猷阁代之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1286275_comment'></div>问策安出，所从兵少多，公曰：「若志在除彦，某书生也，非所及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1286275_comment'></div>代之，则湖南送吏足矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1286275_comment'></div>彦殊不意公至，径入府受将吏谒，大骇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1286275_comment'></div>公曲折譬哓，又大悟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1286275_comment'></div>即日上道，卒赖以全。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1286275_comment'></div>除岳飞参谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1286275_comment'></div>飞母死，遁于庐山，张宗元摄飞事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1286275_comment'></div>飞将张宪因辞疾，下多效之，汹汹生异语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1286275_comment'></div>公强邀宪行军，谓诸将曰：「太尉力乞张公，而诏使随至，岳家军马素齐整，无故忽諠闹，是汝辈累太尉也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1286275_comment'></div>诸将以告宪，宪佯悟曰：「相公心腹，惟参谋知耶」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1286275_comment'></div>飞寻起复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1286275_comment'></div>时去郦琼才一月，人谓「非公，此军亦乱矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1286275_comment'></div>入为户部郎，再知荆南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1286275_comment'></div>桃源伍俊，既招复谋叛，提刑万俟卨不能制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1286275_comment'></div>公许用为靖州，喜曰：「我得据一州，过桃源远矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1286275_comment'></div>即出谢，伏发，擒庭中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1286275_comment'></div>收其藏粟，食十馀年<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_57_1286275", 1286275, "Clauses/189/Comments/0")'>新疆</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1286275_comment'></div>还，进秘阁修撰、陕西都转运使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1286275_comment'></div>以左司郎召，知虔州，主管云台观，复知虔州，修撰集英殿，知福州、广州，待制敷文阁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1286275_comment'></div>绍兴二十年九月二十日，卒于广州，年六十三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1286275_comment'></div>二十二年十二月甲申，葬永嘉县太平山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1286275_comment'></div>自宣和失驭，天下安土乐业之民皆化为盗贼，更起灭千万计，剑槊不能胜，旗榜不能绥，垂二十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1286275_comment'></div>狙啖势穷，乃稍<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_63_1286275", 1286275, "Clauses/211/Comments/0")'>弭戢</span>，而虔、南雄、南安三州，楚、百粤首尾地，尚凭负巢窟，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_63_1286275", 1286275, "Clauses/215/Comments/0")'>炽张</span>如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1286275_comment'></div>公前后讨荡俞三、古五官、朱关索、吴锦等贼，相谓「剥皮殿撰」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1286275_comment'></div>而闽八郡，管天下、伍黑龙、卓和尚、何白旗、邱崇、廖七嫂、满山红之属数十万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1286275_comment'></div>公教奇兵，立左翼军，拔石城人陈敏为统制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1286275_comment'></div>积四年，平<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_67_1286275", 1286275, "Clauses/224/Comments/0")'>豪贼</span>百七十部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1286275_comment'></div>初，闽人依险立砦以守，久则自为贼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1286275_comment'></div>公令有砦者勿葺，寇尽，砦亦空，民返家室，道路夷行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1286275_comment'></div>故绍兴虽忍垢买和，终纳外侮，而内地<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_70_1286275", 1286275, "Clauses/235/Comments/0")'>驯服</span>，纲纪粗伸，由能用公，而闽、楚之功集也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1286275_comment'></div>汀州李谷反，信宿三万人，公急会师断首尾夹击。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1286275_comment'></div>浃辰谷败，僚吏不知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1286275_comment'></div>海寇陈小三载艘六十距境上，给郑广兵三百，与期三日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1286275_comment'></div>求济师，不许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1286275_comment'></div>二日大风，贼不能进退，尽虏以献，请曰：「始以一击十，不自意全，公料三日，何也」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1286275_comment'></div>公曰：「第从吾令，无问所以然」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1286275_comment'></div>盖机速神敏多此类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1286275_comment'></div>而其家所传，则有甚异者，余不得尽记也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1286275_comment'></div>方艰难时，士无贤不肖，皆媮视苟息，惟宗泽未及成，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_79_1286275", 1286275, "Clauses/268/Comments/0")'>忿郁</span>死，赵立、翟兴不幸丧败。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1286275_comment'></div>以功名著者，陈规、胡世将、郑刚中而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1286275_comment'></div>公常胜无误，不以意气加物，裁割应手，小大各成，殆踰于数公，然初佐李纲，与时论忤；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1286275_comment'></div>中从赵、张，事薄；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1286275_comment'></div>晚而秦桧擅国深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1286275_comment'></div>桧事天下不乐闻，虽如公者未有以别异，而独乡人夸诵之尔，可叹也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1286275_comment'></div>然桧尝欲引公为户部侍郎，公耻以言利进，不答，颇怒，故止于外藩，将死乃得待制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1286275_comment'></div>则公之为桧用，自其资所喜，而非利之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1286275_comment'></div>公既为岳飞参谋，飞与其徒妄臣反，冤气贯日月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1286275_comment'></div>独公幸免，其子弟或以咎公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1286275_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1286275_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_90_1286275", 1286275, "Clauses/301/Comments/0")'>巨浸</span>大疫，杀人成丘，死者之家不怨免者，知不以己之所遭同于人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1286275_comment'></div>桧果于杀飞而不忍害公，天诱之也，岳氏何尤焉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1286275_comment'></div>夫人胡氏、刘氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1286275_comment'></div>子叔渊，福州教授；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1286275_comment'></div>叔宣，严州录参；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1286275_comment'></div>恂，愉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1286275_comment'></div>婿吴龟年，检正诸房公事；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1286275_comment'></div>季升，参议官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1286275_comment'></div>孙洪，朝奉郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1286275_comment'></div>浩，朝请大夫；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1286275_comment'></div>泽，潮州司理；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1286275_comment'></div>润，上高主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1286275_comment'></div>曾孙师度，池州司户；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1286275_comment'></div>师旦，建康榷货务；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1286275_comment'></div>师昉，象州录参；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1286275_comment'></div>师善，师石，师睿，师山，师道；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1286275_comment'></div>师昂，将仕郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1286275_comment'></div>师昴，师正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1286275_comment'></div>于是后公六十七年，前辈无在者，虽乡人所夸诵，亦渐衰息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1286275_comment'></div>浩未殁，屡请余志其墓不果。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1286275_comment'></div>而余又老且死，旦与石皆曰：「若是，曾王父之烈，殆其无传」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1286275_comment'></div>乃叙而铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1286275_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_112_1286275'>薛由廉村，派于永嘉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1286275_comment'></div>逮公十二，始振厥华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1286275_comment'></div>公学诗书，公本仁义；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1286275_comment'></div>天机流行，且勇且智。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1286275_comment'></div>宴安之从，士如束蒿；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1286275_comment'></div>砺其颈吭，婴以斧刀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1286275_comment'></div>惟公变化，舒惨莫测；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1286275_comment'></div>鬼蜮陈前，雷电扫迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1286275_comment'></div>闽攘楚劫，亿万维群；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1286275_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_121_1286275", 1286275, "Clauses/373/Comments/0")'>恶首</span>既锄，还我良民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1286275_comment'></div>北北南南，再奠枕席；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1286275_comment'></div>助成中兴，时公是力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1286275_comment'></div>天下大矣，非材孰理？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1286275_comment'></div>建、绍之间，数人而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1286275_comment'></div>彼或不及，磊落而传；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1286275_comment'></div>此实过之，寂寥仅存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1286275_comment'></div>佞碣谀碑，何必遽载！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1286275_comment'></div>论久益明，铢两奚贷！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1286275_comment'></div>伊柏有孙，伊松有子，爰刻墓门，以示无止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1286275_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_131_1286275'>嘉定九年十二月□日。</div><div id='poem_sentence_131_1286275_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1216&endYear=1216')">1216年</a>　为厉仲方撰墓志铭。作品：厉领卫墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286273' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286273' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286273?labeling=true' target='_blank'>厉领卫墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1216年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286273")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286273_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286273'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286273'>君初名仲详，后名仲方，字约甫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286273_comment'></div>有厉文才者，婺州东阳人也，仕唐为都督刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286273_comment'></div>文才四世孙玄，为殿中侍御史，其居号御史里乘骢乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286273_comment'></div>玄之后至君曾祖凝、祖邦用，皆不仕；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286273_comment'></div>而父邦俊，以君仕赠武义郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286273_comment'></div>君中绍熙元年武举，任侍卫步军司计议官，武学谕，閤门舍人，副贺生辰者使于虏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286273_comment'></div>出知安丰军，复还閤门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286273_comment'></div>出知和州，王师北讨，赖其能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286273_comment'></div>就权庐州，俄召授左领卫中郎将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286273_comment'></div>虏内侵，朝廷忧在江北，令君建康防守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286273_comment'></div>虏遁归，复还领卫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286273_comment'></div>用御史疏罢，主仙都观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286273_comment'></div>又用中司疏，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1286273", 1286273, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>降秩</span>徙邵州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286273_comment'></div>嘉定五年九月二十五日，年五十四，卒于邵州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286273_comment'></div>九年，二孤倬、俣始以柩返。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286273_comment'></div>十二月庚申，葬于仁寿乡鲍庄纸白山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286273_comment'></div>始，君与余读书，诸生旬沐岁省皆散去，君独闭一室，未尝窥户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286273_comment'></div>并试两学，示若文有馀者，博蔡镐，见而骇曰：「吾周旋武学，岁月多矣，未省有如此文字」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286273_comment'></div>余笑曰：「此非子所知也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286273_comment'></div>已而及第第一人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286273_comment'></div>然自后屡举进士，遂不中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286273_comment'></div>其入閤门，试而后命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286273_comment'></div>盖天子所以异待武人，比于馆职，被命者以为荣，而领卫尤亲近，君顾不好，特俛仰<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1286273", 1286273, "Clauses/65/Comments/0")'>系縻</span>其间，不欲绝也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286273_comment'></div>嘉泰中，边事将动，谍妄言「虏衰有證，宜即取」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286273_comment'></div>君在安丰，尝奏「淮北饥民<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1286273", 1286273, "Clauses/72/Comments/2")'>扣关</span>求救接」，初无意也，柄臣遽从夜半下其议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286273_comment'></div>议者因共指君为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1286273", 1286273, "Clauses/75/Comments/0")'>开隙</span>生事，语闻四方，虽其故友朋及为士者亦交尤之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286273_comment'></div>虏既卒叛盟，而君竟坐贬死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286273_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1286273", 1286273, "Clauses/80/Comments/0")'>呜呼</span>！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286273_comment'></div>可哀也已！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286273_comment'></div>夫搢绅守和亲，介胄言征伐，由汉已然矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286273_comment'></div>其不能相合而相非，至于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1286273", 1286273, "Clauses/86/Comments/0")'>喧忿</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1286273", 1286273, "Clauses/86/Comments/1")'>诋悖</span>而相加以恶，亦其常情，无足怪也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286273_comment'></div>故季布廷诤欲斩樊将军，而臧宫、马武之请，至烦人主谆悉诏谕而后止，岂非往事之明戒也哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286273_comment'></div>君为武人，盖失路误入尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286273_comment'></div>人犹以故步期君，其所以责之者，抑所以厚之欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286273_comment'></div>然使君致其壹于进士，何患不如武举所得，褒衣大带，掌幄中之论，无冒十死九生之危，夷俟而訾其缺！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286273_comment'></div>则人之所以责我者，而我反以责人矣，不亦又可哀也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286273_comment'></div>君劝安丰种桑数十万株，垦田数千顷，置历阳<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1286273", 1286273, "Clauses/109/Comments/0")'>军实</span>甚众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286273_comment'></div>后人用君所造九牛弩，射杀虏骁将于城下，又用战车败之清水镇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286273_comment'></div>素不识田琳，而知其材，以告余，余为言于朝，使代李爽戍合肥，虏不敢犯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286273_comment'></div>来建康也，虏屯定山十馀万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286273_comment'></div>君募石斌贤、夏侯成再破走之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1286273_comment'></div>虏留六合，余趣君解围；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1286273_comment'></div>料其当自退，不亟出兵，虏卒去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1286273_comment'></div>其谋效审的多如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1286273_comment'></div>然世人责君方深，故未暇明其功，虽余亦不敢言也，斯又重可哀也夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1286273_comment'></div>君娶张氏，先卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1286273_comment'></div>再娶同甫陈氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1286273_comment'></div>子四人，曰伦，曰倬，皆太学生；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1286273_comment'></div>伦早夭；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1286273_comment'></div>曰俣，江西转运司进士；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1286273_comment'></div>曰合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1286273_comment'></div>女嫁吴瑾，承信郎吕珣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1286273_comment'></div>孙男一人，曰简。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1286273_comment'></div>君母吴夫人，惟一子，自君之贬，常悲思哭泣，比死，哭不绝声，丧还，哭之恸以殁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1286273_comment'></div>噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1286273_comment'></div>子禄养而不及终，母寿尽而逢其凶，若夫人与君，其又皆可哀也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1286273_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_56_1286273'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_56_1286273", 1286273, "Clauses/161/Comments/0")'>呜呼</span>厉君，迪知忱恂；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1286273_comment'></div>百家纵横，六籍轮囷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1286273_comment'></div>亦既豹变，刚柔蔚文；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1286273_comment'></div>曷<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_59_1286273", 1286273, "Clauses/167/Comments/0")'>履虎尾</span>，丧其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_59_1286273", 1286273, "Clauses/168/Comments/0")'>匹群</span>！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1286273_comment'></div>人喜攻瑕，天独与纯；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1286273_comment'></div>回祥复亨，展也子孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1286273_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_62_1286273'>嘉定九年十一月□日。</div><div id='poem_sentence_62_1286273_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1216&endYear=1216')">1216年</a>　为门人赵汝铎之妻撰墓志铭。作品：赵儒人墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286312' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286312' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286312?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赵孺人墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1216年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286312")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286312_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286312'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286312'>嘉定十四年九月丙午，王梦龙葬其妻于临海县重晖乡石门真如山，使来告曰：「妇贵，夫所倚也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286312_comment'></div>夫富，妇所安也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286312_comment'></div>此固世俗与宗室为婚者之常也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286312_comment'></div>赵氏家及中外，皆王公将相，贵盛矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286312_comment'></div>然我士人，义不倚为重；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286312_comment'></div>而又贫，不能使之安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286312_comment'></div>方<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1286312", 1286312, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>总髻</span>已出，远京师且千里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286312_comment'></div>其室处，市僦而僧假；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286312_comment'></div>其衣食，斗储而尺聚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286312_comment'></div>我试，迭胜负无虑数十，每时睽岁隔，彼儿字女育，突然成长，我有未及知者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286312_comment'></div>然此亦士人妻之常也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286312_comment'></div>赵氏忘其为贵宗室女，乐其为贫士人妻，见桑而求蚕，行田而学稼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286312_comment'></div>巷婆里嫂，偶坐无怍色；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286312_comment'></div>疏翁族姆，却立无惰容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286312_comment'></div>葵糈<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1286312", 1286312, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>瓠菹</span>，枯羸仅足，而名人胜士邂逅集语，辄重觞累俎，殷勤劝劳，客惊喜留连不忍去也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286312_comment'></div>其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1286312", 1286312, "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>规虑</span>深密，以力自致，必将成我为士人家，而今已矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286312_comment'></div>余观近世惟西桥宗室女有贤行，择对多士人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286312_comment'></div>儒先生子弟有挈之太学者，能敬夫，何止如宾，诸生皆自以其家不及也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286312_comment'></div>夫麟趾，信厚公子也，未见公女也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286312_comment'></div>君名汝议，字履巽，由父池州而上为濮国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286312_comment'></div>嫁王氏，卒年三十九。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286312_comment'></div>于是梦龙自太常簿通判婺州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286312_comment'></div>二子，毅，洪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286312_comment'></div>三女，长婿监严州比较务赵崇陶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286312_comment'></div>君母王氏，校书郎道女，寺簿姑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286312_comment'></div>校书有两姓诗礼之泽，故其甥皆以文字擅名于世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286312_comment'></div>寺簿幼而英发，池州独奇爱，谓似六哥，故以君归之，卒用克苦立王氏家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286312_comment'></div>余尝谓智能兼南北之俗者，必大其门，盖收敛损约，根本也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286312_comment'></div>疏达朗畅，枝叶也：合而成德，家道具焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286312_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_1286312'>《需》险当前，《震》笑居后；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286312_comment'></div>载烝载释，靡登靡豆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286312_comment'></div>曰夫奚悲，噫艰尔思！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286312_comment'></div>曰子奚肯，噫教之永！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286312_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_33_1286312'>嘉定十五年六月日。</div><div id='poem_sentence_33_1286312_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1216&endYear=1216')">1216年</a>　为陈民表撰墓志铭。作品：陈民表墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286314' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286314' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286314?labeling=true' target='_blank'>陈民表墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1216年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286314")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286314_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286314'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286314'>郭之西有隐君子陈君，名烨，字民表。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286314_comment'></div>或问：「君以何称」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286314_comment'></div>曰：「道衰教失，士遁其常守而旅于分域之外，抗而为异行众矣，俛而为常德鲜焉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286314_comment'></div>离其朴于文众矣，反其华于质鲜焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286314_comment'></div>若夫屡变有司之法，益薄而知自厚，又加鲜焉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286314_comment'></div>况于群千万人而进，而求其一二之能止者，殆将绝矣」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286314_comment'></div>君之所称，应是四目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286314_comment'></div>平生著书甚工，然每一篇就，辄重箧累缄，不欲以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1286314", 1286314, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>词藻</span>竞于时也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286314_comment'></div>揣摩世事甚精，然对客语，常深默不解，惟恐以聪察矜于物也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286314_comment'></div>誉之不如无毁也，招之不如无麾也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286314_comment'></div>非其耕不食，非其织不衣，非其好不与游而久也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286314_comment'></div>无悲愁愠忿生于色，无怨尤非怒加于人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286314_comment'></div>自余幼从君至老，验其所行，无不然者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286314_comment'></div>嘉定七年，年八十八，十月二十三日卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286314_comment'></div>世为永嘉人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286314_comment'></div>曾祖粹，祖仲远，父晟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286314_comment'></div>祖及父，里人命曰吴氏，至君暮年，始复正之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286314_comment'></div>夫人王氏，先卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286314_comment'></div>女嫁徐宗之，亦已卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286314_comment'></div>三子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286314_comment'></div>孙男五，孙女六。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286314_comment'></div>九年正月，葬于孝义乡吴平山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286314_comment'></div>初，君戒其子曰：「昔人患进士浮靡，议罢之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286314_comment'></div>察孝廉虽不果，然荐送必由州县，比乡举里选犹近也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286314_comment'></div>今走四方，买姑姨，借族姓，以趁宽额，可乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286314_comment'></div>先王择司徒<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1286314", 1286314, "Clauses/70/Comments/0")'>俊选</span>，使升之入太学，既有闻其辨论，皆属司马于成德达材，何速也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286314_comment'></div>今縻岁月，捐父母，弃室家，以争<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1286314", 1286314, "Clauses/78/Comments/0")'>优校</span>，可乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286314_comment'></div>得丧命也，若慎无然」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286314_comment'></div>其子遵行之，必乡贡，不太学，后皆登进士第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286314_comment'></div>增，临海令；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286314_comment'></div>埴，丰城簿；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286314_comment'></div>止善，靖安尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286314_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_32_1286314'>埴之友沈僩，实卜其兆曰：「吴平，一州地脉所从分也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286314_comment'></div>葬此者，子孙贵且蕃」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286314_comment'></div>噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286314_comment'></div>使其信然，以君之贤，宜有后哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286314_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_36_1286314'>嘉定□□年六月□日。</div><div id='poem_sentence_36_1286314_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1216&endYear=1216')">1216年</a>　为葛自得撰墓志铭。作品：葛君墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（题目见《水心集》卷二十五。）</span><div id='poem_1286315' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286315' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286315?labeling=true' target='_blank'>宋葛君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1216年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286315")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286315_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286315'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286315'>君姓葛氏，名自得，字资深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286315_comment'></div>曾祖及，祖藻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286315_comment'></div>父天民，由建徙台，为黄岩人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286315_comment'></div>世儒家，蓄书千卷，皆父祖手笔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286315_comment'></div>君兼通数术，喜为方，所处疗十得八九以上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286315_comment'></div>二子孩孺，迎师数百馀里，费尽出于医。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286315_comment'></div>及长，自能问学，则谢医不复行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286315_comment'></div>田园甚狭，而以力治不少惰，人颇笑之，君曰：「古今言方寸地，谓此心也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286315_comment'></div>吾得留遗子孙足矣，何以多为」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286315_comment'></div>因名其居曰留耕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286315_comment'></div>嘉定八年十月卒，年六十七。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286315_comment'></div>九年八月某日，葬留耕之后原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286315_comment'></div>娶刘氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286315_comment'></div>子曰成大、方大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286315_comment'></div>婿曰项附实、余师禹、余夷甫、周冕夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286315_comment'></div>儒而匿于医，可铭也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286315_comment'></div>医不以富而以教，可铭也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286315_comment'></div>或曰：「不富则无医之利，虽教而未获子之报，奈何」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286315_comment'></div>夫君知复于儒而已，奚报之求！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286315_comment'></div>虽然，充其道，则可以报矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286315_comment'></div>使遂获之，可铭矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286315_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_1286315'>留耕之闾，有伉其门；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286315_comment'></div>留耕之墓，有崇其坟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286315_comment'></div>人心如驰，易逝难留；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286315_comment'></div>勿昧勿浮，其永之休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286315_comment'></div>嘉定九年七月□日。</div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1286315_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1216&endYear=1216')">1216年</a>　为王夷仲撰墓志铭。作品：校书郎王公夷仲墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286235' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286235' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286235?labeling=true' target='_blank'>校书郎王公夷仲墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1216年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286235")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286235_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286235'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286235'>进士试御前，考官定号名来上，所谓高第者，天子常亲擢赐之，天下以此占上意好恶，而士之遇否，治之通塞系焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286235_comment'></div>绍兴二十七年，永嘉王龟龄为第一，临海王夷仲实第四。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286235_comment'></div>于是高宗临政久，日新其德，思与草野奇杰士共起世务，遍阅所对策，取能伸直节、吐敢言者，无问下第，即拔置之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286235_comment'></div>而夷仲至举司，前后顿挫，十数往返，傫然穷老矣，忽一日受明主不赀之恩如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286235_comment'></div>龟龄既为一时所宗，而夷仲与同时登甲科者亦皆获重名于世，至今称策士之盛，必曰丁丑榜为然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286235_comment'></div>然则岂士能自高耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286235_comment'></div>盖上好之尔！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286235_comment'></div>夷仲，台临海县人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286235_comment'></div>曾祖安礼，祖居中，父庭筠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286235_comment'></div>解褐，婺州推官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286235_comment'></div>满秩，待太学博士阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286235_comment'></div>召试为秘书省正字，兼圣政检讨官，迁校书郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286235_comment'></div>足疾，乞玉隆观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286235_comment'></div>明年，乾道三年，年六十一，疾甚，以六月五日卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286235_comment'></div>四年二月九日，葬重晖乡唐奥山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286235_comment'></div>夫人贾氏，先一年卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286235_comment'></div>后三十二年，长子似之卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286235_comment'></div>次曰应之，免解进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286235_comment'></div>幼曰棐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286235_comment'></div>女，嫁故知池州赵善临。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286235_comment'></div>孙曰象祖，曰革，曰梦龙，曰丕祖，曰淡，曰字孙，曰文子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286235_comment'></div>棐、梦龙中进士第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286235_comment'></div>棐浙西安抚司干官，梦龙信州教官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286235_comment'></div>始，夷仲在婺，孝宗立，赐军兵钱，州无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1286235", 1286235, "Clauses/72/Comments/0")'>见缗</span>，未给也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286235_comment'></div>守方宴宾，卒不顾，冲幕径上，杂坐妄语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286235_comment'></div>夷仲闻变，步行入府门，卒望见，即招手下曰：「节推来」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286235_comment'></div>躬声喏如平日，且愬曰：「侍郎犒赏迟，又欲折支与，健儿懑」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286235_comment'></div>夷仲笑曰：「汝误矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286235_comment'></div>即位例将四十年，兵火散落，我<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1286235", 1286235, "Clauses/92/Comments/0")'>攒检</span>方毕，何得为迟？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286235_comment'></div>钱已在库，何名为折」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286235_comment'></div>卒稍退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286235_comment'></div>夷仲白守，借于他司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286235_comment'></div>俄又报「兵士欧库吏死矣」，夷仲怒叱曰：「汝不听名次而乱取，必斩无赦」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286235_comment'></div>卒意折，皆曰：「依节推说」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286235_comment'></div>始散去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286235_comment'></div>州人极以此多君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286235_comment'></div>括有二士人家，银见，官为烹采，而吴郡王自右曹符下攫取之，士拒不听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286235_comment'></div>吴谓其劫也，移数狱至婺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286235_comment'></div>夷仲讽守，守曰：「吁！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286235_comment'></div>是力足畏也」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286235_comment'></div>夷仲曰：「畏理耶，毋力」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1286235_comment'></div>守因以委夷仲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1286235_comment'></div>亟至右狱，问：「<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_42_1286235", 1286235, "Clauses/125/Comments/2")'>词主</span>安在」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1286235_comment'></div>吏曰：「官人也，随司尔」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1286235_comment'></div>夷仲鞭吏，急追<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_44_1286235", 1286235, "Clauses/130/Comments/0")'>词主</span>，将械之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1286235_comment'></div>其人大惧首服，士幸免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1286235_comment'></div>守并以此知君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1286235_comment'></div>既入参政事，故决意荐君矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1286235_comment'></div>在馆，为省试，点检得诗赋卷，白于众，以为绝出也，独一参详及同知论未合尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1286235_comment'></div>明日，同僚来告曰：「事去矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1286235_comment'></div>同知升谏长，参详亦入台矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1286235_comment'></div>夷仲曰：「不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1286235_comment'></div>此程文工拙也，无关台谏」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1286235_comment'></div>力辨之，竟放高等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1286235_comment'></div>四方士补试于贡院，晨门未启，值忌日行香，至亲王不得前，取别巷过宰相，街司竞棘丛中，或传「坐此罢太学矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1286235_comment'></div>夷仲轮对，从容为上言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1286235_comment'></div>上曰：「闻无赖者亦来耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1286235_comment'></div>夷仲曰：「诚然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1286235_comment'></div>万人之聚，固无不有，然异日为陛下栋梁者皆是也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1286235_comment'></div>上意解，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_59_1286235", 1286235, "Clauses/171/Comments/0")'>浮语</span>浸息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1286235_comment'></div>故夷仲虽不及预大议，而果决敢辩，危事坚正，能遏横流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1286235_comment'></div>余又闻：一日，上批夷仲及张校书恪皆为察官，当笔参政使所亲贺曰：「上不知君选人，明日为乞上殿改官也，盍预计欲言者」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1286235_comment'></div>夷仲皇恐辞曰：「某叨忝未逾月，便作御史，人不谓有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_62_1286235", 1286235, "Clauses/186/Comments/1")'>径路</span>乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1286235_comment'></div>惧，终不许，因草劄，若备对者，言「考第举员而后改官，不刊之法也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1286235_comment'></div>近世或入谷，或献书，或父祖勋伐，或特旨上殿皆得改秩，虽由权道，徒启倖门，非祖宗意也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1286235_comment'></div>所亲果复至曰：「上命无庸辞也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1286235_comment'></div>夷仲出其稿，知不可夺，遂两寝之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1286235_comment'></div>其于进退，又能自重如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1286235_comment'></div>居贫，尤厉操。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1286235_comment'></div>赎质而得金，价十倍，家人有喜色，夷仲趣使还之，曰：「五月披羊裘而负薪，岂拾遗金也」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1286235_comment'></div>摄倅十月，食本俸而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1286235_comment'></div>倅时摄州，兼取之，有司劾其罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1286235_comment'></div>倅窘，持券五百祝夷仲曰：「请书纸为验」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1286235_comment'></div>夷仲反券与书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1286235_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1286235_comment'></div>夷仲不幸而不尽用，然迹其素守本末，而后知高宗之亲擢，可谓知人也已！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1286235_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_76_1286235'>噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1286235_comment'></div>蓄之早而售之晚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1286235_comment'></div>道与世异，用与好反。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1286235_comment'></div>后五十年，记在碑板。</div><div id='poem_sentence_79_1286235_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1216&endYear=1216')">1216年</a>　为薛仁静墓撰文。作品：题薛仁静墓。<div id='poem_1285965' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1285965' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1285965?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题薛仁静墓</a><span class='authorDate'>（1216年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1285965")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1285965_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1285965'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1285965'>薛景石之弟名山，字仁静，死嘉定七年二月二十一日，葬九年四月二日，墓地曰丁亥横山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1285965_comment'></div>君常读《周易》，行携坐挟，终身不释。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1285965_comment'></div>人与语，多不答，或径起，莫测其意。</div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1285965_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1216&endYear=1216')">1216年</a>　为信州重修学作记。作品：信州重修学记。<div id='poem_1286142' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286142' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286142?labeling=true' target='_blank'>信州重修学记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1216年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286142")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286142_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286142'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286142'>余记教授厅之明年，施君应龙大修学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286142_comment'></div>君用学法肄士，士初不便，已而出《论语》、《孟子》书交问更质，指《中庸》、《大学》为之归，益以司马氏《通鉴》，士乃附悦，有跃于心，相率请曰：「先生惠教以远者，使变而至道，厚矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286142_comment'></div>然惟此学始元丰，馀十纪，摧剥行尽，身且不庇，教于何立」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286142_comment'></div>君患之，复召郑著、余凤约岁损食，命工先木。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286142_comment'></div>相次信二守、东方两使属县助长各有差。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286142_comment'></div>使杨梦庚、郑连、诸葛褒撤像殿之坏十六，饰加彤朱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286142_comment'></div>作论堂、棂星门，崇大于旧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286142_comment'></div>偃植之敝，尺以上，悉易以成材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286142_comment'></div>上瓦下砖，楹间之门牖，无不重整。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286142_comment'></div>祭之豆笾、冠佩、章甫，无不新设。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286142_comment'></div>噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286142_comment'></div>亦劳甚矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286142_comment'></div>始余以师之室庐非师之责也，今并弟子之室庐亦师之责矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286142_comment'></div>古今固异事也，及其成功，一而已，渠古之是，今之非哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286142_comment'></div>施君于是则可以教矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286142_comment'></div>昔孔子叹材难，而舜止五臣，周之乱臣仅九人焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286142_comment'></div>孟子亦言由尧、舜至于孔子，见闻之际，彰彰乎莫之企及也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286142_comment'></div>道之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1286142", 1286142, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>凝聚</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1286142", 1286142, "Clauses/50/Comments/1")'>显发</span>，此最其盛者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286142_comment'></div>然而本之为《中庸》，固天所以降命乎我尔；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286142_comment'></div>要之为《大学》，固物所以会通乎我尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286142_comment'></div>性合而中，物至于和，独圣贤哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286142_comment'></div>乃千万人同有也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286142_comment'></div>何孔、孟所称稀阔而不多欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286142_comment'></div>由孔、孟至于今，又加久矣，其可称者，何<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1286142", 1286142, "Clauses/64/Comments/0")'>寥泬</span>而不继欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286142_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286142_comment'></div>安得不博类广伦以明之，毕躬殚力以奉之欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286142_comment'></div>此师友之教，问学之讲，所以穷无穷，极无极也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286142_comment'></div>虽然，有一于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286142_comment'></div>方周衰不复取士，冻饿甚者几不活矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286142_comment'></div>孔、孟不以其不取而不教也，孔、孟之徒不以其不取而不学也，道在焉故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286142_comment'></div>后世取士矣，师视其取而后教之，士视其取而后学之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286142_comment'></div>夫道不以取而后存也，故愈微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286142_comment'></div>然则教其所不取，施君勉诸！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286142_comment'></div>学其所不取，信之士勉诸！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286142_comment'></div>嘉定九年正月。</div><div id='poem_sentence_34_1286142_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1216&endYear=1216')">1216年</a>　为长溪修学作记。作品：长溪修学记。<div id='poem_1286143' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286143' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286143?labeling=true' target='_blank'>长溪修学记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1216年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286143")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286143_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286143'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286143'>县初设学不置粮，士虽居，不能食也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286143_comment'></div>先令黄君龟朋，自出新意，分釐收拾良苦，然后始得食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286143_comment'></div>而学屋百楹，又破漏倾侧，几坏几堕，则虽食将不能居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286143_comment'></div>今令江君嗣祖，治多暇日，径来坐直舍，斤锯不烦，役徒不嚣，而坏者忽成，堕者忽隆，则居与食皆遂矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286143_comment'></div>其为士者叹曰：「自庆历后，为令何啻数十，独二君有功于学，赖以久存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286143_comment'></div>而江君勇于为民，凡可以自力而利其人者，不待告请，常先事率作无怠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286143_comment'></div>古人所谓『心诚求之』，非缘饰学校以美其名也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286143_comment'></div>故相与谋而谂记于余至五六，要必得乃止，曰：「吾欲使后读是记者，思其令不忍忘尔」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286143_comment'></div>惟长溪弥亘山海最巨邑，宦游满天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286143_comment'></div>廉村薛氏举进士为闽、越首，赤岸尤盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286143_comment'></div>往年迎蜀人师先生于金台寺，事之如古游、夏之俦，其言论风指，皆世守之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286143_comment'></div>先生没，即寺建祠，正岁若讳日，必奠谒成礼，冠者、童子皆在，丙子踰一周，敬恭不衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286143_comment'></div>盖其俗朴而专，和而靖，其士缛于文而厚于质，既能思其师而不忍忘，固宜思其令而不忍忘也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286143_comment'></div>夫师之不忘，以道；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286143_comment'></div>令之不忘，以政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286143_comment'></div>三代远矣，令有政而不由学；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286143_comment'></div>孔、孟远矣，师有道而不知统也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286143_comment'></div>学非一日之积也，道岂一世而成哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286143_comment'></div>理无形也，因润泽浃洽而后著，此《兑》之所以贵讲习也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286143_comment'></div>其始若可越，其久乃不可测，其大至于无能名，皆由悦来也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286143_comment'></div>江君盍揭先生而祠于学，以慰其父兄之思；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286143_comment'></div>择士之知伦类统纪者主其子弟，以继先生之道；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286143_comment'></div>使习而愈悦，久而愈成！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286143_comment'></div>是先生因令而愈不忘也，是令与先生交相为不忘也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286143_comment'></div>嘉定九年十一月。</div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1286143_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1217&endYear=1217')">1217年</a>　是年，除华文阁待制，提举西京嵩山崇福宫，请辞。作品：辞免华文阁待制提举西京嵩山崇福宫状。<div id='poem_1285855' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1285855' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1285855?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辞免华文阁待制提举西京嵩山崇福宫状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1217年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1285855")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1285855_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1285855'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1285855'>次对之职，为选甚高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1285855_comment'></div>曩玷留都，虽尝假宠；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1285855_comment'></div>退甘穷巷，固已黜幽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1285855_comment'></div>恍岁月之屡迁，何梦寐之敢及！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1285855_comment'></div>七十既至，一再<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1285855", 1285855, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>控陈</span>，但得归休，便为止足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1285855_comment'></div>岂意矜怜<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1285855", 1285855, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>枯瘁</span>，委曲陶镕，特畀新除，复还旧物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1285855_comment'></div>然而窃寻故实，兼考前文，惟必谐告老，则或容赋禄以示恩；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1285855_comment'></div>今犹使奉祠，则安得因闲而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1285855", 1285855, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>冒受</span>！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1285855_comment'></div>夙夜自揆，震惊靡遑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1285855_comment'></div>伏乞俯谅微诚，特赐敷奏，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1285855", 1285855, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>寝免</span>华文阁待制恩命，只以本官依旧宫观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1285855_comment'></div>不越常分，庶几少安，无任跼蹐俟命之至！</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1285855_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1217&endYear=1217')">1217年</a>　请辞未获准，有谢表。作品：谢除华文阁待制提举西京嵩山崇福宫表。<div id='poem_1285835' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1285835' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1285835?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢除华文阁待制提举西京嵩山崇福宫表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1217年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1285835")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1285835_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1285835'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1285835'>昭示<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1285835", 1285835, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>眷留</span>，未即野人之贱；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1285835_comment'></div>宠还旧职，复参近侍之荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1285835_comment'></div>姓名已没于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1285835", 1285835, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>朽陈</span>，命赐忽超于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1285835", 1285835, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>新特</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1285835_comment'></div>伏念臣资<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1285835", 1285835, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>朴疏</span>信己之学，乏进趣合变之能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1285835_comment'></div>昨一内忝论思，浸成违忤；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1285835_comment'></div>暨乎外专屏捍，又负忧虞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1285835_comment'></div>迄无显效于盛时，固合<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1285835", 1285835, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>冥心</span>于暮齿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1285835_comment'></div>若乃嬴扶短策，缓驾卑车。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1285835_comment'></div>追忆悔尤，滥<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1285835", 1285835, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>轩裳</span>之非据；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1285835_comment'></div>自嗟衰耄，指林壑以言归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1285835_comment'></div>惟赖<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1285835", 1285835, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>天度</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1285835", 1285835, "Clauses/20/Comments/1")'>并涵</span>，皇明隐烛，获从容而善退，保优佚之令终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1285835_comment'></div>至于踯躅往愆，寂寥久废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1285835_comment'></div>因兹告请，遂曲轸于深慈；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1285835_comment'></div>悉与荡除，俾再通于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1285835", 1285835, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>禁籍</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1285835_comment'></div>尚縻素廪，仍蹑<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1285835", 1285835, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>真游</span>，为幸则然，非愿敢及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1285835_comment'></div>此盖恭遇皇帝陛下，躬秉上德，化几泰和，驭臣以贵为初，美俗在宽之用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1285835_comment'></div>哀怜末路，盖欲补其前修；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1285835_comment'></div>矜恤老穷，不忍失其故步。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1285835_comment'></div>窃仰鸿施，有如<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1285835", 1285835, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>神功</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1285835_comment'></div>臣身未殒而年徂，志空存而力尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1285835_comment'></div>虽曰愈重受恩之地，然而莫知报国之方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1285835_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1285835", 1285835, "Clauses/49/Comments/0")'>颠越</span>是期，兢惭罔措。</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1285835_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1217&endYear=1217')">1217年</a>　有谢表致皇太子。作品：除华文阁待制提举西京嵩山崇福宫谢皇太子笺。<div id='poem_1285835' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1285835' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1285835?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢除华文阁待制提举西京嵩山崇福宫表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1217年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1285835")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1285835_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1285835'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1285835'>昭示<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1285835", 1285835, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>眷留</span>，未即野人之贱；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1285835_comment'></div>宠还旧职，复参近侍之荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1285835_comment'></div>姓名已没于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1285835", 1285835, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>朽陈</span>，命赐忽超于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1285835", 1285835, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>新特</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1285835_comment'></div>伏念臣资<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1285835", 1285835, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>朴疏</span>信己之学，乏进趣合变之能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1285835_comment'></div>昨一内忝论思，浸成违忤；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1285835_comment'></div>暨乎外专屏捍，又负忧虞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1285835_comment'></div>迄无显效于盛时，固合<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1285835", 1285835, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>冥心</span>于暮齿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1285835_comment'></div>若乃嬴扶短策，缓驾卑车。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1285835_comment'></div>追忆悔尤，滥<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1285835", 1285835, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>轩裳</span>之非据；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1285835_comment'></div>自嗟衰耄，指林壑以言归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1285835_comment'></div>惟赖<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1285835", 1285835, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>天度</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1285835", 1285835, "Clauses/20/Comments/1")'>并涵</span>，皇明隐烛，获从容而善退，保优佚之令终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1285835_comment'></div>至于踯躅往愆，寂寥久废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1285835_comment'></div>因兹告请，遂曲轸于深慈；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1285835_comment'></div>悉与荡除，俾再通于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1285835", 1285835, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>禁籍</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1285835_comment'></div>尚縻素廪，仍蹑<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1285835", 1285835, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>真游</span>，为幸则然，非愿敢及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1285835_comment'></div>此盖恭遇皇帝陛下，躬秉上德，化几泰和，驭臣以贵为初，美俗在宽之用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1285835_comment'></div>哀怜末路，盖欲补其前修；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1285835_comment'></div>矜恤老穷，不忍失其故步。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1285835_comment'></div>窃仰鸿施，有如<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1285835", 1285835, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>神功</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1285835_comment'></div>臣身未殒而年徂，志空存而力尽。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1217&endYear=1217')">1217年1月30日</a>　正月三十日，友人巩丰卒，有诗哀悼。作品：哀巩仲至诗。<div id='poem_80125' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_80125' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/80125?labeling=true' target='_blank'>哀巩仲至</a><span class='authorDate'>（1217年1月30日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: id='poem_content_80125'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_80125'>老衰哭无泪，行叹复坐嗟。<div id='poem_sentence_0_80125_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_80125_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_80125'>中天悬明月，争欲伸手拿。<div id='poem_sentence_3_80125_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_80125", 80125, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>蜀锦</span>载胡车。<div id='poem_sentence_5_80125_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_80125'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_80125", 80125, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>离离</span>三千首，雅正排<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_80125", 80125, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>淫哇</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_6_80125_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_80125_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_80125'>笑我自山野，悲君混泥沙。<div id='poem_sentence_9_80125_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_80125_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_80125'>兹游隐者事，亦乃期屡差。<div id='poem_sentence_15_80125_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_80125_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_80125'>那知是绝笔，杨柳空白花。<div id='poem_sentence_18_80125_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1217&endYear=1217')">1217年2月8日</a>　二月八日，工部尚书赵师（睪+卉字下面）卒，有挽诗。作品：赵尚书挽诗。<div id='poem_79982' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_79982' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/79982?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赵尚书挽诗二首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1217年2月8日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_79982")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_79982_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_79982'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_79982'>材业将时偶，声名斗宠新。<div id='poem_sentence_0_79982_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_79982'>文昌留不住，大尹政通神。<div id='poem_sentence_1_79982_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_79982'>力说和戎好，从撩相国嗔。<div id='poem_sentence_2_79982_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_79982'>春花插秋鬓，还得自繇身。<div id='poem_sentence_3_79982_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_79982'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_79982_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_79983' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_79983' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/79983?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1217年2月8日）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_79983_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_79983'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_79983'>江北江南曲，吟高许和同。<div id='poem_sentence_0_79983_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_79983'>相迎黄篾浪，失笑白蘋风。<div id='poem_sentence_1_79983_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_79983'>老病犹贪<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作贫）</span>活，漂零各陨空。<div id='poem_sentence_2_79983_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_79983'>长怀洞庭橘，买宅傍墙东。<div id='poem_sentence_3_79983_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_79983'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_79983_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1217&endYear=1217')">1217年2月</a>　二月，为门人宋驹之父宋绍恭作墓志铭。作品：胡朝奉大夫知峡州宋公墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（题目见《水心集》卷二十二。）</span><div id='poem_1286276' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286276' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286276?labeling=true' target='_blank'>故朝奉大夫知峡州宋公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1217年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286276")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286276_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286276'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286276'>曾祖表微，知解州；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286276_comment'></div>祖炤，知丰县；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286276_comment'></div>父坦，赠通奉大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286276_comment'></div>公名绍恭，字彦安，历监南岳庙，明州比较务，心丧免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286276_comment'></div>崇安主簿，丽水县丞，知永嘉县，两浙运司干官，心丧免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286276_comment'></div>通判江州，知峡州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286276_comment'></div>嘉定九年十月初九日卒，十年三月初九日，合其配蒋氏葬会稽县五云西乡秦望金山，于是宜人先十年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286276_comment'></div>子曰驹，登进士第，淮西总领所干官；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286276_comment'></div>曰骦，早夭；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286276_comment'></div>曰騋，徽州司户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286276_comment'></div>女嫁古灵陈杓、知蕲水县唐槫、涑水司马扬，皆已卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286276_comment'></div>孙曰永孙，德孙，右孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286276_comment'></div>孙婿曰山阴任献可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286276_comment'></div>公之来永嘉，不以余<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1286276", 1286276, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>贱陋</span>，损邑大夫重，坐语常移日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286276_comment'></div>意所纵夺，微辞抑扬，余默受教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286276_comment'></div>论承平至渡江公卿行事本末，其人贤不肖，无一<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1286276", 1286276, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>差忒</span>，为之悚听跃立，激慕摧省多矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286276_comment'></div>而公治县，约期会，缓征役，早计预定，阴化潜弭，视新进后生，乍出智虑，聚沙画墁，欲以立名字、造威福者，力相百，功相十也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286276_comment'></div>吏民皆称公聪明允恕，易事而难悦，谓后此更十五令无能继者，而其前亦鲜及也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286276_comment'></div>公既中原故家，见闻所趋，与南士异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286276_comment'></div>外<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1286276", 1286276, "Clauses/65/Comments/0")'>侃乐</span>而中<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1286276", 1286276, "Clauses/65/Comments/1")'>伉简</span>，于其钜儒名人，虽无不敬爱，然犹不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1286276", 1286276, "Clauses/68/Comments/0")'>自满</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286276_comment'></div>至暴兴者无所屈改，素贵者无所假易，然终不示以同异之迹，故世虽不能知公，而亦不能测也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286276_comment'></div>其为峡州，即自乞不行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286276_comment'></div>六主冲佑观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286276_comment'></div>年八十五，惫老不生于色，慢游不设于身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286276_comment'></div>未卒前八日，亲<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1286276", 1286276, "Clauses/81/Comments/0")'>燎燔</span>奉祭，命驹谒冢下，皆如常礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286276_comment'></div>疾作，子孙奔走，医工交错，公笑曰：「吾命有所悬矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286276_comment'></div>戒其干力曰：「晴久省仓燥，官输速了乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286276_comment'></div>初，宋氏赵州平棘县人，而公奉议郎兹丕之子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286276_comment'></div>五世祖宣献公佐仁宗，赐其居京师春明坊；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286276_comment'></div>四世祖常山公，遂为开封人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286276_comment'></div>靖康之难，宋氏奔迸，或在蜀，或在越，事定，解州家竟不知存亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286276_comment'></div>秘阁修撰名煇，公之从叔父也，请于奉议，以公后通奉，而以修撰遇郊之恩任之，然后解州始得祀于南方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286276_comment'></div>余观五胡乱中国三百年，士大夫氏族犹相通，不以南北彼此<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1286276", 1286276, "Clauses/113/Comments/0")'>限断</span>，盖南之号令征伐尚时至于北方故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286276_comment'></div>宣献赐第，在守文极盛之时；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286276_comment'></div>常山徙宅，当稽古更法之际；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286276_comment'></div>世臣巨室，入卫都邑，尊隆本朝，岂非重内临外之义当然哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286276_comment'></div>甫一再传，天下<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1286276", 1286276, "Clauses/124/Comments/0")'>横流</span>，至于父子兄弟不能相保，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1286276", 1286276, "Clauses/126/Comments/0")'>飘转</span>数千里外，死生莫辨，疑信不分，特以魂气之所之，歆旧祀尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286276_comment'></div>顾平棘今在何许，蜀、越有无一宗，哀哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286276_comment'></div>驹博习古今，与余讲夷夏盛衰详矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286276_comment'></div>孔子许管仲如其仁，然则非由、赐所能知欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286276_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_40_1286276'>继绝于罔象之馀，立家于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1286276", 1286276, "Clauses/140/Comments/0")'>播流</span>之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1286276_comment'></div>前轨尚存，旧闻可守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1286276_comment'></div>愤发新功，益振今有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1286276_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_43_1286276'>嘉定十年二月□日。</div><div id='poem_sentence_43_1286276_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1217&endYear=1217')">1217年5月</a>　五月戊戌，友人王楠卒，有祭文。作品：祭王木叔秘监文。<span class='inlineComment2'>（题目见《水心集》卷二十八。）</span><div id='poem_1286355' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286355' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286355?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭王木叔秘监文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1217年5月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286355")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286355_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286355'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286355'>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286355_comment'></div>忠者上之肝膂也，孰盘石而不移？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286355_comment'></div>明者事之蓍蔡也，孰鉴燧而不欺？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286355_comment'></div>廉所以纪其身也，圭芒琰而力持；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286355_comment'></div>谅所以端其友也，矢激烈而正词。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286355_comment'></div>亭山维高，岷冈维平，舒以春温，敛以秋清。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286355_comment'></div>屹其少时，已自前辈，不汲以进，不挠以退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286355_comment'></div>曷徐其行，曷亟其止，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1286355", 1286355, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>垂拱</span>之侍，无几日尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286355_comment'></div>盐梅腥熟，终归臭腐，庸夫吓哉，哲士肯顾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286355_comment'></div>公昔浮舟，驾言东流，排我篱户，笑谈忘忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286355_comment'></div>舟藏人往，徒载遗像，后生观之，犹得<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1286355", 1286355, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>髴髣</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1286355_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1217&endYear=1217')">1217年</a>　为王楠作挽词。作品：王木叔秘监挽词。<span class='inlineComment2'>（题目见《水心集》卷六。）</span><div id='poem_80069' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_80069' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/80069?labeling=true' id='poem_sentence_1_80069_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_80069'>我欲从之似云出，友风子雨游四方。<div id='poem_sentence_2_80069_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_80069'>梦魂无凭不可挽，坐揽衰涕终摧藏。<div id='poem_sentence_3_80069_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_80069'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_80069_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1217&endYear=1217')">1217年7月2日</a>　七月二日，友人瑞安蔡幼学卒于京师，叶适有祭文。作品：祭蔡行之尚书文。<span class='inlineComment2'>（题目见《水心集》卷二十八。）</span><div id='poem_1286356' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286356' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286356?labeling=true' class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286356'>乾道初元，始变时文，公尚总角，舍庞趋醇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286356_comment'></div>机杼自生，笔墨为春，太学南宫，遍魁等伦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286356_comment'></div>答策忠愤，直词大振，名传外夷，气盖<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1286356", 1286356, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>先民</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286356_comment'></div>赐第而归，犹未冠绅，甘节忘卑，乐志忘贫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286356_comment'></div>疏食朗诵，八音递陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286356_comment'></div>岁莫日斜，几就隐沦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286356_comment'></div>曾不介意，形于叹颦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286356_comment'></div>孔子所贤，匪直也人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286356_comment'></div>平居寡言，莫能疏亲；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286356_comment'></div>及见于用，黑白洞分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286356_comment'></div>政和以安，布在全闽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286356_comment'></div>有论有执，西垣北门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286356_comment'></div>夏卿筹边，绝不与邻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286356_comment'></div>众方愕眙，公何恂恂！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286356_comment'></div>不贵其难，而贵其仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286356_comment'></div>既进赵璧，朝服九宾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286356_comment'></div>燕尔<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1286356", 1286356, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>玄酒</span>，公尸之熏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286356_comment'></div>世故迁流，多否常屯，每辄中道，濡尾曳轮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286356_comment'></div>送公长亭，柳色骤新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286356_comment'></div>秋风未落，逝莫我闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286356_comment'></div>垂老丧朋，将死离群。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286356_comment'></div>海覆河翻，永矢斯樽。</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1286356_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1217&endYear=1217')">1217年</a>　作挽诗悼蔡幼学。作品：蔡尚书挽词二首。<span class='inlineComment2'>（题目见《水心集》卷七。）</span><div id='poem_80209' class='_poem'><div id='poem_sentence_0_80209'>总角都<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_80209", 80209, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>鳌头</span>，老生甘服膺。<div id='poem_sentence_0_80209_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_80209'>白首参<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_80209", 80209, id='poem_sentence_2_80209_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_80209'>茫茫落檐花，穷巷犹短檠。<div id='poem_sentence_3_80209_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_80209'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_80209_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_80208' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_80208' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/80208?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1203年8月19日）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_80208_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_80208'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_80208'>拨沙得黄金，百鍊泻光影。<div id='poem_sentence_0_80208_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_80208'>飞行日月上，莹彻肝胆醒。<div id='poem_sentence_1_80208_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_80208'>空山惨马鬣，何意重为圹。<div id='poem_sentence_2_80208_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_80208'>余哀不浪施，留寄长夜炯。<div id='poem_sentence_3_80208_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_80208'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_80208_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1217&endYear=1217')">1217年8月20日</a>　八月二十，妻诸父高子润卒，撰墓志铭。作品：故大宗丞兼权度支郎官高公墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286279' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286279' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286279?labeling=true' target='_blank'>故大宗丞兼权度支郎官高公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1217年8月20日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286279")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286279_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286279'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286279'>予妻诸父高公，讳子润，字毕老，主乌程县簿，真州判官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286279_comment'></div>孝宗知其名，召使赴行在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286279_comment'></div>公由远地下幕，一日，天子有命昼接，喜过望，亟装欲往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286279_comment'></div>而母杨夫人忽病，谒医久未损。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286279_comment'></div>既而公亦病，医无术，谩云：「久且不治矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286279_comment'></div>公惊叹曰：「明主思见我，而不幸母子皆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1286279", 1286279, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>属疾</span>，或者天不与吾行耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286279_comment'></div>重留君命无益，祗为罪耳」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286279_comment'></div>遂以情自乞，词悲甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286279_comment'></div>孝宗不能夺而怜之，为改通直郎，赐绯衣银鱼致其仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286279_comment'></div>当是时，高判官蚤退之节闻于天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286279_comment'></div>公既得谢，疾寻愈，因不复预人事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286279_comment'></div>常穿<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1286279", 1286279, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>黄草</span>履，刺白篾艇，往来田间，人罕识其面，垂三十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286279_comment'></div>开禧元年，起为大理司直，迁太府丞、大宗丞，兼度支郎官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286279_comment'></div>初，公在乌程，疏三十二缕达于太湖，复晋、宋旧迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286279_comment'></div>在真州，创定城营房五千，费减十五，故孝宗以为材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286279_comment'></div>比再出，适会讨虏粮乏，仓猝籴二百馀万，珠粲而瓦实，江、淮诸军，涤甑釜待饟至，然后饱食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286279_comment'></div>朝廷方赖其用，而不悦者谓公「昔固不仕为亢者也，今安得屈而复仕，当返初秩而已」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286279_comment'></div>公由此坐废，即复具野航，出没圩圱如其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1286279", 1286279, "Clauses/64/Comments/0")'>故态</span>，不少介吝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286279_comment'></div>嘉定十年，年七十七，八月二十日，以考卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286279_comment'></div>公蒙城人，宣仁后弟士林曾孙也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286279_comment'></div>公纪两使留后，世赏知閤门事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286279_comment'></div>父宗之，文吏，官益薄，通判婺州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286279_comment'></div>高氏来南方，禁省隔绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286279_comment'></div>公辛苦自衣食，不祖舅戚馀贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286279_comment'></div>学通古今，暗记《左传》、《汉书》，引笔<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1286279", 1286279, "Clauses/84/Comments/0")'>高丽</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286279_comment'></div>为人颖迈肃洁，如琅玕玉树，无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1286279", 1286279, "Clauses/87/Comments/0")'>尘土</span>意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286279_comment'></div>听其语泠泠然，吴侬楚些之鄙都尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286279_comment'></div>而干敏强力，老练<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1286279", 1286279, "Clauses/91/Comments/0")'>世故</span>，审动而果，虑远而成，惜不究其伐而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1286279", 1286279, "Clauses/94/Comments/0")'>顿抑</span>以穷死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286279_comment'></div>悲夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286279_comment'></div>退固人道之甚重，而止者义理之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1286279", 1286279, "Clauses/97/Comments/0")'>奥枢</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286279_comment'></div>在《艮》之《彖》，「时止则止，时行则行」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286279_comment'></div>然则我非敢自命，而世亦不以是格物矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286279_comment'></div>公之不得遇孝宗，盖时止乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286279_comment'></div>然世莫或知而误言之，谓公特自止而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286279_comment'></div>及公悟其不可以终止，而上又因而起公，此亦公当行之时也，然世又莫察而文致之，遂谓其既止则终不可以行焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286279_comment'></div>夫惜其止而劝其行，人之理也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286279_comment'></div>因其止而禁其行，岂人之理哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286279_comment'></div>故予于公暂出终处为之痛惜，而讣闻之日，哭之至于过期而哀，非以亲旧私之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286279_comment'></div>先夫人曰薛氏，后曰刘氏，皆前卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286279_comment'></div>子男曰不华、不矜、不谫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286279_comment'></div>不矜为兄子沐后，不谫为弟子泳后，皆杨氏命也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1286279_comment'></div>公既自衣食，婺州遗业，悉使其弟有之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1286279_comment'></div>其幼弟公尤爱惜，又自辍田以衣食之屡矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1286279_comment'></div>女子婿曰鲍子明、王田、赵希翱、刘松。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1286279_comment'></div>田，朝奉郎、湖北提刑；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1286279_comment'></div>希翱，承奉郎、监明州造船场。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1286279_comment'></div>孙二人，曰晋彦、宋彦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1286279_comment'></div>公先治湖武康上柏山，豫为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_47_1286279", 1286279, "Clauses/140/Comments/0")'>冢藏</span>，十二月某日，不华奉公丧以归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1286279_comment'></div>恭惟宣仁后以国为家，以民为身，以贤为命，以仁为术，治成元祐，天所顾飨，与宋无极，万世载之者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1286279_comment'></div>今其亲外家零落细微馀十数焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1286279_comment'></div>其仅得列于士，又十数之一二焉，若不华则以庶士守其庙矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1286279_comment'></div>士不得以诸侯祭，礼也，况士庶哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1286279_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1286279_comment'></div>公之折节复仕，为是夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1286279_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_54_1286279'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_54_1286279", 1286279, "Clauses/162/Comments/0")'>冗冗</span>万生兮有翘，森森千丈兮寒标。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1286279_comment'></div>噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1286279_comment'></div>胄出兮宜愈大又不磨，卒摧折以尽兮悲奈何！</div><div id='poem_sentence_56_1286279_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1217&endYear=1217')">1217年10月</a>　十月，为友人临海王棐之母唐氏作墓志铭。作品：王太孺人唐氏墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（题目见《水心集》卷二十二。）</span><div id='poem_1286278' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286278' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286278?labeling=true'
