target='_blank'>太孺人唐氏墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1217年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286278")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286278_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286278'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286278'>临海王棐之母曰唐氏，宁海农女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286278_comment'></div>初，校书郎王夷仲，廉士，贫甚，其室贾夫人，年已晚，犹身治爨涤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286278_comment'></div>舅族怜之，为致唐氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286278_comment'></div>才十二岁，粗箴细缕，釜甑盘筵，不唯诺而集，由是无以辱事累夫人者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286278_comment'></div>后十六年，棐生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286278_comment'></div>生时难，贾夫人亲为厌胜，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1286278", 1286278, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>胞络</span>乃得下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286278_comment'></div>又三年，夷仲、贾夫人相次卒，家益衰，兄弟<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1286278", 1286278, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>析耕</span>，不数斛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286278_comment'></div>父母迫以嫁，不许，曰：「吾必自断其发」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286278_comment'></div>然后止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286278_comment'></div>凡棐幼长师友笔砚，觅举近远，虽费而给，未尝<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1286278", 1286278, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>告假</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286278_comment'></div>人见谓孤苦有立志，交重棐，既乃知为唐氏力也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286278_comment'></div>又三十年，棐上舍及第，佐郡府，登朝出守，迎太孺人与俱，无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1286278", 1286278, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>纤粟</span>改常度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286278_comment'></div>每戒棐，禄料未易消，当谨身报国而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286278_comment'></div>又二十年，嘉定七年四月己未，殁于衢州郡舍，年七十八。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286278_comment'></div>七月癸酉，葬临海云溪山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286278_comment'></div>又三年，棐奉使浙西，书来曰：「棐也惧亲之不获于传，辜负罔极是痛，然未知旧比应铭否」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286278_comment'></div>盖古今所称，以有容无忌为贤，而美不及子；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286278_comment'></div>以子贵成亲为荣，而义不在母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286278_comment'></div>若夫擅宠而虐，偏嬖而骄，沦覆于家，近为殷鉴，皆是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286278_comment'></div>太孺人始也劳而后食尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286278_comment'></div>暨失主<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1286278", 1286278, "Clauses/70/Comments/0")'>单特</span>，空手鞠<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1286278", 1286278, "Clauses/71/Comments/0")'>孩孺</span>，心教意饬，隐然律程，日就岁成，使夷仲之世再显，殆天启其节以庥王氏欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286278_comment'></div>乌用旧比也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286278_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_1286278'>江包众流，前派后别；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286278_comment'></div>有洌<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1286278", 1286278, "Clauses/81/Comments/0")'>氿泉</span>，佐江之竭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286278_comment'></div>行为巨川，止为重陂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286278_comment'></div>唯心之亨，是以永垂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286278_comment'></div>嘉定十年十月□日。</div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1286278_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1217&endYear=1217')">1217年11月19日</a>　十一月十九，东阳郭江卒，为撰挽词。作品：郭伯山挽词。<span class='inlineComment2'>（题目见《水心集》卷八。）</span><div id='poem_80019' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_80019' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/80019?labeling=true' target='_blank'>郭伯山挽词</a><span class='authorDate'>（1217年11月19日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_80019")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_80019_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_80019'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_80019'>兄弟穷经各一时，百年义塾尚留炊。<div id='poem_sentence_0_80019_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_80019'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_80019", 80019, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>讲灯</span>常照鹤窥坐，坛杏半红猿拣枝。<div id='poem_sentence_1_80019_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_80019'>未奏边功明主惜，将成<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_80019", 80019, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>京秩</span>故人悲。<div id='poem_sentence_2_80019_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_80019'>挽君已老应先尽，安得埋铭更后垂。<div id='poem_sentence_3_80019_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_80019'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_80019_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1217&endYear=1217')">1217年11月</a>　十一月，为巩丰撰墓志铭。其弟巩嵘适自温州知州移使江西，遂持以归。作品：巩仲至墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（题目见《水心集》卷二十二。）</span><div id='poem_1286281' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286281' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286281?labeling=true' target='_blank'>巩仲至墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1217年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286281")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286281_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286281'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286281'>予友仲至，巩氏，名丰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286281_comment'></div>时新迪义理之学，草茅士震于见闻，多矜露忲狃，至他文史<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1286281", 1286281, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>言论</span>，儒之艺业，又昧陋颠倒，莫知<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1286281", 1286281, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>幅程</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286281_comment'></div>独仲至抑纵开阖，条流品汇，应变不迫，富若素有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286281_comment'></div>余本拙疏不能自达，而仲至广导曲引，出幽入眇，盖为之黾勉追逐于荒原断涧之侧数年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286281_comment'></div>仲至日益有名，不幸不得用，然有以自负，命云侣月，跨越汗漫，浩乎不可浼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286281_comment'></div>而余畏惧怯劣，常痼留一榻，不敢越户限，然后知人之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1286281", 1286281, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>禀分</span>高下绝殊，固非切磋诱掖所能增长矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286281_comment'></div>异日，仲至谓余：「吾登芙蓉上峰，因以过子，将又发药也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286281_comment'></div>而不遂，竟死，悲夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286281_comment'></div>初，仲至以太学上舍对策高第，教授汉阳军，代还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286281_comment'></div>旧例皆自学入馆，有不喜者，才授广东提刑司干办公事，母丧免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286281_comment'></div>人曰不复外补矣，又授浙东。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286281_comment'></div>会改法，本路人不许为监司属官，人又曰再易地而不果，其当径来也，然卒令干办福建帅司公事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286281_comment'></div>以格知临安县，政尚宽简，吏民信化，刑罚衰息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286281_comment'></div>人谓「仲至极不应在州县，今蹉跎满秩矣，尚何诿」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286281_comment'></div>会其所善为学官，仲至劝使拔滞淹士，反坐此食宫观禄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286281_comment'></div>久之，始提辖左藏库。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286281_comment'></div>于是众意益不厌，遂妄称「旦夕居要职矣」，不知语何所从，仲至亦不自知也，竟复以宫观罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286281_comment'></div>士皆失气悒悒曰：「穷至此耶！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286281_comment'></div>今当何为？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286281_comment'></div>其员外通判乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286281_comment'></div>或曰：「不能」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286281_comment'></div>然则正任而待其阙乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286281_comment'></div>犹不与，复授宫观，而仲至死矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286281_comment'></div>嘉定十年正月晦也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286281_comment'></div>其家郓州须城，渡江，即所寓土断，为婺州武义人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286281_comment'></div>曾祖焘，祖庭芝，皆左承议郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286281_comment'></div>庭芝，所谓山堂先生者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286281_comment'></div>父法，乡贡进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286281_comment'></div>前此科目，相传七世矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286281_comment'></div>仲至学敏而早成，自童丱时，前辈<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1286281", 1286281, "Clauses/95/Comments/0")'>源绪</span>，古今音节，事之因革总统，如注水千丈之壑，迎前随后，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1286281", 1286281, "Clauses/100/Comments/0")'>宿艾</span>骇服，以为积数十年<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1286281", 1286281, "Clauses/101/Comments/0")'>灯火</span>勤力，聚数十家师友讲明，犹不能到也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286281_comment'></div>其文无险怪华巧，而以理屈人，片词半牍，皆清朗得言外趣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286281_comment'></div>尤工为诗，多至三千馀首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286281_comment'></div>自举贤尚德之义废，而进人一出于课试之虚文，茍有其一，则清资显辙，执契而取，仲至不多有乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286281_comment'></div>刚者折而不行，柔者流而不止，惟正己不伤物，于用世为宜，仲至不宜乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286281_comment'></div>又曰：「颜渊、贾谊短命，惜哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286281_comment'></div>非时不子用，子不时待也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286281_comment'></div>仲至寿不七十乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286281_comment'></div>自上世有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_1286281", 1286281, "Clauses/127/Comments/0")'>金匮石室</span>之藏，或达书命，谕意指，皆选文学博雅之士，下至鸿都翰林，词赋篆刻，犹各专其官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286281_comment'></div>出内之吝，非不欲参其间，技不两能也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286281_comment'></div>故苍槐翠竹，必植于庭宇，仲至可为帑吏乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286281_comment'></div>凡此皆疑误之难通者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1286281_comment'></div>性<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1286281", 1286281, "Clauses/141/Comments/0")'>质易</span>，无岸谷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1286281_comment'></div>暇日，载一瓢独行田野，不问岐路，抵暮而返。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1286281_comment'></div>去家二里，有龙门峡，登眺徘徊，慨然曰：「此可以止矣」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1286281_comment'></div>初，阮夫人卒，殡于大慈寺东坞，是年十一月壬寅，二子积、耕迎而合葬焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1286281_comment'></div>五女子，婿曰右监门卫大将军善輶、进士高槐、上饶知县张友、常山县尉周维新，幼未嫁也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1286281_comment'></div>孙男曰左，曰弼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1286281_comment'></div>孙女二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1286281_comment'></div>余既为铭，而季氏仲同自温州移使江西，遂持以归，曰：「读于墓而哀吾兄，然十句必九恸，不成声也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1286281_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_49_1286281'>闻于程子：「天地之生材，甚爱甚惜，必有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_49_1286281", 1286281, "Clauses/174/Comments/0")'>吝固</span>之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1286281_comment'></div>蔽贤者，违天地所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_50_1286281", 1286281, "Clauses/176/Comments/0")'>吝固</span>，使之气沮志夺，怫然而怒，聚为阴阳之罚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1286281_comment'></div>则其人虽大必折，虽炎必扑，荒落而类，圮败而族」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1286281_comment'></div>激哉是言也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1286281_comment'></div>天地虽甚爱于贤材，君子初何心于用舍！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1286281_comment'></div>仲至之灵，果上愬于天耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1286281_comment'></div>吾谓必且为祥风庆云，醴泉甘露，以瑞斯人，使其富贵寿考，蕃永而无极也，何荒类圮族之有？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1286281_comment'></div>呜呼！</div><div id='poem_sentence_56_1286281_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1217&endYear=1217')">1217年</a>　并有诗送巩嵘。作品：送巩仲同。<div id='poem_80145' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_80145' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/80145?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送巩仲同</a><span class='authorDate'>（1217年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_80145")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_80145_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_80145'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_80145'>花溪初逢日苦短，橘洲重寻意更长。<div id='poem_sentence_0_80145_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_80145'>天催<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_80145", 80145, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>鹡鸰</span>玉楼去，漱流不并龙洲旁。<div id='poem_sentence_1_80145_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_80145'>春风忽高行旆起，酒尽何如添野水。<div id='poem_sentence_2_80145_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_80145'>古来交契看老时，与公安得轻别离。<div id='poem_sentence_3_80145_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_80145'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_80145_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1217&endYear=1217')">1217年</a>　为王楠撰墓志铭。作品：朝议大夫秘书少监王公墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286291' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286291' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286291?labeling=true' target='_blank'>朝议大夫秘书少监王公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1217年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286291")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286291_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286291'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286291'>公讳楠，字木叔，故顺州王氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286291_comment'></div>石敬瑭叛，贿其地于狄，迁永嘉亭山，为温州人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286291_comment'></div>曾祖震，祖延龄，父赠朝议大夫辂，及其先三世，皆儒者不得仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286291_comment'></div>公总两髻，赋一举空朝廷，语压场屋，人谓必兴王氏矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286291_comment'></div>既冠，以《春秋》中乾道丙戌进士第，婺州推官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286291_comment'></div>孝宗疑「诸州上供，得无渗漏乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286291_comment'></div>漕司遽令婺州增斛二万，守以下不敢争，公独言：「今苗亩七升，罗匹十馀千，较他郡偏重矣，又无故增二万，何以共命」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286291_comment'></div>会新守周权且至，走书白权，袖以进，上愕曰：「朕未尝加赋也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286291_comment'></div>由是凡议渗漏者皆免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286291_comment'></div>移台州推官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286291_comment'></div>处州张彭杀人，谩谓奴当罪，弟张泗佐之，狱四五不承。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286291_comment'></div>公令泗画地状奴所以击死者，泗失对，泣与兄诀曰：「昔勘官皆先鞠奴，款定，泗和之尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286291_comment'></div>今忽先问泗，吾不知所答。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286291_comment'></div>兄真杀人矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286291_comment'></div>彭遂<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1286291", 1286291, "Clauses/49/Comments/0")'>伏罪</span>，一州称明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286291_comment'></div>教授黄州，义乌县丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286291_comment'></div>州索畸零税，帛一分一尺，米一勺一升，公叹曰：「就整不失零，法已苛矣，况百倍诛之乎」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286291_comment'></div>三言于州，乃已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286291_comment'></div>东阳俗素悍，公摄一月，威信大立，决事千章，滞案皆尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286291_comment'></div>民不敢带刀，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1286291", 1286291, "Clauses/68/Comments/0")'>矩步</span>而出，顽乡远逋，争自输委，又请其守别置尉统焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286291_comment'></div>知绩溪县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286291_comment'></div>江以东，绩溪敛最厚，民最薄，凿山垒亩，乾瘠太半。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286291_comment'></div>公积钱买田，为新塘六十八，堨六，浚旧陂百顷，岁得美熟，无以旱报者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286291_comment'></div>监进奏院，太府太常寺簿，坐伪学罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286291_comment'></div>知江阴军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286291_comment'></div>蔡泾者，江海之交也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286291_comment'></div>皇祐中尝一疏治，填淤久，水不能胜舟，公私患之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286291_comment'></div>公开渠港五百馀里，漕挽<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1286291", 1286291, "Clauses/95/Comments/0")'>通流</span>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1286291", 1286291, "Clauses/96/Comments/0")'>灌注</span>一郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286291_comment'></div>民事<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1286291", 1286291, "Clauses/97/Comments/0")'>瘟神</span>谨，巫故为阴庑<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1286291", 1286291, "Clauses/98/Comments/0")'>复屋</span>，塑刻诡异，使祭者<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1286291", 1286291, "Clauses/100/Comments/0")'>凛慄</span>，疾愈众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286291_comment'></div>公鞭巫撤祠，坏其像，病良已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286291_comment'></div>迁大理丞，礼部员外郎，提举江东常平茶盐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286291_comment'></div>开禧之役，沿江上下，警备汹汹，置池州不问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286291_comment'></div>公时兼守池，言：「顷岁有金花帽一篮卦，住此累年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286291_comment'></div>近孟思齐至符离，其人忽指而诮曰：『汝池州城甚恶，姑自完，何必来』！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286291_comment'></div>思齐军相顾失色，始悟其谍也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286291_comment'></div>且虏何畏，不乘吾虚？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286291_comment'></div>一处得入，则江南震矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286291_comment'></div>不报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286291_comment'></div>募张飞英献缗钱八万，请城池州，又不许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286291_comment'></div>不得已补尤穿穴者，深其濠，水环之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286291_comment'></div>抽里兵守江岸，辟刘积中副总管，委以军政，池人少安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1286291_comment'></div>召为吏部郎中，兼枢密院检详文字，国子司业，秘书少监，国史实录院编修检讨官，兼侍立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1286291_comment'></div>罢，主冲佑观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1286291_comment'></div>知袁州，未行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1286291_comment'></div>知赣州，先礼教，后刑罚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1286291_comment'></div>赣人在元祐党十有四，公遍谕耆老曰：「汝州多正人如此，将百世称之，后生可不勉乎」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1286291_comment'></div>民感公意，相戒勿犯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1286291_comment'></div>居数月，夜或不闭户矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1286291_comment'></div>俗喜麻苧，鲜丝纩，公课种桑，多者减役赎罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1286291_comment'></div>赣、广间，常以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_49_1286291", 1286291, "Clauses/165/Comments/0")'>岁杪</span>贩盐，空聚落往返，号盐子，所过辄杀伤官军，故有盐子狱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1286291_comment'></div>公奏申严保伍，须行者，给凭乃听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1286291_comment'></div>是岁，盐子狱十省八九。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1286291_comment'></div>提刑者新进少年，嗜兵而搅事，意不合，毁公于朝，复主冲佑观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1286291_comment'></div>赣人雪涕，前后拥不得行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1286291_comment'></div>公曰：「太守数易，古矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1286291_comment'></div>今不去，后当去耳，焉用无益之留」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1286291_comment'></div>赋诗而别，赣人刊而祠之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1286291_comment'></div>连告老，未下，以嘉定十年五月戊戌卒，年七十五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1286291_comment'></div>十一月，葬于亭山西原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1286291_comment'></div>娶何氏，封宜人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1286291_comment'></div>子曰炜，从事郎、东阳县主簿；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1286291_comment'></div>曰爚，将仕郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1286291_comment'></div>曰熊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1286291_comment'></div>婿曰承事郎、知宜兴县戴桷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1286291_comment'></div>孙曰僧贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1286291_comment'></div>孙女三人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1286291_comment'></div>公爱民如子，母食父训，恻恻若有失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1286291_comment'></div>建其实利，不崇虚誉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1286291_comment'></div>位置处崖峭<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_68_1286291", 1286291, "Clauses/211/Comments/0")'>独特</span>，不轻徇物，自谓「理所到更百折必往；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1286291_comment'></div>或以势见屈，过万钧不受也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1286291_comment'></div>在婺，数以职忤其守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1286291_comment'></div>守，贵人也，去而再相，不一顾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1286291_comment'></div>周丞相闻其名，请见之，虽不拒，啜茗清坐，终无所言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1286291_comment'></div>在礼部颇久次，苏师旦请使见己而后迁，公叹曰：「吾义不交匪人，今其止是乎」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1286291_comment'></div>邓友龙劝北伐，祈公：「幸少助，要官可立得」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1286291_comment'></div>又曰：「前日某人发十策，骤用矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1286291_comment'></div>公力言：「无草草，国与身将俱不利」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1286291_comment'></div>友龙愠曰：「公壹退怯，女子之贞也，吾何望哉」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1286291_comment'></div>竟取宣抚去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1286291_comment'></div>俄而败书闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1286291_comment'></div>韩侂胄死，缘坐<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_80_1286291", 1286291, "Clauses/249/Comments/1")'>窜流</span>衢、信道中不绝，至无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_80_1286291", 1286291, "Clauses/250/Comments/0")'>担夫</span>可雇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1286291_comment'></div>公归未煖席，即奏言：「权利所趋，如䏑在鼎，朵颐染指，何世无人！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1286291_comment'></div>追仇既多，复怨必甚，蔡确新州，可为永鉴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1286291_comment'></div>滋蔓未已，非朝廷福」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1286291_comment'></div>执政善之，不能改也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1286291_comment'></div>初，尤尚书袤知台州，公为其属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1286291_comment'></div>相继同僚者，楼参政钥、彭仲刚、石宗昭、郡人石𡼖、逸民应恕、林宪之流皆聚焉，颇依朋友箴切，不随吏文督迫，名一时胜会，远近传之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1286291_comment'></div>钱丞相象祖，戚家子，有淳行，尤慕公，尝笏履到门，公亦为折屐倾尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1286291_comment'></div>钱公既相，用常法叙进，公亦用常礼<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_88_1286291", 1286291, "Clauses/282/Comments/0")'>旅谒</span>而已，无所请也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1286291_comment'></div>然揣摩者私料公厚钱甚，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_89_1286291", 1286291, "Clauses/285/Comments/0")'>媢忌</span>者因掎公以撼钱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1286291_comment'></div>公既去，钱愧悔曰：「吾本以能薄望轻，不敢白用王君，疑似难明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1286291_comment'></div>今反累之，何尸此位为」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1286291_comment'></div>因固求罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1286291_comment'></div>故钱以公退，公不以钱进也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1286291_comment'></div>公四调官方脱侍左，三入朝犹在散地，虽事多违己而志不舍命，虽道欲成名而天不与时，噫，不知柳下惠之贤耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1286291_comment'></div>亦素所蓄积然耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1286291_comment'></div>余稚从公至耄，岁月<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_96_1286291", 1286291, "Clauses/304/Comments/0")'>相靡</span>，而士之变故繁矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1286291_comment'></div>若夫所谓大节者，于其去就穷达之际，可以考焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1286291_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_98_1286291'>王先朔方，弃地南徂；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1286291_comment'></div>公虽南产，繄北之馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1286291_comment'></div>忠为干骸，义为肝脾；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1286291_comment'></div>彼夸者子，肤革是肥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1286291_comment'></div>欣入不容，戚出不惰；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1286291_comment'></div>宁其失物，毋宁失我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1286291_comment'></div>既以此始，亦以此终；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1286291_comment'></div>尚无死生，安有穷通！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1286291_comment'></div>有兼亭山，有荐岷渊；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1286291_comment'></div>人欤忽亡，德也永存。</div><div id='poem_sentence_107_1286291_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1217&endYear=1217')">1217年</a>　后又为王楠作诗序。作品：王木叔诗序。<div id='poem_1285910' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1285910' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1285910?labeling=true' target='_blank'>王木叔诗序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1217年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1285910")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1285910_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1285910'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1285910'>初，木叔仕二十馀年，未尝觅举，予屡言于执政，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1285910", 1285910, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>不省</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1285910_comment'></div>阙榜有义乌丞，径取以归，家人更<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1285910", 1285910, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>诮诘</span>，不暇顾也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1285910_comment'></div>其在天台，与钱丞相象祖甚相厚，至是适来守，委一州听所为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1285910_comment'></div>素介，无私昵语，钱公尤严惮，故虽当国，不敢以骤用累之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1285910_comment'></div>观集中《送钱郎中被召》诸篇，大意可见矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1285910_comment'></div>木叔不喜唐诗，谓其格卑而气弱，近岁唐诗方盛行，闻者皆以为疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1285910_comment'></div>夫争妍斗巧，极外物之变态，唐人所长也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1285910_comment'></div>反求于内，不足以定其志之所止，唐人所短也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1285910_comment'></div>木叔之评，其可忽诸！</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1285910_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1217&endYear=1217')">1217年12月</a>　十二月，撰文记述温州社稷，提及杨简、巩嵘知温州。作品：温州社稷记。<div id='poem_1286144' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286144' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286144?labeling=true' target='_blank'>温州社稷记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1217年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286144")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286144_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286144'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286144'>社，土也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286144_comment'></div>稷，谷也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286144_comment'></div>非土不生，非谷不育，国始建则壝以祀，示民有命也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286144_comment'></div>风云雷雨，随地而兴；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286144_comment'></div>禾黍菽麦，随种而生；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286144_comment'></div>神明之所由出，至严至敬，不敢忽也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286144_comment'></div>怪淫<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1286144", 1286144, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>诬诞</span>之说起，乞哀于老、佛，听役于鬼魅，巨而龙罔，微而鳝蜴，执水旱之柄，擅丰凶之权，视社稷无为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286144_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286144_comment'></div>岂民悖而不知礼哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286144_comment'></div>乃长吏导之非其义也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286144_comment'></div>盖温州之社稷，昔者莫能详矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286144_comment'></div>某自童年，见其坛陛颓缺，旁无四墉，敝屋三楹，饮博嬉遨聚焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286144_comment'></div>祭且至，徐薙茀蔓草；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286144_comment'></div>燔燎甫毕，已丛生过其旧矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286144_comment'></div>地气一不应，浮屠之普觉，行庙之祠山，湫渊之玉函莆杓，椒邱之三王海神，奔走拜伏，咒诵呶杂，社稷顾漠然无预也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286144_comment'></div>夫莫尊于地，莫察于地，众灵群望，环拱效职者也，何急彼而慢此哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286144_comment'></div>故曰非其义也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286144_comment'></div>嘉定四年，守杨简始加甓土上，于是灌莽尤盛，刺壮城卒专修平之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286144_comment'></div>十年，守巩嵘伉其大门，改造斋房，筑墙百五十堵，具凡佩服器用之须。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286144_comment'></div>杨公谓「守莫先于社稷」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286144_comment'></div>巩公曰：「吾寝处漏不补，它观游无用也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286144_comment'></div>二公知以义导其民矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286144_comment'></div>夫山水之高深，像设之诡特，众灵群望托之以为神也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286144_comment'></div>社稷无有，然则民之耳目虽新于一时而不能久于异日矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286144_comment'></div>古人必树之田主，各以其野之所宜木，郑康成曰：「后土，田正之所依也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286144_comment'></div>周人以栗，宰我曰：『使民战栗』，以为恐惧不自安，非亲地之道也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286144_comment'></div>永嘉之木莫宜于豫樟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286144_comment'></div>豫，雷出地奋也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286144_comment'></div>樟，章之也：皆美甚之名也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286144_comment'></div>数十百年，其大百围，其崇<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1286144", 1286144, "Clauses/88/Comments/0")'>干霄</span>，民无敢不肃也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286144_comment'></div>然后知古之治其国者，社稷之臣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286144_comment'></div>今之守其地者，社稷之守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286144_comment'></div>十二月。</div><div id='poem_sentence_32_1286144_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1217&endYear=1217')">1217年</a>　作《后总》一文，言及温州驻军。<div id='poem_1286015' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286015' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286015?labeling=true' target='_blank'>后总</a><span class='authorDate'>（1217年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286015")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286015_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286015'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286015'>秦既一天下，筑长城以限胡，蒙恬将重兵境上，匈奴畏威远遁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286015_comment'></div>秦之亡，非戎狄能为害也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286015_comment'></div>汉初有天下，韩、赵更叛，匈奴屡入，高帝受围白登，仅以身免，始与中国分权并角。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286015_comment'></div>自后历代盛衰不常，攻守异用，和战迭行，而安危存亡系焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286015_comment'></div>以本朝故实考之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286015_comment'></div>渡江前约和坚定，而南北幸无事者百馀年矣，渡江后约和坚定，而南北幸无事者六十馀年矣，前世所未有也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286015_comment'></div>然于其中间，盟誓渝爽，和约倾败，则恣意摧残，极力倾辱，中原故地沦没大半，残杀之暴，遍于江、浙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286015_comment'></div>其他琐琐一嚬一笑而能制吾之死命者，常人耳目惯见熟闻，不暇赘陈矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286015_comment'></div>韩侂胄愚騃专擅，以功名自喜，轻举妄动，号为复仇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286015_comment'></div>中国皇惧，亟杀侂胄，匣其首谢虏，请再定和约，甫得无事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286015_comment'></div>忽女真、蒙靼递相攻击，议臣谓可乘隙经营，遂绝币罢和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286015_comment'></div>六七年间，牵引山东、河北，破坏关外，未有毫发之益，而所丧巨亿万计，东南之人不得相保。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286015_comment'></div>夫安危大虑，存亡大决，必有成论，终始不移，课功索效，若探囊而取，犹恐不及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286015_comment'></div>奈何疏略茫浪，一不顾计，如处燎原焦烂中，乃谓得清凉安坐之乐哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286015_comment'></div>窃尝朝思夕念，非复归于和，终不能一日无事，然而势有甚不可者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286015_comment'></div>女真、蒙靼，兴灭未定，各责重赂，争邀厚礼，使聘并驰，何以立国？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286015_comment'></div>绝旧希新，后福奚算？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286015_comment'></div>禁新挟旧，先效焉取？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286015_comment'></div>化我沃野，卒为污莱，一也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286015_comment'></div>山东忠义，聚于山阳十万，始畏其强梗若仇敌，今安其捍御如腹心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286015_comment'></div>使蒙则已疑，和金则增忿，反侧立见，变乱遂形。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286015_comment'></div>且养兵百万，安有倚山东人捍御之理！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286015_comment'></div>北不为北，南不为南，则议和方为目前莫大之忧矣，二也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286015_comment'></div>议和不可，独有守淮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286015_comment'></div>淮非边也，今为边耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286015_comment'></div>前世守边，旷数百千里无垣塞，当其盛时，虏不敢入者，以人守之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286015_comment'></div>本朝废不用，自以文法为守，渡江后尤密矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286015_comment'></div>然百守而不一固者，知以文法为守而不知以地为守也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286015_comment'></div>今欲一守而百固，则必画地而守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286015_comment'></div>姑以近事言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286015_comment'></div>嘉定十年，虏始突中渡，自是我无岁不守，虏无岁不突。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286015_comment'></div>梅林、沙窝，山水阻深，虏绕出其后，残黄破蕲，直至大江，湖南、江西处处震动。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286015_comment'></div>今建县为军，升关为使，是弃淮而守江也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286015_comment'></div>然其百守而不一固者如故也，一日突过，则大事去矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286015_comment'></div>愿庙堂回虑易意，行一守百固之策，自淮为始，画地而守，今岁行之，来岁必收其效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286015_comment'></div>天子以保民为职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286015_comment'></div>宰相群臣，助天子保民者也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286015_comment'></div>智虽绝伦，谋虽超众，必其可以保民而后用之，不足以保民者不可用也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286015_comment'></div>今西则阜郊保、洋州，东则眉子洲，北则泗州，南则蕲、黄，我百姓死者四十馀万人矣，是累岁守边之策果不足以保民也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286015_comment'></div>行之不变，民命都尽，其事非远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286015_comment'></div>且民知其终不足以保我，必将自求生路，东南全蜀皆为盗区，是时虽欲一守而百固，可得乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1286015_comment'></div>淮濒，美土也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1286015_comment'></div>其水清，其鱼肥，其种易熟，其熟不独饱，东南之地不能及，非塞外沙碛比也，民所乐耕而愿守也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1286015_comment'></div>请朝廷专建使名，自一里至三四十里止，令民居之，有陂泽之利者固之，有已居之家者助之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1286015_comment'></div>于淮水内<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>深广壕堑，略如冈阜，乘高瞰下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1286015_comment'></div>虏攻则拒守，常时耕作自恣，以逸待劳<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1286015_comment'></div>夫浙西都邑，我之阃奥也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1286015_comment'></div>江东、西，我户庭也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1286015_comment'></div>两淮，我界限也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1286015_comment'></div>譬之人家，必严其界限，不使偷人暴客突过，而后户庭、阃奥得安焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1286015_comment'></div>今虏一突过，则吾界限数百千里之民以肉喂虎狼，然犹以其未至于户庭阃奥也而忽视之，此旁观之所以凛凛也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1286015_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_51_1286015'>自一里至三四十里，居民可百家<span class='inlineComment2'>（袁云：元稿有「则为一堡」四字。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1286015_comment'></div>淮名千里，实可居七八万家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1286015_comment'></div>请朝廷专建使自为之，勿委边帅<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1286015_comment'></div>募浙西、江东、西、湖南、福建厚赀产及盐茶米商能以力居民者，自一里为差至五里止，计其费以官之，或<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>佐以盐茶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1286015_comment'></div>募及其三，即择阴阨，先为之遣将将万人，沿淮上下以护其作<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑸</sup>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1286015_comment'></div>虏来争，幸三数得胜，则惩创渐退，吾役可成矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1286015_comment'></div>其败，谨勿追蹑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1286015_comment'></div>如此，则淮间极边，有材鸷勇力头目数百人错杂而居，其麾下所将可任事者亦不为少，一二年中，安集稍定，则边头形势壮，而淮地三四十里外，南至于江，可以奠枕，淮奠枕则江南晏然，不忧二虏矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1286015_comment'></div>卖官有常价，然无仕进之路，民以为弃己也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1286015_comment'></div>今自一里而至三四十里，所居百家，室庐、粮种、什器、浚壕约费三万缗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1286015_comment'></div>其能五里者，补宣教秉义郎，即理知县、监押资任，其下差次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1286015_comment'></div>关升改官，自知县监押而上，两任通判、路分，两任知州、路钤，不愿转出者，与职名或朝官称谓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1286015_comment'></div>任子孙出仕依常法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1286015_comment'></div>淮东、西已成，西至襄、汉，土尤美，民尤乐耕愿守；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1286015_comment'></div>其无水险可因者，再浚之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1286015_comment'></div>古人五沟五涂而树之林，以山川丘陵为地险，不以人为险也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1286015_comment'></div>今极西至关外，已有山林堡障。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1286015_comment'></div>然自与虏和，不知捍蔽之利，而和约一败，则被残破之害矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1286015_comment'></div>山东忠义人，决不可同处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1286015_comment'></div>石圭已叛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1286015_comment'></div>今淮北实得州县若干，立李全为大使，专其地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1286015_comment'></div>自五百人首领已上，各差次与官，某乡某县皆析与之，居处耕作之费皆稍助之，使之欣然挈携北去，北自为北，南自为南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1286015_comment'></div>观今议者往往以为山东忠义既聚，理无复散，因循目前而忘异日之大祸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1286015_comment'></div>然何待异日，可畏甚哉<span class='inlineComment2'>（袁云：此一段系回刘子至书。）</span>！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1286015_comment'></div>自府兵立而兵农分，自府兵废而兵农不可合，遂遗唐、五代之患，而本朝至渡江受其极弊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1286015_comment'></div>略计四总领之所给，岁为钱六千馀万缗，而米绢犹不预。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1286015_comment'></div>百官群吏，日夜鞭挞疲民以奉其费而不能安也，危乎殆哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1286015_comment'></div>夫因民为兵而以田养之，古今不易之定制也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1286015_comment'></div>募人为兵而以税养之，昔人一时思虑仓猝不审，积习而致然尔，改之无难也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1286015_comment'></div>请择任总领，以濒江近里凡民夫四至包套而种植实不到者耕之，其屋宅、农具、器用、役作、种粮，朝廷各给与百万缗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1286015_comment'></div>今安边所及岁币所不用，足以办此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1286015_comment'></div>若尽力为之，倍给可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1286015_comment'></div>欲其坚实完好，皆粗如私家，家为百亩，可为三十家，从兵居之<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑹</sup>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1286015_comment'></div>教阅皆如在军法<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑺</sup>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1286015_comment'></div>次用总领历后钱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1286015_comment'></div>往岁历后率一二百万缗或数百万缗以上，近馈师常苦不继，当无馀矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1286015_comment'></div>次募故将相贵臣家子弟之愿进者<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑻</sup>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1286015_comment'></div>自百家至千家，第其官职而褒优之，虽次对可也<span class='inlineComment2'>（卜式为关内侯，往事之明例也。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1286015_comment'></div>然则四总领五年中当有十万兵，不待粮饷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1286015_comment'></div>通以十年，则六千万缗及它米绢皆无用，而月桩、和买、折帛、折估、青草诸钱，皆可大削损而归还其民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1286015_comment'></div>夫其所以简易捷疾能若此者，岂有奇术！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1286015_comment'></div>特以田养兵而不以税养兵尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1286015_comment'></div>古人为天下，虽黄帝、舜、禹，无不战者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1286015_comment'></div>惟孙武言「百战百胜，非善之善也，不战而屈人兵，善之善者也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1286015_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1286015_comment'></div>彼固以其学意之尔，非真能不战而屈人兵也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1286015_comment'></div>虽然，于今则有可以不战而屈二虏之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1286015_comment'></div>彼既挫于吾坚堑之下，求战不获。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1286015_comment'></div>昔耶律德光既灭晋，尽以其兵分守中原，忽刘知远称帝，所在州镇起兵逐之，虏遂大败。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1286015_comment'></div>今吾下令中原人勿与虏角，签刷勿应，先锋勿行，能取胡一级<span class='inlineComment2'>（必真胡人，中原人勿自斗也，）</span>，与钱五百缗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1286015_comment'></div>彼有无穷之级，我有无穷之赏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1286015_comment'></div>以其名王、贵婿下至千户级来者，差次重赏，级至二十万，则真胡人部伍离散，无与守中原者，遁还其巢穴矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1286015_comment'></div>故曰「不战而屈人兵」，于今独然者，亦非有奇术，适值其时然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1286015_comment'></div>城濮之役，但言「少长有礼」，一战而胜，遂霸诸侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1286015_comment'></div>本朝制兵，虽荒陬绝戍，一阶一级，佥归伏事，可谓严密矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1286015_comment'></div>然而龠米寸帛皆仰于官，先军后民，养卒不满三千，阖郡为之困弊，举三百年之中以为无可为者，亦不思以田养之而徒以税养之故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1286015_comment'></div>今欲傅城三十里内，以爵及僧牒买田。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1286015_comment'></div>今岁买之，则来岁之获可永减民税十之三，官以其全赋给一郡之用，犹馀十之五<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑼</sup>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1286015_comment'></div>营分给散，悉循今法，无改毫分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1286015_comment'></div>夫可以损民税之十三，可以赢郡用之十五，所行止于傅城三十里之近，而一境数百十里之远不预闻焉，取成于一岁之内而无悠久而难见者焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1286015_comment'></div>昔人有言，「利不百者不变法」，嗟夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1286015_comment'></div>此亦百矣，可以变矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1286015_comment'></div>尝以温州赡军，粗为程式，虽吏文粗鄙，今特存之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_113_1286015_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1286015'><span class='label'>袁云：</span>此以后是约温州言之，它处未必尽然，虽有差误，亦不必较。<br /><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_44_1286015_0'>⑴ 袁聘儒云：「内」字元稿系「南」字。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_45_1286015_0'>⑵ 虏已越淮，复阻广堑，兵少则不能攻，兵多则不能布阵，拐子马虏之长技，无所用也。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_53_1286015_0'>⑶ 其三四十里外，以边帅守。朝廷所行，不以累帅守及令，帅守及令亦不得预吾事，无相侵越也。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_54_1286015_0'>⑷ 袁云：「或」字元稿作「钱」字。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_55_1286015_0'>⑸ 其兵必募精练忍耐，不剽劫生事者。袁云：丁卯岁，侍先生于金陵，亲商略此事。先生谓一里作堡，不过可存著数百人，可以择御者不过数十百人，若五里一堡，则皆三倍矣。公家之力不能遽办，故欲募富商。富商亦谁肯无故出此一项钱？然茶盐米商者，其赀本多在淮南，虏一冲突，则皆荡尽，使其为堡自守，所必乐。然是时虏已据濠梁，故必以兵护作，亦古法。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_83_1286015_0'>⑹ 先有功，以事艺精习，勇捷过其等伍者。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_84_1286015_0'>⑺ 前代虽与敌对守，当其四时，未尝不番休耕作，无常聚不散者。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_87_1286015_0'>⑻ 募之必有方，彼争从命，我不为抑也。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_108_1286015_0'>⑼ 此据温州所馀言之，他州或过或不及。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1286015_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1217&endYear=1217')">1217年</a>　为孟猷撰墓志铭。作品：故运副龙图侍郎孟公墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286277' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286277' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286277?labeling=true' target='_blank'>故运副龙图侍郎孟公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1217年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286277")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286277_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286277'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286277'>良甫名猷，姓孟氏，元祐皇后侄曾孙，信安郡王孙，世家具国史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286277_comment'></div>以承奉郎监秀州籴纳仓，历临安府楼店务，严州税，丽水县丞，浙东常平干官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286277_comment'></div>除籍田令，通判婺州，知南安军、信州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286277_comment'></div>召为都官郎中，改左曹、尚右，出淮东运判。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286277_comment'></div>入为军器监、左司郎中，直宝谟阁，两浙运判副使，太府卿，兼刑部侍郎，主管冲佑观，知婺州，直龙图阁，江东运副，复主冲佑观，于是阶累朝议大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286277_comment'></div>初，余入吴，而良甫兄弟最先至，气敛然滋恭，语退然益卑，齿寒士中不见异，余谓世多贤公子，习使人亲近己，固然尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286277_comment'></div>徐而切偲反复，即耳目之近以验事物之远，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1286277", 1286277, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>瞻瞬</span>领彻，贯穿纵横，虽寒士之深于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1286277", 1286277, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>造诣</span>者不能至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286277_comment'></div>后数年，行加修，名加闻，天下言王公家，无不高良甫之义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286277_comment'></div>由此更践内外，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1286277", 1286277, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>出夷入险</span>，择而守中，劳而有成，干方举德，而莫有助之者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286277_comment'></div>良甫之学，以观省密察为主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286277_comment'></div>外所涉历，皆切于心；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286277_comment'></div>身所觉知，皆反于性。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286277_comment'></div>凡情伪错陈，横逆忽来，几若无所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1286277", 1286277, "Clauses/60/Comments/0")'>撄拂</span>，而筋骸之束，肌肤之会，常得由于顺正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286277_comment'></div>其专悟独了，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1286277", 1286277, "Clauses/65/Comments/0")'>动用</span>不穷，盖非简策所载，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1286277", 1286277, "Clauses/67/Comments/0")'>笺训</span>所及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286277_comment'></div>然余欲其博达伦类，尽究古今之变，以进于昔之所谓知道者，而良甫亦未能也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286277_comment'></div>道者，天下共由之涂也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286277_comment'></div>使有人焉，以为我有是物也，将探而取之，而又曰我能得之矣，则其统已离矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286277_comment'></div>老聃曰：「道冲而用之或不盈，渊兮似万物之宗」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286277_comment'></div>又曰：「犹兮若冬涉川，豫兮若畏四邻」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286277_comment'></div>嗟夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286277_comment'></div>聃遁世不回者，逊而委诸人可也，乃执而自有之若是之固欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286277_comment'></div>良甫立朝，无党与，未尝示人以同异之迹，士大夫敬爱而不敢狎也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286277_comment'></div>方籍田时，以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1286277", 1286277, "Clauses/94/Comments/0")'>伪学</span>斥士且尽，独不及良甫，然遂自乞外补。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286277_comment'></div>后稍复收引，而良甫已先入为郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286277_comment'></div>及兵议起，即被使出淮东。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286277_comment'></div>至兵罢而罹其祸者众，独良甫为无所预。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286277_comment'></div>将用之矣，然亦竟不欲为容而去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286277_comment'></div>盖其出处之际可考者如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286277_comment'></div>其治民考功，因旧循常，无所改作；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286277_comment'></div>必有更革，尤务靖重；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286277_comment'></div>所至皆安其政令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286277_comment'></div>然良甫所长，当危疑未定之时，晓畅彼此之情以济国事；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286277_comment'></div>会通翕合之日，协同贤材之类以新治功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286277_comment'></div>故不以一能一职为称，虽其可称，而亦不足为良甫道之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286277_comment'></div>良甫平居严己恕物，不立<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1286277", 1286277, "Clauses/121/Comments/0")'>岸限</span>，后进晚学，幽人<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1286277", 1286277, "Clauses/123/Comments/0")'>野士</span>，有善意者，日满其门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286277_comment'></div>喜为诗，无风形月状浮劣之语，间出一二，摐然金石，有警于世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286277_comment'></div>卒年六十一，嘉定九年十二月七日也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286277_comment'></div>十年五月二日，葬于吴县白羊山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286277_comment'></div>夫人吕氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286277_comment'></div>子继华，舒州观察推官；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286277_comment'></div>继显，丹杨尉，其夭也，先良甫四月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1286277_comment'></div>或谓良甫之疾，由哭继显而然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1286277_comment'></div>然则学道之力，无用于哀乐之间欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1286277_comment'></div>死生，命也，不以子审矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1286277_comment'></div>果以子也，东门吴之放，曾不如子夏之褊也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1286277_comment'></div>是良甫之道，非离人群而自逸也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1286277_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_46_1286277'>勿谓道存，迅疾不留；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1286277_comment'></div>非智能知，非力能修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1286277_comment'></div>惟余良甫，少成于天；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1286277_comment'></div>古有今无，人十己千。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1286277_comment'></div>操其一机，以应万有；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1286277_comment'></div>竭海糜山，如屈伸肘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1286277_comment'></div>余未及死，子胡遽亡！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1286277_comment'></div>视此铭者，淑人之伤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1286277_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_54_1286277'>嘉定十年四月□日。</div><div id='poem_sentence_54_1286277_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1217&endYear=1217')">1217年</a>　为舒彦升撰墓志铭。作品：舒彦生墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286280' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286280' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286280?labeling=true' target='_blank'>舒彦升墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1217年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286280")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286280_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286280'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286280'>以铁易铜钱，使常在内地，不流入寇境，执事者所知而必行也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286280_comment'></div>然而沿汉、淮上下二千里，铜钱在江南不加益而泄于北日甚，此执事者患之而不能救也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286280_comment'></div>遂其所必行，忽其不能救，予固疑之久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286280_comment'></div>绍熙初，铁钱法弊，商贾顿<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1286280", 1286280, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>亏折</span>，所至皆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1286280", 1286280, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>皇惑</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1286280", 1286280, "Clauses/13/Comments/1")'>罢市</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286280_comment'></div>余偶为蕲州，被使一路，奉上指尽力<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1286280", 1286280, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>安集</span>岁馀方少定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286280_comment'></div>然自是铜铁钱有倍再之价，淮人贵衣高食，不复易活如往年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286280_comment'></div>于时州县吏，能宽刑审虑以善道佐余者惟舒君名杲字彦升，信州永丰人，余同年进士也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286280_comment'></div>曾祖锡，祖子诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286280_comment'></div>幼自知学，夜读书，设水加木于地，每困寐，足跌有声，辄惊寤复读，以为常，其励志如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286280_comment'></div>及第，授宁国尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286280_comment'></div>父若德、母徐接死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286280_comment'></div>主蕲春簿，辟知同安监。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286280_comment'></div>又辟汉阳监，以铁钱相首尾十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286280_comment'></div>教其人使择利害避就，有不及不以为罪，教之如初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286280_comment'></div>所铸轮郭肉好，皆为式于后不可改，故<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1286280", 1286280, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>私钱</span>遂绝而官铸<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1286280", 1286280, "Clauses/46/Comments/1")'>流通</span>至今。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286280_comment'></div>嗟夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286280_comment'></div>天下固有易行之法，虽不肖蔽昧迷失，犹不大坏也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286280_comment'></div>不幸而难从，非贤者顺导<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1286280", 1286280, "Clauses/52/Comments/0")'>委曲</span>，而不抵突以败，寡矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286280_comment'></div>易行之法不多有，行法之贤不多见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286280_comment'></div>适得一人如彦升者，相与调护收拾于奔溃汹骇之中，可不谓难乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286280_comment'></div>奈何生不尽用，而没又将无闻，宜余之愧叹爱惜而不敢吝夫词也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286280_comment'></div>彦升既去汉阳，知新昌县，主管江西运司文字，分差镇江府粮料院。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286280_comment'></div>朝廷录其劳，使干办行在诸司粮料院，迁国子监主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286280_comment'></div>嘉定九年，年六十六矣，其五月十七日，足疾卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286280_comment'></div>秩累朝奉郎，赠其父朝请郎，母安人，又赠其先、后室周氏皆安人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286280_comment'></div>明年八月五日，子俨之、似之、侃之、伸之，婿周梦发，与为兄后者份之，葬彦升于崇善乡大安山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286280_comment'></div>彦升病酷吏恣威虐而世以为有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1286280", 1286280, "Clauses/83/Comments/0")'>风采</span>，贪吏横聚敛而世以为有才具，常恳切为天子陈其故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286280_comment'></div>使行其志，残暴可息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286280_comment'></div>在蕲春，增<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1286280", 1286280, "Clauses/89/Comments/0")'>陂池</span>九百馀，种稻十万斛；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286280_comment'></div>新昌复已失税数千，而同安、汉阳减工费各半。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286280_comment'></div>使究其材，事功可许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286280_comment'></div>仕不希进，余与石应之强使就辟，彦升初不愿也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286280_comment'></div>江西以荐往，竟逡巡诣选而归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286280_comment'></div>使居其位，躁竞可消。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286280_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_34_1286280'>自上世贵廉方有耻之人，悃愊无华之士，临民而官治，在朝而俗美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286280_comment'></div>呜呼彦升，其几是矣！</div><div id='poem_sentence_35_1286280_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1217&endYear=1217')">1217年</a>　为陈谦撰墓志铭。作品：朝请大夫提举江州太平兴国宫陈公墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286313' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286313' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286313?labeling=true' target='_blank'>朝请大夫提举江州太平兴国宫陈公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1217年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286313")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286313_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286313'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286313'>公永嘉陈氏，名谦，字益之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286313_comment'></div>曾祖璿，祖敏昭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286313_comment'></div>父敦化，赠太中大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286313_comment'></div>幼专苦迅捷，初得《通鉴》录本，坐败敖昼夜读，数日略已尽，又论著其要，众咸骇异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286313_comment'></div>入太学时，尚踵秦桧故禁，文气卑弱，公理胜而笔豪，其体一变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286313_comment'></div>中乾道八年甲科，授福州司户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286313_comment'></div>陈丞相俊卿推诚听公，输苗许自槩量，民以为公赐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286313_comment'></div>教授宁国府，未行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286313_comment'></div>史丞相浩荐主管刑工部架阁，迁国子录，敕令所删定官，枢密院编修官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286313_comment'></div>为孝宗陈中兴五事，至李纲议建镇，范宗尹、赵鼎置镇抚，上遽曰：「纲何足道」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286313_comment'></div>公曰：「然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286313_comment'></div>陛下用大臣，审出纲上，『纲何足道』，宜如圣谕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286313_comment'></div>今顾出纲下远甚，奈何」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286313_comment'></div>上蹙然，遂极论踰数刻，因以公语<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1286313", 1286313, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>诘责</span>执政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286313_comment'></div>孝宗寻<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1286313", 1286313, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>内禅</span>，公即求补外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286313_comment'></div>与军垒，不就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286313_comment'></div>通判江州，慕白氏之游，自号「后司马」，留二年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286313_comment'></div>知常州，地迫苏、润，望轻为守，未尝得举职，俚俗谓「此监司出气处」也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286313_comment'></div>公以义胜奸，扶善抑恶，据正而行，监司俛首，逊公所为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286313_comment'></div>州人至今言「陈编修神明也，不再见矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286313_comment'></div>移提举湖北。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286313_comment'></div>辰州猺蒲阙口掠辰、沅、邵、武冈以叛，公偶摄宪事，亲行边，稍经略之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286313_comment'></div>会除夔路运判，而帅司荆鄂军讨捕久无功，两路<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1286313", 1286313, "Clauses/72/Comments/0")'>恫恐</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286313_comment'></div>安抚使王蔺奏留公，就迁提刑，率正兵、丁兵三千，直捣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1286313", 1286313, "Clauses/76/Comments/0")'>贼穴</span>，降诛八十馀峒，凡七十五日，猺人自是不复反。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286313_comment'></div>进直焕章阁，于是绍熙五年也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286313_comment'></div>庆元二年，以户部为湖广总领。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286313_comment'></div>总司先造会子，价益贱，减省，百才直五十，命曰短钱，相承莫能革，更规以自利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286313_comment'></div>公集卓子铺，日付钱为千者五百，使以七十兑焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286313_comment'></div>抑损燕馈，器用崇侈者，还之金银，以市军储；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286313_comment'></div>分遣官属，士卒逃死者，求其隐占，以正军籍：皆昔所未有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286313_comment'></div>统制不悦，过客多觖望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286313_comment'></div>然党论方大起，贬斥不胜计，而公亦随去矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286313_comment'></div>后四年，知袁州，高文虎、程松持不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286313_comment'></div>又四年，党论渐止，提点成都路刑狱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286313_comment'></div>造李冰石堰，嘉州绳桥，皆施<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1286313", 1286313, "Clauses/116/Comments/0")'>便巧</span>，坚久<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1286313", 1286313, "Clauses/117/Comments/0")'>耐实</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286313_comment'></div>褒礼耆彦，待以师友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286313_comment'></div>翰墨许与，流布岷、峨间，蜀人加敬爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286313_comment'></div>移京西转判，复焕章阁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286313_comment'></div>开禧元年，襄阳前帅李奕，后帅皇甫斌，密受韩侂胄意，谋先事扰虏，纵亡命劫界外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286313_comment'></div>斌建令献马者补官，得马三千匹，总豪皆破家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286313_comment'></div>先骑士浮客无所仰耕，又籴米随、郢州，岁恶，至拦米搜籴，民食顿竭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1286313_comment'></div>由是七州民无强弱相扇为盗，纵横入虏地，复归自寇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1286313_comment'></div>商贩路绝，沿汉近山之木皆尽，而邓城镇、屯田、庄府东门，处处杀掠，城扉昼掩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1286313_comment'></div>侂胄不知其情，将遂出师，公谓侂胄：「复雠大义，伐国重事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1286313_comment'></div>丰储实边，教而后战，古人成算既不讲；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1286313_comment'></div>添大军，给纲马，射铁帘，盖寨屋，今日常文又不用；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1286313_comment'></div>乃倚群盗剽夺行之，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_46_1286313", 1286313, "Clauses/161/Comments/1")'>岂得</span>以败亡为戏乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1286313_comment'></div>既屡论斌、奕罪，力陈四不宜动，且求罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1286313_comment'></div>侂胄患之，弥年不决。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1286313_comment'></div>二年，薛侍郎叔似以往谕指协和帅漕，留宣抚京湖，公复以户部郎迁司农少卿，总领湖广，遂去襄阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1286313_comment'></div>斌师大出，不用宣抚令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1286313_comment'></div>初败支池河，再败方城，而郭倬至宿，李爽至寿，皆大溃，金州秦世辅，未及行而溃，盖开禧所谓用兵如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1286313_comment'></div>在襄阳也，度虏必至，至则襄为兵冲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1286313_comment'></div>襄人汲于汉，冬涸，掬泥而饮，公陂北城为地道，沟江，贮之三百尺，茭刍稿秆皆备，纲舟被系千馀，尽释之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1286313_comment'></div>既至鄂，凡米悉运赴襄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1286313_comment'></div>又曰「安陆亦兵冲也」，并发所部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1286313_comment'></div>自夏迄秋，襄得斛百馀万，安陆七十万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1286313_comment'></div>又分光、黄土兵效用戍五关，募守安州三关。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1286313_comment'></div>三关者，魏将元英所攻，韦睿救之者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1286313_comment'></div>及两州被围，卒赖三关兵救安陆，而五关不可攻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1286313_comment'></div>虏既解去，襄城米未食者十五万，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_60_1286313", 1286313, "Clauses/212/Comments/0")'>薪水</span>不乏，竟完二城，皆如公策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1286313_comment'></div>除宣抚司参谋，辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1286313_comment'></div>虏兵深入，陷应城，盗焚汉川，汉阳空城走。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1286313_comment'></div>或言「虏已拆凤栖寺赵太尉宅为筏渡江矣」，武昌震慑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1286313_comment'></div>公方待制宝谟阁，副薛公宣抚，即日置司北岸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1286313_comment'></div>虏绝南河，亟命土豪赵观覆之中流，人马溺死甚众，馀兵皆反走。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1286313_comment'></div>而孝感屯兵亦夜斫贼营，军势欲振矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1286313_comment'></div>会德安教授陈之经见侂胄，言州无援师，伪为恸哭可怜者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1286313_comment'></div>侂胄不知其诈也，怒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1286313_comment'></div>襄阳都统赵淳忌宣抚司统制吕渭孙，诬其杀副统制魏友谅，辄杀之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1286313_comment'></div>薛公不敢劾，遂夺职俱罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1286313_comment'></div>然虏卒不窥汉阳，收兵北遁，公力也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1286313_comment'></div>虏实困弊，然外示不和之形。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1286313_comment'></div>侂胄惧，复以公知江州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1286313_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_74_1286313", 1286313, "Clauses/249/Comments/0")'>备警</span>益严，又以馀力完署舍，浚沟洫，中流晏然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1286313_comment'></div>侂胄死，嘉定元年五月，虏已决和，不乐者乘时毁公，复罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1286313_comment'></div>自是不复用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1286313_comment'></div>八年，始提举兴国宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1286313_comment'></div>九年八月朔，无疾卒，年七十三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1286313_comment'></div>十年正月丁酉，葬建牙乡鹏飞里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1286313_comment'></div>令人胡氏，先公十年卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1286313_comment'></div>子曰临，早夭；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1286313_comment'></div>曰观，宣教郎，知益阳县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1286313_comment'></div>女曰缜，嫁建康府户部赡军中库薛师董。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1286313_comment'></div>孙曰起宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1286313_comment'></div>郊祀皆任兄弟之子：贵州录参颐，彭泽簿巽，新汉阳簿履，将仕郎损。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1286313_comment'></div>而女之嫁者六人矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1286313_comment'></div>公轩迈朗豁，纯识独到，人情共畏，不知其难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1286313_comment'></div>荒蹊绝径，匹马先至，洪波骇浪，扁舟夜涉，惟意所向，若或助之，故动必有成，而人亦莫能测也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1286313_comment'></div>初，隆兴、乾道中，浙东儒学特盛，以名字擅海内数十人，惟公才最高，其《在易庵集》文最胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1286313_comment'></div>然公未常自异于辈流，辈流亦不知异公也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1286313_comment'></div>开禧之役，四十年大事，而公独先见李奕、皇甫斌败證，告于朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1286313_comment'></div>及襄城、安陆获全，功又最著。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1286313_comment'></div>然无分铢之赏，方以为罪，公亦不自明也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1286313_comment'></div>夫挟三最，世不异，复不赏，已置不论矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1286313_comment'></div>至庸人之谤公，则有甚可哀者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1286313_comment'></div>公之使湖北也，岳、复二州人愬曰：「总所岁籴我米，不与我钱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1286313_comment'></div>我非官户也，非士人也，非义勇也，三者幸而免，使我并受。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1286313_comment'></div>总取我一县，又倍之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1286313_comment'></div>传子至孙，不能脱也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1286313_comment'></div>公移书总领张抑再三，抑盛怒不许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1286313_comment'></div>既而公为抑代，遽奏罢之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1286313_comment'></div>抑惭恨，诬公，所以去者用此，至令吴琚检校公在时钱物，然反多抑七十馀万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1286313_comment'></div>后人以抑、昉为谗，因佐佑其说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1286313_comment'></div>比罢副宣抚，复令项安世校公后总时钱物，然一钱一粟不谬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1286313_comment'></div>二籍至今藏其家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1286313_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1286313_comment'></div>世言谗人能以白为黑，止于所谗而已，不谗者固素定也，人素定故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1286313_comment'></div>免岳、复永世之籴，二州祭祠，至今不绝，人不素定乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1286313_comment'></div>琚、安世不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_109_1286313", 1286313, "Clauses/354/Comments/1")'>相谋</span>也，检校若<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_109_1286313", 1286313, "Clauses/355/Comments/0")'>合符</span>，人不素定乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1286313_comment'></div>今谗者往矣，不谗者可以定矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1286313_comment'></div>古人谓舜与蹠之分；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1286313_comment'></div>嗟夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1286313_comment'></div>不定则无分，而舜为蹠矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1286313_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_114_1286313'>选软<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_114_1286313", 1286313, "Clauses/364/Comments/0")'>迟鲁</span>，儒之常患；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1286313_comment'></div>质少文多，流俗所讪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1286313_comment'></div>天门开阖，孰知公贤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1286313_comment'></div>千里独行，振袂无前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1286313_comment'></div>蠢尔阙口，覆波若电；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1286313_comment'></div>开禧挑敌，最为先见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1286313_comment'></div>辈粟万仓，卒全两邦；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1286313_comment'></div>虏不至江，又公之庸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1286313_comment'></div>凡可陈力，奋无易剧；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1286313_comment'></div>零功碎绩，所存历历。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1286313_comment'></div>汲绠千寻，不尽其深；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1286313_comment'></div>以浅疑我，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_125_1286313", 1286313, "Clauses/387/Comments/0")'>谗夫</span>之淫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1286313_comment'></div>或栖连岗，或汎长流；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1286313_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_127_1286313", 1286313, "Clauses/390/Comments/0")'>霞友云朋</span>，造物与游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1286313_comment'></div>建牙之乡，鹏飞之里；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1286313_comment'></div>公游远矣，公誉方起。</div><div id='poem_sentence_129_1286313_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1218&endYear=1218')">1218年</a>　是年，转中大夫，仍奉祠在家著述讲学。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1218&endYear=1218')">1218年9月</a>　九月，应永嘉县令胡衍之请撰文。作品：永嘉县社稷记。<div id='poem_1286147' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286147' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286147?labeling=true' target='_blank'>永嘉县社稷记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1218年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286147")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286147_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286147'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286147'>晋析永宁县置永嘉郡，更名县曰永嘉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286147_comment'></div>在隋、唐间，其社稷，步积之三千二百八十六，中容八坛，图籍转相授，所从来远矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286147_comment'></div>淳熙后，步失者二千有馀，坛陛沦没，即于佛祠，令不能正也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286147_comment'></div>嗟夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286147_comment'></div>岂其邑小，其民寡，不足与正耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286147_comment'></div>将其事缓，其效迂，正不正皆无益损而致然也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286147_comment'></div>山阴胡衍，领县二日，骇怅愧惕，若<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1286147", 1286147, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>疚负</span>在己。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286147_comment'></div>按旧图，就南补北，还得故步，垣千尺，砖之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286147_comment'></div>用政和仪，崇五坛，坛石皆青，表之门道，敞之房宇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286147_comment'></div>嘉定十一年秋，告新社成礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286147_comment'></div>然则果于行义，可以为勇；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286147_comment'></div>复于已失，可以为难；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286147_comment'></div>先有司之所后，可以为敬：参而具者贤也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286147_comment'></div>君辞避不肯当，独推言之曰：「古民人社稷常并称，有其实也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286147_comment'></div>后民人社稷虽并称，名而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286147_comment'></div>实则教之耕稼而养，仰霖润槁，皆神力也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286147_comment'></div>名则视其耕稼而取，俄旱忽水，非神祸哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286147_comment'></div>州之取总其凡，犹窃民誉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286147_comment'></div>县之取烦其目，惟聚民怨；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286147_comment'></div>县社之名仅存者幸也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286147_comment'></div>古之立国，左祖右社，严事如一，朝市均等，无相离也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286147_comment'></div>后世或远或近，率意而为尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286147_comment'></div>自晋、唐置社，僻在大城尽处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286147_comment'></div>今蕃庶，尚草莱杂，昔稀旷，人迹绝矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286147_comment'></div>野庐老圃盍以寄葵韭，华榱巨栋曷以托檐荫焉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286147_comment'></div>永嘉之社，名几不存，可畏也夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286147_comment'></div>治术同异，吏宜考详；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286147_comment'></div>地势偏隔，人且自恕；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286147_comment'></div>令姑罪之免，奚彼敢议哉」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286147_comment'></div>众又谓君思深之至此也，几于仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286147_comment'></div>君役民甚简，不妄劳费；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286147_comment'></div>责输以时，不苟贷假。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286147_comment'></div>然则审其取者，养民之始；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286147_comment'></div>正其名者，致实之渐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286147_comment'></div>故并记之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286147_comment'></div>九月。</div><div id='poem_sentence_35_1286147_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1218&endYear=1218')">1218年10月5日</a>　十月五日，青田县主薄陈耆卿上书叶适，请示《习学记言》大旨，并自青田来永嘉，以所著求教，叶适授以文法。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1218&endYear=1218')">1218年</a>　为陈耆卿题文。作品：题陈寿老论孟纪蒙。<div id='poem_1285951' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1285951' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1285951?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题陈寿老论孟纪蒙</a><span class='authorDate'>（1218年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1285951")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1285951_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1285951'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1285951'>古圣贤之微言，先儒所共讲也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1285951_comment'></div>然皆曰「至二程而始明」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1285951_comment'></div>凡二程所尝讲，皆曰「至是止矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1285951_comment'></div>其密承亲领，游、杨、尹、谢之流，而张、吕、朱氏后时同起，交阐互畅，厥义大弘，无留蕴焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1285951_comment'></div>窃怪数十年，士之诣门请益，历阶睹奥者，提策警厉之深，涵玩充溢之久，固宜各有论述，自名其宗，而未闻与众出之以扶翼其教，何哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1285951_comment'></div>岂敬其师之所以觉我，而谦于我之所以觉人欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1285951_comment'></div>天台陈耆卿，生晚而又独学，奚遽笔之书？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1285951_comment'></div>然观其简峻捷疾，会心切己，则非熟于其统要者不能入也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1285951_comment'></div>总括凝聚，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1285951", 1285951, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>枝源派本</span>，则非博于其伦类者不能推也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1285951_comment'></div>机钥严秘，门藏户摄，则非老于其家室者不能守也，勾萌荣动，春华秋实，则非妙于其功用者不能化也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1285951_comment'></div>盖数十年所未见而一日得之，余甚骇焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1285951_comment'></div>嗟夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1285951_comment'></div>余虽后死，而素无其质，终不足以进此道矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1285951_comment'></div>使子及其时<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1285951", 1285951, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>步趋</span>规矩于亲领密承之间，回复折旋于互畅交阐之盛，不挺然异材乎，不柄授之以扶翼其教乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1285951_comment'></div>「愧余之不足进」，余昔之言也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1285951_comment'></div>「美子之不可及」，余今之言也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1285951_comment'></div>当以今之言为揭。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1285951_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1218&endYear=1218')">1218年</a>　为陈耆卿文集题文。作品：题陈寿老文集后。<div id='poem_1285955' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1285955' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1285955?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题陈寿老文集后</a><span class='authorDate'>（1218年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1285955")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1285955_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1285955'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1285955'>建安中，徐、陈、应、刘，争饰词藻，见称于时，识者谓两京馀泽，由七子尚存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1285955_comment'></div>自后文体变落，虽工愈下，虽丽益靡，古道不复庶几，遂数百年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1285955_comment'></div>元祐初，黄、秦、晁、张，各擅毫墨，待价而显，许之者以为古人大全，赖数君复见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1285955_comment'></div>及夫纷纭于绍述，埋没于播迁，异等不越宏词，高第仅止科举，前代遗文，风流泯绝，又百有馀年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1285955_comment'></div>文之废兴，与治消长，亦岂细故哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1285955_comment'></div>今陈君耆卿之作，驰骤群言，特立新意，险不流怪，巧不入浮，建安、元祐，恍焉再睹，盖未易以常情限也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1285955_comment'></div>若夫出奇吐颖，何地无材，近宗欧、曾，远揖秦、汉，未脱模拟之习，徒为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1285955", 1285955, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>陵肆</span>之资，所知不深，自好已甚，欲周目前之用固难矣，又安能及远乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1285955_comment'></div>君之为文，绵涉既多，培蕴亦厚，幅制广而密，波游浩而平，错综应会，纬经匀等，膏润枯笔之后，安徐窘步之末，若是，则荐之庙郊而王度善，藏之林薮而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1285955", 1285955, "Clauses/56/Comments/0")'>幽愿</span>惬矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1285955_comment'></div>若又审其所从，不求强同，贵其所与，毋为易得，趋舍一心之信，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1285955", 1285955, "Clauses/62/Comments/0")'>否臧</span>百世之公，则何止于建安、元祐之文也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1285955_comment'></div>君必勉之！</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1285955_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1218&endYear=1218')">1218年</a>　应胡卫之请，为邹浩撰墓记。作品：宋吏部侍郎邹公墓亭记。<div id='poem_1286146' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286146' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286146?labeling=true' target='_blank'>宋吏部侍郎邹公墓亭记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1218年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286146")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286146_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286146'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286146'>余友胡卫道知常州，书来曰：「邹公冢在此，学官弟子荐省必时，礼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286146_comment'></div>家浸远而赀落，祭不亭，守无庐，山中松柏皆尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286146_comment'></div>然而敬不专于家者，我其责欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286146_comment'></div>教授赵綝实始作亭，我命尉朱起章治旁庐舍，予閒民衣食以居而汛除焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286146_comment'></div>墓四隅树之木，俟以长而芘蔽焉，若是，则视其家无远矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286146_comment'></div>役甫就，业已毕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286146_comment'></div>虽然，我欲永久如一日，而后此勤惰不齐，奈何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286146_comment'></div>思其气类一而终始能不慢者，惟学之士庶几，故又使司户朱中守序其意以请，幸子词而托之也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286146_comment'></div>公名浩，字志完，章子厚独相日，任谏列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286146_comment'></div>子厚<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1286146", 1286146, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>迷国</span>，罪无匹朋，最大者二后废立之际，尤大者臣子不忍言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286146_comment'></div>公既以死争，而子厚将遂杀公，祖问皆坐贬，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1286146", 1286146, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>旅次</span>不容榻，会其即败，仅免尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286146_comment'></div>小人犹伪撰公疏，激怒<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1286146", 1286146, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>宫闱</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286146_comment'></div>故虽元祐党籍已赦而公三窜谪，屈伸荣辱之变，未尝不以正也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286146_comment'></div>朝廷虽<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1286146", 1286146, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>謇切</span>，乡党常和乐；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286146_comment'></div>识虑虽达权，操舍常据经；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286146_comment'></div>学术虽敏辨，讲肄常钝默。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286146_comment'></div>修之身及家，未尝无本末次第也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286146_comment'></div>谏必行，人臣之荣遇也，然道之难全而非节不著；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286146_comment'></div>喜闻过，人主之盛德也，然事之难明而非节不显。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286146_comment'></div>绍圣迄宣和，谏官五，御史一，皆豪杰有重名者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286146_comment'></div>《记》曰：「释奠必有合也，有国故则否」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286146_comment'></div>呜呼，公可以为故矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286146_comment'></div>学之士，仰缀一瓦，俯缉半甓，而楹桷自新也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286146_comment'></div>雪干霜枝，苍鳞翠甲，而樵牧自绝也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286146_comment'></div>出以公之道而仕，处以公之道而止，而进退自明也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286146_comment'></div>卫道托于学之士也深，而士之报宜厚矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286146_comment'></div>卫道名卫，越州人。</div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1286146_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1218&endYear=1218')">1218年</a>　为林德秀撰墓志铭。作品：林德秀墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286283' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286283' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286283?labeling=true' target='_blank'>林德秀墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1218年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286283")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286283_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286283'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286283'>林颖，字德秀，生三十一年卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286283_comment'></div>自童幼孤苦，无慢情戏色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286283_comment'></div>居嚣烦之域，未尝不静暇也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286283_comment'></div>混渔盐之廛，未尝不肃洁也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286283_comment'></div>入教弟妹，出从友朋，皆有矩法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286283_comment'></div>其于学，知所谓大者而好之，审所谓疑者而通之，求所谓是者而正之矣。<div class='inline'
