id='poem_sentence_5_1286283_comment'></div>不幸得热疾，数日死，悲夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286283_comment'></div>孔子曰：「<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1286283", 1286283, "Clauses/20/Comments/1")'>苗而不秀</span>者有矣夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286283_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1286283", 1286283, "Clauses/21/Comments/1")'>秀而不实</span>者有矣夫」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286283_comment'></div>材者，所赖以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1286283", 1286283, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>生养</span>也，人纪所待以立也，人文所由以明也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286283_comment'></div>苗而秀，秀而实，则民命常永矣，天也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286283_comment'></div>虽然，其不秀者，固嘉种，非稂莠也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286283_comment'></div>其不实者，固良稼，非稊秕也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286283_comment'></div>败之以水旱而不使至于谷，亦天也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286283_comment'></div>知二本之皆一，成毁之皆天，则余于君无憾矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286283_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_1286283'>其寿为伸，其夭为屈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286283_comment'></div>去来冥冥，理焉攸出！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286283_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_1286283'>十一年十月□□日。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1286283_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1218&endYear=1218')">1218年</a>　为郭江撰墓志铭。作品：郭伯山墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286292' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286292' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286292?labeling=true' target='_blank'>郭伯山墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1218年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286292")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286292_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286292'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286292'>君东阳郭氏，名江，字伯山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286292_comment'></div>始余因君请，记一时学术之变，在其父良臣语中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286292_comment'></div>或咎余不当为郭氏轻言道德，又预疑学废，忧愤深切，非所谓感人心而和平也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286292_comment'></div>学之初兴，敏和捷应，君父兄最有力，四方豪俊不逮门者无几。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286292_comment'></div>及好恶异，议论激，奔迸迷匿，苟脱讥谤，同时为精舍者，皆塞向改室，或束书<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1286292", 1286292, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>敖荡</span>，自弃于庸人矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286292_comment'></div>惟君治故馆，率子弟乡里䌷绎旧业无替，旁州比县，自我而有科目大官数十焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286292_comment'></div>学虽不以利言也，久而不怠，则效固从之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286292_comment'></div>然则戴翼于光显之时，接扶于微歇之后，护名士流俗之毁而好以重币，徇州闾荣第之欲而援以先登，斯郭氏常德欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286292_comment'></div>君本有佐世材用，既习熟师友大指，芒锐销尽，不复伸吐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286292_comment'></div>勘古馀日，小缘陂塘，疏著竹树，阻曲薄，粗蔽映尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286292_comment'></div>然余卧病不出十馀年，闻君管押三江袋盐，监穿山破盐场，盱眙军录事参军，又于其间监泰州支盐仓，车辂院，乌江舒城令，辟书四来，君不暇答也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286292_comment'></div>方咸卤下湿，盆夫灶叟，尔汝诟病，其弊事千蠹百穴，君著为条式，使后有矩象。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286292_comment'></div>城盱眙十二里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286292_comment'></div>陡山高危，谷汲险远，君浚荇叶池、铜山崦，披剔暗井，水泉充溢，尤为人所称，惜其不蚤得试，而今老矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286292_comment'></div>盖举改官者垂足，而以嘉定十年十一月十九日卒，年六十五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286292_comment'></div>嗟夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286292_comment'></div>当学术未变时，君之品目岂不素定哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286292_comment'></div>奈何晚岁隳落贸贸尘埃中，岂若岸巾南堂，云卧月起，乐故所闻之道而终其身也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286292_comment'></div>十一年十一月十六日，夫人何氏，子楷、检、彬，为弟后者桂，女淑，孙男宁宇，孙女三，葬君于孝顺乡罗青原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286292_comment'></div>彬守郭西濠上不去，曰：「先人食旧德，惟子是望」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286292_comment'></div>噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286292_comment'></div>余亦死矣，将复使不知者咎余耶！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286292_comment'></div>学者千万世之传，而新美其业以继父祖者，楷等之责也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286292_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_1286292'>菽也筥之，薪也斧之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286292_comment'></div>不厌不歆，神锡予之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286292_comment'></div>其子其孙，其仍其昆；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286292_comment'></div>其学惟实，不惟其文。</div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1286292_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1218&endYear=1218')">1218年</a>　为季子庙撰文。作品：季子庙记。<div id='poem_1286145' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286145' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286145?labeling=true' target='_blank'>季子庙记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1218年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286145")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286145_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286145'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286145'>初，赵公彦橚为晋陵县，听民讼，多族姻也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286145_comment'></div>所为讼者，赀产割裂也，子本贷易也，什伯必取铢两不舍，壹于法而恩义绝，贰以情而廉耻丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286145_comment'></div>赵公曰：「噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286145_comment'></div>殆将非亲戚骨肉耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286145_comment'></div>奚不讼而犹讼也」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286145_comment'></div>顾城阴寂寥，有屋丛彗中，太半摧塌，曰季子庙也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286145_comment'></div>又叹曰：「彼薄千里之吴，不王而食于此，邑人故忘之耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286145_comment'></div>徒争之为病，不让之为贵，今故忘之耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286145_comment'></div>宜不讼而犹讼也」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286145_comment'></div>即市头改筑，题曰：「有吴延陵季子之祠」，与僚佐奠谒尽敬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286145_comment'></div>二十馀年矣，人心感动之深浅，视牒诉损益有考也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286145_comment'></div>而竹幽水清，过者祓涤，季子存矣夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286145_comment'></div>余尝疑泰伯既遁于蛮，染其俗以自晦，则子孙之于文献礼乐，非有先君王之旧闻也，季子何以能知群圣贤之德业，历见中国卿大夫，所言皆中其过？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286145_comment'></div>岂非命世杰识也哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286145_comment'></div>至于父兄好勇轻死，约不传其子而必传其弟，则道固已行于家矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286145_comment'></div>肯嗣吴而治，为文王可也，何愿于子臧？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286145_comment'></div>盖其志远矣大矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286145_comment'></div>让所以畜德也，毫釐之让，足以灭丘山之争。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286145_comment'></div>国犹未离乎争也，不幸有毫釐之争，则灭德矣，斯季子不为欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286145_comment'></div>孟子曰：「无辞让之心，非人也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286145_comment'></div>非人者，形具而人非者之谓也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286145_comment'></div>又曰：「好名之人，能让千乘之国；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286145_comment'></div>茍非其人，箪食豆羹见于色」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286145_comment'></div>嗟夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286145_comment'></div>孟子信以不让为非人，而又以为非其人不能让乎，何前后异指也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286145_comment'></div>由后而言，非其人不能让，能之者，泰伯至季子五人而已，是绝天下也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286145_comment'></div>由前而言，人皆能让，天下皆季子也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286145_comment'></div>晋陵其邑人也，有不能乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286145_comment'></div>不察而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286145_comment'></div>当以孟子前之言为正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286145_comment'></div>嘉定十一年。</div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1286145_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1219&endYear=1219')">1219年</a>　是年，仍以华文阁待制兼提举西京嵩山崇福宫，在家著述讲学，以年已七十，请求致仕，未准。作品：申省乞致仕状。<div id='poem_1285857' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1285857' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1285857?labeling=true' target='_blank'>申省乞致仕状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1219年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1285857")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1285857_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1285857'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1285857'>某伏自惟念，初无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1285857", 1285857, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>艺能</span>，滥尘科目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1285857_comment'></div>往备使令之偶乏，猥超涯分而已多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1285857_comment'></div>效职蔑闻，扪心内愧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1285857_comment'></div>今既七十，馀景不长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1285857_comment'></div>素有气疾，眩晕拘迫；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1285857_comment'></div>近尤畏寒，涩缩惨懔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1285857_comment'></div>咳嗽随声，涕泪交下，倦惫屡月，瘦悴羸残，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1285857", 1285857, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>视荫</span>将息，固无久存之理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1285857_comment'></div>伏乞矜怜，特赐敷奏，许令致仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1285857_comment'></div>傥或垂逝之年，犹保可全之节，冀以歌咏太平之乐，仰酬君父难报之恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1285857_comment'></div>不胜感激俟命之至！</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1285857_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1219&endYear=1219')">1219年</a>　再请致仕，亦未准许，仍居家奉宫观，领祠禄。作品：再申省状。<div id='poem_1285858' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1285858' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1285858?labeling=true' target='_blank'>再申省状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1219年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1285858")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1285858_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1285858'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1285858'>某伏准省劄，奉圣旨不允者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1285858_comment'></div>上恩隆而未许，诚不计其岁年；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1285858_comment'></div>下情迫以再干，敢自违于经律。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1285858_comment'></div>伏念某少而怯懦，长益病昏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1285858_comment'></div>方当壮盛之时，已无血气之勇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1285858_comment'></div>论建常惭于迂阔，事功奚有于毫分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1285858_comment'></div>况今老至而衰，心意<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1285858", 1285858, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>销索</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1285858_comment'></div>目视耳听，皆瞆眊之馀；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1285858_comment'></div>手拘足挛，非奔走之具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1285858_comment'></div>惟欲乞身暮景，得谢<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1285858", 1285858, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>明朝</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1285858_comment'></div>粗希知足之风，不为学者之愧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1285858_comment'></div>伏乞俯加矜恻，特赐奏闻，许令就今年致仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1285858_comment'></div>渔樵故物，复还山泽之臞；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1285858_comment'></div>耕凿<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1285858", 1285858, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>遗民</span>，永被乾坤之造。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1285858_comment'></div>不胜衔荷激切俟命之至！</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1285858_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1219&endYear=1219')">1219年5月</a>　五月，叶适七十寿辰，门人戴栩贺之以诗。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1219&endYear=1219')">1219年8月</a>　八月，曹豳任重庆府司法参军，叶适有诗送之。作品：送曹潜夫诗。<div id='poem_80008' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_80008' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/80008?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送曹潜夫</a><span class='authorDate'>（1219年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_80008")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_80008_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_80008'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_80008'>东南作阙叹年徂，远远参司到蜀都。<div id='poem_sentence_0_80008_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_80008'>元帅幕中须受辟，生羌界上也分符。<div id='poem_sentence_1_80008_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_80008'>閒吟杜甫诗千字，时载扬雄酒一壶。<div id='poem_sentence_2_80008_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_80008'>只我衰残望君切，杜鹃声里认归涂。<div id='poem_sentence_3_80008_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_80008'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_80008_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1219&endYear=1219')">1219年</a>　门人王大受寄呈诗稿，为之题作。作品：题拙斋诗稿。<div id='poem_1285949' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1285949' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1285949?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题拙斋诗稿</a><span class='authorDate'>（1219年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1285949")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1285949_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1285949'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1285949'>王君大受，字仲可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1285949_comment'></div>初，戴肖望常疑病甚，闻其父克明，豪士也，隐于医，死能复生，废能复起，强自载诣门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1285949_comment'></div>视之，曰：「无苦，久客心动耳」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1285949_comment'></div>留荐燠馆，食软腻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1285949_comment'></div>君时甚小，父子同其起居，把酒谈笑，昼夜相属，肖望欣然忘还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1285949_comment'></div>踰月，摇大舫送至都，执手珍重而别。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1285949_comment'></div>余以是奇君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1285949_comment'></div>绍熙四五年，光宗疾，不能谒重华，谏者倾朝，谤者盈市。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1285949_comment'></div>宪圣后兄子琚最贤，君因琚奏孝宗：「陛下惟一子，不审处利害，恣国人腾口取名，于家计大不便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1285949_comment'></div>且群臣以父子礼故，诤不敢止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1285949_comment'></div>陛下何不出手诏云：『皇帝体不安，朕所深知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1285949_comment'></div>卿且勿言，须秋凉，朕自择日与皇帝相见也』」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1285949_comment'></div>孝宗喜其策，会晏驾，不果用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1285949_comment'></div>庆元初，徐谊以忠被谴，徙南安军，势汹汹未已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1285949_comment'></div>君谋为薄谊罪者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1285949_comment'></div>一日，韩侂胄女归宁，忽致谊书，侂胄发函怆然，即移袁州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1285949_comment'></div>方议再移，使臣蔡琏妄言牵引谊，众为谊惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1285949_comment'></div>君调护从容，竟得移婺州，寻归故郡矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1285949_comment'></div>于是胡纮、刘德秀等多<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1285949", 1285949, "Clauses/63/Comments/1")'>架造</span>险阻，欲株陷良善，人人<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1285949", 1285949, "Clauses/65/Comments/0")'>皇恐</span>不自保。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1285949_comment'></div>君又请琚白太后，诰外庭毋更论往事，卒消党祸，力十居六七。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1285949_comment'></div>其虑存国家，以人材否泰为己忧乐，余实亲见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1285949_comment'></div>至他救过解纷，功尚多，有非余所见，故不得而言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1285949_comment'></div>士影随响接，或毁君太过，余亦不取也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1285949_comment'></div>君文峻简<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1285949", 1285949, "Clauses/80/Comments/0")'>通缛</span>，而诗特工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1285949_comment'></div>前四十年，余固已称之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1285949_comment'></div>自后岁别为什，什必愈进，格愈老，字愈嫩，语益近，趣益远，冰凝水泮，不可离合也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1285949_comment'></div>盖谋臣智士，遁藏草野，能终身不耀，养其心至矣，而文采晻郁，无名以传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1285949_comment'></div>骚人墨客，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1285949", 1285949, "Clauses/99/Comments/0")'>嘲弄</span>光景，徒借物吟号，夸其名甚矣，而局量浅狭，无道以守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1285949_comment'></div>若君忧患不干其虑，而咏歌常造其微，庶几兼之也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1285949_comment'></div>噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1285949_comment'></div>笠泽烟雨之上，西湖花月之下，君未尝不留连顾赏，余亦一二寄怀其间矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1285949_comment'></div>昭武虽佳山水，惜君<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1285949", 1285949, "Clauses/113/Comments/0")'>羁囚</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1285949", 1285949, "Clauses/113/Comments/1")'>淹踬</span>，而余既七十，谢世待死，无复会期矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1285949_comment'></div>读此稿尽，拊卷遐想，因以其平生大节缀之于末。</div><div id='poem_sentence_32_1285949_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1219&endYear=1219')">1219年</a>　为周敦颐、程颢、程颐祠堂作记。作品：南安军三先生祠堂记。<div id='poem_1286148' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286148' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286148?labeling=true' target='_blank'>南安军三先生祠堂记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1219年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286148")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286148_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286148'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286148'>南安者，昔周子、二程相与讲习其地，群圣人之道赖以复明，学者纪焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286148_comment'></div>信安刘侯行父，始即学东偏，券市考室，奠祠之如学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286148_comment'></div>初，侯既造设厅，饰以两序，加楼其上；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286148_comment'></div>又移试院位于胜方而益其旧，役费皆倍祠数十：然自以为不足录，惟日惧三君子之奉有失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286148_comment'></div>其治南安，剧贼<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1286148", 1286148, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>遁散</span>，兵不用；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286148_comment'></div>常讼稀减，刑甚省，宿负捐假，敛不急；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286148_comment'></div>民物富乐，略如承平：然自以为不能化，惟日忧三君子之教不行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286148_comment'></div>于是为其士者，思久侯之爱与祠并也，以记来请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286148_comment'></div>余观著令，汉而后诸大儒得祀孔子庙廷者，三君子过之远矣，而乃未之及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286148_comment'></div>或官职所临，县州所生，与所讲习，祠或因于学，或别于学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286148_comment'></div>夫道非系于地，而尊道者犹敬其所从始，特时事之宜，非曰礼当然也，必著令而通祀，斯称矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286148_comment'></div>然则三君子亦何以过诸大儒哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286148_comment'></div>盖道之所以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1286148", 1286148, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>晻郁</span>于后者，天与人殊而人与己殊，道非其道而学非其学也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286148_comment'></div>理不尽，徒胶昔以病今；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286148_comment'></div>心不明，姑舍己以辨物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286148_comment'></div>勤苦而种，皆文藻之末；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286148_comment'></div>卤莽而获，皆枝叶之馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286148_comment'></div>扬雄、韩愈犹然，况其下乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286148_comment'></div>自周子、二程以来，天之命我者，属乎不离也，我之事天者，吻乎有合也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286148_comment'></div>舜、文王之道即己之道；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286148_comment'></div>颜渊、孟轲之学即己之学也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286148_comment'></div>辞华不黜而自落，功利不抑而自退，其本立矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286148_comment'></div>两迷者歧也，四达者路也，邪不乱正；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286148_comment'></div>烛火暗室也，旭日方旦也，幽不掩明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286148_comment'></div>大经大法，未尝不炳然具见，而何塞路之有！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286148_comment'></div>此其所以过之远也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286148_comment'></div>觉于是而进，余所进也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286148_comment'></div>安于是而止，余亦止之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286148_comment'></div>嘉定十二年七月。</div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1286148_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1219&endYear=1219')">1219年</a>　为罗适、陈公辅、陈良翰祠堂作记。作品：台州州学三先生祠堂记。<div id='poem_1286149' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286149' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286149?labeling=true' target='_blank'>台州州学三老先生祠堂记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1219年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286149")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286149_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286149'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286149'>学者，聚道之地而仕所由出也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286149_comment'></div>或<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1286149", 1286149, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>畔道</span>从利，苟荣其身，欲复之于学，弗可受矣，况可祠乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286149_comment'></div>台州之学，得祠者三人：罗提刑适，陈侍郎公辅，陈詹事良翰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286149_comment'></div>提刑用不究，故事不显。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286149_comment'></div>余闻邹浩言，熙丰外贵人视民甚蒿莱，芟燎恨不力也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286149_comment'></div>是时能慷慨建白，保赤子以对天命，惟江都令罗适，弋阳令董敦逸二人，而邹公独谓罗公见而得之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286149_comment'></div>然则推于所不见，其不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1286149", 1286149, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>畔道</span>审矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286149_comment'></div>方靖康忧恐惩艾，已泮岂不尚合！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286149_comment'></div>侍郎发明四肢心腹之论，无过此矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286149_comment'></div>竟失指远去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286149_comment'></div>然后徬徨宗周，卒成分裂之祸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286149_comment'></div>及隆兴英睿<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1286149", 1286149, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>愤激</span>，大势宜若遽振，詹事力守绝和不弃地之策，最专一也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286149_comment'></div>使坚忍待之，虏自当荡析，岂遗种至今哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286149_comment'></div>虽绍兴复用，而已与大臣异议，终不留；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286149_comment'></div>虽乾道再入，而既为近习擅事，迄自退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286149_comment'></div>二公任谏诤，位从官，立朝本末，天下诵之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286149_comment'></div>岂惟不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1286149", 1286149, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>畔道</span>而固行道，道虽难行而亦不苟荣其身而止也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286149_comment'></div>士在天地间，无他职业，一徇于道，一由于学而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286149_comment'></div>道有伸有屈，生死之也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286149_comment'></div>学无仕无已，始终之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286149_comment'></div>集义而行，道之序也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286149_comment'></div>致命而止，学之成也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286149_comment'></div>后世地或千里无学，其君子以意行道，晚进阔远，不知所从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286149_comment'></div>庆历后，名一功，著一善，往往复之于学矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286149_comment'></div>今其秀人美士，群萃而校处，朝夕瞻顾，拂拭像服，如三老之存；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286149_comment'></div>春秋盥荐，饔醴芳苾，如三老之饔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286149_comment'></div>而又仰其大节，俯其细行，无不皆可师也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286149_comment'></div>为聚道之助，不既多乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286149_comment'></div>或疑侍郎不右程公，学术若少异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286149_comment'></div>然按程公亲为孔文仲排劾，而与孔公并党籍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286149_comment'></div>史记晏婴非孔子，而孔子称「善与人交」，两贤哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286149_comment'></div>嘉定十二年八月。</div><div id='poem_sentence_31_1286149_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1219&endYear=1219')">1219年</a>　为金华八咏楼作记。作品：宝婺观记。<div id='poem_1286150' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286150' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286150?labeling=true' target='_blank'>宝婺观记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1219年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286150")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286150_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286150'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286150'>观即八咏楼也，道士陈守正职补治，历十年乃具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286150_comment'></div>夫山峙以近则迫而易穷，川浩以远则荡而难限，皆游观之病也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286150_comment'></div>金华虽高千仞，旁走三县，靡迤回环，不自意深入也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286150_comment'></div>其馀漫陇伏冈，林茂野蕃，若轾若轩，若万马纵牧于平原，锦出绣没，不可控抟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286150_comment'></div>两溪广长，会清合凉，匪厉伊方，徐纳于江。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286150_comment'></div>南山绵绵，果蔬之区，柘桑之园，日月风雨，借其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1286150", 1286150, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>姿态</span>，雾烟氛霭，相为吐吞，而光气灵响之答于耳目异矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286150_comment'></div>四顾百里，不荡不迫，有临望之美，无游观之病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286150_comment'></div>浙以东，兹楼称最焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286150_comment'></div>昔沈约始建，而地以文显。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286150_comment'></div>意士之游者必有得于斯，而余不能知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286150_comment'></div>近世大儒吕公出，而人以理著，四方英俊，岁常数百千人，无不登兹楼，其得之孰浅深高下，则余虽或知而亦不能尽也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286150_comment'></div>山水，至善之所存也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286150_comment'></div>游于是者，密悟为善之机，反冲藏约而内守，通变达化而外应，宽施忘其褊吝，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1286150", 1286150, "Clauses/52/Comments/0")'>朗豁</span>消其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1286150", 1286150, "Clauses/52/Comments/1")'>闇鄙</span>，德成性安，而动乐静寿之功验矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286150_comment'></div>其或不然，豪怒使酒，激而为狂；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286150_comment'></div>感物悲愤，郁而离忧；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286150_comment'></div>巧讽咏益其轻肆，谬题品示其诞拙；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286150_comment'></div>是游观虽不以病夫人，而人反以病夫游观也，可无畏哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286150_comment'></div>嗟夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286150_comment'></div>吕公没久，同时并游俱逝，余亦老不复至矣，故因守正系其语，使后之游者有考也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286150_comment'></div>观初立于唐，史曰须女之舍也，遂以名州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286150_comment'></div>太守洪迈请锡嘉字，故曰宝婺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286150_comment'></div>天象邈矣，星辰之躔次，难言哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286150_comment'></div>然而禬禳每效，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1286150", 1286150, "Clauses/80/Comments/0")'>福嘏</span>频集，邦人<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1286150", 1286150, "Clauses/81/Comments/0")'>奉承</span>，无敢不肃，岂非地胜故耶！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286150_comment'></div>守正与其徒，尤不当以人而病夫游观也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1286150_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1219&endYear=1219')">1219年</a>　为林鼒撰墓志铭。作品：草庐先生墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286251' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286251' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286251?labeling=true' target='_blank'>草庐先生墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1219年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286251")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286251_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286251'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286251'>草庐先生，姓林氏，名鼒，字叔和，黄岩县人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286251_comment'></div>事父母兄无违志，朋友不倍其言，妻子<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1286251", 1286251, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>裕如</span>也，邻里<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1286251", 1286251, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>欢如</span>也，其行既修矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286251_comment'></div>少而广问博请，长而探幽索微，老而愈勤，穷而益信，其学既明矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286251_comment'></div>面于方山，木或春彫，草或冬蕃，井不先汲，炊不蚤熟，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1286251", 1286251, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>蹒行</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1286251", 1286251, "Clauses/20/Comments/1")'>株坐</span>自若也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286251_comment'></div>邑后生聚而谋曰：「得无从草庐游乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286251_comment'></div>先生得无思见我乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286251_comment'></div>邑大夫作而顾曰：「某狱疑，先生决之乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286251_comment'></div>某政谬，草庐知之乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286251_comment'></div>年七十一，一日，笔数牍，缄题竟，就床若将寐者，视之已卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286251_comment'></div>其为士者无不吊而哀，如不欲生也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286251_comment'></div>卒之日，十月丙戌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286251_comment'></div>明年嘉定十年正月丁酉，葬于樟槿山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286251_comment'></div>其为士者无不送而号，如不欲归也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286251_comment'></div>或肖其像，恍乎草庐之容也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286251_comment'></div>或玩其书，泠乎先生之音也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286251_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286251_comment'></div>世谓文华之俗薄，虽躬行朴厚不能化，曷不视此乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286251_comment'></div>自孟子为论世尚友之说，始轻视一乡之善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286251_comment'></div>盖天下所同善者犹未足也，况一乡哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286251_comment'></div>按《周官》，乡即国也，黄岩，古伯男国也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286251_comment'></div>二乡公也，公旦、君奭预焉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286251_comment'></div>一乡卿也，闳、散、南宫适参焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286251_comment'></div>王国之善，即天下之善也，岂孟子未见《周礼》，而以战国近事言之乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286251_comment'></div>然则一乡之所谓君子者，固无往而不为君子矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286251_comment'></div>夫疑天下之善不足于一乡，而又以一乡之善不足于天下者，惑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286251_comment'></div>先生之子季复、幼常除丧来告，余既窃有感于孟子，遂以记其墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286251_comment'></div>两夫人皆陈氏，女嫁胡惠连。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286251_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_1286251'>噫昔追随五十年，近离远合交倾宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286251_comment'></div>一札不至奄重泉，矢词如忘徒泫然。</div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1286251_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1219&endYear=1219')">1219年</a>　为夏庭简撰墓志铭。作品：宣教郎夏君墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286284' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286284' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286284?labeling=true' target='_blank'>宣教郎夏君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1219年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286284")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286284_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286284'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286284'>夏庭简，字迪卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286284_comment'></div>曾祖咸，祖克修，父思恭，世家台州黄岩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286284_comment'></div>庆元五年，登进士第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286284_comment'></div>黄岩，浙河东大邑，赋当其州太半，鱼稻之饶被邻境，喜让善施，温克多异材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286284_comment'></div>然自隋、唐设进士诸科，而其地寂寥湮没，无以名称者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286284_comment'></div>宋兴且百年始一见，又百年始再见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286284_comment'></div>又或始二人，或越数举，积而至于君，然后始赢十人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286284_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286284_comment'></div>何其少而难也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286284_comment'></div>昔王元之、苏子由皆病进士取人猥多，得者滥易，无益治道，余初以为笃论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286284_comment'></div>然以黄岩观之，广地且百里，众民过万室，累数百馀岁矣，苟有以取之，其得宜不止此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286284_comment'></div>然则果欲为治，岂轻绝其人使不得仕耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286284_comment'></div>古人各治其国，士必先自足于私朝而后及上，势不得多且易也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286284_comment'></div>今尽取于上，复分以涖其下，虽多犹少，虽易犹难尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286284_comment'></div>且隋、唐贵进士，号异科，尤异者山人制策，势亦不得多且易也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286284_comment'></div>今无以差等，壹命为进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286284_comment'></div>审如二公意，必于取士之法大有所改。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286284_comment'></div>故余因黄岩进士之少，夏君获预十人之难，疑其论犹未笃也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286284_comment'></div>君初补定海尉，连遭二丧，授长溪簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286284_comment'></div>益读书，明习今古，亲仁敬士，林叔和、赵几道皆爱之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286284_comment'></div>往来长溪，必过余，退然下席，随所遇若素稔，语不妄发，问则博辨，余亦爱之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286284_comment'></div>既而闻其在闽，思不出位，而以事至者常立决，是非少所徇，诸司及<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1286284", 1286284, "Clauses/73/Comments/0")'>士民</span>亦爱之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286284_comment'></div>调临安府都盐仓未久，嘉定十一年某月某日，无疾卒，年四十六。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286284_comment'></div>八月丙申，葬灵云南麓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286284_comment'></div>娶柯氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286284_comment'></div>子二人，曰绍堂、绍基。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286284_comment'></div>三女子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286284_comment'></div>余固悲君成于艰地，而列于稀称，若将有以遇之也，不幸死，则终无传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286284_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_1286284'>文无害，行有耻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286284_comment'></div>载六百，赢十士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286284_comment'></div>慨不逢，表幽里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286284_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_31_1286284'>嘉定十二年六月□日。</div><div id='poem_sentence_31_1286284_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1219&endYear=1219')">1219年</a>　为蔡幼学撰墓志铭。作品：兵部尚书蔡公墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286285' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286285' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286285?labeling=true' target='_blank'>兵部尚书蔡公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1219年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286285")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286285_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286285'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286285'>公温州瑞安新城里蔡氏，名幼学，字行之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286285_comment'></div>曾祖昌，祖廷直，父赠通议大夫端卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286285_comment'></div>中乾道八年进士第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286285_comment'></div>初，同县陈君举，声价喧踊，老旧莫敢<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1286285", 1286285, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>齿列</span>，公稚甚，独相与雁行立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286285_comment'></div>比三年，芮国瑞、吕伯恭连选拔，辄出君举右，皆谓文过其师矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286285_comment'></div>孝宗亲策，将为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1286285", 1286285, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>上首</span>，公乃言：「陛下始即位，冀太平旦暮至也，奈何今十年愈益坏乎」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286285_comment'></div>语谆切如家人父子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286285_comment'></div>又宰相虞允文、梁克家养虚誉茍容，而张说姨子预兵柄，有许、史、丁、傅之渐，孝宗初不过也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286285_comment'></div>或疑「天子圣德方日新，公少年论谏，盍顺导婉达」，由是不得<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1286285", 1286285, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>高第</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286285_comment'></div>教授广德军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286285_comment'></div>通议卒，待潭州教授阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286285_comment'></div>执政言「蔡幼学未登朝可惜」，孝宗遽肯首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286285_comment'></div>问：「年几何矣，何以名幼学」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286285_comment'></div>施参政奏：「孟子云：『幼而学之，壮而欲行之』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286285_comment'></div>故幼学其名，行之其字」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286285_comment'></div>上伫思慨然曰：「今壮矣，可行也已」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286285_comment'></div>差敕令所删定官，对语如策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286285_comment'></div>孝宗喜曰：「解卿意，欲令朕立规摹尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286285_comment'></div>甚善」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286285_comment'></div>然后知上不以言咎臣下，而公亦未尝变所言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286285_comment'></div>硕人黄氏卒，除太学录未行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286285_comment'></div>或请武学参用儒臣，为其博士，久乃为太学博士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286285_comment'></div>召试秘书省正字，兼实录院检讨官，迁校书郎，著作佐郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286285_comment'></div>朝廷念辈流多要地，犹滞馆下，议进擢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286285_comment'></div>公叹伪学祸已成，朋类将散，求外补。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286285_comment'></div>特提举福建常平茶事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286285_comment'></div>御史刘德秀果言公尝迕孝宗，罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286285_comment'></div>再主冲佑观，凡八年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286285_comment'></div>知黄州，福建提刑，未上，召为吏部郎官，国子司业，兼权中书舍人，宗正少卿，迁中书舍人，兼侍讲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286285_comment'></div>韩侂胄死，馀党尚<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1286285", 1286285, "Clauses/87/Comments/0")'>梗塞</span>正路，公一扫绝，窜免尤众，号称职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286285_comment'></div>除刑部、吏部侍郎，兼直学士院。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286285_comment'></div>赵师𢍰以冬官知临安府，公当不允，奏：「师𢍰之人与其行事，众耳目素具也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286285_comment'></div>于是四典京邑，非臣所知，不允，必有褒诏，臣无辞以草」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286285_comment'></div>遂止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286285_comment'></div>改兼侍读，师𢍰命复下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286285_comment'></div>除龙图阁待制，知泉州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286285_comment'></div>寻提举兴国宫，知建宁府、福州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286285_comment'></div>宽而不犯，肃而不残，治居天下最。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286285_comment'></div>提刑喜声威，不以狱市还州县，客谓公：「名盛体峻，何得许」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286285_comment'></div>公笑曰：「此小节耳，不足校也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286285_comment'></div>命吏报应，无失期会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1286285_comment'></div>民恃公少安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1286285_comment'></div>提举使民以田高下藏新会子，按不如令者没入其赀，公骇曰：「此大害也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1286285_comment'></div>昔吾在朝，论从民便尔」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1286285_comment'></div>不许，第多其兑易而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1286285_comment'></div>民赖公获免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1286285_comment'></div>然提举善士也，后知其误，卒皆已之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1286285_comment'></div>除宝谟阁直学士，提举万寿宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1286285_comment'></div>嘉定十年，召权兵部尚书，修《玉牒》，兼太子詹事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1286285_comment'></div>其六月有疾，梦神告曰：「可归矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1286285_comment'></div>陨星屋西南，七月二日薨，年六十四。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1286285_comment'></div>先硕人林氏，今硕人郑氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1286285_comment'></div>子曰籥，承奉郎、仙居丞；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1286285_comment'></div>为二弟后者节、策；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1286285_comment'></div>节迪功郎、浮梁簿，策补致仕官；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1286285_comment'></div>曰范，从政郎、监镇淮酒库。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1286285_comment'></div>孙曰绍老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1286285_comment'></div>孙女四人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1286285_comment'></div>十一年四月十八日，葬于永嘉吹台乡洋奥山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1286285_comment'></div>公内负实力，而忧世至深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1286285_comment'></div>愤耻复雠，无悠悠碌碌之论；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1286285_comment'></div>节减与民，无奇奇怪怪之策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1286285_comment'></div>所知必立，所立必遂，不前锐而后挫，不外强而中弱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1286285_comment'></div>虽于孝宗君臣之交未合，自谓爱君惜日当如是矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1286285_comment'></div>昔子产增赋，浑罕致讥；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1286285_comment'></div>冉有倍粟，仲尼<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_65_1286285", 1286285, "Clauses/176/Comments/0")'>鸣鼓</span>；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1286285_comment'></div>盖据末反本之难也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1286285_comment'></div>非公师友深虑而知化，孰能考次熙宁而后，节敛目取，民困兵骄，所以致患之由，而告于上哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1286285_comment'></div>若夫不别夷夏，不分<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_68_1286285", 1286285, "Clauses/185/Comments/0")'>正闰</span>，恬其仇我，俛焉并立，甚至以为戎狄之德，黎民怀之，若天眷命而然，则尤公师友之所讳也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1286285_comment'></div>初，我币已入，值虏有难，不暇受。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1286285_comment'></div>稍定，则以兵扣边索，中外<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_70_1286285", 1286285, "Clauses/198/Comments/0")'>恫惧</span>，无不言当亟与。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1286285_comment'></div>公为尚书，即日请对，明其不然，始诏与虏绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1286285_comment'></div>因请「固本根以弭外虞，示意向以晓众志，公汲引而材谋奋，审怀附而南北亲」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1286285_comment'></div>条序简捷，士皆惊诵，谓何勇之决也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1286285_comment'></div>上方倚以经度西北，而公病矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1286285_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1286285_comment'></div>岂亦所谓鞠躬尽力，死而后已乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1286285_comment'></div>虽幼以文显，无浮巧轻艳之作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1286285_comment'></div>既长，益务关教化，养性情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1286285_comment'></div>花卉之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_79_1286285", 1286285, "Clauses/221/Comments/0")'>炫丽</span>，风露之凄爽，不道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1286285_comment'></div>词命最温厚，亦不自矜贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1286285_comment'></div>惟于国史研贯专一，朱墨义类，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_81_1286285", 1286285, "Clauses/228/Comments/0")'>刊润</span>齐整，各就书法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1286285_comment'></div>为续司马《公卿百官表》、《年历》、《大事记》、《备志》、《辨疑》、《编年政要》、《列传举要》等百馀篇，今代之完书也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1286285_comment'></div>资凝重，危坐竟日，或不通一词。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1286285_comment'></div>龙窟陈同甫言：「吾常与陈君举极论，往往击杯案，声撼林木，行之在旁，邈若无闻，吾颇讷之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1286285_comment'></div>众亦云素无短长于间也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1286285_comment'></div>一日，客尽散，忽语吾：『道一尔，奚皇帝<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_86_1286285", 1286285, "Clauses/247/Comments/1")'>王霸</span>之云』！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1286285_comment'></div>吾方辨数，而行之横启纵阖，援今證古，釐为十百，聚为一二，抵夜接日，若悬江河，吾谢不能乃已，则复寡言默默如故，故虽并舍连榻不知也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1286285_comment'></div>然则昔人谓「得人于眉睫，定士于俄顷」，亦岂尽然欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1286285_comment'></div>盖公之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_89_1286285", 1286285, "Clauses/261/Comments/0")'>深中隐厚</span>，可验于是矣，故并记之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1286285_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_90_1286285'>智过于师，道始可传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1286285_comment'></div>有佞无仁，奚其御焉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1286285_comment'></div>蔡公直方，不习而利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1286285_comment'></div>寂含五音，璞具六器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1286285_comment'></div>夜半东升，曀于方中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1286285_comment'></div>执德不回，终以显融。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1286285_comment'></div>君能责难，民病能宽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1286285_comment'></div>夷狄邪气，莫能我干。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1286285_comment'></div>木居甚安，瓢饮何有！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1286285_comment'></div>世故云化，三者墨守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1286285_comment'></div>昔余从公，一字之谦；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1286285_comment'></div>诸子示我，书何满奁！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1286285_comment'></div>大典既备，法严义粹；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1286285_comment'></div>玉琰其版，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_103_1286285", 1286285, "Clauses/292/Comments/0")'>金縢</span>其匮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1286285_comment'></div>虽贵有已，虽年有止；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1286285_comment'></div>维书无穷，以贰迁《史》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1286285_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_106_1286285'>嘉定十二年六月□日。</div><div id='poem_sentence_106_1286285_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1219&endYear=1219')">1219年</a>　为赵彦谈撰墓志铭。作品：福建运使直显谟阁少卿赵公墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286286' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286286' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286286?labeling=true' target='_blank'>福建运使直显谟阁少卿赵公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1219年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286286")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286286_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286286'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286286'>公名彦倓，字安卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286286_comment'></div>由宣祖四世彭城侯叔褧为曾祖，直秘阁、知池州尚之为祖，知饶州公广为父。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286286_comment'></div>调溧阳尉，县民潘，兄弟横猾，积为公私患，号三虎，邑官莫敢睨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286286_comment'></div>公具以白留守陈丞相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286286_comment'></div>陈公默不答者累月，一日，忽委公曰：「信矣」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286286_comment'></div>潘悍仆数百，挺刃自卫，公<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1286286", 1286286, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>开示</span>祸福，皆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1286286", 1286286, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>缩却</span>听命，遂缚三虎，正其罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286286_comment'></div>移扬州司户，有告主藏吏盗钱千万以上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286286_comment'></div>适兼狱掾，鞠之，吏涕泪满颐请死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286286_comment'></div>公察其情，屏人问故，则诸吏所共贷也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286286_comment'></div>使视笔帖，尽首服，一日而足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286286_comment'></div>帅大喜，然犹欲逮诸吏，公恳言：「某固与约，后将无以信」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286286_comment'></div>帅为抑止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286286_comment'></div>差平江军节推，摄令宜兴县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286286_comment'></div>以牧马券料为负，自南狩则然，常预用二年后税，民以此德其令，傲不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1286286", 1286286, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>轨法</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286286_comment'></div>公请诸司合奏，释旧逋，禁预借，百年弊事绝矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286286_comment'></div>知于潜县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286286_comment'></div>大胥结台省吏，弄权自恣，公列其奸，械送府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286286_comment'></div>而台吏果欲末减，即力争，乞先罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286286_comment'></div>御史惮之，狱得不变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286286_comment'></div>浮桥迫市区，水数败，人溺死，公叠石跨巨梁坚成，至今民爱之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286286_comment'></div>留其像桥旁，公不听，曰：「苏公昔所游也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286286_comment'></div>因撤以祠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286286_comment'></div>通判临安府、台州，知兴国军，岁旱蝗而开禧兵难作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286286_comment'></div>公缓经赋，弛山泽，通细微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286286_comment'></div>村樵贱鬻苦不酬，益增钱入之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286286_comment'></div>贵则损其直以利城郭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286286_comment'></div>永兴令吴格失上供尤多，公坐贬秩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286286_comment'></div>格愧谢，公曰：「有事时宽民租，根本计也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286286_comment'></div>一官何吝」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286286_comment'></div>且叹曰：「真贤令矣」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286286_comment'></div>又荐之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286286_comment'></div>虏分道进，江以南动骇不自保。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286286_comment'></div>溃卒千人，谋据城外千秋观为乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286286_comment'></div>公募能相捕斩者，未几，以其首至，馀党惊散，人心大安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286286_comment'></div>兴国虽小郡，而介江、鄂中流，备守夙设，器用<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1286286", 1286286, "Clauses/101/Comments/0")'>犀锐</span>，东西依为重蔽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286286_comment'></div>故江淮、荆湖两司，皆论公当迁，以劝<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1286286", 1286286, "Clauses/105/Comments/0")'>艰难</span>勤力之臣，由是既转官，复减磨勘，遂入将作监为丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286286_comment'></div>出知袁州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286286_comment'></div>湖南运判罗孟传反累载，毒甚郴、桂阳，公曰：「猺昔自<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_1286286", 1286286, "Clauses/113/Comments/1")'>相雠</span>而斗，我主断不平，激使叛逆，已前误矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286286_comment'></div>今株营兀戍，弥漫山谷，战无决胜，退虞尾袭，误不可再，国之忧也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286286_comment'></div>若密间巧说，阴诱显击，彼肘腋疑顾，腹心猜防，则还自<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1286286", 1286286, "Clauses/127/Comments/0")'>相雠</span>，而灭亦其势矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286286_comment'></div>帅漕议协，卒降孟传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1286286_comment'></div>进直秘阁，考功郎，浙东提刑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1286286_comment'></div>初，朝廷患开禧会子轻，仅卖半价，悉<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_42_1286286", 1286286, "Clauses/137/Comments/0")'>改造</span>及元陌止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1286286_comment'></div>公扶法以便民，虽有重比，不敢试也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1286286_comment'></div>已乃升宝谟阁，知绍兴府，然后尽所以流通之术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1286286_comment'></div>苗之移于司农者，为之代输而折会于民；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1286286_comment'></div>会之滞于州库者，为之转籴而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_46_1286286", 1286286, "Clauses/147/Comments/0")'>资钱</span>于市；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1286286_comment'></div>钱会常<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_47_1286286", 1286286, "Clauses/148/Comments/0")'>相权</span>，民无贵食，肆无虚券。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1286286_comment'></div>越事力弱，而守以贵人，相趋于简陋，久则不赀省，谓当然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1286286_comment'></div>鹿鸣礼坏，不知何时，公始行之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1286286_comment'></div>储其永费，曰兴贤庄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1286286_comment'></div>筑捍海石塘，亦为庄以虞漏穴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1286286_comment'></div>庙学士馆，城池垒壁，素<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_52_1286286", 1286286, "Clauses/165/Comments/0")'>毁败</span>者，加葺饰丽好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1286286_comment'></div>比将去，不雨数月，野草黄赤，免下三等户税，上二等半免，湖藉田米不输，举缗钱四十万为荒政助。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1286286_comment'></div>饥羸相扇，群聚陂湖中，令尉言且乱，公取死囚，幂其首，刖两足，号于众曰：「此劫菱藕者也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1286286_comment'></div>其仁智不忍而能靖民如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1286286_comment'></div>公虽以徽猷阁再任，而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_56_1286286", 1286286, "Clauses/184/Comments/0")'>旋即</span>用为太府少卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1286286_comment'></div>然不乐居中，暂入即求退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1286286_comment'></div>以显谟阁知太平州，改漕江西。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1286286_comment'></div>总领使纲运隶其所者，皆直达勿团并。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1286286_comment'></div>公曰：「若此，则转运可罢矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1286286_comment'></div>引古今事以辨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1286286_comment'></div>朝廷是公言，如其故，然意益不乐，复求退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1286286_comment'></div>移漕福建。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1286286_comment'></div>公三奉使，皆称提会子，所行皆如浙东，州县不烦，民不病也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1286286_comment'></div>嘉定十一年十月九日，疾卒于建安，年六十四。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1286286_comment'></div>夫人樊氏、江氏，仲氏，皆先卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1286286_comment'></div>十二年某月日，子成忠郎、监徽州酒税垞夫，迪功郎、严州司理宏夫，迪功郎、温州司户崇夫，与为伯晟后者从事郎、真州录事参军师雩，葬公于武康县上柏山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1286286_comment'></div>婿曰宣教郎、知扬子县曾黯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1286286_comment'></div>尼曰悟空大师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1286286_comment'></div>孙时泰，将仕郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1286286_comment'></div>孙女三人，幼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1286286_comment'></div>始，饶州殁而被谴，公泣愬十年，不避风雨，上为感动，复所削。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1286286_comment'></div>奉母孝，抚庶弟友爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1286286_comment'></div>亲善人，喜闻过，顿悟立改。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1286286_comment'></div>以材取知，无所随附。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1286286_comment'></div>其治果敢疏达，而归于平恕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1286286_comment'></div>自小官，所至著声绩，而会稽之政，特见独出，近世未有也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1286286_comment'></div>然余尝怪越中陆海衍沃，山水明秀，冠于东南，家不营而给，人不令而服，晋、唐牧守，啸歌饮酒，永夕而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1286286_comment'></div>若夫趣办救过而以不足日为叹，复赋倍输而以不赖生为戚，则未之闻也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1286286_comment'></div>然则何欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1286286_comment'></div>天反时欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1286286_comment'></div>地反物欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1286286_comment'></div>其难易得失，昔异而今不同，必有故矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1286286_comment'></div>故公焦心疲力，自末反本，而民誉之，以手扣额而未已也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1286286_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_85_1286286'>时所谓材，如刃作棱；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1286286_comment'></div>习砥于人，以割为能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1286286_comment'></div>赵侯恳恳，如母哺儿；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1286286_comment'></div>岂无威严？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1286286_comment'></div>用之孔时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1286286_comment'></div>发名开禧，收实嘉定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1286286_comment'></div>恩涵泽濡，在越尤盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1286286_comment'></div>累阁而进，犹梯级间；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1286286_comment'></div>一以卿招，遂陨不还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1286286_comment'></div>慨其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_94_1286286", 1286286, "Clauses/281/Comments/0")'>生存</span>，孰与<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_94_1286286", 1286286, "Clauses/282/Comments/0")'>死灭</span>！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1286286_comment'></div>岸谷有迁，兹铭是揭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1286286_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_96_1286286'>嘉定十二年八月□日。</div><div id='poem_sentence_96_1286286_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1219&endYear=1219')">1219年</a>　为滕宬撰墓志铭。作品：滕季度墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286297' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286297' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286297?labeling=true' target='_blank'>滕季度墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1219年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286297")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286297_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286297'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286297'>滕宬字季度，来南，籍苏州吴县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286297_comment'></div>曾祖友，知鄂州；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286297_comment'></div>祖康，权知三省枢密院；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286297_comment'></div>父珙，知道州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286297_comment'></div>君初见余，谒入，字却写线上，众皆笑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286297_comment'></div>余异其沈敏，学未久，坤阖乾辟，无不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1286297", 1286297, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>洞达</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286297_comment'></div>虽不喜时文，习制举，一年而成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286297_comment'></div>太守荐直言极谏，孝宗问知世家，甚悦，宰相亦言识君父兄，「住子城后某桥，庭有某树」，皆是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286297_comment'></div>主相论合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286297_comment'></div>既召试，命文<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1286297", 1286297, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>漂疾</span>，午漏不移晷已就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286297_comment'></div>考官疑轻己，大怒，遂以「四通非近法」罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286297_comment'></div>盐司再荐，即日复召，会内禅不果，然后荐者累累不已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286297_comment'></div>韩侂胄方擅事，尤忌君，故为软语逗岁月，君寤，笑曰：「吾得守一技足矣，焉用溟涬风波间」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286297_comment'></div>余为奏授廉靖处士，侂胄犹靳侮不诚与，自是荐者遂绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286297_comment'></div>哀哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286297_comment'></div>自三代取士法坏，独贤良最近古，所得瑰奇卓伟之士不可计，未有以为无用而忽之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286297_comment'></div>至王安石始废，章惇又废，侂胄又废，而君偶当之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286297_comment'></div>夫人主以恻怛思治之心，特下书聘召，岂为应科者地哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286297_comment'></div>奈何后国虑而先其人！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286297_comment'></div>于是有难答之问，易穷之学，然犹止于四通，谓之及格，而君顾以受摈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286297_comment'></div>又所谓不通者，非不能通也，特不当通尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286297_comment'></div>是科久断不续，有司茫然不涉门户，于是以其不当问责于不当通，群诮聚毁，如诘影幻，而君以惯暇逢仓猝，整习遇草野，厌冠而返，可谓<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1286297", 1286297, "Clauses/77/Comments/0")'>无妄</span>之辱矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286297_comment'></div>是皆不足云也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286297_comment'></div>天子好士，与梦岩、卜渭等，固宜获异材，众略辐凑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286297_comment'></div>君独智<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1286297", 1286297, "Clauses/83/Comments/0")'>颖脱</span>，固宜在左右，备顾问，不幸氛雾闭隔，失国之良宝，此余所以深惜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286297_comment'></div>嘉定十一年九月某日，年六十五卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286297_comment'></div>某年月日，葬吴、长洲两县华山赤石原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286297_comment'></div>娶董氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286297_comment'></div>子曰曑，国子进士，亦应贤良方正；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286297_comment'></div>曰杲，早夭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286297_comment'></div>女曰𣉮，嫁广济知县卢櫄；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286297_comment'></div>曰昪，嫁监临安府都作院夏似孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286297_comment'></div>孙男伯祥，孙女懿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286297_comment'></div>君晚居齐门穷僻处，官于吴者知其贤，多就见之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286297_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1286297", 1286297, "Clauses/108/Comments/0")'>清语</span>终日，不及私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286297_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_35_1286297'>事抑道扬，身隐名彰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286297_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1286297", 1286297, "Clauses/113/Comments/0")'>磅礴</span>氤氲，复归其真。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286297_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_37_1286297'>嘉定十二年十二月。</div><div id='poem_sentence_37_1286297_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1219&endYear=1219')">1219年</a>　为徐德操《春秋解》作序。作品：徐德操春秋解序。<div id='poem_1285911' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1285911' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1285911?labeling=true' target='_blank'>徐德操春秋解序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1219年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1285911")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1285911_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1285911'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1285911'>昔余为潮州铭，言其学博而要，文约而费。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1285911_comment'></div>诸子又自列铭旁曰：「《春秋解》十二卷、《书社问答》二卷、《礼经疑难》一卷、《诗文》、《崇孝同参录》，并藏于家」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1285911_comment'></div>余颇疑之而未克见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1285911_comment'></div>后二十六年，始见所谓《春秋解》者，良悔前铭称美<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1285911", 1285911, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>未极</span>，且怪诸子不早示余也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1285911_comment'></div>盖笺传之学，惟《春秋》为难工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1285911_comment'></div>经，理也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1285911_comment'></div>史，事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1285911_comment'></div>《春秋》名经而实史也，专于经则理虚而无證，专于史则事碍而不通，所以难也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1285911_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1285911", 1285911, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>年时</span>闰朔，禘郊庙制，理之纲条不专于史也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1285911_comment'></div>济西河曲、丘甲田赋，事之枝叶不专于经也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1285911_comment'></div>薛伯卒，经无预，然杞、滕、邾、莒之兴废固明也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1285911_comment'></div>诡诸卒，史无预，然戊寅、甲子之先后固察也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1285911_comment'></div>观潮州此类，皆卓而信，明而笃矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1285911_comment'></div>至于授霸者之权，彼与此夺；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1285911_comment'></div>录夷狄之变，先略后详；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1285911_comment'></div>诸侯群诛，大夫众贬，凡《春秋》始终统纪所系，自公、谷以来，画为义例，名分字别，族贵人微，其能本末相顾，隐显<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1285911", 1285911, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>协中</span>，如潮州殆鲜焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1285911_comment'></div>然则理之熟，故经而非虚；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1285911_comment'></div>事之类，故史而非碍欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1285911_comment'></div>古人以教其国，而使人知其深于是书者欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1285911_comment'></div>虽然《诗》、《书》、《礼》所以纪尧、舜、三代之盛，而《春秋》衰世之竭泽也，示不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1285911", 1285911, "Clauses/57/Comments/0")'>泯绝</span>而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1285911_comment'></div>或者遂谓一字一义皆圣人之用，则余未敢从也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1285911_comment'></div>孔子曰：「桓公九合诸侯，不以兵车，管仲之力也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1285911_comment'></div>又曰：「管仲之器，小哉」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1285911_comment'></div>夫有齐桓，无晋文，夷吾为小，是《春秋》不命霸也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1285911_comment'></div>又曰：「齐景公有马千驷，死之日，民无得而称焉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1285911_comment'></div>伯夷、叔齐饿于首阳之下，民到于今称之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1285911_comment'></div>盖其节目<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1285911", 1285911, "Clauses/77/Comments/0")'>疏远</span>如此，则苛文密例而辨人之荣辱于毫釐者非欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1285911_comment'></div>余恨不及潮州而正也，因私附于后。</div><div id='poem_sentence_27_1285911_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1220&endYear=1220')">1220年</a>　仍奉祠家居，讲学著述，《习学记言序目》大致成书。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1220&endYear=1220')">1220年1月8日</a>　一月八日，友人黄章卒，叶适有祭文。作品：祭黄观复文。<span class='inlineComment2'>（题目见《水心集》卷二十八。）</span><div id='poem_1286359' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286359' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286359?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭黄观复文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1220年1月8日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286359")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286359_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286359'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286359'>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286359_comment'></div>昔同吴官，拂榻延箸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286359_comment'></div>子时少年，未测我语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286359_comment'></div>子尊亦疑，匿使南去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286359_comment'></div>既历三纪，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1286359", 1286359, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>苍凉</span>成翁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286359_comment'></div>百闻满臆，千虑填胸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286359_comment'></div>乃能与我，深斗浅攻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286359_comment'></div>学之难知，非适今日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286359_comment'></div>自有经籍，朋吁众咈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286359_comment'></div>及余未死，要徵以一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286359_comment'></div>卓彼鉴者，烂如晨星。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286359_comment'></div>有郁彼蒙，涣兮春冰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286359_comment'></div>悲子一昏，不复再明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286359_comment'></div>八年岂多，丧我四友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286359_comment'></div>子宗三失，海缩岳朽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286359_comment'></div>凛凛兹酹，地将不受。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1286359_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1220&endYear=1220')">1220年2月</a>　二月，为赵彦橚撰墓志铭。作品：故宝谟阁待制平江府赵公墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（写作时间见《水心集》卷二十三。）</span><div id='poem_1286287' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286287' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286287?labeling=true' target='_blank'>故宝谟阁待制知平江府赵公墓铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1220年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286287")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286287_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286287'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286287'>秦悼王四世惠州防御使叔侯，生训之，知永丰县，有惠政，军兴，数调发而民不烦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286287_comment'></div>孟太后幸江西，卫卒反，攻县，与贼斗而死，赠直秘阁，邑人哀之，庙祀至今。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286287_comment'></div>训之生公涣，朝奉大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286287_comment'></div>公涣生公，名彦橚，字文长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286287_comment'></div>乾道己丑进士，昆山主簿，乐清尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286287_comment'></div>大旱，令索租急，而以故事祷雨，盛服须公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286287_comment'></div>公不往，曰：「损敛已责，古人所以召和于阴阳也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286287_comment'></div>令不得已为罢催，雨寻澍足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286287_comment'></div>改建康府推官，郡议复台衣税。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286287_comment'></div>公言：「地为桑，既税之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286287_comment'></div>桑为丝，丝为帛，又皆税之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286287_comment'></div>帛为衣，且故敝矣，又可税乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286287_comment'></div>且又昔之所废，其可复乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286287_comment'></div>帅异其言，止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286287_comment'></div>诸司多荐公者，辄推以授同僚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286287_comment'></div>章侍郎森、郑尚书侨荐福建运司干官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286287_comment'></div>诸县欠赈盐本钱数千万，般卖零落，令佐积穷馁，公请于长，一弃除之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286287_comment'></div>举员及，旧例用亲嫌去，公曰：「无亲安去」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286287_comment'></div>卒待满而行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286287_comment'></div>知晋陵县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286287_comment'></div>庆元初，浙西饥，三十县饿死殆尽，独公能活二十万，又以羡钱为五等户代输。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286287_comment'></div>由是擢监登闻检院。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286287_comment'></div>时政出韩侂胄，朝士无不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1286287", 1286287, "Clauses/67/Comments/0")'>造门</span>，公叹曰：「诸人今枉此足易，后复直之甚难」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286287_comment'></div>添差通判江州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286287_comment'></div>彭泽县妻杀夫，州逮夫之父，公曰：「此县狱所无也，而使其父子并为淫妇死乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286287_comment'></div>争累日乃已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286287_comment'></div>知汀州，嫉诸司不荐名士，勉而荐者犹扳置庸不肖中，是辱贤也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286287_comment'></div>乞诏「自今杰材须特荐，毋得与凡流杂」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286287_comment'></div>叶八子千人聚汀、赣间，约日破清流县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286287_comment'></div>公始至，以策授<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1286287", 1286287, "Clauses/87/Comments/0")'>巡尉</span>，悉捕灭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286287_comment'></div>提点广西刑狱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286287_comment'></div>仕畏入瘴地，多依阻，幕属幸日月尽遣还，本举浔守廖德明、廉守刘炳，显于朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286287_comment'></div>设抵当库，廪落南无食者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286287_comment'></div>公念广西重困，盖承平时湖南、北助岁用，或赐封桩钱，中兴艰难，皆废矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286287_comment'></div>官自鬻盐利十分，奉运司六，充郡费四。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286287_comment'></div>然漕司常取其八，而州以不足者责之县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286287_comment'></div>吁！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286287_comment'></div>既甚矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286287_comment'></div>且其出纳之数，视中州何有，而经总钱乃过正赋数倍，此民所以尤病也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286287_comment'></div>遂奏减经总，还二分盐息于郡，庶几稍苏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286287_comment'></div>上是之，即除公运判，以忧归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1286287_comment'></div>侂胄死，召为户部郎，枢密院检详文字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1286287_comment'></div>朝论谓公材臣，将选知临安，公笑曰：「此岂孤拙所堪」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1286287_comment'></div>迁太府少卿，湖广总领。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1286287_comment'></div>迁卿，修撰右文殿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1286287_comment'></div>知镇江府，辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1286287_comment'></div>召仍太府，权户部侍郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1286287_comment'></div>未几，三<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_47_1286287", 1286287, "Clauses/135/Comments/0")'>引疾</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1286287_comment'></div>修撰集英殿，知建宁府，改太平州，辞，提举万寿宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1286287_comment'></div>知平江府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1286287_comment'></div>于是年七十矣，公曰：「吾昔不起，今告老而起，义安在」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1286287_comment'></div>固辞，未听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1286287_comment'></div>女真寇边，军书日数十警，慨然曰：「国有急，不敢以既老辞也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1286287_comment'></div>昆山并大洋，盗出没不可踪迹，以其半置嘉定县，凿锦帆泾，百港<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_53_1286287", 1286287, "Clauses/158/Comments/0")'>缕络</span>之所宗也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1286287_comment'></div>又将增隍为城，未及而边遽少缓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1286287_comment'></div>公亦病，复辞，犹不听，使待制宝谟阁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1286287_comment'></div>以明年七月戊寅卒，嘉定十一年也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1286287_comment'></div>十一月丙申，子迪功郎、临安县主簿炬夫，承务郎、监临安府粮料院㷆夫，合公与令人陈氏之柩于无锡县富安乡苍岘山葬焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1286287_comment'></div>孙男一，女三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1286287_comment'></div>公质刚而行良，先难后获，贵义贱利，以治道隆替消长为身否泰，以善人进退用舍为己忧乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1286287_comment'></div>侘胄始得志，郁挫天下士，使不自容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1286287_comment'></div>后颇悔曰：「此辈岂可无吃饭处耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1286287_comment'></div>稍收拾，铢寸与之，士甘其晚悟，未深虑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1286287_comment'></div>侘胄既亟败，忌者反指为党，疑似锄剥不少借。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1286287_comment'></div>公常痛愤，谓「始坐伪学废，终用兵端斥，茍欲锢士，何患无名，而益友之类绝矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1286287_comment'></div>材尽而求不获，有国之公患；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1286287_comment'></div>冤甚而谤不息，非士之私耻也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1286287_comment'></div>每进退，未尝不恳激为上言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1286287_comment'></div>又以凡在近臣，皆当规讽补切。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1286287_comment'></div>夫己见上殿，侍从也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1286287_comment'></div>直前奏事，左右史也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1286287_comment'></div>故又恳激为同舍言，毋旷素业，隳旧典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1286287_comment'></div>而公自以不得其言，汲汲去位恐不速。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1286287_comment'></div>再命为州，终不行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1286287_comment'></div>一时闻风皆悚慕，后相继稍有言者自公发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1286287_comment'></div>总领号脂膏地甚，虚籍为大蠹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1286287_comment'></div>虽廉能自守，而明不足检覈，隐粮剩镪，大将夺有之，十无虑四三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1286287_comment'></div>公令军别为籍，兵<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_77_1286287", 1286287, "Clauses/225/Comments/0")'>逸亡</span>，马<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_77_1286287", 1286287, "Clauses/226/Comments/0")'>倒毙</span>，皆即报；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1286287_comment'></div>参伍其少多，匿不自占，辄诘问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1286287_comment'></div>或传军中狼顾，离立族语，公曰：「此特主帅不便尔，士卒何损」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1286287_comment'></div>持愈坚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1286287_comment'></div>三年间，籍在人亡赢三万，减钱百万缗，用遂宽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1286287_comment'></div>比其去，馀七百万，而诸路累积逋负犹四百万，尽蠲之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1286287_comment'></div>余尝患雅士不亲钱谷，而自喜析秋毫者必外为苛敛，若夫不出度程之中，而自足于经常之内，则昔人所未讲也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1286287_comment'></div>夫虚其一心以乐与当世之贤，岂非吉人盛德哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1286287_comment'></div>然是人也与世务常多阙短，而精通流速者，挟己长以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_85_1286287", 1286287, "Clauses/254/Comments/0")'>玩物</span>矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1286287_comment'></div>若夫兢兢于道德之意而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_86_1286287", 1286287, "Clauses/255/Comments/0")'>亹亹</span>于事物之实，则前辈所难能也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1286287_comment'></div>在广西，柴中行、宋亿，他司属官也，察其贤，迎荐之，门生谢启皆削投。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1286287_comment'></div>前二十年，祠季子晋陵市，将没，请余记曰：「晋陵之先，文名胡也，节名邹也，皆达人也，宿道而婉其俗者末也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1286287_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_89_1286287'>呜呼文长，道远曷寻！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1286287_comment'></div>岳可量高，海可算深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1286287_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_91_1286287", 1286287, "Clauses/277/Comments/0")'>黼黻</span>为章，宫徵成音；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1286287_comment'></div>经综纬错，其行钦钦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1286287_comment'></div>中全一刚，以折百壬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1286287_comment'></div>有书者碑，苍岘之林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1286287_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_95_1286287'>嘉定十三年二月□日。</div><div id='poem_sentence_95_1286287_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1220&endYear=1220')">1220年5月7日</a>　五月七日，门人宋驹葬于山阴，有祭文。作品：祭宋厩父文。<span class='inlineComment2'>（题目见《水心集》卷二十八。）</span><div id='poem_1286360' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286360' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286360?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭宋厩父文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1220年5月7日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286360")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286360_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286360'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286360'>淳熙初载，实偕我游，我言甚切，世谩不詶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286360_comment'></div>子惠闻之，如水东流，惟其所欲，书外无求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286360_comment'></div>食或腐鲑，衣或穿裘，山或樏载，溪或桴浮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286360_comment'></div>若耶之曲，云门之陬，抱箧独往，竟岁长留。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286360_comment'></div>三坟启伏，百世承周，雷霆聩塞，日月昏幽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286360_comment'></div>子不人语，人不子谋，自悟自乐，孰知其忧！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286360_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286360_comment'></div>天欲死我，尽丧厥俦，无复传声，无复置邮，无复影响，千里相收。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286360_comment'></div>寂寂永夜，茫茫古丘，不如我先，放子白头。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1286360_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1220&endYear=1220')">1220年6月</a>　六月，为门人周端朝之父周鼎臣作墓志铭。作品：周镇伯墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（题目见《水心集》卷二十四。）</span><div id='poem_1286299' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286299' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286299?labeling=true' target='_blank'>周镇伯墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1220年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286299")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286299_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286299'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286299'>曾祖宗道，祖德元，父松，永嘉人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286299_comment'></div>君讳鼎臣，字镇伯，勤志广学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286299_comment'></div>大书丛卷多数百者，亲手传写，记忆略遍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286299_comment'></div>未冠，与郑景望同登，名誉<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1286299", 1286299, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>正等</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286299_comment'></div>既而川壅泽流，山止谷进，诸弟迭起，各取科目，争为闻家，然皆由君教也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286299_comment'></div>授漳浦主簿，文牍间，判疑雪枉，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1286299", 1286299, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>笔势</span>若飞不可遏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286299_comment'></div>有以民为劫冒赏，狱上矣，君覆而冤之，一食顷放散数十人，传声欢呼，彻于比郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286299_comment'></div>州使行视四县，尽荒远不到地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286299_comment'></div>龙岩<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1286299", 1286299, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>瘴毒</span>深厚，号乌脚溪者，左足未投，右胫已骍黑，君特馆其处。<div
