class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286299_comment'></div>村落所急，便宜不请白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286299_comment'></div>蒲延大掠流鹅湾，同巡检轻战而溃，君代尉驰往，三日中生缚其酋二，剚贼无遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286299_comment'></div>发寄纳仓赈伤死，召奔逃归业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286299_comment'></div>差次将卒功状，无敢不平，而不自言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286299_comment'></div>姿敏决，刚峭不可屈，前守材其为，无不听；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286299_comment'></div>后守恶其直，不尽从也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286299_comment'></div>监司欲荐未及，以淳熙十三年三月二十九日卒，年六十一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286299_comment'></div>十五年十二月二十三日，葬建牙乡渚浦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286299_comment'></div>夫人王氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286299_comment'></div>子曰吁；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286299_comment'></div>曰端朝，省试第一，今宣教郎太学博士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286299_comment'></div>君卒后，二子出入，里中指曰：「周镇伯儿也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286299_comment'></div>外家初与田不取，弟多分财不较也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286299_comment'></div>细人或叹曰：「异日主簿有酒常饮我，今亡矣」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286299_comment'></div>或泣曰：「我性傲无礼，主簿辄避我；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286299_comment'></div>他大人咄挞，不我恕也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286299_comment'></div>故僮使曰：「去官人久，见则教我好伏事，牢拾饭碗，未尝坠此言也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286299_comment'></div>余既庐松台下，而周氏居二百年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286299_comment'></div>山之先儒故老，莫如君者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286299_comment'></div>其学也，惰者可殖；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286299_comment'></div>其行也，薄者可化也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286299_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_1286299'>阔视宇宙隘，回虑几席安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286299_comment'></div>古来贤达流，何必用舍间！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286299_comment'></div>活人乌脚溪，杀贼流鹅砦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286299_comment'></div>虽无旧史传，幸有新铭载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286299_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_34_1286299'>嘉定十三年六月日。</div><div id='poem_sentence_34_1286299_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1220&endYear=1220')">1220年8月</a>　八月，为周南仲之文作跋。作品：周南仲《丁卯召试馆职策》跋。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1220&endYear=1220')">1220年9月</a>　九月，为赵师（睪+卉字下面）撰墓志铭。作品：兵部尚书徽猷阁学士赵公墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286300' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286300' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286300?labeling=true' target='_blank'>兵部尚书徽猷阁学士赵公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1220年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286300")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286300_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286300'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286300'>七世祖德昭，太祖子也，王于燕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286300_comment'></div>曾孙世恬，四世孙令晙，师友皆名士，虽秉旄节，恭约如寒人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286300_comment'></div>六世和州防御使伯骕，高宗在国邸，游最旧，中兴久，乃召归，居禁中卜掾堂，以文艺侍左右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286300_comment'></div>生公，名师𢍰，字从善，补平江府司户，两浙转运司属官，中淳熙二年进士第，荐授司农簿大理丞，迁正，将作少监，兼户部、金部郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286300_comment'></div>孝宗念公族家故人子，赡智蚤立，异顾待。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286300_comment'></div>屡奏事殿上，漏常下数刻，所论意合，无不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1286300", 1286300, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>肯可</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286300_comment'></div>言：「左右曹度支金仓，各掌邦赋，名类<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1286300", 1286300, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>析裂</span>，每有会计，遍走五司，文籍复重，吏出没为奸利，不便；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286300_comment'></div>请立总计司，并钱物一之，弊可绝」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286300_comment'></div>上大喜，亟命操笔者前；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286300_comment'></div>甫离御榻，已批外行矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286300_comment'></div>执政迎劳，惊曰：「何速也」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286300_comment'></div>防御丧，免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286300_comment'></div>于时庐陵名难治，前守比不胜任，选知吉州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286300_comment'></div>治有馀，益施与，减征商十三四，减苗秏十五六，属县解板帐，量留之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286300_comment'></div>穷乡不幸病死，为给费。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286300_comment'></div>民感其意，即城隍敞大堂分建十一祠，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1286300", 1286300, "Clauses/66/Comments/0")'>祝嘏</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1286300", 1286300, "Clauses/66/Comments/1")'>荐献</span>，如神明焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286300_comment'></div>铸钱以贯数积二三十万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286300_comment'></div>复选都大提点，取铜廊场矿再变而成，宿逋岁课俱足，赢铜钱数万钧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286300_comment'></div>著《宝司撮要》五卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286300_comment'></div>上尤喜，召为户部郎官，出淮东总领。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286300_comment'></div>光宗立，进太府少卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286300_comment'></div>奏「宜令成闵、皇甫倜入宿卫，问中原形势」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286300_comment'></div>方蒐除杂役，佐正兵，厚立赏格，激其退惰，拔偏将董世雄、冯琪、庄松等三十馀人，事颇有绪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286300_comment'></div>会修楚州城，多异议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286300_comment'></div>移江西提刑，不就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286300_comment'></div>提举云台观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286300_comment'></div>知秀州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286300_comment'></div>未行，改淮南运判。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286300_comment'></div>私铁钱聚淮东数百万，掩遏盐利，八州闭肆逾月，樵苏路沮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286300_comment'></div>公亟出令，恣民挟私钱交市如其故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286300_comment'></div>请于朝，用度僧牒、官会、桩积米，收而鐍藏之，尽乃止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286300_comment'></div>又请造交子，行于江南诸州，稍流通官钱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286300_comment'></div>第功，直秘阁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286300_comment'></div>盐场官有赃负，既劾治，反为所陷，罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286300_comment'></div>除太府少卿，淮西总领。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286300_comment'></div>军人被差擘生券不削本俸，自公始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286300_comment'></div>游士乞索不厌，毁短公，复罢，提举云台观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286300_comment'></div>除直秘阁，两浙转运副使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286300_comment'></div>以司农卿知临安府，权工部侍郎，为真，仍兼临安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286300_comment'></div>齐国夫人疾病，待制华文阁，知镇江府，辞，提举兴国宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286300_comment'></div>释服，知扬州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1286300_comment'></div>升龙图阁，赐正透犀以带。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1286300_comment'></div>在扬三年，入权工部尚书，寻权户部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1286300_comment'></div>既而落权，皆兼临安府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1286300_comment'></div>两繁增剧，闲整如平日，人服其难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1286300_comment'></div>时嘉泰末，开禧初也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1286300_comment'></div>韩侂胄将北伐，密谋累岁，有闻不敢问，问或不敢答。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1286300_comment'></div>公还自广陵，建预防素备八事，且言「今日当以蔡谟之忧为忧」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1286300_comment'></div>侂胄殊不快，言无见从者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1286300_comment'></div>一日，侍从官集侂胄所，公固守前议，声色俱厉，侂胄大骇，故虽以二难倚公，而不能留也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1286300_comment'></div>明年，皇甫斌败，郭倬、李爽溃退，江、淮处处戒严。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1286300_comment'></div>公由绍兴府、庐州，再为工部尚书，知临安府，募京畿将兵三千人，衣装等仗皆如大军，蔽浙江而营，以壮军容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1286300_comment'></div>对人说边事，悲愤感激，形于涕泣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1286300_comment'></div>侂胄愈怨，谰者谓其崇饰小信，大声疾呼，自是与公绝矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1286300_comment'></div>又明年，侂胄死，起知京口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1286300_comment'></div>麦折价无过㪷二百，琢石示永利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1286300_comment'></div>除宝谟阁学士，知江陵府，制置京湖，辞，未听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1286300_comment'></div>给舍不悦，改直学士，提举万寿宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1286300_comment'></div>三为工部尚书，知临安府，力辞，学士院无答诏，亦止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1286300_comment'></div>俄复以夏官兼焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1286300_comment'></div>十馀年中，四知临安府，廋情匿奸，悬见立剖，猝需冗求，趣具曲应，巷夫街叟，夸赞相续，皆曰：「长安门户百万，皆若赵尚书亲履其家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1286300_comment'></div>我曹情伪如山海，非赵尹岂能遍识」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1286300_comment'></div>至今其论犹然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1286300_comment'></div>诗曰：「商邑翼翼，四方之极」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1286300_comment'></div>郑氏曰：「商邑之礼俗翼翼然，四方所则效，王化所以自京师始也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1286300_comment'></div>周人合公卿大夫之贤，通治六乡，信厚驯美，横猾消伏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1286300_comment'></div>《记》曰：「古之欲明明德于天下者，先治其国」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1286300_comment'></div>夫王畿，固天子之所自治也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1286300_comment'></div>汉以来，独任京兆尹，彼名豪巨侠，蹙虐贫细，所在布满，非设方略，广耳目，何以迹捕；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1286300_comment'></div>不严击断，敢<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_69_1286300", 1286300, "Clauses/239/Comments/0")'>诛杀</span>，岂为衰止哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1286300_comment'></div>然而智进则德退，术胜则道微，用之殊方，流品亦异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1286300_comment'></div>故萧望之嫌张敞材轻，非师傅之器；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1286300_comment'></div>公乘兴讼王尊功伐前所未有，名将不及：毁誉之不同若此，亦各以其所试言之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1286300_comment'></div>公奏：「陛下始缘都城楮贱米贵，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_73_1286300", 1286300, "Clauses/253/Comments/0")'>牵挽</span>用臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1286300_comment'></div>今虽楮稍重而贱之源犹在，籴渐平而贵之根自若，惧终不足<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_74_1286300", 1286300, "Clauses/256/Comments/1")'>寄委</span>」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1286300_comment'></div>上不能夺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1286300_comment'></div>解府事，兼详定敕令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1286300_comment'></div>连自乞退十馀疏，言者因曰：「可许矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1286300_comment'></div>遂归吴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1286300_comment'></div>凡五年，然后以宝谟阁学士提举万寿宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1286300_comment'></div>提举之二年，嘉定十年也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1286300_comment'></div>其二月初八，薨于私第，年七十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1286300_comment'></div>初，秦国夫人生公而终，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_82_1286300", 1286300, "Clauses/273/Comments/0")'>忆念</span>至老，常涕泣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1286300_comment'></div>奉齐国孝敬，公休私佚，清早深暮，无不在侧，饮食寒暖必营护。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1286300_comment'></div>与弟师弇笃爱终始，有无多少必均壹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1286300_comment'></div>遗命「善事叔父如吾在时」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1286300_comment'></div>淑人蔡氏，先公卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1286300_comment'></div>子希苍，某官保义郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1286300_comment'></div>希虞，早卒；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1286300_comment'></div>希祐，某官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1286300_comment'></div>二婿，杨训，某官；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1286300_comment'></div>詹乂民，某官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1286300_comment'></div>孙曰添孙，某官；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1286300_comment'></div>曰桂老，某官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1286300_comment'></div>孙婿曰莫幼成，某官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1286300_comment'></div>四月庚午，葬吴县长洲乡鹿山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1286300_comment'></div>余与公同淮漕，同总领，希苍再从余金陵，自公殁，即遣客候余，阅数年不倦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1286300_comment'></div>余欲附公于敞、尊之次，而本朝宪令平，无前世轻重之患；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1286300_comment'></div>钱唐民俗愿，无京兆悍强之习；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1286300_comment'></div>然则公之材智，容有不尽施者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1286300_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_100_1286300'>公遇孝宗，冠阼方初；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1286300_comment'></div>策画云兴，毋疾少徐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1286300_comment'></div>自浙北、南，暨淮东、西；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1286300_comment'></div>众大之居，独以能推。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1286300_comment'></div>有渐农鳸，有赫冬卿；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1286300_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_105_1286300", 1286300, "Clauses/328/Comments/0")'>八座尚书</span>，五繇尹升。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1286300_comment'></div>北伐大议，为时力争；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1286300_comment'></div>谁云忤触，籍甚其名！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1286300_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_108_1286300", 1286300, "Clauses/334/Comments/0")'>材品</span>素分，物论先具；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1286300_comment'></div>岂如王尊，歘毁忽誉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1286300_comment'></div>毁勿与门，誉勿与邻；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1286300_comment'></div>惟孝及友，燕尔后人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1286300_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_112_1286300'>嘉定十三年九月日。</div><div id='poem_sentence_112_1286300_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1220&endYear=1220')">1220年12月</a>　十二月，应浙东提刑汪纲之请，为其曾祖汪勃作墓志铭。作品：故枢密参政汪公墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286302' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286302' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286302?labeling=true' target='_blank'>故枢密参政汪公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1220年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286302")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286302_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286302'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286302'>乾道七年四月十二日，签书枢密院事兼权参知政事汪公勃薨，年八十四。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286302_comment'></div>十月己酉，葬会昌乡蜀里北庄村。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286302_comment'></div>嘉定十三年，曾孙纲以墓上之铭来请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286302_comment'></div>公字彦及，徽州黟人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286302_comment'></div>年十八，州荐士称首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286302_comment'></div>试辟廱太学，锋锐明敏，同舍<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1286302", 1286302, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>畏伏</span>，尊以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1286302", 1286302, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>宿旧</span>，垂三十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286302_comment'></div>绍兴三年，类省试饶州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286302_comment'></div>二年，登进士第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286302_comment'></div>主严州建德簿，池州建德丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286302_comment'></div>京口置沿江安抚，辟为属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286302_comment'></div>十三年，除太常寺主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286302_comment'></div>高宗厌<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1286302", 1286302, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>戎马</span>久，思壹休息，既定和亲，罢诸将兵，而名士大夫，皆谓「父兄雠未报，兵未当罢」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286302_comment'></div>上患之，择耆艾质厚不与赵、张同好恶者居<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1286302", 1286302, "Clauses/34/Comments/1")'>纪纲地</span>，共持国论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286302_comment'></div>公自御史台检法官为监察御史，奏事殿中，上方书《孝经》，公奏：「显仁后归，孝之大也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286302_comment'></div>请刊石，摹以赐群臣诸生，示天下子道」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286302_comment'></div>又言：「新学初建，科场适开，万方趋向于是乎卜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286302_comment'></div>学者不粹然一出于孔氏，而以专门曲学乱之，可乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286302_comment'></div>上曰：「此所以正人心也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286302_comment'></div>诏有司，「凡私意<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1286302", 1286302, "Clauses/55/Comments/2")'>臆说</span>尽黜之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286302_comment'></div>大理少卿朱斐对上，指大理寺为诏狱，公论「斐不自知职业何事，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1286302", 1286302, "Clauses/59/Comments/1")'>不学无识</span>」，竟罢斐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286302_comment'></div>蔡攸家人至行在，公历陈「靖康祸变，臣子不忍闻」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286302_comment'></div>上读疏悲愤，亟命临安还之所贬州，京子孙不用赦令内徙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286302_comment'></div>进侍御史，言：「陛下近以各郡土俗利害，随宜增损，裕养民力，其节目甚多，给舍条上矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286302_comment'></div>宜令监司以方镂之，遍下州县，使百姓户晓，而劾其稽违者」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286302_comment'></div>由是上益以公为知大体，明治道，擢授谏议大夫，兼侍讲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286302_comment'></div>押班赵辙凭宠作势，妄占人庐舍，公奏，斥之外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286302_comment'></div>上曰：「逐一内侍而其类皆竦，人知畏矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286302_comment'></div>愈奇公，可大用也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286302_comment'></div>迁御史中丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286302_comment'></div>十八年，遂以端明殿学士副密院事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286302_comment'></div>段拂罢，兼摄东府事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286302_comment'></div>自秦桧志得，恶同列偪己，始废序迁之制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286302_comment'></div>甫签署或参知，已逐去，俄复窜谪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286302_comment'></div>公上所属任，非桧引者，每造前倾接，俞咈旋首，下殿目送，必与桧钧礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286302_comment'></div>桧瞬息间喻意，相縻岁馀，未有以逞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286302_comment'></div>公顾桧忮忍，欲有所建白，答上恩遇，常<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1286302", 1286302, "Clauses/114/Comments/0")'>沮塞</span>不得间，则叹息曰：「此岂伴食处哉」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286302_comment'></div>及赐桧<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1286302", 1286302, "Clauses/117/Comments/0")'>犀带</span>，忽问：「枢密有否」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286302_comment'></div>使者言：「带二，一赐枢密」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286302_comment'></div>桧怃然曰：「上果厚汪枢哉」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286302_comment'></div>弥不平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286302_comment'></div>公亦慨然曰：「吾可以去矣」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1286302_comment'></div>即告上：「陛下幸哀臣母老病，得退就田里」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1286302_comment'></div>上雅知公为桧发也，重慰荐，以旧职食宫观禄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1286302_comment'></div>终桧在，不敢动摇公者，上力也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1286302_comment'></div>桧死，起知湖州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1286302_comment'></div>廉俭至骨，不费公使一物，内屏烛跋，撚纸代燎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1286302_comment'></div>政以慈爱为主，劝两讼勿争，词致殷重，其人感悦合掌结欢而散。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1286302_comment'></div>霅上相语：「莫激恼这佛」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1286302_comment'></div>将老，上终始念公，超秩三等，制曰：「为民借留」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1286302_comment'></div>叶义问，故人也，有隐憾，上章<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_49_1286302", 1286302, "Clauses/157/Comments/0")'>毁诋</span>，夺学士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1286302_comment'></div>孝宗初，特诏复与，言者未已，命再格。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1286302_comment'></div>又诏复龙图阁，而公已薨，遂追复焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1286302_comment'></div>盖当桧亡后，一时党援，刬薙焚汰，不啻草莽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1286302_comment'></div>独公老成重德，人无异词，虽为义问排毁公者，后亦卒自悔恨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1286302_comment'></div>而二宗眷眷于公如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1286302_comment'></div>嗟夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1286302_comment'></div>是非贤否之实，岂终不可定哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1286302_comment'></div>汪氏望于黄陂，世序甚远，然未有仕者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1286302_comment'></div>公始赠曾祖昌龄太子少保，祖惟立少傅；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1286302_comment'></div>父才贵太子太师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1286302_comment'></div>在饶州也，张琪兵突黟县，家遁溃不相知，母舒氏陷贼几不脱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1286302_comment'></div>寇退，邑落死走十三四，而公奏名以归，长幼各聚，数里内无一亡失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1286302_comment'></div>乡人惊异曰：「是公素孝谨，天殆活之」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1286302_comment'></div>既贵，封舒氏延康郡，逮西府之养云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1286302_comment'></div>赠其配曰祝氏高平，曰唐氏南昌，皆郡夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1286302_comment'></div>四子，作砺，湖北提刑；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1286302_comment'></div>作舟，监行在都茶场；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1286302_comment'></div>作霖，京西安抚司干官；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1286302_comment'></div>作乂，清江丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1286302_comment'></div>孙十一人，义和，侍御史；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1286302_comment'></div>义荣，大理丞；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1286302_comment'></div>义端，徽猷阁待制；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1286302_comment'></div>义质，蕲春簿；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1286302_comment'></div>义的，太学内舍生；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1286302_comment'></div>义路，义处，义方，义实，义善，义准。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1286302_comment'></div>曾孙纲，直秘阁浙东提刑；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1286302_comment'></div>纪，赣县丞；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1286302_comment'></div>统，通判楚州；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1286302_comment'></div>纮，监平江府赡军库；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1286302_comment'></div>绛，知龙阳县；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1286302_comment'></div>缜，知永兴县；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1286302_comment'></div>绶，知丰城县；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1286302_comment'></div>绎，通判安丰军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1286302_comment'></div>公诚笃款尽，自少至老，不欺无妄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1286302_comment'></div>尤简朴，安同异，行畴垄中，农坐桑语，尔汝如一人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1286302_comment'></div>岁侵，倒廪下其直，巨姓皆曰：「枢密尚减价，我何敢求赢」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1286302_comment'></div>故市籴常平，黟人亦以为佛也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1286302_comment'></div>公在时，诸孙已取高第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1286302_comment'></div>后侍从相踵，至纲三世，卓然异材，宜于内外善类合一，追述祖德，销熄<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_88_1286302", 1286302, "Clauses/266/Comments/0")'>诬谩</span>，太史公所谓忠信行道以奉主上，世家之流也，不止铭墓而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1286302_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_89_1286302'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_89_1286302", 1286302, "Clauses/271/Comments/0")'>治古</span>君臣，与道合离；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1286302_comment'></div>卜用一相，至公匪私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1286302_comment'></div>舜命伯禹，稷、契参之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1286302_comment'></div>迹不存家，心国是毗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1286302_comment'></div>翼翼高宗，进臣以恭；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1286302_comment'></div>独我偃我，尔无尚同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1286302_comment'></div>断断汪公，辅君以忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1286302_comment'></div>臣岂不比，曰君是从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1286302_comment'></div>事往论移，群讪一声；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1286302_comment'></div>虽与桧异，难于自明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1286302_comment'></div>惟两圣人，深照厥诚；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1286302_comment'></div>始黜终复，生冤死荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1286302_comment'></div>坟彼北庄，其下靡刻；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1286302_comment'></div>蜀笋仍存，翁仲犹默。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1286302_comment'></div>碑铭新特，纲也念德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1286302_comment'></div>碑坚有泐，铭坚无惑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1286302_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_105_1286302'>十二月日。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_105_1286302'></div><div id='poem_sentence_105_1286302_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1220&endYear=1220')">1220年</a>　冬，永嘉知县胡衍离任，有诗送之。作品：送胡衍道。<span class='inlineComment2'>（题目见《水心集》卷七。）</span><div id='poem_80159' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_80159' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/80159?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送胡衍道</a><span class='authorDate'>（1220年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_80159")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_80159_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_80159'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_80159'>庭松雪外青，槛梅冰里白。<div id='poem_sentence_0_80159_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_80159'>正堪频把玩，何忍骤离拆。<div id='poem_sentence_1_80159_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_80159'>我老如蜕蝉，随叶飘重泉。<div id='poem_sentence_2_80159_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_80159'>欣君整佩出，直上穹穹天。<div id='poem_sentence_3_80159_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_80159'>卓茂冠天下，王祥歌海沂。<div id='poem_sentence_4_80159_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_80159'>奉璋承大糦，吁俊迪深知。<div id='poem_sentence_5_80159_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_80159'>情胡万难齐，理或一未贯。<div id='poem_sentence_6_80159_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_80159'>中道不及伸，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_80159", 80159, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>偏质</span>徒受乱。<div id='poem_sentence_7_80159_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_80159'>同人当同群，不止同其门。<div id='poem_sentence_8_80159_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_80159'>众金<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_80159", 80159, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>炉鞴</span>合，一匠杗桷分。<div id='poem_sentence_9_80159_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_80159'>惜民当惜农，不止惜其佣。<div id='poem_sentence_10_80159_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_80159'>客主两无怨，政刑会时雍。<div id='poem_sentence_11_80159_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_80159'>三年心所亲，临别语甚的。<div id='poem_sentence_12_80159_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_80159'>已去宁再逢，怀哉展其力。<div id='poem_sentence_13_80159_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_80159'></div><div id='poem_sentence_14_80159_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1220&endYear=1220')">1220年</a>　临海吴子良（明辅）上书叶适，求教道学名实真伪之说。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1220&endYear=1220')">1220年</a>　为宜兴县修学作记。作品：宜兴县修学记。<div id='poem_1286151' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286151' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286151?labeling=true' target='_blank'>宜兴县修学记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1220年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286151")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286151_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286151'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286151'>戴君桷宰宜兴，既补弟子员食于学，视学舍壮整者惟高尹商老宣化堂；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286151_comment'></div>罗令仲舒东序堂亦倾敝，馀或缺或毁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286151_comment'></div>顾其士陈梦印、章悉夫，买旁县材，拣工优作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286151_comment'></div>叠二年，复修堂庙，设大门，门左右挟前崇，门棂对立西序宗子小学，凡职列之次，故所无皆具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286151_comment'></div>然后使沈梦龙来言曰：「噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286151_comment'></div>可记矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286151_comment'></div>荆溪，《禹贡》中江也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286151_comment'></div>渚洑澄澈，云木萦带，君山最雄秀，嵌洞尤怪伟，盖自楚、汉为东南称首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286151_comment'></div>近苏公去万里蜀，周览天下，择阳羡而居，其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1286151", 1286151, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>疏展</span>隩丽兼之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286151_comment'></div>方周孝侯童騃纵暴，至比以异物，一旦感激，杀虎斩蛟，从陆士衡兄弟，前死不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1286151", 1286151, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>却顾</span>，大节尚生存，或疑非地力之劲挺不能也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286151_comment'></div>熙宁更用经义，士初昧溺于时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286151_comment'></div>开封礼部有二邵，集英亲策有余，选皆第一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286151_comment'></div>京师之大，四海之广，一邑而擅魁特者三，或疑非地禀之文华不能也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286151_comment'></div>夫发于劲挺，孰若纳于中和；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286151_comment'></div>华其文辞，孰若厚其根本！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286151_comment'></div>根本，学也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286151_comment'></div>中和，道也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286151_comment'></div>地安能预哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286151_comment'></div>阙党、互乡，地耻其人也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286151_comment'></div>鲁多儒，卫君子，人美其地也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286151_comment'></div>今夫邑之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1286151", 1286151, "Clauses/60/Comments/0")'>翘材</span>颖质，将进于道，必约以性，通以心，肝脾胃肾无恣其情，念虑思索无挠其灵，则偏气不胜而中和全矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286151_comment'></div>将深于学，必测之古，證之今，上该千世，旁括百家，异流殊方，如出<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1286151", 1286151, "Clauses/73/Comments/0")'>一贯</span>，则枝叶为轻而本根重矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286151_comment'></div>学与道会，人与德合，登高丘可以奄鲁，俯长流可以观逝，则山川虽富，同游于覆载之内，义理至乐，独行于物欲之外矣，岂非令长修学之本意哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286151_comment'></div>罨画之溪，犹浴沂也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286151_comment'></div>善拳之窦，亦舞雩也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286151_comment'></div>非骚人<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1286151", 1286151, "Clauses/88/Comments/0")'>墨士</span>专而有也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286151_comment'></div>嘉定十三年十月。</div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1286151_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1220&endYear=1220')">1220年</a>　为著作佐郎周梦祥之女周氏撰墓志铭。作品：孺人周氏墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（人物身份见《水心集》卷二十三本文。）</span><div id='poem_1286288' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286288' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286288?labeling=true' target='_blank'>孺人周氏墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1220年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286288")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286288_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286288'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286288'>夫人，括苍周氏，著作佐郎梦祥之女，材任家事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286288_comment'></div>偶于三山陈垓，妇道修饬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286288_comment'></div>君教永嘉，方倾身与士接，夜诵满廊户，烹菜搅糜，鼓三伐，共食已，乃揖就睡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286288_comment'></div>夫人常鬻假称具无难色，士誉君之贤，则及夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286288_comment'></div>将别，小学子<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1286288", 1286288, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>翘敏</span>者，怀以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1286288", 1286288, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>果饵</span>，储以方笔，或总其角，或束其带，顾恋依依，尤以夫人为有恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286288_comment'></div>嘉定十二年九月十九日卒，年四十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286288_comment'></div>十三年三月二日，葬丽水县南明山任坞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286288_comment'></div>女曰恩娘，男曰虎孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286288_comment'></div>君悲夫人不尽年，莫助为善，思有刻于墓，而一郡士亦皆惨惨恻恻，自致其请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286288_comment'></div>噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286288_comment'></div>未见以法为师弟子而能交相爱若是也，岂合于古之道者固不异今之法欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286288_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_1286288'>青青者蔬，妇手所择；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286288_comment'></div>以羹以菹，成士之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286288_comment'></div>弃我顷畚，追彼石兮！</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1286288_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1220&endYear=1220')">1220年</a>　为戴龟朋撰墓志铭。作品：竹洲戴君墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（人物身份见《水心集》卷二十三本文。）</span><div id='poem_1286293' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286293' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286293?labeling=true' target='_blank'>竹洲戴君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1220年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286293")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286293_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286293'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286293'>尹戴姓，名龟朋，字叔宪，台州黄岩人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286293_comment'></div>祖舜钦，宣和中进士，上书危言，天子不怒，赐同出身，南康军司户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286293_comment'></div>父秉中，亦有材气，补进义校尉，不仕，尝自赞其像，为时所称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286293_comment'></div>君生六十二，开禧三年五月某日卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286293_comment'></div>娶蔡氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286293_comment'></div>子曰枞，曰周孙，皆先死，以从弟温之子大本为子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286293_comment'></div>一女，嫁林珍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286293_comment'></div>嘉定十三年二月某日，葬太平乡黄仙山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286293_comment'></div>蔡氏侄滂，请余铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286293_comment'></div>滂父镐，余友也，不得辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286293_comment'></div>滂言：「戴居南塘，山易材，海易渔，田易稼，聚族数十，富乐累世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286293_comment'></div>自君父祖皆知名，而君及从叔秉器尤为邑里所敬，有钜人长者之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286293_comment'></div>族人新为宅者，将立门以出，秉器故有大圊，正直门处，族人不敢谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286293_comment'></div>秉器知之，中夜毁圊，夷其地，旦而门立，则坦然无有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286293_comment'></div>族人殊不自意，秉器亦不复言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286293_comment'></div>盖其平生行事如此甚众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286293_comment'></div>君少苦学，取友必胜己。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286293_comment'></div>文记诗歌，务为奇卓清简，无俗间鄙腐意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286293_comment'></div>性介特，未尝辄以私谒人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286293_comment'></div>而人急难，若己痛疾，救之不暇喘，僦宿者与庐，露殡者与山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286293_comment'></div>然力不逮秉器，故所施亦狭，而心无不至也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286293_comment'></div>殁既久，怀其恩者，语则涕下不自禁」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286293_comment'></div>余既闻二戴事，而思天下之广，人类至多，其为善宜不绝，可传而不得传者不为少也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286293_comment'></div>然则君之得传，岂偶然哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286293_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_1286293'>象物之洁，以竹自环；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286293_comment'></div>洲萦渚穿，万其琅玕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286293_comment'></div>昔王逸少，寄于兰亭；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286293_comment'></div>修竹茂林，千载犹青。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286293_comment'></div>竹洲在亡，视其子孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286293_comment'></div>竹耶铭耶！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286293_comment'></div>孰诏以存。</div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1286293_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1220&endYear=1220')">1220年</a>　为李祥撰墓志铭。作品：国子祭酒赠宝谟阁待制李公墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286298' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286298' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286298?labeling=true' target='_blank'>国子祭酒赠宝谟阁待制李公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1220年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286298")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286298_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286298'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286298'>李公名祥，字元德，曾祖远，祖通，父赠中大夫扬，常州无锡人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286298_comment'></div>隆兴元年，登进士第，主钱塘县簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286298_comment'></div>皇城司妄告密，威胁吏成其罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286298_comment'></div>武臣子谤讪，鞫于临安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286298_comment'></div>公偶摄录参，亟闭狱户，逻者求入，吏白旧例得监视，皆不许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286298_comment'></div>既而所告无实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286298_comment'></div>知府姚宪惊曰：「上命无实乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286298_comment'></div>公谢曰：「即坐谴，自甘」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286298_comment'></div>宪曰：「上何知是君」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286298_comment'></div>公曰：「尹言过矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286298_comment'></div>上<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1286298", 1286298, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>至明</span>，岂重逻轻尹哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286298_comment'></div>小人<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1286298", 1286298, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>奸罔</span>，宜有惩艾」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286298_comment'></div>宪具论如公意，上骇曰：「朕几误，卿吾争臣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286298_comment'></div>遂赐宪出身，为谏大夫，预政矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286298_comment'></div>调濠州录事参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286298_comment'></div>安丰守冒民田，讼屡改，监司以委公，还之民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286298_comment'></div>未几，其人易守濠，换司理庐州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286298_comment'></div>守出改官奏为劝留者，公曰：「无吝民田，幸矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286298_comment'></div>荐何敢」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286298_comment'></div>主管户部架阁文字，太学博士，国子博士，司农寺丞，枢密院编修官，兼刑部郎官，大宗正丞，军器少监。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286298_comment'></div>言：「忝迹八年，外贤材不胜众，愿更出迭入由臣始」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286298_comment'></div>出，提举淮东盐，淮西运判，入，郎仓部，检详枢密院诸房文字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286298_comment'></div>两淮铁钱比不定，大商丧亿万，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1286298", 1286298, "Clauses/72/Comments/0")'>浮细</span>失什伯，且乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286298_comment'></div>公再疏乞官赐钱米销滥恶者，废定城、兴国、汉阳监，更铸绍熙新钱，从之，淮人以安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286298_comment'></div>迁国子司业，宗正少卿，国子祭酒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286298_comment'></div>庆元元年二月，丞相赵汝愚免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286298_comment'></div>公争议曰：「顷寿皇崩，两宫隔绝，丧无主，留正弃印亡，国命如发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286298_comment'></div>汝愚不畏灭族，决策立陛下，风尘不摇，天下晏然，社稷之臣也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286298_comment'></div>奈何无念功诚意，忽体貌常典！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286298_comment'></div>精忠巨节，怫郁<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1286298", 1286298, "Clauses/98/Comments/0")'>黯闇</span>，何以示后世」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286298_comment'></div>除直龙图阁，湖南<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1286298", 1286298, "Clauses/101/Comments/0")'>运副</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286298_comment'></div>言者怒，劾公，罢之，于是太学诸生杨宏中、周端朝六人固留公，并得罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286298_comment'></div>悲夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286298_comment'></div>祸所从来远矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286298_comment'></div>世方绌道学，而柄路艰用材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286298_comment'></div>周丞相执政久，士多貌若愿，不心与也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286298_comment'></div>忮者已怨，相与击逐，喜曰：「道学散群矣」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286298_comment'></div>赵丞相特用材锐甚，清官重职，往往世所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_1286298", 1286298, "Clauses/120/Comments/0")'>标指</span>谓道学者，忮者尤怨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286298_comment'></div>幸其有功，生异起说，枝连叶缀，若组织然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286298_comment'></div>谤成而赵公亦逐，则又喜曰：「道学结局矣」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286298_comment'></div>凡经赵公识面坐语，无不迹绝影灭也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1286298_comment'></div>盖道学于公，涂问巷揖，无及门之款；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1286298_comment'></div>赵公于公，序进次补，无踰级之迁也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1286298_comment'></div>一旦正色抗辞，殄行谗说，犹蛰虫之遇震霆，莫能测焉，何哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1286298_comment'></div>冲然无去来而为心者，公心也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1286298_comment'></div>漠然无重轻而为言者，公论也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1286298_comment'></div>公本于公心以发公论，赵公之诬赖以明，道学之禁赖以解，殆天意，非人力也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1286298_comment'></div>既归无锡，客或扣前语，掉头不对。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1286298_comment'></div>常时禄入，缘手散亲旧悉尽，家人忧之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1286298_comment'></div>更卖田，起宅数间而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1286298_comment'></div>再主<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_50_1286298", 1286298, "Clauses/159/Comments/0")'>冲佑观</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1286298_comment'></div>再请老，以直龙图阁致仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1286298_comment'></div>嘉泰元年八月十八日卒，年七十四。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1286298_comment'></div>夫人戴氏，有淑行，能助公为施者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1286298_comment'></div>十月十四日，葬开元乡华𡃖村，山曰横山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1286298_comment'></div>明年，戴氏殁，合于墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1286298_comment'></div>子曰纶，先卒；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1286298_comment'></div>曰维，某官；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1286298_comment'></div>曰约，某官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1286298_comment'></div>婿曰赵绎，某官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1286298_comment'></div>孙曰悫，曰愈，曰思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1286298_comment'></div>孙女四人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1286298_comment'></div>其后上既于赵公备褒恤之礼，谥曰忠定，而公亦赠宝谟阁待制，赐谥肃简焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1286298_comment'></div>公义顺而理和，埙唱篪应，璋判圭合，得于自然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1286298_comment'></div>是非邪正，豫定于心，不待择而知；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1286298_comment'></div>趋舍避就，行其所安，不待辨而明也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1286298_comment'></div>古今叹材难有二：不能必行，难也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1286298_comment'></div>不能必言，难也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1286298_comment'></div>能必行者，执政大臣之选也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1286298_comment'></div>能必言者，谏官御史之选也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1286298_comment'></div>今人共称赵公事，是其一验尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1286298_comment'></div>其言于孝宗曰：「唐、虞称盛治者，君臣和也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1286298_comment'></div>今猜防收揽，虽干官亦亲擢，陛下不和也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1286298_comment'></div>政事堂多存形迹，不肯协同，辅相不和也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1286298_comment'></div>大将宿卫，当清苦孤立，今党援<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_74_1286298", 1286298, "Clauses/221/Comments/0")'>封殖</span>，大残也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1286298_comment'></div>阉佞给使，当沈伏奔走，今名闻<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_75_1286298", 1286298, "Clauses/225/Comments/0")'>鼎贵</span>，大贼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1286298_comment'></div>骑淮常作过，捍边何有？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1286298_comment'></div>而长此隳信誓；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1286298_comment'></div>武举试七书，韬略安在？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1286298_comment'></div>而重此，轻儒臣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1286298_comment'></div>箴痛过砭石矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1286298_comment'></div>又特奏五劄子，故淹缓晷刻以广上意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1286298_comment'></div>余以是知其能必言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1286298_comment'></div>言恢复众矣，未有循其本者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1286298_comment'></div>公言：「预买四十馀千，秋苗斛两大硕，秫麦尤重，经总无名，本先拨也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1286298_comment'></div>皆曰不可损。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1286298_comment'></div>今岁损一二，来岁损一二，不可乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1286298_comment'></div>为博士，为寺丞，为编修官，为提举，朝辞始终一志，前后一念，皆复雠也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1286298_comment'></div>气泰神静，本末有序，余以是知其能必行也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1286298_comment'></div>然而其上不为执政大臣，其次不为谏官、御史，材非果难也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1286298_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_90_1286298'>超天门之嶪峨兮，众外逐而侜谖，奚夫子之并登兮，独内秉而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_90_1286298", 1286298, "Clauses/267/Comments/0")'>塞渊</span>！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1286298_comment'></div>建惊世之华旗兮，载骇俗之高轩，遏谗慝之横溃兮，扶忠良之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_91_1286298", 1286298, "Clauses/271/Comments/0")'>阸艰</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1286298_comment'></div>讯曰：山浮苍兮水涵清，深复深兮窈斯铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1286298_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_93_1286298'>嘉定十三年六月日。</div><div id='poem_sentence_93_1286298_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1221&endYear=1221')">1221年1月</a>　一月，为陈亮、王自中合撰墓志铭。作品：陈同甫王道甫墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286303' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286303' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286303?labeling=true' target='_blank'>陈同甫王道甫墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1221年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286303")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286303_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286303'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286303'>志复君之雠，大义也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286303_comment'></div>欲挈诸夏合南北，大虑也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286303_comment'></div>必行其所知，不以得丧壮老二其守，大节也：春秋、战国之材无是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286303_comment'></div>吾得二人焉：永康陈亮，平阳王自中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286303_comment'></div>亮字同甫，童幼时，周参政葵请为上客。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286303_comment'></div>朝士白事，参政必指令揖同甫，因得交一时豪俊，尽其论议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286303_comment'></div>隆兴再约和，天下欣然幸复苏息，独同甫持不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286303_comment'></div>婺州方以解头荐，著《中兴五论》，奏入，不报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286303_comment'></div>后十年，同甫在太学，睨场屋士馀十万，用文墨少异雄其间，非人杰也，弃去之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286303_comment'></div>更名同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286303_comment'></div>复上书至再，天子始欲召见，倖臣耻不诣己，执政尤不乐，复不报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286303_comment'></div>又十年，亲至金陵视形势，复上书：「陛下试一听臣，用其喜怒哀乐之权鼓动天下」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286303_comment'></div>上顾内禅决矣，终不报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286303_comment'></div>由是在庭交怒，以为怪狂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286303_comment'></div>前此乡人为宴会，末胡椒，特置同甫羹胾中，盖村俚敬待异礼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286303_comment'></div>同坐者归而暴死，疑食异味有毒，已入大理狱矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286303_comment'></div>民吕兴、何廿四殴吕天济，且死，恨曰：「陈上舍使杀我」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286303_comment'></div>县令王恬实其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286303_comment'></div>台官谕监司选酷吏讯问，数岁无所得，复取入大理，众意必死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286303_comment'></div>少卿郑汝谐直其冤，得免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286303_comment'></div>未几，光宗策进士，擢第一，既知为同甫，则大喜曰：「朕亲览，果不谬」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286303_comment'></div>授建康军签判。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286303_comment'></div>同甫虽据高第，忧患困折，精泽内耗，形体外离，未至官，病，一夕卒，哀哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286303_comment'></div>葬家侧龙窟马铺山，世所谓陈龙川也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286303_comment'></div>自中字道甫，岸谷深厚，山止时行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286303_comment'></div>所历虽知名胜人或官序高重，逆占其无忧当世意，直嬉笑视，不与为宾主礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286303_comment'></div>一日，赴丞相坐，有馈鹿至，请赋之，韵得方字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286303_comment'></div>摇膝朗唱曰：「世间此物多谓马，宝匣还宜出上方」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286303_comment'></div>相惨愠，亟入复出，出入数四。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286303_comment'></div>客皇恐不自得，道甫神色不异，饮啖自若，以此甚不悦于流俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286303_comment'></div>乾道四年，议遣归正人，伏丽正门争论，且言：「今内空无贤，外虚无兵，当网罗英俊，广募忠力，为中原率」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286303_comment'></div>坐斥徽州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286303_comment'></div>每应试，皆陈实策，无一语类时文，或笑曰：「此劄子也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286303_comment'></div>然竟亦得乙第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286303_comment'></div>中书舍人王蔺荐于上，蔺上所厚，得召对。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286303_comment'></div>上壮其貌，亲其言，改官为籍田令，又使举其所知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286303_comment'></div>将用矣，以谏官蒋继周疏罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286303_comment'></div>上徐悔，差通判郢州道，知光化军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286303_comment'></div>还朝，光宗曰：「寿皇以卿属朕，姑为郎相伴乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286303_comment'></div>公谢：「臣已累寿皇，不敢复累陛下」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286303_comment'></div>固请，知信州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1286303_comment'></div>复召，以王恬疏罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1286303_comment'></div>知邵州，以谢原明罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1286303_comment'></div>知兴化军，以高文虎罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1286303_comment'></div>是其人之于二公，非有睚眦激发之愤，肤奏噆螫之苦也，相传以嫉，望风而忌尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1286303_comment'></div>然二公自料，苟其人志不复君之雠，虑不足挈诸夏合南北，固不与并立矣，则进退离合之不相容，亦其势也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1286303_comment'></div>然党偏而方隅乱，说胜而白黑混，至使旁观不敢平论，后世不能分别，又足悲夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1286303_comment'></div>道甫既罢兴化而死，始道甫乐仙坛山北之原，即其葬焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1286303_comment'></div>外戚擅事累世，必其危汉者，刘向耳；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1286303_comment'></div>宦官擅事累世，必其亡唐者，刘蕡耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1286303_comment'></div>以穷乡素士，任百年复雠之责，余固谓止于二公而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1286303_comment'></div>彼舅犯、先轸识略犹不到，公子胜、新垣衍奚由知之！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1286303_comment'></div>余固谓春秋、战国之材无是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1286303_comment'></div>虽然，上求而用之者也，我待求而后用者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1286303_comment'></div>不我用，则声藏景匿而人不能窥；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1286303_comment'></div>必我用，则智运术展而众不能间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1286303_comment'></div>若夫疾呼而后求，纳说而后用者，固常多逆而少顺，易忤而难合也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1286303_comment'></div>二公之自处，余则有憾矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1286303_comment'></div>同甫称信州韩筋柳骨，笔研当独步，自谓不能及，又叹今日人材众多，求如道甫髣髴，邈不可得，盖亦指文墨少异者言之，犹前意也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1286303_comment'></div>今同甫书具在，芒彩烂然，透出纸外，学士争诵惟恐后，则既传而信矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1286303_comment'></div>道甫乃独无有，是信而不传也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1286303_comment'></div>鲍叔，管仲友也，鲍卑而管贵，美在叔也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1286303_comment'></div>王猛，薛强友也，王显而薛晦，过在强也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1286303_comment'></div>同甫得无以死后馀力引而齐之，使道甫亦传而信乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1286303_comment'></div>是以并志二公，使两家子弟刻于墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1286303_comment'></div>若世出，则碑阴叙焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1286303_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_66_1286303'>哦彼《黍离》，孰知我忧！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1286303_comment'></div>竭命殚力，其为宗周。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1286303_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_68_1286303'>嘉定十四年正月□日。</div><div id='poem_sentence_68_1286303_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1221&endYear=1221')">1221年2月</a>　二月，为施师点撰墓志铭。作品：故知枢密院事资政殿大学士施公墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286304' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286304' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286304?labeling=true' target='_blank'>故知枢密院事资政殿大学士施公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1221年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286304")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286304_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286304'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286304'>淳熙十五年，知枢密院事施公师点引疾辞位，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1286304", 1286304, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>逃宠</span>畏盈，敷露恳切。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286304_comment'></div>上疑讶，抑首蹙眉，请间谕公曰：「卿辅朕事已有绪，奈何欲弃朕」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286304_comment'></div>还其奏五六，公径出六和塔俟命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286304_comment'></div>上不得已，以为资政殿大学士，知泉州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286304_comment'></div>固辞州，提举洞霄宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286304_comment'></div>光宗内禅，诏曰：「卿，冲人旧学也，何以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1286304", 1286304, "Clauses/20/Comments/1")'>启告</span>朕」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286304_comment'></div>公即疏言：「今民贫兵馁，将愚而敌诈，虏惧有伏，宜熟察审处，使初元之政足以竦厉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286304_comment'></div>而陛下<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1286304", 1286304, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>心术</span>之微，又有当自谨者」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286304_comment'></div>知隆兴府，放逋赋十八万，达冤疏壅，微细必亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286304_comment'></div>半岁，复求去，不许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286304_comment'></div>绍熙三年二月乙未，薨于豫章，年六十九。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286304_comment'></div>口自为表谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286304_comment'></div>略曰：「念民情难保，监天命靡常，忧国势所可忧，用人材所当用」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286304_comment'></div>上览奏悲恻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286304_comment'></div>四年十一月戊寅，葬永丰县富成乡西塘山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286304_comment'></div>提举福建市舶椷来曰：「先人蒙国大恩，赠死恤孤，一用旧礼，阶崇二列，谥美正宪，盖哀荣略备矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286304_comment'></div>独墓道之碑未立，非敢慢也，有待而然」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286304_comment'></div>窃惟淳熙中，天下治安，天子恭己，群臣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1286304", 1286304, "Clauses/61/Comments/0")'>遵职</span>，中都官贵重，留久者尤幸甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286304_comment'></div>执政至十馀年，公一旦乞身不及顾，竟得请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286304_comment'></div>将行，遍谒朝士旧故，诸客送登舟，人人把手笑语，尽欢而别。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286304_comment'></div>行路聚观，咨叹倾挹，虽疏广、受无以尚之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286304_comment'></div>夫耽位败高节，怀禄失令名，然则縻于进者非公之志，而果于退者公之勇也，岂不贤哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286304_comment'></div>公字圣与，信州玉山人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286304_comment'></div>三世褒叙，安与少保，舜则太傅，实太师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286304_comment'></div>绍兴二十七年，太学上舍中第，教授复州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286304_comment'></div>魏国夫人终丧，王枢密纶欲以馆职荐，公曰：「父年高，迫近禄，人子私愿也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286304_comment'></div>无考任而躐华选，惧为侥倖之倡」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286304_comment'></div>教授临安府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286304_comment'></div>陈丞相康伯遂以馆职荐，召对，言：「顷中外人情急于得和，无故裂四郡奉虏，是欲和也，非欲久也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286304_comment'></div>陛下发愤，逐宰相谏官主议者，示以必战而后和可成，然犹未也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286304_comment'></div>因陈备虏五事，及他便宜甚众，曰：「如是则有备，备坚而和可久矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286304_comment'></div>故终孝宗世，以和为形，以备为实，虏卒不敢<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1286304", 1286304, "Clauses/117/Comments/0")'>背约</span>，策自公始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286304_comment'></div>授正字，兼圣政检讨校书郎，兼吴益王教授，国史编修官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286304_comment'></div>又言：「法为天下信，事为天下功，臣下争欲变法，各求立事，不参覈而遽从，已变遄复，暂立忽废，此功信所以隳，国权所以去也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286304_comment'></div>又言：「治盗贼当委牧守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286304_comment'></div>但责巡尉，何以禁暴」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286304_comment'></div>事多施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286304_comment'></div>公起疏外，论建朴率，不择深浅，而切机凑的，深中利害，虽老于台阁□□不能及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286304_comment'></div>上方向用，言者不乐，罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286304_comment'></div>主管崇道观，知筠州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286304_comment'></div>太师终丧，知池州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1286304_comment'></div>入奏：「今日用人未有毫发效，骤迁轻改，视职守如流」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1286304_comment'></div>上美其意，曰：「卿谦退靖重」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1286304_comment'></div>除秘书丞，考功郎官，国子司业，秘书少监，兼左谕德，中书舍人，兼右庶子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1286304_comment'></div>既升监，俄正知制诰，兼左庶子，礼部侍郎，进给事中，增詹事为二，兼焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1286304_comment'></div>在后省，言：「吴渊小人被劾，不可杂学士；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1286304_comment'></div>潘景圭无学法吏，不可权侍郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1286304_comment'></div>张说子荐赃败，不可收叙；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1286304_comment'></div>宋钧罢黜，不可真俸；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1286304_comment'></div>郭倪、李安礼他日一转九官，不可宣赞」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1286304_comment'></div>而明州民汪伋献稻万馀助赈恤，户部谓不应赏格，朝廷令须岁稔还之，亦极论其非。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1286304_comment'></div>使女真，班定，典仪以虏王子且至，退公位，公曰：「立已定，何退为」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1286304_comment'></div>屡请不改，白其相曰：「南大使不肯动」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1286304_comment'></div>王子竟徙他班，虏相与愕顾叹服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1286304_comment'></div>公初见上，固默许任属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1286304_comment'></div>及请乞户四等以下积欠，谓「非卿不闻此」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1286304_comment'></div>至引《书》「三宅三俊」，欲先重职事官之选，然后次补而上，皆有其人，为愈用愈不匮之术，则曰「公辅器也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1286304_comment'></div>及封駮不避，专对有守，益嗟异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1286304_comment'></div>郊祀，以备顾问，辇由侧升。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1286304_comment'></div>上念公魁伟，使陟降从御道，有司曰：「非故典也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1286304_comment'></div>遂诏卫士扶掖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1286304_comment'></div>于是人知上决意用公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1286304_comment'></div>十一年，除端明殿学士，签书枢密院事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1286304_comment'></div>其九日，兼参知政事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1286304_comment'></div>既而以参政同知枢密院，又知枢密院事，凡六载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1286304_comment'></div>与同列开陈上前，有不中理，未尝不反覆执谏，退无异言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1286304_comment'></div>上数劳勉曰：「异时宰相奏事，参署噤不一语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1286304_comment'></div>朕图回天下，日周遍常再三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1286304_comment'></div>卿尽言若此，真慰朕怀也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1286304_comment'></div>公益感励奋发，以薄聚敛、厚舍施为己任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1286304_comment'></div>大阅，出内藏钱激犒，而除其窠名为民病者六十万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1286304_comment'></div>罢昭州贡金，尽蠲经总制宿负钜亿万，而旱饥有一州放至六十万者，皆公所建白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1286304_comment'></div>户部立上供比较法，且请不待岁终行之，既画降，公力辨，遂追寝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1286304_comment'></div>至于宽释威怒，保护善良，鉴析<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_73_1286304", 1286304, "Clauses/257/Comments/0")'>材杰</span>，舒拔淹滞，上常目公，言一听可，至今人多称诵，而公不自以为德也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1286304_comment'></div>于时法度尊明，民物丰乐，公喟然曰：「以宠利居成功，古人之深戒也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1286304_comment'></div>决去不回，有识壮之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1286304_comment'></div>内行尤淳备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1286304_comment'></div>丧魏国，日侍太师，夜即墓庐以宿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1286304_comment'></div>丧太师，如魏国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1286304_comment'></div>任补先其侄，政府恩悉推与族人，裨穷乏有倒廪，助婚丧有倾橐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1286304_comment'></div>待人质而笃，处己约而裕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1286304_comment'></div>不鸣善以收誉，不衒荐以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_81_1286304", 1286304, "Clauses/283/Comments/0")'>市恩</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1286304_comment'></div>每谓诸子：「进退以义，士之节也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1286304_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_83_1286304", 1286304, "Clauses/287/Comments/0")'>枉道</span>干进，士之耻也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1286304_comment'></div>汝第戒之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1286304_comment'></div>子栝，上舍甲科，福建帅司干官；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1286304_comment'></div>枱，通判福州；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1286304_comment'></div>椷；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1286304_comment'></div>椐，通判沅州；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1286304_comment'></div>𣕄，通判抚州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1286304_comment'></div>婿刘仿，知南剑州；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1286304_comment'></div>赵汝谈，西外宗正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1286304_comment'></div>栝、枱、椐、仿，皆已卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1286304_comment'></div>孙沆，京西提举兼提刑通判；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1286304_comment'></div>汶，监蕲口镇；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1286304_comment'></div>洙，承务郎江陵县主簿；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1286304_comment'></div>浚，承务郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1286304_comment'></div>渷，瑞安县尉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1286304_comment'></div>洽，将仕郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1286304_comment'></div>濆，登仕郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1286304_comment'></div>而洙、浚亦已卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1286304_comment'></div>曾孙鉴、镃、雄、岘童、小大，馀未名，而镃、雄皆将仕郎也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1286304_comment'></div>余读公讲筵故事，审时所急，能因时正救而纳之于道；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1286304_comment'></div>东宫故事，择义所明，能先事豫防而引之于善；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1286304_comment'></div>及前后章奏累百数，大抵权实兼举，雅俗并伸，切而不偪，广而不缓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1286304_comment'></div>至于科举、制科之外，有安贫乐道、经明行修者，欲诏州郡特举而官之，则又未尝不大公之志，懿公之识，而惜其不遂相哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1286304_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_106_1286304'>迪惟阜陵，载竞载勤；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1286304_comment'></div>淳熙末年，求治愈新；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1286304_comment'></div>不自圣智，推贤其臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1286304_comment'></div>其臣施公，左右有民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1286304_comment'></div>文献举之，货财与之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1286304_comment'></div>泰道并包，勿猜沮之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1286304_comment'></div>严严庙谟，虚己以咨；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1286304_comment'></div>令如雷风，鼓舞四驰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1286304_comment'></div>我无上欺，上惟我信；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1286304_comment'></div>律吕必应，心手同运。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1286304_comment'></div>祈归<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_116_1286304", 1286304, "Clauses/362/Comments/0")'>故国</span>，草木华润；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1286304_comment'></div>世韪其退，有考其进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1286304_comment'></div>公既返止，帝亦禅止；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1286304_comment'></div>古称明良，毋或远止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1286304_comment'></div>幽堂久寂，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_120_1286304", 1286304, "Clauses/371/Comments/0")'>遗耀</span>未纪；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1286304_comment'></div>君臣之逢，以播来史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1286304_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_122_1286304'>嘉定十四年二月□日。</div><div id='poem_sentence_122_1286304_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1221&endYear=1221')">1221年3月</a>　李埴、曹叔远修复潼川府城，既毕役，请叶适撰修城记。作品：潼川府修城记。<div id='poem_1286152' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286152' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286152?labeling=true' target='_blank'>潼川府修城记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1221年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286152")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286152_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286152'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286152'>自李顺灭，蜀安乐到今，汉、唐不逮也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286152_comment'></div>然民离于兵久而膂力积销弱，地离于兵久而预防益<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1286152", 1286152, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>简薄</span>，及<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1286152", 1286152, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>奸豪</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1286152", 1286152, "Clauses/5/Comments/1")'>窥度</span>，则不足支仓猝有事之用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286152_comment'></div>近张福叛，逐制置，戕总领，剽杀纵横，吏或死或逃，无敢抗者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286152_comment'></div>已残利、遂，将及潼川。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286152_comment'></div>李公𡌴初命为牧，即疾驰至，与提刑曹公叔远，集义壮，倩西军，贼所从县镇加警，隍堞之毁塞亟治；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286152_comment'></div>投木隔炮，凡可以坏贼之具<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1286152", 1286152, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>宿设</span>；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286152_comment'></div>昼夜激厉，上下<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1286152", 1286152, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>同意</span>，誓必死守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286152_comment'></div>贼觇伺逡巡，知决不可犯，竟取他道而去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286152_comment'></div>嗟夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286152_comment'></div>不独保一郡也，乃<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1286152", 1286152, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>捍护</span>成都一路，功伐隐然，非智素讲，勇立断，安能接二百年<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1286152", 1286152, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>生养</span>使不失哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286152_comment'></div>既修城，门西牛头，高峭腾突，按《图志》，「相里贵据其上，攻城几破」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286152_comment'></div>二公谋曰：「城幸而得山，天遗我也，可委于敌而外求险耶」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286152_comment'></div>于是追改往谬，跨巅连趾，通合为一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286152_comment'></div>枝西溪之渠，循山而南，达于武江，弥霖骤潦，无奔湍蚀流焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286152_comment'></div>城尽甃巨石，创瓮城县门，敌窗蔽膝，并应<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1286152", 1286152, "Clauses/58/Comments/0")'>程法</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286152_comment'></div>东西行来，炜耀赩翕，猘酋沮气，狼子堕魄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286152_comment'></div>时公兄壁镇遂宁，亦修城，复夏鲁奇旧迹，役费倍数十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286152_comment'></div>非修也，筑新城也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286152_comment'></div>夫改往谬于未及，复旧迹于垂坠，非艰危之际所能行也，公弟兄行乎哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286152_comment'></div>且其生兵速练，阙械速补，所以支仓猝有事之用而为久长无事之备者，将非素讲立断而然欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286152_comment'></div>绍兴后，竭巴、益奉边将，吴曦因以反，剑关、栈阁真缩手矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286152_comment'></div>宜若耕塞下，令戍士足食，内地择要害自为守，其伦理渐次，必由二城始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286152_comment'></div>夫李，执政近臣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286152_comment'></div>曹，亦东南之望也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286152_comment'></div>一日会于朝，以虑一州者为蜀虑，以虑蜀者为天下虑可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286152_comment'></div>嘉定十四年三月。</div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1286152_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1221&endYear=1221')">1221年4月</a>　四月，为门人寿春知县宋驹撰墓志铭。作品：宋厩父墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286305' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286305' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286305?labeling=true' target='_blank'>宋厩父墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1221年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286305")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286305_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286305'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286305'>宋驹，字厩父，自宣献公后，事见其父《峡州志》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286305_comment'></div>时诸儒以观心空寂名学，徒默视危拱，不能有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1286305", 1286305, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>论诘</span>，猥曰「道已存矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286305_comment'></div>君固未信，质于余。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286305_comment'></div>余为言学之本统，古今<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1286305", 1286305, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>伦贯</span>，物变终始，所当究极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286305_comment'></div>忽昂然负载，如万斛舟；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286305_comment'></div>如食九奏，大牢先设而醯酱不遗；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286305_comment'></div>如赐大宅，百室皆备，从门而入也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286305_comment'></div>识益增，智愈长，千岁前成败是非之迹，纠结者条理，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1286305", 1286305, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>郁闇</span>者昭灼，破竹<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1286305", 1286305, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>迎判</span>乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286305_comment'></div>伐柯睨远乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286305_comment'></div>常掩卷叹曰：「世孰能为我师」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286305_comment'></div>家居，或尽一史，露抄雪纂，踰月不出门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286305_comment'></div>野宿，或专一经，山吟水诵，兼旬不返舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286305_comment'></div>每与余言，自谓乐甚，非人所知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286305_comment'></div>且其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1286305", 1286305, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>趋舍</span>不同流，知奚用为！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286305_comment'></div>盖余友如君比不过数人尔，数年间相继死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286305_comment'></div>悲夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286305_comment'></div>无以寄余老矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286305_comment'></div>君殁嘉定十三年五月丙申，年六十二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286305_comment'></div>十二月己未，夫人黄氏，子永孙，婿任献可，即山阴县承务乡之陈坞葬焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286305_comment'></div>一女，未行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286305_comment'></div>孙曰慧孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286305_comment'></div>君有科第四十年，任徽州司户，知寿春县，其为两浙转运帐司，六部架阁文字，淮西总领所，浙西提刑司干官，皆不赴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286305_comment'></div>余尝考次<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1286305", 1286305, "Clauses/65/Comments/1")'>洙、泗</span>之门，不学而任材者，求也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286305_comment'></div>遗学而求道者，参也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286305_comment'></div>学而近于名者，商也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286305_comment'></div>学而近于利者，师也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286305_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286305_comment'></div>余无以命之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286305_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_1286305'>以为诚好学，则孔氏之所称，颜回而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286305_comment'></div>以为非好学，则天下之滔滔，又将谁是！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286305_comment'></div>咨尔后人，勿怠勿止，尚君之似！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286305_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_31_1286305'>嘉定十四年四月□日。</div><div id='poem_sentence_31_1286305_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1221&endYear=1221')">1221年5月30日</a>　五月三十日，友人永嘉薛叔似卒于家，叶适撰祭文。作品：祭薛端明文。<div id='poem_1286361' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286361' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286361?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭薛端明文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1221年5月30日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286361")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286361_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286361'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286361'>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286361_comment'></div>视不以目而明，听不以耳而聪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286361_comment'></div>譬巧射之百发，岂劳思乎彀中！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286361_comment'></div>由天分之素高，与性会而俱崇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286361_comment'></div>故乐广约言而能以理服物，徐傅善论而不以学为功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286361_comment'></div>蚤名重于淳熙，翕多士其并宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286361_comment'></div>欢独悟与众得，皆自余之启蒙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286361_comment'></div>彼建安之裁量，外永嘉而弗同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286361_comment'></div>幸于公而无疑，亦莫知其所从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286361_comment'></div>噫道术之难明，非专智之可穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286361_comment'></div>虽弗同其奚害，公胡恃以自容！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286361_comment'></div>伟凤雏之挺出，贯千载而兼通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286361_comment'></div>悲<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1286361", 1286361, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>霍霍</span>以先逝，遂悽悽而奄终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286361_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286361_comment'></div>方谏垣之始合兮，谓礼乐之皆可举，何<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1286361", 1286361, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>师干</span>之晚试兮，乃时命之不吾与！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286361_comment'></div>位暂伸而志屈，神尚完而形沮，每相从于一丘，付万事于无语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286361_comment'></div>耆老都尽，寂寥谁主，我但孤存，有陨如雨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1286361_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1221&endYear=1221')">1221年5月</a>　五月，为薛叔似作挽词。作品：薛端明挽词两首。<div id='poem_80046' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_80046' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/80046?labeling=true' target='_blank'>薛端明挽诗二首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1221年5月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_80046")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_80046_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_80046'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_80046'>可但补阙名官日，不逢引裾强谏时。<div id='poem_sentence_0_80046_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_80046'>上朝有疏天常纳，下殿无行谁独疑。<div id='poem_sentence_1_80046_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_80046'>论道何如出纶晚，督军颇叹封侯迟。<div id='poem_sentence_2_80046_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_80046'>凌烟画手今寂寞，豆蒄林高荔子垂。<div id='poem_sentence_3_80046_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_80046'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_80046_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_80045' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_80045' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/80045?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1221年5月）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_80045_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_80045'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_80045'>冰稼初融阙月沉，英豪四坐地炉深。<div id='poem_sentence_0_80045_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_80045'>争看麈尾频挥处，难了朱弦未尽音。<div id='poem_sentence_1_80045_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_80045'>怪我轻谈当世事，知公默会古人心。<div id='poem_sentence_2_80045_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_80045'>空山稳对梅花宿，错向林逋墓里寻。<div id='poem_sentence_3_80045_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_80045'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_80045_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1221&endYear=1221')">1221年5月</a>　五月，代薛叔似撰遗表。作品：代薛端明上遗表。<div id='poem_1285842' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1285842' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1285842?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代薛端明上遗表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1221年5月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1285842")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1285842_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1285842'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1285842'>臣闻不可移者，有生之定数；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1285842_comment'></div>不能泯者，将死之遗忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1285842_comment'></div>尚忍须臾，愿殚悃愊<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1285842_comment'></div>伏念臣奋身孤远，逢世<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1285842", 1285842, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>熙平</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1285842_comment'></div>孝宗圣德愈新，超居谏职；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1285842_comment'></div>陛下大明始照，擢忝从官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1285842_comment'></div>荏苒岁年，驱驰中外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1285842_comment'></div>谕上指于帅漕未和之际，宣国威于汉虏既隙之馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1285842_comment'></div>书殿升华，政途窃宠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1285842_comment'></div>深惭非据，不敢<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1285842", 1285842, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>冒当</span>；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1285842_comment'></div>迄荷隆慈，许从晚退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1285842_comment'></div>岩栖穴处，未尝不戴于尧天；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1285842_comment'></div>气尽形销，无复再瞻于舜日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1285842_comment'></div>入冥已迫，恋阙空多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1285842_comment'></div>伏望皇帝陛下，法泰道之裁成，体乾行之变化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1285842_comment'></div>灼见<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1285842", 1285842, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>物则</span>，不失义理之中；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1285842_comment'></div>审知治原，常以仁恕为本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1285842_comment'></div>永膺大宝，益迈昌图。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1285842_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1221&endYear=1221')">1221年5月</a>　五月，为姜处度撰墓志铭。作品：朝奉大夫知惠州姜公墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286306' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286306' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286306?labeling=true' target='_blank'>朝奉大夫知惠州姜公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1221年5月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript:
