ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286306")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286306_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286306'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286306'>君名处度，字容之，仕南康尉，鄱阳丞，知随、清流二县，通判南雄州，守惠州而卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286306_comment'></div>绍熙二年十月二十二日，年五十六。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286306_comment'></div>三年正月辛酉，祔于临海西溪东奥山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286306_comment'></div>君在南康，屡缚巨寇，不自言功，监司异之，名由此起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286306_comment'></div>惠州有母讼子者，从容著狴中，日引出与语，发明慈孝，更相感动，意终不置于法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286306_comment'></div>归舟过其家，母迎拜，谢曰：「儿能事我矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286306_comment'></div>闻者以为庶几古人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286306_comment'></div>特练吏术，得其隐奸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286306_comment'></div>如款司善出入人罪，宜同推吏厚给禄，胥徒赀产中役者，当先罢而后募，皆人所未知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286306_comment'></div>君七子三女，而以盛强之年丧夫人龚氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286306_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1286306", 1286306, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>阃阈</span>素严，户外绝行迹，夜设灯火，相对教书史，课纺织，皆有成立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286306_comment'></div>而君萧然一榻，终死无姬媵，人服其清。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286306_comment'></div>姜氏，淄州长山人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286306_comment'></div>姜，齐姓也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286306_comment'></div>淄，齐郡也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286306_comment'></div>田常既篡齐，旧公族浮沈邑里，千馀年不再见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286306_comment'></div>《繇》称「有妫之后，将育于姜」，竟夺而王之，岂师尚父、桓公之烈而遂无传哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286306_comment'></div>君七世祖沼，始为右赞善大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286306_comment'></div>沼子昭范，经行最高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286306_comment'></div>弟遵，被遇天圣中，至枢密副使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286306_comment'></div>宋丞相郊言：「汉以豪杰徙姜氏天水，后叶复贯淄右」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286306_comment'></div>李翰林淑亦言：「由汉阳徙淄川，再为甲姓」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286306_comment'></div>按《史》、《汉》，徙齐诸田于关中，无姜氏徙者；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286306_comment'></div>蜀姜维、唐姜谟虽出天水，不载其所从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286306_comment'></div>二公<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1286306", 1286306, "Clauses/76/Comments/0")'>博通</span>古事，其徙天水及后世徙而复还，殆必有据依而云也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286306_comment'></div>昭范子从简，用副枢密任将作监主簿，不肯仕，范文正公备礼邀请，亦不往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286306_comment'></div>从简子希颜，知雍邱县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286306_comment'></div>希颜子筠，通判全州，是为曾祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286306_comment'></div>筠子仲谦，有文名，著《乐书》百卷，终广东运副。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286306_comment'></div>君父诜，以吕丞相颐浩世姻忤秦桧，迟于吴十四年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286306_comment'></div>高宗既叹其屈，而孝宗尤器其材，遂擢工部侍郎，宝文阁直学士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286306_comment'></div>君继善承德，宜其世家，身苦而志约，事集而能显。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286306_comment'></div>子注，知邵武军，本规矩，服宪令，治行甚脩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286306_comment'></div>余尝为寮，知其贤也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286306_comment'></div>姜氏盛矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286306_comment'></div>故《诗》曰「必齐之姜」；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286306_comment'></div>与周并称，故传曰「虽有姬、姜」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286306_comment'></div>然自小白卒，齐无令侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286306_comment'></div>故孔子谓民无得而称焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286306_comment'></div>而二惠、栾、高以亢没恭，非庇其宗者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286306_comment'></div>然则民之去姜而归陈，岂舜使之哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1286306_comment'></div>君与父祖，起寂寥息歇之后，贵近赫奕，八世相接，皆有称述，过于先君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1286306_comment'></div>盖惟贤可以不失其世，惟仁可以益大其后尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1286306_comment'></div>方家长山时，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_43_1286306", 1286306, "Clauses/131/Comments/0")'>甲馆</span>上腴，几半一县，患难漂泊，旅于台州，不克自返。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1286306_comment'></div>悲夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1286306_comment'></div>余固忧夫云海岛屿之间，浸远而忘，则后生晚出不复知其为齐之姜也，故详录之以遗注焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1286306_comment'></div>注，长也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1286306_comment'></div>曰郊，知馀杭县；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1286306_comment'></div>曰邽，监沙市镇；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1286306_comment'></div>曰郯，曰郛，曰邹，皆先卒；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1286306_comment'></div>曰酂，今为承信郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1286306_comment'></div>婿曰知华亭县陈鋾，监杂卖场门赵汝鉴，签判南康军詹怀祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1286306_comment'></div>孙曰霆，曰安祖、和祖、弥大、充实、弥壮、仁实、迩逊、智实、梦实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1286306_comment'></div>孙婿曰黄钟，承奉郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1286306_comment'></div>曰陈泂，将仕郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1286306_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_55_1286306'>太公表东海，齐都古临淄；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1286306_comment'></div>绵绵百世下，子孙未尝离。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1286306_comment'></div>枢密佐真宗，侍郎贵淳熙；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1286306_comment'></div>有美惠州牧，迈善与家宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1286306_comment'></div>励我清苦志，绝彼骄吝疵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1286306_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_60_1286306", 1286306, "Clauses/173/Comments/0")'>素风</span>落朱荣，旅葬台之湄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1286306_comment'></div>长山蔚故垄，何时复言归！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1286306_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_62_1286306'>嘉定十四年五月□日。</div><div id='poem_sentence_62_1286306_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1221&endYear=1221')">1221年6月</a>　六月，为叶文翁作诗并文。作品：叶路分居思堂。<div id='poem_79941' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_79941' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/79941?labeling=true' target='_blank'>叶路分居思堂二首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1221年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_79941")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_79941_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_79941'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_79941'>叶媪开新学，同人饭野蔬。<div id='poem_sentence_0_79941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_79941'>明经传一相，考古付三馀。<div id='poem_sentence_1_79941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_79941'>苔色迷<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_79941", 79941, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>青简</span>，虫文蚀素书。<div id='poem_sentence_2_79941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_79941'>君能葺遗址，堂宇胜于初。<div id='poem_sentence_3_79941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_79941'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_79941_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_79942' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_79942' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/79942?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1221年6月）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_79942_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_79942'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_79942'>苦说诸梁后，簪缨富远孙。<div id='poem_sentence_0_79942_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_79942'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_79942", 79942, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>白袍</span>虽屡捷，黄榜未沾恩。<div id='poem_sentence_1_79942_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_79942'>淡沱磨冰砚，萧条倚帐门。<div id='poem_sentence_2_79942_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_79942'>嗟余忝宗末，老病不堪论。<div id='poem_sentence_3_79942_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_79942'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_79942_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_79942'><span class='label'>按：</span>（叶文翁再荐不中第驻兵永嘉暇日必从予游博闻善论而恂恂众人中无异寒士初卫国夫人黄氏君之五世妣丞相颙高祖也少而嫠居建义学以教后进丞相既贵以为夫人之报焉君因义学故基作居思堂请予赋之嘉定十四年六月）<br /></div><div id='poem_note_79942_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1221&endYear=1221')">1221年7月</a>　七月，除宝谟阁直学士，提举凤翔府上清太平宫，请辞。作品：辞免除宝谟阁直学士提举凤翔府上清太平宫状。<div id='poem_1285856' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1285856' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1285856?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辞免除宝谟阁直学士提举凤翔府上清太平宫状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1221年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1285856")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1285856_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1285856'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1285856'>闻命殊常，省躬<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1285856", 1285856, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>震越</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1285856_comment'></div>盖臣子年耄而食贫，上所矜闵，则为之改祠赋禄，所以示恩也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1285856_comment'></div>至于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1285856", 1285856, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>超进</span>职名，宠光荣耀，将以为劝，则非德进而业广，不在兹选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1285856_comment'></div>某颓龄暮景，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1285856", 1285856, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>贫病交迫</span>，伏蒙至仁，曲加怜念，特畀祠官；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1285856_comment'></div>所宜祗服恩私，俯偻拜受，无敢后矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1285856_comment'></div>恭惟先帝大训，华阁秘藏，学士寓直，最为清近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1285856_comment'></div>而某志行凋落，问学空殚，性与年徂，材随老尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1285856_comment'></div>傥若贪荣冒处，不知<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1285856", 1285856, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>自引</span>，是彰圣朝滥予之过，而非所以为劝也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1285856_comment'></div>伏望钧慈特赐敷奏，令某止仍旧职，寅奉新祠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1285856_comment'></div>所有宝谟阁直学士恩命，乞赐寝免，不胜俟命之至！</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1285856_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1221&endYear=1221')">1221年7月</a>　请辞未准，有谢表。作品：谢除宝谟阁直学士提举凤翔府上清太平宫表。<div id='poem_1285836' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1285836' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1285836?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢除宝谟阁直学士提举凤翔府上清太平宫表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1221年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1285836")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1285836_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1285836'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1285836'>帝典近而易遵，皇居亲而愈切。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1285836_comment'></div>超踰次对，启沃前旒，顾惭衰迈之踪，难副知怜之厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1285836_comment'></div>伏以鉴观<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1285836", 1285836, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>治忽</span>，审择后先，大化所覃，右文为盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1285836_comment'></div>藏奎图之府，建自太宗；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1285836_comment'></div>直学士之官，置从景德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1285836_comment'></div>逮兹列圣，并焕鸿名；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1285836_comment'></div>分命诸儒，递升<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1285836", 1285836, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>华序</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1285836_comment'></div>博达今古，从容规讽之间；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1285836_comment'></div>先识几微，补报职业之外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1285836_comment'></div>臣力耕朽壤，勤凿<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1285836", 1285836, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>枯泉</span>，空有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1285836", 1285836, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>胼手胝足</span>之劳，曾无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1285836", 1285836, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>曝背食芹</span>之献。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1285836_comment'></div>忽进陪于阁职，复严奉于仙灵，浅陋则多，润色奚赖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1285836_comment'></div>此盖恭遇皇帝陛下，同天造化，与世范围，万物睹圣而作新，一毫皆上所成就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1285836_comment'></div>存留宿旧，闵惜馀残；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1285836_comment'></div>非必选贤，示将假宠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1285836_comment'></div>臣敢不寅恭异数，夕惕茂恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1285836_comment'></div>待满今祠，终偿晚岁乞身之愿；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1285836_comment'></div>试寻末学，少殚平生致主之忠。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1285836_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1221&endYear=1221')">1221年7月</a>　七月，撰文记录连州开峡。作品：连州开楞伽峡记。<div id='poem_1286153' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286153' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286153?labeling=true' target='_blank'>连州开楞伽峡记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1221年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286153")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286153_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286153'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286153'>湟水会众流，东南束两崖，湍怒激跃，势倾百里，舟行必踰峡矣，然后喜无患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286153_comment'></div>夫山水之险，亦所在而有，此固其著名者耶！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286153_comment'></div>嘉泰二年，崖坠壅水，高者数十丈，下者百馀尺，雨不时霁，则溪谷倒注横溢，航楫不通，估货不行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286153_comment'></div>嘉定庚辰，太守杨侯㮤始至，岁适大潦，城邑吞没，漫为湖海，四顾叹曰：「州素薄，监司未有意，将孰弭兹祸」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286153_comment'></div>转运判官刘侯强学，闻而矍然，亟举两司八百万实其费。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286153_comment'></div>是冬，遂命司法李华、郡人张浩大议疏凿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286153_comment'></div>华巧思强力，侯专任不疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286153_comment'></div>易者劝趋，难者募应，小石繂运，大石镵落，上以火攻，下以堰取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286153_comment'></div>馀隐石黯黯平流中尚数处，工不知所为，华创巨灵凿，贯木百钧，捣之糜碎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286153_comment'></div>春且半，石之为水害者尽平，舟自番禺来城下，群川众壑，各得所归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286153_comment'></div>老稚聚观喜极，或泣曰：「连始复为郡矣」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286153_comment'></div>按《书》「随山浚川」，所以合天人同愿，勤功茂伐，最为繁悉，而远莫能详也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286153_comment'></div>及梁山<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1286153", 1286153, "Clauses/57/Comments/0")'>颓陀</span>，重人乃以国君当自贬损，不敢言修治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286153_comment'></div>其他仆陵摧阜，骇闻异见，史氏所录，盖多有之，而终不言某能开导，某能攻除，以还其旧者，岂其逸而不传耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286153_comment'></div>抑敬而不敢，亦若重人之所谓耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286153_comment'></div>虽然，以今峡视之，舍而不治，则一州废矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286153_comment'></div>夫忽人患而不加恤，慢天灾而苟自恣，二过孰愈？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286153_comment'></div>今夫杨侯惨怛而仁，刘侯果毅而明，而又得属如李君，奔走毕力，以出连人于涂炭之苦，此岂非天人之所同愿欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286153_comment'></div>未几，侯迁提举常平，二公方萃处，余庆其能为所部捍患致利，民必被赐矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286153_comment'></div>嘉定十四年七月。</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1286153_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1221&endYear=1221')">1221年7月</a>　七月，为门人陈耆卿之母撰墓志铭。作品：陈处士姚夫人墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286307' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286307' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286307?labeling=true' target='_blank'>陈处士姚夫人墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1221年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286307")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286307_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286307'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286307'>余求近世文人可以继元祐并称者，得陈君耆卿，既叙而信之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286307_comment'></div>然窃怪与君壤地同，乡里接，何昔未闻而今始见也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286307_comment'></div>岂非特立独出，不系于家门耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286307_comment'></div>君俛而不肯，久乃言曰：「吾胄出太邱长寔，从婺徙台，贻范、贻序，著名神宗朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286307_comment'></div>二大父并、宾，皆儒先生，传数十世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286307_comment'></div>吾父讳炳，字叔明，吾母姚氏，亦临海儒家，人谓嫁娶适当也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286307_comment'></div>吾父之学勤矣，载籍累万数，易惑难统，众所怠忽而必尽力焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286307_comment'></div>其致思深矣，根萌不能达于枝叶，派流不能复于源本，则不已焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286307_comment'></div>其研味外之味乐矣，竹阁之寂寥，雪风之寒清，不以告人而人亦莫之扣也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286307_comment'></div>其艺业敏矣，经义词赋，人擅其一而疏，我兼其二而工也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286307_comment'></div>其教人之功用捷矣，昏能使明，懦能使强，锐者抑，画者进，时吾亦旁立，常曰：『谨识之，勿惰也』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286307_comment'></div>于是吾母以俭治贫，而吾父忘其不足也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286307_comment'></div>以豫治猝，而亲宾疑其有馀也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286307_comment'></div>左腕乳褓，右手缝缉，男以冠，女以笄，而不知其生育之为素狭也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286307_comment'></div>悲夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286307_comment'></div>岂在人者不可期耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286307_comment'></div>春秋<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1286307", 1286307, "Clauses/58/Comments/0")'>小比</span>，吾父无不高选，而三岁荐士，乃不一用，岂在天者不可期耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286307_comment'></div>庆元之丁巳，吾父年才五十二，而以八月十四日卒矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286307_comment'></div>子一而女四，贫窭<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1286307", 1286307, "Clauses/67/Comments/0")'>迫猝</span>，尤甚于吾父在时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286307_comment'></div>于是吾母终以俭治，而不使其子之无依也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286307_comment'></div>终以豫治，而不使其女之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1286307", 1286307, "Clauses/72/Comments/0")'>无归</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286307_comment'></div>且吾父之训必曰『师友于古』，吾母之诲必曰『视汝父』，曾谓可独立特出乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286307_comment'></div>士志于利，家门何有！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286307_comment'></div>不然，不肖孤惧不任矣，谓不系于家门亦非也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286307_comment'></div>虽然，吾有憾焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286307_comment'></div>父夭而母寿，几养之有施也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286307_comment'></div>不幸嘉定庚午，吾母五十九耳，五月之九，亦不克寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286307_comment'></div>是人与天果皆不可期，而吾无以地上为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286307_comment'></div>故子虽误于论，而吾父开说焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286307_comment'></div>木可抱也，亦可踣也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286307_comment'></div>山可絙也，亦可谷也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286307_comment'></div>惟铭罔极也，所以示家门之重而父母训诲之流泽也，子傥有意乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286307_comment'></div>余既愧其言，又考其乡大夫之状，则知叔明<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1286307", 1286307, "Clauses/102/Comments/0")'>未艾</span>，而乡人固尚其德矣，不独以文称也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286307_comment'></div>叔明既亡，而姚夫人固代之教矣，不独以家能也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286307_comment'></div>然则所谓未闻者，余寡陋之罪尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286307_comment'></div>昔司马迁、班固<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1286307", 1286307, "Clauses/110/Comments/1")'>称述</span>父业，皆不借他手，君不自援笔，而余何敢！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286307_comment'></div>盖叔明葬以己未八月十四日，姚夫人葬以辛未十二月庚申。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286307_comment'></div>婿曰何革、姚衍、吴梦龄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286307_comment'></div>耆卿，从事郎，教授舒州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286307_comment'></div>孙男女各三人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286307_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_40_1286307'>义诚之乡，戏龙之山；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1286307_comment'></div>陈氏自古，族冢居间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1286307_comment'></div>吁嗟叔明！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1286307_comment'></div>手栽桧杉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1286307_comment'></div>卬须室人，一往不还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1286307_comment'></div>独遗厥子，翠竹孔鸾；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1286307_comment'></div>其文烂烂，永也不刊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1286307_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_47_1286307'>嘉定十四年七月□日。</div><div id='poem_sentence_47_1286307_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1221&endYear=1221')">1221年7月</a>　七月，撰门人孟导墓志铭。作品：孟达甫墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286308' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286308' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286308?labeling=true' target='_blank'>孟达甫墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1221年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286308")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286308_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286308'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286308'>孟导，字达甫，从其兄学于余。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286308_comment'></div>葑门幽寂，红药被野如菜，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1286308", 1286308, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>俊流</span>数十，论杂捷起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286308_comment'></div>良甫酬接甚简，时然后言；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286308_comment'></div>达甫尤简，或终席不一语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286308_comment'></div>众谓良甫以道自命，当尔，犹未测达甫所至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286308_comment'></div>余间与偶坐，则<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1286308", 1286308, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>纵言</span>细民疾苦，田里愁叹，吏贤不肖，无一不中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286308_comment'></div>侧听者皆服，知其于时事最精切也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286308_comment'></div>监昆山镇，金华丞，干办浙东提举司公事，通判临安府，整棼割蠹，职务大起，诸使及同僚<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1286308", 1286308, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>交誉</span>争荐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286308_comment'></div>或言「资敏明，弊山讼海皆究微」，或言「性孤洁，丝馈缕谒不逮门」，且曰「戚家后壸有人焉」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286308_comment'></div>遂为将作簿军器，大理丞，迁正，知严州临江军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286308_comment'></div>每将议择材能臣理剧繁事，未尝不在选中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286308_comment'></div>然达甫老，退食闲居，隐几嘘㗳，验学有常业，讲德有常友，以财聚为讳，以察冤为急，诘奸无枝叶之滥，得情无钩距之巧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286308_comment'></div>或以为是大儒先生所为，非吾所谓材者，故虽常在选中，而卒亦不果用也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286308_comment'></div>夫事虽材而后集，然必挠材以赴事；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286308_comment'></div>材虽事而后显，然必生事以示材：此常人之同患，非知道者不能免也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286308_comment'></div>今夫达甫能养其材而不困于事，因于事而不过其材，则庶几古人之意矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286308_comment'></div>在金华，浚培塘陂八百三十，役夫二十万，劝相慰勉而已，无扑罚也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286308_comment'></div>严州时，山潦屡浸<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1286308", 1286308, "Clauses/67/Comments/0")'>屋极</span>，水突扉，则舟楫具，茇舍备，糗粮给，民迁如归，忘其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1286308", 1286308, "Clauses/73/Comments/0")'>垫昏</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286308_comment'></div>耶律裕治城壁于六合，厚遇新附者，军人不悦，妄称总管细作也，大噪，脔食尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286308_comment'></div>招讨郭倪胁裕子臣友上之大理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286308_comment'></div>达甫曰：「囚笔楷著行黏纸皆匀同，此习本也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286308_comment'></div>果得诬枉状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286308_comment'></div>韩侂胄诛，堂后官五人，给舍以为当<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1286308", 1286308, "Clauses/87/Comments/0")'>随坐</span>，达甫承推，争曰：「以随为权则信，以随为反则非。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286308_comment'></div>请先罢」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286308_comment'></div>吏竟免死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286308_comment'></div>达甫之材，不困于事如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286308_comment'></div>会子减贱不行，曰：「必子母相权而后可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286308_comment'></div>店铺抑兑，盐贾科贴，乃流通浅术，不用也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286308_comment'></div>治临江以俭，交货燕贿皆削去，通判挟所重亟沮止，终不听，曰：「为之诡遇岂不能，恐事过吾材尔」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286308_comment'></div>既连黜两州，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1286308", 1286308, "Clauses/111/Comments/0")'>世味</span>益薄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286308_comment'></div>知南康，自列亲嫌不往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286308_comment'></div>改江阴军，未上卒，嘉定十三年七月二十七日，年六十一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286308_comment'></div>孟氏墓于无锡富安乡，山曰梧桐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286308_comment'></div>十四年四月庚申，夫人丁氏，子从政郎扬州录事参军继勋、文林郎继勤、修职郎监临安府都税院继勇，葬达甫墓东五里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286308_comment'></div>幼子、一孙未名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286308_comment'></div>初，大父信安郡王，父特进，浮寄<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1286308", 1286308, "Clauses/128/Comments/0")'>侨处</span>，箧无留藏，窖无积陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286308_comment'></div>达甫兄弟，瘦僮羸马，仅免徒步，视贵豪不万一比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286308_comment'></div>余始授以齐民治生法，酸寒枯落，岁縻月累，然后粗立田宅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286308_comment'></div>畏公上，尊法令，里社节腊，宾亲邂逅，恩意倾洽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286308_comment'></div>戒其子曰：「昔宣仁简录我先后以继涂姒，遭家多难，再兴宋室，俯仰百年，而隆祐之泽远矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286308_comment'></div>若等衣食其力，无敢齿八姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1286308_comment'></div>仕必由平进，学必依<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1286308", 1286308, "Clauses/153/Comments/0")'>癯儒</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1286308_comment'></div>粗粝适口而膏粱疏，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_42_1286308", 1286308, "Clauses/155/Comments/1")'>毳褐</span>附身则绮纨赘矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1286308_comment'></div>诸子敬奉教，从进士，贡有司，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_43_1286308", 1286308, "Clauses/159/Comments/0")'>入孝出悌</span>，朝经暮史，闾巷之间循循焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1286308_comment'></div>然则孟氏方进而未已欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1286308_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_45_1286308'>以为道耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1286308_comment'></div>既许其兄，达甫事耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1286308_comment'></div>亦道之行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1286308_comment'></div>事来而理，事往而止；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1286308_comment'></div>合不伤物，离不丧己。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1286308_comment'></div>世方用我，谢曰不能；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1286308_comment'></div>我所甚难，功利刑名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1286308_comment'></div>信安维坟，已南无北；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1286308_comment'></div>尚其素风，梧桐之侧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1286308_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_54_1286308'>嘉定十四年七月□日。</div><div id='poem_sentence_54_1286308_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1221&endYear=1221')">1221年9月</a>　九月，为门人赵蹈中撰文。作品：茶陵军减苗置寨记。<div id='poem_1286154' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286154' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286154?labeling=true' target='_blank'>茶陵军减苗置寨记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1221年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286154")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286154_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286154'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286154'>茶陵中县，十比衡阳三四。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286154_comment'></div>绍兴初，以其旁午广、虔诸郡，寇贼所见伏，故建军升使，示有蕃卫而强其县，所以安利一路也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286154_comment'></div>嘉定初，又以其直韶州，千里无官司，雠杀不忌，寇贼辄发，故裂三乡别置酃邑，戍及水口，蕃卫尤密，遂废军罢使而弱其县，亦所以安利一路也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286154_comment'></div>虽然，安利一路，视令材何如，不在县强弱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286154_comment'></div>今昔异规，未知孰是，而茶陵则有二患：兵移于新邑，无卫民不安；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286154_comment'></div>赋移于新邑，重输民不利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286154_comment'></div>经数令，至卢君子及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286154_comment'></div>君虽有字养之方，制御之略，顾事已坏，欲挽回，得哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286154_comment'></div>余友赵蹈中，转漕湖南，察而怜之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286154_comment'></div>蹈中明果肃怛，右良锄奸，捕劾罗天锡等罪<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1286154", 1286154, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>不道</span>以上，论如律，取其租石三千八百，补茶陵之缺正足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286154_comment'></div>卖财物贯三万四千，立古云巡检，永食七十人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286154_comment'></div>然后亩之增税者尽除，夫之荷粮者悉免，官急借而先期者偿之，户穷乏而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1286154", 1286154, "Clauses/51/Comments/0")'>殿负</span>者贷之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286154_comment'></div>营圃初成，弓矢初张，习教有晨，部分有容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286154_comment'></div>上下感悦，斗讼<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1286154", 1286154, "Clauses/57/Comments/0")'>稀省</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286154_comment'></div>炎帝庙、孔子学及尉署久敝，加整治功坚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286154_comment'></div>旧潦衢淖巷，沟而隆之，街石粲然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286154_comment'></div>刷比岁焚劫之丑，还百年富盛之乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286154_comment'></div>蹈中爱君材有馀，又荐于朝，力无不尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286154_comment'></div>民既幸其私我，相率来告曰：「必记是不忘」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286154_comment'></div>夫始议必详，横恩难再，若分遣丞佐，迭受民词，不亦简而易行乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286154_comment'></div>奚别置为！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286154_comment'></div>业已析裂，饷挽失供，不并请乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286154_comment'></div>奚后患为！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286154_comment'></div>士兵捍其境，耕而后食，茶陵顷五千无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1286154", 1286154, "Clauses/83/Comments/0")'>遗莱</span>，旷土可寻乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286154_comment'></div>奚仰哺为！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286154_comment'></div>禹弼成五服，因物自然，安得巨亿之财为一县地哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286154_comment'></div>本蹈中意，欲以独厚茶陵者，遍惠所部耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286154_comment'></div>嘉定十四年九月。</div><div id='poem_sentence_27_1286154_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1221&endYear=1221')">1221年闰12月</a>　闰十二月，为杨愿撰墓志铭。作品：资政殿学士参政枢密杨公墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286295' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286295' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286295?labeling=true' target='_blank'>资政殿学士参政枢密杨公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1221年闰12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286295")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286295_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286295'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286295'>唐静恭坊杨氏尤贵盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286295_comment'></div>入本朝，至公七世，皆有显人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286295_comment'></div>由公而上，北海主簿符，都水使者曼，驾部郎中宿，皆以公赠东宫师保。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286295_comment'></div>公讳愿，字原仲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286295_comment'></div>宣和末，自太学录上书陈九事，女真闻其名，聘之北行，匿民间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286295_comment'></div>上书执政，请迎复元祐皇后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286295_comment'></div>奔济州，劝进，辟元帅府属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286295_comment'></div>高宗即位，授修职郎，仍学录。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286295_comment'></div>议将迁金陵，复上书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286295_comment'></div>幸扬州，御营使辟机宜文字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286295_comment'></div>丞新昌县，越州辟观察判官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286295_comment'></div>参政秦桧荐授枢密院编修官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286295_comment'></div>中绍兴二年进士第，迁计议官，召试馆职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286295_comment'></div>谗者谓公因元帅府得仕，则右选也，当罢，宰相赵鼎明不然，乃已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286295_comment'></div>主管崇道观，吴郡陈夫人丧免，除秘书郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286295_comment'></div>谗者犹在，通判明州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286295_comment'></div>潘良贵素善公，事常咨而后行，公亦为之尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286295_comment'></div>除秘书丞，监察御史，司封右司员外郎，起居舍人，兼中书舍人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286295_comment'></div>初修玉牒，以选命公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286295_comment'></div>除中书舍人，贺金人正旦，于是始用年号。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286295_comment'></div>兼侍讲，给事中，直学士院，接伴虏使完颜󰒣，于是始揖󰒣于淮中流，舟行以宾主为次，御筵口宣，设案拜舞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286295_comment'></div>南人骤睹旷礼，泣下沾襟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286295_comment'></div>除御史中丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286295_comment'></div>未几，除端明殿学士，签书枢密院事，兼权参知政事，时绍兴十四年十二月也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286295_comment'></div>十五年十月，御史论韩公裔，语微及公，即乞疏五上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286295_comment'></div>以端明提举太平观，知宣州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286295_comment'></div>玉牒书成，迁资政殿学士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286295_comment'></div>知建康府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286295_comment'></div>守郡四年，政以简，治以静，不数令，不兴役，刑罚罕用，谷麦滋熟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286295_comment'></div>二十二年十一月二十八日，薨于州，年五十二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286295_comment'></div>配曰永阳夫人王氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286295_comment'></div>公世家楚，吴郡之殁也，公葬之于越。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286295_comment'></div>二十四年二月七日，子右奉议郎、新江州通判祐，遂葬公会稽县五云乡之何山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286295_comment'></div>孙若干，某官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286295_comment'></div>孙女若干，婿某官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286295_comment'></div>公孝友宾睦，大祀恩，遍任兄弟及妹之子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286295_comment'></div>敬贤与善，后进单文独艺，礼待必均。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286295_comment'></div>始在太学，年尚少，文甚敏，行与文称，恂达而矩，严重而通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286295_comment'></div>祭酒杨时印信，诸生二千人皆伏受令，学禁齐肃，不敢踰越也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286295_comment'></div>论王安石学术之祸，精于元祐者不能过也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286295_comment'></div>分别徐处仁、吴敏、李纲功罪，无不曲当也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1286295_comment'></div>历指宣和致乱，靖康<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1286295", 1286295, "Clauses/124/Comments/0")'>弊风</span>，穷大极小，无不激烈也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1286295_comment'></div>又曰：「谋以活国者，国常存而身随之安；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1286295_comment'></div>谋以活身者，国常亡而身随之危。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1286295_comment'></div>今一举而迁金陵，求活身也，非活国也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1286295_comment'></div>虏既灭吾国矣，陛下将活其国以自存乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1286295_comment'></div>将活其身而国终于亡乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1286295_comment'></div>今盗贼满天下，随而为兵亦满天下，而天子侍卫乃不过三千。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1286295_comment'></div>非满二万，安能主令也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1286295_comment'></div>萧山户万九千，其九家自为守，万取千人为兵，方李抱真则损其十，方李德裕则加其百，通之天下，不胜兵矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1286295_comment'></div>夫酒税、房廊、头子、杂名之钱，皆漕计也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1286295_comment'></div>增取其三，别属经制，漕计甚缓，经制愈急。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1286295_comment'></div>善良穷蹙，奸猾怨愤，仓猝之变，何必唐建中哉」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1286295_comment'></div>前后累数万言，文武大略，经纬条理，远有贾、陆遗思，近有欧、苏新意，时材不能及也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1286295_comment'></div>宰相以为州县常人耳，不顾省，桧独首荐，登于朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1286295_comment'></div>及赵、张更迭重任，士徒步拔引，翕忽鼎贵，然亦不能用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1286295_comment'></div>桧卒用之，起秘书丞，数年预政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1286295_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1286295_comment'></div>公之不幸，桧之幸也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1286295_comment'></div>在《易》之《颐》，所以为颐者初也，贤也，而以自养为吉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1286295_comment'></div>四者颐之颠也，而以所养为吉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1286295_comment'></div>夫养必以正而不以应，古人之戒深矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1286295_comment'></div>桧能用公而公为桧用，此明于颐者所以为公惜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1286295_comment'></div>虽然，余有疑焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1286295_comment'></div>桧归自虏，人皆曰：「请立赵宗也，许还母后也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1286295_comment'></div>又曰：「收悍将也，总<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_65_1286295", 1286295, "Clauses/198/Comments/1")'>利柄</span>也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1286295_comment'></div>天下望桧与赵、张等，而或以为过之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1286295_comment'></div>士游其门与赵、张等，而未有以为不及也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1286295_comment'></div>张丞相罢，高宗问：「代卿者桧乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1286295_comment'></div>张不对。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1286295_comment'></div>固问，则曰：「近与共事，方觉其闇」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1286295_comment'></div>上曰：「然则赵鼎也」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1286295_comment'></div>张惘然不知所出，而秦与赵、张之憾不可解矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1286295_comment'></div>夫同在<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_73_1286295", 1286295, "Clauses/215/Comments/0")'>廊庙</span>，徒晚觉于十年之后；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1286295_comment'></div>公疏远也，而责其蚤觉于十年之先乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1286295_comment'></div>岂公自以为上九之由颐，而明于颐者特未之及耶！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1286295_comment'></div>公卒后六十馀年，㮤持其家传泣曰：「善实者有徵也，故述有据；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1286295_comment'></div>世异者无党也，故笔无私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1286295_comment'></div>子奚舍诸」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1286295_comment'></div>公尝赋《东山三叠》，其词曰：「云溯风而上征兮，鸟择木而高翔」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1286295_comment'></div>然则公择之者欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1286295_comment'></div>故并次以为铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1286295_comment'></div>若夫阳为喷饭，玩也，公不为玩也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1286295_comment'></div>留其表弟，厚也，公为厚也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1286295_comment'></div>其差误鄙浅，不足复辨也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1286295_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_85_1286295'>东山之久兮孰为征？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1286295_comment'></div>东山之高兮谁实登？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1286295_comment'></div>一周、孔之誉慕兮，百共、鲧之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_87_1286295", 1286295, "Clauses/246/Comments/1")'>怨憎</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1286295_comment'></div>失类而行，道远且艰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1286295_comment'></div>人有其宝，不如何山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1286295_comment'></div>瞻彼何山，言树之麓；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1286295_comment'></div>豹文而隐，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_91_1286295", 1286295, "Clauses/254/Comments/0")'>龟寿</span>而伏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1286295_comment'></div>瞻彼何山，言息其巅；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1286295_comment'></div>星不离经，水皆涤源。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1286295_comment'></div>绣裳萧萧，白璧沈沈；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1286295_comment'></div>揭兹墓门，五云之深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1286295_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_96_1286295'>嘉定十四年闰十二月。</div><div id='poem_sentence_96_1286295_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1221&endYear=1221')">1221年</a>　为钱氏撰墓志铭。作品：钱氏墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286290' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286290' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286290?labeling=true' target='_blank'>夫人钱氏墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1221年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286290")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286290_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286290'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286290'>同年刘使君，与余素旧，其守永嘉，常减骑数出，支坐熟语，良乐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286290_comment'></div>一日，忽悽然洒涕而称曰：「吾母临海钱氏，三王之孙也，而以儒显。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286290_comment'></div>外妣早丧，祖曰：『家事惟女之任』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286290_comment'></div>事益理矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286290_comment'></div>然而舅若姨皆曰：『恩我者姊也』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286290_comment'></div>故为女而孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286290_comment'></div>吾父信书而已，至生业，则曰：『惟尔母之听』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286290_comment'></div>业益进矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286290_comment'></div>然而伯叔娣姒各有承禀，不自己出也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286290_comment'></div>故为妇而顺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286290_comment'></div>诸子方携抱，所习经皆口授，不以烦师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286290_comment'></div>其从师质讯反覆，曰：『某善也，某未善也』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286290_comment'></div>师不敢慢，子不敢惰，赖以有立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286290_comment'></div>故为母智而明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286290_comment'></div>凡此略皆实行，不敢增损云也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286290_comment'></div>不幸以绍熙辛亥卒，明年而葬于黄岩县龙鸣山，三十年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286290_comment'></div>然而哀不止，悲不释，何谓也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286290_comment'></div>吾母卒时寿八十矣，兄允元不及仕，允迪定海丞，弟允武吴江簿，而允济掌教婺州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286290_comment'></div>甚哉，年之高，养之薄也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286290_comment'></div>今不肖孤忝母馀泽，有迹于朝，假使者节从二千石后，而亲不吾待矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286290_comment'></div>一朝之荣，聚菌也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286290_comment'></div>一饷之禄，稊米也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286290_comment'></div>于吾母不加毫末。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286290_comment'></div>若夫宰木<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1286290", 1286290, "Clauses/62/Comments/0")'>岑翳</span>，山云兴伏，而阙不以铭，斯则罪之大者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286290_comment'></div>是故深惨惩痛而谒于子，不知泪之横臆也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286290_comment'></div>余不识夫人，而识其夫曰承务郎讳祐，兼力众善，笃学至老，不以家自浼者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286290_comment'></div>识允迪，厚而敏；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286290_comment'></div>识允武，果而通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286290_comment'></div>若使君信道执德，终始不变，则固余畏友矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286290_comment'></div>异术而同材，异用而同方，非毓其源而疏之，曷至是！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286290_comment'></div>夫人之贤，信矣夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286290_comment'></div>盖允元之记曰：「必求精于理，邃于文者」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286290_comment'></div>噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286290_comment'></div>理，本也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286290_comment'></div>文，末也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286290_comment'></div>余不精其本，安邃其末！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286290_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_36_1286290'>葬也久，铭始有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286290_comment'></div>德成于先，论定于后。</div><div id='poem_sentence_37_1286290_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1221&endYear=1221')">1221年</a>　为黄章撰墓志铭。作品：黄观复墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286309' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286309' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286309?labeling=true' target='_blank'>黄观复墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1221年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286309")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286309_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286309'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286309'>承事郎提领所干办公事黄章字观复，余友礼部尚书名度仲子，检身一以正，不中于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1286309", 1286309, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>规矩绳墨</span>，不行也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286309_comment'></div>与人一以恕，不著于亲和爱敬，不止也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286309_comment'></div>讲学必于师友，不足以达于道德性命，不求也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286309_comment'></div>应事必于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1286309", 1286309, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>法义</span>，虽足以通于变故仓猝，不用也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286309_comment'></div>父母信之，兄弟顺之，乡党朋友皆悦而训之，乐其宽而畏其严，慕其广而遵其俭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286309_comment'></div>久而乡大夫国人又皆允之，将进矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286309_comment'></div>嘉定十三年正月初八日，卒官下，年五十五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286309_comment'></div>十四年十二月壬申，葬小江尚书墓侧百馀步。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286309_comment'></div>夫人谢氏，先卒，再曰赵氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286309_comment'></div>子元护，承务郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286309_comment'></div>元真，通仕郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286309_comment'></div>二女子，未行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286309_comment'></div>弟准来请铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286309_comment'></div>按昔无铭人三世者，疑未听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286309_comment'></div>准曰：「不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286309_comment'></div>铭吾父祖以及吾兄，一于善而已，非三也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286309_comment'></div>读是铭者，悲吾兄以及吾父祖，一于善而已，非三也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286309_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286309_comment'></div>余果不祥耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286309_comment'></div>黄氏果不幸耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286309_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_1286309'>人乎观复永百秋！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286309_comment'></div>斗揭岳伫江河流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286309_comment'></div>天乎观复岂其仇！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286309_comment'></div>声灭影绝何所游？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286309_comment'></div>怛哉铭乎炯厥幽！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286309_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_1286309'>嘉定十四年十二月□日。</div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1286309_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1222&endYear=1222')">1222年</a>　是年，转通议大夫，仍奉祠居家，著述讲学。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1222&endYear=1222')">1222年1月1日</a>　正一月一日，宁宗受“恭膺天命”玉宝于大庆殿，大赦天下，叶适上贺表。作品：受玉宝贺表。<div id='poem_1285844' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1285844' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1285844?labeling=true' target='_blank'>受玉宝贺表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1222年1月1日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1285844")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1285844_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1285844'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1285844'>恭睹诏书，元正日受玉宝者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1285844_comment'></div>天运重来，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1285844", 1285844, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>国宝</span>再得，感深昔念，喜甚今逢<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1285844_comment'></div>恭以圣宋，一道相承，九有率俾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1285844_comment'></div>琢雕信玺，膺受隆图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1285844_comment'></div>西祀东封，借曰著神休于炳炳；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1285844_comment'></div>继志述事，于以见孝德之兢兢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1285844_comment'></div>变或隐而难防，理无往而不复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1285844_comment'></div>窃何止于阳虎，获乃自于蒙人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1285844_comment'></div>憬彼远夷，慕仁风而愿献；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1285844_comment'></div>特因方镇，转诚意以上通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1285844_comment'></div>兼陈样册之文，益彰篆籀之实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1285844_comment'></div>以至初秦永昌之刻，我家备物之珍，殆无或遗，靡不具在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1285844_comment'></div>亶明德而密护，迄假手以回还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1285844_comment'></div>皇帝陛下，师古以治身，奉先而缵服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1285844_comment'></div>何<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1285844", 1285844, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>食息</span>不存于祖业，曾斯须敢怠于孙谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1285844_comment'></div>宜上穹之鉴临，挈东州而归附。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1285844_comment'></div>敬致<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1285844", 1285844, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>邦符</span>之旧，光昭帝命之新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1285844_comment'></div>群辟会同，有司<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1285844", 1285844, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>枚进</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1285844_comment'></div>江、淮<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1285844", 1285844, "Clauses/42/Comments/1")'>延颈</span>，望基本之常安；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1285844_comment'></div>关、洛倾心，想恩荣之遍及。</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1285844_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1222&endYear=1222')">1222年1月</a>　正月，上皇后贺笺。作品：受玉宝贺笺。<div id='poem_1285845' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1285845' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1285845?labeling=true' target='_blank'>受玉宝贺笺</a><span class='authorDate'>（1222年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1285845")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1285845_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1285845'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1285845'>副袆是御，洪惟内治之彰明；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1285845_comment'></div>玉宝来归，信矣外戎之助顺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1285845_comment'></div>慰满民望，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1285845", 1285845, "Clauses/5/Comments/1")'>契合</span>天心<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1285845_comment'></div>恭惟皇后殿下，德静而方，仁润以泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1285845_comment'></div>绶黄赤以受玺，文与帝同；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1285845_comment'></div>服浣濯以俭躬，志先妇道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1285845_comment'></div>宜致家邦之庆，聿观符瑞之还，喜协宸衷，荐孚郊庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1285845_comment'></div>臣欣逢盛典，陪阻<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1285845", 1285845, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>近班</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1285845_comment'></div>赵璧今回，无复间行而衣褐；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1285845_comment'></div>鲁宝再得，尚堪泚笔以书经。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1285845_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1222&endYear=1222')">1222年1月</a>　正月，撰东阳吴葵墓志铭。作品：修职郎监和剂局吴君墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286310' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286310' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286310?labeling=true' target='_blank'>修职郎监和剂局吴君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1222年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286310")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286310_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286310'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286310'>郭氏父子兴于学，余记述已详。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286310_comment'></div>同时吴君文炳学尤壮，给费广。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286310_comment'></div>兰溪徐畸字叔范，弓两斛，力射命中，文得欧、曾<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1286310", 1286310, "Clauses/7/Comments/1")'>笔外法</span>，莫有知者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286310_comment'></div>吴君独备礼，请主学，趣诸子敬事，畸由此显名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286310_comment'></div>金华唐仲友，字与正，博学宏词，著作郎，知台州，江西提刑，吴君亦尽礼请，一旦挈生员百馀应聘至，远近惊愕，不意其为吴君屈也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286310_comment'></div>悲夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286310_comment'></div>士亦何常哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286310_comment'></div>《易》曰：「虎视耽耽，其欲逐逐，无咎」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286310_comment'></div>世有能操养士之柄，而恣其衣食之求，则威望自尊，而士<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1286310", 1286310, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>靡靡</span>从之，何咎之有！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286310_comment'></div>君名葵，字景阳，文炳长子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286310_comment'></div>自曾祖臻、祖杲，雄于东阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286310_comment'></div>君既以学佐其父，所讲必儒术，所行必善意，俦经汇史，豪俗痛改。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286310_comment'></div>外弟傅寅，字同叔，博通古书，特有隐趣，君严事如师，逊爱如兄，多出资用<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1286310", 1286310, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>纪理</span>其家，相与终身，不失尺寸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286310_comment'></div>淳熙大荒札，匝其居数十里，养生丧死，廪无留陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286310_comment'></div>补歙县西尉，通山簿尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286310_comment'></div>建炎后，尉无公署。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286310_comment'></div>访遗址，发私钱更造。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286310_comment'></div>益募兵，教军律如素熟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286310_comment'></div>民逋负，缧于县庑，复以私钱贷输，曰：「后勿尔」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286310_comment'></div>皆驩呼听命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286310_comment'></div>摄大冶县，慕其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1286310", 1286310, "Clauses/72/Comments/0")'>德声</span>，不言而化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286310_comment'></div>差监和剂局，叹曰：「吾本无进心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286310_comment'></div>前十年仅免盗亡匿，今又十年当嘉定丁丑，七十三矣，方欲办药良苦，奈何」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286310_comment'></div>其长亦阴为所亲地，故使食祠庙禄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286310_comment'></div>买地孤山下，将遂留止，有寒疾而归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286310_comment'></div>九月某日，族人并集，扶床遍视，曰：「珍重」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286310_comment'></div>乃瞑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286310_comment'></div>初，君爱水白潭之原，曰：「以是葬我」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286310_comment'></div>后四年正月某日，竟掩棺焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286310_comment'></div>娶陆氏、宗氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286310_comment'></div>子敬子、鲁子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286310_comment'></div>婿陈黻、陈桂、曹弼、汤康年、鄂州教授胡似。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286310_comment'></div>孙兴庆、嘉庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286310_comment'></div>君之父，智能知徐，力能致唐，宜铭也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286310_comment'></div>君能厚于傅，乐成其名，宜铭也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286310_comment'></div>君好善而喜游，意有不适，短棹独往，一览数州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286310_comment'></div>余仕江、淮间，君辄来握手，匆匆饭数匕径去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286310_comment'></div>问其所为，笑而不答。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286310_comment'></div>然则非游也，其中有所存，不偶于世而寄焉尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286310_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_39_1286310'>以财活人，以儒活身；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286310_comment'></div>谓仁不富，虎也妄云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1286310_comment'></div>山樵水渔，耕道猎德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1286310_comment'></div>视余此铭，仁者之获。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1286310_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_43_1286310'>嘉定十五年正月□日。</div><div id='poem_sentence_43_1286310_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1222&endYear=1222')">1222年1月</a>　正月，为门人黄岩戴木之父戴丁撰墓志铭。作品：戴佛墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286311' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286311' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286311?labeling=true' target='_blank'>戴佛墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1222年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286311")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286311_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286311'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286311'>嘉定中，黄岩戴木以诗集句见，爱其意正，留与寀居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286311_comment'></div>目不流盼，足以窘步，敛身降首，惟书之徇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286311_comment'></div>于是父丁年七十二矣，有上气疾，疾已复至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286311_comment'></div>俄又疾作，芒屦夜发，及门而丁殁，十四年四月丁巳也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286311_comment'></div>哭既卒，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1286311", 1286311, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>摄衰</span>复至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286311_comment'></div>明年犹未行，余累趣之，木曰：「二月壬寅，葬日也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286311_comment'></div>繁昌乡戴奥，葬地也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286311_comment'></div>必得铭行矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286311_comment'></div>木言：「人未有不渔猎贫弱以求富强者，怨谤近而易感，故业不永，命不长；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286311_comment'></div>虽暂永长，众不谓是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286311_comment'></div>木之先，高洵曦，曾舜文，及祖秉器，关市调直，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1286311", 1286311, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>铢龠</span>必平，不平宁弃与，里人同辞赞重曰：『嘻，此佛也』！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286311_comment'></div>先人继之，无改其度，亦曰：『嘻！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286311_comment'></div>此佛也』！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286311_comment'></div>佛者，里人尊敬之极称也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286311_comment'></div>我不诳彼，彼故诚我，虽不渔猎而富强之道存焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286311_comment'></div>然而人力为彼不为此，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286311_comment'></div>族祖垕无子，以木弟栝为子，久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286311_comment'></div>会其亲从有子，先人曰：『彼当立』，使栝亟归，垕惊泣曰：『彼雠也，委吾财于壑，焉用』？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286311_comment'></div>尽立卖契以畀我，先人不听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286311_comment'></div>垕竟自费之，十一付其雠，示不绝而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286311_comment'></div>从父澹，病且死，子始一岁，叹曰：『托孤幼莫如吾兄华父』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286311_comment'></div>华父，先人字也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286311_comment'></div>举家赀半，请弟栩为之子，先人曰：『不受，无以安吾弟』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286311_comment'></div>澹死，妻邱能寡，爱其子如己出，先人曰：『是庶几矣』，即以券还邱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286311_comment'></div>二产直皆馀万缗」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286311_comment'></div>昔孟轲有食羹形色，千乘好名之论，夫始不以一胾动其心，多则变矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286311_comment'></div>王介甫语苏子瞻曰：「『行一不义，杀一不辜，而得天下，不为也』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286311_comment'></div>人必知此而后可以有为矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286311_comment'></div>苏公笑曰：「较半年磨勘，虽杀人为之也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286311_comment'></div>王公不能答。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286311_comment'></div>噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286311_comment'></div>彼固公卿之箪食豆羹欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286311_comment'></div>若夫二产之获，则匹夫之千乘已，君非好名而能不取，岂非贤哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286311_comment'></div>娶毛氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286311_comment'></div>子楷、木、栝、栩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286311_comment'></div>女嫁内舍生毛仁厚、曾建大；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286311_comment'></div>幼未行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286311_comment'></div>孙宜老、双老、大老、冲老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286311_comment'></div>孙女二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286311_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_39_1286311'>始由信立，一钱不欺；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286311_comment'></div>终以义断，万金不私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1286311_comment'></div>岂无长林，何必高冈！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1286311_comment'></div>棣华连理，伯季<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_42_1286311", 1286311, "Clauses/123/Comments/0")'>同藏</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1286311_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_43_1286311'>嘉定十五年正月日。</div><div id='poem_sentence_43_1286311_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1222&endYear=1222')">1222年2月</a>　二月，为友人卫湜撰写藏书记。作品：栎斋藏书记。<div id='poem_1286155' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286155' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286155?labeling=true' target='_blank'>栎斋藏书记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1222年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286155")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286155_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286155'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286155'>余友卫君湜，清整而裕，淡泊而详，酷嗜书，山聚林列，起栎斋以藏之，与弟兄群子习业于中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286155_comment'></div>夫其地有江湖旷逸之思，圃有花石奇诡之观，居有台馆温凉之适，皆略不道，而独以藏书言者，志在于学而不求安也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286155_comment'></div>又其自以为栎者，真无用于世矣，非<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1286155", 1286155, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>退托</span>而云也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286155_comment'></div>按孔安国皇名《坟》，帝名《典》，尧、舜在焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286155_comment'></div>然《书》称「若稽古」四人，高辛而上无预也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286155_comment'></div>《说命》曰「学于古训乃有获」，不知说所谓古何时也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286155_comment'></div>六世之籍不存矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286155_comment'></div>以子华子考之，不可训明甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286155_comment'></div>然则所谓古者，唐、虞以后尔，故孔子于羲、昊之前，亦缺弗讲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286155_comment'></div>若夫讨礼而尊天子，正乐以黜诸侯、大夫，《春秋》修而不作，《诗》、《书》因其旧，无所更定，世儒往往未能明也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286155_comment'></div>司马迁创本纪、世家，史法变坏，遂不可复；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286155_comment'></div>老、庄推虚无冲漠，正道隳裂，遂不可合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286155_comment'></div>孙、吴以狙诈祖兵制，申、商以险刻先治道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286155_comment'></div>若夫言语之缛为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1286155", 1286155, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>辞章</span>，千名百体，不胜浮矣，韩、欧虽挈之于古，然而益趋于文也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286155_comment'></div>经传之流为注疏，俚笺臆解，不胜妄矣，程、张虽订之于理，然而未几性也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286155_comment'></div>凡此皆出孔氏后，节目最大，余所甚疑，而君所藏皆具有焉，盖君之力良难而任良重矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286155_comment'></div>问学之要，除之又除之，至于不容除；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286155_comment'></div>尽之又尽之，至于不容尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286155_comment'></div>故称钧石必以铢，会亿万必以一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286155_comment'></div>读虽广，不眩也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286155_comment'></div>记虽博，不杂也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286155_comment'></div>日融月释，心形俱化，声色玩好，如委灰焉，然后退于栎而进于道矣，固宜漏众美而以书言也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286155_comment'></div>宝装绮籍，不敢触手，金匮石室，犹存其人，兹外欤，非内欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286155_comment'></div>嘉定十五年二月。</div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1286155_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1222&endYear=1222')">1222年3月</a>　三月，为门人湖州知州赵希苍撰文。作品：湖州胜赏楼记。<div id='poem_1286156' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286156' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286156?labeling=true' target='_blank'>湖州胜赏楼记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1222年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286156")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286156_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286156'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286156'>凡城邑据江海陂泽之胜，皆即以为赏，盖物常聚于大矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286156_comment'></div>吴兴三面切太湖，涉足稍峻伟，浸可几席尽也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286156_comment'></div>然四水会于霅溪，镜波蓝浪，梁梠动摇，而靓妆袨服之倒影，互为散合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286156_comment'></div>众流放于荷叶浦，沈清浮渌，凫鹄栖止，而绮荷文蓼之罗生，无有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1286156", 1286156, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>际畔</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286156_comment'></div>特岭联亘，巧石<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1286156", 1286156, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>绵络</span>，颇抑湖之重势而蔽遮其寒风，故其人意安而气和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286156_comment'></div>舸经舫纬，艇绘艓缕，细声窈眇，豪唱激越，宛转一州间，随地而胜，随胜而赏，无不得所求，具区虽大，不暇观也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286156_comment'></div>夫岂娱于耳目之狭者易徇，而迪于心志之广者难亲耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286156_comment'></div>亦其神灵爽异所独钟，彼虽大而此不小也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286156_comment'></div>《国风》废，王道息，柳恽以《江南曲》名于时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286156_comment'></div>古之采蘋，筥盈而釜熟，荐于大宗，礼至敬也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286156_comment'></div>主于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1286156", 1286156, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>少女</span>，教至行也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286156_comment'></div>恽之《采蘋》，徒咏而已，其思荡，其志淫，岂《召南》本指哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286156_comment'></div>然而词人<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1286156", 1286156, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>艺士</span>，争共誇述，郡之胜赏，由是而始，敞堂奥馆，益盛于今。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286156_comment'></div>太守赵君，既新白蘋亭，复楼于侧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286156_comment'></div>其言曰：「清风水遁，碧澜山隐，兼之者斯楼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286156_comment'></div>力能见湖而不为者，民方与我游于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1286156", 1286156, "Clauses/62/Comments/0")'>丽密</span>之内，我不敢与民纵于青冥之外也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286156_comment'></div>虽然，以道讲民，见湖可哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286156_comment'></div>白居易论谢、柳乐山水，多高情，不闻善政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286156_comment'></div>按史，恽守吴兴，前后十年，其政清静，吏民所怀，病去而乞留千馀人，居易偶不详也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286156_comment'></div>政在平，平在久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286156_comment'></div>加以不倦，瘠土可使沃，穷阎可使富，况蒲鱼丰衍，明山媚水，素称胜绝乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286156_comment'></div>君初至，损税直，增学廪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286156_comment'></div>亲不葬，女不嫁，废疾无医，死无敛棺，皆助之恐不及，可谓有志矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286156_comment'></div>惜其暂不得久，近惠而未及远利也，故录以次恽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286156_comment'></div>君名希苍，字汉英。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286156_comment'></div>嘉定十五年三月。</div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1286156_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1222&endYear=1222')">1222年6月</a>　六月，友人刘光祖卒，有祭文。作品：祭刘阁学文。<div id='poem_1286365' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286365' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286365?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭刘阁学文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1222年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286365")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286365_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286365'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286365'>公副杂端，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1286365", 1286365, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>奏效</span>岂多，从余楚宫，樽酒笑歌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286365_comment'></div>其为二史，述作未久，我适馈师，再见京口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286365_comment'></div>比三召之，余卧不闻，竟复改命，不得至门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286365_comment'></div>道之合离，古云有数，惜哉匆匆，徇彼长路！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286365_comment'></div>仰有茂木，俯有清泉，既老而休，乐以永年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286365_comment'></div>公初秉德，维蜀之望，德成而尊，四海顺向。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286365_comment'></div>凡今善人，与夫志士，无不相吊，简溪亡矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286365_comment'></div>人生如赘，何计往来，我亦行死，孰为公哀。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1286365_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1222&endYear=1222')">1222年6月</a>　六月，友人李壁卒，有祭文。作品：祭李参政文。<div id='poem_1286363' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286363' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286363?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭李参政文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1222年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286363")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286363_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286363'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286363'>昔公预政，转攲为平，黼扆一去，岷峨几程。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286363_comment'></div>天蕴良谟，发于妙龄，逮兹退藏，愈励愈明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286363_comment'></div>今所未知，古所已行，方略部分，如将使兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286363_comment'></div>百家粗残，全取粹精，一代文献，得其纪承。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286363_comment'></div>予日深伫，鼎餗再羹，刲割既坏，拨扶将兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286363_comment'></div>奈何一朝，长隔死生！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286363_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1286363", 1286363, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>呜呼哀哉</span>！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286363_comment'></div>道之方消，不可禄荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286363_comment'></div>蘋苇摇曳，猿鹤逢迎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286363_comment'></div>或泣不歌，或饮不酲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286363_comment'></div>展转其间，奚置品评。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286363_comment'></div>一念未泯，独公弟兄，特于东南，片善寸能，颊舌匪誉，肺肠与并。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286363_comment'></div>哀今无有，士失倚凭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286363_comment'></div>老我何用，叩胸血零！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286363_comment'></div>空留故书，熠熠满縢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286363_comment'></div>黄河北流，大江东倾，此酒远溯，涌溢公庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286363_comment'></div>神尚挹彼，毋我或醒。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1286363_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1222&endYear=1222')">1222年6月</a>　六月，为友人临海王梦龙之妻撰墓志铭。作品：赵孺人墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286312' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286312' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286312?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赵孺人墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1216年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286312")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286312_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286312'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286312'>嘉定十四年九月丙午，王梦龙葬其妻于临海县重晖乡石门真如山，使来告曰：「妇贵，夫所倚也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286312_comment'></div>夫富，妇所安也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286312_comment'></div>此固世俗与宗室为婚者之常也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286312_comment'></div>赵氏家及中外，皆王公将相，贵盛矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286312_comment'></div>然我士人，义不倚为重；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286312_comment'></div>而又贫，不能使之安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286312_comment'></div>方<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1286312", 1286312, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>总髻</span>已出，远京师且千里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286312_comment'></div>其室处，市僦而僧假；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286312_comment'></div>其衣食，斗储而尺聚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286312_comment'></div>我试，迭胜负无虑数十，每时睽岁隔，彼儿字女育，突然成长，我有未及知者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286312_comment'></div>然此亦士人妻之常也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286312_comment'></div>赵氏忘其为贵宗室女，乐其为贫士人妻，见桑而求蚕，行田而学稼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286312_comment'></div>巷婆里嫂，偶坐无怍色；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286312_comment'></div>疏翁族姆，却立无惰容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286312_comment'></div>葵糈<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1286312", 1286312, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>瓠菹</span>，枯羸仅足，而名人胜士邂逅集语，辄重觞累俎，殷勤劝劳，客惊喜留连不忍去也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286312_comment'></div>其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1286312", 1286312, "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>规虑</span>深密，以力自致，必将成我为士人家，而今已矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286312_comment'></div>余观近世惟西桥宗室女有贤行，择对多士人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286312_comment'></div>儒先生子弟有挈之太学者，能敬夫，何止如宾，诸生皆自以其家不及也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286312_comment'></div>夫麟趾，信厚公子也，未见公女也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286312_comment'></div>君名汝议，字履巽，由父池州而上为濮国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286312_comment'></div>嫁王氏，卒年三十九。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286312_comment'></div>于是梦龙自太常簿通判婺州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286312_comment'></div>二子，毅，洪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286312_comment'></div>三女，长婿监严州比较务赵崇陶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286312_comment'></div>君母王氏，校书郎道女，寺簿姑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286312_comment'></div>校书有两姓诗礼之泽，故其甥皆以文字擅名于世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286312_comment'></div>寺簿幼而英发，池州独奇爱，谓似六哥，故以君归之，卒用克苦立王氏家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286312_comment'></div>余尝谓智能兼南北之俗者，必大其门，盖收敛损约，根本也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286312_comment'></div>疏达朗畅，枝叶也：合而成德，家道具焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286312_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_1286312'>《需》险当前，《震》笑居后；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286312_comment'></div>载烝载释，靡登靡豆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286312_comment'></div>曰夫奚悲，噫艰尔思！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286312_comment'></div>曰子奚肯，噫教之永！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286312_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_33_1286312'>嘉定十五年六月日。</div><div id='poem_sentence_33_1286312_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1222&endYear=1222')">1222年</a>　门人陈耆卿代吴守上书叶适求铭。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1223&endYear=1223')">1223年1月</a>　一月，除敷文阁学士，提举南京鸿庆宫，乞致仕。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1223&endYear=1223')">1223年1月</a>　一月，除宝文阁学士，转正议大夫。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1223&endYear=1223')">1223年1月20日</a>　一月二十日，公夙抱气疾，骤发动，薨于正寝，享年七十四。遗表上，赠光禄大夫，谥文定。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1223&endYear=1223')">1223年4月25日</a>　四月二十五日，叶适子宣、寀等奉叶适柩葬于永嘉开元观之原，门人赵汝铎填讳。门人孙之弘等来会葬。程珌、魏了翁、刘宰、刘克庄、陈耆卿、吕皓、吴子良等有祭文和挽词。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1223&endYear=1223')">1223年10月</a>　十月，叶适次子叶寀，编次《习学记言序目》五十卷，嘱门人孙之弘作序。<br /></div>
-----end



-----title
乐清
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='fb95adacdd41450499e35020fd8f05a8_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("fb95adacdd41450499e35020fd8f05a8");'><span id='fb95adacdd41450499e35020fd8f05a8_link'
