href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1165&endYear=1165')">1165年</a>　在温州乐清县白石北山小学舍执教谋生。与净慧院僧择饶为方外之交。间从黄氏父子垂钓。结识王十朋门人叶士宁，相与论学。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1166&endYear=1166')">1166年</a>　在乐清白石北山小学舍执教。八月，温州遇台风水灾。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1167&endYear=1167')">1167年</a>　仍在乐清白石北山小学舍执教，结交台州黄岩县林鼐、林鼒兄弟，论学游处。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='42f90c1e6edf4da7874d0a085d42802f_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("42f90c1e6edf4da7874d0a085d42802f");'><span id='42f90c1e6edf4da7874d0a085d42802f_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1176&endYear=1176')">1176年</a>，27岁</div><div id='42f90c1e6edf4da7874d0a085d42802f' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在乐清雁荡山僧舍，丁希亮来受学。戴许、蔡仍、王汶诸人来学，似亦在本年。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>与陈亮通信。作品：致陈亮第十七函。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>春夏之间，致书吕祖谦。作品：与吕丈书。<div id='poem_1285865' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1285865' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1285865?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与吕丈书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1176年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1285865")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1285865_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1285865'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1285865'>春初因章端叟到婺，草草附一书，计须呈彻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1285865_comment'></div>自后缺便，弗获嗣遣，实劳詹问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1285865_comment'></div>中夏届时，伏惟雠校雍容，神相万福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1285865_comment'></div>某授徒僧舍，凡百粗遣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1285865_comment'></div>应酬虽无观书之暇，然亦胜索居也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1285865_comment'></div>去冬之书，辄自陈道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1285865_comment'></div>大抵以乍出坑谷，忽见天地日月，不觉<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1285865", 1285865, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>欣跃</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1285865", 1285865, "Clauses/17/Comments/1")'>惊诧</span>，过于高快。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1285865_comment'></div>自接报赧，益用力其间，乃知天地尽大，日月尽明，缉熙工夫无有穷已，其智愈崇，其礼愈卑，向时平实之语，乃今始知味矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1285865_comment'></div>更惟有以进之，不胜颙俟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1285865_comment'></div>同志林百顺，依君举兄为学，志况颇坚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1285865_comment'></div>平时愿叩门墙而不可得，想今已获趋拜，当蒙与进也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1285865_comment'></div>末由亲承，临风耿耿！</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1285865_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
金华（婺州）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='70c1e4051ebc46ccbe51467c2403b8e1_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("70c1e4051ebc46ccbe51467c2403b8e1");'><span id='70c1e4051ebc46ccbe51467c2403b8e1_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1168&endYear=1169')">1168-1169年</a>，19-20岁</div><div id='70c1e4051ebc46ccbe51467c2403b8e1' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1168&endYear=1168')">1168年</a>　春夏间，离开乐清游学婺州，曾上书薛季宣求教学问，并因生活困难要求相助。约是年，与陈亮相识，后为知交。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1169&endYear=1169')">1169年</a>　游学婺州，居学生张垓家中。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='9d55fe1e5a554de4aa3e5e5102ff137f_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("9d55fe1e5a554de4aa3e5e5102ff137f");'><span id='9d55fe1e5a554de4aa3e5e5102ff137f_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1175&endYear=1175')">1175年</a>，26岁</div><div id='9d55fe1e5a554de4aa3e5e5102ff137f' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1175&endYear=1175')">1175年</a>　仲秋，重游婺州，与陈亮相聚。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='79ada060675c4969bb3797770e20af75_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("79ada060675c4969bb3797770e20af75");'><span id='79ada060675c4969bb3797770e20af75_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1181&endYear=1181')">1181年</a>，32岁</div><div id='79ada060675c4969bb3797770e20af75' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1181&endYear=1181')">1181年7月29日</a>　七月二十九日，吕祖谦卒于金华家中，叶适有祭文，并至金华会葬。陈亮、潘景愈等欲以叶适为吕学传人，叶适辞谢。作品：祭吕太史文。<div id='poem_1286319' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286319' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286319?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭吕太史文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1181年7月29日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286319")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286319_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286319'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286319'>维淳熙八年十月二十九日，门人文林郎、新差武昌军节度推官叶适谨以清酌庶羞之奠，敬祭于近故主管直阁大著郎中一丈先生之灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286319_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286319_comment'></div>语何必深，论不欲极，使人心而有止，则虽言而宁默。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286319_comment'></div>缅道术其难知，超圣贤之独得，虽经籍之具存，盖不存之莫测。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286319_comment'></div>昔余之于公也，年有长少之序，辈有先后之隔，每将言而辄止，意迟迟而太息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286319_comment'></div>今余之于公也，丧前路之乡导，废旁观之轨则，纵欲言而谁闻，恨冥冥而不白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286319_comment'></div>人材兮离合，世道兮开塞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286319_comment'></div>彼苍苍之吉凶，竟无所考兮，余亦安能至此而不惑也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286319_comment'></div>绍兴以来，闻卑见陋，士失常心，颠错昏昼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286319_comment'></div>非无豪杰，力止自救。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286319_comment'></div>公以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1286319", 1286319, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>生禀</span>之知，世家之旧，备义理于一身，讲源流于遍扣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286319_comment'></div>既彻牖以并纳，亦随方而独诱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286319_comment'></div>由是东南之士，拔起<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1286319", 1286319, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>林岫</span>，为英为哲，继公之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286319_comment'></div>如雷雨之先物，咸颖发而苕秀；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286319_comment'></div>流蘋藻以芼撷，洁黍稷而饙馏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286319_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286319_comment'></div>公之施于世者，止此而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286319_comment'></div>至于不以记为博，不以文为富；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286319_comment'></div>器不止于一能，学不期于偏就；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286319_comment'></div>事欲析而愈精，德欲充而兼冒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286319_comment'></div>畅群儒之异旨，续<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1286319", 1286319, "Clauses/57/Comments/0")'>先民</span>之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1286319", 1286319, "Clauses/57/Comments/1")'>遗胄</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286319_comment'></div>周、孔之业，散而不述；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286319_comment'></div>禹、汤之功，息而不奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286319_comment'></div>若千载之有待，又一朝而永谬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286319_comment'></div>疑古人之皆然，傥今人而何咎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286319_comment'></div>恃哭泣之可忍，徒荐哀于此酎<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286319_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_1286319'>自篇首至「之灵」原无，据《东莱吕太史文集》附录补。</div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1286319_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1286319'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_25_1286319_0'>⑴ 《水心文集》卷二八。又见《五百家播芳大全文粹》卷九四，《东莱吕太史文集》附录，《吕东莱外录》卷三。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1286319_comment'></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='4ecacc863367431f9b9ba01db4becfe2_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("4ecacc863367431f9b9ba01db4becfe2");'><span id='4ecacc863367431f9b9ba01db4becfe2_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1189&endYear=1189')">1189年</a>，40岁</div><div id='4ecacc863367431f9b9ba01db4becfe2' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1189&endYear=1189')">1189年6月</a>　六月，自温州赴江陵，经金华。<br /></div>
-----end

-----title
永康
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='56d97713803842c485fa2319af11a1ae_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("56d97713803842c485fa2319af11a1ae");'><span id='56d97713803842c485fa2319af11a1ae_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1172&endYear=1172')">1172年</a>，23岁</div><div id='56d97713803842c485fa2319af11a1ae' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1172&endYear=1172')">1172年</a>　不久，奉母命游学婺州，曾客居永康陈亮家中。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='8b6cc0abe5e04a708662dd4d6470d5e4_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("8b6cc0abe5e04a708662dd4d6470d5e4");'><span id='8b6cc0abe5e04a708662dd4d6470d5e4_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1178&endYear=1178')">1178年</a>，29岁</div><div id='8b6cc0abe5e04a708662dd4d6470d5e4' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1178&endYear=1178')">1178年6月</a>　六月，归家省亲，携吕祖谦信与香茶等物，过永康访陈亮。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='2f0463f99aae4ec788e83b025da51c1a_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("2f0463f99aae4ec788e83b025da51c1a");'><span id='2f0463f99aae4ec788e83b025da51c1a_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1189&endYear=1189')">1189年</a>，40岁</div><div id='2f0463f99aae4ec788e83b025da51c1a' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1189&endYear=1189')">1189年5月</a>　五月，回乡探亲，途径永康，访陈亮。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='5907568610564e66be969d80695194f7_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("5907568610564e66be969d80695194f7");'><span id='5907568610564e66be969d80695194f7_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1189&endYear=1189')">1189年</a>，40岁</div><div id='5907568610564e66be969d80695194f7' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1189&endYear=1189')">1189年6月</a>　六月，经永康，陈亮、张镃以诗词相送。<br /></div>

-----title
杭州（临安）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='3cd39548cc4f4328891f9cd562cd200d_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("3cd39548cc4f4328891f9cd562cd200d");'><span id='3cd39548cc4f4328891f9cd562cd200d_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1173&endYear=1174')">1173-1174年</a>，24-25岁</div><div id='3cd39548cc4f4328891f9cd562cd200d' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1173&endYear=1173')">1173年</a>　至临安，约是年向郑伯熊问学。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1174&endYear=1174')">1174年</a>　是年春夏间在京师，向签书枢密院事叶衡上书，论天下大势，不报。作品：上西府书。<div id='poem_1285862' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1285862' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1285862?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上西府书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1174年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1285862")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1285862_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1285862'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1285862'>某瓯粤之鄙人，行年二十有五，于今世最为不肖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1285862_comment'></div>虽少曾读书，颇涉治乱，而言语迟钝，意向迂阔，自度无以求知于当世君子，在京逾年，未尝有所诣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1285862_comment'></div>今者收拾废放，将就陇亩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1285862_comment'></div>然而伏念天子明圣，亲御明堂，布德施教，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1285862", 1285862, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>润泽</span>海宇，犹惧闾阎之隐或不自得，于是屡下直言之诏，招采山岩遁逸之士、狂狷朴野之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1285862_comment'></div>凡天下之大政，师旅刑赋之本末，道德法制之先后，至于宫掖之议，民伍之情，宰相之所未及行，谏官之所未暇言者，咸得极陈于前，无有所讳，而某虽不肖，实治其学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1285862_comment'></div>伏惟执事英杰俊伟，材智特异，忠勇并昭，尝以再期之年，行数千里，尽守上流要塞之处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1285862_comment'></div>今又近掌地官，不盈月而在右府，天下想望风采，日观盛德，位尊责厚，忧深虑远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1285862_comment'></div>然则今天下之事，非某谁实言之，非明公谁能听之！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1285862_comment'></div>且尽言而无利害之心，与听言而求尽天下之利害，非明公与某而谁望！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1285862_comment'></div>故愿求见左右，略疏一二，惟明公深思之无忽！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1285862_comment'></div>某闻古之所谓英雄豪杰之士者，必能见天下之势，故能因人之未定以收其权，因天下之不足以成其功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1285862_comment'></div>昔者光武起于圣公假立之中，受节济河，群盗相王，成算未立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1285862_comment'></div>及邓禹纳说，则收二郡，取河北，祀汉配天，业侔西京。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1285862_comment'></div>其后玄德以摧败之馀，寄命新野，而群雄<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1285862", 1285862, "Clauses/66/Comments/0")'>若崩厥角</span>，北面曹氏，当是之时，以为无复争矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1285862_comment'></div>然孔明一起，则江东合从，曹公奔遁；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1285862_comment'></div>刘璋失国，连荆、益之众，东向以争天下，汉几复兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1285862_comment'></div>今夫天下多才勇敢之士，居于可以有为之地，而终于无以建立，或反以败亡随之者，此无他，不能见天下之势，而陷溺于流俗之习也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1285862_comment'></div>请遂言今天下之势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1285862_comment'></div>夫使民无嗜战之意而亦无畏战之心，外可以立功而内不失为无事，鄙后世鞍马之劳而坐收三代揖逊服人之获，此岂非今日之所愿欲哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1285862_comment'></div>夫却药于瞑眩而愈疾于至危，此亦病者之所愿欲也，然而实难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1285862_comment'></div>自唐末、五代之祸，天下生死于兵，艺祖因人心之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1285862", 1285862, "Clauses/94/Comments/0")'>患苦</span>，削而损之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1285862_comment'></div>其后太宗下太原，势可以定燕、代而不果；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1285862_comment'></div>真宗幸澶渊，力可以破契丹而不听；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1285862_comment'></div>乃反黜币赐金，自诎不校以怀服之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1285862_comment'></div>至于仁宗，遂专以偃兵不战持守天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1285862_comment'></div>当时元老大臣以和亲避狄为上策，学士大夫以因循苟简为正论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1285862_comment'></div>犯乐喜之讥，成子木之诈，晏然自以为仁义之勋，莫能易也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1285862_comment'></div>是故元昊、智高虽号桀黠，计其强武，曾何足以方冒顿、颉利之十一二！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1285862_comment'></div>而吾士马全盛，生民安业，然一方有警，天下震动，羽檄日奏，无战不衄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1285862_comment'></div>天子为之忧愧<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1285862", 1285862, "Clauses/119/Comments/0")'>太息</span>，引咎镇抚，然后少安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1285862_comment'></div>兵寝事竟，则谋议之臣动色相贺，以为万全，不自知其耻也，畏战无勇之俗于是成矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1285862_comment'></div>使其民便于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1285862", 1285862, "Clauses/127/Comments/0")'>击刺</span>，狃于兵革，遂悍而不反，若秦人之末世，固为非也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1285862_comment'></div>如使一切不计，以求苟安，侵肤及骨，扶服拜起，将成二周之馀俗，文、武之先君固如是乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1285862_comment'></div>熙宁、元丰之际，始稍变其习，思有以振起之，然天下之心终以不服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1285862_comment'></div>至于邪正相非，朋党相援，大坏极弊，以及靖康之忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1285862_comment'></div>女真小胡，弃靺羯，踰易水，长驱勾吴之地，如入穹庐之乡，所过屠戮郛郭，不可胜计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1285862_comment'></div>而其父兄子弟，蓝缕窜伏，迄不敢怨，若无复有血气之知者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1285862_comment'></div>又况乃加之以列淮之守，四十年之辱也哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1285862_comment'></div>厥今天下大义不明，趋身之便，偷惰耳目，《春秋》之作，《小雅》之废，嘻笑谐谑，以为当然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1285862_comment'></div>虽有忠良谋智之士，学于圣贤，其陋更甚，刚心勇气，无复存矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1285862_comment'></div>执事以为今日之势何如也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1285862_comment'></div>夫以江、淮之弱而兼西北之强，鼓思退之卒而战<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1285862", 1285862, "Clauses/173/Comments/0")'>自奋</span>之兵，轻腹心之忠而乐简策之谀，求驽骀于千里，抱<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1285862", 1285862, "Clauses/176/Comments/0")'>鼠璞</span>以待价，此智士所以寒心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1285862_comment'></div>虽然，治乱无常势，成败无定谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1285862_comment'></div>独往独来，乃凝于神；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1285862_comment'></div>事成功立，莫识其门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1285862_comment'></div>弱可强也，怯可勇也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1285862_comment'></div>穰苴之胜，战已败之师；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1285862_comment'></div>勾践之霸，奋垂亡之国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1285862_comment'></div>用今之民，求今之治，则亦变今之势矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1285862_comment'></div>然而非其人无以使下，非其言无以谕众，其名不正，其辞不顺，虽作于色，发于身，天下犹未从也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1285862_comment'></div>易败素者必以紫，藉圭璧者必以绨，必入胡估之肆，莫能名其器而唯衒其美，则万金之直可至矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1285862_comment'></div>今也灿然陈于前，人独邈之而不顾者，何哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1285862_comment'></div>且今天下之患，其深大宏远者，某不敢遽言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1285862_comment'></div>言其所易知而最甚者，亦有三而已：朝廷之上，陋儒生之论，轻仁义之学，则相与摈贤者而不使自守以高世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1285862_comment'></div>庸人诋道以从时，举缝掖而仇视者盖半天下，而名实之辨乱矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1285862_comment'></div>夫事有逆顺，命有祸福，为善未验，或蒙其尤，此时之常也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1285862_comment'></div>而天下之人，消沮悼慄，遂以为不复有所就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1285862_comment'></div>且上有复九庙安中国之心，帝王之盛节也，而群臣不能将顺圣意，左右推挽，庶几有成，而皆以为当一切无事而已，君子则拂之以求名，小人则悦之以求利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1285862_comment'></div>积此之患，其本不立，其末皆废矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1285862_comment'></div>天作水旱，地为沟浍，非良农之疾也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1285862_comment'></div>蟊贼之不除，螟螣之蕃滋，则后稷亦畏之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1285862_comment'></div>故善医者，未论疾之虚实而先察其受病之处，傥在于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1285862_comment'></div>伏惟执事，诚有意于今世乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1285862_comment'></div>方明主虚心以待执事者，宜无不听，则当酌古今之变，权利害之实，以先定国是于天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1285862_comment'></div>然后收召废弃有名之士，斥去大言无验之臣，辟和同之论，息朋党之说；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1285862_comment'></div>据岁入之常以制国用，罢太甚之求以纾民力；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1285862_comment'></div>广武举之路，无限其任保；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1285862_comment'></div>多制科之选，无必其记问；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1285862_comment'></div>责州郡以荐士，则士林之气增；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1285862_comment'></div>委诸路以择材，则士卒之心勇；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1285862_comment'></div>四分上流之地以命羊、陆之帅，厚集荆、楚之郊以求宛、洛之绩；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1285862_comment'></div>仍旧兵之数以严蒐练，耕因屯之田以代军输；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1285862_comment'></div>稍宽闽、浙之患，无旷江南之野；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1285862_comment'></div>重台谏而任刺史，崇馆阁以亲讲读；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1285862_comment'></div>遴储佐之材，分幕府之寄：凡今之急政要务，不待朝夕而行之者，其大略在是矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1285862_comment'></div>而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_75_1285862", 1285862, "Clauses/283/Comments/0")'>委曲</span>细故，皆足以兆治乱之端者，又不可悉数，则又在笃意以求之，平心以思之，人效其说，士程其技，则无遗矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1285862_comment'></div>行之不可以不公，守之不可以不信，受之不可以不广；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1285862_comment'></div>变已成之弱势，去方至之三患，推之以年数也，而少康之复夏，宣王之兴周，有不论矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1285862_comment'></div>自昔中兴之功，江左之策，盖未有高焉者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1285862_comment'></div>虽然，其所以行此者，则又有三焉：一曰诚，二曰赏，三曰罚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1285862_comment'></div>夫发号出令，无有巨小，必思生民之大计而不徇乎一身之喜怒，是之谓诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1285862_comment'></div>爱人之功，求人之善，举之公卿之上而忘其疏贱之丑，是之谓赏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1285862_comment'></div>惩人之过，明人之恶，加之窜殛之戮而遗其贵近之厚，是之谓罚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1285862_comment'></div>执事居得致之位而值可为之时，萧、曹、房、杜之流，非有他也，为之而合，行之而至矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1285862_comment'></div>某之于执事，未之见也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1285862_comment'></div>执事之于某，未之闻也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1285862_comment'></div>而深言当世之故遂至于此，宜若狂且易者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1285862_comment'></div>然今天下之士，其不以得至于公卿大臣为悦者鲜矣，不以得至为悦而不以利言者鲜矣，不以利言而言能尽天下之利见天下之势者亦鲜矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1285862_comment'></div>某<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_88_1285862", 1285862, "Clauses/336/Comments/0")'>不佞</span>，自以为无三者之患而独有忧世之心，且其外不至于不当言者，是以遂言而无惮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1285862_comment'></div>伏惟执事思其所以处此而一赐之可否，使执事有以慰天下之望，而某亦不为失人，幸甚！</div><div id='poem_sentence_89_1285862_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1174&endYear=1174')">1174年</a>　识黄岩丁希亮。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='f9ad1420899542d68a564705da3e73c3_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("f9ad1420899542d68a564705da3e73c3");'><span id='f9ad1420899542d68a564705da3e73c3_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1178&endYear=1178')">1178年</a>，29岁</div><div id='f9ad1420899542d68a564705da3e73c3' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1178&endYear=1178')">1178年4月</a>　四月，以进士第二名及第，授文林郎、镇江府观察推官。作品：廷对。<div id='poem_1285846' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1285846' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1285846?labeling=true' target='_blank'>廷对</a><span class='authorDate'>（1178年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1285846")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1285846_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1285846'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1285846'>朕绍休圣绪，厉精万机，夙夜靡皇，庶克有济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1285846_comment'></div>今兹登进多士，咸造在廷，将以讲明治道，考观素蕴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1285846_comment'></div>角虚文而废实用，朕无取焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1285846_comment'></div>历稽邃古，三皇之书谓之《三坟》，以言大道；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1285846_comment'></div>五帝之书谓之《五典》，以言常道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1285846_comment'></div>夫出治之经，要本诸《五典》，而《三坟》所载曰大道云者，果何所谓耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1285846_comment'></div>仲尼之门，难疑答问，惟仁尤重，或以爱人为仁，或以刚毅近仁，或以克己复礼，天下归仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1285846_comment'></div>其他论仁不一而止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1285846_comment'></div>夫圣人立教，宜有定说，乃多为之目如是，后之求仁者果安所从耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1285846_comment'></div>汉高帝制礼，欲度其所能行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1285846_comment'></div>齐、鲁两生，召之不至，谓「必俟百年而后兴」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1285846_comment'></div>惟叔孙通达于时变，定一王之仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1285846_comment'></div>二者之见，其孰是耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1285846_comment'></div>唐太宗论乐，谓「治之隆替无关乎此」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1285846_comment'></div>杜淹疑其不然，虽魏徵亦曰「乐在人和，不在声音」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1285846_comment'></div>二者之论，其孰当耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1285846_comment'></div>朕上宪帝皇之道，中参将圣之训，下监汉、唐之迹，烛理未深，治不加进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1285846_comment'></div>故欲彊国势而威令未孚，欲恢王纲而规模未广，士风惰而未振，民力艰而未裕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1285846_comment'></div>抑尝览苏轼之论，言「天下之势，中国士民，优游缓带，勇气消耗，而戎狄之赂，转输天下」，以为一时深弊，朕有感焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1285846_comment'></div>子大夫以选待问，其考引古初，攈摭经史，博举先儒之言，茂明当世之务，条著于篇，勿迂勿泛，朕将亲览！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1285846_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_1285846'>臣恭惟陛下天锡勇智，临御九有，实开有宋无疆之业，故能不以草茅之陋，爰命有司，博举秀异，亲降色辞，问以道、仁、礼、乐之大要，当世之先务，圣心之所向，参验酌取，图惟厥中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1285846_comment'></div>臣愚不肖，窃独自念，以为古之忠臣未尝不愿言天下之事，古之明君未尝不乐闻天下之言，然而听之者常以为难而言之者终不敢尽，何哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1285846_comment'></div>岂非君臣之情不通，而上下之势不合耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1285846_comment'></div>今陛下虚己宏大，畴咨众言，凡伊尹、傅说之流伏藏于农役之贱而不敢发，贾谊、陆贽叫呼于堂陛之间而不见听者，亦既举以访之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1285846_comment'></div>宸衷恳恻，诏策深厚，臣而不言，其又何责！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1285846_comment'></div>虽然，君听在乎广大，臣言贵乎切近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1285846_comment'></div>臣闻以庸君行善政，天下未乱也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1285846_comment'></div>以圣君行弊政，天下不可治矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1285846_comment'></div>伏睹今日之故，承末流之极弊而不及其本，厌众说之太烦而不求其要；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1285846_comment'></div>或以浅末之议而废经远之论，或以一时之效而易久大之规；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1285846_comment'></div>朝廷一体也，而□□内外；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1285846_comment'></div>文武一道也，而互为抑扬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1285846_comment'></div>是以上下喜无事，群臣不任责，当天下积累之后而无根固不拔之势，以生齿日滋之众而有贫弱就衰之萌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1285846_comment'></div>至于大本不立，大义不明，少不为虑，则天下之事又将有出于意料之外者，岂非以圣君行弊政之故欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1285846_comment'></div>如其条贯统纪，臣不得以尽言也，敢因圣问之所及而疏其略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1285846_comment'></div>臣伏读圣策之所以诏臣者曰：「朕诏休圣绪，厉精万机，夙夜靡皇，庶克有济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1285846_comment'></div>今兹登进多士，咸造在廷，将以讲明治道，考观素蕴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1285846_comment'></div>角虚文而废实用，朕无取焉」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1285846_comment'></div>臣仰见陛下勤政愿治十有七年，周旋万机之变，多阅义理之会，深患虚文之误世矣，故将以卓然可见之实下求臣等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1285846_comment'></div>臣闻虚文者，实用之所因以见，非舍言语文字之外而有所谓实者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1285846_comment'></div>陛下聪明圣知度越古昔，所受群臣章疏书奏、閟论密语、大廷广对，凡几何矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1285846_comment'></div>考览载籍，上自尧、舜、禹、汤之德业，孔氏之所记录，与秦、汉以来废兴成败之迹，百家众说无不明矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1285846_comment'></div>嗣服以来，四策多士，其间山岩遗弃，抱不能已之人，投匦肆言，利害百出，固已众矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1285846_comment'></div>陛下亦尝得其所谓实乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1285846_comment'></div>古之治道，皆有一定必然之说相传而不变，彼尧、舜、禹、汤号为圣人者，特奉行之耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1285846_comment'></div>自圣人不作而治不明，战国、秦、汉之君臣日乱其统，而儒者独传之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1285846_comment'></div>董仲舒、刘向、王通，盖稍欲广推发明其意矣，而位不足以行其言，才不足以发其志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1285846_comment'></div>若苏绰之辅宇文，魏徵之劝太宗者，二君既亲见其利矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1285846_comment'></div>虽然，祖宗立国之定势，则常因儒者之学以求三代之旧而施之于政事之际，二百馀年，《六经》、孔氏之说益以著明，凡古人之所以治天下之常道无不尽顺，今之世反厌其熟烂迂阔而不可信用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1285846_comment'></div>陛下翻然改虑易念，将求一新之乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1285846_comment'></div>臣恐其无所据矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1285846_comment'></div>陛下盍亦因已然之众说，详考而择其中乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1285846_comment'></div>则凡今之所谓虚文者，随其高下皆足以为实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1285846_comment'></div>不然，则虽《六经》、孔氏之书均为无用，而何益于治哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1285846_comment'></div>夫十有七年，天下颙颙，海内向风，而治道之实终于未定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1285846_comment'></div>今欲拨去虚文以幸天下，而士亦不免以空言应上之求，是将孰从而取之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1285846_comment'></div>故其素所蕴积而自见者，亦于此观之足矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1285846_comment'></div>孟轲曰：「我知言」，未有不知言而能得其人者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1285846_comment'></div>臣伏读圣策，有「历稽邃古，三皇之书谓之《三坟》，以言大道；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1285846_comment'></div>五帝之书谓之《五典》，以言常道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1285846_comment'></div>夫出治之经，要本诸《五典》，而《三坟》所载曰大道云者，果何所谓耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1285846_comment'></div>臣窃惟陛下本《五典》以出治，则古人治天下之常道，陛下既得之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1285846_comment'></div>《三坟》之书，孔氏不序，而安国独言之，何欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1285846_comment'></div>彼将以为天地运化之始，阴阳消长之会，羲、农、黄帝所以开天极而制化原者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1285846_comment'></div>敬天爱民，尊道保法，执赏罚之信，示予夺之公，此尧、舜、三代之所以治天下而立人纪也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1285846_comment'></div>尧、舜、三代以人合天，而后之为异学者，夸焉以为羲、农、黄帝是以天应人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1285846_comment'></div>故其高诞恍忽者，人于佛、老，而迂僻下俚者，流为阴阳、卜筮、纵横之方，其技其意，莫不自托于大道以惑世主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1285846_comment'></div>臣愿陛下执《五典》之常道而无疑乎安国之偏辞，则出治之经正矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1285846_comment'></div>臣伏读圣策，有「仲尼之门，疑难答问，惟仁尤重，或以爱人为仁，或以刚毅近仁，或以克己复礼，天下归仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1285846_comment'></div>其他论仁不一而止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1285846_comment'></div>夫圣人立教，宜有定说，乃多为之目如是，后之求仁者果安所从耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1285846_comment'></div>臣闻仲尼亲见周之衰坏，中国、夷狄并起而争，以为本于其君之不仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1285846_comment'></div>其君不仁，故其臣贪诈邪虐，而不为信谊忠厚之事以报其上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1285846_comment'></div>君臣流毒，被于天下，纲纪隳坏，人文不立，而天下之民物不能自必其命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1285846_comment'></div>当是之时，仲尼退与其徒求所以为仁之方，发其所厚，消其所薄，根于心术，见于事变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1285846_comment'></div>虽其质之所受者有异，性之所习者有偏，而仁之为道未尝远也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1285846_comment'></div>或曰爱人，或曰刚毅，或曰克己复礼，与其他不一之论，广大充满，上下周流，而仁在是矣，以为虽未能以救当时之患，而犹可以启后人之心也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1285846_comment'></div>嗟夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1285846_comment'></div>荜门委巷之士，其势与力不足以自存矣，可谓微也，而犹不忘于求仁，乃若陛下，承尧、舜付托之重，守累圣太平之业，欲从而意得，恩博而泽厚，所谓操可致之实，有能致之势矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1285846_comment'></div>陛下圣性得之，犹复加圣心焉，则有喜有怒，有生有杀，应天下之众变而不失吾心之至仁，此孔氏之本旨也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1285846_comment'></div>若夫拘牵于文谊，训释乎章句，因有得焉，亦足以助陛下之仁，然而未敢为陛下言之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1285846_comment'></div>臣伏读圣策，有「汉高帝制礼，欲度其所能行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1285846_comment'></div>齐、鲁两生，召之不至，谓『必俟百年而后兴』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1285846_comment'></div>惟叔孙通达于时变，定一王之仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1285846_comment'></div>二者之见，其孰是耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1285846_comment'></div>臣闻周之礼至秦而亡，汉氏初起，以其智力角逐一世而仅得之，则秦之礼至汉亦亡矣，其君臣上下未有长久之意也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1285846_comment'></div>使汉仪不定，则何以系其心？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1285846_comment'></div>如必积德百年而后兴，则汉不及积矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1285846_comment'></div>若其文物以纪之，声明以发之，上下有章，登降有数，举无失乎天人之常理，则非积德百年有不能至也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1285846_comment'></div>士欲及时以致功，达权以致变，则通意诚近之矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1285846_comment'></div>耻为一时之用而宁甘没世之无闻，两生殆未必知礼之用也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1285846_comment'></div>虽然，一代之大典，则必与斯人之徒议之，此固非叔孙通之所能识也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1285846_comment'></div>臣伏读圣策，有「唐太宗论乐，谓『治之隆替无关乎此』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1285846_comment'></div>杜淹疑其不然，虽魏徵亦曰『乐在人和，不在声音』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1285846_comment'></div>二者之论，其孰当耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1285846_comment'></div>臣窃以为两生之论高祖未可以制礼，而犹制之，盖尊卑贵贱之序不可一日废也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1285846_comment'></div>若太宗，则治既效矣，功既成矣，可以作乐而犹未作也，反以谓治之隆替无关焉者，何耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1285846_comment'></div>魏徵智足以知仁谊而不足以知礼乐，知人之和而不知声音之致和，故其所以辅太宗者亦仅是耶！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1285846_comment'></div>陛下求道于《典》、《坟》，求仁于孔氏，是既然矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1285846_comment'></div>求礼乐于汉、唐，则非所求也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1285846_comment'></div>汉、唐之始，不及政事，何暇礼乐！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1285846_comment'></div>且高帝不喜儒，不知学，先王圣人之道无所入于其心，然犹曰「度吾所能行者」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1285846_comment'></div>太宗经理世务，动询儒生，天资明锐，尤喜文学，然乃曰「治不必为乐，乐不足为治」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1285846_comment'></div>夫不稽之古，不谋之道，而茍欲循其所安，陛下何取焉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1285846_comment'></div>深惟今世，上自郊庙，下至田野闾里，制度文为之节，脱略而不备，浅陋而不经；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1285846_comment'></div>嫁娶、祠祀、饮食、生养无所取法，贫富相遁，无所纪极，而天下之治因以不举，其患皆坐于礼乐之不明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1285846_comment'></div>礼乐不明，则政事不立；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1285846_comment'></div>政事不立，则财用竭而天下匮矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1285846_comment'></div>陛下慨念天下之大，将奋然有所自为，而不先定其本，则仁心仁闻何由而著，王功帝德何由而隆！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1285846_comment'></div>且夫祖宗之盛，盖尝有意于礼乐矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1285846_comment'></div>屡举而不遂，欲行而辄止者，陛下知之乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1285846_comment'></div>汉、唐茍简之说杂乎其中，旧臣元老未能深识礼乐之意以有所论建也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1285846_comment'></div>故臣愿陛下将兴礼乐以为出治之本，而无求乎汉、唐之陋，则天下之士必有出而赞陛下者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1285846_comment'></div>臣伏读圣策，有「朕上宪帝皇之道，中参将圣之训，下监汉、唐之迹，烛理未深，治不加进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1285846_comment'></div>故欲强国势而威令未孚，欲恢王纲而规模未广，士风惰而未振，民力艰而未裕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1285846_comment'></div>抑尝览苏轼之论，言『天下之势，中国士民，优游缓带，勇气消耗，而戎狄之赂，转输天下』，以为一时深弊，朕有感焉」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1285846_comment'></div>臣伏读至此，窃知陛下以当世之要务，圣心之所向，形之训词，开导诱掖，使之有知而必言，有言而必尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1285846_comment'></div>臣不佞，盖于其始也，愿陛下即虚文而求实用；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1285846_comment'></div>于其次也，愿陛下执常道以正治经，存至仁以厚民望；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1285846_comment'></div>又其次也，则欲立礼乐以定出治之本；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1285846_comment'></div>凡陛下之所以策臣者，不敢不条列而对也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1285846_comment'></div>若夫当世之要务，则虽圣问之所不及，而因其所及，可一一而陈也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1285846_comment'></div>圣志之所向，虽众人之所未喻，而臣之所自喻者，可反复而论之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1285846_comment'></div>其本末可见，其次第可知，陛下试幸听之毋忽！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1285846_comment'></div>陛下留意天下之大计，而不蔽于一偏之见，不任独知之明，是以上法三、五，中稽孔氏，下验汉、唐，凡道、仁、礼、乐之大要，皆泛观而博取之，然而非圣志之所向也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1285846_comment'></div>陛下以今日之事为何如耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1285846_comment'></div>以陛下夙兴夜寐，精实求治，十有七年之久，而迄未有尺寸之效，能使陛下有以自慰其心者，亦尝思其故乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1285846_comment'></div>独运于上而未得其人以自辅也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1285846_comment'></div>且陛下临政之初，尽起诸臣于废弃休老之馀，举国论而听之，而其人既足以副陛下之望也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1285846_comment'></div>陛下又自简拔，至兴于梦寐，取之具员疏远之中，一朝而暴亲贵之者，不知其几人焉，而其人又多为罪戾以负陛下之知矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1285846_comment'></div>使陛下徘徊四顾，莫识谁可，丞相之席虚而不登者二三期矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1285846_comment'></div>然而卒以付之旧学之臣也，尝辅政于十五六年之前，则陛下观之亦审乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1285846_comment'></div>群情嗷嗷，观听是举，其亦有以佐陛下之大有为乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1285846_comment'></div>虽然，宰相失其职久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1285846_comment'></div>自崔亮、裴光庭以铨法自守，世谓吏部为失职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1285846_comment'></div>此特一有司之事耳，犹可为也，而至于宰相专限资格，助吏部行有司之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1285846_comment'></div>今也管库之小臣，在外职司之僚属，进拟不足，除授不行，相视莫知所以为计；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1285846_comment'></div>四方之士大夫，足相蹑于政事堂，不自知其贤不肖，而皆取必于上；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1285846_comment'></div>若乃侍从近臣之进退，又常曰不敢预闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1285846_comment'></div>不知丞相之职，真若是而已乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1285846_comment'></div>天下大事，于今有几？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1285846_comment'></div>其所施设，宜何后先？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1285846_comment'></div>王业偏安于一隅，庶政积废于今日，臣不知今之所谓大臣者，能进此道而任此责乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1285846_comment'></div>三代之佐，臣不敢论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1285846_comment'></div>若诸葛亮、王猛，振起治功之臣也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1285846_comment'></div>唐之裴度，近世之韩琦、富弼，维持法度之臣也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1285846_comment'></div>宰相之职为最大，而居今日为甚艰，以其失职之久而不自知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1285846_comment'></div>从坚中实，未能革伪；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1285846_comment'></div>茍绝亲党，岂云守公！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1285846_comment'></div>臣愿陛下诏大臣交修协济，纪律粲然，以回天下之视听，而无蹈于失职之过而不自知，则众务可以渐举矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1285846_comment'></div>谏官、御史，各有分职，不可相侵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1285846_comment'></div>规切谏诤，以人主之得失、国家之大体为己任者，谏官之职也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1285846_comment'></div>明于人臣之忠邪，以排击奸佞、肃清班列为己任者，御史之事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1285846_comment'></div>今谏官侵御史之事矣，非惟侵御史之事也，且又失谏官之职矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1285846_comment'></div>往者祖宗之世，谏官、御史以言事为贤，或除授有不当，废置有不宜，所言不见听，连章欢哗，至于空台省而去，更出迭入，议论不衰，岂不多事而可厌乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1285846_comment'></div>然而祖宗不厌，益置员数，分命荐举，若是者何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1285846_comment'></div>以为不厌其多事，直差可以无事尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1285846_comment'></div>伏自顷岁，有论除授之不当而去者数人，陛下既觉悟而亟还之，超迁而尊遇之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1285846_comment'></div>六七年间，以沈默相承，而天下遂至于无可言之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1285846_comment'></div>然则真无可言之事欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1285846_comment'></div>抑其有而不敢言欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_160_1285846_comment'></div>抑不惟不敢而亦不知言之欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_161_1285846_comment'></div>不敢言固可畏，不知言又大可畏也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_162_1285846_comment'></div>虽然，陛下之于谏官，多阙而不补，而比者独以一人长之，又何欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_163_1285846_comment'></div>天下固不为无可言之事矣，而使他人不得言，言之则为越职，为生事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_164_1285846_comment'></div>臣愿陛下益置员数如祖宗之旧，择今之所谓以名义材实自任者处焉，而责之以天下之所当言，其必有可言者，而国是可以渐定矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_165_1285846_comment'></div>朝有政令，虑其遽行而不审也，而集两制以上议之，所以广谋智，重改作也，此先王之典，而汉氏之所以尝行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_166_1285846_comment'></div>然臣窃怪其所议者，多不急之细故，有司之烦文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_167_1285846_comment'></div>小臣转对，无以应故事而为臆说者，陛下既以乐听不拒之意而付之近臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_168_1285846_comment'></div>又不以正义大体明其不足论，乃委曲迁就，犹为之辞，徒闻某州添一通判事，某路添一参议者而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_169_1285846_comment'></div>陛下所任两制、侍从，以为心膂经画之地；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_170_1285846_comment'></div>今也弊精神于无用微文，而不讲天下之大政要务以为数千百年经久之规，天下之祸不切而最深，孰有甚于此者！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_171_1285846_comment'></div>臣愿陛下责之以远且大者乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_172_1285846_comment'></div>若夫法令苛密之为患，使天下度外之士无以自容；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_173_1285846_comment'></div>人才衰少之为忧，使缓急倚伏之际无一可保。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_174_1285846_comment'></div>陛下圣志且有所向，而内治数端，近在目前，犹或未举，何欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_175_1285846_comment'></div>岂非并志于所向而不还顾其所行乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_176_1285846_comment'></div>然则「欲强国势而威令未孚，欲恢王纲而规模未广」，于此乎得之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_177_1285846_comment'></div>「士风惰而未振」，陛下思振之欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_178_1285846_comment'></div>陛下必以今世儒者最为无用，而科举之士多文少实，陛下且欲任使而不可得乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_179_1285846_comment'></div>臣请析之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_180_1285846_comment'></div>臣闻周公太宰之治，以九两系邦国之民，有曰「师以贤得民，儒以道得民」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_181_1285846_comment'></div>儒者职业，在周公时犹未大也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_182_1285846_comment'></div>其后孔子修群圣人之道，付之儒者使世守之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_183_1285846_comment'></div>而秦、汉以还，习于功利杂伯之政，与群圣人之道不类，故儒者诵孔氏之遗言，取《六经》之具载者而切劘之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_184_1285846_comment'></div>彼直抱圣人所传之道耳，至其用之则在人主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_185_1285846_comment'></div>夫其忠信孝友以为行，言语文字以为能，谈谊而不谈利，计德而不计功，朋友无閒言，乡党无过行，斯可谓脩洁博习之贤，亦足当卿大夫之选矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_186_1285846_comment'></div>凡今儒者，正当是耳，陛下如欲求卓异特起之士如孟轲、子思、周公、召公以兴起治道，则宜详择而遍观之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_187_1285846_comment'></div>天之生是人也不数矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_188_1285846_comment'></div>陛下望之太深，责之太备，以大贤之任而欲众儒者之皆能，臣是以知其难也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_189_1285846_comment'></div>天下不察，猥谓陛下不好儒，斯言过矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_190_1285846_comment'></div>科举之法，凡今大略皆所以堤防不肖而欲贤者自振于其中，此直幸耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_191_1285846_comment'></div>其多得不肖而不自振者，此乃法之所宜有也，而又何怪焉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_192_1285846_comment'></div>虽然，振之在陛下耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_193_1285846_comment'></div>「民力艰而未裕」，臣日夜念此久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_194_1285846_comment'></div>以陛下忧闵元元之心，天下奏报为民，而上常蒙画可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_195_1285846_comment'></div>而今东吴数州赋役差轻之外，自浙水而西，江水以东，民终岁勤动而有仅足以输者，何欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_196_1285846_comment'></div>一遇水旱，不能偿种，逃田尽室而去之，不知论议之臣亦尝以告陛下乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_197_1285846_comment'></div>陛下盖恻然兴叹，以为俟版图之复也，当尽捐天下之赋在于常科之外者，天下无不感陛下之言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_198_1285846_comment'></div>然臣以为陛下诚欲大有为也，则必先有大慰天下之望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_199_1285846_comment'></div>故夫能捐横赋而后可以复版图，俟版图之复而后捐之者，无是道也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_200_1285846_comment'></div>能裕民力而后可以议进取，待进取之定而后裕之者，无是道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_201_1285846_comment'></div>陛下徒因今之法而少宽之，此不足以裕民；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_202_1285846_comment'></div>果裕民也，更为之法可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_203_1285846_comment'></div>以臣所论，今天下之财，自一缕以上无不尽取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_204_1285846_comment'></div>陛下清俭寡欲，至于太息而言财利；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_205_1285846_comment'></div>主计之臣，甘受聚敛之名而不辞；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_206_1285846_comment'></div>郡县之官，明行侵刻而不愧；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_207_1285846_comment'></div>非以奉陛下无益之用、侈靡之资也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_208_1285846_comment'></div>为天下之大蠹，十分之九以供之，而犹不足者，兵是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_209_1285846_comment'></div>自唐之末年，固已困于兵，而藩镇四起，乱亡相继。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_210_1285846_comment'></div>艺祖受命，收节度之权，严阶级之法以安天下，而养兵之患未暇去也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_211_1285846_comment'></div>太宗、真宗，继有西北之事，天下之兵遂以增益而不省，而本朝之大，独当前世养兵之患矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_212_1285846_comment'></div>祖宗之已然者姑不暇论，而以今天下之半，专给百万之兵，可乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_213_1285846_comment'></div>流弊之极，至于陛下犹豫而不知所以处之，数年之后，陛下亲见之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_214_1285846_comment'></div>陛下诚思所以处此也，则民力裕而百度脩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_215_1285846_comment'></div>不然，民未裕也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_216_1285846_comment'></div>陛下圣志之所独向，臣愚不肖，不足以窥测万一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_217_1285846_comment'></div>然臣独以为使宰相得其道，谏官得其职，近臣与大计，儒者守常度，至于宏大规模于文法之外，振起人才于名义之中，减兵费，宽民力，治官之冗滥，去吏之弊害，凡急政要务十数条者，陛下一朝改定以幸天下，使民志定而人心悦，则圣志之所向，始有可得而言者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_218_1285846_comment'></div>夫复仇，天下之大义也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_219_1285846_comment'></div>还故境土，天下之尊名也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_220_1285846_comment'></div>以天下之大义而陛下未能行，以天下之尊名而陛下未能举，平居长虑远想，当食而不御者，几年于此矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_221_1285846_comment'></div>陛下上则重违太上皇帝问安侍膳之意，下则牵于儒臣深根固本之说，徒与二三亲信密计而深筹之，然犹不欲诵言其事，方借苏轼之论以旁训臣等，此亦公卿大夫不能建明之罪也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_222_1285846_comment'></div>夫轼之论，为祖宗平世而发也，故以「优游缓带」而讥其俗，「转输戎赂」而惜其费。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_223_1285846_comment'></div>若曰不爱金帛乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_224_1285846_comment'></div>今日复仇之义不得旋踵，而今也四十年不举矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_225_1285846_comment'></div>陛下若欲教天下以为人子之义，使枕戈北首，虑不顾身，天下之人其又何辞！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_226_1285846_comment'></div>而徒有感于轼之论而已乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_227_1285846_comment'></div>虽然，臣则有忧于此，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_228_1285846_comment'></div>为复仇之论者有矣，不过欲斗胜负于兵革而已，自用兵以来无他画也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_229_1285846_comment'></div>为固本之论者有矣，不过欲久和好以无事而已，自<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_230_1285846", 1285846, "Clauses/809/Comments/0")'>通和</span>之外无长虑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_230_1285846_comment'></div>为国之道，必有次第；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_231_1285846_comment'></div>天下大事，不容茍简；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_232_1285846_comment'></div>岂可不出于用兵则出于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_233_1285846", 1285846, "Clauses/814/Comments/0")'>通和</span>哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_233_1285846_comment'></div>陛下圣志之所独向者，其固有本末次第之可考乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_234_1285846_comment'></div>抑亦未免徒出于用兵也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_235_1285846_comment'></div>如其本末可见，次第可知，则陛下行之而已；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_236_1285846_comment'></div>如未免于用兵也，则臣以为过计矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_237_1285846_comment'></div>往者隆兴之初，聚重兵于淮水之上，使辅臣督之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_238_1285846_comment'></div>方其未战也，天下交口而议其后；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_239_1285846_comment'></div>及其一战而不胜也，大兵溃散，飞檄告警，督师罢黜，而复与虏和矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_240_1285846_comment'></div>今日之事，其去隆兴之初有几？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_241_1285846_comment'></div>粮储备乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_242_1285846_comment'></div>器械精乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_243_1285846_comment'></div>士卒练乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_244_1285846_comment'></div>所恃者如此而已，可谓眇矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_245_1285846_comment'></div>且夫复仇者，本非用兵之谓也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_246_1285846_comment'></div>合数十利口之臣操胜负常势之说，以误陛下，一战弃之，而陛下之大功不可立也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_247_1285846_comment'></div>直使王猛、王朴辈为陛下计之，必不出此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_248_1285846_comment'></div>此天地之大义，国家之大体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_249_1285846_comment'></div>救御之术，消复之方，转祸为福，因败为功，以辅成陛下之志者，天下岂无人耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_250_1285846_comment'></div>陛下何不博求而公选之，赐以清閒之燕，姑告其圣志之所独向者！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_251_1285846_comment'></div>必坚决，必刚健，必信任，必不息，必无使小人参之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_252_1285846_comment'></div>天下之事，在陛下岁月之顷耳，起膏肓于神药，还淳厚于重裘，可立而待也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_253_1285846_comment'></div>陛下之所以策臣者，而于终曰：「子大夫以选待问，其考引古初，攈摭经史，博举先儒之言，茂明当世之务，条著于篇，勿迂勿泛，朕将亲览」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_254_1285846_comment'></div>臣不肖，所闻不广，孤陋自成，无以极古初之道，摭经史之传，妄以其意之所以欲言者，略而言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_255_1285846_comment'></div>臣闻谈天下之常理，必近乎迂；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_256_1285846_comment'></div>为天下之正论，必近乎泛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_257_1285846_comment'></div>古之圣人，平心以来天下之言而不责其必中，其听之似迂也，其取之似泛也，而切言实论始可得而识矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_258_1285846_comment'></div>责其必中而不乐夫迂且泛之言，则奇怪可喜之说交至而莫能择，歆艳夸衍，捭阖钳制，而人主之心术始为天下之所窥矣，名实之辨有不乱乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_259_1285846_comment'></div>臣伏惟陛下求治岁久，未睹成效，深知夫天下之事，似足以乱真，名足以欺实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_260_1285846_comment'></div>是以策臣于始，既责之以实用；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_261_1285846_comment'></div>策臣于终，又戒之以勿迂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_262_1285846_comment'></div>然而臣恐陛下乐闻切近之论，而怪奇可喜，不计本末，不参古今，乘间而为说以中陛下之欲者，不为少矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_263_1285846_comment'></div>陛下之爵足以贵，陛下之禄足以富，名器之所予而奔走之，彼为怪奇可喜之说者攫取而去，陛下将何便于此！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_264_1285846_comment'></div>陛下诚存广大以为听之之道，而使人臣得因贵仕以输切近之忠，规为定于上，法守行于下，怪奇可喜之说不得参于其间，驯致而责其成，则禹、汤之功不难到矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_265_1285846_comment'></div>陛下有上圣之资而行乎久弊之政，方将新美众事，兴举百废，以济大业，以定治本，以追禹、汤之骏功，而听言之道不幸有近于臣之所忧者，故列于末，惟陛下财幸！</div><div id='poem_sentence_266_1285846_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1178&endYear=1178')">1178年</a>　赴鹿鸣宴。作品：鹿鸣宴诗。<div id='poem_80196' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_80196' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/80196?labeling=true' target='_blank'>鹿鸣宴诗</a><span class='authorDate'>（1178年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_80196")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_80196_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_80196'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_80196'>鹿鸣著周雅，取士各惟时。<div id='poem_sentence_0_80196_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_80196'>永嘉近千载，文物盛于斯。<div id='poem_sentence_1_80196_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_80196'>贤侯奉明指，荐棘锁秋扉。<div id='poem_sentence_2_80196_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_80196'>𢁙宝难骤识，独鉴防群嗤。<div id='poem_sentence_3_80196_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_80196'>诚云得之慰，重为失者悲。<div id='poem_sentence_4_80196_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_80196'>鄙夫素寡学，已老谩将知。<div id='poem_sentence_5_80196_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_80196'>仰欣多材聚，俯愧只影踦。<div id='poem_sentence_6_80196_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_80196'>晴霜万里肃，威凤正高飞。<div id='poem_sentence_7_80196_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_80196'>朝阳羽<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_80196", 80196, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>翙翙</span>，春梧绿<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_80196", 80196, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>蕤蕤</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_8_80196_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_80196'>新荣忌轻觅，苦节誓终期。<div id='poem_sentence_9_80196_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_80196'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_80196_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1178&endYear=1178')">1178年</a>　拜谢宰执。作品：登科谢宰执。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='72bf3576e6ba40b6b883ab98ce338afc_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("72bf3576e6ba40b6b883ab98ce338afc");'><span id='72bf3576e6ba40b6b883ab98ce338afc_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1186&endYear=1189')">1186-1189年</a>，37-40岁</div><div id='72bf3576e6ba40b6b883ab98ce338afc' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1186&endYear=1186')">1186年</a>　是年，改宣教郎，任太学正，与俞君烈、刘愚为僚友。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1186&endYear=1186')">1186年</a>　为孟夫人撰写墓志铭。作品：宋故孟夫人墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286173' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286173' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286173?labeling=true' target='_blank'>宋故孟夫人墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1186年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286173")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286173_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286173'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286173'>夫人姓仲氏，扬州人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286173_comment'></div>曾祖迪功郎彦明，祖赠正奉大夫将之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286173_comment'></div>父曰并，字弥性，左朝请大夫，淮东安抚司参议官，有俊名绍兴中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286173_comment'></div>夫人之夫名嵩，朝奉郎直秘阁、浙西安抚司参议官，实少师信安郡王忠厚之次子也，以才称，其仕不究于年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286173_comment'></div>而夫人既寡，后七年，年五十有二，以淳熙甲辰二月癸未卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286173_comment'></div>七月丁酉，合葬于常州无锡县富安乡许岘山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286173_comment'></div>五子：曰夔，宣义郎、监秀州华亭县市舶务，曰曾，皆已亡；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286173_comment'></div>曰猷，宣义郎、新监临安府楼店务；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286173_comment'></div>曰导，承奉郎、新监秀州籴纳仓；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286173_comment'></div>曰翔，将仕郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286173_comment'></div>两孙，曰升，曰桂孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286173_comment'></div>一女最长，适奉议郎、通判筠州李大理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286173_comment'></div>夫人讳灵湛，六岁诵《周》《召南》诗，通其意，识度过人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286173_comment'></div>信安王以恭俭律家，夫人尤勤苦敬顺，事夫训子，率用<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1286173", 1286173, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>寒素</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286173_comment'></div>精义择语，类<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1286173", 1286173, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>先生</span>长者之法言；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286173_comment'></div>当家事，精密有断，近智士丈夫所为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286173_comment'></div>尝见佛者宗杲，重其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1286173", 1286173, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>明悟</span>，使从其徒曰无著道人妙总，总亦以其所知许之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286173_comment'></div>未三十，即斋居蔬食，除割世欲，昼课经梵，夜习禅观，指月出之光自喻其性，以为亘古今不能亏也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286173_comment'></div>将死，子妇等前问，细碎尽酬答，申衍契入，照了幻妄，嬉笑如常日，亦异于人矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286173_comment'></div>自诗书古文，其录贤妇<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1286173", 1286173, "Clauses/68/Comments/0")'>烈女</span>，莫不备闺阃之义，严死生之际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286173_comment'></div>其后世教微阙，虽贤公卿大夫，皆寄性命于禅佛；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286173_comment'></div>及力不能守其说，则荒愦恋结，禅佛者亦笑之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286173_comment'></div>况妇人女子，而能坚勇精进，绝欲轻死，宜其以为奇异希有，高世不伦之行矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286173_comment'></div>若夫人是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286173_comment'></div>使其负如此之性质，出于非禅佛之世，而以夫专洁从一之操，与诗书古文之称参其贤行，岂有高下之差乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286173_comment'></div>余与猷、导游，嘉夫人之义而叹其不遇，故序而铭之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286173_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_1286173'>彼欲伊昏，彼利伊尘；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286173_comment'></div>却灭不存，以性为亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286173_comment'></div>刚者能之，伟欤夫人！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286173_comment'></div>昔之称贤，以法成身；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286173_comment'></div>佩服孔伦，图史是陈；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286173_comment'></div>世异教差，稽德则均。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286173_comment'></div>许岘之山，水奫木囷；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286173_comment'></div>终也可湮，铭此不泯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286173_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_34_1286173'>淳熙丙午正月朔，龙泉叶适撰。</div><div id='poem_sentence_34_1286173_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1186&endYear=1186')">1186年</a>　为姚颖撰写墓志铭。作品：故宣教郎通判平江府姚君墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286174' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286174' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286174?labeling=true' target='_blank'>宋故宣教郎通判平江府姚君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1186年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286174")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286174_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286174'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286174'>余友四明姚君洪卿，淳熙十年十一月十三日，终于苏州官舍，余哭送其柩出盘门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286174_comment'></div>十二月十二日，葬鄞县阳堂乡延寿寺山，孤善长以状来请铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286174_comment'></div>于是善长七岁，而洪卿之死，涉四年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286174_comment'></div>洪卿讳颖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286174_comment'></div>曾祖阜，左迪功郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286174_comment'></div>祖孚，左奉议郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286174_comment'></div>父孝全，以承事郎致仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286174_comment'></div>洪卿淳熙五年策进士第一，授签书宁国军节度判官厅公事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286174_comment'></div>召为秘书省校书郎，出添差通判平江府，遂卒，年三十四。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286174_comment'></div>洪卿冲澹谨重，特有雅量。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286174_comment'></div>赐第时，余与之同谢，又同期集事甚久，余察洪卿不以喜累志也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286174_comment'></div>洪卿之学，勤苦<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1286174", 1286174, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>兼洽</span>，其文精俊详实，然退藏抑损，常愿出人后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286174_comment'></div>既得盛名，尤务审缓，不急暴所长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286174_comment'></div>所历之官，皆人立欲以其材能自振迅者，而洪卿摧敛<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1286174", 1286174, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>锋锐</span>，若不敢有所为，其有所为，惟恐人以为能也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286174_comment'></div>盖余复与之同官于吴，而见其志益明，业益习，论天下事无不尽，而最惓惓于当世所谓善人君子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286174_comment'></div>余然后窃叹国家以科目求士，其偶然得之，而前辈巨人皆由此出，而洪卿器端识远，益进而未已，是其得人矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286174_comment'></div>士之一身与其父母兄弟妻子，皆系命于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1286174", 1286174, "Clauses/55/Comments/0")'>举选</span>之得失，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286174_comment'></div>以其荣悴异焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286174_comment'></div>故得者莫不自以为天与之，而又自以为一与者不复夺也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286174_comment'></div>今天与洪卿之荣如此，而又夺之之峻如此，且并其父母兄弟妻子之望皆失之，何耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286174_comment'></div>岂天固爱之而固忍之耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286174_comment'></div>是殆有不可得晓者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286174_comment'></div>士之饬身厉行，不显于其时，则传于后而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286174_comment'></div>洪卿既首进士，为馆职矣，徒以得年之夭，故不大见，然犹当文有次，官有业，行有述，而善长皆不能言也，岂天之暂显之而终蔽之耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286174_comment'></div>是又特难晓也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286174_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286174_comment'></div>此余所以记其所知之大意，而不使洪卿之遂无传也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286174_comment'></div>洪卿二男，曰善长，曰某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286174_comment'></div>一女，曰某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286174_comment'></div>夫人王氏，今丞相冀国公之子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286174_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_1286174'>不以既与为通，不以复夺为穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286174_comment'></div>众人之荣，如埃随风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286174_comment'></div>有孚其躬，长短必终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286174_comment'></div>昭哉洪卿！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286174_comment'></div>妥矣幽宫。</div><div id='poem_sentence_34_1286174_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1186&endYear=1186')">1186年</a>　为嵇居易撰写墓志铭。作品：将仕郎嵇君墓记。<span class='inlineComment2'>（人名参看《水心集》卷十三。）</span><div id='poem_1286175' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286175' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286175?labeling=true' target='_blank'>将仕郎嵇君墓记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1186年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286175")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286175_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286175'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286175'>君讳居易，字俟之，家应天府宋城，渡江为上虞人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286175_comment'></div>高祖翰林学士颖，拒不献张尧封文者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286175_comment'></div>曾祖景中，将作监主簿；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286175_comment'></div>祖立，赠中奉大夫；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286175_comment'></div>考讳琬，朝请郎，知袁州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286175_comment'></div>君用袁州恩补将仕郎，铨试入等，未及进官，以淳熙十二年二月十七日卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286175_comment'></div>明年八月二十三日，从袁州墓右始宁乡宋家㠗祔焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286175_comment'></div>夫人赵氏，余妇之异姓姑也，故来求铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286175_comment'></div>余未尝知君，而视君之状曰：「事亲纯孝，处己俭约，有乃父风，无子弟<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1286175", 1286175, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>气习</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286175_comment'></div>丧袁州也，毁甚骨立，因得风疾以死」而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286175_comment'></div>其辞方，其事逸，其美略，使余无所依以为述也，辞之五六反。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286175_comment'></div>夫人重介其仆，谓余妇曰：「宣教平生辛苦，既无官爵，且减年寿，一家之恨无复愬矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286175_comment'></div>而葬无埋铭，吾他日何以见吾夫于地下！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286175_comment'></div>汝善请之，吾弗得弗止也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286175_comment'></div>其词甚悲，环听者皆悲，有泪下者，余于是重夫人之欲以文字托其夫也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286175_comment'></div>其家庭之传，夫妇之道，必有可见者，然愧夫终无所依以为述，不能伸夫人所以托其夫之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286175_comment'></div>盖君之子曰楠，曰樗，一女尚幼，姑记以遗之，使待夫楠若樗者长而能考君之行以告，将续书矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286175_comment'></div>宣教郎行太学正叶适记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1286175_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1187&endYear=1187')">1187年</a>　是年升任太学博士。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1187&endYear=1187')">1187年7月28日</a>　七月二十八日，女媛卒，葬之于钱塘门外。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1187&endYear=1187')">1187年7月30日</a>　七月三十日，知大宗正事崇国公赵不𢙯卒，以文祭之。作品：祭赵知宗文。<div id='poem_1286322' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286322' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286322?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭赵知宗文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1187年7月30日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286322")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286322_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286322'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286322'>惟公，廉问岷、梁，政兼忠惠，称一时奉使之贤；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286322_comment'></div>纠察邦族，事遵法教，为近世司宗之首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286322_comment'></div>至于思虑<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1286322", 1286322, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>款实</span>，皆有益之言；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286322_comment'></div>服用粗朴，无私积之富。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286322_comment'></div>顾瞻遗老，存者几人，尚其耇耆，永以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1286322", 1286322, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>引翼</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286322_comment'></div>遽闻殒背，徒切摧伤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286322_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1286322", 1286322, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>荧然</span>一卮，于此<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1286322", 1286322, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>永诀</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1286322_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1187&endYear=1187')">1187年</a>　冬，因轮对，上书孝宗，力主抗金。作品：上殿札子。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1187&endYear=1187')">1187年10月8日</a>　十月八日，高宗赵构卒，作挽词。作品：高宗皇帝挽词二首。<div id='poem_80022' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_80022' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/80022?labeling=true' target='_blank'>高宗皇帝挽词二首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1187年10月8日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_80022")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_80022_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_80022'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_80022'>何止超前代，功隆道更尊。<div id='poem_sentence_0_80022_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_80022'>几同造区夏，还复外乾坤。<div id='poem_sentence_1_80022_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_80022'>黄屋尧年度，青山禹穴昏。<div id='poem_sentence_2_80022_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_80022'>遗民犹望幸，泪血洒中原。<div id='poem_sentence_3_80022_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_80022'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_80022_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_80021' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_80021' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/80021?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1187年10月8日）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_80021_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_80021'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_80021'>河济初开府，江淮晚视师。<div id='poem_sentence_0_80021_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_80021'>缵戎繇子圣，永命独天知。<div id='poem_sentence_1_80021_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_80021'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_80021", 80021, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>鹤唳</span>空虚警，云生仗自移<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_80021_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_80021'>上哀何以称，卒代继周时。<div id='poem_sentence_3_80021_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_80021'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_80021_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_80021'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_80021_0'>⑴ 时厌代之夕都下相传有䌽云翔鹤之异</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_80021_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1187&endYear=1187')">1187年</a>　为厉详撰墓志铭。作品：厉君墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（人名参看《水心集》卷十三。）</span><div id='poem_1286182' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286182' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286182?labeling=true' target='_blank'>厉君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1187年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286182")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286182_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286182'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286182'>东阳厉详，自余居永嘉及吴也，东西数百里来学，岁时不归，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1286182", 1286182, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>同席</span>畏其专。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286182_comment'></div>余间问详：「岂有兄弟任事者耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286182_comment'></div>曰：「无兄弟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286182_comment'></div>大人之诲详曰：『学惟远而闻无狭，师惟久而业弗遁，不淑其身不止』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286182_comment'></div>故详之归不敢尔」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286182_comment'></div>余悚然知厉君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286182_comment'></div>有过其家者，为余言：「君不广门巷，不大屋宅，不营子利，仅足而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286182_comment'></div>言简而志啬，退己而进物，桑果蔬药之列不乱，盖知自守者也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286182_comment'></div>余于是愿识君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286182_comment'></div>淳熙十二年八月某日，君年四十八，无甚疾而卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286182_comment'></div>详跣哭，沿震泽绝浙江以敛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286182_comment'></div>十四年某月某日，既葬，使告余曰：「先生将何以相之」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286182_comment'></div>余重愧夫累详而不及视君之诀也，且又知君愿识君未果而君死也，与之铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_1286182'>厉显唐世，都督御史；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286182_comment'></div>灌顶中兴，故存其址。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286182_comment'></div>君名邦俊，元明繄字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286182_comment'></div>考及祖曾，不逮于仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286182_comment'></div>配惟吴氏，婿也卢辅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286182_comment'></div>幼女许嫁，乐清夏鲁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286182_comment'></div>君郁所能，讳为世知；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286182_comment'></div>续功于儒，一子是诒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286182_comment'></div>怀德其乡，逍遥之原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286182_comment'></div>匪往者辞，彼来者言。</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1286182_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1187&endYear=1187')">1187年</a>　撰写诗文。作品：赠讷相。进故事。<div id='poem_80222' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_80222' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/80222?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赠讷相</a><span class='authorDate'>（1187年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_80222")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_80222_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_80222'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_80222'>柯山讷相丑形模，以相获妍如子都。<div id='poem_sentence_0_80222_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_80222'>每将气色较官簿，初若搏影终探符。<div id='poem_sentence_1_80222_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_80222'>刘公实，升提刑，丘宗卿，加龙图。<div id='poem_sentence_2_80222_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_80222'>就中两说最称验，余耳所逮非人诬。<div id='poem_sentence_3_80222_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_80222'>汎言心事依劝戒，多假名器烦邀呼。<div id='poem_sentence_4_80222_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_80222'>君门九重远万里，求者争道分荣枯。<div id='poem_sentence_5_80222_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_80222'>一身暂寄百骸聚，楦彼朱紫谁头颅。<div id='poem_sentence_6_80222_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_80222'>子其惜术无浪许，恐负西山之饿夫。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_80222_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1286065' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286065' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286065?labeling=true' target='_blank'>进故事</a><span class='authorDate'>（1187年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286065")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286065_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286065'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286065'>定公问：「一言而可以兴邦，有诸」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286065_comment'></div>孔子对曰：「言不可以若是其几也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286065_comment'></div>人之言曰：『为君难，为臣不易』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286065_comment'></div>如知为君之难也，不几乎一言而兴邦乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286065_comment'></div>曰：「一言而丧邦，有诸」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286065_comment'></div>孔子对曰：「言不可以若是其几也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286065_comment'></div>人之言曰：『予无乐乎为君，唯其言而莫予违也』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286065_comment'></div>如其善而莫之违也，不亦善乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286065_comment'></div>如不善而莫之违也，不几乎一言而丧邦乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286065_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_1286065'>臣闻鲁为因旧之国，定公非开治之君，然其所问，犹欲求邦之所以废兴，且以一言为断，志如此其切，词如此其急者，盖当是时王道虽衰而未息，其君臣相与议论，尚能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1286065", 1286065, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>参稽</span>于义理之初而未尽埋没于事为之末故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286065_comment'></div>自禹承舜曰：「后克艰厥后，臣克艰厥臣，政乃乂，黎民敏德」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286065_comment'></div>伊尹训太甲曰：「有言逆于汝心，必求诸道；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286065_comment'></div>有言逊于汝志，必求诸非道」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286065_comment'></div>是则君臣各知难而任责，人主必舍己而求是，乃从古致治之本原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286065_comment'></div>春秋以来，几失之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286065_comment'></div>臣尝因孔子之对而论之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286065_comment'></div>夫推兴丧者治之理，而顺乐易者人之情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286065_comment'></div>然而克艰乃致易之原也，受逆乃得顺之门也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286065_comment'></div>人情见美而心好，即安而意悦，常欲以易求易而不知其难，以顺求顺而不知其逆也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286065_comment'></div>故因一易造百难，因一顺生众逆，轻则疑阻横生、怨谤满前，重则矛戟森起、杀戮相继，展转<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1286065", 1286065, "Clauses/60/Comments/0")'>雠疾</span>，靡所定止，而身与家国从之，乌得其顺且易哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286065_comment'></div>治道有二：内理也，外事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286065_comment'></div>事著而有方，故任之欲难，难则行，行则勤，勤则业广，积日累月而无事不举，非致易乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286065_comment'></div>理微而无形，故察之欲逆，逆则止，止则思，思则理明，心融意浃而群疑冰释，非致顺乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286065_comment'></div>外业广，内理明，治天下不能加毫末矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286065_comment'></div>此「为君难」所以为「一言而兴邦」，而「唯其言莫予违」所以为「一言而丧邦」也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286065_comment'></div>臣观三代以前，君臣共治，无一事不难，无一语不逆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286065_comment'></div>如疆田畴，如作室屋，如利器用，无一苟且以就堕媮者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286065_comment'></div>及其功业<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1286065", 1286065, "Clauses/94/Comments/0")'>光美</span>，垂布简册，顺易孰大焉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286065_comment'></div>后之君臣，或有所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1286065", 1286065, "Clauses/98/Comments/0")'>更尝</span>，有所容受，不必尽合，遂称治世，然其去古人则已远矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286065_comment'></div>况于忽所难，趋所易，安所顺，舍所逆，以酖毒为甘美，而寝积薪之火者，可不畏孔子之言哉！</div><div id='poem_sentence_29_1286065_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1188&endYear=1188')">1188年</a>　是年，叶适转奉议郎、太常博士兼实录院检讨官，詹体仁、林湜同在太常，交往密切。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1188&endYear=1188')">1188年</a>　上书右丞相周必大，推荐陈傅良等三十四人。作品：上执政荐士书。<div id='poem_1285871' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1285871' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1285871?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上执政荐士书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1188年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1285871")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1285871_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1285871'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1285871'>国家之用贤才，必如饥渴之于饮食，诚心好之，求取之急惟恐不至，口腹之获惟恐不尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1285871_comment'></div>及其醉饱之馀，嗜好衰息，方复调适众味，和剂八珍，祈恳而后进，勉强而后餐，其不弃去者寡矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1285871_comment'></div>故上有失士之患，而士有不遇时之悲，至使官职旷阙，治功陵夷，雅俗隳坏，遗风不接，由其始用之非诚心，善人之类遭厌薄而散漫也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1285871_comment'></div>窃以近岁海内方闻之士，志行端一，才能敏强，可以卓然当国家之用者，宜不为少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1285871_comment'></div>而其间虽有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1285871", 1285871, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>已经</span>选用，不究才能，尝预荐闻，未蒙旌擢；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1285871_comment'></div>亦有已罹忧患，恐致沈沦，既得外迁，因不复入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1285871_comment'></div>以一疑而伤众信，用浮华而伤实能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1285871_comment'></div>又况其自安常分，无所扳援，复贻颓年，永绝荣进者乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1285871_comment'></div>每一思之，深切痛悼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1285871_comment'></div>伏惟丞相国公晋当国柄，所宜察饥渴饮食之时，体尽诚好士之心，急求力取，博选亟用，以为国本民命永远之地，以报明主之遇，以塞多士之责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1285871_comment'></div>某等见闻所亲不相为比，所爱不相为私，疏以公相信，远以义相昭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1285871_comment'></div>昔班固奏记东平王苍，荐者六人，国为得才，不专幕府，而苍纳之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1285871_comment'></div>裴伯为李吉甫疏三十士，吉甫藉以举用，而当时翕然称其得人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1285871_comment'></div>某等滥膺朝列，叨窃禄食，常愧听闻短狭，知贤不多，无以裨补万一，不胜惭愧！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1285871_comment'></div>谨自陈傅良以下三十四人，冒昧以闻，伏候采择。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1285871_comment'></div>陈傅良，刘清之，勾昌泰，祝环，石斗文，陆九渊，沈焕，王谦，丰谊，章颖，陈损之，郑伯英，黄艾，王叔简，马大同，吕祖俭，石宗昭，范仲黼，徐谊，杨简，潘景宪，徐元德，戴溪，蔡戡，岳甫，王楠，游九言，吴镒，项安世，刘爚，舒璘，林鼐，袁謇，廖德明。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1285871_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1188&endYear=1188')">1188年</a>　六月，新江西提刑朱熹为兵部郎官，以足疾未就职，林栗劾其慢命，熹乞奉祠，叶适独上封事为朱熹辩护。作品：辩兵部郎官朱元晦状。<div id='poem_1285830' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1285830' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1285830?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辩兵部郎官朱元晦状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1188年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1285830")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1285830_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1285830'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1285830'>臣闻臣子告君父之言必以实，非其实而敢告者，惟私意之是徇，而忘君父之为不可欺者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1285830_comment'></div>臣窃见近日朱熹除兵部郎官，未供职间，而侍郎林栗急劾去之，士论怪骇，莫测其故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1285830_comment'></div>盖熹素有文学行谊，居官所至有绩，因王淮深恶之，遂不敢仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1285830_comment'></div>陛下差熹江西提刑，使之奏事，熹趑趄辞避，终未敢前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1285830_comment'></div>淮既<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1285830", 1285830, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>罢去</span>，陛下趣熹入对，用为郎官，人知陛下进熹有渐，无不称庆，忽为栗诬奏逐去，众议所以汹汹不平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1285830_comment'></div>臣始疑之，以为栗何故至此，得非熹果有罪，外人不能知，而栗独得其实以告陛下也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1285830_comment'></div>暨栗劾奏熹文字传播中外，臣始得以始末参验，然后知其言熹罪，无一实者，特发于私意而遂忘其欺尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1285830_comment'></div>栗虽贵而近，臣虽贱而远，然臣子之于君父，大义一也，乌有栗以熹不实之罪欺罔君父之前，而臣忍不以实陈于陛下乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1285830_comment'></div>栗言：「熹敢自称私计非便，只欲回就江西提刑，已受省劄，不肯赴部供职」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1285830_comment'></div>臣闻熹既受除郎官省劄，即时遣回江西提刑司接人，客将兵卒等皆已辞去，其时朝士有候熹者，皆共见之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1285830_comment'></div>熹以脚疾发动，不任下床，遂申尚书省，乞给假候痊安日供职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1285830_comment'></div>是栗谓熹只欲回就江西不肯供职者，非其实也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1285830_comment'></div>栗言：「熹四司郎官厅印记不肯收受，推出门外，令送长贰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1285830_comment'></div>缘长贰不合收管郎官厅印记，臣再令送还，仍加<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1285830", 1285830, "Clauses/62/Comments/0")'>镌谕</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1285830_comment'></div>既能出入宫门，上殿奏事，并遍谒宰执台谏，即乘轿入部供职，良不为难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1285830_comment'></div>兼郎官印记，难以弃掷在外，虑有失去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1285830_comment'></div>其朱熹坚执不从，臣为贰卿，不能率属，致其偃蹇拒违君命，实负惭德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1285830_comment'></div>所有印记无所归著，不免令四司人吏抱守终夕，至于达旦」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1285830_comment'></div>且臣闻熹未对之前，脚疾已作；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1285830_comment'></div>当对之日，偶然少止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1285830_comment'></div>对下之日，后与宰执台谏相见，脚疾痛复剧；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1285830_comment'></div>既申尚书省祗受恩命，止乞给假供职，适会歇泊旬休，未及将上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1285830_comment'></div>所有郎官印记，熹既未供职，岂可受乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1285830_comment'></div>熹已申省乞给假矣，虽欲听栗<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1285830", 1285830, "Clauses/94/Comments/0")'>镌谕</span>而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1285830", 1285830, "Clauses/94/Comments/1")'>扶曳</span>供职，可乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1285830_comment'></div>郎官未供职以前，印记合是何官收掌，此正长贰之所当知，其可推以委熹乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1285830_comment'></div>是栗谓熹不受印记，偃蹇拒违君命，非其实也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1285830_comment'></div>栗又言：「熹本无学术，徒窃张载、程颐之绪馀，以为浮诞宗主，谓之道学，妄自推尊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1285830_comment'></div>所至辄携门生十数人，习为春秋、战国之态，妄希孔、孟<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1285830", 1285830, "Clauses/111/Comments/1")'>历聘</span>之风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1285830_comment'></div>绳以治世之法，则乱人之首也」。<div class='inline'
