id='poem_sentence_28_1285830_comment'></div>臣闻朝廷开学校，建儒官，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1285830", 1285830, "Clauses/116/Comments/0")'>公教</span>育于上，士子辟<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1285830", 1285830, "Clauses/117/Comments/0")'>家塾</span>，隆师友，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1285830", 1285830, "Clauses/119/Comments/0")'>私淑艾</span>于下，自古而然矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1285830_comment'></div>使熹果无学术欤，人何用仰之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1285830_comment'></div>果有学术欤，其相与从之者，非欲强自<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1285830", 1285830, "Clauses/125/Comments/0")'>标目</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1285830_comment'></div>以劝人为忠为孝者，乃所以为人材计，为国家计也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1285830_comment'></div>惟蔡京用事，讳习元祐学术，曾有不得为师之禁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1285830_comment'></div>今栗以诸生不得从熹讲学为熹之罪，而又谓非治世之法，宜禁绝之，此又非其实也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1285830_comment'></div>栗又言「熹欲索<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1285830", 1285830, "Clauses/136/Comments/1")'>高价</span>，妄意要津，傲睨累日，不肯供职」，以为作伪有不可掩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1285830_comment'></div>夫栗逆探熹之用心而暴扬之，此非臣之所得知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1285830_comment'></div>臣所得知者，熹以今月初八日除郎，十一日再为江西提刑，栗之劾熹，当在初九、初十尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1285830_comment'></div>相去隔日之间，而栗以熹累日不肯供职，是栗急于诬熹，而不自顾其言之非实也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1285830_comment'></div>栗又言：「陛下爱惜名器，馆学寺监久次当迁郎官者，只令兼权，其视郎选亦不轻矣，而熹乃轻之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1285830_comment'></div>兵部郎官本系大宗丞计衡兼权，以熹之故，移计衡于都官而以兵部处熹，所以待熹亦不薄矣，而熹乃薄之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1285830_comment'></div>臣闻陛下明诏，曾任监司知县者，始得除郎，其事久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1285830_comment'></div>馆学寺监，虽久次而未尝历知县监司，则不可兼权，岂得谓其当迁郎哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1285830_comment'></div>差除之际，那换阙次，移衡用熹，熹何德焉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1285830_comment'></div>是又栗急于诬熹之罪，组织其言语，足其文尔，而不自顾其言之非实也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1285830_comment'></div>栗又言：「职制者朝廷之纪纲，熹既除兵部，在臣合有统摄，乞将熹新旧任<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_45_1285830", 1285830, "Clauses/183/Comments/1")'>并且</span>停罢」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1285830_comment'></div>臣闻唐左右丞进退郎官矣，本朝故事，未之或然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1285830_comment'></div>惟台谏弹劾，有停斥之请；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1285830_comment'></div>给舍缴駮，有寝罢之文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1285830_comment'></div>至于六部寺监举劾其属，必曰「乞行回避」，微其文，婉其义，所以重台纲，尊国体也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1285830_comment'></div>今熹得为栗之属，尚未供职，而栗望风劾之，且兼用给舍、台谏缴劾百官之例，何哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1285830_comment'></div>栗以职制纪纲劾熹，而先自乱之，是职制纪纲非其实也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1285830_comment'></div>凡栗之辞，始末参验，无一实者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1285830_comment'></div>至于其中「谓之道学」一语，则无实最甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1285830_comment'></div>利害所系，不独朱熹，臣不可不力辩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1285830_comment'></div>盖自昔小人残害忠良，率有指名，或以为好名，或以为立异，或以为植党。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1285830_comment'></div>近创为「道学」之目，郑丙倡之，陈贾和之，居要津者密相付授，见<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_56_1285830", 1285830, "Clauses/222/Comments/0")'>士大夫</span>有稍慕洁修，粗能操守，辄以道学之名归之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1285830_comment'></div>以为善为玷阙，以好学为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_57_1285830", 1285830, "Clauses/226/Comments/0")'>过愆</span>，相为钩距，使不能进，从旁窥伺，使不获安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1285830_comment'></div>于是贤士惴慄，中材解体，销声灭影，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_58_1285830", 1285830, "Clauses/234/Comments/0")'>秽德垢行</span>，以避此名，殆如<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_58_1285830", 1285830, "Clauses/236/Comments/0")'>吃菜事魔</span>影迹犯败之类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1285830_comment'></div>往日王淮表里台谏，阴废正人，盖用此术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1285830_comment'></div>此于陛下彰善黜恶，封殖人才，以为子孙无穷之命者，其损不细矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1285830_comment'></div>栗为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_61_1285830", 1285830, "Clauses/244/Comments/0")'>侍从</span>，就其蹇浅，无以达陛下之德意志虑，示信于下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1285830_comment'></div>而更<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_62_1285830", 1285830, "Clauses/248/Comments/1")'>袭用</span>郑丙、陈贾密相付授之说，以道学为大罪，文致语言，逐去一熹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1285830_comment'></div>自此游辞无实，谗口横生，善良受祸，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_63_1285830", 1285830, "Clauses/255/Comments/0")'>何所不有</span>！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1285830_comment'></div>臣伏见栗耻不得与庙号之议，遂为乐尧之说，而人知其横；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1285830_comment'></div>怒详定所人吏执覆，遂请罢局，而人知其专。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1285830_comment'></div>而况职匪<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_66_1285830", 1285830, "Clauses/262/Comments/0")'>风闻</span>，古有常守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1285830_comment'></div>今又茍恣一身之很愎，不畏君父之高明，公形无实之言，显逐知名之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1285830_comment'></div>陛下原其用心，察其旨趣，举动如此，欲以何为！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1285830_comment'></div>诚不可不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_69_1285830", 1285830, "Clauses/272/Comments/0")'>预防</span>，不可不早辨也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1285830_comment'></div>臣去冬蒙恩面对，论一大事有四难、五不可之条，其说至长，未获究竟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1285830_comment'></div>方<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_71_1285830", 1285830, "Clauses/278/Comments/0")'>斋心涤虑</span>，以俟陛下反覆诘难，庶几竭尽愚衷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1285830_comment'></div>今以郎官去留，何至上封事譊譊，徒溷<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_72_1285830", 1285830, "Clauses/283/Comments/0")'>宸虑</span>哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1285830_comment'></div>盖见大臣以下，畏栗凶燄，莫敢明辨，积在厉阶，将害大体尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1285830_comment'></div>伏愿陛下正纪纲之所在，绝欺罔于既形，无惟其近，惟其贤，无惟其官，惟其是，摧折<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_74_1285830", 1285830, "Clauses/295/Comments/0")'>暴横</span>以扶善类，奋发刚断以慰公言，国家之本，孰大于此！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1285830_comment'></div>臣不胜效忠思报之至！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1285830_comment'></div>干冒宸严，伏地待罪。</div><div id='poem_sentence_76_1285830_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1188&endYear=1188')">1188年8月</a>　八月，为皇太后宫拟名慈福宫。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1188&endYear=1188')">1188年3月</a>　三月，为同僚蔡镐之从祖撰写藏书序文。作品：石庵藏书目序。<div id='poem_1285889' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1285889' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1285889?labeling=true' target='_blank'>石庵藏书目序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1188年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1285889")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1285889_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1285889'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1285889'>石庵书若干卷，承奉郎蔡君瑞藏之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1285889_comment'></div>始，蔡君之伯父曰居士，葬母，因其地为庐居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1285889_comment'></div>绍兴十九年，大旱饥，榖石五千二百足钱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1285889_comment'></div>居士将以所馀榖散之，而患无名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1285889_comment'></div>时庵傍有石，冒土而奋，如<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1285889", 1285889, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>蟠根</span>丛萌，欲发而尚郁者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1285889_comment'></div>遂为万夫佣，使出之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1285889_comment'></div>高二丈，广可三之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1285889_comment'></div>石温润如玉质，故名石庵云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1285889_comment'></div>蔡君念族人多贫，不尽能学，始买书寘石庵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1285889_comment'></div>增其屋为便房，愿读者处焉，买田百亩助之食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1285889_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1285889_comment'></div>蔡君可谓能教矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1285889_comment'></div>富者知损其赢，以益市书与田，而收恤其族人，则无富之过；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1285889_comment'></div>贫者随聪明之小大，以书<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1285889", 1285889, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>自业</span>，而不苟恃衣食，则无贫之患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1285889_comment'></div>教成义立，而族多<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1285889", 1285889, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>材贤</span>，则玉石之祥，其遂酬乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1285889_comment'></div>君之从孙武学谕镐，与余同寮，以请而序之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1285889_comment'></div>淳熙十五年三月日。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1285889_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1188&endYear=1188')">1188年</a>　为林鼐岳父撰墓志铭。作品：宋杜君墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286176' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286176' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286176?labeling=true' target='_blank'>宋杜君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1188年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286176")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286176_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286176'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286176'>台州黄岩有善士曰杜君，讳椿，字大年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286176_comment'></div>学以厚其质，不为浮华枝叶之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286176_comment'></div>其行推己以恕人，无矫厉崭绝之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286176_comment'></div>其处家居乡，自以为我士也，凡为善与义，而至于侵越其所守，以涉于售誉取名之嫌者，皆抑而不敢行，故常足其分而已，然其久而人自化服，盖其质之不可掩也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286176_comment'></div>试于礼部，不中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286176_comment'></div>当特奏名，因谢不出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286176_comment'></div>年七十四而死，乡人叹惜之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286176_comment'></div>淳熙十五年八月甲申，君卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286176_comment'></div>满三月，二子烨、知仁，即葬君于善化乡亲仁里之樊川，而致其婿林鼐之述来请铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286176_comment'></div>烨为乡贡进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286176_comment'></div>鼐，余友也，为承议郎，通判筠州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286176_comment'></div>余观夫世人役于时之好恶，而终其身求以徇外之绳墨为不足，以卒丧其所立者多矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286176_comment'></div>如君之安于一丘，而能自信独乐，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1286176", 1286176, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>耆老</span>不倦，以尽其死，是可贤也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286176_comment'></div>故稍采其平生之大意而铭之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286176_comment'></div>君曾祖明，祖谊，父舜卿，夫人商氏、徐氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286176_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_1286176'>君尝榜其居之堂曰遗安，义取庞公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286176_comment'></div>豫名其兆以牧之之樊川，而自号樊翁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286176_comment'></div>死命其子敛用深衣，葬用三月，曰惟礼之从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286176_comment'></div>稼不使枯兮，廪则不丰；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286176_comment'></div>游于樊兮，合族宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286176_comment'></div>君最老而命歌兮，和者幼童。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286176_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286176_comment'></div>尔后之人兮，无坠此风！</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1286176_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1188&endYear=1188')">1188年</a>　为丘崇之母撰墓志铭。作品：故太硕人臧氏墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286180' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286180' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286180?labeling=true' target='_blank'>故太硕人臧氏墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1188年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286180")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286180_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286180'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286180'>赠朝散大夫丘君讳经字子常之夫人曰臧氏，淳熙十四年七月二日卒，年八十七。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286180_comment'></div>时夫人之子崇，以朝请大夫直龙图阁，为两浙转运副使，上特厚赙赐之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286180_comment'></div>十五年三月六日，遂葬夫人于江阴城东敔山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286180_comment'></div>始，大夫葬城西四十馀年矣，弗果合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286180_comment'></div>夫人及大夫，皆江阴人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286180_comment'></div>大夫质厚而逊，有冒夺其田者，大夫知直在己，耻以讼自言，因推与之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286180_comment'></div>绍兴行经界法遽，民尤惮役，大夫赀不当募，叹曰：「吾何敢钩及邻比以重难委人耶」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286180_comment'></div>卒默受役，费几尽其产。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286180_comment'></div>其仁不忍校如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286180_comment'></div>大夫终，诸子皆幼，夫人悉罢废故所治生事，独郭外田数十亩，曰：「耕此，教若曹耳」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286180_comment'></div>虽甚贫，而能储乏积少，以供宾祭，待问遗，人不疑其力之不逮也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286180_comment'></div>察士之材否，使其子择而后从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286180_comment'></div>夜必令执书，从旁曰：「我妇人也，不能知书之义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286180_comment'></div>观其玩诵反复，清切不寐者，深于学之验也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286180_comment'></div>道里中某子某弟成坏近事，曰：「此我所知也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286180_comment'></div>又逆论其远者，数为危语以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1286180", 1286180, "Clauses/52/Comments/0")'>动切</span>之，曰：「我寡而尔贫，使但为中人，弗能振也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286180_comment'></div>其后龙图中甲科，仕历内外矣，夫人每告以上拔擢太过，宜自警厉之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286180_comment'></div>及龙图治行暴当世，赫然为名能臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286180_comment'></div>其所平处，欲周尽情伪，时有纵恕；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286180_comment'></div>必使人乐其明，安其政者，无不孜孜言之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286180_comment'></div>天下高龙图之名，而未知夫人训之勤也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286180_comment'></div>夫人既晚获荣养封秩，龙图又请移妇吴氏所得恩及庆太上皇帝、太上皇后万寿，累至太硕人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286180_comment'></div>所迎置皆繁会地，极燕游滋味之适。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286180_comment'></div>然夫人常不以为幸，间独掩涕，忽忽伤大夫之不及见而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286180_comment'></div>虽笃老，犹自缝缉，衣敝不肯更。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286180_comment'></div>有积辄散之，曰：「岂无财之罪耶」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286180_comment'></div>三子：长早卒；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286180_comment'></div>曰轼，亦先卒；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286180_comment'></div>季，龙图也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286180_comment'></div>二女，适汤季行，汤大成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286180_comment'></div>孙曰寿俊，脩职郎、新严州司户参军；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286180_comment'></div>寿嗣，寿迈，寿倩，寿昌，寿嘏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286180_comment'></div>孙婿曰丁圻，卢鹏南，吕鼎，从事郎新温州军事推官赵师端，馀未行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286180_comment'></div>曾孙二男一女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286180_comment'></div>夫昔之履约蹈难，奋其名节，已而门户盛大，子孙昌衍，迄为世家者，无不称其母之贤也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286180_comment'></div>夫人始寡居尤薄而守义益笃，其子赖以成名，是宜书矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286180_comment'></div>而大夫尚德无竞，殁久而善愈报，可不并序见之，亦以慰龙图君之哀思！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286180_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_37_1286180'>嫠适其遇，贫非其惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286180_comment'></div>其义不毁，有子以裕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286180_comment'></div>命秩厚之，年寿久之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286180_comment'></div>其究不留，铭勿朽之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_40_1286180_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1188&endYear=1188')">1188年</a>　为叶权撰墓志铭。作品：叶君墓志铭。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1188&endYear=1188')">1188年</a>　为赵不息撰写行状。作品：故昭庆军承宣使知大宗正事赠开府仪同三司崇国赵公行状。<span class='inlineComment2'>（人名参看《水心集》卷二十六。）</span><div id='poem_1286167' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286167' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286167?labeling=true' target='_blank'>故昭庆军承宣使知大宗正事赠开府仪同三司崇国赵公行状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1188年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286167")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286167_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286167'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286167'>公姓赵氏，讳不𢙯，字仁仲，太宗皇帝六世孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286167_comment'></div>曾祖宗晖，判大宗正事，嗣濮王，濮之嗣王由王始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286167_comment'></div>追封怀王，谥曰荣穆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286167_comment'></div>祖南康郡王仲损，追王于沂，谥恭宪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286167_comment'></div>父士圃，为集庆军节度使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286167_comment'></div>公以宣和四年天宁节赐名，授保义郎，监岳庙，在西京者一，潭州者一，皆食其禄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286167_comment'></div>次迁至从义郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286167_comment'></div>中绍兴二十七年进士第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286167_comment'></div>当超两秩，请以益其母封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286167_comment'></div>法止令人，高宗嘉之，封曹氏咸宁郡夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286167_comment'></div>易左宣义郎，婺州金华县丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286167_comment'></div>初，青城之难，集庆从焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286167_comment'></div>公生七年，祖母李夫人，母齐国曹夫人，更负公逃兵间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286167_comment'></div>公尝思慕涕泣曰：「不当灭贼见吾父耶」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286167_comment'></div>闻者壮而哀之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286167_comment'></div>十四岁，丧李夫人，执三年丧，如成人礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286167_comment'></div>转徙浙东、闽之建上，与其贤士游，求书手自写读，昼夜学不去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286167_comment'></div>曹夫人间止公曰：「汝有官矣，勤甚将自苦」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286167_comment'></div>公谢曰：「君父未报，非敢志富贵也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286167_comment'></div>夫人以是奇公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286167_comment'></div>故未及第前，不仕州县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286167_comment'></div>金华知县懦，不事，公为决其邑事，不使郡守以为令过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286167_comment'></div>豪姓何汝翼挟持其县，前后邑官莫敢较。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286167_comment'></div>汝翼谓公可<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1286167", 1286167, "Clauses/63/Comments/0")'>习慢</span>也，以事至，则傲抗无礼，公械治之，请于郡，编置他州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286167_comment'></div>虏亮畔盟有闻，公逆遣吏别市军须物，人初疑之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286167_comment'></div>既而上司果配买诸县，独金华得不扰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286167_comment'></div>通判永州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286167_comment'></div>永民输米斛面殆过正税，公诚言于守，减其数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286167_comment'></div>湖南患役兵睥睨诸郡，择便利去来，辄易姓名应募。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286167_comment'></div>有刺其眉以别之者，卒传相怨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286167_comment'></div>而永守亦欲效之，卒几变矣，公力止之，得免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286167_comment'></div>始，公应举赴集，必侍齐国以行，未尝违温凊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286167_comment'></div>时靖州守贰交劾，盛夏制狱数百人，其亲戚皆哭送就逮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286167_comment'></div>安抚使命公治之，公不敢辞，遂与齐国俱至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286167_comment'></div>视其牍，曰：「此守倅不足尔，平人无罪也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286167_comment'></div>躬抚囚，视饮食之，荷系必避日之东西。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286167_comment'></div>不十日狱成，被罪则数人，重者杖而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286167_comment'></div>靖人德公与夫人，绘其像事之，谓公慈悲，夫人劝善云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286167_comment'></div>刘珙预政事，旧知公，欲用为寺监丞，公辞曰：「母老矣，家且贫，所急者见次尔」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286167_comment'></div>刘公叹息之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286167_comment'></div>得知开州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1286167_comment'></div>开在巴东穷陋处，公罢横敛，去苛政，以修学兴孝劝之，民稍知义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1286167_comment'></div>郡盐井曰温汤，先是长吏必以所亲吏监之，相为利，公罢不用，民以宽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1286167_comment'></div>省啬公费，至之年，代民秋输，明年，又代民夏租之半。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1286167_comment'></div>州以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_44_1286167", 1286167, "Clauses/135/Comments/0")'>天申节</span>银绢抑配于民，民甚苦之，公始用库钱除其配。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1286167_comment'></div>夔州岁寄籴和籴军粮，使民中米易以盐，吏为奸而盐不可得，公始鬻盐籴旁郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1286167_comment'></div>开人请公刻于石，曰：「异时有复科者，将抱石以愬也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1286167_comment'></div>在开三年，民绝斗殴，夜不闭户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1286167_comment'></div>治唐韦处厚盛山十二景，复其故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1286167_comment'></div>诸司荐之，以为如古循吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1286167_comment'></div>除夔州路转运判官，开人数千遏城门不得行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1286167_comment'></div>公使谕之曰：「今犹在本州，惠利可及汝也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1286167_comment'></div>人皆哭曰：「<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_52_1286167", 1286167, "Clauses/159/Comments/2")'>何若</span>只在我州」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1286167_comment'></div>开人至今思公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1286167_comment'></div>夔州在蜀四路尤穷，公既奉使，访其所疾苦，僚吏皆曰：「夔路银两估六千，恭、涪、忠、万、夔，最凋郡也，今以银绢上供，则五州之困久矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1286167_comment'></div>公以大宁盐者，夔路财货之所出也，吏不得人，私贩卤折。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1286167_comment'></div>且部使者以亲旧摄官，而佐以转运司吏，故利不专于上而因缘侵刻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1286167_comment'></div>公首斥去，悉委大宁监而课其最负。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1286167_comment'></div>未几告羡，盐多无所泄，公喜曰：「吾事就矣」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1286167_comment'></div>乃出钱市羡盐数十万斤，视恭、涪以上米贱，而盐贵大宁数倍，使卖之，得米三万馀斛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1286167_comment'></div>时湖北大饥，以米至荆南，民歌舞于道，易银而归，遂代五郡上供银一万五千七百两，绢一万二千二百匹，总缗钱十五万馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1286167_comment'></div>移成都路转运判官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1286167_comment'></div>西方饥甚，公不俟装行，岁暮抵泸南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1286167_comment'></div>泸南多谷，公曰：「使吾视事然后告籴，则岁已改而民饿死矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1286167_comment'></div>即日借泸南五万缗，选迎吏留泸州、江安、南溪等为籴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1286167_comment'></div>既入境，号其部曰：「米至矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1286167_comment'></div>闭籴者争自粜，价几减半。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1286167_comment'></div>永康军都江堰者，彭、汉、永康、成都、蜀郡之田所资以溉也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1286167_comment'></div>受水之郡，孟春会灌口神李冰祠下，笼石蛇拦江为巨堰，吏盗佣而堰不足以待水之暴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1286167_comment'></div>乾道壬辰，夏秋大水，堰坏，下田涨，上田涸，岁之所以饥也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1286167_comment'></div>公径趋永康筑堰，绳去岁弊吏坐之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1286167_comment'></div>然后分三策：民业耕者，田主<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_71_1286167", 1286167, "Clauses/226/Comments/0")'>借贷</span>之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1286167_comment'></div>游手末作，上户籴米赈之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1286167_comment'></div>老幼疾患，官为粥饭养之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1286167_comment'></div>双流米氏吝粜，邑民聚而发其廪，公罪米氏，籍其米，黥盗米者十馀人，他富家、饥民皆震恐不敢违。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1286167_comment'></div>虞丞相允文别田在二江，亦尽其藏以赈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1286167_comment'></div>公号令恳恻严信，州县推心奉承，民皆实被惠，存活数百馀万人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1286167_comment'></div>乾道九年，黎州青羌奴儿结反，知州宇文绍直遣推官黎商老御之，未战溃，商老等死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1286167_comment'></div>制置使急调兵千馀人戍沈黎，属公饷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1286167_comment'></div>故富人出粮，而下户以力致于边，公曰：「蜀饥，未能自哺，不可扰也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1286167_comment'></div>以自籴馀米，发嘉、眉、邛、蜀兵运入沈黎而益部不知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1286167_comment'></div>奴儿结者，吐蕃小聚落也，不满数百，以盗马为业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1286167_comment'></div>一日，盗宝塞良马十一疋，鬻于官，守将不与直，故叛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1286167_comment'></div>黎推官既死，制置使使权黎州王昉赂奴儿结，与之盟，公不可，曰：「若大族何」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1286167_comment'></div>使不听，卒盟之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1286167_comment'></div>是岁，召使还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1286167_comment'></div>公摄事三日，吐蕃酋首梦东畜列数千人，越大渡河，破汉源镇，入汉地二百七十里，沈黎大惊，成都亦恐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1286167_comment'></div>成都月一与府官兵将饮设于大慈寺，是日，公月设如故，其夜，召部将郭虎臣、张汝楫、张师良、雷震，以飞山军强弩一千，益以邛、雅禁兵千馀，夜赴沈黎，戒曰：「坚守城，勿出击」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1286167_comment'></div>又以便宜召宣抚司屯驻绵州兵五百人，戍邛州为之援。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1286167_comment'></div>密檄诸蕃部，与之约曰：「生获一吐蕃者，赏十缣，杀获者，赏二缣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1286167_comment'></div>于是邛部川首领崖櫗，会黎州土丁诸蕃部落，大败吐蕃于汉源，以梦东畜列之首来献，尽灭其族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1286167_comment'></div>自始寇至灭十六日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1286167_comment'></div>时熟户蕃嘉州虚恨蛮亦来寇边，公曰：「此不足治也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1286167_comment'></div>取吐蕃首数十标境上，一夕，悉遁去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1286167_comment'></div>公始令黎州并边家出一丁，免其租赋，分戍诸堡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1286167_comment'></div>后使者坏其法，且轻将大军入蛮地，皆陷矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1286167_comment'></div>言者妄指公赈济时事，坐罢去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1286167_comment'></div>蜀人泣送，自成都至夔流，道塞不可行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1286167_comment'></div>寻差主管台州崇道观，除成都路提刑，以齐国，辞不行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1286167_comment'></div>除江南西路转运判官，未行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1286167_comment'></div>授右监门卫大将军，忠州防御使，权知大宗正事，进朗州观察使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1286167_comment'></div>高宗寿八十，进昭庆军承宣使，皆知大宗正事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1286167_comment'></div>吏白：「承受奏请，旧例用中贵人」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1286167_comment'></div>公曰：「有司不存乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1286167_comment'></div>承受何为罢之」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1286167_comment'></div>有内管，贵震中外，他日请见公至再，公辞以出矣，不复见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1286167_comment'></div>虏李佾、元颜烈来聘，公副中书舍人施师点馆客。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1286167_comment'></div>虏宾从见馆使、使副，故与之揖，馆使宾从见虏使，虏使副不为礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1286167_comment'></div>至是虏三节人见公，公受其揖不疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1286167_comment'></div>玉津园宴射，伴射者及虏使副射不中，公一发连三中的，上下欢动，虏益畏服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1286167_comment'></div>时既罢宗室祠庙，添差亦十存二三，公三奏疏力请，得稍宽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1286167_comment'></div>始置自讼斋，请赐书，使宗室有过者读焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1286167_comment'></div>奏修宫学，添弟子员。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1286167_comment'></div>又欲给其食，视太学校定法，事未能尽从，而宫学亦颇自立矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1286167_comment'></div>公以文行训勉宗室，先教养，后法戒，荐其秀杰者数十人，多至通显。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1286167_comment'></div>所论天下事尤多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1286167_comment'></div>莫岁大旱，一日进九劄子，劝上求直言，通下情，上即施行之，退而焚其检。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1286167_comment'></div>布衣上书狂易抵罪，公言「太上皇帝不罪言者」，条奏数事，曰：「此篇书之于御座之右」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1286167_comment'></div>上为悚然兴，可之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1286167_comment'></div>上既喜公言，切诏通进司，凡公实封文字，其亟进入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1286167_comment'></div>公自为小官，有闻见，或实封上，或贻大臣书，或面对及宴语汎论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1286167_comment'></div>其乞四川复置宣抚司，援唐以兰陵公主园赏谏者请赏谏，台谏不当因言事迁他官，请许其补外，王抃不宜拣选诸路军马，王友直不可为殿前副都指挥使，皆人所难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1286167_comment'></div>疏藁百馀篇，多者至万馀言，或从或否，而上知其忠，亲信之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1286167_comment'></div>宴禁中，前为寿，上令公满酌，饮之釂，谓皇太子及嗣濮王等曰：「此贤宗室也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1286167_comment'></div>一日，坐待漏院，有给使数人白同班曰：「英国公借打毬马」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1286167_comment'></div>公正色曰：「上唯一太子，太子唯一皇孙，万一马惊失坠，虽斩汝辈无益也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1286167_comment'></div>左右皆惊，同班者遂不敢假。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1286167_comment'></div>常曰：「人患不知尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1286167_comment'></div>知之不能行，是无勇也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1286167_comment'></div>故公晚节尤自著见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1286167_comment'></div>赐第西百官宅，屋宇卑朴，厅事甚隘，出入无呵导，人不识何官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1286167_comment'></div>或摄弊衣迎客，客亦不知为公也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1286167_comment'></div>入蜀时，乘一舟，及罢归，尽室五十口，亦乘一舟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1286167_comment'></div>至江陵，市蜀物贽亲旧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1286167_comment'></div>至浔阳，官供帐一<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_134_1286167", 1286167, "Clauses/453/Comments/0")'>挂丝</span>，使吏持归，吏以重不肯，公曰：「吾未尝判销破状也，趣持归」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1286167_comment'></div>平生所敬重者朱熹、张栻，尝请赐张公谥，且乞用朱公云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1286167_comment'></div>某与公相见晚，不前知其出处，因谒公再三，且自始至末，无一语为无益，以是敬公，今观公行事，是其合矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1286167_comment'></div>公淳熙十四年七月三十日薨于位，年六十七。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1286167_comment'></div>先<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_138_1286167", 1286167, "Clauses/472/Comments/0")'>告疾</span>也，请罢户部不候岁终先行比较指挥，请无遣郎官往汀州行经界法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1286167_comment'></div>临终，口授具奏，言「旱灾民困，蜂虿有毒，狼子野心」，盖指时事所急也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1286167_comment'></div>初，公自朝奉大夫授右监门卫大将军，至是官承宣使，封天水郡侯，食邑户至千二百，诏赠开府仪同三司，封崇国公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1286167_comment'></div>以是年十月二十三日葬于临安府馀杭县同化乡里山宋宣之原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1286167_comment'></div>娶郑氏，太常少卿之女，封永国夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1286167_comment'></div>子男四人：善临，朝奉郎、新权发遣池州军州事；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1286167_comment'></div>善防，承务郎、特添差马军行司主管机宜文字；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1286167_comment'></div>善下，宣教郎、两浙西路提刑司干办公事；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1286167_comment'></div>善咏，忠训郎、新添差淮西安抚司准备将领。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1286167_comment'></div>女一人，适王一夔，成忠郎、新高邮军兵马监押。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1286167_comment'></div>孙男八人：汝谈，修职郎、广德军军学教授；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1286167_comment'></div>汝谠；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1286167_comment'></div>汝训，国子进士；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1286167_comment'></div>汝诂，汝诂，汝和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1286167_comment'></div>二人未名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1286167_comment'></div>孙女六人，长适进士潘自牧，馀未行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1286167_comment'></div>曾孙一人，崇豫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1286167_comment'></div>公所著《论语解》一编，他文未次第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1286167_comment'></div>永州时，为《宋中兴圣德颂》，刻诸崖石，楚、蜀间传之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1286167_comment'></div>奉议郎太常博士兼实录院检讨官叶适状。</div><div id='poem_sentence_157_1286167_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1188&endYear=1188')">1188年</a>　为赵公撰写谥议。作品：司崇国赵公谥宣简议。<div id='poem_1285971' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1285971' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1285971?labeling=true' target='_blank'>故昭庆军承宣使知大宗正事赠开府仪同三司崇国赵公谥宣简议</a><span class='authorDate'>（1188年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1285971")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1285971_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1285971'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1285971'>议曰：某既状公之行，上之太常，而承乏博士，当以谥配行，其可不信！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1285971_comment'></div>夫高爵重位，不为富贵沈溺，而能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1285971", 1285971, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>退逊</span>以保其节，文雅以发其名，此宗室公族之所谓贤也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1285971_comment'></div>公遭时多故，特<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1285971", 1285971, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>眇然</span>童子，周旋四方，而感励问学，居穷守独之操，甚于寒乡窭士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1285971_comment'></div>救民之疾苦如饥渴，行惠利之政如嗜欲，应猝制变，敏而有功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1285971_comment'></div>强梗在前，不避也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1285971_comment'></div>自为小官以至留务，论事不绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1285971_comment'></div>进见上前，意质而辞详，其所不隐，不知祸福之可择也，且死，犹奏谏疏者三焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1285971_comment'></div>望其容庄，听其言必有当于理义，察其行己，可谓能以礼始终者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1285971_comment'></div>凡此皆载于状不诬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1285971_comment'></div>然则公之贤，非宗室公族之所谓贤也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1285971_comment'></div>谨按《谥法》：「善问周达曰宣，壹德不懈曰简」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1285971_comment'></div>宜谥曰「宣简」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1285971_comment'></div>谨议。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1285971_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1188&endYear=1188')">1188年</a>　为龚公撰写谥议。作品：故赠右谏议大夫龚公谥节肃议。<div id='poem_1285972' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1285972' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1285972?labeling=true' target='_blank'>故赠右谏议大夫龚公谥节肃议</a><span class='authorDate'>（1188年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1285972")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1285972_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1285972'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1285972'>议曰：陈瓘、邹浩、任伯雨及公，皆官不应谥；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1285972_comment'></div>天子特赐之谥，追伤祸变艰难之所致，褒劝仗节敢言之臣，所以示为百僚法也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1285972_comment'></div>窃因明诏，考见当时之故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1285972_comment'></div>盖元符之末，建中靖国之初，既昭雪<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1285972", 1285972, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>流人</span>，生死蒙泽，天下望尽复元祐政事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1285972_comment'></div>而巨奸已败者犹偃蹇不自退，方稔者日睥睨而为谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1285972_comment'></div>公与同时谏官御史，随其邪慝所在，连奏累疏，迎锋摧击。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1285972_comment'></div>时之盛衰视其官，治之废兴由其身，志清王道，夺回正路，可谓壮哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1285972_comment'></div>夫君子之所以贵乎天下者，以其念治之心异于人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1285972_comment'></div>推念治之心而遂之，方谗人尚炽，邪正未分，如<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1285972", 1285972, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>痈疽</span>隐起于其身，不决溃之不止，而或者乃以为不可力争以激其势，斯患失而不知义者之论也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1285972_comment'></div>世言公羁置化州，徒步赴贬，持扇乞钱以为资。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1285972_comment'></div>嗟乎，公能不自悔矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1285972_comment'></div>虽奸臣遇公之酷如此，又岂足为公戚哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1285972_comment'></div>谨按《谥法》：「能自持守曰节，刚德克就曰肃」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1285972_comment'></div>谥公曰「节肃」，宜无愧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1285972_comment'></div>谨议。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1285972_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1188&endYear=1188')">1188年</a>　为黄公撰写谥议。作品：黄端明谥简肃议。<div id='poem_1285973' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1285973' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1285973?labeling=true' target='_blank'>黄端明谥简肃议</a><span class='authorDate'>（1188年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1285973")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1285973_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1285973'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1285973'>治身之义，事君之节，二者君子之极行也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1285973_comment'></div>于治身也能谨其小，于事君也能识其大，而君子之行不远矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1285973_comment'></div>昔之治其身者，或忽于言动之细微，而曰我能为其大者而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1285973_comment'></div>及其所以事君，则又或不能为其大，而姑欲累小善以自免焉，此德之所以不立而人之所以不成也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1285973_comment'></div>故兵部尚书端明殿学士黄公之状，言公俨然庄重，坐立有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1285973", 1285973, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>常处</span>，不倾侧<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1285973", 1285973, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>跛倚</span>；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1285973_comment'></div>语默有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1285973", 1285973, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>常节</span>，不戏言苟笑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1285973_comment'></div>人以为拘絷而不能顷刻安者，公独泰然以终其身，虽在燕私，未尝须臾变也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1285973_comment'></div>及再得谢，年七十馀矣，益谨敬不颓堕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1285973_comment'></div>后生来见者，礼对如大宾，教语必以孝弟忠信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1285973_comment'></div>至其薨也，盖八十有五，而所以自持其躬者如一日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1285973_comment'></div>其仕当秦桧死后，贺虏生辰还，言「虏必徙居汴以迫我，宜早自计」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1285973_comment'></div>时前使还者不敢言，宰相怒公，公不为动，自是三四年，每进见未尝不论边事，虏果以钦宗来讣，出不逊语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1285973_comment'></div>公独请即发丧，决用兵策，使使臣督诸军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1285973_comment'></div>及贼在江旁，朝臣争挈家逃匿，公家人亦旦暮请，公曰：「天子在是，若等安适耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1285973_comment'></div>比虏退，家在城中者，公与陈丞相康伯而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1285973_comment'></div>虏后请修好，且责臣礼与新得四郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1285973_comment'></div>或谓「实利不可干，虚名不足惜也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1285973_comment'></div>公独曰：「土疆一彼一此耳，名定，百世不易也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1285973_comment'></div>议者非是」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1285973_comment'></div>王之望约和，公又论之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1285973_comment'></div>天申节上寿，议者以钦宗服除，当举乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1285973_comment'></div>公言：「《春秋》君弑贼不讨，不书葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1285973_comment'></div>钦宗实未葬，乐不当作也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1285973_comment'></div>争之力，事得暂寝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1285973_comment'></div>范成大使虏，祈请山陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1285973_comment'></div>公又言：「置钦宗梓宫而不问，无以尽人心，且使夷狄窥我矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1285973_comment'></div>公之立朝始末议论如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1285973_comment'></div>夫俊豪跌宕，脱略于绳检之外者，岂非其自喜以为伟人名士之所为哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1285973_comment'></div>其循守卑论，弃忘大雠，与夫临大计，当大事，不敢<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1285973", 1285973, "Clauses/90/Comments/0")'>坚决</span>，有退后之懦，无率先之勇，而以他小善自贤者，尚多有之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1285973_comment'></div>然则公之于治身也可谓能谨其小，而于事君也可谓能识其大矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1285973_comment'></div>状又言，公为普安教授时，不与内知龙大渊坐；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1285973_comment'></div>为国子司业时，不奏武成王庙芝草。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1285973_comment'></div>宰相率达官书佛经刻六和塔，公谢不能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1285973_comment'></div>其孝友笃至，夫妇相敬如宾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1285973_comment'></div>与人交，恭而敬，淡而久，收死恤孤，赈贫继绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1285973_comment'></div>盖公既已识事君之大节，则虽其小者宜不失乎<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1285973", 1285973, "Clauses/112/Comments/0")'>斤然</span>之守，而于治身之谨诚细微无不尽焉，则推而达之，固所以合乎人伦之大义也，岂非所谓「物有本末，事有终始，知所先后」，而非偶然幸致者乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1285973_comment'></div>谨按《谥法》：「壹德不懈曰简，执心决断曰肃」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1285973_comment'></div>公之治身，谨言动，无耋艾率以恭，斯壹德不懈矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1285973_comment'></div>公之事君，排和议，无难易必以勇，斯执心决断矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1285973_comment'></div>请谥曰「简肃」，于易公名为宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1285973_comment'></div>谨议<span class='inlineComment2'>（《水心文集》卷二六。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1285973_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_41_1285973'>敬：原缺，据四库本补。</div><div id='poem_sentence_41_1285973_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1188&endYear=1188')">1188年</a>　为李纲撰写谥议。作品：李丞相纲谥忠定议。<div id='poem_1285974' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1285974' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1285974?labeling=true' target='_blank'>李丞相纲谥忠定议</a><span class='authorDate'>（1188年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1285974")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1285974_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1285974'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1285974'>议曰：公自起居郎极论都城水灾，斥为监当，而抗直之声震于天下矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1285974_comment'></div>及斡离不来寇，在廷茫然，将从乘与以出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1285974_comment'></div>独公请与执政辨诘，遂夺其议，力守京师，虏以退却。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1285974_comment'></div>然其留割三镇诏书，击女真之归而募兵以防其再至，皆为同列所排，不果用也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1285974_comment'></div>高宗中兴，首命公自辅，于是张邦昌以僭逆诛矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1285974_comment'></div>先事河北、河东，录坚守者，建遣张所、傅亮往援接之，乞幸襄、邓以系人心而无走东南，使周望、傅雱通问二圣而无踵和约，时中原尚未溃也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1285974_comment'></div>公方除京、黼乱政，渐复祖宗旧法，奏请施行数十事，多中机要。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1285974_comment'></div>使稍得岁年之须，则两河不遂陷而虏不敢复鼓行入内地矣，而雠耻因可报也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1285974_comment'></div>不幸又七十五日而罢去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1285974_comment'></div>迄其后常疏外坎𡒄，虽仅免颠沛，而曾不少得其意焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1285974_comment'></div>自是祸难百出，而南北竟以分裂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1285974_comment'></div>此为国家惜者，所以哀公之心，而深悲其相之不终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1285974_comment'></div>士至有未尝识公面，而坐论救公以死，彼岂有所顾望附托而然哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1285974_comment'></div>盖公之贤，自当时市井负贩，莫不喜为之道说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1285974_comment'></div>然而谤公者亦众矣，其尤甚者，罪公特以计取显位而已，京师之祸，公实使之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1285974_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1285974_comment'></div>当是之时，所谓谋国者，岂有他道哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1285974_comment'></div>避走而乞和，誉贼虏而卑中国尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1285974_comment'></div>以避走乞和誉贼虏卑中国之人而议公之得失，故其自许为谋详虑密，而谓公为略而疏；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1285974_comment'></div>自以为镇重能消弭，而谓公为轻锐而喜事；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1285974_comment'></div>其恬视君父之仇，畏死持禄，甘为世所贱侮，而以公之能尊君以身徇国为人望所属者，谓为朋党要结以自营。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1285974_comment'></div>故主和者非致寇，而守京师者为失策矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1285974_comment'></div>则公之负谤于时，固亦其理之所宜得也，何足辨哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1285974_comment'></div>顾独有可恨者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1285974_comment'></div>夫是非毁誉之相蒙布，必至于久而后论定，是从古以然者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1285974_comment'></div>公之殁五十载矣，世之论公者，卒亦未有以大异于前日也，何欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1285974_comment'></div>孔子曰：「微管仲，吾其被发左衽矣」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1285974_comment'></div>考公之行事而深察其志，使要其功烈之所成就，则岂有愧于孔子之所称者哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1285974_comment'></div>悲夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1285974_comment'></div>谨按《谥法》：「虑国忘家曰忠，安民大虑曰定」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1285974_comment'></div>请以「忠定」为公谥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1285974_comment'></div>谨议。</div><div id='poem_sentence_31_1285974_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1189&endYear=1189')">1189年1月</a>　仍任太常博士兼实录院检讨官。正月，上李丞相纲谥忠定议。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1189&endYear=1189')">1189年2月</a>　二月二日，孝宗内禅，光宗即位。三十日，叶适等八人被中书舍人罗点荐台谏。因光宗欲罢周必大职，不果用。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1189&endYear=1189')">1189年</a>　新君嗣位，叶适上疏，指出当时国势、士、民、兵、财、纪纲法度之六大弊端。作品：应诏条奏六事。<span class='inlineComment2'>（原文集作《上光宗皇帝札子》）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1189&endYear=1189')">1189年5月</a>　五月，除秘书郎，仍兼实录院检讨官。乞补外，添差湖北安抚司参议。与乐清王闻诗来往颇密。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='786dba069ae647af9725ca7946643cca_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("786dba069ae647af9725ca7946643cca");'><span id='786dba069ae647af9725ca7946643cca_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1193&endYear=1194')">1193-1194年</a>，44-45岁</div><div id='786dba069ae647af9725ca7946643cca' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1193&endYear=1193')">1193年8月</a>　转朝散郎，八月召赴临安行在，将蕲州特产簟席赠与陆游。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1193&endYear=1193')">1193年11月</a>　十一月内引，除尚书左选郎官，同月，奏请光宗朝重华宫。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1193&endYear=1193')">1193年</a>　冬，友人巩丰丧母，叶适被请求表其墓，次年完成。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1193&endYear=1193')">1193年</a>　赞扬门人孔元忠所著《论语说》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1193&endYear=1193')">1193年</a>　为陈彦群撰墓志。作品：陈彦群墓志。<div id='poem_1286191' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286191' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286191?labeling=true' target='_blank'>陈彦群墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286191")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286191_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286191'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286191'>彦群名季雅，永嘉人，姓陈氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286191_comment'></div>质灵气迈，随闻而思，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1286191", 1286191, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>遇见</span>能述，自高其材，不乐师授。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286191_comment'></div>时诸儒方为制度新学，抄记《周官》、《左氏》、汉、唐官民兵财所以沿革不同者，筹算手画，旁采众史，转相考摩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286191_comment'></div>其说膏液润美，以为何但捷取科目，实能附之世用，古人之治可复致也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286191_comment'></div>至其他察性命以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1286191", 1286191, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>絜矩</span>，奋豪杰以特兴，亦多微妙奇伟，非颖秀士亲承其旨趣，固莫能通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286191_comment'></div>君间独诣学堂，阔视长揖，与其先生弟子交论无所降，人亦未之然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286191_comment'></div>异日，州将荐君高等，读其书，遒熟如素讲，往往加以新意出人上，始大<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1286191", 1286191, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>叹骇</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286191_comment'></div>遂中进士第，又中教官，为隆兴府教授。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286191_comment'></div>未久，再遭忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286191_comment'></div>差潭州教授，未得上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286191_comment'></div>君益闭门，尽抽古今文字，且诵且索，寝食失期度，务为周览遍学，钩得其要，累众所能，连类敷绎，并集己长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286191_comment'></div>然人视君貌益<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1286191", 1286191, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>冲然</span>，接对言语，退就<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1286191", 1286191, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>平实</span>，几可亲近，然后皆喜曰：「彦群能下人矣」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286191_comment'></div>君得足肿疾，烦痛，自出请医。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286191_comment'></div>医云：「寒湿所为也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286191_comment'></div>用附子七物汤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286191_comment'></div>饮，加<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1286191", 1286191, "Clauses/61/Comments/0")'>愦闷</span>，呼曰：「吾何以不得食冷果子耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286191_comment'></div>家人信医言，禁不与。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286191_comment'></div>无几何死，年四十五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286191_comment'></div>夫天之赋予于君也，瑰绝而不伦；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286191_comment'></div>君之贵尊其身也，刻苦以求成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286191_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1286191", 1286191, "Clauses/72/Comments/0")'>浪波</span>急疾，高或灭峤，远浮数国，而渟于深渊，必将有以用之也，而竟若此，何耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286191_comment'></div>曾祖士真，祖寿，父裕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286191_comment'></div>夫人刘氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286191_comment'></div>刘之翁名仲光，字茂实，长者名士，异待君，不用子婿礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286191_comment'></div>君无所成而殁，殁且无子，以兄之子谦僧为后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286191_comment'></div>茂实夫妇哭极哀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286191_comment'></div>后二年，绍熙四年七月壬午，葬君于吹台乡白泉山师姑井，而谓余曰：「子非其同年进士乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286191_comment'></div>铭非子曷宜」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286191_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_1286191'>有巨木兮，自寸草起；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286191_comment'></div>行柯布叶，翳空未已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286191_comment'></div>不畏斧斤，规就栋梁；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286191_comment'></div>俛首梓人，伊木之殃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286191_comment'></div>须其全材，剥落尽悴；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286191_comment'></div>老干独存，远者千岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286191_comment'></div>物生匪易，其成孔艰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286191_comment'></div>天乎彦群，往即兹山。</div><div id='poem_sentence_35_1286191_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1193&endYear=1193')">1193年</a>　为姜安礼撰墓志铭。作品：姜安礼墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286192' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286192' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286192?labeling=true' target='_blank'>姜安礼墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286192")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286192_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286192'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286192'>姜君，讳处恭，字安礼，淄州长山人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286192_comment'></div>六世祖昭范，名能治《春秋》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286192_comment'></div>昭范之弟遵，仕至枢密副使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286192_comment'></div>君曾祖朝奉大夫筠，避乱于台州临海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286192_comment'></div>祖仲思，朝散郎，签书南康军判官，摄军事，讨李成，坠马卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286192_comment'></div>父訦，从政郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286192_comment'></div>至君来秀州嘉兴，始居之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286192_comment'></div>自大夫入南，相继官不进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286192_comment'></div>君九岁而孤，家尤贫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286192_comment'></div>大母父母皆散死他州不能葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286192_comment'></div>而朝散旅于都昌佛寺，四十馀年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286192_comment'></div>君营衣食，治坟墓，收拾诸榇，见星出入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286192_comment'></div>其走都昌，柩故庑殡，后为僧堂也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286192_comment'></div>老僧以告，君掘地数丈得之，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1286192", 1286192, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>题志</span>尚新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286192_comment'></div>归，从左蠡小孤，遇暴风，繂断橹折，舟几覆，然后得聚葬于武康上柏岩山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286192_comment'></div>君曰：「吾可以死乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286192_comment'></div>既而颇买田治屋，不至富厚，亦稍赒族穷，援人于乏，如有馀者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286192_comment'></div>君虽不以科举自达，至于惩渡江凋落之后，奋寒士单薄之习，积无至有，以立家室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286192_comment'></div>教二子煇、郜，进士，女适济南吕濛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286192_comment'></div>有孙男女五人，婚对及时，门户新成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286192_comment'></div>课其力致之难，过于场屋偶然成事者远矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286192_comment'></div>余往来秀州十年间，闻君名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286192_comment'></div>又识煇于太学，欲见君，不果。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286192_comment'></div>煇将对集英策，余疑之曰：「子色间青黑，何祥也」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286192_comment'></div>君素有足疾，加剧，卒年五十九。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286192_comment'></div>葬朝散从政墓西百步。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286192_comment'></div>夫人龚氏，赠谏议大夫夬家也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286192_comment'></div>已葬，煇录君诗百馀首，示余求铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286192_comment'></div>余读之，曰：「君诗<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1286192", 1286192, "Clauses/83/Comments/1")'>清壮</span>抑扬，而不刻削以反今人之律，乐称人善而志意独到，盖得古人之意，可铭已」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286192_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_1286192'>绍熙四年二月十八君死，是年四月二十八日君葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286192_comment'></div>呜呼，其诗则传，尚不亡哉！</div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1286192_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1194&endYear=1194')">1194年1月</a>　正月，孝宗不豫，光宗因疾不能朝见，朝议纷纷，叶适言于丞相留正，当播告天下，俟帝疾。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1194&endYear=1194')">1194年2月</a>　二月，为陈亮《吕夫人夏氏墓志铭》题字，时住渔浦镇。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1194&endYear=1194')">1194年2月</a>　二月，为六安县令陆子虡撰文。作品：六安县新学记。<div id='poem_1286111' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286111' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286111?labeling=true' target='_blank'>六安县新学记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286111")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286111_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286111'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286111'>六安，皋陶故国，亡后四百馀年，而英布与项羽灭秦，又助汉畔楚，再王其地云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286111_comment'></div>孔子叙《书》，列古圣人，尧、舜、禹、皋陶四人而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286111_comment'></div>余尝疑尧、舜既垂治法，而知人安民尚犹难之，则使后世何以取中焉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286111_comment'></div>夫尽其身之聪明，遇事成理而于性无所失，岂非圣人之德，人理之正哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286111_comment'></div>然而以质独就者常远于性，以材特见者常离于身，盖其理谬，其德薄，而非天下之材矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286111_comment'></div>今也将合天下而立常道，则患无圣人者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286111_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286111_comment'></div>尧、舜之难，不其然乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286111_comment'></div>自皋陶开天德之品，兴九德之教，以成天下之材，非天下无圣人之患，而患无是质与材也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286111_comment'></div>果诚有之，远若使近，离若使亲，因之勿废也，就之勿更也，翕异为同，会少为多，续短为长，其家邦也各乂尔，其采事也竞劝尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286111_comment'></div>故教德之方，自皋陶始，能治天下以常道，能起天下以多材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286111_comment'></div>禹、汤遵之，至于成周。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286111_comment'></div>不然，则有偏无救，终为天之弃德，而尧、舜之难常在也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286111_comment'></div>至后世之学，乃以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1286111", 1286111, "Clauses/52/Comments/0")'>充备</span>盛德为圣人，废其材，更其质，一施天下之智愚贤不肖，必至于道而后用之，是何其与皋陶异指耶！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286111_comment'></div>将后世固美于教而皋陶未之及耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286111_comment'></div>余不得而知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286111_comment'></div>及英布奋一夫<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1286111", 1286111, "Clauses/60/Comments/0")'>雄狡</span>，事至微末，则自司马迁以下皆喜称之，道之升降又重可叹已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286111_comment'></div>会稽陆子虚为六安令，新立学，日取卖酒钱一千馔诸生，惧且去不继，则食绝学坏也，来请记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286111_comment'></div>余尝以公事自巢父、许由所居北行，沿淮望颍水，西入梅林、沙窝，百馀里中，山四合如攒绮绣，南下蕲、舒，所谓四、五祖灊天柱峰，信乎名山哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286111_comment'></div>或言六安山谷尤深，余思皋陶氏，欲至其处不可得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286111_comment'></div>夫九德者，皋陶所以教，学之所以始也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286111_comment'></div>故书遗陆君，使刻于石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286111_comment'></div>绍熙五年二月。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1286111_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1194&endYear=1194')">1194年3月</a>　三月，陈亮卒于永康家中，年五十二，叶适有祭文。作品：祭陈同甫文。<div id='poem_1286332' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286332' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286332?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭陈同甫文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286332")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286332_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286332'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286332'>呜呼同甫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286332_comment'></div>气足盖物，力足<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1286332", 1286332, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>首事</span>，天所畀也，孰可<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1286332", 1286332, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>抑制</span>！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286332_comment'></div>以智开物，以机动事，学而得之，又相<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1286332", 1286332, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>比佽</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286332_comment'></div>载书以来，纠结披籍，解剥阖辟，遇其殊特。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286332_comment'></div>著于词章，无后无前，启蛰涤酲，独为时先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286332_comment'></div>补空续高，扶英植豪，探海取鳌，惟己所操。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286332_comment'></div>回视世人，磨细研精，俯墨仰绳，用影律形，视人而行，服劳终身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286332_comment'></div>□□□□，俎豆仅列，我漫一奏，《韶》坏《雅》阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286332_comment'></div>呜呼同甫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286332_comment'></div>绝代之宝，众岂同美，抵掷弃捐，亦其常理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286332_comment'></div>子重受祸，嘻又已甚，寓矢以攻，杀者无禁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286332_comment'></div>脱廷尉械，为进士头，天子第之，始莫我尤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286332_comment'></div>谓天弗省，天乃终定；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286332_comment'></div>谓天既定，而弗永命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286332_comment'></div>呜呼同甫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286332_comment'></div>心事难平，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1286332", 1286332, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>宠光</span>易满，万世之长，一朝之短。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286332_comment'></div>余蚤从子，今也变衰，子有微言，余何遽知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286332_comment'></div>畏子<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1286332", 1286332, "Clauses/57/Comments/0")'>高明</span>，痛子憔悴，镌嗟无勇，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1286332", 1286332, "Clauses/60/Comments/1")'>和、随</span>有罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286332_comment'></div>子不余谬，悬俾余铭，且曰必信，视我如生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286332_comment'></div>畴昔之言，余不敢苟，哀哉此酒，能复饮否？</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1286332_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1194&endYear=1194')">1194年4月</a>　四月，史浩卒，年八十九，叶适有祭文。作品：祭史太师文。<div id='poem_1286333' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286333' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286333?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭史太师文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286333")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286333_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286333'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286333'>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286333_comment'></div>公事孝宗，奋由龙潜，翊之天飞，劳画倍兼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286333_comment'></div>孝宗命相，公再当国，同致太平，亦同好德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286333_comment'></div>公老卧家，孝宗禅禹，辞于群臣，独诏公处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286333_comment'></div>公之将薨，孝宗始疾，及其讣闻，震悼以亟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286333_comment'></div>嗟夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286333_comment'></div>天之生公，实畀孝宗，君臣之间，自初及终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286333_comment'></div>岂惟君臣，以师以友，言同虑从，恩隆情厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286333_comment'></div>官为太师，九十之齿，中兴以来，未有公比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286333_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1286333", 1286333, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>于皇</span>孝宗，庙祏既祔，四海恫瘝，三年缟素。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286333_comment'></div>惟公元臣，存殁无亏，民思孝宗，则偕公悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286333_comment'></div>昔公剡士，十有五辈，或至或否，均受其赉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286333_comment'></div>我不知公，公亦荐我，如公至心，固自为可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286333_comment'></div>生不能谢，死也宜哀，敬陈兹觞，公无吐哉！</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1286333_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1194&endYear=1194')">1194年5月</a>　五月，作永嘉西山《醉乐亭记》<div id='poem_1286114' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286114' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286114?labeling=true' target='_blank'>醉乐亭记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年5月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286114")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286114_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286114'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286114'>因城郭之近，必有临望之美，为其人<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1286114", 1286114, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>燕纾</span>往来之地，所以合众纪时，消烦娱忧，岂天固设之哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286114_comment'></div>永嘉多大山，在州西者独细而秀，十数步内，辄自为拱揖，高不孤耸，下亦凝止，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1286114", 1286114, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>阴阳</span>附从，向背以情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286114_comment'></div>水至城西南阔千尺，自峙岩私盐港，绿野新桥，陂荡纵横，舟艇各出茭莲中，棹歌相<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1286114", 1286114, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>应和</span>，已而皆会于思远楼下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286114_comment'></div>土人以山水所到，斯吉祥也，益深其崦，百金一藏，赇匠施僧，阡垄交植。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286114_comment'></div>岁将寒食，丈夫洁巾袜，女子新簪珥，扫冢而祭，相与为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1286114", 1286114, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>遨嬉</span>，城内外无居人焉，故西山之游为最著。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286114_comment'></div>虽然，地狭而专，民多而贫，外有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1286114", 1286114, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>靓袨</span>都雅之形，其实无名园杰榭，尤花异木，遨者虽心竞不相下，然或举债移质为毕事而已，固不能斗珍丽，穷水陆也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286114_comment'></div>守长不察，曰：「噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286114_comment'></div>侈富甚矣」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286114_comment'></div>贪胥所窥，暴令绳之，必<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1286114", 1286114, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>逻捕</span>以酒，夺其笑语，械缚挞击，破产纳钱，不如是，榷利不数倍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286114_comment'></div>嗟夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286114_comment'></div>以窭从奢，求一日之乐而诒终年之忧，不变者何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286114_comment'></div>朝议大夫直龙图阁、宣城孙公为郡之初，访民俗之所安而知其故，至清明节，始罢榷弛禁，纵民自饮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286114_comment'></div>又明年，宅西山之中，作新亭以休遨者，名曰醉乐，取昔人「醉能同其乐」之义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286114_comment'></div>孙公性不喜饮，其政不专为宽，盖通民之愿而务得其情如此，亭成而民歌乐之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286114_comment'></div>当是时，四邻水旱不常，而永嘉独屡熟，殆天亦以其人之和者应之欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286114_comment'></div>古之善政者，能防民之佚游，使从其教；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286114_comment'></div>节民之醉饱，使归于德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286114_comment'></div>何者？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286114_comment'></div>上无所利以病民也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286114_comment'></div>及其后也，因民之自游而为之御，招民以极醉而尽其利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286114_comment'></div>民犹有不得游且醉，则其赖于生者日已薄，而人之类可哀也已！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286114_comment'></div>故余记公之事，既以贤于今之所谓病民者，而推公之志，又将进于古之所谓治民者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286114_comment'></div>绍熙五年五月。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1286114_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1194&endYear=1194')">1194年6月</a>　六月，孝宗崩，光宗不能执丧，引发宫廷政变，拥立嘉王赵扩为帝，是为宁宗，叶适参与密议。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1194&endYear=1194')">1194年</a>　为孝宗皇帝写挽词。作品：孝宗皇帝挽词二首。<div id='poem_79966' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_79966' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/79966?labeling=true' target='_blank'>孝宗皇帝挽词二首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_79966")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_79966_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_79966'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_79966'>俭德加文意，雄才自武宣。<div id='poem_sentence_0_79966_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_79966'>道终遗万乘，丧制尽三年。<div id='poem_sentence_1_79966_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_79966'>暂乞狂胡命，常持复汉权。<div id='poem_sentence_2_79966_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_79966'>全将一孝字，高谥百王前。<div id='poem_sentence_3_79966_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_79966'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_79966_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_79965' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_79965' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/79965?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_79965_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_79965'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_79965'>昔年叨上殿，叹息动宸襟。<div id='poem_sentence_0_79965_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_79965'>岂不人思奋，其如天意深。<div id='poem_sentence_1_79965_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_79965'>帝王犹遇合，南北限升沈。<div id='poem_sentence_2_79965_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_79965'>尚有登遐日，诸军特赐金。<div id='poem_sentence_3_79965_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_79965'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_79965_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1194&endYear=1194')">1194年7月</a>　七月，宁宗即位。叶适因拥立有功，升国子司业，进对，申绎《卷阿》之义为献。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1194&endYear=1194')">1194年8月</a>　八月，覃恩转朝请郎。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1194&endYear=1194')">1194年9月</a>　九月，借显谟阁学士，差充馆伴史。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1194&endYear=1194')">1194年10月</a>　十月，兼实录院检讨官，该月，叶适曾与太常少卿詹体仁至丞相留正家要求改卜孝宗山陵，与刘德秀发生争辩，后刘德秀为御史，参劾道学人士。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1194&endYear=1194')">1194年10月</a>　十月，同年友范仲黼知彭州，有诗送之。作品：送范文叔知彭州。<div id='poem_79999' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_79999' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/79999?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送范文叔知彭州</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_79999")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_79999_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_79999'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_79999'>君今结束归何勇，我独栖迟去不能。<div id='poem_sentence_0_79999_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_79999'>江水入冬犹浩荡，风帆逼岁合骞腾。<div id='poem_sentence_1_79999_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_79999'>相逢论事信徒尔，清坐矢心嗟未曾。<div id='poem_sentence_2_79999_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_79999'>想得彭州退公后，夜窗重整照书灯。<div id='poem_sentence_3_79999_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_79999'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_79999_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1194&endYear=1194')">1194年闰10月</a>　闰十月，撰友人巩丰之母杨氏墓表。作品：杨夫人墓表。<div id='poem_1286193' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286193' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286193?labeling=true' target='_blank'>杨夫人墓表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年闰10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286193")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286193_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286193'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286193'>杨氏，婺州武义人，嫁东平巩法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286193_comment'></div>巩君死，夫人年二十六，子长曰丰，三岁，幼嵘也始生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286193_comment'></div>巩氏畏胡南徙，以贫，教授不自业，人谓夫人：「当奈何」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286193_comment'></div>夫人曰：「吾义寡巩氏矣，复何顾」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286193_comment'></div>二子稍长，尽卖房中物买小宅，为娶妇立家室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286193_comment'></div>时婺有大儒吕公，夫人告二子曰：「尔学不成，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1286193", 1286193, "Clauses/22/Comments/1")'>无庸</span>归也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286193_comment'></div>二子或经年不得见夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286193_comment'></div>既而先后登进士第，皆为时所知，丰尤有文名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286193_comment'></div>夫人卒，年六十八。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286193_comment'></div>丰为从事郎，干办江东提刑司公事；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286193_comment'></div>嵘为奉义郎，知徽州歙县事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286193_comment'></div>孙男四人，女七人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286193_comment'></div>绍熙五年十一月九日，葬长寿乡大慈寺东坞，与其夫人之域相望云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286193_comment'></div>余每记义乌何懋恭言：「巩氏之子丰，弱冠尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286193_comment'></div>论周、秦以前事，语言如冰玉，不可尘垢也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286193_comment'></div>然欲其少自屈，尝劝之曰：「子三岁而孤，太夫人不行以俟子，子亦从科举乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286193_comment'></div>于时余尚未识丰，而知有夫人矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286193_comment'></div>去年冬，丰墨衰绖，旅于江下民舍甚久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286193_comment'></div>余间往唁之，问所以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286193_comment'></div>丰泣曰：「吾谋葬吾母，冢上之表，子为则宜」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286193_comment'></div>余曰：「无学术之传，无文字之教，而分义自明者，妇人之大德也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286193_comment'></div>故能左右夫子而家道成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286193_comment'></div>世或烂焉华藻，欲如《关雎》、《鹊巢》，则失之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286193_comment'></div>夫人未三十丧其夫，不嫁终身训二子使有立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286193_comment'></div>巩氏再振于东南，由夫人启之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286193_comment'></div>里巷之女子，能为夫人所为，则微可使兴，辱可使荣，而死生之道不愧矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286193_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_1286193'>绍熙五年闰十月□日，朝请郎、守国子司业、兼实录院检讨官龙泉叶适述。</div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1286193_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1194&endYear=1194')">1194年闰10月</a>　闰十月，朱熹以兼实录院同修撰入史院，欲以事目分之，叶适不从。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1194&endYear=1194')">1194年11月</a>　十一月，因韩侂胄与赵汝愚争权，叶适请求外调，除太府卿、淮东总领。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1194&endYear=1194')">1194年12月</a>　陈傅良曾于十一月二十八日奏文留用叶适，十二月一日，奉旨，不允。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='34c816c5cf5f4051a4235c166b71dc09_label'><a href='javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1203&endYear=1203')">1203年9月</a>　九月，奉召赴行在（临安），入对，奏荐楼钥、丘崇、黄度三人。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1203&endYear=1203')">1203年</a>　连上宁宗三劄，其一论国家盛衰与人才关系；二与三分论湖南、泉州财政之弊。作品：上宁宗皇帝劄子。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1203&endYear=1203')">1203年11月</a>　十一月，除权兵部侍郎。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='4de19385af3b4390944d0ab3a0e923d2_label'><a href='javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1206&endYear=1206')">1206年2月</a>　二月，服阕，奉召赴临安行在。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1206&endYear=1206')">1206年3月</a>　三月，宁宗召见于延和殿。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1206&endYear=1206')">1206年</a>　韩侂胄主张抗金北伐，不少大臣附和，叶适提出异议，反对草率用兵，因韩侂胄不听，叶适连上三札。作品：上宁宗皇帝札子。<br /><a href="javascript:
