</span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1285839")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1285839_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1285839'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1285839'>未散沈忧，徒抱不天之恨；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1285839_comment'></div>迄缘终制，冒参<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1285839", 1285839, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>掌土</span>之联。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1285839_comment'></div>再窃身荣，永辜亲养<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1285839_comment'></div>伏念臣昨承君命而趋走，遽罹家祸之悲伤，当其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1285839", 1285839, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>冥迷</span>，仍复顾省。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1285839_comment'></div>虽云顺变，惊日月之不留；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1285839_comment'></div>强使复常，恍形神之非昔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1285839_comment'></div>记怜俯逮，命召趋行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1285839_comment'></div>赐先见于延和，归旧班于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1285839", 1285839, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>起部</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1285839_comment'></div>沐浴膏泽之美，殆异馀人；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1285839_comment'></div>生施枯槁之恩，有愈造物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1285839_comment'></div>而臣摧残故步，损耗宿心，岂无激昂之思，滋甚衰迟之迫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1285839_comment'></div>镒称铢失，难课近功；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1285839_comment'></div>一忆十忘，何裨末谊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1285839_comment'></div>但积徊徨之愧，莫知退避之方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1285839_comment'></div>此盖伏遇皇帝陛下，龙德显行，乾刚独运，毖而求助，谦以图于。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1285839_comment'></div>拔臣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1285839", 1285839, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>寡特</span>之中，冀销<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1285839", 1285839, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>迎附</span>；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1285839_comment'></div>察臣忧患之后，多自<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1285839", 1285839, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>创惩</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1285839_comment'></div>回视此生之几何，常惧移忠而靡及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1285839_comment'></div>沧溟善下，或堪<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1285839", 1285839, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>涓勺</span>之输；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1285839_comment'></div>穹昊盖高，尚竭么微之告。</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1285839_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1206&endYear=1206')">1206年</a>　有谢表。作品：除吏部侍郎谢表。<div id='poem_1285840' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1285840' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1285840?labeling=true' target='_blank'>除吏部侍郎谢表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1206年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1285840")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1285840_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1285840'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1285840'>甫越兼旬，遽移<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1285840", 1285840, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>冠部</span>，畀之华剧，增以事权<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1285840_comment'></div>伏念臣素弱而不能自强，无材而愿出人下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1285840_comment'></div>乃欲安分，匪云<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1285840", 1285840, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>执谦</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1285840_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1285840", 1285840, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>胥疏</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1285840", 1285840, "Clauses/8/Comments/1")'>退惰</span>之中，功名绝纪；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1285840_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1285840", 1285840, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>蹇产</span>病昏之后，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1285840", 1285840, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>意乐</span>全销。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1285840_comment'></div>天许会逢，上命亲近，从<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1285840", 1285840, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>冬卿</span>而陪献纳，考地贡而修<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1285840", 1285840, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>虞衡</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1285840_comment'></div>外耀恩荣，内藏<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1285840", 1285840, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>拙守</span>，于臣何所不足，愧臣无以仰承。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1285840_comment'></div>今也超<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1285840", 1285840, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>六联</span>之清高，司<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1285840", 1285840, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>右列</span>之铨序，效职既重，责成必深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1285840_comment'></div>用名已浮，计实安有，耳目睹记，夙宵隐忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1285840_comment'></div>此盖恭遇皇帝陛下，有拔士之至明，以好贤为大德，驭下极<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1285840", 1285840, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>称亭</span>之审，待臣循理分之宜，位著所严，等威自辨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1285840_comment'></div>臣萧然二簋，不胜礼乐之陈；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1285840_comment'></div>眇矣一金，岂在<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1285840", 1285840, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>范镕</span>之列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1285840_comment'></div>虽厉平凡之操，曷酬<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1285840", 1285840, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>卓异</span>之知。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1285840_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1206&endYear=1206')">1206年</a>　举荐门人周南为文字官，诏试馆职。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1206&endYear=1206')">1206年5月</a>　宋四路大军已出，下诏伐金，叶适预料此举可能失败，首倡防江之议。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='46bcb6165eff4bb1aa8797cafb1ec5cb_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("46bcb6165eff4bb1aa8797cafb1ec5cb");'><span id='46bcb6165eff4bb1aa8797cafb1ec5cb_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1207&endYear=1207')">1207年</a>，58岁</div><div id='46bcb6165eff4bb1aa8797cafb1ec5cb' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1207&endYear=1207')">1207年12月</a>　十二月初，转朝议大夫。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1207&endYear=1207')">1207年12月8日</a>　十二月八日，遭御史中丞雷孝友论，落职。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1207&endYear=1207')">1207年</a>　为黄文叔写诗文寄之。作品：寄黄文叔谢送真日铸。<div id='poem_80189' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_80189' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/80189?labeling=true' target='_blank'>寄黄文叔谢送真日铸</a><span class='authorDate'>（1207年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_80189")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_80189_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_80189'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_80189'>建溪疑雪白，日铸胜兰芳。<div id='poem_sentence_0_80189_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_80189'>谁知真苦涩，黯淡发幽光。<div id='poem_sentence_1_80189_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_80189'>骑省可正论，农卿今则亡。<div id='poem_sentence_2_80189_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_80189'>怀人坐太息，泉竭鼎无汤<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_80189_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_80189'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_80189_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_80189'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_80189_0'>⑴ 往岁詹元善屡以建溪真茶寄余所谓常品甘白者云此侯辣挞叶尔日铸世以香为贵亦尚白而文叔饷真芽色不白且无香然则物之不伪者岂将悦人于声色臭味之外耶抑且姑全其本质而已耶</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_80189_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1207&endYear=1207')">1207年</a>　为翁忱撰墓志铭。作品：翁诚之墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286210' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286210' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286210?labeling=true' target='_blank'>翁诚之墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1207年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286210")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286210_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286210'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286210'>公姓翁氏，讳忱，字诚之，温州乐清人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286210_comment'></div>曾祖某，祖某，父某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286210_comment'></div>公貌方神清，正其色词，无一毫假与人意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286210_comment'></div>人亦以公为不可冀幸，见之者必虑而后言，择而后求，未尝敢辄以非义干也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286210_comment'></div>然或退而窥公之私，于家人父子朋友之伦，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1286210", 1286210, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>油翼</span>粹美，意细而情亲，笃厚甚矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286210_comment'></div>学不名一家，事物之义理，深约精尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286210_comment'></div>文字<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1286210", 1286210, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>重密</span>，有周、汉体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286210_comment'></div>诗尤得<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1286210", 1286210, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>句律</span>，读之者如在庙朝听韶濩之音，金石之声，非山泽之癯所能为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286210_comment'></div>少有大志，自闾阎隐疾，田野久困，上劘人主，秘及宫掖，皆欲尽言而不忌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286210_comment'></div>诚使得行其意，不得乎其言则不止，不得乎其职则不进也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286210_comment'></div>公之平生可考见者如此，然则不足为名士贤大夫乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286210_comment'></div>中进士第，历明州慈溪县尉，邵州邵阳县令，知岳州巴陵县，通判郴州，官累朝奉郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286210_comment'></div>公既不求知于人，人亦无能知公者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286210_comment'></div>至其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1286210", 1286210, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>造意</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1286210", 1286210, "Clauses/47/Comments/1")'>广远</span>，据经坚决，寄讽于草木，托兴于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1286210", 1286210, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>亭传</span>，人多惮而不能回也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286210_comment'></div>开禧元年十二月七日，卒于郴州，年六十九。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286210_comment'></div>夫人张氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286210_comment'></div>二子：中行，先卒；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286210_comment'></div>中立，将仕郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286210_comment'></div>三女：长嫁进士包某；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286210_comment'></div>次嫁文林郎、严州分水县令冯遇，遇死，再嫁进士何某；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286210_comment'></div>又次嫁进士陈某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286210_comment'></div>孙男女各一人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286210_comment'></div>三年十一月十三日，葬永嘉县秀峰山，祔其先人焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286210_comment'></div>于是同年生龙泉叶某与为铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286210_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_1286210'>呜呼诚之！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286210_comment'></div>嘐嘐乎，绳绳乎，不忮不求，归全其生乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286210_comment'></div>不从古人于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1286210", 1286210, "Clauses/78/Comments/0")'>九京</span>乎！</div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1286210_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1207&endYear=1207')">1207年</a>　为岳父高子莫撰墓志铭。作品：高永州墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286213' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286213' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286213?labeling=true' target='_blank'>高永州墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1207年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286213")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286213_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286213'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286213'>庆元己未夏，余畏风，更用寒热，药不疗病，聚腹胁上行，四肢百体皆失度，如土木偶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286213_comment'></div>众医妄议却立，亲党不知所为，多引去，惟外舅朝奉大夫永州高使君日来视余。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286213_comment'></div>其明年庚申，永州亦病，四月二十三日卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286213_comment'></div>方永州且病且死，余不能伏枕席，常狂行竟日，其疾不能问，其殓不能哭也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286213_comment'></div>又明年辛酉十一月初九日，葬于永嘉官庄，其子属余铭，又不能为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286213_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286213_comment'></div>余山野人尔，永州徒以文墨事不辱婿之，而无铭以传，余义阙矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286213_comment'></div>又六年丁卯，余疾终未愈也，然渐欲操笔矣，乃次而铭之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286213_comment'></div>使君讳子莫，字执中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286213_comment'></div>蒙城之高，实生宣仁圣烈后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286213_comment'></div>后亲侄公绘，任保静军节度使，赠太师，追封咸宁郡王，为公曾祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286213_comment'></div>祖世定，朝议大夫、秘阁修撰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286213_comment'></div>父本之，从事郎、江西运司干官，赠朝议大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286213_comment'></div>运干卒时，生五年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286213_comment'></div>高氏来永嘉，无宅无田。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286213_comment'></div>公幼孤，贫甚，天性耐穷约，知事轻重，转侧闾巷间，自求师友以立门户，故虽贵姓而知名与儒书生等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286213_comment'></div>调郢州京山尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286213_comment'></div>虏新抽兵，苇屋数楹在丛寇中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286213_comment'></div>公视弓手土豪如家人，尽死力，贼发辄灭，流亡复归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286213_comment'></div>诸司高其能，举改官至六七，会罢岳庙理考法而止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286213_comment'></div>知明州象山县，大饥，负樵百斤易糟一掬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286213_comment'></div>公听鸡声出，竭公私哺之，夜归以斗落为候。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286213_comment'></div>岁寻大熟，麦一茎四五穗，民还宿逋，钱米露积。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286213_comment'></div>魏惠宪王甚爱公，曰：「类我家人」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286213_comment'></div>诸参佐敬之，曰：「寒士尔」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286213_comment'></div>知处州丽水县，善以简静拊<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1286213", 1286213, "Clauses/84/Comments/0")'>瘠薄</span>，有铢黍便民事，亦为设方略废置，补<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1286213", 1286213, "Clauses/87/Comments/0")'>预借</span>一料，民稍宽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286213_comment'></div>监左藏东库，辟成都钤辖司干官，母老不行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286213_comment'></div>通判台州，守猜而敛厚，民怨恶之，公据职争辨，守积不喜，中以法，谪主管崇道观，犹名自陈，所过遮泣曰：「谁独护我」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286213_comment'></div>通判隆兴府，帅素知公材，命吏「必先白通判，吾<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1286213", 1286213, "Clauses/105/Comments/1")'>书行</span>而已」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286213_comment'></div>事无不出公意，一府大治，归贤其帅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286213_comment'></div>知永州，未到郡卒，年六十一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286213_comment'></div>夫人翁氏，封宜人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286213_comment'></div>子二人：不愚；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286213_comment'></div>不息，迪功郎、福州长溪县主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286213_comment'></div>女二人，长归余，幼归朝奉郎、平江府通判包履常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286213_comment'></div>男孙五人，叔筠、彦伟、彦修、彦侃、彦符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286213_comment'></div>女孙一人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286213_comment'></div>公风神峻美，虽巾屐疏散，亦就<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_1286213", 1286213, "Clauses/126/Comments/0")'>仪律</span>，人谓图画当似之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286213_comment'></div>敏达明恕，要在不繁鞭挞而事举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286213_comment'></div>退公，常掩户翛然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286213_comment'></div>一衣数十年，生计粗给。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1286213_comment'></div>其仕虽取知，或连章荐引，然不验。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1286213_comment'></div>晚乘太守车，若将有为也，而又死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1286213_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_43_1286213'>车欲辐轮，不寘河旁；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1286213_comment'></div>马有乘黄，不在康庄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1286213_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_45_1286213", 1286213, "Clauses/145/Comments/0")'>浮桴</span>百艰，终也望洋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1286213_comment'></div>善价可求，孰为公偿！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1286213_comment'></div>山冥冥以宿云，水幽幽而击榔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1286213_comment'></div>嗟官庄之原兮，有永其藏！</div><div id='poem_sentence_48_1286213_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1207&endYear=1207')">1207年</a>　为詹元善撰墓志铭。作品：司农卿湖广总领詹公墓铭。<div id='poem_1286208' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286208' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286208?labeling=true' target='_blank'>司农卿湖广总领詹公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1207年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286208")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286208_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286208'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286208'>公姓詹氏，讳体仁，字元善，初后其舅张氏，既复为詹氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286208_comment'></div>詹氏之先，有自光州固始家于建武夷者，其后别居江、浙，皆本武夷，而公为浦城人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286208_comment'></div>曾祖某，祖某，父某，少有异材，乡举第一，授赣州信丰县尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286208_comment'></div>见张忠献公，论灭虏秘计，忠献壮之，辟为属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286208_comment'></div>以公赠朝奉大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286208_comment'></div>公<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1286208", 1286208, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>始冠</span>，第进士，大夫死钱塘，与柩俱返，哀动行路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286208_comment'></div>未几，张氏祖亦死，仲舅童孺不胜丧，公服重治家事，教舅有立，人无异言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286208_comment'></div>调饶州浮梁尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286208_comment'></div>郡以公屡获盗，欲奏其赏，谢不就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286208_comment'></div>为湖州归安丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286208_comment'></div>会张氏祖母死，终丧，为泉州晋江丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286208_comment'></div>公<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1286208", 1286208, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>颖迈</span>特立，在下僚，气顺言正，喜因事开说以便民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286208_comment'></div>上官不以气类离合，常敬听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286208_comment'></div>梁丞相荐于朝，召授太学录，迁博士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286208_comment'></div>于时学官号天下选，讲学得人之盛，后以为不可及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286208_comment'></div>公居间前后四年，功最多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286208_comment'></div>迁太常博士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286208_comment'></div>高宗方定谥，或谓宜称尧宗；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286208_comment'></div>公言于古无据，谓比殷高宗谥改高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286208_comment'></div>后为少卿，谥孝宗，亦公所定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286208_comment'></div>议者皆厌服从之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286208_comment'></div>迁丞，摄郎金部，提举浙西常平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286208_comment'></div>除左曹郎、湖广总领，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1286208", 1286208, "Clauses/67/Comments/0")'>逃卒</span>千人入大冶，因铁铸钱乱<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1286208", 1286208, "Clauses/68/Comments/0")'>币法</span>，劫掠为变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286208_comment'></div>公谓诸司宜速讨，曰：「此去京师千馀里，上请须报，贼计行也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286208_comment'></div>于是群党亟坏，人不知警。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286208_comment'></div>就迁司农少卿，召为太常少卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286208_comment'></div>光宗疾，省重华不以时，中外骇惧，或瘖不出语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286208_comment'></div>公深陈父子至恩，激发廷臣，使交疏迭谏，用意尤苦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286208_comment'></div>永阜陵当复土，公言：「本营思陵非高爽地，自思而西，势益卑下，非所以安神灵也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286208_comment'></div>宰相不听，公争之力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286208_comment'></div>迁太府卿，即请外，除直龙图阁，知福州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286208_comment'></div>岁馀，时论浸异，言者遂以争山陵事为公罪，罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286208_comment'></div>凡八年，徙屋苕霅，玩愒水石，诵读悠然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286208_comment'></div>复龙图，知静江府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286208_comment'></div>始至，劳农观田器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286208_comment'></div>公曰：「是薄而小，不足尽地力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286208_comment'></div>且无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1286208", 1286208, "Clauses/114/Comments/0")'>沟畎</span>，何以行水」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286208_comment'></div>乃更造农具，取水法，物别为图授之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286208_comment'></div>移知鄂州，除司农卿，再为湖广总领。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286208_comment'></div>公恩在鄂师，戍卒迟公来，合两手曰：「复得吾父矣」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286208_comment'></div>盖儒者之政，归于正己厚下而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1286208_comment'></div>世吏所以便文自用者，虽善弗录也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1286208_comment'></div>为民利无不举，为民害无不去，以其下为当捐无不与，以其上为不当取无不革也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1286208_comment'></div>故公于浙西，开漕渠，浚练湖，置斗门，以备水旱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1286208_comment'></div>特散盐本钱数万，以业亭民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1286208_comment'></div>湖广币轻，出百万权其价，而放诸州积欠亦百馀万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1286208_comment'></div>诸屯累重者，增券给之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1286208_comment'></div>簸腐籴新，士食好米。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1286208_comment'></div>又与鄂州运司同筑武昌万金堤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1286208_comment'></div>福州之僧坊以赂易，主者差其直有常数，公一彻去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1286208_comment'></div>其在桂，则十县之税钱为阁一万四千，杂税朱胶为除八千。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1286208_comment'></div>大凡州县之以用乏告，以赋重请，皆立应无留也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1286208_comment'></div>人或疑公且空有司之藏为百姓地矣，而公之财常源源暴暴，如泉涌山聚，此又世吏所难测也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1286208_comment'></div>公立朝，察消长，观<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_53_1286208", 1286208, "Clauses/164/Comments/0")'>会通</span>，劝发善意，助达阳德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1286208_comment'></div>于人材治道，开阖明晦，密扶显相，功效十数，顾难以言传也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1286208_comment'></div>自赵丞相去，士久失职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1286208_comment'></div>公率<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_56_1286208", 1286208, "Clauses/174/Comments/0")'>同志</span>请于周丞相，反覆极论，责以变通之理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1286208_comment'></div>因疏纳知名者三十馀人，周丞相不能用，然其后亦多所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_57_1286208", 1286208, "Clauses/179/Comments/0")'>收擢</span>，公之力也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1286208_comment'></div>时边事方旦暮急，而公已病，犹恳恳调护兵民，杜塞<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_58_1286208", 1286208, "Clauses/184/Comments/0")'>希意</span>迎和者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1286208_comment'></div>朝廷既召公归，遂以开禧二年二月二日卒，年六十四矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1286208_comment'></div>武昌之人，如丧所亲，号泣送之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1286208_comment'></div>夫人吴氏、聂氏，先公卒；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1286208_comment'></div>复娶沈氏，皆封恭人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1286208_comment'></div>五子：端愿，从事郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1286208_comment'></div>端悫，迪功郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1286208_comment'></div>端直，将仕郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1286208_comment'></div>端方，端靖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1286208_comment'></div>四年某月某日，葬于某县某乡某所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1286208_comment'></div>公少从建安朱公学，得其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_68_1286208", 1286208, "Clauses/207/Comments/0")'>指要</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1286208_comment'></div>已而遍观诸书，博求百家，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_69_1286208", 1286208, "Clauses/210/Comments/0")'>融会通浃</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1286208_comment'></div>天文、地理、象数、异书，无不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_70_1286208", 1286208, "Clauses/212/Comments/0")'>该极</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1286208_comment'></div>每陋巷棐几，茗饮冷落，或穷游纵观，觞行淋漓，辄为人讲说，本末条畅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1286208_comment'></div>眉疏目明，照坐奕奕，夜阑烛尽，听者忘疲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1286208_comment'></div>著《象数总义》若干卷，某集若干卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1286208_comment'></div>始，公之后张氏，詹氏诸兄蚤世而贫，公养视弟鼎，买田宅，具婚嫁，女为官人妻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1286208_comment'></div>既还詹氏，经营二家如一日，至于吊死恤孤，无疏戚贵贱，有无共之，信矣其笃厚君子也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1286208_comment'></div>余观公在朝，有可以致高位之时屡矣，而义不茍取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1286208_comment'></div>尝与同僚<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_77_1286208", 1286208, "Clauses/241/Comments/0")'>燕语</span>，顾余而叹曰：「吾等善自立，须子一好墓铭而已」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1286208_comment'></div>悲夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1286208_comment'></div>余之卒铭公也耶！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1286208_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_80_1286208'>约步则履，殆无奇行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1286208_comment'></div>恢疏伟人，难中准绳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1286208_comment'></div>莫求广居，陋者则然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1286208_comment'></div>大德不踰，公其有焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1286208_comment'></div>相彼豪雄，竭海摧岳；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1286208_comment'></div>又粹以悫，金鍊玉琢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1286208_comment'></div>匪质偶成，以学故能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1286208_comment'></div>既超既腾，靡公靡卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1286208_comment'></div>噫嘻古人，用岂必尽！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1286208_comment'></div>我铭此诗，哀而勿愠。</div><div id='poem_sentence_89_1286208_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
嘉兴
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='2ab47533114f426188565ceda029dcd4_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("2ab47533114f426188565ceda029dcd4");'><span id='2ab47533114f426188565ceda029dcd4_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1174&endYear=1174')">1174年</a>，25岁</div><div id='2ab47533114f426188565ceda029dcd4' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1174&endYear=1174')">1174年</a>　离京，过秀州，上书王希吕。作品：寄王正言书。<div id='poem_1285863' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1285863' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1285863?labeling=true' target='_blank'>寄王正言书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1174年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1285863")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1285863_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1285863'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1285863'>某再拜：人之所以贵于君子者，以其存心也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1285863_comment'></div>心之所存，高出于道德，卑溺于功名，旁达于技艺，而微极于幽远，举无非是心者，盖亦博矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1285863_comment'></div>然大要皆以社稷生民为主，而一身之利害不参焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1285863_comment'></div>自昔唐、虞、三代之君子，随世就功，因事用力，其存心有小大，故所成就有厚薄，不可掩也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1285863_comment'></div>孟子曰：「有事君人者，事是君则为容悦者也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1285863_comment'></div>有安社稷臣者，以安社稷为悦者也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1285863_comment'></div>有天民者，达可行于天下而后行之者也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1285863_comment'></div>夫所谓天民者，吾不得而见之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1285863_comment'></div>视今之士，崇饰<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1285863", 1285863, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>诈巧</span>，造作成败，缓则专利于己而急则归过于君，自以为身之用舍无与于君之安危，则犹未得为能事是君也，而所谓安社稷者，尚安能之！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1285863_comment'></div>今夫利有便于民而决为之，计有所不合于众而勇行之，昭然号于人曰：「此吾君之所欲」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1285863_comment'></div>天下莫能违也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1285863_comment'></div>然利兴而民怨，计行而众诽，社稷危矣，而君谁与安！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1285863_comment'></div>是以昔之君子，言不苟徇，必依于道，事不苟悦，必顾于理，其所以慨然而力争，坚守而不变者，凡皆以为社稷也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1285863_comment'></div>社稷苟存，而君尚谁与亡！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1285863_comment'></div>所谓社稷臣者，必至于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1285863_comment'></div>然其干君之所忌，婴祸之所聚，亦已甚矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1285863_comment'></div>时有变兴，道有用舍，不能以尽然也，君子于此，则亦尽其心而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1285863_comment'></div>所患者，才不足以副其心，而道不足以周其才，果于靖难，而于天时人事人情物理之微有所未察，则不免以其身与社稷俱毙，其发而不中而为仁人义士之所哀，若陈蕃、李固之流，盖患是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1285863_comment'></div>夫由其前以行其志，而又思其后以全其功，亦可谓难矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1285863_comment'></div>伏惟执事，才器之刚果，学术之正大，议论之闳远，脱身亳、宋，中间阅草棘，来见天子，为谏官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1285863_comment'></div>时值朝廷有大废置，立殿陛上，语移数刻，奄人侍宦，股慄<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1285863", 1285863, "Clauses/88/Comments/0")'>失气</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1285863_comment'></div>当是时，忠义之气盖天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1285863_comment'></div>及其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1285863", 1285863, "Clauses/91/Comments/0")'>屏居</span>田野，一室萧然，不闻国家之论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1285863_comment'></div>然发言措辞，慷慨明白，语及社稷事，辄愤激流涕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1285863_comment'></div>其于饮食衣服，盖有若不得已然者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1285863_comment'></div>闻之于人，以为今之君子未始见也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1285863_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1285863_comment'></div>非其心之所存，何以及此！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1285863_comment'></div>某一生多难，学为世嗤，誓将去瓯闽之上，凿井筑室，有以自老，于今天下之事无所复置其念矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1285863_comment'></div>惟其深悲于孟子之言，而有感于执事之意，故所愿有谒焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1285863_comment'></div>伏惟执事，安佚以养其身，和平以养其心，发而中节以养其言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1285863_comment'></div>昆岗之炎，玞珷皆烬，则所谓良玉者，可不深藏而自爱乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1285863_comment'></div>昨舟行过秀州，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1285863", 1285863, "Clauses/123/Comments/0")'>詹望</span>君子，近在咫尺，有病不能自力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1285863_comment'></div>既去，始大悔，故一作此道其区区。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1285863_comment'></div>拜见无期，惟千万为国自重。</div><div id='poem_sentence_34_1285863_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
黄岩
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='549fceef7c0d44e5a308bc5e0e23f80c_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("549fceef7c0d44e5a308bc5e0e23f80c");'><span id='549fceef7c0d44e5a308bc5e0e23f80c_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1176&endYear=1176')">1176年</a>，27岁</div><div id='549fceef7c0d44e5a308bc5e0e23f80c' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1176&endYear=1176')">1176年</a>　游黄岩，遇陈傅良，听说戴溪有方外之求，作书规劝。作品：与戴少望书。<div id='poem_1285866' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1285866' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1285866?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与戴少望书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1176年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1285866")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1285866_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1285866'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1285866'>少望兄足下：奉别忽已三改月，詹望詹望！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1285866_comment'></div>日来伏惟<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1285866", 1285866, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>起居</span>佳胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1285866_comment'></div>十日前及陈傅良遇于黄岩，说足下决以此月初三日行天下求世外之道，欲抵书已无及，徒益怅恨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1285866_comment'></div>昨日里人来，知尚因循未果行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1285866_comment'></div>始在韩丈时，屡闻少望此言，心谓戏耳，不识诚有之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1285866_comment'></div>少望天下奇才，于今世不过数人，造物者所庇惜，柰何以少得丧，一不当意，遂为此等<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1285866", 1285866, "Clauses/19/Comments/1")'>绝世</span>自好、苍莽不可知之事？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1285866_comment'></div>惊惊怪怪！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1285866_comment'></div>切计诸公已有为少望留行者，若犹未也，则愿进其愚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1285866_comment'></div>往时陆惟忠学内外丹法，东坡先生谓之曰：「子神清而骨寒，其清可以仙，其寒亦可以死」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1285866_comment'></div>惟忠学之，每几乎成，物辄有以害之，则叹曰：「吾真坐寒而死矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1285866_comment'></div>今为足下言不可出之故，不但寒耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1285866_comment'></div>古之至人，未有闻也，未有行也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1285866_comment'></div>必疲筋骨，极精神，甘贱役，甚至侮蛟龙，冒锋镝，竟其死而不知倦，然犹有不闻，闻之而不行者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1285866_comment'></div>吾料足下是数者皆不能尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1285866_comment'></div>平时拣求美便，斥弃酸咸，尊夫人、贤兄佳爱，故曲徇其所欲耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1285866_comment'></div>步行至十里外，足弱不能前而反，非舟车不能越乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1285866_comment'></div>将遂舍之而去，道里甚远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1285866_comment'></div>荆、襄、江、淮，土俗嗜好不同东浙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1285866_comment'></div>即不幸一日有饥寒劳苦之间，风雨露雾之气从而乘之，疾病且作，旁无亲党，药物不至，则为之奈何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1285866_comment'></div>无乃贼其所爱之身，失天生贤之意，废于贤母兄之望乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1285866_comment'></div>想少望一读至此，可以遂释前念也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1285866_comment'></div>列仙者，必用心于寂寞，笃学于无为，已而道充其中，大发乎外，是以旦暮于吴、越之区，飞翔乎秦、汉之郊，纵意所如，无留焉者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1285866_comment'></div>足下犹未能充也，遂肆然发之，搂取其名而不思其难，恐力穷气尽，则必有俟之者焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1285866_comment'></div>故为少望计，当杜门端居，危坐深念，时用《参同契》、《九龠》之书、老氏《道德》言，以增益其所未定，道引<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1285866", 1285866, "Clauses/89/Comments/0")'>关节</span>，屏闲思虑，以远去少年之习，高人长者当袭武而至矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1285866_comment'></div>仆旧读柳子厚文，独爱其序送娄图南极有理，使世之君子，畔其道以从异学，劳而无成者，可以自镜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1285866_comment'></div>正惟不劳而成，固与龟蛇木石无以异耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1285866_comment'></div>愿足下深思惟忠之事，而反复子厚之意，救世俗之失，正诸子之非，明圣人之经，是所期于少望者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1285866_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1285866", 1285866, "Clauses/107/Comments/0")'>鄙言</span>可听，不可忽！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1285866_comment'></div>岁行尽矣，寒苦，惟厚自爱！</div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1285866_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
苏州（平江）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='2b11356e3b0a486aa3c1d8ea0efb18e5_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("2b11356e3b0a486aa3c1d8ea0efb18e5");'><span id='2b11356e3b0a486aa3c1d8ea0efb18e5_link' href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1182&endYear=1182')">1182年</a>　至苏州上任浙西提刑司干办公事。有书致周必大，已佚。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1182&endYear=1182')">1182年</a>　永嘉学者何傅卒，为之撰写墓志铭。作品：墓林处士墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286172' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286172' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286172?labeling=true' target='_blank'>墓林处士墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1182年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286172")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286172_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286172'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286172'>墓林处士者，永嘉何傅字商霖者也，死年五十七。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286172_comment'></div>所居墓林巷，城中最深僻处也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286172_comment'></div>前二岁，余数过焉，草木稀疏而不荣，败屋才三间，悉用故《唐书》黏之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286172_comment'></div>处士润泽详整，如大人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286172_comment'></div>对客为清远之言，其言以有财为累而以贫贱为得，以即死为可足而无憾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286172_comment'></div>其忧诸子曰：「恐不能如我无过」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286172_comment'></div>其釜爨常空，而意气悠然，未尝以微感人，人亦忘其为贫也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286172_comment'></div>尝一日大雪，道无行人，处士与同巷朱伯鱼问余，遂登郭公山富览亭之故基，以望江北。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286172_comment'></div>雪骤甚不已，两袂皆积。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286172_comment'></div>余不能忍寒，饮酒而下，处士独傍城隅，度横彴，徬徨折苇之间，昏夜乃归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286172_comment'></div>以余所知于处士，能不以非义干其虑，而有冻饿自守之乐，斯亦士之极致也，岂可谓之非贤者欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286172_comment'></div>处士自少攻为诗，竟以成名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286172_comment'></div>迨其死也，犹课某章，未缮而卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286172_comment'></div>男女七人，其长者未冠也，其幼者尚抱也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286172_comment'></div>死之日，其友翁忱既襚敛之，又率尝往来者尽有赙焉，始克葬于西山崇明寺旁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286172_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_1286172'>古人有言曰：「天生五材，民并用之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286172_comment'></div>厚薄不齐，非圣莫司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286172_comment'></div>惟其不悲，以刻于斯。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1286172_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1182&endYear=1182')">1182年</a>　为包颙叟撰写挽诗。作品：包颙叟挽词二首。<div id='poem_79940' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_79940' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/79940?labeling=true' target='_blank'>包颙叟挽词二首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1182年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 class='poemContent' id='poem_content_79940'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_79940'>风沙江上宅，斥卤望中村。<div id='poem_sentence_0_79940_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_79940'>密竹元遮径，崇兰早映门。<div id='poem_sentence_1_79940_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_79940'>笑谈看磊落，材力可腾掀。<div id='poem_sentence_2_79940_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_79940'>谁复知心事，沧波雾雨昏。<div id='poem_sentence_3_79940_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_79940'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_79940_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_79939' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_79939' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/79939?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1182年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_79939_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_79939'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_79939'>养志诸郎事，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_79939", 79939, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>专经</span>永夜残。<div id='poem_sentence_0_79939_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_79939'>虽云绿衫易，更觉䌽衣难。<div id='poem_sentence_1_79939_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_79939'>客散棋奁闭，庭虚酒盎乾。<div id='poem_sentence_2_79939_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_79939'>无言慰孤苦，持此问漫漫。<div id='poem_sentence_3_79939_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_79939'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_79939_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1182&endYear=1182')">1182年</a>　为刘茂实写序文。作品：送刘茂实序。<div id='poem_1285883' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1285883' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1285883?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送刘茂实序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1182年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1285883")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1285883_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1285883'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1285883'>刘茂实为知奉新县事，某序送之，曰：昔之立法者，以职官令、录近于民，非举其材不得为之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1285883_comment'></div>最重者改官而知大县，奏上，天子临前，侍郎读胪句传而命之，谓之再及第，由是脱吏部而登朝廷矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1285883_comment'></div>盖其厚以一县为寄而超尊之，非恤士大夫而苟荣其身也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1285883_comment'></div>及其久也，循习而例不明，以为凡仕者必<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1285883", 1285883, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>关升</span>，必改官，此上所设以待人之求，而其进取条目之限当如此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1285883_comment'></div>自改官至外员郎，有禄以传其子，所以备一身之事尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1285883_comment'></div>故其既得改官也，反以为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1285883", 1285883, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>格法</span>之咎，曰，「何必使我为知县」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1285883_comment'></div>而厌苦之至，常避免而不得，则勉强而后受。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1285883_comment'></div>既至如不能脱，未有乐而久居者也，皆务为苟且之政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1285883_comment'></div>虽欲无大阙败，然积百数十岁以一意相承，而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1285883", 1285883, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>功化</span>之陵夷甚矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1285883_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1285883_comment'></div>以不乐为知县之人，改其所愿之官，其必至是欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1285883_comment'></div>然余见今之论者，真以县为难治，位卑责重，不可以自为，又以不自为者为罪也，亦未尽力而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1285883_comment'></div>秦、汉以下，顾何容有易治之县耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1285883_comment'></div>独未知三代何如耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1285883_comment'></div>曹、滕、邾、莒，有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1285883", 1285883, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>南面</span>之尊，未尝得自行其志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1285883_comment'></div>虽孔子之门人冉求、仲由之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1285883", 1285883, "Clauses/52/Comments/1")'>果艺</span>，又未尝不以宰邑为难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1285883_comment'></div>然则县之难治，亦非独今世也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1285883_comment'></div>其要使为国者尽去烦密之法，无破产之役，无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1285883", 1285883, "Clauses/58/Comments/0")'>杂名</span>之敛，一出于简古而不以所难责吏，则庶几公私之论可一而民可善治矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1285883_comment'></div>不然，则或幸而得仁厚<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1285883", 1285883, "Clauses/62/Comments/0")'>通敏</span>之才，不以改官为身计，而能因今之法度，以行其政事之仁，然后可望以一县之善治也，不其难欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1285883_comment'></div>茂实材厚<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1285883", 1285883, "Clauses/68/Comments/0")'>通敏</span>，顺物险易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1285883_comment'></div>其居自勉以道义之重，而为朋友之所望者当何如，况一改官之利哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1285883_comment'></div>所谓幸而得之者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1285883_comment'></div>故于其行也，历道古今之变以告之，不独庆奉新之人将蒙其泽，而茂实之功名亦可少见矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1285883_comment'></div>淳熙九年八月日序。</div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1285883_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1182&endYear=1182')">1182年</a>　为叶梓写撰墓志铭。作品：叶君墓志铭。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1183&endYear=1183')">1183年</a>　仍在平江任原职，并讲学授徒。与浙西提刑刘颖、浙西提刑司检法官罗克开交往密切。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1183&endYear=1183')">1183年8月</a>　八月，朝廷以左藏南库隶户部，叶适应诏奏书。作品：财赋总论。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1183&endYear=1183')">1183年9月</a>　范成大以资政殿学士于八月间奉祠还乡，叶适偕罗克开晋谒。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1183&endYear=1183')">1183年11月</a>　十一月，同年进士姚颖卒，时任平江府通判，叶适哭送其柩出苏州盘门。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1183&endYear=1183')">1183年</a>　友人黄度之子黄章在苏州为官，常有往来。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1183&endYear=1183')">1183年</a>　叶适亦有文名，各方从学者众，遂在葑门设教。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1183&endYear=1183')">1183年</a>　吟咏苏州景物。作品：超然堂。灵岩。葑门。齐云楼。虎丘。北斋。题椿桂堂。<div id='poem_80203' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_80203' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/80203?labeling=true' target='_blank'>超然堂</a><span class='authorDate'>（1183年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: id='poem_content_80203'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_80203'>晨兴诣曹参使驿，传呼趋庭头颈屈。<div id='poem_sentence_0_80203_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_80203'>退归阖户胥吏玩，过门掉臂不入室。<div id='poem_sentence_1_80203_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_80203'>宅舍空荒转<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_80203", 80203, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>颓漏</span>，驺仆蓝缕常<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_80203", 80203, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>寒乞</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_80203_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_80203'>此堂岂可更超然，乍可鞅掌中怫郁。<div id='poem_sentence_3_80203_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_80203'>每怜庄周齐物论，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_80203", 80203, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>遣词</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_80203", 80203, "Clauses/9/Comments/1")'>旷荡</span>违经律。<div class='authorDate'>（1183年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_80076_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_80076'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_80076_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_80076'>及尔风露清，忽感意象谐。<div id='poem_sentence_5_80076_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_80076'>幽深容<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_80076", 80076, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>浪蕊</span>，润泽长芳荄。<div id='poem_sentence_6_80076_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_80076'>亭亭两高梧，买自娄门街。<div id='poem_sentence_7_80076_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_80219_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_80219'>词华<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_80219", 80219, ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1184&endYear=1184')">1184年6月</a>　六月，应诏撰书。作品：贤良进卷。<div id='poem_80106' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_80106' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_sentence_4_80106_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_80106'>津般俾之读，涉岸沧溟汹。<div id='poem_sentence_5_80106_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_80106'>谁知畏浩博，敢复议<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_80106", 80106, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>烦冗</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_6_80106_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_80106'>芄兰恨柔蔓，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_80106", 80106, ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1185&endYear=1185')">1185年</a>　秋八月前，仍在平江任职，讲学授徒。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1185&endYear=1185')">1185年</a>　春，陈亮在家建抱膝亭，叶适为之作诗二首。作品：陈同甫抱膝斋二首。<div id='poem_80108' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_80108' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/80108?labeling=true' target='_blank'>陈同甫抱膝斋二首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1185年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_80108")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_80108_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_80108'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_80108'>昔人但抱膝，将军拥和銮。<div id='poem_sentence_0_80108_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_80108'>徒知许国易，未信藏身难。<div id='poem_sentence_1_80108_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_80108'>功虽愆岁晚，誉已塞世间。<div id='poem_sentence_2_80108_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_80108'>今人但抱膝，流俗忌长叹。<div id='poem_sentence_3_80108_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_80108'>儒书所不传，群士欲焚删。<div id='poem_sentence_4_80108_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_80108'>讥诃致囚箠，一饭不得安。<div id='poem_sentence_5_80108_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_80108'>珠玉无先容，松柏有后艰。<div id='poem_sentence_6_80108_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_80108'>内窥深深息，仰视冥冥翰。<div id='poem_sentence_7_80108_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_80108'>勿要两脾消，且令四体胖。<div id='poem_sentence_8_80108_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_80108'>徘徊重徘徊，夜雪埋前山。<div id='poem_sentence_9_80108_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_80108'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_80108_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_80107' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_80107' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_title_80107_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_80107'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_80107'>音骇则难听，问骇则难答。<div id='poem_sentence_0_80107_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_80107'>我欲终言之，复恐来尊沓。<div id='poem_sentence_1_80107_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_80107'></div><div id='poem_sentence_9_80107_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1185&endYear=1185')">1185年8月丙辰</a>　八月丙辰日，为连襟乐清包履常之父包昂撰墓记。作品：包颙叟墓记。<div id='poem_1286294' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286294' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286294?labeling=true' target='_blank'>包颙叟墓记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1185年8月丙辰）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286294")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286294_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286294'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286294'>包君年五十，淳熙九年十月某日卒，十一月某日，葬永嘉县塘下原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286294_comment'></div>君之子履常，思其父之久而存，谓有以铭其圹者，以为请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286294_comment'></div>十二年八月丙辰，始克文之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286294_comment'></div>而圹閟不可铭，乃刻记其墓上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286294_comment'></div>君讳昂，字颙叟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286294_comment'></div>曾祖某，祖某，世籍雁池。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286294_comment'></div>考某，爱乐清之柳市，徙居之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286294_comment'></div>馆头、乐清之间，路不堠，濠无梁，行旅无舍，盖柳市稍有聚落大姓，而君以贤闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286294_comment'></div>君和厚平恕，以卑逊韬其材力；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286294_comment'></div>时发于事之难者，壮勇敢决，已力强党破散，阴类消伏，众皆推君为能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286294_comment'></div>问学知大义所止，不为异人之行，人亦莫有指其过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286294_comment'></div>温之士几万人，其解选拘于旧额，最号狭少，以幸为得尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286294_comment'></div>如君之贤，既遗落不偶，而君无暇与新进争所知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286294_comment'></div>退而教子读书，择古人之义，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1286294", 1286294, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>耽玩</span>传写，申论反覆，陶然有以自乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286294_comment'></div>初，君之子与其乡党周旋，通于令长，以任利害之政，凶饥有赒，征敛有损，施设惠爱，尚多可纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286294_comment'></div>而余独以为君既不幸，不得见其大者于世用，则其小者岂必以此求知于众人，故余亦存其大略而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286294_comment'></div>夫人翁氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286294_comment'></div>七男子，履常，履端，履冰，履道，履远，履大，履言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286294_comment'></div>一婿，张自得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286294_comment'></div>二女，笄未适也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286294_comment'></div>孙曰安娘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286294_comment'></div>履常为迪功郎、新建昌军学教授，与余同高氏婿云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1286294_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1185&endYear=1185')">1185年</a>　为金华时镐之母邵氏撰行述。作品：太孺人邵氏行述。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1185&endYear=1185')">1185年</a>　冬，有太学正之召，自平江赴临安。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='ecc9f37264a94f6690546024620203e5_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("ecc9f37264a94f6690546024620203e5");'><span id='ecc9f37264a94f6690546024620203e5_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1191&endYear=1191')">1191年</a>，42岁</div><div id='ecc9f37264a94f6690546024620203e5' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1191&endYear=1191')">1191年</a>　携眷赴任。过苏州，会见门人王大受。<br /></div>

-----title
吴江
-----detail

class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_80098")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_80098_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_80098'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_80098'>具区以为潴，吴江以为裨。<div id='poem_sentence_0_80098_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_80098'>自专一方浸，尽纳海所遗。<div id='poem_sentence_1_80098_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_80098'>逝川无发叹，丽泽可求师。<div id='poem_sentence_2_80098_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_80098'>昔人会心地，今为鱼鸟资。<div id='poem_sentence_3_80098_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_80098'>飞者自无极，游者自无涯。<div id='poem_sentence_4_80098_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_80098'>造物不谆谆，亦莫分<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_80098", 80098, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>何谁</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_5_80098_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_80098'>此时余与子，相遇相谐嬉。<div id='poem_sentence_6_80098_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_80098'>曾观烟雨外，未满苍茫思。<div id='poem_sentence_7_80098_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_80098'>复来秋风后，重有骚屑悲。<div id='poem_sentence_8_80098_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_80098'>不及日月入，烂焉堕轮规。<div id='poem_sentence_9_80098_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_80098'>尚见波涛惊，累然拥丘坻。<div id='poem_sentence_10_80098_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_80098'>况彼琐细者，蒲菼争纷披。<div id='poem_sentence_11_80098_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_80098'>当年吴季子，德合无醇疵。<div id='poem_sentence_12_80098_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_80098'>范蠡之所矜，视之渺毫釐。<div id='poem_sentence_13_80098_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_80098'>末路张季鹰，适意亦见推。<div id='poem_sentence_14_80098_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_80098'>人才非一端，事近苦易移。<div id='poem_sentence_15_80098_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_80098'>常恐后生辈，风流日凌迟。<div id='poem_sentence_16_80098_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_80098'>县忧公家迫，俗陋栋宇卑。<div id='poem_sentence_17_80098_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_80098'>子将跨大阁，对此连天㳽。<div id='poem_sentence_18_80098_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_80098'>英雄久销歇，枯槁乃光辉。<div id='poem_sentence_19_80098_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_80098'>置余一榻处，析理定兴衰。<div id='poem_sentence_20_80098_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_80098'></div><div id='poem_sentence_21_80098_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>再过吴江，作诗赠了洪禅师。作品：再过吴江赠僧了洪。<div id='poem_80084' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_80084' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/80084?labeling=true' target='_blank'>再过吴江赠僧了洪</a><span class='authorDate'>（1183年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_80084")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_80084_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_80084'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_80084'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_80084", 80084, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>回飙</span>掩夹浦，势与黑楼颃。<div id='poem_sentence_0_80084_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_80084'>连袂上长桥，身弱屡见扛。<div id='poem_sentence_1_80084_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_80084'>苟无倾覆忧，恣横未易当。<div id='poem_sentence_2_80084_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_80084'>坐定互惊愕，师云乃其常。<div id='poem_sentence_3_80084_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_80084'>有时气力雄，驾浪拍此邦。<div id='poem_sentence_4_80084_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_80084'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_80084", 80084, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>熟风</span>无失舟，小艇来茫茫。<div id='poem_sentence_5_80084_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_80084'>始悟寡所谙，论改色据张。<div id='poem_sentence_6_80084_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_80084'>衒小以为大，空令事难量。<div id='poem_sentence_7_80084_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_80084'>玩变不睹微，亦乖智之方。<div id='poem_sentence_8_80084_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_80084'>已矣勿复云，闻钟过石塘。<div id='poem_sentence_9_80084_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_80084'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_80084_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
江陵
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='05d45bf03b7c4c7e88646f43851d54a2_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("05d45bf03b7c4c7e88646f43851d54a2");'><span id='05d45bf03b7c4c7e88646f43851d54a2_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1189&endYear=1190')">1189-1190年</a>，40-41岁</div><div id='05d45bf03b7c4c7e88646f43851d54a2' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1189&endYear=1189')">1189年</a>　至江陵任湖北安抚司参议官。为周淳中作墓志铭。作品：故朝散大夫主管建宁府武夷山冲佑观周先生墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286179' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286179' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286179?labeling=true' target='_blank'>故朝散大夫主管建宁府武夷山冲佑观周先生墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1189年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286179")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286179_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286179'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286179'>先生姓周氏，讳淳中，字仲古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286179_comment'></div>及进士第，乞监潭州南岳庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286179_comment'></div>教授全州，以心丧去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286179_comment'></div>又教授广德军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286179_comment'></div>广德之学自钱公辅、洪兴祖，先生增制学宫，教以义利先后，人用知劝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286179_comment'></div>满秩，有咨其贤者，共为荐，改官，知台州宁海县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286179_comment'></div>富人子育于伯父，后乃愬父与赀不平，傅狱累岁矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286179_comment'></div>先生使并处一室，为言鞠养旧恩可念也，因相泣不复愬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286179_comment'></div>知州索民久欠甚急，先生争不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286179_comment'></div>又以故乞监岳庙去，朝廷将用之，先生辞焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286179_comment'></div>为主管淮西安抚司机宜文字，帅欲奏边状，必请先生乃具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286179_comment'></div>还，授茶陵军使，茶陵阙远，故求之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286179_comment'></div>已而遂乞主管台州崇道观、成都府玉局观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286179_comment'></div>授淮东安抚司参议官，当上，又乞主管建宁府武夷山冲佑观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286179_comment'></div>淳熙十六年五月己未卒，积年六十八，阶至朝散大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286179_comment'></div>先生温州瑞安县人，居三港镇之西。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286179_comment'></div>初买废山，躬执锄镰，烧地种木，稍凿平为宅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286179_comment'></div>既久，则大竹长杉，回合蔽亏，绮岚绀池，焕霍房户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286179_comment'></div>先生出仕之日少，退休之日多，常终岁闭门，花香鸟鸣，畅然怡适，不问外事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286179_comment'></div>间行市上，负贩错杂，见者惊异，谓为古人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286179_comment'></div>先生与人尽恭，能推善逊强，不使人以其薄仕进为出己上，故行高而人不忌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286179_comment'></div>著《文集》十卷，《春秋说约》六卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286179_comment'></div>曰昌龄者，曾王父也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286179_comment'></div>曰赠宣教惟良者，王父也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286179_comment'></div>曰大宗正丞赠中大夫之翰者，皇考也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286179_comment'></div>娶林氏，将作少监待问之女，封宜人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286179_comment'></div>有四男子：㮨，迪功郎、新福州永福县主簿；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286179_comment'></div>橚，未命；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286179_comment'></div>楠，先卒；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286179_comment'></div>枋，太学进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286179_comment'></div>两婿，曰刘用晦、林必大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286179_comment'></div>孙男三人，焘，烈，熙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286179_comment'></div>孙女二人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286179_comment'></div>九月壬申，㮨等葬先生于来暮乡龟岩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286179_comment'></div>大宗正丞以节廉重，人恨其不得为谏官御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286179_comment'></div>先生仍祈退远利，诡世无悔，迄再不显。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286179_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_36_1286179'>凡仕之初，岂异乎民！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286179_comment'></div>超卑跨尊，奴使厥神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286179_comment'></div>又于其间，突兀轮囷；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286179_comment'></div>智不能周，并伤乃身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286179_comment'></div>取物之残，眄睨嚬呻；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1286179_comment'></div>勤拾涕洟，味其芳辛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1286179_comment'></div>吁嗟先生！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1286179_comment'></div>退以自珍；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1286179_comment'></div>冗不希荣，屈不望伸；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1286179_comment'></div>有来招之，亦莫汝徇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1286179_comment'></div>不以为高，所求者仁；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1286179_comment'></div>异彼区区，计伐称勋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1286179_comment'></div>如编群羽，附诸坚珉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1286179_comment'></div>我述斯铭，无惰后闻。</div><div id='poem_sentence_49_1286179_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1190&endYear=1190')">1190年</a>　是年十月前，仍任湖北安抚司参议官，转朝奉郎。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1190&endYear=1190')">1190年6月</a>　友人潘景宪卒，有祭文。作品：祭潘叔度文。<span class='inlineComment2'>（题目见《水心集》卷二十八。）</span><div id='poem_1286324' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286324' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286324?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭潘叔度文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1190年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286324")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286324_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286324'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286324'>呜呼叔度！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286324_comment'></div>学不苟为足也，故虽既闻<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1286324", 1286324, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>理要</span>，而犹前师后友，上请下问，至于老而未已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286324_comment'></div>仕不苟为进也，故虽已得名第，而常避名匿迹，援亲辞病，终其身而不试。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286324_comment'></div>侧躬容膝于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1286324", 1286324, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>榱题</span>广屋之下，垢衣恶食于文绣膏粱之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286324_comment'></div>其仰如疑，其俯如愧；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286324_comment'></div>疾痛满心，药石起志；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286324_comment'></div>惴惴慄慄，以殁其世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286324_comment'></div>呜呼悲夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286324_comment'></div>岂非小罪大惧而知为善之难，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1286324", 1286324, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>粹白</span>累缁而畏失身之易，不私其乐而私其忧，愿近于仁而远于利者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286324_comment'></div>若夫父母兄弟，安其义而不以为劳；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286324_comment'></div>朋友<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1286324", 1286324, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>国人</span>，化其节而不以为异：一纯无疵，群贱犹贵，盖粲乎其可考，非率尔之所议也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286324_comment'></div>余视执事，匪合而离；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286324_comment'></div>书札罕通，嗜好多违：至其知君，自谓庶几。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286324_comment'></div>念考槃之不见，陈<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1286324", 1286324, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>泂酌</span>以来思。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1286324_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1190&endYear=1190')">1190年8月</a>　时阎苍舒任江陵府知府兼湖北安抚使，叶适撰《江陵府修城记》<div id='poem_1286105' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286105' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286105?labeling=true' target='_blank'>江陵府修城记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1190年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286105")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286105_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286105'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286105'>太原阎公治江陵，始至，与将佐行视新城壁及战守之具，曰：「美哉丞相卫国赵公之所为也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286105_comment'></div>公莅荆六年，不趣令暴兴，简绌细苛，壹于无事，繄楚邦保障是急。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286105_comment'></div>诡大力难，爰集兹绪，卒有功庸，为方镇首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286105_comment'></div>家铭、史册，书法举焉，而公弗命，故无记者，将何以昭丞相之勤，久荆人之思？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286105_comment'></div>某实受任代公，其无泯缺之惧」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286105_comment'></div>既乃谓某：「子以谋议名官，记，子职也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286105_comment'></div>始，江陵息靖康之难，伐茭芦，逐虎豹，四招流民，重立坊市，垂五十载，渐还故初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286105_comment'></div>惟城朽败日甚，毁垣颓堑，莫补莫续，驴马之驮可径，门关之阖不楔也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286105_comment'></div>前后守者，以役众费广，不敢有意，至言「罗郭无用，才葺子城可矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286105_comment'></div>人苟其居，不自顾必。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286105_comment'></div>朝廷患之，令都副统制总领钱粮讲修筑之政，安抚使不得预，议久不决。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286105_comment'></div>赵公闻而叹曰：「郡守号称专城，近制仍提督修城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286105_comment'></div>今将修江陵而帅守不预，非法意也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286105_comment'></div>遂具为奏，且合他司固请，诏许焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286105_comment'></div>钱二十五万贯，米四万石，皆从中下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286105_comment'></div>役以江陵、鄂州驻劄之兵，佐以郡府之义勇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286105_comment'></div>赵公杖屦日出城上，以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1286105", 1286105, "Clauses/64/Comments/0")'>劝劳</span>之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286105_comment'></div>始于淳熙十二年九月，成于十三年七月，为砖城二十一里，楼橹<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1286105", 1286105, "Clauses/68/Comments/0")'>战棚</span>之屋一千三间，浚隍池，缭甬道，备凡捍御器械之用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286105_comment'></div>然后江陵之人，更门益宅，早卧而晏起；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286105_comment'></div>四方之来者，惊其厚墉崇雉，岿然于长川大陂广野之中，环城以骋，登楼而望，知其跨江北，连襄、沔，莫不慨然思凭国威而壮戎守也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286105_comment'></div>天子迁赵公金紫光禄大夫，以宠褒之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286105_comment'></div>孟轲论高城深池之利不如人和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286105_comment'></div>盖先治其城郭者，乃诸侯郡守之常政尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286105_comment'></div>其后吏慢因循，以为幸其人之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1286105", 1286105, "Clauses/89/Comments/0")'>和辑</span>，可以坐镇，何必殚财动众，以新无用之城垒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286105_comment'></div>及变故起于仓猝，则虽有尧、舜之民不能以自保，此明主之所鉴也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286105_comment'></div>至尊寿皇圣帝，顺天从时，不轻试征伐，自淮南至京以西，数千里<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1286105", 1286105, "Clauses/100/Comments/0")'>险害</span>之地，皆特使将军城之，州县主给期会而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286105_comment'></div>独江陵为后，而赵公尝相天子，知上意，因力以请，然则阎公之欲记，岂独以明赵公之绩哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286105_comment'></div>所以示寿皇圣帝之规烈，使臣子不敢忘也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286105_comment'></div>赵公名雄，为右丞相，去江陵而判其乡资州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286105_comment'></div>阎公名苍舒，为吏部侍郎，待制龙图阁；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286105_comment'></div>其继赵公，自汉中徙焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286105_comment'></div>绍熙元年八月二十日。</div><div id='poem_sentence_31_1286105_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1190&endYear=1190')">1190年</a>　叶适公余之暇读佛书尽千卷，以告朱熹，二人对佛经与“夷狄”意见不同。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1190&endYear=1190')">1190年</a>　友人冯传之来荆州访，叶适作诗相送。作品：送冯传之。<div id='poem_80136' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_80136' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/80136?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送冯傅之</a><span class='authorDate'>（1190年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_80136")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_80136_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_80136'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_80136'>我乞来荆州，足未曾出门。<div id='poem_sentence_0_80136_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_80136'>明明楚汉迹，莽莽风尘昏。<div id='poem_sentence_1_80136_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_80136'>兹复罢著书，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_80136", 80136, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>梵译</span>专讨论。<div id='poem_sentence_2_80136_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_80136'>颓然对<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_80136", 80136, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>白法</span>，诸有不得存。<div id='poem_sentence_3_80136_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_80136'>傅之京口别，岁暮始穷源。<div id='poem_sentence_4_80136_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_80136'>帆张飞动势，缆系栖泊痕。<div id='poem_sentence_5_80136_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_80136'>相顾举杯酒，醉极<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_80136", 80136, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>沮漳</span>翻。<div id='poem_sentence_6_80136_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_80136'>儒生慕杰气，赤手诛<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_80136", 80136, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>鲸鲲</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_7_80136_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_80136'>将军建实垒，寸甓宜自攒。<div id='poem_sentence_8_80136_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_80136'>于时雪五尺，遣卒问江干。<div id='poem_sentence_9_80136_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_80136'>答言屈大夫，横肆群鱼吞。<div id='poem_sentence_10_80136_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_80136'>岂如卫宁蘧，舒卷常温温。<div id='poem_sentence_11_80136_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_80136'>闻此重嗟叹，恐堕祸福观。<div id='poem_sentence_12_80136_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_80136'>荣禳用国宝，谁能免沈燔。<div id='poem_sentence_13_80136_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_80136'>要令德性修，乃挽江海浑。<div id='poem_sentence_14_80136_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_80136'>我今材力尽，拙计东南坤。<div id='poem_sentence_15_80136_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_80136'>尚馀春秋志，欲执左衽奔。<div id='poem_sentence_16_80136_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_80136'>念子独奈何，葺屋补墙藩。<div id='poem_sentence_17_80136_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_80136'>梅花一两拆，春意到草根。<div id='poem_sentence_18_80136_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_80136'>倘见南枝荣，折寄随惊湍。<div id='poem_sentence_19_80136_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_80136'></div><div id='poem_sentence_20_80136_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1190&endYear=1190')">1190年10月</a>　差知蕲州，赴任前，自江陵回永嘉省亲，是年在江陵交游颇多。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1190&endYear=1190')">1190年10月</a>　为汉阳军新修学作记。作品：汉阳军新修学记。<div id='poem_1286106' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286106' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286106?labeling=true' target='_blank'>汉阳军新修学记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1190年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286106")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286106_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286106'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286106'>古之言曰：「一道德，同风俗」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286106_comment'></div>风俗之难同也，以其陋而远，虽道德大备之世，莫或齐焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286106_comment'></div>江、汉，蛮、荆之杂尔，自虞、夏时，治之略于中国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286106_comment'></div>惟周以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1286106", 1286106, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>增累</span>仁义，化衍南服，至能使江、沱之媵躬无怨之劳，汉广之女息游者之思，歌于正风，号登太平矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286106_comment'></div>然而国别土断，卒无卓然以忠哲志义之材自成者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286106_comment'></div>及楚用其民，纵横吞灭，君臣暴诈之行，著于《春秋》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286106_comment'></div>久而孙卿、屈原之徒，议论风旨为天下师，则怒峡之巅，绝沔之涯，兰芷<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1286106", 1286106, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>芳洁</span>，宝璐照耀，而楚之文词尝盛矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286106_comment'></div>是其昔之和平专一，秉内性之理义，有合于风、雅者，或不自知其善也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286106_comment'></div>而悲愤刻约，琢外巧之卉木，遂变风、雅而为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1286106", 1286106, "Clauses/36/Comments/1")'>丽淫</span>者，亦不自悟其失也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286106_comment'></div>随习迁改，常性<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1286106", 1286106, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>爽越</span>，千载之后，终为楚人之材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286106_comment'></div>嗟夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286106_comment'></div>周道之备也，江、汉之民，虽观感其善性而未能成材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286106_comment'></div>逮王泽之衰也，反沈溺于荆、楚之习而不克自振，可不哀欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286106_comment'></div>今吴、越、闽、蜀，家能著书，人知<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1286106", 1286106, "Clauses/51/Comments/0")'>挟册</span>，以辅人主取贵仕，而江、汉盖鲜称焉，岂其性与习俱失之哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286106_comment'></div>汉阳，昔郧子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286106_comment'></div>以遗音求之，正《召南》汉广之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286106_comment'></div>岸南即鄂州，今之巨镇，王师所屯，通阓大衢，商贾之会，物货之交也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286106_comment'></div>汉阳独力渔勤稼，不以走集逐利相夸诩；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286106_comment'></div>士大夫以其俗静而朴，往往舍鄂来居焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286106_comment'></div>军学地卑下，先时江暴涨，南湖不泄，洄洑停积，摧剥垫坏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286106_comment'></div>知军事吴兴皇甫焕，筑而隆之，尽彻旧屋，更起新宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286106_comment'></div>既成而堂庑崇崇，百楹相扶，墙甓外周，赤白<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1286106", 1286106, "Clauses/81/Comments/0")'>炳明</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286106_comment'></div>侯使请记于余，于是东平巩丰实为学官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286106_comment'></div>夫以巩君之博敏达于教，皇甫侯之聪明辨于政，为是役也，不徒示人以材力之所能至而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286106_comment'></div>使其考正古今之俗，因野夫贫女之常性，而兴其俊秀豪杰之思，一其趋向，厚其师友，畜其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1286106", 1286106, "Clauses/93/Comments/0")'>闻知</span>，广其伦类，极夫先王道德之正，文献渊源之远，而一归于性命之粹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286106_comment'></div>其视成周之士庶几乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286106_comment'></div>何必为楚人之材也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286106_comment'></div>千载之习，固不足以乱之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286106_comment'></div>若夫利禄之学，枝叶之文，口耳教导，媚世希宠，斯又在孙卿、屈原之下尔，非所以愧也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286106_comment'></div>故为记之，以答其人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286106_comment'></div>绍熙元年十月。</div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1286106_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1190&endYear=1190')">1190年10月</a>　为阎苍舒作诗。作品：题阎才元喜雪堂3首。<div id='poem_79920' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_79920' class='poemTitle
