id='poem_title_79920_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_79920'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_79920'>东来十月黄尘满，霰点霜花总未堪。<div id='poem_sentence_0_79920_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_79920'>恰是使君诚意足，带将腊雪赴荆南。<div id='poem_sentence_1_79920_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_79920'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_79920_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_79919' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_79919' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/79919?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1190年10月）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_79919_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_79919'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_79919'>平压龙山五尺危，堕鸢何处避阴威。<div id='poem_sentence_0_79919_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_79919'>渐令融罢春泥软，麦浪<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_79919", 79919, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>黏天</span>燕子飞。<div id='poem_sentence_1_79919_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_79919'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_79919_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_79918' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_79918' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/79918?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1190年10月）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_79918_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_79918'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_79918'>檐角低猥小凭栏，霏霏只合对高寒。<div id='poem_sentence_0_79918_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' -----title
蕲春

href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1191&endYear=1191')">1191年</a>　是年春，任蕲州知州，有到任谢表。作品：蕲州到任谢表。<div id='poem_1285832' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1285832' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1285832?labeling=true' target='_blank'>蕲州到任谢表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1191年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1285832")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1285832_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1285832'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1285832'>始从参幕，无最可书；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1285832_comment'></div>骤借专城，以恩被录。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1285832_comment'></div>对宠灵而甚愿，误寄委以知难<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1285832_comment'></div>伏念臣顷隶太常，承乏博士，方寿皇袭行舜、禹之旧，当陛下祗见祖宗之初，颇预讨论，尝叨奉引。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1285832_comment'></div>何幸清明之上，获缀末班；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1285832_comment'></div>乃缘贫悴之馀，自求外补。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1285832_comment'></div>远役忽栖于故楚，浮家几遍于长川。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1285832_comment'></div>恭惟驾驭豪杰之时，兼有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1285832", 1285832, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>收挽</span>孤寒之道，遂令试郡，课以治民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1285832_comment'></div>江、黄之间，山泽相杂，素号僻左，本极<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1285832", 1285832, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>贫虚</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1285832_comment'></div>属因淮南行铁以来，暨乎蕲口置监而后，阴仰官炉之羡，不胜伪冶之烦，浸用骄奢，无复绳矩，所以检覈增铸，禁绝私钱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1285832_comment'></div>畏两文销折之多，市井至于昼闭；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1285832_comment'></div>取十年工本之数，军库为之顿空。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1285832_comment'></div>解纷既难，任责良重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1285832_comment'></div>将欲<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1285832", 1285832, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>布宣</span>国家拊循之德，奉行监司督察之威，稍安人情，粗给经费，惧非<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1285832", 1285832, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>孱拙</span>，所克堪胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1285832_comment'></div>兹盖伏遇皇帝陛下，详于使臣，察于知远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1285832_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1285832", 1285832, "Clauses/49/Comments/0")'>柬擢</span>疏贱，即为守望之亲；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1285832_comment'></div>磨厉钝顽，收其敏达之效；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1285832_comment'></div>辑和边面，培壮本根。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1285832_comment'></div>臣敢不因时所宜，以静为福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1285832_comment'></div>日计不足，虽无毫发之功；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1285832_comment'></div>心力未穷，尚答乾坤之造。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1285832_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1191&endYear=1191')">1191年</a>　政事简静，颇得蕲州主簿舒杲相助，与本地隐士李之翰友善。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1191&endYear=1191')">1191年</a>　拜谒先圣。作品：蕲州谒先圣文。<div id='poem_1286382' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286382' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286382?labeling=true' target='_blank'>蕲州谒先圣文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1191年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286382")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286382_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286382'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286382'>重其任而轻其道，专其学而杂其施，此为政者所以谬于古而违于今也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286382_comment'></div>某知难而已，力则不逮，然不敢不勉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_1_1286382_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1191&endYear=1191')">1191年</a>　祭拜诸庙。作品：祭诸庙文。<div id='poem_1286383' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286383' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286383?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭诸庙文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1191年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286383")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286383_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286383'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286383'>政刑予夺，虽曰吏治；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286383_comment'></div>灾祥丰歉，岂伊人为！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286383_comment'></div>思尽此心，庶几昭答！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286383_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1286383_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1191&endYear=1191')">1191年</a>　作文祈晴。作品：祈晴文。<div id='poem_1286384' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286384' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286384?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祈晴文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1191年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286384")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286384_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286384'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286384'>始部使者下属郡祈晴，而蕲自十三日大雨之后，膏润相接，谷之未刈者殆欲芽矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286384_comment'></div>将以十九日有谒祠下，执事宿戒，阴云忽开，象纬清明，原隰酣丽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286384_comment'></div>曝晒稿穗，槩平釜钟，囷仓不空，岁事良毕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286384_comment'></div>夫敏于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1286384", 1286384, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>赴急</span>者神之德，怨于失时者民之情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286384_comment'></div>待请而从，人道所尚；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286384_comment'></div>先祷而应，吏惧不堪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286384_comment'></div>益求其衷，以称嘉贶。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1286384_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1191&endYear=1191')">1191年</a>　作文祈雪。作品：祈雪文。<div id='poem_1286385' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286385' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286385?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祈雪文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1191年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286385")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286385_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286385'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286385'>淳、绍之交，大雪<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1286385", 1286385, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>烂漫</span>，平地累尺，而人以过寒为患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286385_comment'></div>今冬温暖已甚，褚有不穿之裘，傩腊将至而近郊未见白焉，民又以疫疠告矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286385_comment'></div>揆血气之和，以求时令之正，此神之休而吏之责也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286385_comment'></div>翕合冻凝，飘舞积聚，在瞬息之间尔，敢再拜以蕲。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1286385_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1191&endYear=1191')">1191年</a>　作文谢雪。作品：谢雪文。<div id='poem_1286386' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286386' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286386?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢雪文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1191年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286386")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286386_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286386'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286386'>当庚寅之上谒，粲晴光其朝晰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286386_comment'></div>步堂皇以屡瞻，渐重云之晡起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286386_comment'></div>霰已下兮还止，阴已交而似霁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286386_comment'></div>越庚寅之三日，缤终日而并萃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286386_comment'></div>高嵯峨兮特映，远苍茫兮平施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286386_comment'></div>抽寒疾之关钥，洗麦苗之昏秽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286386_comment'></div>遍国人而相语，何肸蚃兮斯异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286386_comment'></div>事有时而适合，物或疑于偶值。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286386_comment'></div>惟应节而不滥，尤神灵之可贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286386_comment'></div>念欲报之靡足，写以词而未既。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286386_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1286386_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1191&endYear=1191')">1191年</a>　为翰林医痊王克明撰墓志铭。作品：翰林医痊王君墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（人名参看《水心集》卷十三该文。）</span><div id='poem_1286183' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286183' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286183?labeling=true' target='_blank'>翰林医痊王君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1191年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286183")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286183_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286183'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286183'>王君，绍兴、乾道间名医，法应得铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286183_comment'></div>初，君之子大受以铭示余，宁武军承宣使张抡之文也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286183_comment'></div>大受言：「先求于知枢密院黄公洽，公谢曰：『张侯文高』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286183_comment'></div>卒使铭之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286183_comment'></div>公简固在尔」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286183_comment'></div>余嘉黄公能逊，又极爱张笔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286183_comment'></div>大受拜曰：「愿改石，以属君」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286183_comment'></div>余骇弗敢答而罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286183_comment'></div>然自是大受见辄有请，辄弗敢答。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286183_comment'></div>上即位之元年，余参议于荆，距读铭之岁八年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286183_comment'></div>荆去吴郡四千里，友朋之问，累月不至，大受数寄余书，必言改铭事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286183_comment'></div>又曰：「吾弟素强无病，一夕中寒死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286183_comment'></div>人生危脆难保，而亡父未铭，八年之期，宁屡合耶」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286183_comment'></div>余重恻然悲之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286183_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286183_comment'></div>舍贵而用贱，置巧而命拙，大受岂有利于其间哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286183_comment'></div>君讳克明，字彦昭，饶州乐平人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286183_comment'></div>生乏乳，以粥饵活，遂得脾胃疾，长益甚，医以为不可治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286183_comment'></div>君怒，因自读《难经》、《素问》，用意处药，宿病尽瘳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286183_comment'></div>始以其术行游江淮，入苏、湖，最后家乌镇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286183_comment'></div>常数百千里赴人之急，贤卿大夫皆自屈与游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286183_comment'></div>针灸尤精；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286183_comment'></div>诊脉有难知者，必沈思得其要，然后与药，则无不验矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286183_comment'></div>未尝多用药，病虽数證，亦才下一药，曰：「此病之本也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286183_comment'></div>本除而馀病去矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286183_comment'></div>亦有不与药者，要以某日当自愈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286183_comment'></div>有以为非药之过者，过在某事，当随其事以治之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286183_comment'></div>凡此类医自好者之所操，惟君能必雠其言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286183_comment'></div>夫书医以多愈疾为奇，而君本豪伟，通古今，喜气节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286183_comment'></div>大受读书能文，又以其先大家，多衣冠显人，特君发愤于庸医为之耳，颇微其事，故今所记者仅数事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286183_comment'></div>至其治疗之曲折，又不能详，为可惜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286183_comment'></div>魏安行妻风痿，十年不起床，君施针而步履复初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286183_comment'></div>庐守王安道中风，噤不语旬日，他医莫知为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286183_comment'></div>君曰：「此非汤剂之所及也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286183_comment'></div>令炽炭烧地洒药，舆安道其上，药气熏蒸，须臾而苏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286183_comment'></div>虏使黑鹿谷过姑苏馆，病伤寒垂死，部使者请君治之，二日愈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286183_comment'></div>后从徐度聘虏，黑鹿谷适为先排使，待君亲甚，君莫测也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286183_comment'></div>至赵州，马逸，伤足，坠石桥下，谷奏其主，以己之车乘之，北方由是知君名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286183_comment'></div>从张子盖救海州战士大疫，全活几万人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286183_comment'></div>子盖上其功，君曰：「吾非有战功也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286183_comment'></div>辞不受，王炎宣抚四川，辟君，君意有不乐，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1286183", 1286183, "Clauses/124/Comments/0")'>谒疾</span>竟去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1286183_comment'></div>炎怒，劾君避事，坐贬秩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1286183_comment'></div>又从吕正己使虏，虏接伴忽被危疾，服君药有间，厚为谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1286183_comment'></div>君不肯，以状还国信所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1286183_comment'></div>丹阳苏著行金告君疾，君始纳之，疾愈，卒归其金。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1286183_comment'></div>然则不专用是易衣食明矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1286183_comment'></div>始，君以试中礼部，累其官至额内翰林医痊，赐金紫，赠父实为秉义郎，母张氏，封太孺人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1286183_comment'></div>淳熙五年六月卒，年六十七。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1286183_comment'></div>其明年五月，夫人闻人氏亦卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1286183_comment'></div>闻人，秀州嘉兴人，有干局，事姑甚孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1286183_comment'></div>君好侠尚义，不问有无，而能治生教子，缮园池屋宅以为富者，闻人力也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1286183_comment'></div>是年八月壬寅，子大中、大受、大春、大雅、大异，合葬君与闻人于湖州乌程县永新乡义安里平山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1286183_comment'></div>女嫁孔闻诗，幼未行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1286183_comment'></div>孙男二，女二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1286183_comment'></div>余既次君事而未铭也，绍熙二年，去荆过吴，大受谓余，卜改葬矣，曰某州县某山某年月日下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1286183_comment'></div>大受又曰：「吾愧不知父之学，近从人得一事焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1286183_comment'></div>胡秉彝之配，病内秘，腹胀痛，号呼宛转旬馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1286183_comment'></div>父往视之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1286183_comment'></div>其家饭亲，客既集，父谓胡曰：『吾使恭人疾愈而与于会，可乎』？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1286183_comment'></div>以半硫圆碾生姜，调乳香下之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1286183_comment'></div>俄起，对客如平常」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1286183_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_61_1286183'>古之圣智，先知疾苦；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1286183_comment'></div>草木杂使，阴阳参御；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1286183_comment'></div>物无非药，待我而愈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1286183_comment'></div>其言尚存，有方与数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1286183_comment'></div>后之用者，视薪失斧；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1286183_comment'></div>持平不效，出奇则误。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1286183_comment'></div>天疢王君，因书自悟；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1286183_comment'></div>以身为节，意成尺度；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1286183_comment'></div>遇病必除，莫名其故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1286183_comment'></div>岂此独能，彼有弗虑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1286183_comment'></div>愤伤末流，以疏掩嫭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1286183_comment'></div>余友戴肖望尝得医于君，每言其切脉用药，非今人之所能预也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1286183_comment'></div>惜余不及见其人，而但铭其墓尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1286183_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_74_1286183'>龙泉叶适撰。</div><div id='poem_sentence_74_1286183_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1191&endYear=1191')">1191年</a>　为东阳郭良臣撰墓志铭。作品：郭府君墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286184' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286184' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286184?labeling=true' target='_blank'>郭府君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1191年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286184")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286184_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286184'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286184'>绍熙二年八月十日，东阳郭江改葬父于孝顺乡罗青阡，来言曰：「吾父兄殆不知君，君宜知吾父兄，葬，得君铭乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286184_comment'></div>君姓郭氏，讳良臣，字德邻，婺州东阳人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286184_comment'></div>自曾祖感、祖招、父知常富其里中，至君兄弟皆士人，犹故不得宦达，然赀分而能不衰，故郭氏日大由君起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286184_comment'></div>昔周、张、二程考古圣贤微义，达于人心，以求学术之要，世以其非笺传旧本，有信有不信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286184_comment'></div>百年之间，更盛衰者再三焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286184_comment'></div>乾道五六年，始复大振。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286184_comment'></div>讲说者被闽、浙，蔽江、湖，士争出山谷，弃家巷，赁馆贷食，庶几闻之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286184_comment'></div>君二子澄、江，幼有异质，君怜其弱，不得远去，为作好屋甘饭，招里中或他郡年与澄相长少者同处，聘请知其说者为之师，又尝使澄出从大师，归而与其师学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286184_comment'></div>澄静而敏，所论质皆能记忆，所举发皆能推见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286184_comment'></div>所得非一师，为之师者多自以为不及也，澄犹执<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1286184", 1286184, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>弟子</span>礼恭甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286184_comment'></div>与澄同学者，虽得科第去，犹故咨澄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286184_comment'></div>于是君昼夜劳苦治生，尽以其馀付澄，为四方师友费。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286184_comment'></div>后数年，而君年五十二以卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286184_comment'></div>澄甫免君丧，亦死，死时年三十耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286184_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286184_comment'></div>君不获尽寿以厚澄，澄夭于年而不极其学，斯命也，志则不可掩矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286184_comment'></div>其后一二大师皆相继死，欲学者不知所统壹，世又或以为讳，昔之群萃者散亡，后生求所向者莫与之适，此余自涉事至今目所睹也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286184_comment'></div>学实而已，实善其身，实仪其家，移以事君，实致其义，古今共之，不可改也，岂私好者能慕之，私恶者能讳之哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286184_comment'></div>谓其兴隆，有所歆艳，谓其衰坏，有所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1286184", 1286184, "Clauses/80/Comments/0")'>简薄</span>，盖皆过矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286184_comment'></div>余伤学术之变，感君与澄之志，故因江之请而叙之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286184_comment'></div>问江旧学之庐在乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286184_comment'></div>曰：「池深而木寒」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286184_comment'></div>「食于学之田」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286184_comment'></div>曰：「岁别其租以待」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286184_comment'></div>察江之言，皆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1286184", 1286184, "Clauses/92/Comments/0")'>饱练世故</span>而不回挠，是足以继其父兄矣，则君之所恃以不朽者，何独铭也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286184_comment'></div>君娶曹氏，又娶杨氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286184_comment'></div>五子，长即澄也，次江、沔，早卒；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286184_comment'></div>汉，恢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286184_comment'></div>女嫁朝散大夫、湖南运判张商卿，承议郎、淮西江东总领司干办公事何庶，修职郎、建康府溧水县主簿魏挺，修职郎王驎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286184_comment'></div>孙男八人，女二人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286184_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_1286184'>学术之变，重事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286184_comment'></div>系于君墓，使后来者有考焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286184_comment'></div>故君之他善众矣，皆略弗著。</div><div id='poem_sentence_32_1286184_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1191&endYear=1191')">1191年</a>　为郭良显撰墓志铭。作品：郭处士墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286185' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286185' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286185?labeling=true' target='_blank'>郭处士墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1191年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286185")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286185_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286185'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286185'>君姓郭氏，讳良显，字德扬，婺州东阳人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286185_comment'></div>曾祖感，祖招，父知常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286185_comment'></div>郭氏之著于东阳久矣，自浙以东，数大家者先郭氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286185_comment'></div>郭氏未有爵位，财不逾人，而得为大家，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286185_comment'></div>东阳旧俗，以气力为雄，带刀束棍，裹行道上，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1286185", 1286185, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>失意</span>辄相<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1286185", 1286185, "Clauses/18/Comments/1")'>雠杀</span>；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286185_comment'></div>庭讼，视胜者歌舞贺之尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286185_comment'></div>郭氏美其家，用儒学，又知世所尊贵学之上者，其有原本善士，千里外礼致，托以子弟，不专请乡州先生也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286185_comment'></div>嫁女取一时名人，饰<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1286185", 1286185, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>遣具</span>，从夫子所向，不以族姓当对分毫拣择为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1286185", 1286185, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>近昵</span>恩爱也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286185_comment'></div>人急难求假，必随其力以应，未尝<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1286185", 1286185, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>控避</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286185_comment'></div>游士过其家，意无不自满去，而得路绝不复通；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286185_comment'></div>虽其婿与客多贵，亦弗轻以事委也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286185_comment'></div>其敬贤知义有耻，拔为高明，不见卑陋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286185_comment'></div>自君三世至君兄弟十馀人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286185_comment'></div>各有门户，略皆如此，宜其虽不富未仕，而望最著于浙东，有以也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286185_comment'></div>君尤笃厚质直，学知古事，陈说世变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286185_comment'></div>持家大约遵用父祖绳墨，又自力其细小者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286185_comment'></div>亲有孤女不能行，为择所归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286185_comment'></div>饿者与食，病者与药，死者棺敛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286185_comment'></div>闾里纤悉，一本惠利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286185_comment'></div>其卒，小人自以失所依倚，多痛惜之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286185_comment'></div>盖君于为善，离其性未远，心力所至，不但驰走于人所知者而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286185_comment'></div>君绍熙元年年五十四死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286185_comment'></div>二年九月十五日，葬高塘周寅坞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286185_comment'></div>娶叶氏，先卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286185_comment'></div>三子，湜，洵，溪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286185_comment'></div>女嫁修职郎、前太平州教授叶挺，从事郎、前赣州司户孙礿，文林郎、湖州乌程县丞叶知几，迪功郎、新严州分水县尉史弥念。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286185_comment'></div>孙男六人，女二人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286185_comment'></div>将葬，溪以校书郎石君应之书来请铭曰：「愿无没其所长」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286185_comment'></div>因具载郭氏事云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286185_comment'></div>今溪之群从，又数十人矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286185_comment'></div>其相先以义，相竞以善，流风成而意好熟，孝慈友悌之行内合，博闻<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1286185", 1286185, "Clauses/93/Comments/0")'>恂达</span>之誉外昭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286185_comment'></div>然则郭氏之大未已也，岂必合门而处，同釜而食，然后为善也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286185_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_32_1286185'>大能用其家之律，细能践其身之仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286185_comment'></div>允也郭君，弗疚于闻。</div><div id='poem_sentence_33_1286185_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1191&endYear=1191')">1191年</a>　为友人俞烈之母张氏撰墓志铭。作品：安人张氏墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286186' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286186' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286186?labeling=true' target='_blank'>安人张氏墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1191年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286186")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286186_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286186'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286186'>余在太学，与国子博士俞君烈为僚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286186_comment'></div>博士资厚而文，发和而刚，余慕而交之久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286186_comment'></div>他日，博士以书抵余，视其缄题有异于常，读之云云，则以母张夫人之状来，曰：「愿有铭」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286186_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286186_comment'></div>吾知博士之贤，而不知夫人教之至是夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286186_comment'></div>博士不自言，几没夫人之美，是吾过已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286186_comment'></div>既发吊使且哭，则与为铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286186_comment'></div>夫人，临安人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286186_comment'></div>曾祖景初，祖钺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286186_comment'></div>父浃，与博士之父承事郎宽居同县，为姻家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286186_comment'></div>博士大父以儒术起，律家齐整，乡里敬重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286186_comment'></div>夫人，张氏爱女也，父母卜所宜归，以女承事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286186_comment'></div>夫人识过于材，习见舅氏专以学行成名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286186_comment'></div>承事业已知家事，两叔尚毁齿未毕，夫人则<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1286186", 1286186, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>旦旦</span>洗面束发<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1286186", 1286186, "Clauses/38/Comments/1")'>衿绅</span>之，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1286186", 1286186, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>趣使</span>向学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286186_comment'></div>博士生而能言，夫人自教诵《蒙求》、《孝经》，昼出从先生，夜归就膏火，亲课其勤惰，率鸡鸣乃得睡，既<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1286186", 1286186, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>长立</span>犹然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286186_comment'></div>博士后试礼部，为天下第一，有爵于朝，封夫人至安人，俞氏之门光显矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286186_comment'></div>以状考之，夫人能顺舅之严，敬姑之亲，以义丰家，合其孝慈，所谓妇人之常德也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286186_comment'></div>独于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1286186", 1286186, "Clauses/58/Comments/0")'>贵学</span>若嗜欲，终笃而子，为时闻人，则识过于材，所谓非妇人之常者，兹其验欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286186_comment'></div>博士尝宦，不得意，且外补，惧为夫人忧；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286186_comment'></div>夫人时已病，手足不良，耳目聪明，谓博士曰：「吾所以望汝，何必今日」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286186_comment'></div>博士因请以崇道观禄归养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286186_comment'></div>嗟乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286186_comment'></div>夫人之教博士，岂<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1286186", 1286186, "Clauses/77/Comments/0")'>科第</span>而已，盖又有名节之训焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286186_comment'></div>夫人绍熙二年九月十五卒，年七十五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286186_comment'></div>生三子：璨，将仕郎，先卒；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286186_comment'></div>次博士，承务郎，主管台州崇道观；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286186_comment'></div>次珙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286186_comment'></div>女适将仕郎王庭实、高健，进士戴思恭、王伯容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286186_comment'></div>十二月二十二日，葬下洪山，从其舅焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286186_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_1286186'>孰不有子，荷其荣禄？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286186_comment'></div>夫人之荷，夫人之告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286186_comment'></div>诏彼来者，自作自成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286186_comment'></div>怠实望虚，其尚斯铭。</div><div id='poem_sentence_32_1286186_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1192&endYear=1192')">1192年</a>　任淮西（淮南西路）提举兼提刑，转盐铁冶司公事，有谢表。作品：除淮西提举谢表。<div id='poem_1285833' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1285833' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1285833?labeling=true' target='_blank'>除淮西提举谢表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1192年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1285833")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1285833_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1285833'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1285833'>素抱迂愚，自投闲散。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1285833_comment'></div>责之御守，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1285833", 1285833, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>试事</span>浅而未酬；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1285833_comment'></div>就俾按行，忝命优而难称<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1285833_comment'></div>伏以久令一使，兼总三台。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1285833_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1285833", 1285833, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>属昔</span>荒残，在权宜而当省；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1285833_comment'></div>于今垦辟，盖吏道之滋繁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1285833_comment'></div>重以铁冶之司，旁制江湖之远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1285833_comment'></div>适<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1285833", 1285833, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>币泉</span>淆杂之过，幸朝廷收换之恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1285833_comment'></div>而钱之官私，尚难辨其真伪；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1285833_comment'></div>铸有新旧，致徒分于爱憎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1285833_comment'></div>人心<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1285833", 1285833, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>交疑</span>，物货浸少，兹为大虑，所贵周防。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1285833_comment'></div>譬之琴瑟既解而更张，然胶柱之讥犹在；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1285833_comment'></div>如彼马牛不安于乘服，则骇舆之患当思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1285833_comment'></div>臣暂领蕲阳，未彰善效；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1285833_comment'></div>弗谙淮土，早动<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1285833", 1285833, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>乡情</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1285833_comment'></div>敢以章句之诸生，辄叨金谷之剧选！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1285833_comment'></div>此盖恭遇皇帝陛下，顺时除弊，因事讨论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1285833_comment'></div>不惜厚费，以解诖误之穷愁；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1285833_comment'></div>不变本谋，以消<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1285833", 1285833, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>奸非</span>之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1285833", 1285833, "Clauses/40/Comments/1")'>阶祸</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1285833_comment'></div>臣祗承德意，遵用宽慈，察部之条，视身为律。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1285833_comment'></div>倘刑罚可损而事以厎定，则威灵所被而民用遹宁。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1285833_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1192&endYear=1192')">1192年</a>　上状讨论淮西铁钱事。作品：淮西论铁钱五事状。<div id='poem_1285831' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1285831' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1285831?labeling=true' target='_blank'>淮西论铁钱五事状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1192年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1285831")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1285831_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1285831'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1285831'>臣窃见近岁私铸铁钱散漫江淮，公私受弊，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1285831", 1285831, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>人情</span>摇动，其事多端，幸蒙朝廷不惜厚费，特与收换，始得宁帖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1285831_comment'></div>臣昨在蕲州目见利害，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1285831", 1285831, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>询采</span>吏民，颇为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1285831", 1285831, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>亲切</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1285831_comment'></div>今暂领兼司，所当随时补缉，务使淮人迄臻安静，谨具奏闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1285831_comment'></div>其事有五：一曰开民间行使之路，二曰责州县关防之要，三曰审朝廷<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1285831", 1285831, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>称提</span>之政，四曰谨诸监铸造之法，五曰详冶司废置之宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1285831_comment'></div>何谓开民间行使之路？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1285831_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1285831", 1285831, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>始初</span>铁钱不分官私，民间不辨好恶，得钱便使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1285831_comment'></div>自禁私钱，百姓惩创，卖买<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1285831", 1285831, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>交关</span>，文文拣择。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1285831_comment'></div>或将官钱指为私钱，不肯收受；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1285831_comment'></div>或只要一色样钱，谓如舒、蕲人各只使本监字号钱之类；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1285831_comment'></div>或只要新铸官钱，且免拣择，民旅持钱买物，一贯之中，常退出三四百，至以米谷他物自相酬准。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1285831_comment'></div>城市尚可，村落尤甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1285831_comment'></div>缘此行用艰难，物货稀少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1285831_comment'></div>朝廷禁断私钱，本要流通官钱，若官钱方更疑惑，岂得稳便！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1285831_comment'></div>臣近以乾道、同安、蕲春、大冶、宿松、汉阳、定城新旧诸样官钱，钉板印榜，晓谕民间，令其从便行使，亦立私钱样，令拣选不用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1285831_comment'></div>令各州签厅官委诸县钉样于都保，又别差官亲至村落委曲<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1285831", 1285831, "Clauses/53/Comments/0")'>劝喻</span>，欲其耳目接熟，用钱不疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1285831_comment'></div>须待官钱流通，物价复旧，方见禁断私钱之利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1285831_comment'></div>在臣本路，已逐一如此施行，其淮东、湖北，臣目所不见，未知如何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1285831_comment'></div>近因还司过蕲口镇，镇民诣臣称：扬、真、泰州，凡绍熙元年二年蕲春监所铸钱，皆嫌粗恶，拣退不使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1285831_comment'></div>臣寻令拆辩拣择，其字文模糊尤甚，十居二三，见已<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1285831", 1285831, "Clauses/73/Comments/0")'>关会</span>诸处别议措置。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1285831_comment'></div>然则拣择用钱，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1285831", 1285831, "Clauses/75/Comments/0")'>人情</span>不甚相远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1285831_comment'></div>兼既有新旧诸钱，并私钱色样不一，曾经拣换，钱文牴牾，若不于行使地分明加告报，终恐<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1285831", 1285831, "Clauses/81/Comments/0")'>向后</span>用者疑惑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1285831_comment'></div>臣不敢作冶司发往两路州郡，欲乞自朝廷降样行下，永远照使，要令村落僻远认识不疑，民旅交易流通无碍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1285831_comment'></div>如此，则既扰之精神可以收回，人亦知收换之实利矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1285831_comment'></div>何谓责州县关防之要？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1285831_comment'></div>两路先后立限收换私钱，淮东多而淮西少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1285831_comment'></div>虽缘禁有迟速之故，然积累数年，委有许多私钱别无归著，其当与收换则一尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1285831_comment'></div>今已于限内申报尽绝，而旧色私钱，尚颇散在民间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1285831_comment'></div>或限内赍赴不及，出限不可投换；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1285831_comment'></div>或贯陌少可，无力投换；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1285831_comment'></div>或富人收藏，意图他时禁弛，复得行用；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1285831_comment'></div>既各尽绝，难恤其馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1285831_comment'></div>然市钱日用之中，常有夹带，所幸民间识认，择出不要。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1285831_comment'></div>其新铸私钱，间有三两文到市上者，奸民窥伺，岂肯遽已！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1285831_comment'></div>自禁戢以来，号令纷纷，争为严峻，或令五家结甲，或令旬申有无私铸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1285831_comment'></div>巡尉以捕捉入衔败获治经由透漏，沿流常要巡绰，津渡皆须搜逻，吏人甘伏决配，官员当俟朝典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1285831_comment'></div>臣检照旧事及不住承准申明，虽皆已遵守觉察，然终未得关防之要。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1285831_comment'></div>必行则诬告罗织，狱讼繁兴；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1285831_comment'></div>泛行则便同文具，奸宄仍在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1285831_comment'></div>臣近令各州签厅官，责属内厢巡地分都保等处，专一禁止行使私钱之家，旬具委无行使私钱结罪，类申本司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1285831_comment'></div>只此一令，不必繁多，但要行之坚久，私钱无用，私铸自息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1285831_comment'></div>此虽冶司职事，亦但可施之本路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1285831_comment'></div>欲乞朝廷指挥，于行使铁钱州郡，除照官钱色样从便流通行使外，并要本州月具更无行使私钱文状结罪申尚书省。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1285831_comment'></div>盖欲必无私铸，其说难信；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1285831_comment'></div>欲必不使私钱，其事易遵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1285831_comment'></div>况经收换，朝廷为民之意已足；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1285831_comment'></div>如有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_45_1285831", 1285831, "Clauses/156/Comments/0")'>违戾</span>，惩治大吏一人，自然<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_45_1285831", 1285831, "Clauses/158/Comments/0")'>震耸</span>用命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1285831_comment'></div>如此，则令简而可行，实而可久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1285831_comment'></div>何谓审朝廷<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_47_1285831", 1285831, "Clauses/162/Comments/0")'>称提</span>之政？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1285831_comment'></div>始作铁钱，非要添此一项泉币，盖专以绝铜钱渗漏之患尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1285831_comment'></div>铜钱过江北、既有铁钱以易之矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1285831_comment'></div>铁钱过江南，亦必有铜钱易之可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1285831_comment'></div>今为铜钱地而不为铁钱地，事不均平，岂行法以来偶未之思欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1285831_comment'></div>故江北自行铁钱之后，金银<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_52_1285831", 1285831, "Clauses/173/Comments/0")'>官会</span>，无不高贵，富商大贾，财本隔碍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1285831_comment'></div>而淮旁之民，只是往来两岸洲夹之内，铜铁异用，风波滞留，便已盘费<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_53_1285831", 1285831, "Clauses/181/Comments/0")'>消折</span>，安居虽久，仍旧<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_53_1285831", 1285831, "Clauses/183/Comments/0")'>凋疏</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1285831_comment'></div>淮人叹息，以为朝廷缘铜钱之故，致令江北不得自在，空怀抑郁，无与上闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1285831_comment'></div>近户部建明，权作两淮交子百万，通行沿江州郡，仍许入纳，淮人若骤得此数行用，稍广目前利益。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1285831_comment'></div>但臣采其土俗之论，以为月日稍久，流转不行，必有减落百陌之忧，将为店铺停塌之利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1285831_comment'></div>若要<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_57_1285831", 1285831, "Clauses/200/Comments/0")'>称提</span>得所，义理均平，当使铁钱之过江南，亦如铜钱之过江北，皆有兑换之处，两无废弃之虞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1285831_comment'></div>于江南沿江州郡，以铜钱<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_58_1285831", 1285831, "Clauses/207/Comments/0")'>会子</span>中半，或一分铜钱，二分<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_58_1285831", 1285831, "Clauses/209/Comments/0")'>会子</span>，直行兑换铁钱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1285831_comment'></div>计其所收，或科拨付总领所，或仍换铜钱，则可以减诸监岁铸之额。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1285831_comment'></div>或付两淮和籴、桩积、马料、修城，则更不支降交会，亦于朝廷初无所失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1285831_comment'></div>淮人知铁钱过江有兑换之处，自加贵重，商旅之在淮南者，亦不敢轻贱铁钱，则金银<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_61_1285831", 1285831, "Clauses/222/Comments/0")'>官会</span>及其他物货，自当低小。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1285831_comment'></div>如此<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_62_1285831", 1285831, "Clauses/224/Comments/0")'>称提</span>，虽行铁钱，可以经久无弊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1285831_comment'></div>若恐铁钱过江，兑换者多，自合量宜撙节，但要存此<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_63_1285831", 1285831, "Clauses/230/Comments/0")'>发泄</span>一路而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1285831_comment'></div>何谓谨诸监铸造之法？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1285831_comment'></div>臣窃详与监以来所铸铁钱，其轻重薄厚，精粗大小，略为相等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1285831_comment'></div>就中淳熙七八九年中间，蕲春监所铸，字画精细，轮郭坚明，比于诸钱，又为精好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1285831_comment'></div>十五、六年以至绍熙元、二，则顿成粗恶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1285831_comment'></div>习久生弊，势亦宜然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1285831_comment'></div>昨铁冶司急欲取胜盗铸者，遂翻新样，四季别为字文，旧重四斤十二两，今增为五斤八两，新钱比旧，大几一轮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1285831_comment'></div>臣窃以钱文宜一，轻重大小宜均，则<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_70_1285831", 1285831, "Clauses/255/Comments/0")'>民听</span>不疑，行用不惑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1285831_comment'></div>季别一样，自铸工不能记忆，民间何由辨认！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1285831_comment'></div>而又新钱特大，形迹旧钱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1285831_comment'></div>常人之情，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_73_1285831", 1285831, "Clauses/263/Comments/0")'>喜新厌旧</span>，所以有只要新钱之说，岂可旧钱遂成无用！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1285831_comment'></div>又持大者，自为贯辨，则可行使，分开互用，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_74_1285831", 1285831, "Clauses/270/Comments/0")'>串联</span>不合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1285831_comment'></div>臣细视之，新钱刻画粗大，其实不如旧钱，用铁虽多，钱体不重，但加比验，自可分明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1285831_comment'></div>兼照自淳熙七年至绍熙二年上半年，同、春两监通铸过四百馀万贯，七年之前及他监所铸，又未有数目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1285831_comment'></div>前公私行用，官中自应保护旧钱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1285831_comment'></div>其新钱但当钤束监匠，尽工铸造，深鉴末年之弊，必如初铸之精而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1285831_comment'></div>若徒翻样增铁以自别异，深所未可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1285831_comment'></div>故湖广总所近有申请，以新旧官钱不同，未敢通用，正谓此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1285831_comment'></div>臣已行下诸监，只以蕲春监淳熙七、八、九年钱样为准，务令精好，更不添两数及四季翻样，欲乞更赐圣裁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1285831_comment'></div>庶几<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_82_1285831", 1285831, "Clauses/299/Comments/0")'>民听</span>不疑，新旧一等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1285831_comment'></div>何谓详冶司废置之宜？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1285831_comment'></div>臣窃以臣僚初议，专置铁冶一司，是时私铸炽盛，铁钱流入浙西，内地骇愕，专官讲求，诚合权道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1285831_comment'></div>及其方略禁奸，摧遏锋锐，虽伤猛骤，亦中事机。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1285831_comment'></div>今观冶司陈请三十馀事，皆已施行矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1285831_comment'></div>然终是论建太广，行移束湿，至使诸司乖戾，州郡掣肘，人心惊疑，异论蜂起；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1285831_comment'></div>自有各路监司<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_88_1285831", 1285831, "Clauses/321/Comments/0")'>任责</span>指挥，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_88_1285831", 1285831, "Clauses/322/Comments/0")'>人情</span>少安，方敢向前措置，此臣所亲见也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1285831_comment'></div>事变之来，动以静胜不在张皇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1285831_comment'></div>其后冶司亦自畏缩，虽已得旨者，多不果用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1285831_comment'></div>且如舒、蕲两监，鼓铸之政，旧责守臣，其增造减工，糙恶生弊，走弄<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_91_1285831", 1285831, "Clauses/335/Comments/0")'>文历</span>，支用自由，当职官吏，固宜黜罚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1285831_comment'></div>为冶司者，但当督察稽考，总其大柄而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1285831_comment'></div>取而自铸，遂致怨咨，以为破坏两州，事起仓猝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1285831_comment'></div>至于碎置干官捡踏，创造廨宇营房，列属徒多，控制州郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1285831_comment'></div>况铁炭中卖，处处增足，非比铜坑，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_95_1285831", 1285831, "Clauses/353/Comments/0")'>苗脉</span>须要寻求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1285831_comment'></div>坐食端闲，冗长无用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1285831_comment'></div>以臣所见，私钱既蒙朝廷收换，若民间照样行使，则官钱通流；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1285831_comment'></div>州郡严禁夹带，则私铸止绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1285831_comment'></div>铸造并遵旧法，而新旧钱不疑；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1285831_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_100_1285831", 1285831, "Clauses/364/Comments/0")'>称提</span>出于均平，而江南、北如一；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1285831_comment'></div>逐路自有监司<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_101_1285831", 1285831, "Clauses/366/Comments/0")'>任责</span>，则提点江淮、湖北，空令取会迂回。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1285831_comment'></div>更乞圣慈与宰执商量，数月之间，合与未合结局，协于权制，不为赘疣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1285831_comment'></div>塞希恩侥倖之门，杜贪功纷乱之意，静治不扰，淮人自安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1285831_comment'></div>臣谬蒙恩选委，所有愚虑，不敢不言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1285831_comment'></div>干冒天威，臣无任<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_105_1285831", 1285831, "Clauses/382/Comments/0")'>陨越</span>俟命之至！</div><div id='poem_sentence_105_1285831_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1192&endYear=1192')">1192年1月1日</a>　登烟霏楼有诗。作品：除夜元日连登烟霏楼二首。<div id='poem_80180' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_80180' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/80180?labeling=true' target='_blank'>除夜元日连登烟霏楼二首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1192年1月1日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_80180")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_80180_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_80180'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_80180'>岩峦宽去灵虬寺，水竹低横处士园。<div id='poem_sentence_0_80180_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_80180'>此是蕲州无比好，亦如浙下好山川。<div id='poem_sentence_1_80180_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_80180'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_80180_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_79898' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_79898' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/79898?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1192年1月1日）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_79898_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_79898'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_79898'>摧荷秃柳不胜春，脉脉荒堤数过人。<div id='poem_sentence_0_79898_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_79898'>我若有材能速化，应将地巧答天真。<div id='poem_sentence_1_79898_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_79898'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_79898_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1192&endYear=1192')">1192年1月4日</a>　作烟霏楼记。作品：烟霏楼记。<span class='inlineComment2'>（作品日期见《水心集》卷九该文落款。）</span><div id='poem_1286108' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286108' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286108?labeling=true' target='_blank'>烟霏楼记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1192年1月4日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286108")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286108_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286108'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286108'>烟霏楼者，本西楼也，太守仲并更名之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286108_comment'></div>余自湖口渡江，沿淮北上至王潼洲，烧苇夜行，投宿民舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286108_comment'></div>迟明，道上车夫与牙兵相詈击，慰谢之，然后肯去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286108_comment'></div>践小杨湖，一步数陷，所过空堤绝岸，败芦<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1286108", 1286108, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>衰莽</span>而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286108_comment'></div>入濯港，乃见黄梅诸峰雄秀可喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286108_comment'></div>而百馀里之间，碎坡丛岫，靡迤连接，浅泉细石，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1286108", 1286108, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>经络</span>田畔，则蕲之土无不辟而居者相望矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286108_comment'></div>然而州无城堞，市无廛肆，屋无楼观，佳卉良木不殖，公私一切<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1286108", 1286108, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>简陋</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286108_comment'></div>四方之集徙者，以欺诞苟且为生，促具衣食则止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286108_comment'></div>其于绝埃烦，近清凉，理榛荒，致茂好，居高览远，以遂其生之乐，非惟不能，亦未之知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286108_comment'></div>故郡之涵晖、见山与超然观之废址，不散则偪，景蔽而意昏，皆不足以处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286108_comment'></div>烟霏者，直通判厅之西。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286108_comment'></div>其下中洲隐士李之翰所居，稍有水竹花石之胜，四旁庐宅，以宽且远，不见甚陋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286108_comment'></div>鸥鹭之羽，鸡犬之声，飞走喧寂，各会其性。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286108_comment'></div>林樊间错，晻霭西去，对灵虬、马下等山，拱揖宾伏，阴晴旦莫，天地之气迭为降升，登之者亦如在吴、越绮丽之乡，湖、湘清幽之滨，使吟者忘句而饮者忘酒也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286108_comment'></div>盖一州之观，无以过此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286108_comment'></div>夫蕲，山泽之聚，淮之名城也，岂其天趣不足哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286108_comment'></div>特地力有未尽尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286108_comment'></div>以余之不肖，忝长吏于是，不能疏涤其陋以安利之，徒品择其美以自纵也，岂古人所谓富而教之者乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286108_comment'></div>顾今之吏有不可以此责者，故记其说以遗通判事朱君俣，刻之楼上，使蕲之人能尽其性之德以为材，尽其地之力以为利，生殖遂长而英发，器用坚实而久成，如韩之乐，公刘之芮鞠，淇澳之君子，亦欲其知自兹游者始也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286108_comment'></div>绍熙三年正月四日。</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1286108_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: target='_blank'>祭妻母翁安人文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1192年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适",
