class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286325'>外舅后家，门贵身贫，夫人南产，地异材钧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286325_comment'></div>京山四年，远不偕戍，挟两幼女，终永独处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286325_comment'></div>居闲岁深，得官日浅，分甘共少，其乐<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1286325", 1286325, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>衍衍</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286325_comment'></div>内不为丰，外不求多，称力而食，靡廛彼禾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286325_comment'></div>人所弗堪，己则自保，巧拙之间，岂有天道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286325_comment'></div>我生多难，蓬首<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1286325", 1286325, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>木质</span>，夫人爱之，始自锄祓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286325_comment'></div>漂流不已，齿发既衰，如云出山，未雨莫回。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286325_comment'></div>每得安来，忽以凶报，预知将终，曾不我告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286325_comment'></div>所不老寿，噫我之祸，亦有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1286325", 1286325, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>短怀</span>，自今无愬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286325_comment'></div>彼一卮酒，地远味酸，寄哀此文，追琢我肝。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1286325_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1192&endYear=1192')">1192年</a>　春，撰太学同僚蔡镐之父蔡待时墓志铭。作品：忠翊郎致仕蔡君（待时）墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286189' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286189' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286189?labeling=true' target='_blank'>忠翊郎致仕蔡君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1192年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286189")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286189_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286189'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286189'>故封忠翊郎蔡公，讳待时，字元晦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286189_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1286189", 1286189, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>魁磊</span>喜大节，虽不得仕，而家世豪族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286189_comment'></div>高曾在堂，阖门骨肉百馀，君尚未壮，所以事上接下，已能无一不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1286189", 1286189, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>意满</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286189_comment'></div>叔以居屋狭，房户多，议欲分异，君泣请曰：「某幼孤，所赖惟叔尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286189_comment'></div>愿终以事父者事叔」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286189_comment'></div>叔曰：「隘不可容也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286189_comment'></div>君感涕，累月不忍，田货更推逊，迄不立<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1286189", 1286189, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>券要</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286189_comment'></div>治家<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1286189", 1286189, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>刚明</span>，先赋输，平买卖，多与少夺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286189_comment'></div>旬为族人具酒食，毕会，君手洁樽易酎，摘举其行事以劝曰：「某善于某也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286189_comment'></div>由是人有所为，畏君闻之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286189_comment'></div>环白山数里，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1286189", 1286189, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>暴力</span>销耎，负贩有实直，惜乎君之所施者少也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286189_comment'></div>余与君之子镐善，每器镐之为，镐极谢不敢当。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286189_comment'></div>间为余言其详曰：「非我之能，吾父实教之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286189_comment'></div>镐初为武学谕，适有执政与父旧，故乡人以贺父，父笑不应，戒镐曰：『汝谨自守，无以利灭命也』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286189_comment'></div>镐果逐去，则曰：『我固知当如是也』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286189_comment'></div>比复召，而劾镐者方陪国柄，镐将避不赴，父怒曰：『天子呼汝，不以大臣为嫌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286189_comment'></div>汝不誓死报上恩，而暇自嫌耶』！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286189_comment'></div>镐之接伴虏使也，父问曰：『汝行，于国大事何所得』？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286189_comment'></div>镐曰：『筑瓦梁堰，全修楚州城，皆不便，而正使曰非使指，疑未奏』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286189_comment'></div>父曰：『传不云「皇皇者华，臣获五善」乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286189_comment'></div>何得言非使指也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286189_comment'></div>急奏之』！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286189_comment'></div>镐迫面对，五夜漏将上，属藁不能脱，请俟送伴回。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286189_comment'></div>父曰：『使命事关<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1286189", 1286189, "Clauses/83/Comments/1")'>国信</span>，有不如意，国北门可复入耶』？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286189_comment'></div>自秉烛，趣镐写劄子已，乃睡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286189_comment'></div>后镐以上奖谕告，父叹曰：『臣子之于君父，其义一也，所知不隐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286189_comment'></div>我馀年岂待汝禄活，期汝者名节尔』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286189_comment'></div>镐又曰：「子一日尝过我，父自屏窥之，曰：『此可与友也，汝善亲之，吾去汝归耳』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286189_comment'></div>且父怜我既仕，不应治生业，特以岁入之馀，使弟钟为我权之，颇益买曰以私我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286189_comment'></div>故我之所以能安于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1286189", 1286189, "Clauses/108/Comments/0")'>僻愚</span>，不慕势利者，我父既不以养己者责我，而又宽我儿女<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1286189", 1286189, "Clauses/111/Comments/1")'>猥众</span>之忧故也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286189_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286189_comment'></div>镐诚<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1286189", 1286189, "Clauses/113/Comments/0")'>笃厚</span>者，然不曰每事当推美于父，余亦信镐之言不欺，盖其父子皆一时奇士矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286189_comment'></div>君年六十四，以淳熙十六年九月二十一日卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286189_comment'></div>十二月十一日，葬驯雉乡奥山，与弟待用爱友，遗命同穴异圹云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286189_comment'></div>娶于氏，封宜人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286189_comment'></div>子镐，忠翊郎、武学博士；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286189_comment'></div>次钟；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286189_comment'></div>次棨，武学上舍生，早卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286189_comment'></div>六女，得嫁者四，婿郑溥、戴龟朋、朱某、张筹也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286189_comment'></div>始，镐为君求余志其墓，余许之，未及而镐卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286189_comment'></div>余念镐父子并死，大则为国失士也，小则其乡无任也，岂独一家之祸哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1286189_comment'></div>既铭博士，又以铭君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1286189_comment'></div>其辞曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_42_1286189'>观其宗族之际，观其乡党之际，观其父子之际。</div><div id='poem_sentence_42_1286189_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1192&endYear=1192')">1192年</a>　撰蔡镐墓志铭。作品：忠翊郎武学博士蔡君（镐）墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286190' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286190' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286190?labeling=true' target='_blank'>忠翊郎武学博士蔡君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1192年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286190")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286190_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286190'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286190'>君姓蔡氏，讳镐，字正之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286190_comment'></div>初入武学，以信义称，两学生不幸死，辄请君属其后事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286190_comment'></div>试屡入优等，恶逼同试者，以疾避不试，司业高之，上其行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286190_comment'></div>及赐第，上识其名，曰：「此戴几先所荐耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286190_comment'></div>顾宰相：「别与好官」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286190_comment'></div>君无所求，以格授盐城尉，诏特用君，与武学谕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286190_comment'></div>未几，自乞从军，上难之，曰：「三衙岂可以阶级待学官」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286190_comment'></div>不许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286190_comment'></div>君以法裁诸生，诸生多不悦，言事者用为君罪，劾去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286190_comment'></div>枢密院召君<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1286190", 1286190, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>禀议</span>，欲使贺虏正旦，君闻之，故逾期行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286190_comment'></div>差马军行司计议官，虏贺正旦来，遂以君馆伴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286190_comment'></div>当宴紫宸殿，上患腹暴下，将就驿赐之，虏使辞，请俟上有间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286190_comment'></div>故事，馆伴非上旨不过虏使位，上令君<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1286190", 1286190, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>过位</span>谕虏使，虏使固辞，诏改宴为茶酒而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286190_comment'></div>中官甘弁与掌仪谋并免茶酒，复使君<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1286190", 1286190, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>过位</span>，君以非上旨，趣至再三不行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286190_comment'></div>弁怒，谮于上，君请待罪，上意解，卒赐茶酒而罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286190_comment'></div>复为武学谕，迁博士，充接送伴使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286190_comment'></div>时议筑瓦梁堰，浸地三州，方四百里，曰「可为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1286190", 1286190, "Clauses/64/Comments/2")'>边险</span>」，调役烦拿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286190_comment'></div>君归，奏其不便曰：「是弃淮西山外四州与盱眙也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286190_comment'></div>滁河两旁，桑稻满野，家计成，子孙长矣，又可鱼乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286190_comment'></div>且水没楚州，城坍损坼裂，瓮肚低坐，既皆有定处，随宜修补，州郡常事尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286190_comment'></div>今欲尽刬旧土，重筑新城，费直数百万缗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286190_comment'></div>纵陛下不惜钱，使军士刬平复叠，舍一易，造两难，惧有他变」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286190_comment'></div>上悟，为量修城，罢筑堰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286190_comment'></div>君念去亲久，求归甚力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286190_comment'></div>执政惜之，留为贺金国正旦使，丁父忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286190_comment'></div>服丧垂毕，即召命，未至，以疾卒，年四十九。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286190_comment'></div>君性安于善，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1286190", 1286190, "Clauses/102/Comments/0")'>质局</span>方整，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1286190", 1286190, "Clauses/103/Comments/0")'>刚塞</span>重厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286190_comment'></div>畏利欲如<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1286190", 1286190, "Clauses/104/Comments/0")'>痛切</span>，义理所集，趋前就之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286190_comment'></div>自事君父，从<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1286190", 1286190, "Clauses/108/Comments/0")'>友执</span>，待妻子，驭下使人，临财当事，余默考之，无一不合，使之治民，必为仁牧；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286190_comment'></div>使之治军，必为良将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286190_comment'></div>君业堕武举，用之有限，若使为士大夫，亦莫量其所至也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286190_comment'></div>寿皇圣帝进天下以知兵，故尤重武，亲教骑射，程其力用，武士有一长，必演而出之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286190_comment'></div>有司探上意，故君为学生而已荐君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286190_comment'></div>当是时，不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_1286190", 1286190, "Clauses/131/Comments/0")'>狃狎</span>便顺，张皇呼吸，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_1286190", 1286190, "Clauses/133/Comments/0")'>干没</span>速化，而能以实利害、诚行己应其上如君者一二耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286190_comment'></div>会约和坚定，无他警急，所谓疆圉大事，不过专对宴贿之间，故君之可<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1286190", 1286190, "Clauses/139/Comments/0")'>传载</span>者止于如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286190_comment'></div>夫以可致之材，遭不好之时，与时之好虽勤而己之材不及，是不足云已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286190_comment'></div>若时与材好合矣，其不须暇而夺之者，独年也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286190_comment'></div>虽然，在君之正其行如何尔，年又足云乎哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286190_comment'></div>始，君十四世祖午，传为晋蔡谟之后，自婺州来居黄岩白山，遂为台州人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286190_comment'></div>曾祖产，祖元之，父待时，皆不仕，待时以君故封忠翊郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286190_comment'></div>君病革，自书凡数千言，其词多咎己过，教子弟以忠信孝悌而已，且曰「无求仕宦」，盖不以年不足用年尽为其身惜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1286190_comment'></div>夫人郑氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1286190_comment'></div>子曰淑，曰滂，曰泽，曰湛，曰济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1286190_comment'></div>女四人，未嫁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1286190_comment'></div>淑走愬余于濡须，相见北关门外，久雪始融，泥潦尺馀，拜且哭曰：「先人临绝以再世墓铭托夫子，今卜以某年月日葬某所，非得子文不掩也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1286190_comment'></div>余义知君，于其吊也，遽不及诔，因为长言系诸铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1286190_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_46_1286190'>人谓君学孙、吴以发身兮，乃能好《诗》、《礼》而恂恂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1286190_comment'></div>曰是可载以爵禄兮，不耀武而怀文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1286190_comment'></div>不尽年可戚嗟兮，傥<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_48_1286190", 1286190, "Clauses/192/Comments/0")'>耋耄</span>渠不为之欢欣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1286190_comment'></div>夫使人愿其通而悲其短兮，岂不足以为贤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1286190_comment'></div>孰知君之贤兮，在明大义于君亲！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1286190_comment'></div>约规矩绳墨以自严兮，不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_51_1286190", 1286190, "Clauses/198/Comments/0")'>决骤</span>而横陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1286190_comment'></div>挺球玉之纯美兮，就巧琢而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_52_1286190", 1286190, "Clauses/200/Comments/0")'>齐均</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1286190_comment'></div>骥之德实良兮，非行王路而后<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_53_1286190", 1286190, "Clauses/202/Comments/0")'>服驯</span>；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1286190_comment'></div>木受地之正命兮，枝叶华实皆成熟而蔚彬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1286190_comment'></div>听天命以生死兮，辨异端而脱幽沦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1286190_comment'></div>相灵芝与醴泉兮，固突出而无因；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1286190_comment'></div>其偶然而瑞世兮，亦或终閟而不伸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1286190_comment'></div>嗟君之自知兮，不如我之知为深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1286190_comment'></div>伐石矢铭兮，词不呜呜而愔愔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1286190_comment'></div>何必贻后之人兮，君乎我歆。</div><div id='poem_sentence_60_1286190_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1192&endYear=1192')">1192年4月</a>　四月，友人郑伯英卒，叶适和陈亮均有祭文。作品：祭郑景元文。<span class='inlineComment2'>（题目见《水心集》卷二十八。）</span><div id='poem_1286327' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286327' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286327?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭郑景元文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1192年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286327")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286327_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286327'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286327'>天之生材，岂不欲用？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286327_comment'></div>曰人不致，匪天能送。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286327_comment'></div>人之有材，岂不求通？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286327_comment'></div>曰天不显，匪人能洪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286327_comment'></div>天人相尤，事茫理昧，材虽美成，卒以朽败。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286327_comment'></div>寿皇御极，思得奇干，大长为伟，小短为悍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286327_comment'></div>谁不缘饰，谁不奋迅！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286327_comment'></div>取于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1286327", 1286327, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>疏远</span>，谁不亲近！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286327_comment'></div>临归重华，尚亲拔擢，公登甲科，乃自《访落》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286327_comment'></div>既有异能，又有绝度，率马以骥，遵彼大路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286327_comment'></div>乃不卿相，乃不方镇，乃不奔走，御侮四邻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286327_comment'></div>乃为选人，须鬓雪白，其田不食，海滨广斥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286327_comment'></div>上书非忿，饮酒非狂，非如题鴂，使草不芳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286327_comment'></div>非天非人，使公蹇蹇，曰惟公命，则又鄙浅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286327_comment'></div>永嘉翩翩，号多友朋，公在其间，前援后承。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286327_comment'></div>我最晚出，公顾亦厚，谬志纷纭，盖尝一剖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286327_comment'></div>置之何为，恋家为乐，但念公亡，山川寂寞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286327_comment'></div>且吊公墓，且哭公堂，且声此词，以纪我伤。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1286327_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1192&endYear=1192')">1192年7月</a>　七月，友人林鼐卒，有祭文。作品：祭林伯和文。<span class='inlineComment2'>（题目见《水心集》卷二十八。）</span><div id='poem_1286329' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286329' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286329?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭林伯和文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1192年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286329")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286329_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286329'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286329'>嗟君之质，坚厚而明，敢决不回，惟是之行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286329_comment'></div>我之厚君，岂独故旧，望其诚然，阳燧在昼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286329_comment'></div>家既淑友，官既廉清，进趋之行，既恬以宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286329_comment'></div>曷不安行，按程百里？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286329_comment'></div>谁促其步，五十而已？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286329_comment'></div>母丧未终，遽失爱子；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286329_comment'></div>府君寿考，亦相尾死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286329_comment'></div>祸难之来，东陨西倾，四山合颓，棺椁复萦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286329_comment'></div>欲以情推，天不我应；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286329_comment'></div>欲力以救，则非我能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286329_comment'></div>君之于善，盖其性尔，至其所遭，则有命矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286329_comment'></div>虽以此说，讵能勿怨！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286329_comment'></div>我于君弟，如我与君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286329_comment'></div>君之幼儿，今为几岁？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286329_comment'></div>学不可失，我其与诲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286329_comment'></div>愧我远役，不能往哭，念君如存，陈词以告。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1286329_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1192&endYear=1192')">1192年11月</a>　十一月，岳母安葬，志其墓。作品：高夫人墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（题目见《水心集》卷十四。）</span><div id='poem_1286187' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286187' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286187?labeling=true' target='_blank'>高夫人墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1192年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286187")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286187_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286187'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286187'>夫人翁氏葬，某将为铭，已复自疑曰：古之妇人，德善以位登，功烈因事显，书传所载，固<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1286187", 1286187, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>瑰异</span>俊哲，非凡女子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286187_comment'></div>屏梱内常事细行，直不足录。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286187_comment'></div>今之铭妇女，大抵依放之云尔，外属至亲，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1286187", 1286187, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>褒叙</span>而已，词无抑扬，则于铭尤难，是夫人之美，无以传信于后矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286187_comment'></div>自余为高氏婿，颇得闻外舍事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286187_comment'></div>始在京师名南宅者，宣仁后家也，王侯贵盛冠天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286187_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1286187", 1286187, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>逃乱</span>转客，留居永嘉，外舅幼鞠其祖，袍笏外无分焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286187_comment'></div>夫人已归，则废寺颓然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286187_comment'></div>外舅尉郢上，夫人远不能至，独与两女闭门课纺绩自给。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286187_comment'></div>由外舅言宣仁后，则曰曾老姑，而自渡江未有特录高氏者，其仕与寒士等，惟门户调度异甚，以贫故几不立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286187_comment'></div>夫人智能通南北之俗，自<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1286187", 1286187, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>文绣</span>工巧，下至炊爨<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1286187", 1286187, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>烦辱</span>，皆身亲之，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1286187", 1286187, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>豫算</span>有无，乃具衣食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286187_comment'></div>外人所有，不立毫分冀幸意；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286187_comment'></div>馈与自己出，惟恐人不我惬也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286187_comment'></div>每族里间计较家事，极为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1286187", 1286187, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>退懦</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1286187", 1286187, "Clauses/50/Comments/1")'>卑约</span>，示若无有，人或颇<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1286187", 1286187, "Clauses/52/Comments/0")'>忽易</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286187_comment'></div>逮其一旦设张丰大，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1286187", 1286187, "Clauses/54/Comments/0")'>出人望外</span>数等，人皆惊不意，以为何术能然，直以为勉强然尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286187_comment'></div>至其久无不然，以此终其身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286187_comment'></div>盖夫人知自力不望人，挽合为规，曲折为矩，变化为度量。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286187_comment'></div>世俗所谓生事家计，皆绝不营，要以仅足而止，所以相夫子之贫而不废礼，成夫子之廉而不失义而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286187_comment'></div>用是后家旧事，能岁时举行不废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286187_comment'></div>自鲁王及宣仁后亲昆弟下，咸宁郡王、秘阁修撰，荣绪华宗，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1286187", 1286187, "Clauses/74/Comments/0")'>中更</span>坠落，以一线引千钧，乔木之萌生复见径尺，夫人之助也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286187_comment'></div>始，高氏既归余，余号尤贫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286187_comment'></div>高氏之能匀厚培薄，均足内外，使余尚自立于闾巷者，皆用夫人教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286187_comment'></div>余年益晚，发秃齿阙，沿汉浮江，栖栖羁旅，惟不足于养是谋，独夫人察而怜之，非特以婿故爱也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286187_comment'></div>今夫人不幸不老于寿以死，岂惟高氏之不吊，盖余命之穷也已！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286187_comment'></div>夫人前数年逆知将终，首饰履缘，无不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1286187", 1286187, "Clauses/97/Comments/0")'>豫备</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286187_comment'></div>去岁，余来蕲阳，夫人送高氏至江滨，有诀别语，盖知其不再见也，悲夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286187_comment'></div>夫人，温州永嘉人，归外舅，今为朝请郎、主管台州崇道观，夫人封安人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286187_comment'></div>子不愚、不息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286187_comment'></div>两女，其幼嫁修职郎、建昌军教授包履常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286187_comment'></div>夫人绍熙三年三月某日卒，年五十八。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286187_comment'></div>十一月某日，葬永嘉护国寺山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286187_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286187_comment'></div>余铭夫人，不敢依放古事，不用<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1286187", 1286187, "Clauses/119/Comments/0")'>褒叙</span>常礼，其实如此也，未知可传信于后否？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286187_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_32_1286187'>崛微以兴赖齐伦，累贵而衰甚难嫔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286187_comment'></div>夫人<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_1286187", 1286187, "Clauses/125/Comments/0")'>挚刚</span>又<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_1286187", 1286187, "Clauses/125/Comments/1")'>淑均</span>，量己所能自苦辛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286187_comment'></div>内为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1286187", 1286187, "Clauses/127/Comments/0")'>俭卑</span>外舒陈，扶危出泰全旧门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286187_comment'></div>人或不足己馀分，教成厥女掀我贫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286187_comment'></div>卓哉诗书章懿勋，叙铭其实刊<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1286187", 1286187, "Clauses/132/Comments/0")'>幽珉</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_36_1286187_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1192&endYear=1192')">1192年12月</a>　十二月，除浙西提刑。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1192&endYear=1192')">1192年</a>　作诗挽陈持中之嫂。作品：岷江愁二首。<span class='inlineComment2'>（《水心集》卷八作“岷江愁挽陈持中知府郎中嫂恭人二首”）</span><div id='poem_80119' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_80119' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/80119?labeling=true' target='_blank'>岷江愁二首挽陈持中知府郎中嫂恭人<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1192年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_80119")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_80119_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_80119'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_80119'>岷江诸峰如献酬，岷江潭头绀碧流。<div id='poem_sentence_0_80119_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_80119'>不愁水生劝人去，只愁人死送山休。<div id='poem_sentence_1_80119_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_80119'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_80119_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_80120' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_80120' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/80120?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1192年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_80120_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_80120'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_80120'>谁家双旐扬春波，黑头中郎宰相科。<div id='poem_sentence_0_80120_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_80120'>有儿有女后应好，同穴同时今奈何。<div id='poem_sentence_1_80120_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_80120'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_80120_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1192&endYear=1192')">1192年</a>　为光州知州王闻诗改司马温公祠撰文。作品：司马温公祠堂记。<div id='poem_1286110' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286110' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286110?labeling=true' target='_blank'>司马温公祠堂记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1192年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286110")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286110_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286110'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286110'>公，河内人，生于光州，因以为名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286110_comment'></div>绍熙三年，太守王侯闻诗改祠公郡东堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286110_comment'></div>光边远极陋，民之智识不足于耕殖，而何暇知公之仁！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286110_comment'></div>虽然，公自元祐以来，由京师达四方，家绘其像，饮食皆祝，非必师友士大夫能敬公而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286110_comment'></div>公之乡已不得见，因其尝生也，表厉尊显，以明尚贤治民之本旨，此侯之志欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286110_comment'></div>自王迹泯而圣贤之德业不著，士负所有而就功名，以为凡用世操术，必将有异于人而后可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286110_comment'></div>故或诡谲其身而出处乱，封大其欲而廉隅失；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286110_comment'></div>朴拙称任重，跌宕为豪英；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286110_comment'></div>寡学多憃，谓之有力，先从后畔，自许知权。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286110_comment'></div>其谬于情性伦理，固亦多悔，而犹强忮坚忍以冀其成者，盖道德丧而流俗驱靡之然矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286110_comment'></div>公子弟力学，进士起家，州佐从辟，官使承事，犹常人尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286110_comment'></div>充实积久，而廉夫畏其洁，高士则其操，儒先宗其学，去就为法故，步趋中绳墨，用舍进退关乎民心，为宋元臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286110_comment'></div>至于深衣幅巾，退然山泽之间，诚意至义，不敢加一豪于婴儿<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1286110", 1286110, "Clauses/52/Comments/0")'>下走</span>，而同其吉凶忧乐之变，岂必殊特自许，谓当离类绝伦，与人异趣者哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286110_comment'></div>若夫比并伊、吕，配拟经训，使人主降屈体貌，自以圣人复出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286110_comment'></div>及其造事改法，众所不向，天下大扰，而公以身争之，稍还其旧以便民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286110_comment'></div>小人比而怨公，遂纳善士于朋党而指公为魁杰，追斥崖上，刻名坚石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286110_comment'></div>播之外朝，士皆燬庐灭迹，同族废锢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286110_comment'></div>当是时，天象<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1286110", 1286110, "Clauses/74/Comments/0")'>错戾</span>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1286110", 1286110, "Clauses/75/Comments/0")'>碑首</span>仆裂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286110_comment'></div>其后女真入中国，海内横流，余读《实录》，至靖康元年二月壬寅诏赠公太师，未尝不感愤泪落也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286110_comment'></div>盖是非邪正，久郁不伸，至使夷狄驾祸以明之而后止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286110_comment'></div>然则公独夫之力岂能动天，而天人之际何其可畏若是哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286110_comment'></div>余是以因侯之作，并论次，以明圣贤之德业不在彼而在此也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1286110_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1192&endYear=1192')">1192年</a>　为李之翰撰文。作品：李氏中洲记。<div id='poem_1286109' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286109' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286109?labeling=true' target='_blank'>李氏中洲记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1192年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286109")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286109_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286109'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286109'>君隐约于蕲久矣，在城西中洲，依水为圃，荫茆而宅，无所燕馆，不崇珍台，其间蹊隧仅通而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286109_comment'></div>春阳<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1286109", 1286109, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>开舒</span>，似有敷荣，揫歛气应，不厌摧落，四时之序，略备而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286109_comment'></div>蕲人以其居而安，游而乐，因即而名之，贩夫走卒，皆曰中洲，不斥言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286109_comment'></div>君之可称有二焉：世之豪杰特起之士，岂不正其性命之情哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286109_comment'></div>然而气血之偏使，常制其中和；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286109_comment'></div>利欲之交习，常行于理义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286109_comment'></div>终也则势力之高下为进退，岁月之壮老为盛衰，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1286109", 1286109, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>规砭</span>未忘而身又蹈之，何欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286109_comment'></div>盖君于气血利欲之杂先尽矣，遗世以顺，照物以哲，故能养心于内，不暴于外，屈伸俯仰，有以自信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286109_comment'></div>虽薄滋味，简服用，约居处，颓然穷老，而可乐之实常在矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286109_comment'></div>一也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286109_comment'></div>佛之学入中原，其始固为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1286109", 1286109, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>异教</span>而已，久而遂与圣人之道相乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286109_comment'></div>有志者常欲致精索微以胜之，卒不能有所别异而又自同于佛者，智不足以两明而学失之略也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286109_comment'></div>君始学于佛，既悟其说，然后归而求之圣人之道，有是乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286109_comment'></div>无是乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286109_comment'></div>反<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1286109", 1286109, "Clauses/54/Comments/0")'>伦类</span>者易知，合性命者难辨，于是诚得其所以不同者，故其修身教人，出于仁义道德之本统，而知入德之有门矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286109_comment'></div>二也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286109_comment'></div>不富于技而能已足者，士之常道也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286109_comment'></div>不分于用而能已成者，士之常职也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286109_comment'></div>仁者，人之所以为人之实也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286109_comment'></div>不求仁则失其所以为人；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286109_comment'></div>求仁而不得其所以为仁，不可止也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286109_comment'></div>古之人，舍一世之所重以求其所谓仁者；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286109_comment'></div>后之人，求一世之所重以丧其所谓仁者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286109_comment'></div>夫重与轻不先审，而以其所丧者为所求；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286109_comment'></div>人与己不先察，而以其所竞者为所乐；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286109_comment'></div>可乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286109_comment'></div>不可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286109_comment'></div>此君之所以为庶几，而余之所以愧君也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286109_comment'></div>君已七十，中洲之上，木老花残，不复计惜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286109_comment'></div>所察将益警，所进将益深，不惰不昏，以俟天命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286109_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286109_comment'></div>余之愧君未已也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286109_comment'></div>李氏，名之翰，字周翰。</div><div id='poem_sentence_32_1286109_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1192&endYear=1192')">1192年</a>　为李之翰作诗。作品：中洲处士折梅花并新语为赠。<span class='inlineComment2'>（《水心集》卷八作“中洲处士折梅花并新语为赠率易鄙句为谢”）</span><div id='poem_79934' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_79934' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/79934?labeling=true' target='_blank'>中洲处士折梅花并新语为赠率易鄙句为谢</a><span class='authorDate'>（1192年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_79934")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_79934_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_79934'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_79934'>中洲之中十树梅，蟠枝着地照蒿莱。<div id='poem_sentence_0_79934_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_79934'>即非无主凭谁伴，自不冲寒要早开。<div id='poem_sentence_1_79934_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_79934'>午蝶只随游子意，暮笳难写遁夫哀。<div id='poem_sentence_2_79934_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_79934'>幽怀寂寂天应笑，插向归帆雪满桅。<div id='poem_sentence_3_79934_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_79934'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_79934_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1192&endYear=1192')">1192年</a>　祭李之翰。作品：祭中洲处士李公文。<div id='poem_1286326' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286326' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286326?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭中洲处士李公文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1192年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286326")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286326_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286326'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286326'>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286326_comment'></div>排幽出深，自为芳馨，天不夭伤，使秀于庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286326_comment'></div>彼来者谁，莫采莫掇，挹嗅过之，摧落岁月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286326_comment'></div>君力于善，不求事功，挫绝枝荣，本乐是宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286326_comment'></div>使其师友，上下百世，庶乎成材，性命之际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286326_comment'></div>今也七十，靡有骄媮，亦足以归，无怍斯丘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286326_comment'></div>蕲春山城，中洲水宅，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1286326", 1286326, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>槁梧</span>其阴，钓石不泐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286326_comment'></div>昔我谓君，「死如委土，顺而尽矣，何较福祸」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286326_comment'></div>君曰「不然，孰示劝惩，端洁尔身，升济神明」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286326_comment'></div>悲君遽亡，无复论辨，盍从天来，视此薄奠！</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1286326_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1193&endYear=1193')">1193年1月</a>　正月，为门人徐玑之父徐德操作墓志铭。作品：徐德操墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（题目见《水心集》卷十四。）</span><div id='poem_1286188' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286188' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286188?labeling=true' target='_blank'>徐德操墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286188")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286188_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286188'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286188'>公姓徐氏，讳定，字德操，泉州晋江人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286188_comment'></div>曾祖冘，祖逢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286188_comment'></div>父泽，赠朝议大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286188_comment'></div>朝议少孤，母刘夫人挈之从吕氏，因以所从为姓五十年，公不知其徐氏子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286188_comment'></div>朝议且死，以告，曰：「即有立，毋忘吾宗」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286188_comment'></div>公愤泣，终丧，与二弟来行在，约不取科名勿止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286188_comment'></div>及公仕为宣教郎，而二弟皆擢进士第矣，始以其本末自言，复姓徐氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286188_comment'></div>公解褐，授秀州崇德县尉，母丧不行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286188_comment'></div>历处州吉州教授，知邵武军邵武县，干办福建路转运司公事，通判太平州，知潮州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286188_comment'></div>还，奏事谒病，主管武夷山冲祐观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286188_comment'></div>绍熙二年九月丙戌卒，年七十四，官朝散大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286188_comment'></div>在邵武，危与守<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1286188", 1286188, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>争辨</span>，数轧其不义，几得罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286188_comment'></div>在太平之岁，实淳熙八年，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1286188", 1286188, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>火星</span>犯南斗，公以历占之曰：「此岁饥而民流，当自南而趋北也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286188_comment'></div>郡扼江、淮之冲，可不备乎」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286188_comment'></div>始未信，流民果大至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286188_comment'></div>当涂、采石之间，叠饿骈疫，暴露汹汹，守不知所为，尽以委公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286188_comment'></div>公设次卧起，造屋数百，行食散药，须舟不时，济者皆归焉，毕渡不失一人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286188_comment'></div>宣州妖民胡木匠，居麻姑山，诱聚数千人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286188_comment'></div>守适罢去，两通判争摄事不协，事莫理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286188_comment'></div>盗乘间将犯城，缚巡检一人，贯其耳以徇，人情恐惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286188_comment'></div>转运使命公摄宣州，公单车驰入境，令曰：「汝等粥糜苦不饱，谩相从尔，非为乱也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286188_comment'></div>能自首者无罪，与之粟」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286188_comment'></div>众咸从令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286188_comment'></div>胡木匠以半夜望西北有青云起，唶谓其徒曰：「吉人之祥哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286188_comment'></div>城不可冀也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286188_comment'></div>已而卒败，胡木匠亦幻以逃，不获。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286188_comment'></div>潮之土豪吴亮者，当沈师寇汀州，官军合闽、广之人不能捕，亮实诱以出，有司抑其赏不奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286188_comment'></div>公为之叹息，看待过意，月与飧钱甚多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286188_comment'></div>会汀、赣山寇复动，稍稍及潮，公议讨之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286188_comment'></div>贼闻之曰：「是官能用吴亮者，奈何」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286188_comment'></div>因相与散去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286188_comment'></div>公安重俭节，不以词色娱人，不以意气凭物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286188_comment'></div>学博而要，文约而费。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286188_comment'></div>居閒教授学者至数百，依经训而言，无心通臆畅之说；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286188_comment'></div>仕宦平进，不求出常调，据法义以治，无刑名货利之功，有所惨怛，若己好乐，不可<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1286188", 1286188, "Clauses/119/Comments/0")'>销释</span>；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286188_comment'></div>有所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1286188", 1286188, "Clauses/120/Comments/0")'>执论</span>，发于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1286188", 1286188, "Clauses/121/Comments/0")'>坚毅</span>，不可<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1286188", 1286188, "Clauses/122/Comments/0")'>悗夺</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286188_comment'></div>公既有以自守，不媚于世，世亦无能用公者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286188_comment'></div>虽然，世之操纵方圆，雕琢技能，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_1286188", 1286188, "Clauses/129/Comments/0")'>梳栉</span>缴绕以赴绳墨，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_1286188", 1286188, "Clauses/130/Comments/0")'>磨错</span>椎钝以就锋锐，死往生来，不能绝也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286188_comment'></div>使其有益于道之治乱而贬性劳力以为之，犹曰可耳；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286188_comment'></div>均之无益，而彼富贵之几何，终磨灭以尽，则与其毁阙而进，不如成全而退，动而得于人之多，不如静而失于己之少也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286188_comment'></div>公其知之矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1286188_comment'></div>宜人鲍氏，永嘉人也，故公宅永嘉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1286188_comment'></div>四子：玚，迪功郎、汀州司户；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1286188_comment'></div>赅，早卒；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1286188_comment'></div>玑，当受公致仕恩；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1286188_comment'></div>瑄，贺今皇帝即位补将仕郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1286188_comment'></div>进士陈度，迪功郎、徽州黟县尉张炳，进士万与权，三女子之婿也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1286188_comment'></div>绍熙四年正月壬申，葬公孝义乡何奥村。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1286188_comment'></div>诸子使瑄来请铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1286188_comment'></div>余闻公在家时，惟以朔望日谒郡守，他官府<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_49_1286188", 1286188, "Clauses/164/Comments/0")'>旷岁</span>不到，殊不识其处，参坐语未尝及公事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1286188_comment'></div>今玚等所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_50_1286188", 1286188, "Clauses/167/Comments/0")'>论叙</span>信笃，固终始不懈其德矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1286188_comment'></div>可无铭！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1286188_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_52_1286188'>不秏其内，以盈其外；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1286188_comment'></div>不亏其性，以益其命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1286188_comment'></div>尚不厚其生，岂其死而荣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1286188_comment'></div>乌乎徐公此其称！</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_55_1286188'></div><div id='poem_sentence_55_1286188_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
丹阳
