href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1194&endYear=1194')">1194年12月</a>　十二月，抵达丹阳淮东总领任所，作谢表。作品：除太府卿淮东总领谢表。<div id='poem_1285834' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1285834' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1285834?labeling=true' target='_blank'>除太府卿淮东总领谢表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1285834")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1285834_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1285834'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1285834'>既筦钱米，又知甲兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1285834_comment'></div>本乞<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1285834", 1285834, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>漫游</span>，更叨烦委<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1285834_comment'></div>伏念序迁学校，固惭课业之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1285834", 1285834, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>荒唐</span>；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1285834_comment'></div>内迫家门，重困<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1285834", 1285834, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>食用</span>之寡薄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1285834_comment'></div>一贫殆不可忍，屡请期于必从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1285834_comment'></div>然而辞尊居卑，陈力就列，视古为训，于退则宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1285834_comment'></div>今乃升寄卿班，示厥号名之宠；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1285834_comment'></div>预闻军政，制其财赋之权。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1285834_comment'></div>猥用<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1285834", 1285834, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>荣章</span>，被之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1285834", 1285834, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>弱质</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1285834_comment'></div>若夫此地，爰自积年，务场坏而经常之镪大亏，纲运弊而湿恶之粮亦匮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1285834_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1285834", 1285834, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>口累</span>日重者近忧而已，兵民俱困则远患若何！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1285834_comment'></div>况于由细入粗，以轻驭重，忽当警急，无异承平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1285834_comment'></div>国其选择而使能，臣姑冒昧而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1285834", 1285834, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>就禄</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1285834_comment'></div>此盖恭遇皇帝陛下，勤劳初载，谨审外防。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1285834_comment'></div>谓臣粗读古书，合更时务，因其欲敛藏湖海之上，且复令周旋戎马之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1285834_comment'></div>臣敢不事贵经通，身先损节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1285834_comment'></div>必吝<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1285834", 1285834, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>出纳</span>，是为有司之常；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1285834_comment'></div>苟逃<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1285834", 1285834, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>旷瘝</span>，终返腐儒之旧。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1285834_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1194&endYear=1194')">1194年</a>　撰文祭先圣。作品：总司祭先圣文。<div id='poem_1286387' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286387' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286387?labeling=true' target='_blank'>总司祭先圣文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286387")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286387_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286387'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286387'>古今之官不同，而所谓总领军马钱粮者，其事任固亦非今之所当忽也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286387_comment'></div>使某万一不至于不胜其任，是亦先圣之所以教矣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_1_1286387_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1194&endYear=1194')">1194年</a>　被使兵食，寄地丹阳。作品：诸庙文。<div id='poem_1286388' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286388' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286388?labeling=true' target='_blank'>诸庙文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286388")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286388_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286388'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286388'>某被使兵食，寄地丹阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286388_comment'></div>惟神默相此邦，敢不敬告！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286388_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1286388_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1195&endYear=1195')">1195年5月</a>　是年道学被禁，称“伪学”，五月，为绩溪县令王楠撰文。作品：绩溪县新开塘记。<div id='poem_1286112' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286112' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286112?labeling=true' target='_blank'>绩溪县新开塘记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1195年5月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286112")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286112_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286112'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286112'>田于山谷，踰高逗深烧变，筑叠而堨，引其泉流以润泽之，有所不及，益凿为塘，储雨以待。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286112_comment'></div>昔之聚民于此者，择其水土之利，固已详矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286112_comment'></div>若夫计田而掘，量亩而浚，必使水无不足，而不以雨旸之节听于天，时有水旱而田无高下，皆欲为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1286112", 1286112, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>乐岁</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286112_comment'></div>人之愿<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1286112", 1286112, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>虽然</span>，而人之事不能尽然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286112_comment'></div>民啬税输，而与官较尺寸之旱，常以报闻，则讼牒烦而诈伪起，绩溪之民无善俗矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286112_comment'></div>王君木叔宰是县之始，行视民田，验其水利之近远，塘堨之有无，而知所以丰荒之故曰：「凡不得水者，当别开塘注田尔」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286112_comment'></div>农不可，曰：「田狭，吾安能坏见田，又刻财与力创为之耶」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286112_comment'></div>教之再三，犹不听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286112_comment'></div>木叔曰：「是不足告语」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286112_comment'></div>其治县<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1286112", 1286112, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>节缩</span>，稍得馀钱，遂请于监司，买民田使为之，古迹之废并修之，塘之所须楗桩木石皆买与之，工食之不足者颇助之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286112_comment'></div>毕二年，为新塘六十八，堨六，买田有自亩三十至六十步，出钱有自缗二百三十以上至千文，饮田有自亩二千至三千，然后绩溪之田无不得水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286112_comment'></div>绍熙五年，县民始不以旱报官而岁全熟美矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286112_comment'></div>木叔之治民，又详矣哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286112_comment'></div>古之长民者示之以意，其次为条教，其次号令之，最下者挞罚驱胁之，意之难从久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286112_comment'></div>若木叔知计田掘塘为民利，以条教告之，以号令使之而已；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286112_comment'></div>民有不听，挞罚之尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286112_comment'></div>夫将以利之而已，虽或挞罚之，未过也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286112_comment'></div>今木叔以条教号令为不能，挞罚之又不可，故为之买田掘之，又为之买楗桩木石与之，工食助之，如父母待<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1286112", 1286112, "Clauses/75/Comments/0")'>骄子</span>然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286112_comment'></div>或曰「非常道，木叔委曲以就其民尔」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286112_comment'></div>夫委曲以就其民而可以利之，虽非常道，斯谓之仁矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286112_comment'></div>绩溪之民，忘之，可乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286112_comment'></div>不忘，未之计，废坠之，可乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286112_comment'></div>木叔名楠，永嘉人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286112_comment'></div>庆元元年五月二十日。</div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1286112_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1195&endYear=1195')">1195年6月</a>　六月，为乐清县学撰文。作品：乐清县学三贤祠堂记。<div id='poem_1286113' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286113' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286113?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乐清县学三贤祠堂记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1195年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286113")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286113_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286113'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286113'>士患不贤与无德；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286113_comment'></div>贤有德矣，进而至公卿之位，则为其事，不至者世以为有命焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286113_comment'></div>夫贤有德，岂必为公卿哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286113_comment'></div>孟子称「禹、稷与颜回同道」，当其时盖已有流俗之论，而孟子言之如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286113_comment'></div>悲夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286113_comment'></div>直以贫贱不如富贵，此流俗之细尔，犹不病德也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286113_comment'></div>至谓贤而贱终不如贤而贵，有德而富犹过于有德而贫，以夫区区自为轻重，转讹习陋，而使天下言贤有德者，必将兼出于富贵而后止，则流俗之为害大矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286113_comment'></div>然则以不至公卿为命者，是畏贫贱而乐富贵，非命之正也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286113_comment'></div>故太子詹事龙图阁学士王公十朋，字龟龄，温洲乐清人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286113_comment'></div>秦桧死，首开直道对策，高宗寤，擢上第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286113_comment'></div>孝宗初，力请复雠，不合，连守外州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286113_comment'></div>自绍兴庚辰至乾道辛卯，公名节为世第一，士无不趋<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1286113", 1286113, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>下风</span>者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286113_comment'></div>有钱公尧卿字熙载，贾公如规字元范，公同邑士也，与公亲友，而年辈稍前于公；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286113_comment'></div>钱公孝悌醇行，为善如嗜欲；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286113_comment'></div>贾公<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1286113", 1286113, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>恻怛</span>长者，惠贫恤孤；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286113_comment'></div>皆不及仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286113_comment'></div>然邑人高此二公，虽天下独知乐清有王公，而邑人以为此二公固亦其地之所有也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286113_comment'></div>齐是民也，而贤有德者得为士；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286113_comment'></div>民齐不能相治也，故士得为公卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286113_comment'></div>民得尽为士而士不得尽为公卿也，乌得以有司之所别异而异三公者乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286113_comment'></div>使王公之用能退而不愧二公，二公之处能不愧其身，此邑人所以推尊之意，彼区区者无预也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286113_comment'></div>虽然，有一焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286113_comment'></div>民得尽为士也而不尽为士，士不得尽为公卿也而非贤有德者为公卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286113_comment'></div>身之所以自修，非修其身者不能知，而有司之所别异者，户号而目熟之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286113_comment'></div>悲夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286113_comment'></div>此流俗之害所以或细或大而终不可息欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286113_comment'></div>始，邑既祠王公于学；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286113_comment'></div>又以为学之再兴，钱公、贾公尝有力，其并祠贾而遗钱者，吏失之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286113_comment'></div>王公之子吏部郎闻诗，乃言于州，列祠三公，以年之先后为次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286113_comment'></div>余美司封所为，且俱习三家子孙，故为之论孟子大指为记，因以审考流俗之趣好孰当否云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286113_comment'></div>庆元元年六月。</div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1286113_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1195&endYear=1195')">1195年6月</a>　六月，为东溪先生刘伯熊文集作序。作品：东溪先生集序。<span class='inlineComment2'>（撰写之月见《水心集》卷十二该文末。）</span><div id='poem_1285890' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1285890' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1285890?labeling=true' target='_blank'>东溪先生集序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1195年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1285890")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1285890_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1285890'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1285890'>君名伯熊，字元朝，姓刘氏，居简东溪，号东溪先生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1285890_comment'></div>始冠，有荣人杨先生爱其赋，诲之曰：「无为俗学」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1285890_comment'></div>君谢，闭户焚昔稿，束注解，读经必自识，然后纵观他书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1285890_comment'></div>如是馀十年复见，杨先生曰：「可也，吾畏子矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1285890_comment'></div>君高远独出，无拘留泥滓间意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1285890_comment'></div>学已成，谓当直施用，不曲步捷行以渐巧取之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1285890_comment'></div>论说必穷尽，欲砭<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1285890", 1285890, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>时陋</span>，扶世坏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1285890_comment'></div>文不为扶疏茂好，惟自<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1285890", 1285890, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>根极</span>而成者，无不具也，故不得志于科举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1285890_comment'></div>至转富入贫，本业<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1285890", 1285890, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>微析</span>，终不动，一以溪山云月为家宅，笔墨简策为性情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1285890_comment'></div>常<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1285890", 1285890, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>覃研</span>竟日夜，曰：「孔、颜不如是乎」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1285890_comment'></div>绍熙五年，君之无服弟起居郎德修，学于君者也，时镇夔门，君来视之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1285890_comment'></div>会起居召入，因请与东下，遨西湖上，赋诗徘徊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1285890_comment'></div>叹曰：「古人虽闲客，用即帝王师，若余空疏，何为者哉」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1285890_comment'></div>庆元元年，还至南徐州，病甚，腰膂不能据身，脉乍有乍无，神将离形，犹<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1285890", 1285890, "Clauses/58/Comments/0")'>峭绝</span>凛立，谆谆皆仁义语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1285890_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1285890_comment'></div>使君老不酬，又万里外死，浮柩以归，人为君伤之，君不自伤者，命耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1285890_comment'></div>性耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1285890_comment'></div>德之上下不伦，学之高深无穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1285890_comment'></div>余观子贡为卫将军语弟子行，而孔子笑曰：「汝次为人矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1285890_comment'></div>为言夷、齐、赵武、士会、老莱子、羊舌大夫等，皆洙、泗以前人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1285890_comment'></div>士不景行古人，积实弥长，而夸近以足己，难哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1285890_comment'></div>余晚见君，不及反复其议论，以所闻于德修，读其书，可以考焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1285890_comment'></div>六月日。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1285890_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1195&endYear=1195')">1195年8月</a>　八月二十四日，陈傅良妻张氏卒，致函叶适，请撰墓志。作品：张令人墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286195' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286195' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286195?labeling=true' target='_blank'>张令人墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1195年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286195")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286195_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286195'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286195'>夫人讳幼昭，字景惠，姓张氏，温州永嘉人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286195_comment'></div>归陈氏，为中书舍人傅良之妻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286195_comment'></div>夫人父兄皆儒先生，自幼<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1286195", 1286195, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>陶染</span>诗礼间事，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1286195", 1286195, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>绝异</span>于他女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286195_comment'></div>其夫有学行文词经世之业，远近<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1286195", 1286195, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>宗从</span>登门请义，通日夜，历寒暑，室内常无坐处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286195_comment'></div>夫人独挟一婢治爨，贫甚，籴米市薪，行饭分茗，皆令得洁馔，有无未尝使夫闻之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286195_comment'></div>新有田五亩，夫之伯氏，鳏也，将<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1286195", 1286195, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>继室</span>而不得具礼，夫人曰：「鬻此田耳」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286195_comment'></div>后夫宦颇遂，不至乏，稍经营兄姊及他亲友，或一日直取数十百万钱，夫人喜曰：「士方穷时，欲有施与云云，为大言耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286195_comment'></div>今而得酬，岂非幸耶」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286195_comment'></div>过洞庭，管押者忽告曰：「某所行李有盗」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286195_comment'></div>家人<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1286195", 1286195, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>皇骇</span>，夫人笑曰：「即如是，所失不过财物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286195_comment'></div>若贫，即不失矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286195_comment'></div>夫仕上皇，力谏不听，乞致其仕，下殿即行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286195_comment'></div>新天子<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1286195", 1286195, "Clauses/49/Comments/0")'>嗣统</span>，急召使至，俄复罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286195_comment'></div>往来业业数月，夫人率男女欢笑相随，曰：「以为高则余不安，以为罪当逐则宜尔」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286195_comment'></div>不信<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1286195", 1286195, "Clauses/57/Comments/0")'>方术</span>，不崇释、老，不畏巫鬼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286195_comment'></div>凡其夫所欲向意行，不曲折仿古，不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1286195", 1286195, "Clauses/62/Comments/0")'>循俗</span>，夫人一切<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1286195", 1286195, "Clauses/63/Comments/0")'>顺承</span>，曰：「不如是，是吾不能从其夫」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286195_comment'></div>然而每曰：「以子之疏且易，欲以其求知于天者，使人亦知之乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286195_comment'></div>宜谤之众<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1286195", 1286195, "Clauses/71/Comments/1")'>也与</span>」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286195_comment'></div>夫阅士久，士之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1286195", 1286195, "Clauses/73/Comments/0")'>品俦</span>高下皆能言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286195_comment'></div>夫所与游，夫人则亦与其偶相视遇如娣姒，忧乐皆同焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286195_comment'></div>妇人之可贤，有以文慧，有以艺能，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1286195", 1286195, "Clauses/80/Comments/0")'>淑均</span>不妒，宜其家室而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286195_comment'></div>至于儒者之意，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1286195", 1286195, "Clauses/83/Comments/0")'>散阔</span>而不续，高远而难攀，自笃信力学之士，随其分量所得，毫釐有间，苟不尽知，趋舍异涂，辄相<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1286195", 1286195, "Clauses/90/Comments/0")'>疵病</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286195_comment'></div>乃能习见于房琐，安行于梱闼，埙埙应和，如出一人，穷达毁誉，有以皆乐，则夫人之贤加于世之贤也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286195_comment'></div>夫人爱其弟特甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286195_comment'></div>弟死久，讳不告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286195_comment'></div>过时而后哭之，恸绝，遂得疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286195_comment'></div>庆元元年八月二十二日且午，曰：「伯伯何在？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286195_comment'></div>吾今死，不可不与别」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286195_comment'></div>薄暮，伯氏至，夫人曰：「新妇归矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286195_comment'></div>夫抚之曰：「得无记畴昔所得于《论语》、《孟子》乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286195_comment'></div>颔之再三而瞑，年五十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286195_comment'></div>封令人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286195_comment'></div>子师辙，迪功郎、福州罗源县主簿，师朴，承务郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286195_comment'></div>女阿鬒，适潘子顺；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286195_comment'></div>阿晦，适将仕郎薛师雍；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286195_comment'></div>阿季、阿福，许嫁太学上舍生林子燕、将仕郎徐冲；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286195_comment'></div>不弃；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286195_comment'></div>不卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286195_comment'></div>庆元某年月日葬于某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286195_comment'></div>夫以书来曰：「吾梦景惠盛服出布帷，问焉往？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286195_comment'></div>曰：『往见子谢』，意属子铭也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1286195_comment'></div>又曰：「常日有不乐，未尝破<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1286195", 1286195, "Clauses/139/Comments/0")'>声色</span>，其女问何以能忍」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1286195_comment'></div>曰：「我岂无气性者耶！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1286195_comment'></div>但写上墓志不得，故不为尔」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1286195_comment'></div>然则夫人之期于后远矣，余何足以铭！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1286195_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_45_1286195'>同其夫之志意兮，眇追古而逐今。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1286195_comment'></div>有迂而不达兮，有微而莫寻；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1286195_comment'></div>人所不知兮，夫人知心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1286195_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1286195_comment'></div>所谓好合兮，所谓瑟琴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1286195_comment'></div>老至不偕，夫也弗任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1286195_comment'></div>山则寿矣，勒此崖阴。</div><div id='poem_sentence_51_1286195_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1195&endYear=1195')">1195年9月</a>　为友人黄子由之父撰写行状。作品：通直郎致仕总干黄公行状。<div id='poem_1286168' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286168' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286168?labeling=true' target='_blank'>通直郎致仕总干黄公行状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1195年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286168")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286168_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286168'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286168'>绍熙五年秋七月庚午，黄子由自嘉王府直讲为起居郎，兼权给事中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286168_comment'></div>踰月，迁中书舍人兼侍讲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286168_comment'></div>时国有大丧，内禅甫定，诸<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1286168", 1286168, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>处分</span>尚多草创，人心忧恐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286168_comment'></div>天子思尽下情，博谋群臣，于三宫僚尤委信，或一日再宣对。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286168_comment'></div>子由素负直节，激发敢言事，事有未便常争论，上每为顺听，一时甚赖之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286168_comment'></div>知子由者，不以遭遇万一遽至显用为子由之身荣，而以子由能竭诚不阿补益上初政，为国家喜之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286168_comment'></div>冬十月庚寅，子由以父丧去职，于是知之者，又皆痛惜，以为天不且假其父之年，而令于此时得疾死，何耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286168_comment'></div>知子由之父者，则又曰：「不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286168_comment'></div>是翁奋立寒苦，为乡先生，天质<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1286168", 1286168, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>疏宕</span>，不避就向背，教子必自达于义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286168_comment'></div>晚而后得仕，仕不尽其能而死，是可痛惜也，焉得但以子由一时去职为重而痛惜之哉」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286168_comment'></div>明年，子由使其弟田来曰：「将以庆元二年三月某日葬吾父于吴县至德乡观音山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286168_comment'></div>天乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286168_comment'></div>往而不复反也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286168_comment'></div>图以永先人之存，诏无穷之哀，宜莫如有以述也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286168_comment'></div>惟荒哀<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1286168", 1286168, "Clauses/49/Comments/0")'>迷塞</span>，不能次第其辞，而以属于子也，若何而可」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286168_comment'></div>余念去岁临于重华，旦晡辄与子由同待事殿门外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286168_comment'></div>一日，子由出家信数通遍视诸大夫，雪涕曰：「吾翁官建邺，疾病矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286168_comment'></div>而易月之练方毕，家事义不并，奈何」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286168_comment'></div>宰相闻之，予告往省。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286168_comment'></div>上时犹在嘉邸，大书「成斋」二字，令以赐翁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286168_comment'></div>成斋者，翁为乡先生授弟子经时所名也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286168_comment'></div>至则翁疾良愈，遂奉以来行在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286168_comment'></div>及子由入见，上先问翁动息曰：「总干已无事耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286168_comment'></div>已安乐耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286168_comment'></div>子由顿首谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286168_comment'></div>归道上语，翁叹曰：「士不遇，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1286168", 1286168, "Clauses/80/Comments/0")'>岩栖谷隐</span>，姓名<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1286168", 1286168, "Clauses/81/Comments/0")'>沦灭</span>，其常也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286168_comment'></div>今以蓬门被云汉之章，野人致<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1286168", 1286168, "Clauses/84/Comments/0")'>天帝</span>之间，吾为赖宠乎」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286168_comment'></div>故自子由骤用，时适多事，而翁诲之曰：「惟苦言可以报国尔」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286168_comment'></div>亲为视表章，或具草使上之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286168_comment'></div>子由固喜忠义，然观翁意，虽有可以回曲保荣利，亦不愿其子为之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286168_comment'></div>然则知之者所以惜子由之去而哀翁之死不虚矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286168_comment'></div>翁死，上遣中使王德谦赙，举朝皆吊哭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286168_comment'></div>丧还，赴于涂、哭于郊、吊于家者，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1286168", 1286168, "Clauses/102/Comments/0")'>相属</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286168_comment'></div>且翁父子既逢时贵重，而其生死之际又为时所痛惜如此，今子由欲永先人之存，诏无穷之哀，是则述之大者已，以首于状可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286168_comment'></div>君讳云，字鼎瑞，吴郡人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286168_comment'></div>世农家，未有仕者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286168_comment'></div>居幼自知学，年十二三，已能授童子书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286168_comment'></div>既冠，入太学，文义益通达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286168_comment'></div>吴中大书会稀少，至君学蚤成，后生慕从常百馀人，勤苦诱掖，一变口耳之习。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286168_comment'></div>其荐第有名，多君门下，他师不敢望也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286168_comment'></div>考官戏曰：「吾为黄先生取士尔」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1286168_comment'></div>尝彻旧宅，将新之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1286168_comment'></div>夜半，邻近惊曰：「火且作」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1286168_comment'></div>视之，则有光发其楹下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1286168_comment'></div>或以告君，君卧自若，曰：「有是乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1286168_comment'></div>告者益众，曰：「火且作三矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1286168_comment'></div>君徐起，祝曰：「吾及儿子幸为儒，他日以是试之可也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1286168_comment'></div>未几，子由以对策言直，得赐第一人及第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1286168_comment'></div>君所对尤切，亦欲以冠特奏者，有不喜，曰：「少戆矣」，犹寘高等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1286168_comment'></div>时淳熙八年也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1286168_comment'></div>调永州祁阳县主簿，简易廉直，民爱敬之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1286168_comment'></div>辞，监建康酒库。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1286168_comment'></div>人谓君：「酒碎务，何得自屈」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1286168_comment'></div>君曰：「吾岂以儒者薄是官」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1286168_comment'></div>投明，坐垆下，治之逾谨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1286168_comment'></div>诸司更荐君，一一俛受。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1286168_comment'></div>至当改官，乃自言老病不愿，遂以通直郎致仕，卒，年六十四。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1286168_comment'></div>娶李氏，有妇道，穷约中能助君为善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1286168_comment'></div>再娶刘氏，并赠孺人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1286168_comment'></div>三子，子由长也，名由，为朝散大夫，试中书舍人，兼实录院同修撰兼侍讲；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1286168_comment'></div>次甲，进士；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1286168_comment'></div>次田，免解进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1286168_comment'></div>女归迪功郎台州天台县主簿赵汝泌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1286168_comment'></div>君<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_63_1286168", 1286168, "Clauses/194/Comments/0")'>坦荡</span>不为限级，遇人无新旧，樽酒尽欢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1286168_comment'></div>财物<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_64_1286168", 1286168, "Clauses/197/Comments/0")'>到手</span>，与亲友共费，贸丁田供粥糜而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1286168_comment'></div>而有至性。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1286168_comment'></div>四岁丧母，鞠于莫氏，其考复聘孙氏，从而室诸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1286168_comment'></div>有弟曰茂，君日自莫氏往来宁其父母，退而抚茂，风雨不懈也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1286168_comment'></div>孙氏又死，君迎父育弟，己之服具，使茂择取半焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1286168_comment'></div>茂又不进，君复空舍纳之，衣食居处无间也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1286168_comment'></div>刘氏故适士人，夫死久，尚未殡，姑老，二女幼，乃改事君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1286168_comment'></div>君为葬死者，养老者，经营其女，各有归焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1286168_comment'></div>有文二十卷，词咏从容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1286168_comment'></div>每指其心而言曰：「是方寸地，岂可忽耶」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1286168_comment'></div>庆元元年九月□日，朝请郎、试太府卿、淮东军马钱粮叶适状。</div><div id='poem_sentence_74_1286168_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1195&endYear=1195')">1195年12月29日</a>　十二月二十九日，为金坛县重建学撰文。作品：金坛县重建学记。<div id='poem_1286115' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286115' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286115?labeling=true' target='_blank'>金坛县重建学记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1195年12月29日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286115")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286115_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286115'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286115'>致学莫要于辨人己之分而审其所处之义，使己立而物不病，可以达于道矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286115_comment'></div>孟子谓「伯夷、柳下惠，百世之师也」，以孟子之言考之，伯夷以为人不尽如己，而己不可以苟用，故必不用以伸己；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286115_comment'></div>柳下惠不然，以为人固不尽如己而己亦不必志于不用，故或用或不用以伸物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286115_comment'></div>夫二人之高卑皆过矣，惟其于人己之分豫辨，而所以处之素审，故虽高而不伤物，虽卑而不丧己也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286115_comment'></div>又以孔子之言考之，「不降其志，不辱其身」，固学之至极；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286115_comment'></div>虽降志辱身，而言诚能中伦，行诚能中虑，则亦不以其身为私己也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286115_comment'></div>况于不伤物而不有其高，不丧己而无至于卑，其于人己之分尤豫辨，所以处之尤素审，一于恕而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286115_comment'></div>裁成群圣贤之道而制行定，率性尽习而教法明；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286115_comment'></div>用则自我而行可也，不用则敛藏以待也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286115_comment'></div>此孔氏之所以学，而颜、孟皆传之，古今之义理准焉，虽更燔灭坏乱，而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1286115", 1286115, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>传注</span>终不能汩，异说终不能迷也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286115_comment'></div>然则后之学孔氏何当哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286115_comment'></div>敬其所传，可与言学之方欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286115_comment'></div>简<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1286115", 1286115, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>传注</span>，辟异说，可与言道之序欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286115_comment'></div>若夫人己之分未豫辨，而以敬其所传者貌加之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286115_comment'></div>所以处之未素审，而以简<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1286115", 1286115, "Clauses/49/Comments/1")'>传注</span>、辟异说者众建之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286115_comment'></div>成己不忠而成物不恕，是故高则伤物而卑则丧己，此非孔氏之学使然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286115_comment'></div>奉议郎李松知金坛县，改旧弃陋，大为学宫，请前襄阳司理参军路芾主教后学，又请余记其大意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286115_comment'></div>昔太伯、季札蓄德于己，不较于物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286115_comment'></div>物纷然就之不足，己冲然自靖有馀也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286115_comment'></div>澹台灭明行不由径，非公事不出户，言偃以为得人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286115_comment'></div>古人之行虽殊，学虽有浅深高下，然未有不辨人己之分而审其所以处之者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286115_comment'></div>史称子游吴人也，而澹台子羽盖尝从弟子南游至江。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286115_comment'></div>方吴与越递兴，至汉、魏以后，京口常为江南必争之地，其人以智诈勇力擅名于时，而古人之遗风馀教无闻焉，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286115_comment'></div>今将因其地俗而教之以禄利，则所学者固科举之华藻尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286115_comment'></div>若将教之以道，则必自敬其所传始，必自简<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1286115", 1286115, "Clauses/80/Comments/1")'>传注</span>、辟异说始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286115_comment'></div>嗟夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286115_comment'></div>去古远而师友不明，余上考太伯、夷、惠，下参季札、子游、子羽，折之于孔氏，以为人己之分当豫辨，所以处之当素审也，盖庶几云尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286115_comment'></div>庆元元年十二月二十九日。</div><div id='poem_sentence_27_1286115_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1195&endYear=1195')">1195年</a>　为门人丁木之父撰墓志。作品：丁君墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286194' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286194' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286194?labeling=true' target='_blank'>丁君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1195年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286194")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286194_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286194'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286194'>君姓丁氏，名世雄，字少云，台州黄岩人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286194_comment'></div>曾祖皓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286194_comment'></div>祖旼，承节郎，监北恩州王子税。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286194_comment'></div>父轼，进武校尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286194_comment'></div>君少挟《周礼》应举，主司材之，欲送高处，坐不如式罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286194_comment'></div>俄而校尉死，无兼子弟，君且诵书，且应家，慨然曰：「岂天之与我有限哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286194_comment'></div>我非以家自没者也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286194_comment'></div>即其居，萦山带水，菊蕙成行，起高堂温室，朱绿照映，而穷村陋墅，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1286194", 1286194, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>焕然</span>为王侯贵人幽奇<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1286194", 1286194, "Clauses/27/Comments/1")'>闲丽</span>之境。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286194_comment'></div>君又曰：「崇饰游观非实务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286194_comment'></div>虽然，寄情物表，愿思美人，不如是亦不能抗身埃𡏖之外也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286194_comment'></div>四方之士闻而往焉，君亲敬其贤有名，厚资业其穷乏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286194_comment'></div>乡人有官私急难，常借助之，税役或为代输，疾病请药<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1286194", 1286194, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>填户</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286194_comment'></div>有以伪死乞敛具，亦不较。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286194_comment'></div>凋年，先下谷直，刻铭秤旁曰：「买物之权，惟利铢两者乱之耳」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286194_comment'></div>凡义举，众力推其首必曰丁君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286194_comment'></div>世所谓好人行好事，无不日孳孳也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286194_comment'></div>无丝发公事，足不出门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286194_comment'></div>藏屋以书，教子以师，雅乐不淫，赋咏有措。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286194_comment'></div>昔君之同堂弟希亮从余学，每为余言君曰：「吾兄甚善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286194_comment'></div>虽然，所少者专一苦学耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286194_comment'></div>子何道诱之，损其为彼，进其为此」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286194_comment'></div>于是时，希亮年已长，自悔少学不力，竭昼夜读书为文，不啻如严父师在旁<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1286194", 1286194, "Clauses/70/Comments/0")'>程督</span>之，故言君如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286194_comment'></div>余曰：「夫善有端，勤劳其身常若不足而为善者，善也，子今日是也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286194_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1286194", 1286194, "Clauses/77/Comments/0")'>安乐</span>其身常若有馀而为善者，亦善也，子之兄是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286194_comment'></div>归于善而已，不可易訾也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286194_comment'></div>君年四十九，绍熙五年六月十八日卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286194_comment'></div>庆元元年十一月初三日，葬繁昌乡温岭西山王子之墓十步。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286194_comment'></div>初娶杨氏，早卒；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286194_comment'></div>今娶戴氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286194_comment'></div>二男子，木，复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286194_comment'></div>三女子，皆嫁士人，曰郑楷、徐良臣、万钟云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286194_comment'></div>始，希亮既以其学少君，君不为变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286194_comment'></div>门内之集，希亮辄谢不预，二家宾客亦难往来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286194_comment'></div>或疑君弟兄有间，及希亮骤得疾，垂绝，无妻，子幼，乃整衣危坐，请君，托以后事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286194_comment'></div>君泣曰：「弟无匆匆」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286194_comment'></div>他日，戴氏为其内，君为其外，经纪诸用，过于希亮在时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286194_comment'></div>人又以此多君弟兄，且曰「不茍为异同也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286194_comment'></div>木使来请，余不获识君，追记答希亮语，述而铭之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286194_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_38_1286194'>手种之木，家蓄之书，皆善人之馀也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286194_comment'></div>尔后守之，岂曰弗踰，可以大厥闾也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_39_1286194_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
长沙
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='5778e8b74d9f4586b1fac7da9626c334_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("5778e8b74d9f4586b1fac7da9626c334");'><span id='5778e8b74d9f4586b1fac7da9626c334_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1201&endYear=1202')">1201-1202年</a>，52-53岁</div><div id='5778e8b74d9f4586b1fac7da9626c334' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1201&endYear=1201')">1201年</a>　叶适起复，任湖南转运判官，夏天赴任，有到任谢表。作品：湖南运判到任谢表。<div id='poem_1285837' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1285837' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1285837?labeling=true' target='_blank'>湖南运判到任谢表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1201年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1285837")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1285837_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1285837'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1285837'>冒选择于久闲之日，厚矣曷酬；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1285837_comment'></div>拜恩除于尚病之时，羸而难任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1285837_comment'></div>陈情未察，恭命勉行<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1285837_comment'></div>伏念臣思过特深，自量尤审，一昨赐归于穷舍，即甘息望于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1285837", 1285837, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>荣涂</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1285837_comment'></div>惟君父之矜怜不衰，与朝廷之记录常在，甫颁祠廪，遽锡州麾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1285837_comment'></div>虽许控辞，终蒙注意，遂出重湖之节，假以灌输之权。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1285837_comment'></div>示欲必行，严为期会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1285837_comment'></div>臣子供<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1285837", 1285837, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>奔走</span>之职，何敢屡违；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1285837_comment'></div>穹苍垂覆盖之私，所宜<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1285837", 1285837, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>仰戴</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1285837_comment'></div>载驰袢暑，绵涉修程；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1285837_comment'></div>既达置司，奉将<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1285837", 1285837, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>隆指</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1285837_comment'></div>然念臣灾屯合聚，痾恙侵凌，形质至于变移，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1285837", 1285837, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>心虑</span>从而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1285837", 1285837, "Clauses/31/Comments/1")'>昏夺</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1285837_comment'></div>累年沈痼，众药备尝，曾微<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1285837", 1285837, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>除愈</span>之期，仅有苏醒之觉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1285837_comment'></div>故人玩于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1285837", 1285837, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>存省</span>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1285837", 1285837, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>或疑</span>无他；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1285837_comment'></div>医工莫知主名，可谓<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1285837", 1285837, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>异疾</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1285837_comment'></div>今有事任于一路不为少，非展布其四体无以堪，若姑以疲惫临之，则<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1285837", 1285837, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>何但</span>卤莽而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1285837_comment'></div>更虞<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1285837", 1285837, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>阙败</span>，上累生成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1285837_comment'></div>此盖伏遇皇帝陛下，法帝尧之知人，致文王之多士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1285837_comment'></div>考于已试，宁使勿欺；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1285837_comment'></div>采其旧闻，责以来效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1285837_comment'></div>故令废惰，玷此光华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1285837_comment'></div>臣敢不销虚威以周下情，立实信以观远俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1285837_comment'></div>视残躯之可力，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1285837", 1285837, "Clauses/58/Comments/0")'>倾尽</span>而为；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1285837_comment'></div>傥宿疚之或平，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1285837", 1285837, "Clauses/60/Comments/0")'>糜捐</span>以报。</div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1285837_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1201&endYear=1201')">1201年11月9日</a>　十一月九日，岳父葬于永嘉官庄，其子嘱叶适作铭，因病不能为。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1201&endYear=1201')">1201年12月</a>　十二月，转朝散大夫。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1201&endYear=1201')">1201年</a>　是年，曾会别同年友琼州词史郭宗之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1202&endYear=1202')">1202年</a>　除秘阁修撰，仍任湖南转运判官。作品：除秘阁修撰谢表。<div id='poem_1285838' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1285838' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1285838?labeling=true' target='_blank'>除秘阁修撰谢表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1202年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1285838")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1285838_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1285838'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1285838'>谂疾丐归，将待休于一壑；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1285838_comment'></div>疏恩寓职，乃增重于三湘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1285838_comment'></div>众之所荣，臣以为忝<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1285838_comment'></div>窃以典修中秘，肇自政和，必须资历之多，号称馆阁之旧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1285838_comment'></div>属厌时望，积累<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1285838", 1285838, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>外庸</span>，不虚论撰之名，始副抡除之实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1285838_comment'></div>伏思臣者，素谓畸人，虽早污于清班，亦<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1285838", 1285838, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>滥尘</span>于烦使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1285838_comment'></div>施已深而未报，福遽过以挻灾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1285838_comment'></div>坐阅寒凉，再徂岁闰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1285838_comment'></div>及此<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1285838", 1285838, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>扶行</span>而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1285838", 1285838, "Clauses/22/Comments/1")'>问俗</span>，几成尸素以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1285838", 1285838, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>具官</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1285838_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1285838", 1285838, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>惘惘</span>于簿书之程，区区乎医药之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1285838_comment'></div>空抱膏肓之苦，莫克<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1285838", 1285838, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>砭磨</span>；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1285838_comment'></div>迄何毫发之劳，可当褒序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1285838_comment'></div>饰<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1285838", onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1285838", 1285838, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>衡听</span>，兼爱曲成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1285838_comment'></div>怜其拙疏，若在所取；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1285838_comment'></div>不缘<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1285838", 1285838, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>孤外</span>，而有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1285838", 1285838, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>遐遗</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1285838_comment'></div>使之托身文字之林，挂名奎璧之次，焕矣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1285838", 1285838, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>贲赉</span>，烨其宠章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1285838_comment'></div>臣末路幸逢，矢心<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1285838", 1285838, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>铭激</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1285838_comment'></div>怅沈痾之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1285838", 1285838, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>萦薄</span>，未测颓龄；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1285838_comment'></div>恐绵力之支离，弗酬大造。</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1285838_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1202&endYear=1202')">1202年12月</a>　十二月，除右文殿修撰，知泉州。<br /></div>

-----title
南京（建康）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='7e1794f556804257ad67f4b95b45fe53_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("7e1794f556804257ad67f4b95b45fe53");'><span id='7e1794f556804257ad67f4b95b45fe53_link' id='poem_sentence_3_1285841_comment'></div>虑先根本，则岂容忘实而徇名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1285841_comment'></div>藩墙初锐于扫除，堂奥遽烦于备警。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1285841_comment'></div>江流回绕，遂将数里而屯；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1285841_comment'></div>民力空殚，必也计丁而役。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1285841_comment'></div>募市人至万数，阅水舰且千馀，欲以岁年之规，责于旬月之近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1285841_comment'></div>自怜忧患，复苦病昏，忽被趣行，罔知攸措。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1285841_comment'></div>此盖伏遇皇帝陛下，文训武克，天施地生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1285841_comment'></div>观衣袽濡曳之爻，所宜戒惧；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1285841_comment'></div>诵<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1285841", 1285841, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>桑土绸缪</span>之句，尤在恩勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1285841_comment'></div>臣敢不怵惕以预防，拊循而夙具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1285841_comment'></div>视身衰谢，已无欲速之心；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1285841_comment'></div>凭国威灵，愿附不争之胜。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1285841_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1206&endYear=1206')">1206年10月</a>　十月，金兵南下，屯兵于定山，叶适命左领卫中郎将门人厉仲方破定山之敌，解六合之围，建康人心始定。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1206&endYear=1206')">1206年</a>　叶适辟门人张垓、滕宬及故人蔡必胜之子蔡任为幕僚，叶适用渡江劫寨之计，迫使金兵退却，滕宬赞助之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1206&endYear=1206')">1206年</a>　冬，叶适因公务劳累，旧疾之外又添新病，背病半年。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1206&endYear=1206')">1206年</a>　冬，友人程珌来建康相访，共游秦淮河。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1206&endYear=1206')">1206年</a>　魏了翁来书，请叶适为其书斋作铭，叶适应之。作品：师立斋铭。<div id='poem_1286162' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286162' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286162?labeling=true' target='_blank'>师立斋铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1206年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286162_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1286162'>人之晞圣，资盖匪夷，亦或仅有，而患<span class='link'
