href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1206&endYear=1206')">1206年</a>　是年，叶适为陈亮之子请于朝，补一官。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1206&endYear=1206')">1206年</a>　为王文礼撰墓志。作品：运使直阁郎中王公墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286226' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286226' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286226?labeling=true' target='_blank'>运使直阁郎中王公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1206年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286226")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286226_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286226'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286226'>公王氏，讳闻礼，字立之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286226_comment'></div>余既为兴之铭墓，论其家世详矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286226_comment'></div>兴之，公兄也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286226_comment'></div>初，公由太学用詹事恩补承务郎，监湖州乌青镇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286226_comment'></div>有医善为方，得赐带如从官，吏畏之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286226_comment'></div>宴圣节居卿监上，公按令黜其班。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286226_comment'></div>又有讼其留人子女者，夺以还民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286226_comment'></div>医不胜忿，挟他势摇公，因力求去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286226_comment'></div>知泉州惠安丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286226_comment'></div>时禁私庵寮，有壮屋号弥陀庵，主僧倚郡将请嘱为奸利，公捕，立<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1286226", 1286226, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>毁撤</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286226_comment'></div>守怒，诘问不测，公徐疏以实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286226_comment'></div>守因敬公，荐其贤，待军器所干办公事阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286226_comment'></div>蜀帅辟钤辖干官兼制司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286226_comment'></div>眉之豪王姓，养族人子，族人为大官，并冒其籍，已而有子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286226_comment'></div>族人子曰：「籍之财皆吾故物也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286226_comment'></div>不与弟一钱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286226_comment'></div>愬之二十年，三获罪矣，公叹曰：「世未有赍巨产而子于人者，且安得异籍」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286226_comment'></div>遂中分之，其兄乃服，诣公谢，一蜀传诵，以为名判。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286226_comment'></div>授湖北营田干官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286226_comment'></div>泸帅张孝芳被杀，贼党多免死配流，过江陵，公请帅奏于朝，正其罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286226_comment'></div>会庆节礼毕，吏以例白留山棚，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1286226", 1286226, "Clauses/59/Comments/0")'>元夕</span>张灯可就用也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286226_comment'></div>公曰：「岁不稔，民且饥，宴游可<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1286226", 1286226, "Clauses/63/Comments/1")'>预计</span>耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286226_comment'></div>力劝去之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286226_comment'></div>会公再从蜀帅辟机宜文字，将祖道，公曰：「山棚尚在，不敢」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286226_comment'></div>帅亟命除而后赴坐，人两贤之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286226_comment'></div>吴挺死，属光宗不豫，久未遣代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286226_comment'></div>或谓吴氏世捍蜀，故名吴家军，当暂置其子弟以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1286226", 1286226, "Clauses/77/Comments/0")'>俟命</span>，不然变生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286226_comment'></div>既而累摄事者至军亦皆死，蜀人尤惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286226_comment'></div>独公持不可，复选李世广摄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286226_comment'></div>又半载，朝廷始用张诏而以李为副，众乃定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286226_comment'></div>辟知黎州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286226_comment'></div>西南夷曳失索，结连青羌、吐蕃五部并反。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286226_comment'></div>公切责诸将曰：「尔辈常讽蛮使叛，而欲买降之，利在己，是以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1286226", 1286226, "Clauses/93/Comments/1")'>边祸</span>屡作」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286226_comment'></div>取最甚者赵鼎、魏大寿劾罢之，拔义勇正将杨师杰，委以讨贼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286226_comment'></div>大渡河侧有聚落曰三村，居民百馀家，素为羌乡导，贼资以入寇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286226_comment'></div>公<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1286226", 1286226, "Clauses/101/Comments/0")'>诱降</span>之，徙于内地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286226_comment'></div>邛部川王者，盛于诸羌，有女儿城，贼借以出兵，公以逆顺喻之，愿助王师，曳失索势始离。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286226_comment'></div>然犹举数千人围安静寨，公厚赏募士，内外合击，大破贼，斩获粮仗，得免者十三四。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286226_comment'></div>诸将欲乘胜渡河，公止之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286226_comment'></div>曳失索请以买和旧约得犒而降，公不许，曰：「汝能敛兵束手，当贷汝死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1286226_comment'></div>否唯有战耳」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1286226_comment'></div>公于安静新旧寨中间，择险要筑艮溪寨，视二寨之阙修完之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1286226_comment'></div>踰年，曳失索乞降甚哀，公已移知常州矣，为庭受礼毕径去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1286226_comment'></div>曳失索泣送曰：「我以安抚恩威故来，今安归乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1286226_comment'></div>公慰遣曰：「汝第驯弭王化，无他虑也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1286226_comment'></div>自曳失索畔服二年中，公本末精审，不失机变，今载其大者如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1286226_comment'></div>常之狱，有手刃佣主及家数人皆死，焚其庐，州以无證佐奏裁，公亟具駮论如法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1286226_comment'></div>公在常，如詹事治鄱，以明义厚俗省争讼为本，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_47_1286226", 1286226, "Clauses/149/Comments/0")'>滞案</span>如山，予夺皆尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1286226_comment'></div>秩且满，旱乾无年，公疏：「<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_48_1286226", 1286226, "Clauses/154/Comments/1")'>救荒</span>莫若预，绍熙末，费数十百万而人相枕死如故者，行之晚也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1286226_comment'></div>又禁米不出境，面无越疆，虽贵家护载，上司督发，皆不听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1286226_comment'></div>是岁，田无𦮼秆，而民食犹自如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1286226_comment'></div>朝廷命公留，将卒行之，不乐者排公，竟罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1286226_comment'></div>起知德安府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1286226_comment'></div>改太府丞，除考功郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1286226_comment'></div>建言：「磨勘法，文臣以四年，武臣以五年，而起理必自五六年之一日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1286226_comment'></div>然或四五年而为岁六十九，则五六年之一日而有不得任其后者矣，非天子所以优臣下也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1286226_comment'></div>请限岁终得磨勘」，至今行之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1286226_comment'></div>出为江东转运判官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1286226_comment'></div>约浮拾漏，未久，有钱三十万缗，别藏以待非常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1286226_comment'></div>为部内损积逋，减月解，广德赈饥，宣州南康修学养士费皆自出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1286226_comment'></div>急吏缓民，损上益下，随形纠割，风俗大改。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1286226_comment'></div>加直秘阁，仍运判，以病主冲佑观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1286226_comment'></div>归，至兰溪，开禧二年六月十九日卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1286226_comment'></div>前数日，与余书，论事耿耿，不疑其有疾也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1286226_comment'></div>十二月辛酉，葬于白岩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1286226_comment'></div>宜人万氏，先卒，再室以张氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1286226_comment'></div>子曰仲龙，迪功郎、江淮宣抚司准备差遣，曰驲，某官；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1286226_comment'></div>曰骕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1286226_comment'></div>二婿，曰朱蕴厚，曰薛师谦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1286226_comment'></div>公果敢激烈，当官职与事，遇法理不顺者，直前疏治，矢纵川决，莫敢<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_69_1286226", 1286226, "Clauses/224/Comments/0")'>婴忤</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1286226_comment'></div>信其志，虽雷霆独立，犹面折无讳也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1286226_comment'></div>在荆州，向余剧语詹事绍、隆间忧劳忠虑，于时正邪贤不肖，一一记忆无遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1286226_comment'></div>夫能知兄弟之意以达之于行事，步趋若一人，尺度若一手，至充之于性，放之于古，其不合者少矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1286226_comment'></div>而惎公者曰：「此一家政事尔」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1286226_comment'></div>余昔至泉，距詹事三十五年矣，其人思而爱之如初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1286226_comment'></div>至浮光，兴之遗迹又余所亲见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1286226_comment'></div>及公摄阆而遽去，去常而复游也，画像以祠，刊石以纪，倾郭而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_76_1286226", 1286226, "Clauses/249/Comments/0")'>逆送</span>，扶舟而后先不绝也，一家政事何如哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1286226_comment'></div>然则为公子孙者，皆勤其业，皆遵其教，民世世被之，皆曰一家政事然也，不亦善乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1286226_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_78_1286226'>仁智同源而异术，盐梅同味而异物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1286226_comment'></div>伟欤立之！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1286226_comment'></div>而以刚闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1286226_comment'></div>资之以仁，从兄之温。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1286226_comment'></div>高冈千寻，洪流万里；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1286226_comment'></div>不为清谈，著于已事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1286226_comment'></div>非色非声，众人母之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1286226_comment'></div>咨尔后来，尚祢祖之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_85_1286226_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1207&endYear=1207')">1207年1月27日</a>　一月二十七，奏请沿江制置史依照沿海制置使例，荐举属官，从之。作品：正月二十七日知建康府兼沿江制置使叶适奏文。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1207&endYear=1207')">1207年2月16日</a>　二月十六，除宝文阁待制，改兼江淮制置使，措置屯田。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1207&endYear=1207')">1207年2月</a>　二月，奏请安集两淮。作品：安集两淮申省状。<div id='poem_1285853' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1285853' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1285853?labeling=true' target='_blank'>安集两淮申省状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1207年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1285853")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1285853_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1285853'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1285853'>右逐一开具在前外，然其间利害曲折，亦复不少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1285853_comment'></div>某窃照去岁虏入两淮，所残破处，安丰、濠、盱眙、楚、庐、和、扬凡七郡，其民奔迸渡江求活者几二十万家，而依山傍水相保聚以自固者亦几二十万家；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1285853_comment'></div>今所团结，即其保聚不流徙者，虽不能尽在其中，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1285853", 1285853, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>大约</span>已十馀万家矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1285853_comment'></div>其流徙者，死于冻饿疾疫，几殚其半；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1285853_comment'></div>而保聚之民，亦有为虏驱掠而去者；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1285853_comment'></div>散为盗贼，则又不在焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1285853_comment'></div>度今七郡之民，通计三十万家，和议未定，室庐不成；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1285853_comment'></div>就使和议有定，其短长之期又未可知；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1285853_comment'></div>此三十万家者，终当皇皇无所归宿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1285853_comment'></div>盖淮上<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1285853", 1285853, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>四战</span>之场，虏敌往来之地，民生其间，势固应尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1285853_comment'></div>然自古立国，未尝不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1285853", 1285853, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>有以</span>处之也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1285853_comment'></div>无以处之，则地为弃地而国谁与共守！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1285853_comment'></div>设使今岁边报复急，此三十万家者，又将奔迸流徙而丧其生乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1285853_comment'></div>春秋、战国之时，画国而守，大为城邑，小为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1285853", 1285853, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>垒壁</span>，百里之国，皆有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1285853", 1285853, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>边面</span>，自非暴君苛政，其民未尝散之四方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1285853_comment'></div>两汉以后，裂为南北，中原不合者凡数百年，人在战地，各自为家，养生送死，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1285853", 1285853, "Clauses/52/Comments/0")'>老子长孙</span>，未尝有阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1285853_comment'></div>彼非<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1285853", 1285853, "Clauses/54/Comments/0")'>有以</span>自守，不肯轻弃其乡，安能如此！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1285853_comment'></div>自唐以后至于本朝，以和戎为国是，千里之州，百里之邑，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1285853", 1285853, "Clauses/61/Comments/0")'>混然</span>一区，烟火相望，无有捍蔽，一旦胡尘猝起，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1285853", 1285853, "Clauses/65/Comments/0")'>星飞云散</span>，无有能自保者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1285853_comment'></div>南渡之后，前经逆亮之祸，近有仆散揆之寇，累世生聚，一朝荡然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1285853_comment'></div>故某昨于国家营度规恢之初，以为未须便做，且当于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1285853", 1285853, "Clauses/74/Comments/0")'>边淮</span>先募弓弩手，耕<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1285853", 1285853, "Clauses/75/Comments/0")'>极边</span>三十里之地，西至襄、汉，东尽楚、泗，约可十万家，列屋而居，使<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1285853", 1285853, "Clauses/80/Comments/0")'>边面</span>牢实，虏人不得踰越，所以安其外也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1285853_comment'></div>盖汉、唐守边郡而安中州，未有不如此者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1285853_comment'></div>今事已无及，长淮之险，与虏共之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1285853_comment'></div>惟有因民之欲，令其依山阻水，自相保聚，用其豪杰，借其声势，縻以小职，济其急难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1285853_comment'></div>春夏散耕，秋冬入保，大将凭城郭，诸使总号令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1285853_comment'></div>虏虽大入，而吾之人民安堵如故，扣城则不下，攻壁则不入，然后设伏以诱其进，纵兵以扰其归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1285853_comment'></div>使此谋果定，行之有成，又何汲汲于畏虏乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1285853_comment'></div>所以安其内也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1285853_comment'></div>夫徒手搏虎以幸其毙，一夫之勇也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1285853_comment'></div>一夫之勇未必验，而一夫之怯，其为验也决矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1285853_comment'></div>为天下者，不以天下之大而就一夫之勇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1285853_comment'></div>故某愿朝廷以谋困虏，以计守边，安集两淮，以捍江面。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1285853_comment'></div>使淮人不遁，则虏又安敢萌窥江之谋乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1285853_comment'></div>故堡坞之作，山水寨之聚，守以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1285853", 1285853, "Clauses/124/Comments/0")'>精志</span>，行以强力，少而必精，小而必坚，毋徇空言而妨实利，则今日之所行，与汉、唐之屯田，六朝、三国、春秋之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1285853", 1285853, "Clauses/131/Comments/2")'>垒壁</span>，彼各<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1285853", 1285853, "Clauses/132/Comments/0")'>有以</span>施之，不相谋而相得故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1285853_comment'></div>伏乞照会指挥施行！</div><div id='poem_sentence_32_1285853_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1207&endYear=1207')">1207年2月</a>　二月，上堡坞之议。作品：条陈堡坞五事。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1207&endYear=1207')">1207年2月</a>　二月，奏荐门人滕宬，诏赐廉靖处士。作品：奏荐滕贤良。<div id='poem_1285847' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1285847' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1285847?labeling=true' target='_blank'>奏荐滕贤良</a><span class='authorDate'>（1207年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1285847")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1285847_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1285847'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1285847'>臣闻国家之求材，因其欲进而与之进，则臣职修；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1285847_comment'></div>因其欲退而与之退，则士节励。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1285847_comment'></div>二者皆于治道有益，而退为难能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1285847_comment'></div>臣伏见平江府布衣滕宬，权知三省枢密院事康之孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1285847_comment'></div>少有绝识，文行兼茂，外示淳朴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1285847_comment'></div>及与之斟酌世故，动中机微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1285847_comment'></div>淳熙中，以贤良召，阁试肆通，为考官排沮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1285847_comment'></div>孝宗惜之，降旨再试，会内禅而止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1285847_comment'></div>比岁近臣又加论荐，士人叹息，以为近世科目淹久，无如宬者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1285847_comment'></div>而宬廉靖自乐，不竞不絿，年踰五十，绝意仕进，萧然一廛，甘于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1285847", 1285847, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>退老</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1285847_comment'></div>迹其清裁，可以范世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1285847_comment'></div>臣愚伏望圣慈，念孝宗延登之勤，嘉宬操行之美，特赐一处士名目，以旌冲尚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1285847_comment'></div>臣干犯天威，不胜震惧！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1285847_comment'></div>伏候敕旨<span class='inlineComment2'>（《水心文集》卷二七。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1285847_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_1285847'>此下原有「三月一日奉圣旨，赐廉靖处士」句，属追记文字。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1285847_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1207&endYear=1207')">1207年</a>　夏间，友人李埴（原字为“上直下土”）来建康，请叶适为其父李焘《巽岩集》作序。作品：巽言集序。<div id='poem_1285897' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1285897' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1285897?labeling=true' target='_blank'>巽岩集序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1207年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1285897")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1285897_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1285897'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1285897'>「李氏《续通鉴》，《春秋》之后，财有此书」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1285897_comment'></div>此言非欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1285897_comment'></div>自史法坏，谱谍绝，百家异传，与《诗》、《书》、《春秋》并行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1285897_comment'></div>而汉至五季，事多在记，后史官常狼狈收拾，仅能成篇，呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1285897_comment'></div>其何以信天下也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1285897_comment'></div>《通鉴》虽幸复古，然由千有馀岁之后追战国、秦、汉之前则远矣，疑词误说流于人心久矣，方将<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1285897", 1285897, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>钩索</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1285897", 1285897, "Clauses/17/Comments/1")'>质验</span>，贯殊析同，力诚劳而势难一矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1285897_comment'></div>及公据变复之会，乘岁月之存，断自本朝，凡实录、正史、官文书，无不是正，就一律也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1285897_comment'></div>而又家录、野记，旁互参审，毫发不使<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1285897", 1285897, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>遁逸</span>，邪正心迹，随卷较然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1285897_comment'></div>夫孔子所以正时月日必取于《春秋》者，近而其书具也，今惟《续通鉴》为然尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1285897_comment'></div>故余谓「《春秋》之后，财有此书」，信之所聚也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1285897_comment'></div>虽然，公终不敢自成书，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1285897", 1285897, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>第使</span>至约出于至详，至简成于至繁，以待后人而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1285897_comment'></div>学者奚不于此取衷哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1285897_comment'></div>余少则习《长编》，恨公他文未能得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1285897_comment'></div>会与公子参知政事壁、湖北帅𡌴善，𡌴至金陵，以公集示余，因属为序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1285897_comment'></div>自有文字以来，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1285897", 1285897, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>名世</span>数十，大抵以笔势纵放、<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1285897", 1285897, "Clauses/51/Comments/1")'>凌厉</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1285897", 1285897, "Clauses/51/Comments/2")'>驰骋</span>为极功，风霆怒而江河流，六骥调而八音和，春辉秋明而海澄岳静也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1285897_comment'></div>高者自能，馀则勉而效之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1285897_comment'></div>虽然，此韩愈所谓下逮《庄》、《骚》，其上无是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1285897_comment'></div>观公大篇详而正，短语简而法，初未尝藻黼琢镂，以媚俗为意；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1285897_comment'></div>曾点之瑟方希，化人之酒欲清，又非以声色臭味自怡悦也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1285897_comment'></div>独于古文坠学，堂上之议，起虞造周，如挈裘领振之焉，固遗其下而独至其上者欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1285897_comment'></div>蜀自三苏死，公父子兄弟后起，兼方合流以就家学，综练古今名实之际，有补于世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1285897_comment'></div>天下传以继苏氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1285897_comment'></div>公讳焘，字仁甫，立朝有大节，屡进辄自引去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1285897_comment'></div>晚为杂学士，专史事，天子方倚以政，不幸卒矣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1285897_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1207&endYear=1207')">1207年5月</a>　五月，祷雨于祠山张王庙。作品：祷雨题张王庙。<div id='poem_80194' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_80194' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/80194?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祷雨题张王庙</a><span class='authorDate'>（1207年5月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_80194")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_80194_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_80194'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_80194'>夏至老秧含寸荑，平田回回不敢犁。<div id='poem_sentence_0_80194_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_80194'>群农无计相聚泣，欲将泪点和乾泥。<div id='poem_sentence_1_80194_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_80194'>祠山今古同一敬，签卦分明指休證。<div id='poem_sentence_2_80194_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_80194'>传言杯珓三日期，注绠翻车连晓暝。<div id='poem_sentence_3_80194_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_80194'>龙神波后何惨怆，昔睡今醒喜萧爽。<div id='poem_sentence_4_80194_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_80194'>人云天上行水曹，取此<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_80194", 80194, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>化权</span>如反掌。<div id='poem_sentence_5_80194_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_80194'>浙河以东尽淮壖，哀哉震泽几为原。<div id='poem_sentence_6_80194_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_80194'>愿王顿首玉帝前，请赐此雨周无偏<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_7_80194_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_80194'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_80194_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_80194'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_7_80194_0'>⑴ 开禧三年春不雨江河浅狭田野皆枯裂夏至秧老忧不得入土祷于祠山庙期以三日逾夕而雨大降插种毕犹有馀泽乃作此诗刻于庙庑建邺守龙泉叶适</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_80194_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1207&endYear=1207')">1207年</a>　逾夕雨大降，撰谢雨文。作品：祠山谢雨文。<div id='poem_1286390' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286390' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286390?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祠山谢雨文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1207年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286390")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286390_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286390'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286390'>乃五月乙酉，雨昼夜不止，百泉交趋，千壑并至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286390_comment'></div>或耘其前，歌长以谣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286390_comment'></div>或播其后，笑而忘号。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286390_comment'></div>担牲挈壶，敬谢明德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286390_comment'></div>伊苗有稚，谁稼之穑。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1286390_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1207&endYear=1207')">1207年6月5日</a>　六月五日，奏请准江淮制置司荐举属员。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1207&endYear=1207')">1207年</a>　朝廷急于求知，叶适以为不必，乃请力修堡坞以自固，夏，经营定山、瓜步、石跋三堡坞成，上三处堡坞图本并四十七处团结山寨居民户口姓名账册。作品：定山瓜步石跋三堡坞状。<div id='poem_1285854' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1285854' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1285854?labeling=true' target='_blank'>定山瓜步石跋三堡坞状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1207年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1285854")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1285854_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1285854'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1285854'>某昨蒙差兼江淮制置，专一措置屯田。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1285854_comment'></div>被命之始，即尝深念，以为今之屯田，与昔不同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1285854_comment'></div>夫省运就粮，分兵久驻，磨以岁月，待敌之变，此昔日屯田之常论也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1285854_comment'></div>顷自虏寇<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1285854", 1285854, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>惊骚</span>，淮人奔迸南渡，生理破坏，田舍<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1285854", 1285854, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>荒墟</span>，十郡萧然，无复保聚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1285854_comment'></div>今之所急，在于耕其旧业而复其所常安，守其旧庐而忘其所甚畏尔，岂得以昔日之常论冒行之乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1285854_comment'></div>故某逐急，且于江北创立三堡，先作一层。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1285854_comment'></div>今三堡既就，流民渐归，所宜招徕安集，量加赈贷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1285854_comment'></div>令于东西一二百里、南北三四十里之内，其旧有田舍者，依本住坐，元无本业，随便居止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1285854_comment'></div>其间有强壮者，稍加劝募，给之弓弩，教以习射，时命<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1285854", 1285854, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>程试</span>，利以赏激。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1285854_comment'></div>度一堡界分内，可得二千家为率，万一虏骑今秋再至，随处入堡，与官兵共守，此今日经营之大略也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1285854_comment'></div>至于屏蔽江南，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1285854", 1285854, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>防把</span>口岸，则其说尤长，敢不尽布愚悃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1285854_comment'></div>某去岁忝缀朝列，首建防江之议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1285854_comment'></div>继来建康，考详前后案牍，无非葺治战舰，布列岸兵，栽埋鹿角，钉设暗桩，开掘沟堑，计步而守，数里而屯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1285854_comment'></div>皆元勋故老之已行，谋臣策士之素讲，虽其间用之有利不利，然终未有能舍此而特立者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1285854_comment'></div>况某晚进末学，何所能为，不过守举旧事，期于无阙而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1285854_comment'></div>如鹿角、暗桩之类，去岁论者固尝指为儿戏，及扣其别有何策，则又寂无所言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1285854_comment'></div>某犹谓厉人心而坚守，阻大江而自固，则如前数事，亦岂不足以立功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1285854_comment'></div>至十月之末，边遽告急，淮人渡江以亿万计，江南震动，众情惶惑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1285854_comment'></div>一日，有两骑伪效番装，跃马江岸，相传虏人至矣，济渡之舟，斫缆离岸，橹楫失措，渡者攀舟，覆溺数十百人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1285854_comment'></div>某始叹息曰：「是真不足赖也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1285854_comment'></div>今虽岸步有寨，江流有船，鹿角、暗桩，数重并设，沟堑深阔，不可越踰，其如人心已摇，谁与力拒！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1285854_comment'></div>万一虏兵果至，彼皆弃之而走尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1285854_comment'></div>所以建炎、绍兴之间，兀术辈未尝不径渡江南，如逆亮之不得济而殒者，幸也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1285854_comment'></div>于是始捐重赏，募勇士，渡江北，劫虏营，石跋、定山上下，凡十数往返，取其俘馘，系累以报，江南<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1285854", 1285854, "Clauses/114/Comments/0")'>奋气</span>，见者贾勇，而人心始安，虏亦由此卷甲遁矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1285854_comment'></div>然后知三国孙氏常以江北守江，而不以江南守江，至于六朝，无不皆然，乃昔人已用之明验。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1285854_comment'></div>自南唐以来，始稍失之，故建炎、绍兴不暇寻绎尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1285854_comment'></div>然渡江之兵，苦于江北无家，基寨无所驻足，故石斌贤之徒不能成大功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1285854_comment'></div>宣司尝急呼封彦明、王益，欲令将兵策应和州，竟闵嘿而止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1285854_comment'></div>今石跋则屏蔽采石，定山则屏蔽靖安，瓜步则屏蔽东阳、下蜀，西护历阳，东连仪真，缓急应援，首尾联络，所筑皆是故基，砖石犹在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1285854_comment'></div>今各堡无事之时，只以五百人一将戍守，常加修葺，勿使废坏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1285854_comment'></div>收聚居民，与之为主，令岸渡繁会，自成市井。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1285854_comment'></div>若万一有警，乞从朝廷即令各堡增募一千人，照吐浑等仗，并与帮收，总领所请给，随堡防守教阅，诸州禁兵抽摘二千人，以九月至，并于防江效用内摘那千人，各堡二千五百人，并堡坞内外居民二千家之胜兵者，或临时旋行招募，亦各二千人，各堡通为四千五百人，相共守把。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1285854_comment'></div>然后令制置司以八九月别募精勇敢死士千人，厚帮请给，以待劫寨焚粮直前搏击之用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1285854_comment'></div>盖堡坞之成，于防江有四利：往日江南列营五万人，去岁亦不下三万，而民兵不预。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1285854_comment'></div>然止可坐食而守，敌果窥江，责其不走，固已难矣，而况进战乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1285854_comment'></div>何者？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1285854_comment'></div>虏在北岸，共长江之险，兵众骑多，而吾军之气已夺矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1285854_comment'></div>今堡坞既立，虏有所忌，固不敢窥江。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1285854_comment'></div>就使来窥，江南岸兵胆气自生，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_38_1285854", 1285854, "Clauses/188/Comments/0")'>志力</span>得展，使之前进，无所畏怯，一利也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1285854_comment'></div>虽有各处战舰，然虏已在江岸，或声言夺船径渡，或实为造舟之势，我之舟师往往不敢放出北岸，胜负未决，旁观胆落，忧恐万端。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1285854_comment'></div>今堡坞既成，虏纵在江北，我有应接之利，或近岸排列，千弩并发；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1285854_comment'></div>或舍舟登岸，乘势击逐，二利也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1285854_comment'></div>至于海舟，风帆八面，便利捷疾，尤在舟师之上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1285854_comment'></div>然迫虏于岸而收全功者其势易，俟其入江而决死斗者其势难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1285854_comment'></div>今堡坞既成，有易无难，三利也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1285854_comment'></div>战舰甲士，虚闭舟中，拥戈坐观，从昔病之，无策可治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1285854_comment'></div>今舟得便利，人无虚设，四利也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1285854_comment'></div>使虏果忌堡坞为彼之害，或拥大众，志在必取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1285854_comment'></div>今石跋、瓜步，近在江津，定山去江才三里尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1285854_comment'></div>我以战舰海舟为江中家计，强弩所及，虏人腹背受敌，自投死地，理在不疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1285854_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_50_1285854", 1285854, "Clauses/236/Comments/0")'>脱若</span>虏人畏而不前，置而不问，尽力攻击和、滁、真、六合等城，或有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_50_1285854", 1285854, "Clauses/239/Comments/0")'>退遁</span>，我以堡坞全力助其逐袭，或形其前，或出其后，制胜必矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1285854_comment'></div>此堡坞之利，所以为用力寡而收功博，孙氏、六朝以江北而守江南，能立国于百战之馀者，非幸也，数也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1285854_comment'></div>故某欲因屯田堡坞之立，收兵民杂守之用，屏蔽江面，先作一层，使江北之民，心有所恃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1285854_comment'></div>虏虽再来，不复求渡，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_53_1285854", 1285854, "Clauses/258/Comments/0")'>腾突</span>纷扰，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_53_1285854", 1285854, "Clauses/259/Comments/0")'>贻乱</span>江南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1285854_comment'></div>次第入深，因其险要，用其豪杰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1285854_comment'></div>见团结山水为寨者四十七处，此于官司之力，无缘周遍，特借以声势，使自为守，春夏散耕，秋冬入堡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1285854_comment'></div>盖孙氏、六朝保固江、淮之成规，非充国先零、枣祗许下之谓也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1285854_comment'></div>不然，则南北并争之际，无岁不有兵革，淮人岂能屡逃屡复，以自滨于流离死亡也哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1285854_comment'></div>某自去冬，忧悸熏心，旧疾之外，复增新病，背病半年，呻吟宛转。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1285854_comment'></div>自有改兼江、淮之命，不敢辞避，力疾督趣，成此三堡，其间条目，极有未备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1285854_comment'></div>而某羸證既成，不能扶持忍死，以待毕事，岂胜惭惧！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1285854_comment'></div>伏乞朝廷速赐选择总练<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_61_1285854", 1285854, "Clauses/293/Comments/0")'>通方</span>老于智谋之士，前来建康，纠剔某妄作疏漏之失，考寻前史规画缜密之旧，克集功绪，以究远图，某不任祈叩之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1285854_comment'></div>所有定山、瓜步、石跋三处堡坞图本，并四十七处团结山水寨居民户口姓名帐册，谨随状缴申，伏乞指挥施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1285854_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_63_1285854'>一、自江距淮，地里阔远，加以濠梁残寇未退，人情忧疑，未敢放心复业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1285854_comment'></div>保聚之计，只得自近而远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1285854_comment'></div>今欲先于沿江地分真、滁、和三州，各立堡坞一层，如真州则于瓜步，滁州则于定山一带<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，和州则于杨林、石跋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1285854_comment'></div>不但缓急之际，可以保卫居民，亦可捍蔽江面，以待策应<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1285854_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_67_1285854'>一、上项瓜步、定山、杨林、石跋，并合从官司措置，随其地势，或依山，或阻水，就加葺理，务令牢实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1285854_comment'></div>此外入深第二层，更择别有山水险要可充堡坞去处，接续措置，以次申奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1285854_comment'></div>其沿边差官未及去处，见已出给公据，付忠义头目等人，分头前去说谕各处土豪，令从便一面先次团结，本司即与差官覆实措置，乃量立赏格，以示激劝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1285854_comment'></div>今具所给公据如后<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1285854_comment'></div>此项目今淮上如和州沥湖有胡知礼，盱眙嘉山有赵玘兄弟等，去岁皆自团结，虏骑侵犯，已能保守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1285854_comment'></div>内沥湖曾射杀虏统军并人骑甚众，遗尸至今满河，功赏未录。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1285854_comment'></div>其他安丰、光、黄等处，往往皆有土豪保聚之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1285854_comment'></div>官司要须因其险阻，斟酌措置，俟见次第，续行条具申明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1285854_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_75_1285854'>一、瓜步、定山、杨林、石跋等处，系是捍蔽江面，不止为淮民保聚之计，合于内起盖芦䕠屋，屯驻官兵及应副本司官吏，安泊桩顿钱粮军器等<span class='inlineComment2'>（内仓敖甲仗库等，合用瓦屋。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1285854_comment'></div>仍开掘壕堑，筑垒土城，以备虏骑冲突，及其馀接续措置去处，所有工料钱米，难以便行拘掯，归一数目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1285854_comment'></div>欲乞朝廷科拨钱四十万贯，米一十万石，付进东、西总领所桩管，仍就总领所差官受给。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1285854_comment'></div>遇有本司支遣，即关牒照数支破，俟结局日，具细数申朝廷出豁施行<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1285854_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_79_1285854'>一、今来所立堡坞，盖为各自保护一处，及虏或冲突攻围，即互策应，烧劫营寨，出奇立功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1285854_comment'></div>所用军器，合从官司量行给付。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1285854_comment'></div>照得两淮民兵，最便于皮笠、纸甲、皮甲、短装弩，胜于铁兜鍪、铁甲及神劲、剋敌等弩远甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1285854_comment'></div>又其工费难易，相去十之七八。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1285854_comment'></div>此外如三叉枪、短枪、手斧、提刀之类，皆不可阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1285854_comment'></div>今当以十万人军器为率。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1285854_comment'></div>欲乞朝廷行下内郡，逐急分头置造施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1285854_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_86_1285854'>一、两淮地分，除舒、蕲、通、泰诸州人户见自安业，不用措置外，有庐、和、濠、光、扬、楚、真、滁州、安丰、高邮、盱眙及黄州、故镇、无为、巢县等处，并合从上项条具，次第措置施行。</div><div id='poem_sentence_86_1285854_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1285854'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_65_1285854_0'>⑴ 定山一带系属真、和州界，缘沿江别无滁州地分，惟定山一带，最为径便。其滁州人户愿就此处保聚者听从。所有税役，自合仍旧属真、和州。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_66_1285854_0'>⑵ 去岁虏骑蹂践两淮，曾于瓜步、定山一带劄寨，及于杨林、石跋窥觇江面。今措置保聚，最为紧切去处。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_70_1285854_0'>⑶ 当司今差某人前去某州军界内说谕：本处土豪有信义为众所推服之人，先与借补官资，差充总首，令各从便选择地利，依山傍水，可充堡坞去处，团结人户，防备虏骑冲突，目即劝诱流民复业，且就便居止，或有急难，则入坞屯聚。如保守无虞，即当差官前去点检，照当司所定则例，具申朝廷，正补官资施行。今开具下项三千口以上补进勇副尉，五千口以上补进义副尉，一万口以上补进义校尉，一万五千口以上补进武校尉，二万口以上补承信郎，三万口以上补成节郎，四万口以上补保义郎，五万口以上补成忠郎。右帖付某人，仰执此前去，多方说谕。仍开具已说谕到土豪姓名，及图画堡坞去处山水形势，逐一贴说缴申，切待差官覆实施行。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_78_1285854_0'>⑷ 兼照若兴此役，流民必多应募，因可以赡给之，不至狼狈失所。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1285854_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1207&endYear=1207')">1207年</a>　叶适因病乞辞，朝廷准，由其同乡好友徐谊于七月十七日接任，时，袁聘儒佐助叶适建堡坞。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1207&endYear=1207')">1207年</a>　是年，门人金华王植来建康，请铭其妇庄氏。作品：庄夫人墓志铭。<div id='poem_1286215' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1286215' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1286215?labeling=true' target='_blank'>庄夫人墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1207年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25184, "南宋", "叶适", "poem_title_1286215")'>叶适</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1286215_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1286215'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1286215'>庆元戊午，余始居生姜门外西湖上，金华王植立之实来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1286215_comment'></div>于时士相禁以学，立之宰相家子，匿姓名，舍辎重，从余穷绝处，水村夜寂，蟹舍一渔火隐约，而立之执书循厓，且诵且思，声甚<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1286215", 1286215, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>悲苦</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1286215_comment'></div>其中表有仕永嘉者，节朔设坫盛集，立之独后至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1286215_comment'></div>中表笑曰：「上学来欤」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1286215_comment'></div>盖靳之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1286215_comment'></div>自是岁率一来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1286215_comment'></div>他日，余过立之，屋墙静修，牖案洁清，僮御敬勤，物具中仪，余固惑焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1286215_comment'></div>凡学于外者，必弛于家，今乃不若是，何欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1286215_comment'></div>问所以然，则其夫人庄氏之力也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1286215_comment'></div>庄氏归立之二十馀年，一切以劳自当，而奉夫子于学，故立之不为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1286215", 1286215, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>訾省</span>而家事自治，斯异矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1286215_comment'></div>夫母于子能使之学，古今常道；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1286215_comment'></div>妇于夫能劝其学，非今也，古人之事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1286215_comment'></div>母之于子有禄利，故使之学，非必贤母而后能也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1286215_comment'></div>妇于夫将以垂其名，非必有禄利，其劝之学，非贤妇人不能矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1286215_comment'></div>余先人祥之岁，立之来而亟去，止之不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1286215_comment'></div>曰：「妇将免，吾欲勿行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1286215_comment'></div>妇曰：『第往，吾期未也』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1286215_comment'></div>今其未或既皆不可知，吾速返矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1286215_comment'></div>夫不以一身之急废其夫千里之会，斯又贤也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1286215_comment'></div>去年余在建邺，立之来，歔欷曰：「庄氏，子所谓贤者，丙寅八月初七死矣，十二月十四，葬某所矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1286215_comment'></div>其归也，不及事吾父母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1286215_comment'></div>吾祖妣，魏国之爱也，庄氏孝事之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1286215_comment'></div>吾之褊也，庄氏<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1286215", 1286215, "Clauses/77/Comments/0")'>柔承</span>之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1286215_comment'></div>吾女弟行也，而尽用其奁中物；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1286215_comment'></div>外妹不能嫁也，而割其田。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1286215_comment'></div>其俭至于惜一钱，而以为吾师友之费；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1286215_comment'></div>吾之困无一言，而以吾之得从巨人名士为其身之喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1286215_comment'></div>吾之友二弟也，虽贫，而四十口之聚无所间；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1286215_comment'></div>曰传、任、备，是三子也，虽幼，而能不以小且近教之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1286215_comment'></div>吾已矣，无所复望于今世，而谓庄氏之足以终吾身也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1286215_comment'></div>而卒至此，信矣其穷也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1286215_comment'></div>子哀吾者，其得无辞乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1286215_comment'></div>余曰：「然」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1286215_comment'></div>夫人名则，亦金华人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1286215_comment'></div>二女，曰师莒，奴奴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1286215_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_35_1286215'>不妄喜愠，成妇之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1286215_comment'></div>不苟利泽，知学之获。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1286215_comment'></div>益封我原，益树我杞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1286215_comment'></div>既以其夫，亦以其子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1286215_comment'></div>嘉定元年七月□日。</div><div id='poem_sentence_39_1286215_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
宁国
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='f052b8bcce5548a4a0919ec317ce360a_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("f052b8bcce5548a4a0919ec317ce360a");'><span id='f052b8bcce5548a4a0919ec317ce360a_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1207&endYear=1207')">1207年</a>，58岁</div><div id='f052b8bcce5548a4a0919ec317ce360a' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1207&endYear=1207')">1207年7月</a>　七月，奉召赴（临安）行在，返临安时，因病舍舟山行，过宁国县，得识知县应懋之。<br /></div>
-----end



-----title
绍兴（会稽）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='acde0e4eda7543c680caa7588f447ff7_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("acde0e4eda7543c680caa7588f447ff7");'><span id='acde0e4eda7543c680caa7588f447ff7_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1223&endYear=1223')">1223年</a>，74岁</div><div id='acde0e4eda7543c680caa7588f447ff7' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1223&endYear=1223')">1223年10月</a>　十月，汪纲刻《习学记言》于绍兴郡斋，并跋。<br /></div>
-----end
